ContentCN: 親愛主，是我四圍盾牌，
ContentEN: Thou, O Lord, are a shield about me,

ContentCN: 是我榮耀，祢使我昂然抬頭。(2x)
ContentEN: You’re my glory, You’re the lifter of my soul.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞，哈利路亞，
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Hallelujah,

ContentCN: 哈利路亞，祢使我昂然抬頭。
ContentEN: Hallelujah, You’re the lifter of my soul.

ContentCN: 來歡呼耶穌!歡呼以馬內利!
ContentEN: All hail King Jesus! All hail Emmanuel!

ContentCN: 萬王之王，萬主之主，明亮晨星。
ContentEN: King of kings, Lord of lords, Bright Morning Star.

ContentCN: 我要歌唱讚美祢，永遠讚美祢
ContentEN: And throughout eternity I'll sing Your praises.

ContentCN: 我要與祢同作王，直到永遠。
ContentEN: And I'll reign with You throughout eternity.

ContentCN: 永永遠遠祂是
ContentEN: Forever He will be

ContentCN: 寶座上的羔羊，
ContentEN: The Lamb upon the throne.

ContentCN: 我要歡喜跪拜，
ContentEN: I gladly bow the knee

ContentCN: 單單要敬拜祂。
ContentEN: And worship Him alone.

ContentCN: 諸天宣揚
ContentEN: All heav'n declares

ContentCN: 復活之主的榮耀，
ContentEN: The glory of the risen Lord.

ContentCN: 誰能相比
ContentEN: Who can compare

ContentCN: 我主的聖潔美麗？
ContentEN: With the beauty of the Lord?

ContentCN: 永永遠遠祢是
ContentEN: Forever You will be

ContentCN: 寶座上的羔羊，
ContentEN: The Lamb upon the throne.

ContentCN: 我要歡喜跪拜，
ContentEN: I gladly bow the knee

ContentCN: 單單要敬拜祢。
ContentEN: And worship You alone.

ContentCN: 我要宣揚
ContentEN: I will proclaim

ContentCN: 復活之主的榮耀，
ContentEN: The glory of the risen Lord.

ContentCN: 祂曾捨命
ContentEN: Who once was slain

ContentCN: 拯救世人歸救主。
ContentEN: To reconcile man to God

ContentCN: 惟祢是我力量，盾牌，
ContentEN: You alone are my strength, my shield,

ContentCN: 我心靈只有向祢下拜。
ContentEN: To You alone may my spirit yield.

ContentCN: 惟有祢是我心所敬愛，
ContentEN: You alone are my heart’s desire

ContentCN: 我渴望來敬拜祢。
ContentEN: And I long to worship Thee.

ContentCN: 如鹿渴慕清涼的溪水，
ContentEN: As the deer panteth for the water,

ContentCN: 我的靈也真渴慕祢
ContentEN: So my soul longeth after Thee.

ContentCN: 惟有祢是我心所敬愛，
ContentEN: You alone are my heart’s desire

ContentCN: 我渴慕來敬拜祢。
ContentEN: And I long to worship Thee.

ContentCN: 惟祢是我力量，盾牌，
ContentEN: You alone are my strength, my shield,

ContentCN: 我心靈只有向祢下拜。
ContentEN: To You alone may my spirit yield.

ContentCN: 惟有祢是我心所敬愛，
ContentEN: You alone are my heart’s desire

ContentCN: 我渴望來敬拜祢。
ContentEN: And I long to worship Thee.

ContentCN: 我要祢勝過世上金銀，
ContentEN: I want You more than gold or silver,

ContentCN: 只有祢能滿我心。
ContentEN: Only You can satisfy.

ContentCN: 唯有祢賜我真實喜樂，
ContentEN: You alone are the real joy-giver,

ContentCN: 祢是我眼中瞳仁。
ContentEN: And the apple of my eye.

ContentCN: 惟祢是我力量，盾牌，
ContentEN: You alone are my strength, my shield,

ContentCN: 我心靈只有向祢下拜。
ContentEN: To You alone may my spirit yield.

ContentCN: 惟有祢是我心所敬愛，
ContentEN: You alone are my heart’s desire

ContentCN: 我渴望來敬拜祢。
ContentEN: And I long to worship Thee.

ContentCN: 祢是我好朋友是兄弟，
ContentEN: You’re my friend and You are my brother,

ContentCN: 又是我的大君王，
ContentEN: Even though You are a King.

ContentCN: 我愛祢超過愛任何人，
ContentEN: I love You more than any other,

ContentCN: 更超過世上萬物。
ContentEN: So much more than anything.

ContentCN: 神阿，願祢崇高遠超過諸天
ContentEN: Be exalted, O God above the heavens

ContentCN: 願祢的榮耀彰顯於全地
ContentEN: Let thy glory be over all the earth.

ContentCN: 神阿，願祢崇高遠超過諸天
ContentEN: Be exalted, O God above the heavens

ContentCN: 願祢的榮耀彰顯於全地
ContentEN: Let thy glory be over all the earth.

ContentCN: 神阿，願祢崇高遠超過諸天
ContentEN: Be exalted, O God above the heavens

ContentCN: 我要獻上感謝，哦主、在萬民之中。
ContentEN: I will give thanks to Thee, O Lord among the people.

ContentCN: 我也要獻上讚美在萬邦之中。
ContentEN: I will sing praises to Thee among the nations.

ContentCN: 因祢不改變的愛、那愛上達穹蒼。
ContentEN: For thy steadfast love is great, Is great to the heavens,

ContentCN: 因祢的信實、祢的信實，高聳雲霄。
ContentEN: And thy faithfulness,Thy faithfulness to the clouds.

ContentCN: 願祢的榮耀彰顯於全地
ContentEN: Let thy glory be over all the earth.

ContentCN: 神阿，願祢崇高遠超過諸天
ContentEN: Be exalted, O God above the heavens

ContentCN: 願祢榮耀，願祢榮耀
ContentEN: Let Thy glory,   Let Thy glory,

ContentCN: 願祢的榮耀彰顯於全地
ContentEN: Let thy glory be over all the earth.

ContentCN: 我要獻上感謝，哦主、在萬民之中。
ContentEN: I will give thanks to Thee, O Lord among the people.

ContentCN: 我也要獻上讚美在萬邦之中。
ContentEN: I will sing praises to Thee among the nations.

ContentCN: 因祢不改變的愛、那愛上達穹蒼。
ContentEN: For thy steadfast love is great, Is great to the heavens,

ContentCN: 因祢的信實、祢的信實，高聳雲霄。
ContentEN: And thy faithfulness,Thy faithfulness to the clouds.

ContentCN: 多美好，多美好，
ContentEN: Beautiful, beautiful

ContentCN: 耶穌何等美好，
ContentEN: Jesus, is beautiful,

ContentCN: 我生命被祂改變
ContentEN: And He makes all things beautiful,

ContentCN: 成為美好。
ContentEN: Things of my life.

ContentCN: 細心的，輕撫我，
ContentEN: Carefully touching me,

ContentCN: 祂使我眼明亮，
ContentEN: Causing my eyes to see,

ContentCN: 耶穌使我生命
ContentEN: Jesus makes beautiful,

ContentCN: 成為美好。
ContentEN: Things of my life.

ContentCN: 因祂活著，我能面對明天；
ContentEN: Because He lives, I can face tomorrow

ContentCN: 因祂活著，不再懼怕。
ContentEN: Because He lives, all fear is gone;

ContentCN: 我深知道祂掌管明天；
ContentEN: Because I know He holds the future

ContentCN: 生命充滿了希望只因祂活著
ContentEN: And life is worth the living just because He lives

ContentCN: 神差愛子，祂名叫耶穌，
ContentEN: God sent His Son, they call Him Jesus;

ContentCN: 祂賜下愛，醫治，寬恕。
ContentEN: He came to love, heal and forgive.

ContentCN: 死裡復活，使我得自由，
ContentEN: He lived and died to buy my pardon;

ContentCN: 那空墳墓就是我的得救記號。
ContentEN: An empty grave is there to prove my Savior lives.

ContentCN: 因祂活著，我能面對明天；
ContentEN: Because He lives, I can face tomorrow

ContentCN: 因祂活著，不再懼怕。
ContentEN: Because He lives, all fear is gone;

ContentCN: 我深知道祂掌管明天；
ContentEN: Because I know He holds the future

ContentCN: 生命充滿了希望只因祂活著
ContentEN: And life is worth the living just because He lives

ContentCN: 何等甘甜，靠耶穌基督
ContentEN: How sweet to hold a new born baby,

ContentCN: 祂帶給我，滿足喜樂。
ContentEN: And feel the pride and joy he gives;

ContentCN: 更覺安慰，乃是我確定，
ContentEN: But greater still the calm assurance:

ContentCN: 我能面對，未來坎坷，因祂活著。
ContentEN: This child can face uncertain days because He lives.

ContentCN: 因祂活著，我能面對明天；
ContentEN: Because He lives, I can face tomorrow

ContentCN: 因祂活著，不再懼怕。
ContentEN: Because He lives, all fear is gone;

ContentCN: 我深知道祂掌管明天；
ContentEN: Because I know He holds the future

ContentCN: 生命充滿了希望只因祂活著
ContentEN: And life is worth the living just because He lives

ContentCN: 我有一天，會渡生命河
ContentEN: And then one day, I'll cross the river;

ContentCN: 人生苦難，一一攻克。
ContentEN: I'll fight life’s final war with pain.

ContentCN: 藉主耶穌，戰勝了死亡，
ContentEN: And then, as death gives way to victory,

ContentCN: 我將看到，祂榮耀光，見祂掌權。
ContentEN: I'll see the light of glory and I'll know He reigns.

ContentCN: 我深信在那各各他山頂，
ContentEN: I believe in a hill called Mount Calvary,

ContentCN: 我救主曾為我被掛；
ContentEN: I'll believe what ever the cost;

ContentCN: 當歲月漸漸消失，世界成過去，
ContentEN: And when time has surrendered and earth is no more,

ContentCN: 我仍願倚靠古舊十架。
ContentEN: I'll still cling to that old rugged cross.

ContentCN: 人一生在世如客旅轉眼逝去，
ContentEN: There are things as we travel this earth's shifting sands,

ContentCN: 世上並無一處能久留；
ContentEN: That transcend all the reason of man;

ContentCN: 雖然有名利財寶一生在追求
ContentEN: But the things that matter the most in this world,

ContentCN: 但不能使我永遠擁有。
ContentEN: They can never be held in our hand.

ContentCN: 我深信在那各各他山頂，
ContentEN: I believe in a hill called Mount Calvary,

ContentCN: 我救主曾為我被掛；
ContentEN: I'll believe what ever the cost;

ContentCN: 當歲月漸漸消失，世界成過去，
ContentEN: And when time has surrendered and earth is no more,

ContentCN: 我仍願倚靠古舊十架。
ContentEN: I'll still cling to that old rugged cross.

ContentCN: 我深信基督既為人受死十架，
ContentEN: I believe that the Christ who was slain on that cross,

ContentCN: 今日能使你生命改變；
ContentEN: Has the power to change lives today;

ContentCN: 因為祂曾改變我，賜我新生命，
ContentEN: For He changed me completely, a new life is mine,

ContentCN: 我今願靠近十架身邊。
ContentEN: That is why by the cross I will stay.

ContentCN: 我深信在那各各他山頂，
ContentEN: I believe in a hill called Mount Calvary,

ContentCN: 我救主曾為我被掛；
ContentEN: I'll believe what ever the cost;

ContentCN: 當歲月漸漸消失，世界成過去，
ContentEN: And when time has surrendered and earth is no more,

ContentCN: 我仍願倚靠古舊十架。
ContentEN: I'll still cling to that old rugged cross.

ContentCN: 我深信人生雖然如謎難測透，
ContentEN: I believe that this life with its great mysteries,

ContentCN: 有一天這一切將結束；
ContentEN: Surely someday will come to an end;

ContentCN: 但因信我能得勝死亡與黑暗，
ContentEN: But faith will conquer the darkness and death,

ContentCN: 到天家與我良友同住。
ContentEN: And will lead at last to my friend.

ContentCN: 在天上神的寶座前
ContentEN: Before the throne of God above

ContentCN: 我有完全，可靠中保；
ContentEN: I have a strong, a perfect plea;

ContentCN: 一大祭司，祂名為“愛”，
ContentEN: A great High Priest, whose Name is Love,

ContentCN: 永遠活著為我祈求。
ContentEN: Who ever lives and pleads for me.

ContentCN: 我的名刻在祂手上，
ContentEN: My name is graven on His hands,

ContentCN: 我的名寫在祂心內；
ContentEN: My name is written on His heart;

ContentCN: 我深知祂站立在天，
ContentEN: I know that while in heav'n He stands

ContentCN: 無權勢能使我離開，
ContentEN: No tongue can bid me thence depart,

ContentCN: 無權勢能使我離開。
ContentEN: No tongue can bid me thence depart.

ContentCN: 當撒但試探我絕望，
ContentEN: When Satan tempts me to despair,

ContentCN: 控訴我裏面的罪惡，
ContentEN: And tells me of the guilt within,

ContentCN: 我舉目，見祂在天上，
ContentEN: Upward I look, and see Him there

ContentCN: 已了結我一切罪過。
ContentEN: Who made an end of all my sin.

ContentCN: 因無罪救主為我死，
ContentEN: Because the sinless Savior died,

ContentCN: 有罪的我被算無罪；
ContentEN: My sinful soul is counted free;

ContentCN: 因神, 公義者, 已滿足
ContentEN: For God, the Just, is satisfied

ContentCN: 看著祂而赦免了我
ContentEN: To look on Him and pardon me,

ContentCN: 看著祂而赦免了我。
ContentEN: To look on Him and pardon me.

ContentCN: 看哪，祂這復活羔羊！
ContentEN: Behold Him there, the risen Lamb!

ContentCN: 我完全，無瑕疵的“義”，
ContentEN: My perfect, spotless Righteousness,

ContentCN: 偉大不改變的“我是”，
ContentEN: The great unchangeable I AM,

ContentCN: 榮耀和恩典的君王。
ContentEN: The King of glory and of grace.

ContentCN: 與主合一，我就不死；
ContentEN: One with Himself, I cannot die;

ContentCN: 我已藉寶血被買贖；
ContentEN: My soul is purchased by His blood;

ContentCN: 我命與基督藏在天
ContentEN: My life is hid with Christ on high,

ContentCN: 與基督，我救主，我神
ContentEN: With Christ, my Savior and my God,

ContentCN: 與基督，我救主，我神。
ContentEN: With Christ, my Savior and my God.

ContentCN: 頌讚主聖名，全能的神，
ContentEN: Blessed be the Lord God Almighty

ContentCN: 昔在今在永在的父神，
ContentEN: Who was and is and is to come;

ContentCN: 頌讚主聖名，全能的神，
ContentEN: Blessed be the Lord God Almighty

ContentCN: 祢作王到永遠。
ContentEN: Who reigns for evermore.

ContentCN: 天上的父神，我們愛祢，
ContentEN: Father in heaven, how we love You;

ContentCN: 在全地尊崇祢聖名：
ContentEN: We lift Your name in all the earth.

ContentCN: 願祢國度，如今降臨我們中間，
ContentEN: May Your kingdom be established in our praises,

ContentCN: 當我們宣揚祢大能作為。
ContentEN: As Your people declare Your mighty works.

ContentCN: 將所有重擔全交託。
ContentEN: I cast all my cares upon You.

ContentCN: 將一切憂慮傷痛帶到主前。
ContentEN: I lay all of my burdens down at Your feet.

ContentCN: 無論何時，我陷困境難渡過，
ContentEN: And anytime that I don’t know what to do,

ContentCN: 就將所有重擔全交託。
ContentEN: I will cast all my cares upon You.

ContentCN: 主，祢是陶匠
ContentEN: You are the potter,

ContentCN: 我是泥土
ContentEN: I am the clay;

ContentCN: 模我，塑造我
ContentEN: Mold me and make me,

ContentCN: 是我的懇求
ContentEN: This is what I pray.

ContentCN: 更新我心意
ContentEN: Change my heart, O God,

ContentCN: 使我能像祢
ContentEN: Make it ever true;

ContentCN: 更新我心意
ContentEN: Change my heart, O God,

ContentCN: 使我能像祢
ContentEN: May I Be Like You

ContentCN: 我活著為基督，
ContentEN: Christ in me is to live,

ContentCN: 死後有益處。
ContentEN: To die is to gain.

ContentCN: 我活著為基督，
ContentEN: Christ in me is to live,

ContentCN: 死後有益處。
ContentEN: To die is to gain.

ContentCN: 我活著為基督，
ContentEN: Christ in me is to live,

ContentCN: 死後有益處。
ContentEN: To die is to gain.

ContentCN: 我活著為基督，
ContentEN: Christ in me is to live,

ContentCN: 死後有益處。
ContentEN: To die is to gain.

ContentCN: 祂是王，是詩歌，
ContentEN: He’s my King, He’s my song,

ContentCN: 是生命，是喜樂，
ContentEN: He’s my life, and He’s my joy.

ContentCN: 是力量，是寶劍，
ContentEN: He’s my strength, He’s my sword,

ContentCN: 是平安，是我主，
ContentEN: He’s my peace, He’s my Lord.

ContentCN: 神為你傾倒祂心中的珍寶，
ContentEN: Our God withheld not His own Son

ContentCN: 未曾留下祂兒子。
ContentEN: The treasure of His heart, Poured out for you.

ContentCN: 祂既已捨棄祂兒子，
ContentEN: Since He already gave His Son,

ContentCN: 現在還留下甚麽不給你
ContentEN: What now will He withhold from you His own.

ContentCN: 來，你這蒙主愛的人
ContentEN: Come ye beloved of the Lord.

ContentCN: 要思念慈愛天父
ContentEN: And consider all the love

ContentCN: 所傾倒給你所有的愛。
ContentEN: That the Father has poured out on you.

ContentCN: 以喜樂合一的心靈
ContentEN: With joyful hearts in one accord,

ContentCN: 來仰望那位將祂
ContentEN: Come and look upon the love

ContentCN: 所有為你捨棄者的愛。
ContentEN: Of the One who gave His all for you.

ContentCN: 神為你傾倒祂心中的珍寶，
ContentEN: Our God withheld not His own Son

ContentCN: 未曾留下祂兒子。
ContentEN: The treasure of His heart, Poured out for you.

ContentCN: 祂既已捨棄祂兒子，
ContentEN: Since He already gave His Son,

ContentCN: 現在還留下甚麽不給你
ContentEN: What now will He withhold from you His own.

ContentCN: 朋友請你仔細一想，
ContentEN: My friend consider then the price

ContentCN: 祂樂意付出代價
ContentEN: That so willingly He paid.

ContentCN: 來拯救並贖你歸於祂。
ContentEN: To redeem and win you back to Him.

ContentCN: 想想你當如何生活，
ContentEN: Consider how then you will live,

ContentCN: 如何使用你光陰
ContentEN: And just how to spend the days

ContentCN: 並祂贖回給你的自由。
ContentEN: And the freedom He has won for you.

ContentCN: 神為你傾倒祂心中的珍寶，
ContentEN: Our God withheld not His own Son

ContentCN: 未曾留下祂兒子。
ContentEN: The treasure of His heart, Poured out for you.

ContentCN: 祂既已捨棄祂兒子，
ContentEN: Since He already gave His Son,

ContentCN: 現在還留下甚麽不給你
ContentEN: What now will He withhold from you His own.

ContentCN: 凡祂寶座所有財寶，
ContentEN: With all the treasures of His throne,

ContentCN: 無論諸天和全地
ContentEN: Of the earth and of the sky,

ContentCN: 充滿宇宙一切的豐富，
ContentEN: And of the universe beyond,

ContentCN: 天父卻賜下祂兒子，
ContentEN: Our Father gave instead His Son,

ContentCN: 因祂寶貴的價值
ContentEN: Counting His worth far beyond

ContentCN: 遠超天國所有的財寶。
ContentEN: All The Treasures of His kingdom home.

ContentCN: 來親近我
ContentEN: Commune with Me,

ContentCN: 來親近我
ContentEN: Commune with Me,

ContentCN: 在神聖基路伯翅膀間，
ContentEN: Between the wings of the cherubim,

ContentCN: 來親近我。
ContentEN: Commune with Me. (2x)

ContentCN: 我敬拜祢
ContentEN: I worship You,

ContentCN: 我敬拜祢
ContentEN: I worship You,

ContentCN: 在神聖基路伯翅膀間，
ContentEN: Between the wings of the cherubim,

ContentCN: 我敬拜祢。
ContentEN: I worship You. (2x)

ContentCN: 與祢相會
ContentEN: I’ll meet You there,

ContentCN: 與祢相會
ContentEN: I’ll meet You there,

ContentCN: 在神聖基路伯翅膀間，
ContentEN: Between the wings of the cherubim,

ContentCN: 與祢相會。
ContentEN: I’ll meet You there. (2x)

ContentCN: 求為我造清潔心，哦，主，
ContentEN: Create in me a clean heart, O God,

ContentCN: 使我重新有正直的靈；
ContentEN: And renew a right spirit within me.

ContentCN: 求為我造清潔心，哦，主，
ContentEN: Create in me a clean heart, O God,

ContentCN: 使我重新有正直的靈。
ContentEN: And renew a right spirit within me.

ContentCN: 不要丟棄我離開祢面，哦，主，
ContentEN: Cast me not away from Thy presence, O Lord,

ContentCN: 不要從我收回祢的聖靈。
ContentEN: And take not Thy Holy Spirit from me.

ContentCN: 求祢仍使我得到祢救恩之樂，
ContentEN: Restore unto me the joy of Thy salvation,

ContentCN: 使我重新有正直的靈。
ContentEN: And renew a right spirit within me.

ContentCN: 引導我親近祢   永不離開祢
ContentEN: Draw me close to You, never let me go.

ContentCN: 今我全然交託給祢   聽祢說我是祢朋友
ContentEN: I lay it all down again, to hear You say that I’m Your friend.

ContentCN: 祢是我所愛   無人能相比
ContentEN: You are my desire, no one else will do,

ContentCN: 世上無ㄧ能取代祢
ContentEN: ‘Cause nothing else could take Your place,

ContentCN: 我感受祢溫暖擁抱
ContentEN: To hear the warmth of Your embrace.

ContentCN: 求祢引導我   回轉歸向祢
ContentEN: Help me find the way, bring me back to You.

ContentCN: 引導我親近祢   永不離開祢
ContentEN: Draw me close to You, never let me go.

ContentCN: 今我全然交託給祢   聽祢說我是祢朋友
ContentEN: I lay it all down again, to hear You say that I’m Your friend.

ContentCN: 祢是我所愛   無人能相比
ContentEN: You are my desire, no one else will do,

ContentCN: 世上無ㄧ能取代祢
ContentEN: ‘Cause nothing else could take Your place,

ContentCN: 我感受祢溫暖擁抱
ContentEN: To hear the warmth of Your embrace.

ContentCN: 求祢引導我   回轉歸向祢
ContentEN: Help me find the way, bring me back to You.

ContentCN: 我今飲於永不乾涸的活泉，
ContentEN: Drinking at the Fountain that never runs dry,

ContentCN: 我今飲於生命活水泉源;
ContentEN: Drinking at the Fountain of life am I;

ContentCN: 甜美、喜樂、歡暢，何其無限無量，
ContentEN: Finding joy and pleasure in abounding measure,

ContentCN: 我今飲於生命活水泉源。
ContentEN: I am drinking at the Fountain of life.

ContentCN: 多年疲憊，未能尋到一泉源
ContentEN: Many weary years I vainly sought a spring,

ContentCN: - 永不乾涸的活泉;
ContentEN: One that never would run dry;

ContentCN: 地上一切全都未能如我願
ContentEN: Unavailing all that earth to me could bring,

ContentCN: 無何能使我心滿。
ContentEN: Nothing seemed to satisfy.

ContentCN: 我今飲於永不乾涸的活泉，
ContentEN: Drinking at the Fountain that never runs dry,

ContentCN: 我今飲於生命活水泉源;
ContentEN: Drinking at the Fountain of life am I;

ContentCN: 甜美、喜樂、歡暢，何其無限無量，
ContentEN: Finding joy and pleasure in abounding measure,

ContentCN: 我今飲於生命活水泉源。
ContentEN: I am drinking at the Fountain of life.

ContentCN: 永遠不在罪的野地再流蕩，
ContentEN: Thro’ the desert land of sin I roam no more,

ContentCN: 我已尋到活水泉;
ContentEN: For I find a living spring;

ContentCN: 我的喜樂之杯滿溢而流淌，
ContentEN: And my cup of gladness now is running o’er,

ContentCN: 基督已使我心滿。
ContentEN: Jesus is my Lord and King.

ContentCN: 我今飲於永不乾涸的活泉，
ContentEN: Drinking at the Fountain that never runs dry,

ContentCN: 我今飲於生命活水泉源;
ContentEN: Drinking at the Fountain of life am I;

ContentCN: 甜美、喜樂、歡暢，何其無限無量，
ContentEN: Finding joy and pleasure in abounding measure,

ContentCN: 我今飲於生命活水泉源。
ContentEN: I am drinking at the Fountain of life.

ContentCN: 在此所得滿足越過越甜美，
ContentEN: Here is sweet contentment as the days go by,

ContentCN: 在此得主的安息;
ContentEN: Here is holy peace and rest;

ContentCN: 在此所受安慰越過越加倍，
ContentEN: Here is consolation as the moments fly,

ContentCN: 在此受主的福氣。
ContentEN: Here my heart is always blest.

ContentCN: 我一切生活都在於祢
ContentEN: Every move I make I make in You

ContentCN: 都在於祢 (耶穌)
ContentEN: You make me move (Jesus)

ContentCN: 我一切氣息都在於祢
ContentEN: Every breath I take I take in You

ContentCN: 我生命道路都在於祢
ContentEN: Every step I take I take in You

ContentCN: 祢是道路(耶穌)
ContentEN: You are my way (Jesus)

ContentCN: 我一切氣息都在於祢
ContentEN: Every breath I take I breathe in You

ContentCN: 憐憫恩典如浪潮
ContentEN: Waves of mercy waves of grace

ContentCN: 隨處我都見祢的榮面
ContentEN: Everywhere I look I see Your face

ContentCN: 祢大愛吸引我
ContentEN: Your love has captured me

ContentCN: 哦我神祢愛怎能如此
ContentEN: Oh my God this love how can it be

ContentCN: 啦啦啦啦啦啦啦

ContentCN: 唯有基督，是我盼望，
ContentEN: In Christ alone, my hope is found,

ContentCN: 是我亮光，力量，詩歌；
ContentEN: He is my light, my strength, my song;

ContentCN: 是房角石，穩固根基，
ContentEN: This Cornerstone, this solid Ground,

ContentCN: 乾旱風暴無可畏懼。
ContentEN: Firm through the fiercest drought and storm.

ContentCN: 哦！愛何高，平安何深，
ContentEN: What heights of love, what depths of peace,

ContentCN: 懼怕消除，爭競平行，
ContentEN: When fears are stilled, when strivings cease!

ContentCN: 是我安慰，是我一切，
ContentEN: My Comforter, my All in All,

ContentCN: 基督愛裡我今站立。
ContentEN: Here in the love of Christ I stand.

ContentCN: 在基督裡，榮耀的神，
ContentEN: In Christ alone, who took on flesh,

ContentCN: 道成肉身降卑為人。
ContentEN: Fullness of God in helpless babe!

ContentCN: 忍受罪人辱罵頂撞，
ContentEN: This gift of love and righteousness,

ContentCN: 十字架上捨命流血。
ContentEN: Scorned by the ones He came to save.

ContentCN: 滿足父神公義要求，
ContentEN: Till on that cross, as Jesus died,

ContentCN: 衆人罪孽都歸祂身，
ContentEN: The wrath of God was satisfied,

ContentCN: 蒙愛稱義白白恩典，
ContentEN: For every sin on Him was laid;

ContentCN: 因基督死我今活著。
ContentEN: Here in the death of Christ I live.

ContentCN: 在墳墓裡，我主靜臥，
ContentEN: There in the ground His body lay,

ContentCN: 黑暗掩藏世人之光，
ContentEN: Light of the world by darkness slain;

ContentCN: 榮耀大日光芒四射，
ContentEN: Then bursting forth in glorious Day,

ContentCN: 從墳墓裡我主起來。
ContentEN: Up from the grave He rose again!

ContentCN: 祂已復活全然得勝，
ContentEN: And as He stand in victory

ContentCN: 罪惡咒詛失去權勢，
ContentEN: Sin’s curse has lost its grip on me,

ContentCN: 寶血重價屬我歸祂，
ContentEN: For I am His and He is mine,

ContentCN: 基督屬我我今屬祂。
ContentEN: Bought with the precious blood of Christ.

ContentCN: 基督能力，我身彰顯，
ContentEN: No guilt in life, no fear in death,

ContentCN: 不再定罪死亡失勢，
ContentEN: This is the power of Christ in me;

ContentCN: 生命氣息從祂而得，
ContentEN: From life’s first cry to final breath,

ContentCN: 從生到死在祂手中。
ContentEN: Jesus commands my destiny.

ContentCN: 哦！何穩妥，地獄權勢，
ContentEN: No power or hell, no scheme of man,

ContentCN: 世人惡謀不能加害，
ContentEN: Can ever pluck me from His hand;

ContentCN: 直至祂來歡見主面，
ContentEN: Till He returns or calls me home,

ContentCN: 祂全能力我今穩立。
ContentEN: Here in the power of Christ I’ll stand!

ContentCN: 祂做事，有定時，
ContentEN: In His time, in His time;

ContentCN: 按祂時候能成就美好事，
ContentEN: He makes all things beautiful in His time

ContentCN: 主，求祢每日指示，敎我明白祢心思，
ContentEN: Lord, please show me every day As You’re teaching me Your way,

ContentCN: 我願遵行祢旨意，等候祢！
ContentEN: That You do just what You say in Your time.

ContentCN: 祢做事，有定時，
ContentEN: In Your time, in Your time;

ContentCN: 按祢時候能成就美好事，
ContentEN: You make all things beautiful in Your time.

ContentCN: 主，我獻身心給祢，我口稱頌讚美祢，
ContentEN: Lord, my life to You I bring May each song I have to sing

ContentCN: 我願令祢心滿意，等候祢！
ContentEN: Be to You a lovely thing in Your time.

ContentCN: 歡唱我愛祢，主，
ContentEN: Singing I love You Lord,

ContentCN: 歡唱我愛祢，主，
ContentEN: Singing I love You Lord,

ContentCN: 歡唱我愛祢，主，
ContentEN: Singing I love You Lord,

ContentCN: 我愛祢。
ContentEN: I Love You.

ContentCN: 在這個時刻，我向主歌唱，
ContentEN: In moments like these, I sing out a song,

ContentCN: 唱出一首愛的詩歌。
ContentEN: I sing out a love song to Jesus.

ContentCN: 在這個時刻，我高舉雙手。
ContentEN: In moments like these, I lift up my hands,

ContentCN: 向我的主高舉雙手。
ContentEN: I lift up my hands to the Lord.

ContentCN: 敬畏站立在祢面前
ContentEN: And I stand, I stand in awe of You

ContentCN: 敬畏站立在祢面前
ContentEN: I stand, I stand in awe of You

ContentCN: 聖潔神配得所有讚美
ContentEN: Holy God to whom all praise is due

ContentCN: 我站立敬畏祢
ContentEN: I stand in awe of You

ContentCN: 如何能描述祢有多美麗
ContentEN: You are beautiful beyond description

ContentCN: 言語無法形容
ContentEN: Too marvelous for words

ContentCN: 實在奧妙非我能明瞭
ContentEN: Too wonderful for comprehension

ContentCN: 也從來未曾聽見過
ContentEN: Like nothing ever seen or heard

ContentCN: 誰能曉得祢無限的智慧
ContentEN: Who can grasp Your infinite wisdom?

ContentCN: 誰能測度祢愛的高深
ContentEN: Who can fathom the depth of Your love?

ContentCN: 如何能描述祢有多美麗
ContentEN: You are beautiful beyond description

ContentCN: 尊貴王祢今掌權
ContentEN: Majesty enthroned above

ContentCN: 救贖我的挽囘祭，
ContentEN: In redeeming sacrifice,

ContentCN: 洗淨我潔白如雪，
ContentEN: Washes me whiter than the snow,

ContentCN: 白如雪；
ContentEN: Than the snow,

ContentCN: 主耶穌，神寶貴的羔羊。
ContentEN: My Jesus, God’s precious sacrifice.

ContentCN: 祢寶血已潔淨我，
ContentEN: It’s Your blood that cleanses me,

ContentCN: 祢寶血使我得生命，
ContentEN: It’s Your blood that gives me life,

ContentCN: 祢寶血已經成為
ContentEN: It’s Your blood that took my place.

ContentCN: 能洗淨一切罪污，
ContentEN: That can cleanse the deepest stain,

ContentCN: 洗淨我潔白如雪 ，
ContentEN: Washes me whiter than the snow,

ContentCN: 白如雪；
ContentEN: Than the snow,

ContentCN: 主耶穌，神寶貴的羔羊。
ContentEN: My Jesus, God’s precious sacrifice.

ContentCN: 神羔羊為我流血，
ContentEN: It’s the blood of the Lamb,

ContentCN: 神羔羊為我流寶血，
ContentEN: It’s the blood of the Lamb,

ContentCN: 神羔羊的寶貴血，
ContentEN: It’s the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 耶穌，超乎萬名之名，
ContentEN: Jesus, name above all names,

ContentCN: 美好的救主，榮耀之君。
ContentEN: Beautiful Savior, glorious Lord;

ContentCN: 以馬內利，與人同在的神，
ContentEN: Emmanuel, God is with us,

ContentCN: 聖潔的救主，永活的道。
ContentEN: Blessed Redeemer, Living Word.

ContentCN: 耶穌，慈愛的牧者，
ContentEN: Jesus, loving Shepherd,

ContentCN: 葡萄樹，神的兒子。
ContentEN: Vine of the branches, Son of God,

ContentCN: 平安君王，奇妙保惠師，
ContentEN: Prince of peace, wonderful Counselor,

ContentCN: 宇宙的救主，世界的光。
ContentEN: Lord of the universe, Light of this world.

ContentCN: 耶穌，救恩的道路，
ContentEN: Jesus, way of salvation,

ContentCN: 萬王之王，萬主之主。
ContentEN: King of kings, Lord of lords.

ContentCN: 道路，真理，又是生命，
ContentEN: The way, the truth, and the life,

ContentCN: 我的創造者，我救主朋友。
ContentEN: My Creator, my Savior and Friend.

ContentCN: 認識祢，耶穌！認識祢，
ContentEN: Knowing You, Jesus, knowing You,

ContentCN: 無何能與相比。
ContentEN: There is no greater thing.

ContentCN: 是一切，是至好，
ContentEN: You’re my all, You’re the best,

ContentCN: 祢是我喜樂，公義，
ContentEN: You’re my joy, my righteousness

ContentCN: 哦主！我愛祢！
ContentEN: And I love You Lord.

ContentCN: 前我所珍愛，生命築其上，
ContentEN: All I once held dear built my life upon,

ContentCN: 世界所尊崇，爭奪擁有，
ContentEN: All this world reveres and wars to own,

ContentCN: 前以為有益，今當作有損，
ContentEN: All I once thought gain I have counted loss,

ContentCN: 比起“認識祢”，真如糞土。
ContentEN: Spent and worthless now compared to this.

ContentCN: 認識祢，耶穌！認識祢，
ContentEN: Knowing You, Jesus, knowing You,

ContentCN: 無何能與相比。
ContentEN: There is no greater thing.

ContentCN: 是一切，是至好，
ContentEN: You’re my all, You’re the best,

ContentCN: 祢是我喜樂，公義，
ContentEN: You’re my joy, my righteousness

ContentCN: 哦主！我愛祢！
ContentEN: And I love You Lord.

ContentCN: 我心所渴慕更多認識祢，
ContentEN: Now my heart’s desire is to know You more,

ContentCN: 得在祢裡面，又屬於祢，
ContentEN: To be found in You and known as Yours.

ContentCN: 因信而擁有 - 我所不配得
ContentEN: To possess by faith what I could not earn,

ContentCN: 這無價之寶的神的義。
ContentEN: All-surpassing gift of righteousness.

ContentCN: 認識祢，耶穌！認識祢，
ContentEN: Knowing You, Jesus, knowing You,

ContentCN: 無何能與相比。
ContentEN: There is no greater thing.

ContentCN: 是一切，是至好，
ContentEN: You’re my all, You’re the best,

ContentCN: 祢是我喜樂，公義，
ContentEN: You’re my joy, my righteousness

ContentCN: 哦主！我愛祢！
ContentEN: And I love You Lord.

ContentCN: 哦！能曉得祢復活的大能，
ContentEN: Oh, to know the power of Your risen life,

ContentCN: 得以交通於祢的苦難，
ContentEN: And to know You in Your sufferings.

ContentCN: 主！我效法祢，效法祢的死，
ContentEN: To become like You in Your death, my Lord,

ContentCN: 使我能經歷死而復活。
ContentEN: So with You to live and never die.

ContentCN: 真神羔羊，寶貴羔羊，
ContentEN: Oh Lamb of God, sweet Lamb of God,

ContentCN: 我深愛慕聖潔羔羊，
ContentEN: I love the holy Lamb of God.

ContentCN: 求祢寶血來洗淨我。
ContentEN: Oh, wash me in His precious blood,

ContentCN: 耶穌基督真神羔羊。
ContentEN: My Jesus Christ the Lamb of God.

ContentCN: 上帝兒子聖潔無瑕，
ContentEN: Your only Son, no sin to hide,

ContentCN: 竟被差遣離天座位，
ContentEN: But You have sent Him from Your side.

ContentCN: 踏上塵土罪惡世界，
ContentEN: To walk upon this guilty sod

ContentCN: 甘願成為真神羔羊。
ContentEN: And to become the Lamb of God.

ContentCN: 真神羔羊，寶貴羔羊，
ContentEN: Oh Lamb of God, sweet Lamb of God,

ContentCN: 我深愛慕聖潔羔羊，
ContentEN: I love the holy Lamb of God.

ContentCN: 求祢寶血來洗淨我。
ContentEN: Oh, wash me in His precious blood,

ContentCN: 直至我成為神羔羊。
ContentEN: Till I am just a lamb of God.

ContentCN: 神的愛子被釘十架，
ContentEN: Your gift of Love, they crucified,

ContentCN: 受盡凌辱，遭人厭棄，
ContentEN: They laughed and scorned Him as He died,

ContentCN: 謙卑君王頭戴荊冠，
ContentEN: The humble King, they named a fraud

ContentCN: 成為犧牲，真神羔羊。
ContentEN: And sacrificed the Lamb of God.

ContentCN: 求祢寶血來洗淨我。
ContentEN: Oh, wash me in His precious blood,

ContentCN: 耶穌基督真神羔羊。
ContentEN: Till I am just a lamb of God.

ContentCN: 前我失喪，毫無盼望，
ContentEN: I was so lost, I should have died,

ContentCN: 蒙祢救贖，近祢身旁，
ContentEN: But You have brought me to Your side

ContentCN: 用杖與竿領我一生，
ContentEN: To be led by Your staff and rod,

ContentCN: 我今成為主的小羊。
ContentEN: And to be called the Lamb of God.

ContentCN: 當抬起頭仰望我救主，
ContentEN: Lift up your heads to the coming King,

ContentCN: 虔誠敬拜歌唱讚美祂，
ContentEN: Bow before Him and adore Him, sing.

ContentCN: 讚美祂尊榮，讚美祂權能，
ContentEN: To His majesty, let your praises be

ContentCN: 良善聖潔，榮耀全歸主萬王之王。
ContentEN: Pure and holy giving glory to the King of kings.

ContentCN: 主，祢是何等的寶貴；
ContentEN: Lord, You are so precious to me.

ContentCN: Oh Lord, I live to worship You!
ContentEN: 哦主，我活為敬拜祢。

ContentCN: 在祢座前，主，
ContentEN: In Your presence, Lord,

ContentCN: 我見祢面，我見祢面。

ContentCN: 因在祢腳下，哦主，
ContentEN: For down at Your feet Oh Lord

ContentCN: 是浩瀚穹蒼，
ContentEN: Is the most high place;

ContentCN: 在祢座前，主，
ContentEN: In Your presence, Lord,

ContentCN: 我見祢面，我見祢面。
ContentEN: We seek Your face, we seek Your face.

ContentCN: 主開我雙眼，讓我們見耶穌
ContentEN: Open our eyes, Lord, we want to see Jesus

ContentCN: 伸出手觸摸祂，
ContentEN: To reach out and touch him,

ContentCN: 並說我們愛祂，
ContentEN: And say that we love him.

ContentCN: 主開我雙耳，助我們得聽見，
ContentEN: Open our ears, Lord, and help us to listen,

ContentCN: 主開我雙眼，讓我們見耶穌。
ContentEN: Open our eyes, Lord, we want to see Jesus.

ContentCN: 主耶穌，我救主
ContentEN: My Jesus, My Saviour,

ContentCN: 無一人能像祢
ContentEN: Lord there is none like You;

ContentCN: 我願一生，全心讚美
ContentEN: All of my days I want to praise

ContentCN: 祢奇妙全能的大愛
ContentEN: The wonder of Your mighty love.

ContentCN: 祢是我安慰師
ContentEN: My comfort , my shelter,

ContentCN: 我避難所和力量
ContentEN: Tower of refuge and strength,

ContentCN: 我的一切，每個氣息
ContentEN: Let every breath, all that I am,

ContentCN: 永遠不住敬拜祢
ContentEN: Never cease to worship You.

ContentCN: 向主歡呼，願全地揚聲唱
ContentEN: Shout to the Lord, all the earth let us sing

ContentCN: 頌讚榮耀，能力歸於君王
ContentEN: Power and majesty, praise to the King

ContentCN: 眾山跪拜，眾海洋歡呼
ContentEN: Mountains bow down and the seas will roar

ContentCN: 歡呼主的聖名
ContentEN: At the sound of Your name.

ContentCN: 我要歡唱祢大能的作為
ContentEN: I sing for joy at the work of Your hands,

ContentCN: 我要永遠愛祢，要永遠堅定
ContentEN: Forever I’ll love You, forever I’ll stand;

ContentCN: 無一事物能與祢的應許相比
ContentEN: Nothing compares to the promise I have in You!

ContentCN: 至榮耀之子光明為袍。
ContentEN: Son of all glory robed in the light.

ContentCN: 因人的墮落脫下榮耀。
ContentEN: Put off His mantle drawn by man’s plight.

ContentCN: 祂成為人的樣式並來爭戰，
ContentEN: Entered the battle taking on the form of man,

ContentCN: 因愛我們的大愛。
ContentEN: Drawn by His love for us all.

ContentCN: 至榮耀之父捨棄愛子，
ContentEN: Father of glory released His Son,

ContentCN: 使祂所計劃，得以成就。
ContentEN: That He might finish the task begun.

ContentCN: 祂為了我們的罪捨棄祂生命，
ContentEN: He laid His life down exchanged for our sin,

ContentCN: 因愛我們的大愛。
ContentEN: Drawn by His love for us all.

ContentCN: 誰能使我們與祂隔絕，
ContentEN: Who then can separate us from Him?

ContentCN: 耶穌得勝者，死無權勢，
ContentEN: Jesus the victor, death lost its sting.

ContentCN: 我謙卑放下一切俯伏在祂前，
ContentEN: I yield the title to all that I am,

ContentCN: 重生為我王而活。
ContentEN: Reborn to live for my King.

ContentCN: 耶穌，主耶穌
ContentEN: Jesus, O Jesus,

ContentCN: 求充滿我們，
ContentEN: Come and fill Your lambs.

ContentCN: 耶穌，主耶穌
ContentEN: Jesus, O Jesus,

ContentCN: 求充滿我們，
ContentEN: Come and fill Your lambs.

ContentCN: 讓神的兒子以祂聖靈
ContentEN: O let the Son of God enfold you

ContentCN: 和祂愛來圍繞你，
ContentEN: With His Spirit and His love,

ContentCN: 讓祂充滿你心，使你靈滿足；
ContentEN: Let Him fill your heart and satisfy your soul.

ContentCN: 讓祂擔負你一切掛慮，
ContentEN: O let Him have the things that hold you,

ContentCN: 賞賜平安的聖靈，
ContentEN: And His Spirit like a dove

ContentCN: 降臨在你生命中，使你完全。
ContentEN: Will descend upon your life and make you whole.

ContentCN: 耶穌，主耶穌
ContentEN: Jesus, O Jesus,

ContentCN: 求充滿我們，
ContentEN: Come and fill Your lambs.

ContentCN: 耶穌，主耶穌
ContentEN: Jesus, O Jesus,

ContentCN: 求充滿我們，
ContentEN: Come and fill Your lambs.

ContentCN: 哦！揚聲歡呼歌唱讚美，
ContentEN: O come and sing this song with gladness

ContentCN: 讓你心充滿喜樂，
ContentEN: As your hearts are filled with joy,

ContentCN: 舉起雙手甘願順服祂的名；
ContentEN: Lift your hands in sweet surrender to His name.

ContentCN: 將你的憂傷破碎心靈，
ContentEN: O give Him all your tears and sadness,

ContentCN: 痛苦歲月交給祂，
ContentEN: Give Him all your years of pain,

ContentCN: 你將靠著祂的名，進入永生。
ContentEN: And you’ll enter into life in Jesus’ name.

ContentCN: 喝那豐富生命的活水泉，
ContentEN: Drinking at the springs of living water,

ContentCN: 現今我快樂，我靈魂得滿足，
ContentEN: Happy now am I; my soul they satisfy.

ContentCN: 喝那豐富生命的活水泉，
ContentEN: Drinking at the springs of living water,

ContentCN: 何等甜美如此豐盛恩典。
ContentEN: O Wonderful and bounriful supply!

ContentCN: 我在罪惡羞辱荒漠，乾渴難言，
ContentEN: I thirsted in the barren land of sin and shame,

ContentCN: 想找滿足，卻得不到一點，
ContentEN: And nothing satisfying there I found;

ContentCN: 但有一天，我走到十字寳架前，
ContentEN: But to the blessed cross of Christ one day I came,

ContentCN: 見豐富活水泉源在那邊。
ContentEN: Where springs of living water did abound.

ContentCN: 喝那豐富生命的活水泉，
ContentEN: Drinking at the springs of living water,

ContentCN: 現今我快樂，我靈魂得滿足，
ContentEN: Happy now am I; my soul they satisfy.

ContentCN: 喝那豐富生命的活水泉，
ContentEN: Drinking at the springs of living water,

ContentCN: 何等甜美如此豐盛恩典。
ContentEN: O Wonderful and bounriful supply!

ContentCN: 神賜豐富生命活泉，何等甘甜，
ContentEN: How sweet the living water from the hills of God!

ContentCN: 使我得享快樂，幸福無邊，
ContentEN: It makes me glad and happy all the way.

ContentCN: 在我人生旅程，滿有榮耀恩典
ContentEN: Now glory, grace, and blessing mark the path I've trod;

ContentCN: 高聲唱 “ 哈利路亞！”到永遠。
ContentEN: I'm shouting "Hallelujah!" all the way.

ContentCN: 謝千萬聲﹐謝千萬聲﹐
ContentEN: Ten thousand thanks, ten thousand thanks,

ContentCN: 讚美不住添增﹐
ContentEN: We'll praise Him o'er and o'er;

ContentCN: 與主同住恩典一生﹐
ContentEN: And for the life with Him to live,

ContentCN: 惟感謝千萬聲。
ContentEN: Ten thousand thousand more.

ContentCN: 千萬聲感謝我主﹐祂命為我傾倒。
ContentEN: Ten thousand thanks to Jesus , Whose life our ransom paid,

ContentCN: 祂的寶血已流出﹐成功救贖新造。
ContentEN: Whose blood a full redemption. For all the world has made.

ContentCN: 讓每顆心敬拜主﹐每一受造歌唱。
ContentEN: Let ev'ry heart adore Him; Let ev'ry creature sing.

ContentCN: 千萬聲感謝我主﹐我救主﹐我君王。
ContentEN: Ten thousand thanks to Jesus, Our Savior and our King.

ContentCN: 謝千萬聲﹐謝千萬聲﹐
ContentEN: Ten thousand thanks, ten thousand thanks,

ContentCN: 讚美不住添增﹐
ContentEN: We'll praise Him o'er and o'er;

ContentCN: 與主同住恩典一生﹐
ContentEN: And for the life with Him to live,

ContentCN: 惟感謝千萬聲。
ContentEN: Ten thousand thousand more.

ContentCN: 千萬聲感謝我主，祂愛深高闊長，
ContentEN: Ten thousand thanks to Jesus - His love is ever same.

ContentCN: 祂的恩典已流露，他以“自己”下賞；
ContentEN: His grace has poured out for you, Our reward He became;

ContentCN: 哦，我心何等滿足，已得宇宙至寶！
ContentEN: O, satisfied our hearts are, for Jesus Christ we've gained.

ContentCN: 千萬聲感謝我主，我今已成富豪！
ContentEN: Ten thousand thanks to Jesus - Great riches we've attained.

ContentCN: 謝千萬聲﹐謝千萬聲﹐
ContentEN: Ten thousand thanks, ten thousand thanks,

ContentCN: 讚美不住添增﹐
ContentEN: We'll praise Him o'er and o'er;

ContentCN: 與主同住恩典一生﹐
ContentEN: And for the life with Him to live,

ContentCN: 惟感謝千萬聲。
ContentEN: Ten thousand thousand more.

ContentCN: 千萬顆心歸我主，帶著無比歡喜！
ContentEN: Ten thousand hearts to Jesus - How gladly would we give;

ContentCN: 千萬條命活為主，只要祂給氣息！
ContentEN: Ten thousand lives to Jesus, Had we so long to live;

ContentCN: 千萬舌頭讚耶穌，千萬首詩獻上；
ContentEN: Ten thousand tongues shall praise Him,

ContentCN: 給祂 - 我的親愛主，給祂 - 我的君王！
ContentEN: Ten thousand songs ascend,

ContentCN: 謝千萬聲﹐謝千萬聲﹐
ContentEN: Ten thousand thanks, ten thousand thanks,

ContentCN: 讚美不住添增﹐
ContentEN: We'll praise Him o'er and o'er;

ContentCN: 與主同住恩典一生﹐
ContentEN: And for the life with Him to live,

ContentCN: 惟感謝千萬聲。
ContentEN: Ten thousand thousand more.

ContentCN: 感謝我主千萬聲，為這許多祝福，
ContentEN: Ten thousand thanks to Jesus, For blessing ev'ry hour,

ContentCN: 千萬聲千千萬聲，千萬聲感謝主；
ContentEN: Ten thousand times ten thousand for love's redeeming pow'r;

ContentCN: 那日祂要迎我們，在無終榮耀裏，
ContentEN: And when He comes in glory, His blessed face we'll see;

ContentCN: 祂愛長闊又高深，是我美麗詩題！
ContentEN: His love thro' endless ages, Our sweetest song shall be.

ContentCN: 主堅強的愛永遠不會消滅
ContentEN: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases

ContentCN: 祂的憐憫也永不止息
ContentEN: His mercies never come to an end

ContentCN: 每早晨都是新的
ContentEN: They are new every morning

ContentCN: 天天是新的
ContentEN: New every morning

ContentCN: 祢的信實極其廣大
ContentEN: Great is Thy faithfulness O Lord

ContentCN: 祢的信實廣大
ContentEN: Great is Thy faithfulness

ContentCN: 贖價已付，阿利路亞，
ContentEN: The price is paid, Alleluia,

ContentCN: 奇妙恩典﹐牢固穩妥，
ContentEN: Amazing grace, so strong and sure;

ContentCN: 獻全心並全人﹐
ContentEN: And so with all my heart,

ContentCN: 獻我命與我力，
ContentEN: My life in every part,

ContentCN: 我活著為感恩 – 祢付贖價。
ContentEN: I live to thank You for the price You paid.

ContentCN: 贖價已付，讓我們都進入
ContentEN: The price is paid, come let us enter in,

ContentCN: 耶穌的死所帶來的一切
ContentEN: To all that Jesus died to make our own.

ContentCN: 為每個罪祂付足了贖價
ContentEN: For every sin more than enough He gave,

ContentCN: 已除罪污，並已買來自由。
ContentEN: And bought our freedom from each guilty stain.

ContentCN: 贖價已付，阿利路亞，
ContentEN: The price is paid, Alleluia,

ContentCN: 奇妙恩典﹐牢固穩妥，
ContentEN: Amazing grace, so strong and sure;

ContentCN: 獻全心並全人﹐
ContentEN: And so with all my heart,

ContentCN: 獻我命與我力，
ContentEN: My life in every part,

ContentCN: 我活著為感恩 – 祢付贖價。
ContentEN: I live to thank You for the price You paid.

ContentCN: 贖價已付，看撒旦已遁逃；
ContentEN: The price is paid, see Satan flee away;

ContentCN: 在十架上，仇敵權勢被毀。
ContentEN: For Jesus crucified destroyed his power.

ContentCN: 無需再付，控告已經終止，
ContentEN: No more to pay, let accusation cease,

ContentCN: 在基督裡已不再被定罪。
ContentEN: In Christ there is no condemnation now.

ContentCN: 贖價已付，阿利路亞，
ContentEN: The price is paid, Alleluia,

ContentCN: 奇妙恩典﹐牢固穩妥，
ContentEN: Amazing grace, so strong and sure;

ContentCN: 獻全心並全人﹐

ContentCN: 羊和牧者同樣輕重﹐身和頭同境遇﹔
ContentEN: The sheep and shepherd are of one, the head and body same;

ContentCN: 羊和牧者同樣輕重﹐身和頭同境遇﹔
ContentEN: The sheep and shepherd are of one, the head and body same;

ContentCN: 誰也不能從祢手中﹐奪去祢的兒女。
ContentEN: None e'er can pluck from out Thy hand the child who trusts Thy name.

ContentCN: 誰也不能從祢手中﹐奪去祢的兒女。
ContentEN: None e'er can pluck from out Thy hand the child who trusts Thy name.

ContentCN: 千人的手不能阻我﹐萬人的眼也不﹔
ContentEN: A thousand hands won't hinder me nor will ten thousand eyes;

ContentCN: 千人的手不能阻我﹐萬人的眼也不﹔
ContentEN: A thousand hands won't hinder me nor will ten thousand eyes;

ContentCN: 路上荊棘﹐不過助我忠勇進前得福。
ContentEN: The thorns upon the road but help me onward to the prize.

ContentCN: 路上荊棘﹐不過助我忠勇進前得福。
ContentEN: The thorns upon the road but help me onward to the prize.

ContentCN: 我心﹐我靈﹐今當復興﹐讓這世界過去﹗
ContentEN: Arise, my spirit and my heart, and let the world go by;

ContentCN: 我心﹐我靈﹐今當復興﹐讓這世界過去﹗
ContentEN: Arise, my spirit and my heart, and let the world go by;

ContentCN: 生命的主﹐求祢快臨﹐接我進入天域﹗
ContentEN: The Lord of life will take me soon to be with Him on high.

ContentCN: 生命的主﹐求祢快臨﹐接我進入天域﹗
ContentEN: The Lord of life will take me soon to be with Him on high.

ContentCN: 醫治的日﹐人的盼望﹐我真愛祢光線﹗
ContentEN: Thou healing Sun! Thou Hope of man! I really love Thy ray.

ContentCN: 醫治的日﹐人的盼望﹐我真愛祢光線﹗
ContentEN: Thou healing Sun! Thou Hope of man! I really love Thy ray.

ContentCN: 公義的主﹐榮耀的王﹐我今伏祢面前﹐
ContentEN: O righteous Lord! O glorious King, I bow to Thee and pray:

ContentCN: 公義的主﹐榮耀的王﹐我今伏祢面前﹐
ContentEN: O righteous Lord! O glorious King, I bow to Thee and pray:

ContentCN: 求祢自己快登寶座﹗求祢臉面快顯﹗
ContentEN: Oh, may Thou soon ascend Thy throne and quickly show Thy face;

ContentCN: 求祢自己快登寶座﹗求祢臉面快顯﹗
ContentEN: Oh, may Thou soon ascend Thy throne and quickly show Thy face;

ContentCN: 求祢伸手建立天國﹐向萬民賜恩典﹗
ContentEN: Thy heav'nly kingdom may Thou found and grant all men Thy grace.

ContentCN: 求祢伸手建立天國﹐向萬民賜恩典﹗
ContentEN: Thy heav'nly kingdom may Thou found and grant all men Thy grace.

ContentCN: 真理本當得勝為王﹗自由本當為后﹗
ContentEN: The truth should triumph and be king, and freedom should be queen;

ContentCN: 真理本當得勝為王﹗自由本當為后﹗
ContentEN: The truth should triumph and be king, and freedom should be queen;

ContentCN: 但是謊言竟然猖狂﹐為這世界元首﹗
ContentEN: But falsehood, which has rampant run, head of the world is seen.

ContentCN: 但是謊言竟然猖狂﹐為這世界元首﹗
ContentEN: But falsehood, which has rampant run, head of the world is seen.

ContentCN: 所以真理求祢快來﹗帶著天光而來﹗
ContentEN: We ask Thee, Truth, to quickly come and bring Thy light from heav'n;

ContentEN: We ask Thee, Truth, to quickly come and bring Thy light from heav'n;

ContentCN: 好使仇敵遇見失敗﹐眾子投入祢懷。
ContentEN: The foe be crushed and all Thy sons into Thy bosom giv'n.

ContentEN: The foe be crushed and all Thy sons into Thy bosom giv'n.

ContentCN: 我眼專看我的救主﹐我心已經在天﹔
ContentEN: My heart is always with Himself. My eyes are heavenward.

ContentEN: My heart is always with Himself. My eyes are heavenward.

ContentCN: 我口不說別的題目﹐只說與主相見。

ContentCN: 主的再臨已經緊近﹐主來原是為我﹔

ContentEN: Why cannot we, dear Lord, discern Thy footsteps?

ContentCN: 我主﹐能否求祢今天一起聽！
ContentEN: Come, come and answer now this mighty corp'rate cry!

ContentEN: Come, come and answer now this mighty corp'rate cry!

ContentCN: 看哪﹗救主駕雲降臨﹐
ContentEN: Lo, He comes with clouds descending,

ContentCN: 祂曾為罪人捨命﹔
ContentEN: Once for favored sinners slain;

ContentCN: 千萬聖徒簇擁侍從﹐
ContentEN: Thousand thousand saints attending

ContentCN: 得勝行列齊歌頌﹕
ContentEN: Swell the triumph of His train:

ContentCN: 阿利路亞﹗阿利路亞﹗神在全地掌權柄。
ContentEN: Alleluia! Alleluia! God appears on earth to reign.

ContentCN: 萬目都要仰望救主﹐
ContentEN: Every eye shall now behold Him,

ContentCN: 身披榮耀何威嚴﹔
ContentEN: Robed in dreadful majesty;

ContentCN: 昔日賣主、刺主、釘主﹐
ContentEN: Those who set at naught and sold Him,

ContentCN: 今要仰望求恩憐。
ContentEN: Pierced and nailed Him to the tree,

ContentCN: 大大哀號﹗大大哀號﹗真彌賽亞今望見。
ContentEN: Deeply wailing, deeply wailing, shall the true Messiah see.

ContentCN: 長年所望身體得贖﹐
ContentEN: Now redemption, long expected,

ContentCN: 何等華麗今實現﹔
ContentEN: See in solemn pomp appear:

ContentCN: 世人鄙視祂的聖徒﹐
ContentEN: All His saints, by men rejected,

ContentCN: 今要會祂在雲間﹕
ContentEN: Now shall meet Him in the air:

ContentCN: 阿利路亞﹗阿利路亞﹗神的大日今應驗。
ContentEN: Alleluia! Alleluia! See the day of God appear.

ContentCN: 同聲阿們﹐我們拜服﹐
ContentEN: Yea, Amen! Let all adore Thee,

ContentCN: 永遠寶座在至高﹔
ContentEN: High on Thine eternal throne;

ContentCN: 願祢得著祢的國度﹐
ContentEN: Savior, take the pow'r and glory,

ContentCN: 得著權能和榮耀﹕
ContentEN: Claim the kingdom for Thine own:

ContentCN: 願祢快來﹗願祢快來﹗永遠之神快來到。
ContentEN: O, come quickly, O, come quickly! Everlasting God, come down.

ContentCN: 哦﹗主耶穌要再來﹐主耶穌快要再來﹗
ContentEN: Oh! He’s coming back again; He is coming back again,

ContentCN: 我真歡樂因祂快回來接我﹗
ContentEN: I’m so glad that He is coming back again.

ContentCN: 我口歡唱心歡跳﹐因我要見祂榮耀﹗
ContentEN: He is coming after me, and His glory I shall see,

ContentCN: 真歡樂﹐祂快回來接我﹗
ContentEN: I’m so glad He is coming for me.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐耶穌﹗這名何等奇妙難言﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus! There's just something about that name!

ContentCN: 恩主﹐救主﹐耶穌﹗猶如雨後清新芳香﹔
ContentEN: Master, Savior, Jesus! Like the fragrance after the rain;

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐耶穌﹗天上人間同聲宣揚﹕
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus! Let all Heaven and earth proclaim:

ContentCN: 君王國度都要成過去﹐這名永遠奇妙難言﹗
ContentEN: Kings and kingdoms will all pass away, but there's something about that name!

ContentCN: 耶穌此名何等芬芳﹐在蒙恩人耳中﹗
ContentEN: How sweet the Name of Jesus sounds in a believer's ear!

ContentCN: 撫他憂悶﹐醫他悲傷﹐並且驅他驚恐。
ContentEN: It soothes his sorrow, heals his wounds, and drives away his fear.

ContentCN: 此名醫治憂傷的靈﹐平定起伏心情﹔
ContentEN: It makes the wounded spirit whole, and calms the troubled breast;

ContentCN: 是饑餓者的生命餅﹐疲倦者的安寧。
ContentEN: 'Tis manna to the hungry soul, and to the weary rest.

ContentCN: 我要建造容身之處﹐此名乃是根基﹔
ContentEN: Dear Name! the Rock on which we build; our shield and hiding place;

ContentCN: 乃是天上豐富之庫﹐包藏無量福氣。
ContentEN: Our never-failing treasury, filled with boundless stores of grace.

ContentCN: 耶穌救主﹐罪人朋友﹐先知、祭司、君王﹔
ContentEN: Jesus, our Savior, Shepherd, Friend, our Prophet, Priest, and King;

ContentCN: 道路、真理、生命、元首﹐接納我的歌唱。
ContentEN: Our Lord, our Life, our Way, our End, accept the praise we bring.

ContentCN: 何等軟弱﹐我的努力﹐最熱思想冷淡﹔
ContentEN: Weak is the effort of our heart, and cold our warmest thought;

ContentCN: 將來親眼見祢自己﹐方照本分頌讚。
ContentEN: But when we see Thee as Thou art, we'll praise Thee as we ought.

ContentCN: 一息尚存﹐在祢來前﹐我願仍傳祢愛﹔
ContentEN: Till then we would Thy love proclaim with every fleeting breath;

ContentCN: 我靠祢名﹐只一瞬間﹐死亡能力失敗。
ContentEN: And triumph in that blessed Name which quells the pow'r of death.

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐我愛祢名﹗謙卑俯伏在祢前﹔
ContentEN: Thy name we love, Lord Jesus! And lowly bow before Thee;

ContentCN: 榮耀、權柄、頌讚、尊敬﹐我活時必向祢獻。
ContentEN: And while we live, to Thee we give, all blessing, worship, glory;

ContentCN: 向祢高歌﹐歌聲沛﹐心口同聲來歌唱﹔
ContentEN: We sing aloud Thy praises, our hearts and voices blending,

ContentCN: 我魂感佩因祢是配﹐祢的美麗真非常﹗
ContentEN: 'Tis Thou alone we worthy own, Thy beauty's all transcending.

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐我愛祢名﹗未有天地未有時﹐
ContentEN: Thy name we love, Lord Jesus; it tells God's love unbounded

ContentCN: 神愛無境﹐就已顯明﹐要施恩典來救世。
ContentEN: To ruined man, ere time began, or heav'n and earth were founded;

ContentCN: 這愛真是永遠愛﹐墮落如我也眷顧﹔
ContentEN: Thine is a love eternal, that found in us its pleasure,

ContentCN: 愛叫祢來﹐為我還債﹐使我成為祢珍物。
ContentEN: That brought Thee low to bear our woe, and make us Thine own treasure.

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐我愛祢名﹗祢的降生何寒微﹗
ContentEN: Thy name we love, Lord Jesus; it tells Thy birth so lowly,

ContentCN: 祢的慈心滿有恩情﹐祢的道路孤且卑。
ContentEN: Thy patience, grace, Thy gentleness, Thy lonely path, so holy;

ContentCN: 我的痛苦祢替背﹐我的荊冕祢替戴﹐
ContentEN: Thou wast the "Man of Sorrows, " our grief, too, Thou didst bear it;

ContentCN: 我的禍杯祢替嘗備﹐常經憂患是為愛﹗
ContentEN: Our bitter cup Thou drankest up; the thorny crown, - didst wear it.

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐我愛祢名﹗"神的羔羊"何清潔﹗
ContentEN: Thy name we love, Lord Jesus; God's Lamb – Thou wast ordained,

ContentCN: 祢被豫定為我受刑﹐流出寶血洗罪孽。
ContentEN: To bear our sins (Thyself all clean) and hast our guilt sustained;

ContentCN: 現在祢坐高天上﹐尊貴、榮耀為冠冕﹐
ContentEN: We see Thee crowned in glory, above the heavens now seated,

ContentCN: 祢打勝仗﹐我得釋放﹐阿利路亞主名甜。
ContentEN: The victory won, Thy work well done, our righteousness completed.

ContentCN: 寶貝名﹐何甘甜﹗地之望並天之樂﹔
ContentEN: Precious name, O how sweet! Hope of earth and joy of heav'n,

ContentCN: 寶貝名﹐何甘甜﹗地之望並天之樂﹔
ContentEN: Precious name, O how sweet! Hope of earth and joy of heav'n,

ContentCN: 寶貝名﹐何甘甜﹗地之望並天之樂。
ContentEN: Precious name, O how sweet! Hope of earth and joy of heav'n.

ContentCN: 寶貝名﹐何甘甜﹗地之望並天之樂。

ContentEN: Glory to God, hallelujah!

ContentCN: 祂名為奇妙﹐祂名為奇妙﹐
ContentEN: His name is wonderful, His name is wonderful,

ContentCN: 祂名為奇妙﹐耶穌我主﹔
ContentEN: His name is wonderful, Jesus my Lord;

ContentCN: 大能的君王﹐萬有的主宰﹐
ContentEN: He is the Mighty King, Master of everything;

ContentCN: 祂名為奇妙﹐耶穌我主。
ContentEN: His name is wonderful, Jesus my Lord.

ContentCN: 祂是大牧人﹐祂是萬古磐石﹐
ContentEN: He's the great Shepherd, the Rock of all ages,

ContentCN: 祂是全能的神﹔
ContentEN: Almighty God is He.

ContentCN: 俯伏敬拜祂﹐愛戴敬仰祂﹐
ContentEN: Bow down before Him, love and adore Him.

ContentCN: 祂名為奇妙﹐耶穌我主。
ContentEN: His name is Wonderful, Jesus my Lord.

ContentCN: 廣﹐廣似洋無邊﹔高﹐高似最高的天﹔
ContentEN: Wide, wide as the ocean, high as the heavens above;

ContentCN: 深﹐深似最深的海﹐是救主的愛。
ContentEN: Deep, deep as the deepest sea, is my Savior's love;

ContentCN: 我雖然不相配﹐卻仍是救主所愛﹔
ContentEN: I, though so unworthy, still am a child of His care,

ContentCN: 因聖經告訴我﹐祂的愛處處與我同在。
ContentEN: For His word teaches me that His love reaches me ev'rywhere.

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌愛我﹐耶穌愛我﹔
ContentEN: Jesus loves me, Jesus loves me;

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌竟然愛我﹗
ContentEN: Jesus loves even me.

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因為天上父神﹐
ContentEN: I am so glad that our Father in heav'n

ContentCN: 在祂話中明說祂愛世人﹔
ContentEN: Tells of His love in the Book He has giv'n;

ContentCN: 聖經所載奇妙之事甚多﹐
ContentEN: Wonderful things in the Bible I see;

ContentCN: 其最甜者﹐就是耶穌愛我。
ContentEN: This is the dearest, that Jesus loves me.

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌愛我﹐耶穌愛我﹔
ContentEN: Jesus loves me, Jesus loves me;

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌竟然愛我﹗
ContentEN: Jesus loves even me.

ContentCN: 我雖忘祂﹐一直流蕩遠離﹐
ContentEN: Though I forget Him and wander away,

ContentCN: 祂仍愛我﹐無論流蕩何地﹔
ContentEN: Still He doth love me wherever I stray;

ContentCN: 祂來尋我﹐直到將我尋著﹐
ContentEN: Back to His dear loving arms would I flee,

ContentCN: 並且帶回﹐因為耶穌愛我。
ContentEN: When I remember that Jesus loves me.

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌愛我﹐耶穌愛我﹔
ContentEN: Jesus loves me, Jesus loves me;

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌竟然愛我﹗
ContentEN: Jesus loves even me.

ContentCN: 耶穌愛我﹐我也要愛耶穌﹔
ContentEN: Jesus loves me, and I know I love Him;

ContentCN: 愛叫祂來將我靈魂救贖﹐
ContentEN: Love brought Him down my poor soul to redeem;

ContentCN: 愛叫祂去受死擔我罪過﹔
ContentEN: Yes, it was love made Him die on the tree;

ContentCN: 因此我就確信耶穌愛我。
ContentEN: Oh, I am certain that Jesus loves me!

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌愛我﹐耶穌愛我﹔
ContentEN: Jesus loves me, Jesus loves me;

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌竟然愛我﹗
ContentEN: Jesus loves even me.

ContentCN: 這愛奇妙﹐雖然我不會說﹐
ContentEN: If one should ask of me, how can I tell?

ContentCN: 我卻知道﹐並且滿有把握﹗
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, I know very well!

ContentCN: 在我靈中聖靈打上印戳﹐
ContentEN: God's Holy Sprit with mine doth agree,

ContentCN: 不斷向我印證耶穌愛我。
ContentEN: Constantly witnessing - Jesus loves me.

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌愛我﹐耶穌愛我﹔
ContentEN: Jesus loves me, Jesus loves me;

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌竟然愛我﹗
ContentEN: Jesus loves even me.

ContentCN: 因有此證﹐我靈充滿安息﹔
ContentEN: In this assurance I find sweetest rest,

ContentCN: 因有主話﹐我心不再懷疑﹔
ContentEN: Trusting in Jesus I know I am blest;

ContentCN: 撒但驚慌﹐離我遠遠逃躲﹐
ContentEN: Satan, dismayed, from my soul now doth flee,

ContentCN: 當我告訴祂說﹐耶穌愛我。
ContentEN: When I just tell him that Jesus loves me.

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌愛我﹐耶穌愛我﹔
ContentEN: Jesus loves me, Jesus loves me;

ContentCN: 我真歡樂﹐因耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: I am so glad that Jesus loves me,

ContentCN: 耶穌竟然愛我﹗
ContentEN: Jesus loves even me.

ContentCN: 等進榮耀親眼看見我王﹐
ContentEN: Oh, if there's only one song I can sing,

ContentCN: 若有詩歌是我口舌愛唱﹐
ContentEN: When in His beauty I see the great King,

ContentCN: 那就必是我所永要唱說﹕
ContentEN: This shall my song in eternity be;

ContentCN: 何等奇妙之事﹐耶穌愛我﹗
ContentEN: Oh, what a wonder that Jesus loves me!

ContentCN: 哦﹐這愛﹐來尋我﹗哦﹐這血﹐來贖我﹗
ContentEN: Oh, the love that sought me! Oh, the blood that bought me!

ContentCN: 哦﹐這恩﹐帶我歸祂羊圈﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the grace that brought me to the fold,

ContentCN: 奇妙恩﹗帶我歸祂羊圈。
ContentEN: Wondrous grace that brought me to the fold!

ContentCN: 我曾犯罪到厭倦﹐煩悶昏沉若病﹔
ContentEN: In tenderness He sought me, weary and sick with sin,

ContentCN: 祂來尋覓帶回圈﹐動作滿了柔情。
ContentEN: And on His shoulders brought me back to His fold again,

ContentCN: 千萬天使充滿歡喜﹐
ContentEN: While angels in His presence sang

ContentCN: 因見恩典希奇無比﹗
ContentEN: Until the courts of heaven rang.

ContentCN: 哦﹐這愛﹐來尋我﹗哦﹐這血﹐來贖我﹗
ContentEN: Oh, the love that sought me! Oh, the blood that bought me!

ContentCN: 哦﹐這恩﹐帶我歸祂羊圈﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the grace that brought me to the fold,

ContentCN: 奇妙恩﹗帶我歸祂羊圈。
ContentEN: Wondrous grace that brought me to the fold!

ContentCN: 我受創傷重且深﹐祂用油酒包裹﹔
ContentEN: He washed the bleeding sin-wounds, and poured in oil and wine;

ContentCN: 祂要使我能放心﹐就說"你永屬我。"
ContentEN: He whispered to assure me, "I've found thee, thou art Mine."

ContentCN: 從無聲音如此甜美﹐
ContentEN: I never heard a sweeter voice,

ContentCN: 傷痛之心頓覺欣慰。
ContentEN: It made my aching heart rejoice.

ContentCN: 哦﹐這愛﹐來尋我﹗哦﹐這血﹐來贖我﹗
ContentEN: Oh, the love that sought me! Oh, the blood that bought me!

ContentCN: 哦﹐這恩﹐帶我歸祂羊圈﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the grace that brought me to the fold,

ContentCN: 奇妙恩﹗帶我歸祂羊圈。
ContentEN: Wondrous grace that brought me to the fold!

ContentCN: 祂指釘痕和槍傷﹐血也、水也流出﹔
ContentEN: He pointed to the nail-prints, for me His blood was shed;

ContentCN: 蘆葦、唾沫、荊棘芒﹐羞辱加上痛苦。
ContentEN: A mocking crown so thorny, was placed upon His head;

ContentCN: 我真不知我有何長﹐
ContentEN: I wondered what He saw in me,

ContentCN: 使祂竟肯為我命喪﹗
ContentEN: To suffer such deep agony.

ContentCN: 哦﹐這愛﹐來尋我﹗哦﹐這血﹐來贖我﹗
ContentEN: Oh, the love that sought me! Oh, the blood that bought me!

ContentCN: 哦﹐這恩﹐帶我歸祂羊圈﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the grace that brought me to the fold,

ContentCN: 奇妙恩﹗帶我歸祂羊圈。
ContentEN: Wondrous grace that brought me to the fold!

ContentCN: 我今安坐在祂前﹐瞻仰祂的榮臉﹔
ContentEN: I'm sitting in His presence, the sunshine of His face,

ContentCN: 安靜溫習祂恩典﹐充滿希奇感歎。
ContentEN: While with adoring wonder His blessings I retrace,

ContentCN: 好像永世時日雖久﹐
ContentEN: It seems as if eternal days

ContentCN: 給我讚美仍嫌不夠。
ContentEN: Are far too short to sound His praise.

ContentCN: 哦﹐這愛﹐來尋我﹗哦﹐這血﹐來贖我﹗
ContentEN: Oh, the love that sought me! Oh, the blood that bought me!

ContentCN: 哦﹐這恩﹐帶我歸祂羊圈﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the grace that brought me to the fold,

ContentCN: 奇妙恩﹗帶我歸祂羊圈。
ContentEN: Wondrous grace that brought me to the fold!

ContentCN: 年日雖然如逝水﹐現今一切安息﹔
ContentEN: So while the hours are passing, all now is perfect rest;

ContentCN: 我正等候那機會﹐能在祂前站立。
ContentEN: I'm waiting for the morning, the brightest and the best,

ContentCN: 那時祂召我到身邊﹐
ContentEN: When He will call us to His side,

ContentCN: 與祂同在﹐永面對面。
ContentEN: To be with Him, His spotless Bride.

ContentCN: 神聖的愛﹐何其美甜﹗
ContentEN: O Love Divine, how sweet Thou art!

ContentCN: 我心何時方現甘願被祢完全領率﹖
ContentEN: When shall I find my willing heart all taken up by Thee?

ContentCN: 我渴、我倦、我死﹐來證
ContentEN: I thirst, I faint, I die to prove

ContentCN: 救贖的愛何等中肯﹐基督對我的愛。
ContentEN: The greatness of redeeming love, the love of Christ to me.

ContentCN: 祂愛強於陰間死亡﹐
ContentEN: Stronger His love than death or hell;

ContentCN: 豐富過人測度力量﹔光明首生眾子
ContentEN: Its riches are unsearchable; the first-born sons of light

ContentCN: 空想要識愛的原本﹐
ContentEN: Desire in vain its depths to see,

ContentCN: 何長、何闊、何高、何深﹐奧秘不得而知。
ContentEN: They cannot reach the mystery, the length, and breadth, and height.

ContentCN: 只有神知神的大愛﹐
ContentEN: God only knows the love of God;

ContentCN: 但願現今就被灌溉﹐在這如石心腸﹔
ContentEN: Oh, that it now were shed abroad in this poor stony heart!

ContentCN: 為愛我嘆﹐為愛我悶﹐
ContentEN: For love I sigh, for love I pine;

ContentCN: 主﹐我祈求只這一分﹐更好福分下賞。
ContentEN: This only portion, Lord, be mine - be mine this better part!

ContentCN: 但願我能同馬利亞﹐
ContentEN: Oh, that I could forever sit

ContentCN: 永遠在主腳前坐下﹐這是我心所選﹔
ContentEN: With Mary at the Master's feet! Be this my happy choice;

ContentCN: 來聽良人﹐是我惟一
ContentEN: My only care, delight, and bliss,

ContentCN: 羨慕、愛好、暢樂、歡喜﹐我的在地之天。
ContentEN: My joy, my heaven on earth, be this, to hear the Bridegroom's voice.

ContentCN: 但願我與蒙愛約翰﹐
ContentEN: O that I could, with favoured John,

ContentCN: 疲倦的頭一同依戀在於愛主胸臆﹐
ContentEN: Recline my weary head upon the dear Redeemer's breast!

ContentCN: 脫離掛慮、懼怕、罪過﹔
ContentEN: From care, and sin, and sorrow free,

ContentCN: 主阿﹐使我從祢尋獲我的永遠安息。
ContentEN: Give me, O Lord, to find in Thee my everlasting rest!

ContentCN: 我們雖然時常搖動﹐但祂依然歷久不變﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂的應許無一落空﹐天地沒有那樣貞堅。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我們雖然二三其心﹐但祂不肯撇棄我們﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 雖受冷落﹐仍要親近﹐地上朋友無祂這真﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂永不肯辜負我們﹐所有信託祂都盡力﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 因為祂既愛了我們﹐就愛我們一直到底。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 到底﹗我們對祂無良﹐忘祂﹐傷祂﹐暗中心變﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂外﹐我們另事偶像﹐心裡也不抱歉半點﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 到這偶像傾倒絕跡﹐不禁悲傷﹐又來尋求
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我們從前所辜負的—這位始終如一的友﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂就收留安慰我們﹐並引我們親祂自己﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 一若毫無其事發生﹐並愛我們一直到底。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐我們對著這愛﹐不能不發高聲讚美﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 比死堅強﹐比水忍耐﹐我們心溶﹐只有感佩﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的救主﹐祢愛何以
ContentEN: O blessed Savior, is Thy love

ContentCN: 這真﹗這寬﹗這奇﹗
ContentEN: So great, so full, so free?

ContentCN: 不然﹐我心、我命、我力﹐
ContentEN: Fain would we have our thoughts, our hearts,

ContentCN: 那肯完全歸祢﹗
ContentEN: Our lives engaged with Thee.

ContentCN: 我們愛祢﹐因祢自己
ContentEN: We love Thee for the glorious worth

ContentCN: 上下千秋無偶﹔
ContentEN: Which in Thyself we see;

ContentCN: 我們愛祢﹐因祢不避
ContentEN: We love Thee for that shameful cross,

ContentCN: 十字架的恥羞。
ContentEN: Endured so patiently.

ContentCN: 人愛所誇﹐不過就是
ContentEN: No man of greater love can boast

ContentCN: 代友捨命的事﹔
ContentEN: Than for his friend to die;

ContentCN: 但祢卻為仇敵受死﹐
ContentEN: Thou for Thine enemies wast slain!

ContentCN: 誰曾愛到如此﹗
ContentEN: What love with Thine can vie?

ContentCN: 雖然祢有神的形像﹐
ContentEN: Though in the very form of God,

ContentCN: 安居榮耀天庭﹔
ContentEN: With heavenly glory crowned,

ContentCN: 但祢卻成奴僕式樣﹐
ContentEN: Thou didst a servant's form assume,

ContentCN: 親歷憂患之境。
ContentEN: Beset with sorrow round.

ContentCN: 祢願凡事與人一樣
ContentEN: Thou wouldst like wretched man be made

ContentCN: (除了罪惡無分)﹐
ContentEN: In everything but sin,

ContentCN: 好叫我們與祢相像﹐
ContentEN: That we as like Thee might become

ContentCN: 雖然前此不稱。
ContentEN: As we unlike had been.

ContentCN: 像祢溫柔﹐像祢貞堅﹐
ContentEN: Like Thee in faith, in meekness, love,

ContentCN: 像祢凡事之間﹗
ContentEN: In every beauteous grace;

ContentCN: 榮上加榮﹐天天更變﹐
ContentEN: From glory unto glory changed,

ContentCN: 直到與祢相見。
ContentEN: Till we behold Thy face.

ContentCN: 我們的主﹐我們的心
ContentEN: O Lord! We treasure in our souls

ContentCN: 珍藏祢的愛情﹔
ContentEN: The memory of Thy love;

ContentCN: 今後我們對祢尊名﹐
ContentEN: And ever shall Thy name to us

ContentCN: 永要感激、恭敬。
ContentEN: A grateful odour prove.

ContentCN: 主愛﹐口舌真說不來﹗
ContentEN: His love is more than tongue can tell!

ContentCN: 主愛﹐口舌真說不來﹗
ContentEN: His love is more than tongue can tell!

ContentCN: 耶穌向我所施恩愛﹐口舌真說不來﹗
ContentEN: The love that Jesus had for me is more than tongue can tell!

ContentCN: 祢的大愛﹐過於人所能度﹐
ContentEN: It passeth knowledge, that dear love of Thine,

ContentCN: 我救主耶穌﹗但不堪的我﹐
ContentEN: My Jesus, Saviour; yet this soul of mine

ContentCN: 真要知道它的高、深、長、闊﹐
ContentEN: Would of Thy love, in all its breadth and length,

ContentCN: 好叫它的能力越顯越多
ContentEN: Its height and depth, its everlasting strength,

ContentCN: 在我身上﹗
ContentEN: Know more and more.

ContentCN: 祢的慈愛﹐過於人所能論﹐
ContentEN: It passeth telling, that dear love of Thine,

ContentCN: 我救主耶穌﹗但我的嘴唇
ContentEN: My Jesus, Saviour; yet these lips of mine

ContentCN: 要向遠近罪人勸誨諄諄﹐
ContentEN: Would fain proclaim to sinners far and near,

ContentCN: 告訴他們﹐祢愛能解憂困﹐
ContentEN: A love which can remove all guilty fear,

ContentCN: 並賜喜樂。
ContentEN: And love beget.

ContentCN: 祢的奇愛過於人所能讚﹐
ContentEN: It passeth praises, that dear love of Thine,

ContentCN: 我救主耶穌﹗但我的心坎
ContentEN: My Jesus Saviour; yet this heart of mine

ContentCN: 總要歌唱那愛﹐這大﹗這滿﹗
ContentEN: Would sing that love, so full, so rich, so free,

ContentCN: 因為惡性如我﹐也得恩湛﹐
ContentEN: Which brings a rebel sinner, such as me,

ContentCN: 來親近神﹗
ContentEN: Nigh unto God.

ContentCN: 我今雖然不能在這地方
ContentEN: But though I cannot sing, or tell, or know

ContentCN: 測度、講論、頌讚愛的泱漭﹔
ContentEN: The fullness of Thy love, while here below,

ContentCN: 但我要帶我的虛空心房﹐
ContentEN: My empty vessel I may freely bring;

ContentCN: 來到祢這愛的泉源良港﹐
ContentEN: O Thou who art of love the living spring,

ContentCN: 求祢充滿﹗
ContentEN: My vessel fill.

ContentCN: 我真是一個虛空的器皿﹐
ContentEN: I am an empty vessel — not one thought

ContentCN: 對祢從無一次戀慕深情﹔
ContentEN: Or look of love to Thee I've ever brought;

ContentCN: 但我卻能一再來祢面前﹐
ContentEN: Yet I may come, and come again to Thee,

ContentCN: 求祢憐恤、幫助﹐得祢恩典﹐
ContentEN: With this the empty sinner's only plea:

ContentCN: 因祢愛我﹗
ContentEN: Thou lovest me.

ContentCN: 哦﹐我主﹐求祢用愛充滿我﹐
ContentEN: Oh, fill me, Jesus, Saviour, with Thy love!

ContentCN: 領我到天上永活的江河﹔
ContentEN: Lead, lead me to the living fount above;

ContentCN: 讓我用簡單的信到那裡﹐
ContentEN: Thither may I in simple faith draw nigh,

ContentCN: 倚靠、鑑賞、稱羨並享受祢﹐
ContentEN: And never to another fountain fly,

ContentCN: 不再他求。
ContentEN: But unto Thee.

ContentCN: 當我面對面看見我救主﹐
ContentEN: Lord Jesus, when Thee face to face I see,

ContentCN: 當我在祂的寶座前俯伏﹐
ContentEN: When on Thy lofty throne I sit with Thee,

ContentCN: 那時﹐我就要希奇並歌唱
ContentEN: Then of Thy love, in all its breadth and length,

ContentCN: 祂的大愛如何深、高、闊、長﹐
ContentEN: Its height and depth, its everlasting strength,

ContentCN: 並要敬拜。
ContentEN: My soul shall sing.

ContentCN: 驚人大愛﹐何能如此-
ContentEN: Amazing love! How can it be

ContentCN: 何等救主竟為我死﹗
ContentEN: That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me!

ContentCN: 何能如此-如我也能
ContentEN: And can it be that I should gain

ContentCN: 得著救主寶血權利﹗
ContentEN: An interest in the Saviour's blood?

ContentCN: 為誰使祂如此痛苦﹖
ContentEN: Died He for me, who caused His pain?

ContentCN: 為我祂樂受苦至極﹗
ContentEN: For me, who Him to death pursued?

ContentCN: 驚人大愛﹐何能如此﹗
ContentEN: Amazing love! How can it be

ContentCN: 何等救主竟為我死﹗
ContentEN: That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me?

ContentCN: 驚人大愛﹐何能如此-
ContentEN: Amazing love! How can it be

ContentCN: 何等救主竟為我死﹗
ContentEN: That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me!

ContentCN: 祂離父神榮耀寶座﹐
ContentEN: He left His Father's throne above,

ContentCN: 祂的恩典無限豐富﹔
ContentEN: So free, so infinite His grace;

ContentCN: 除愛之外一切皆捨﹐
ContentEN: Emptied Himself of all but love,

ContentCN: 來救無望墮落族類﹔
ContentEN: And bled for Adam's helpless race;

ContentCN: 無限憐憫闊長深厚﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis mercy all, immense and free;

ContentCN: 基督我神親來尋我。
ContentEN: For, O my God! It found out me.

ContentCN: 驚人大愛﹐何能如此-
ContentEN: Amazing love! How can it be

ContentCN: 何等救主竟為我死﹗
ContentEN: That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me!

ContentCN: 多年被囚困苦心靈﹐
ContentEN: Long my imprisoned spirit lay

ContentCN: 黑暗罪惡所轄奴僕﹐
ContentEN: Fast bound in sin and nature's night;

ContentCN: 祢眼射出復活光線﹐
ContentEN: Thine eye diffused a quick'ning ray,

ContentCN: 其光閃耀滿我牢房﹔
ContentEN: I woke, the dungeon flamed with light;

ContentCN: 我鍊脫落﹐我心甦醒﹐
ContentEN: My chains fell off, my heart was free;

ContentCN: 歡然跳躍隨祢前往。
ContentEN: I rose, went forth, and followed Thee.

ContentCN: 驚人大愛﹐何能如此-
ContentEN: Amazing love! How can it be

ContentCN: 何等救主竟為我死﹗
ContentEN: That Thou, my God, shouldst die for me!

ContentCN: 永遠脫去審判恐懼﹐
ContentEN: No condemnation now I dread;

ContentCN: 耶穌一切都是屬我﹔
ContentEN: Jesus, and all in Him, is mine!

ContentCN: 因我元首我永活著﹐
ContentEN: Alive in Him, my living Head,

ContentCN: 穿起聖潔公義白衣﹐
ContentEN: And clothed in righteousness divine,

ContentCN: 坦然來到父寶座前﹐
ContentEN: Bold I approach th'eternal throne,

ContentCN: 因我救主來領冠冕。
ContentEN: And claim the crown, thro' Christ my own.

ContentCN: 神聖之愛﹐遠超眾愛﹐天上之樂臨地上﹔
ContentEN: Love Divine, all loves excelling, joy of heav'n, to earth come down;

ContentEN: Let us all in Thee inherit, let us find the promised rest.

ContentEN: Take away the love of sinning; Alpha and Omega be;

ContentEN: Take away the love of sinning; Alpha and Omega be;

ContentEN: Take away the love of sinning; Alpha and Omega be;

ContentEN: End of faith, as its beginning, set our hearts at liberty.

ContentEN: Come, Almighty, to deliver, let us all Thy life receive;

ContentEN: Thee we would be always blessing, serve Thee as Thy hosts above,

ContentEN: Pray, and praise Thee without ceasing, glory in Thy perfect love.

ContentEN: Finish, then, Thy new creation; pure and spotless let us be;

ContentEN: Let us see Thy great salvation perfectly restored in Thee;

ContentEN: Changed from glory into glory till with Thee we take our place,

ContentEN: Till we cast our crowns before Thee, lost in wonder, love and praise.

ContentEN: Breathe, O breathe Thy loving Spirit into every troubled breast;
