ContentCN: 直到進入榮耀之中﹐永遠將祢愛頌揚。
ContentEN: Till we cast our crowns before Thee, lost in wonder, love and praise.

ContentCN: 直到進入榮耀之中﹐永遠將祢愛頌揚。
ContentEN: Till we cast our crowns before Thee, lost in wonder, love and praise.

ContentCN: 直到進入榮耀之中﹐永遠將祢愛頌揚。
ContentEN: Till we cast our crowns before Thee, lost in wonder, love and praise.

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐當我們想到
ContentEN: Lord Jesus, when we think of Thee,

ContentCN: 祢的一切恩愛﹐
ContentEN: Of all Thy love and grace,

ContentCN: 我們的靈盼望最好
ContentEN: Our spirits long and fain would see

ContentCN: 當面見祢丰采。
ContentEN: Thy beauty face to face.

ContentCN: 雖然我們行在野地﹐
ContentEN: And though the wilderness we tread,

ContentCN: 寂寞、乾渴、駭驚﹐
ContentEN: A barren, thirsty ground,

ContentCN: 左右荊棘﹐前後蒺藜﹐
ContentEN: With thorns and briars overspread,

ContentCN: 四圍仇敵陷阱。
ContentEN: Where foes and snares abound.

ContentCN: 我們卻從深處著想﹐
ContentEN: Yet in Thy love such depths we see,

ContentCN: 知道祢愛價值﹔
ContentEN: Our souls o'erflow with praise —

ContentCN: 我們因此心裡明亮﹐
ContentEN: Content ourselves while Lord to Thee

ContentCN: 讚美祢恩不置。
ContentEN: A joyful song we raise.

ContentCN: 祢是我們生命、力量﹐
ContentEN: Our Lord, our Life, our Rest, our Shield,

ContentCN: 盾牌、磐石、詩歌﹐
ContentEN: Our Rock, our Food, our Light -

ContentCN: 無論怎樣把祢思想﹐
ContentEN: Each thought of Thee doth constant yield

ContentCN: 總叫我們快樂。
ContentEN: Unchanging, fresh delight.

ContentCN: 可愛的主﹐保守我們﹐
ContentEN: Blest Saviour, keep our spirits stayed

ContentCN: 緊緊跟隨祢行﹐
ContentEN: Hard following after Thee

ContentCN: 直到我們進入天門﹐
ContentEN: Till we, in robes of white arrayed,

ContentCN: 面見祢的榮形。
ContentEN: Thy face in glory see.

ContentCN: 祢這不肯放我的愛﹐
ContentEN: O Love that wilt not let me go,

ContentCN: 疲倦的我今息於祢﹔
ContentEN: I rest my weary soul on Thee;

ContentCN: 我將餘生還祢若債﹐
ContentEN: I give Thee back the life I owe,

ContentCN: 好使它在祢這深海
ContentEN: That in Thine ocean depths its flow

ContentCN: 能以更為豐溢。
ContentEN: May richer, fuller be.

ContentCN: 祢這照耀我路的光﹐
ContentEN: O Light, that followest all my way,

ContentCN: 我將殘燈帶來交祢﹔
ContentEN: I yield my flickering torch to Thee;

ContentCN: 我心還祢所借火亮﹐
ContentEN: My heart restores its borrowed ray,

ContentCN: 它的日子藉祢太陽
ContentEN: That in Thy sunshine's glow its day

ContentCN: 就能更為明麗。
ContentEN: May brighter, fairer be.

ContentCN: 祢這用苦尋我之樂﹐
ContentEN: O Joy that seekest me through pain,

ContentCN: 我心向祢不能怨懟﹔
ContentEN: I cannot close my heart to Thee;

ContentCN: 暴雨乃是彩虹之轍﹐
ContentEN: I trace the rainbow through the rain

ContentCN: 祢的應許祢必負責﹐
ContentEN: And feel the promise is not vain

ContentCN: 轉瞬便無眼淚。
ContentEN: That morn shall tearless be.

ContentCN: 祢這使我抬頭之架﹐
ContentEN: O Cross that liftest up my head,

ContentCN: 我不敢求與祢相離﹔
ContentEN: I dare not ask to fly from Thee;

ContentCN: 我的榮耀我已葬下﹐
ContentEN: I lay in dust life's glory dead,

ContentCN: 即此長出生命紅花﹐
ContentEN: And from the ground there blossoms red

ContentCN: 永遠開放不已。
ContentEN: Life that shall endless be.

ContentCN: 深哉﹐深哉﹐耶穌的愛﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the deep, deep love of Jesus,

ContentCN: 無限廣闊﹐無限量﹗
ContentEN: Vast, unmeasured, boundless, free!

ContentCN: 浩浩蕩蕩有如汪洋﹐
ContentEN: Rolling as a mighty ocean,

ContentCN: 主愛臨我何週詳﹗
ContentEN: In its fullness over me,

ContentCN: 把我蔭庇把我環繞﹐
ContentEN: Underneath me, all around me,

ContentCN: 是主滔滔大慈愛﹔
ContentEN: Is the current of Thy love;

ContentCN: 導我前行﹐領我歸家﹐
ContentEN: Leading onward, leading homeward

ContentCN: 安息天上到萬代。
ContentEN: To my glorious rest above.

ContentCN: 深哉﹐深哉﹐耶穌的愛﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the deep, deep love of Jesus,

ContentCN: 萬國萬民當頌讚﹗
ContentEN: Spread His praise from shore to shore;

ContentCN: 何等的愛永久的愛﹐
ContentEN: How He loveth, ever loveth,

ContentCN: 世世代代不更變﹗
ContentEN: Changeth never, never more;

ContentCN: 祂常看顧屬祂兒女﹐
ContentEN: How He watcheth o'er His loved ones,

ContentCN: 在十架上祂捨身﹔
ContentEN: Died to call them all His own;

ContentCN: 為了我們父前代求﹐
ContentEN: How for them He intercedeth,

ContentCN: 在寶座上常施恩。
ContentEN: Watcheth o'er them from the throne.

ContentCN: 深哉﹐深哉﹐耶穌的愛﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the deep, deep love of Jesus,

ContentCN: 愛中至愛﹐愛無匹﹗
ContentEN: Love of every love the best;

ContentCN: 猶如洋海祝福四溢﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis an ocean vast of blessing,

ContentCN: 又如良港可安息。
ContentEN: 'Tis a haven sweet of rest.

ContentCN: 深哉﹐深哉﹐耶穌的愛﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the deep, deep love of Jesus,

ContentCN: 對我有如在天堂﹔
ContentEN: 'Tis a heav'n of heav'ns to me;

ContentCN: 領我進入榮光之中﹐
ContentEN: And it lifts me up to glory,

ContentCN: 領我就近祢身旁﹗
ContentEN: For it lifts me up to Thee.

ContentCN: 祂是超乎萬人之上﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: One there is above all others - O how He loves!

ContentCN: 比諸兄弟更密更強﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: His is love beyond a brother's, O how He loves!

ContentCN: 地上朋友時常離我﹐
ContentEN: Earthly friends may fail and leave us,

ContentCN: 今日慰我﹐明日忌我﹔
ContentEN: One day soothe, the next day grieve us,

ContentCN: 但這朋友從不欺我﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: But this Friend will ne'er deceive us, O how He loves!

ContentCN: 我今享受喜樂、安康﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: Joy and peace it is to know Him - O how He loves!

ContentCN: 都虧我主罪債代償﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: Think, O think how much we owe Him - O how He loves!

ContentCN: 祂流寶血﹐祂買了我﹐
ContentEN: With His precious blood He bought us,

ContentCN: 祂來曠野﹐祂尋找我﹐
ContentEN: In the wilderness He sought us,

ContentCN: 同歸羊群﹐祂領導我﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: To His loved ones safely brought us - O how He loves!

ContentCN: 耶穌乃是我們朋友﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: We have found a friend in Jesus - O how He loves!

ContentCN: 祂賜福祺﹐祂賜恩祐﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: 'Tis His great delight to bless us - O how He loves!

ContentCN: 我心欣幸能瞻仰祂﹐
ContentEN: How our hearts delight to hear Him,

ContentCN: 叫我安居常依傍祂﹐
ContentEN: Bid us dwell in safety near Him -

ContentCN: 我怎可以再頂撞祂﹖哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: Why should we distrust or fear Him? O how He loves!

ContentCN: 因祂的名我得赦免﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: Through His name we are forgiven - O how He loves!

ContentCN: 在仇敵前為我設筵﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: Backward shall our foes be driven - O how He loves!

ContentCN: 祂使最好福分臨我﹐
ContentEN: Best of blessings He'll provide us,

ContentCN: 祂禁旨外禍害侵我﹐
ContentEN: Nought but good shall e'er betide us,

ContentCN: 直到榮耀祂在引我﹐哦﹐祂的愛﹗
ContentEN: Safe to glory He will guide us; O how He loves!

ContentCN: 我有良友﹐其愛難述﹐
ContentEN: I've found a Friend, oh, such a Friend!

ContentCN: 愛我遠在創世前﹔
ContentEN: He loved me, ere I knew Him;

ContentCN: 慈繩愛索將我牽引﹐
ContentEN: He drew me, with the cords of love,

ContentCN: 使我和祂永相繫。
ContentEN: And thus He bound me to Him.

ContentCN: 此愛堅強﹐圍繞我心﹐
ContentEN: And round my heart still closely twine,

ContentCN: 再無力量能分離﹔
ContentEN: Those ties which naught can sever,

ContentCN: 我屬我友﹐我友屬我﹐
ContentEN: For I am His and He is mine,

ContentCN: 直到永世不稍渝。
ContentEN: Forever and forever.

ContentCN: 我有良友﹐其愛難述﹐
ContentEN: I've found a Friend, oh, such a Friend!

ContentCN: 救贖大愛奪我心﹔
ContentEN: He bled, He died to save me;

ContentCN: 流血與水﹐賜我永生﹐
ContentEN: And not alone the gift of life,

ContentCN: 更以自己為賞賜。
ContentEN: But His own self He gave me.

ContentCN: 我今不再屬我自己﹐
ContentEN: Naught that I have my own I call,

ContentCN: 永遠歸於我救主﹔
ContentEN: I hold it for the Giver;

ContentCN: 我心、我力、我命、我愛﹐
ContentEN: My heart, my strength, my life, my all

ContentCN: 全歸救主至永久。
ContentEN: Are His, and His forever.

ContentCN: 我有良友﹐其愛難述﹐
ContentEN: I've found a Friend, oh, such a Friend!

ContentCN: 誠信真實無可比﹔
ContentEN: So kind and true and tender,

ContentCN: 祂名稱為奇妙、策士﹐
ContentEN: So wise a counselor and guide,

ContentCN: 是我全能護衛者。
ContentEN: So mighty a defender!

ContentCN: 祂愛不斷向我傾瀉﹐
ContentEN: From Him who loves me now so well

ContentCN: 有何力量能斷開﹔
ContentEN: What pow'r my soul can sever?

ContentCN: 或生或死﹐今世來世﹐
ContentEN: Shall life or death or earth or hell?

ContentCN: 我屬我友到永久！
ContentEN: No, I am His forever.

ContentCN: 我有良友﹐其愛難述﹐
ContentEN: I've found a Friend, oh, such a Friend!

ContentCN: 一切權柄祂掌握﹔
ContentEN: All pow'r to Him is given,

ContentCN: 回家途中﹐有祂護衛﹐
ContentEN: To guard me on my onward course,

ContentCN: 引我安然進榮耀。
ContentEN: And bring me safe to heaven.

ContentCN: 永世榮光﹐遠遠在望﹐
ContentEN: Th'eternal glories gleam afar,

ContentCN: 使我萎靈得鼓舞﹔
ContentEN: To nerve my faint endeavor:

ContentCN: 儆醒、爭戰、勞苦、事奉﹐
ContentEN: So now to watch, to work, to war,

ContentCN: 與主安息享永福。
ContentEN: And then to rest forever.

ContentCN: 主的愛越久越深﹐主的愛越久越深﹔
ContentEN: Sweeter as the years go by, sweeter as the years go by;

ContentCN: 何等豐盛深厚﹐何等廣大長久﹐
ContentEN: Richer, fuller, deeper, Jesus' love is sweeter,

ContentCN: 主的愛越久越深。
ContentEN: Sweeter as the years go by.

ContentCN: 我主因愛尋找我﹐當我罪中迷困﹔
ContentEN: Of Jesus' love that sought me when I was lost in sin,

ContentCN: 何等奇妙的恩典﹐領我歸回羊群。
ContentEN: Of wondrous grace that brought me back to His fold again,

ContentCN: 我主的慈愛憐憫﹐深過最深海洋﹐
ContentEN: Of heights and depths of mercy far deeper than the sea

ContentCN: 高過最高的蒼天﹐我要永遠頌揚。
ContentEN: And higher than the heavens my theme shall ever be.

ContentCN: 主的愛越久越深﹐主的愛越久越深﹔
ContentEN: Sweeter as the years go by, sweeter as the years go by;

ContentCN: 何等豐盛深厚﹐何等廣大長久﹐
ContentEN: Richer, fuller, deeper, Jesus' love is sweeter,

ContentCN: 主的愛越久越深。
ContentEN: Sweeter as the years go by.

ContentCN: 我主生在猶太境﹐走過人生旅程﹔
ContentEN: He trod in old Judea life's pathway long ago;

ContentCN: 群眾來圍繞親近﹐為要得著救恩。
ContentEN: The people thronged about Him, His saving grace to know;

ContentCN: 傷心的人得撫慰﹐瞎眼的能看見﹔
ContentEN: He healed the broken-hearted, and caused the blind to see;

ContentCN: 今天主偉大愛心﹐仍向我們彰顯。
ContentEN: And still His great heart yearneth in love for even me.

ContentCN: 主的愛越久越深﹐主的愛越久越深﹔
ContentEN: Sweeter as the years go by, sweeter as the years go by;

ContentCN: 何等豐盛深厚﹐何等廣大長久﹐
ContentEN: Richer, fuller, deeper, Jesus' love is sweeter,

ContentCN: 主的愛越久越深。
ContentEN: Sweeter as the years go by.

ContentCN: 主有奇妙的慈愛﹐為我忍受虧損﹔
ContentEN: 'Twas wondrous love which led Him for us to suffer loss-

ContentCN: 甘願被釘十字架﹐毫無懷恨埋怨。
ContentEN: To bear without a murmur the anguish of the cross.

ContentCN: 但願蒙救贖聖徒﹐一同歌頌歡呼﹔
ContentEN: With saints redeemed in glory, let us our voices raise,

ContentCN: 直到天地都響應﹐讚美耶穌聖名。
ContentEN: Till heav'n and earth re-echo with our Redeemer's praise.

ContentCN: 何等奇妙﹗何等驚異﹗
ContentEN: How marvelous, how wonderful!

ContentCN: 我將永遠唱此詩﹕
ContentEN: And my song shall ever be:

ContentCN: 何等奇妙﹗何等驚異﹗
ContentEN: How marvelous, how wonderful!

ContentCN: 救主愛我愛無極﹗
ContentEN: Is my Saviour's love for me!

ContentCN: 拿撒勒人耶穌面前
ContentEN: I stand amazed in the presence

ContentCN: 我站立﹐心便震驚﹗
ContentEN: Of Jesus the Nazarene,

ContentCN: 希奇祂如何能愛我-
ContentEN: And wonder how He could love me,

ContentCN: 定罪污穢的罪人﹗
ContentEN: A sinner condemned, unclean.

ContentCN: 何等奇妙﹗何等驚異﹗
ContentEN: How marvelous, how wonderful!

ContentCN: 我將永遠唱此詩﹕
ContentEN: And my song shall ever be:

ContentCN: 何等奇妙﹗何等驚異﹗
ContentEN: How marvelous, how wonderful!

ContentCN: 救主愛我愛無極﹗
ContentEN: Is my Saviour's love for me!

ContentCN: 為我﹐祂在園中祈求﹐
ContentEN: For me it was in the garden

ContentCN: 只願神旨得成就﹔
ContentEN: He prayed: "Not My will, but Thine";

ContentCN: 流淚非為自己憂苦﹐
ContentEN: He had no tears for His own griefs,

ContentCN: 汗如血點只為我﹗
ContentEN: But sweat-drops of blood for mine.

ContentCN: 何等奇妙﹗何等驚異﹗
ContentEN: How marvelous, how wonderful!

ContentCN: 我將永遠唱此詩﹕
ContentEN: And my song shall ever be:

ContentCN: 何等奇妙﹗何等驚異﹗
ContentEN: How marvelous, how wonderful!

ContentCN: 救主愛我愛無極﹗
ContentEN: Is my Saviour's love for me!

ContentCN: 祂擔當我一切罪憂﹐
ContentEN: He took my sins and my sorrows,

ContentCN: 甘願親自來背負﹔
ContentEN: He made them His very own;

ContentCN: 祂背我重擔至加略﹐
ContentEN: He bore the burden to Calvary,

ContentCN: 孤單受苦並受死。
ContentEN: And suffered, and died alone.

ContentCN: 何等奇妙﹗何等驚異﹗
ContentEN: How marvelous, how wonderful!

ContentCN: 我將永遠唱此詩﹕
ContentEN: And my song shall ever be:

ContentCN: 何等奇妙﹗何等驚異﹗
ContentEN: How marvelous, how wonderful!

ContentCN: 救主愛我愛無極﹗
ContentEN: Is my Saviour's love for me!

ContentCN: 當與眾聖同進榮耀﹐
ContentEN: When with the ransomed in glory

ContentCN: 至終親見祂歡顏﹔
ContentEN: His face I at last shall see,

ContentCN: 這將成我無窮喜樂﹐
ContentEN: 'Twill be my joy through the ages,

ContentCN: 來唱祂恩愛無極﹗
ContentEN: To sing of His love for me.

ContentCN: 驚人恩典﹗何等甘甜﹐
ContentEN: Amazing grace! How sweet the sound,

ContentCN: 來救無賴如我﹗
ContentEN: That saved a wretch like me!

ContentCN: 前曾失落﹐今被尋見﹗
ContentEN: I once was lost, but now am found,

ContentCN: 前盲今不摸索﹗
ContentEN: Was blind, but now I see.

ContentCN: 恩典教導我心畏懼﹐
ContentEN: 'Twas grace that taught my heart to fear,

ContentCN: 又將畏懼除掉﹔
ContentEN: And grace my fears relieved;

ContentCN: 恩典與我初次相遇﹐
ContentEN: How precious did that grace appear

ContentCN: 顯為何等可寶。
ContentEN: The hour I first believed!

ContentCN: 主已應許向我施恩﹐
ContentEN: The Lord hath promised good to me;

ContentCN: 祂話就是保證﹔
ContentEN: His word my hope secures;

ContentCN: 祂要作我盾牌、永分﹐
ContentEN: He will my shield and portion be

ContentCN: 帶我經過此生。
ContentEN: As long as life endures.

ContentCN: 歷經艱險、勞碌、痛苦﹐
ContentEN: Through many dangers, toils, and snares,

ContentCN: 今我已息主前﹔
ContentEN: I have already come;

ContentCN: 恩典領我跋涉長途﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis grace hath brought me safe thus far,

ContentCN: 平安歸回天家。
ContentEN: And grace will lead me home.

ContentCN: 當我見主萬年之後﹐
ContentEN: When we've been there ten thousand years,

ContentCN: 仍像太陽照耀﹐
ContentEN: Bright shining as the sun,

ContentCN: 比我開始讚美時候﹐
ContentEN: We've no less days to sing God's praise

ContentCN: 讚美仍不減少。
ContentEN: Than when we first begun.

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐奇妙的救主﹗
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, wonderful Savior!

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐我心所愛慕。
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, the One I adore;

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐奇妙的救主﹗
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, wonderful Savior!

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐永稱頌歡呼。
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, and praise evermore.

ContentCN: 耶穌已愛我﹐奇妙的救主﹗
ContentEN: Jesus has loved me - wonderful Savior!

ContentCN: 耶穌已愛我—為何﹖我難述﹔
ContentEN: Jesus has loved me, I cannot tell why;

ContentCN: 祂親來拯救這不配罪人﹐
ContentEN: He came to rescue sinners unworthy;

ContentCN: 我心已臣服﹐甘為祂捨身。
ContentEN: My heart He conquered, for Him I would die.

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐奇妙的救主﹗
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, wonderful Savior!

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐我心所愛慕。
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, the One I adore;

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐奇妙的救主﹗
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, wonderful Savior!

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐永稱頌歡呼。
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, and praise evermore.

ContentCN: 耶穌已救我﹐奇妙的救主﹗
ContentEN: Jesus has saved me – wonderful Savior!

ContentCN: 耶穌已救我—如何﹖我難述﹔
ContentEN: Jesus has saved me, I cannot tell how;

ContentCN: 我知祂親來為我付贖價﹐
ContentEN: But this I do know, He came, my ransom,

ContentCN: 頭戴荊棘冕﹐捨命在十架。
ContentEN: Dying on Calv'ry with thorns on His brow.

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐奇妙的救主﹗
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, wonderful Savior!

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐我心所愛慕。
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, the One I adore;

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐奇妙的救主﹗
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, wonderful Savior!

ContentCN: 榮耀歸耶穌﹐永稱頌歡呼。
ContentEN: Glory to Jesus, and praise evermore.

ContentCN: 耶穌必領我﹐奇妙的救主﹗
ContentEN: Jesus will lead me – wonderful Savior!

ContentCN: 耶穌必領我—何往﹖我難述﹔
ContentEN: Jesus will lead me, I cannot tell where;

ContentCN: 但我必跟隨﹐不論境如何﹐
ContentEN: So I will follow thro' joy or sorrow,

ContentCN: 陰暗或晴明﹐憂苦或福樂。
ContentEN: Sunshine or tempest, since He leads me there.

ContentCN: 我們要從那裏說起﹐
ContentEN: Where shall our wond'ring souls begin?

ContentCN: 主﹐祢所賜一切福氣﹖
ContentEN: How shall we all to heav'n aspire?

ContentCN: 既然脫罪不作奴隸﹐
ContentEN: As slaves redeemed from death and sin,

ContentCN: 既然免死不作仇敵﹐
ContentEN: As brands plucked from eternal fire,

ContentCN: 我當如何向祢拜禮﹐
ContentEN: How shall we suited triumphs raise,

ContentCN: 把祢高舉纔算適宜﹖
ContentEN: Or sing our great Deliv'rer's praise?

ContentCN: 祢向我們所施安撫﹐
ContentEN: Oh, how shall we the goodness tell,

ContentCN: 我們怎能用口傾吐﹖
ContentEN: Father, which Thou to us hast showed,

ContentCN: 可怒之子當下火湖﹐
ContentEN: Children of wrath, and doomed to hell

ContentCN: 竟然得救﹐以神為父﹗
ContentEN: But children now redeemed to God?

ContentCN: 在地我知罪已抹塗﹐
ContentEN: On earth we know our sins forgiven,

ContentCN: 真是預享屬天美福。
ContentEN: Blest with this antepast of heaven.

ContentCN: 我們的心滿是基督﹐
ContentEN: Our hearts are full of Christ, and long

ContentCN: 切望傾倒此中豐富﹔
ContentEN: Their glorious matter to declare;

ContentCN: 祢是我們詩歌題目﹐
ContentEN: Of Him we make our loftier song,

ContentCN: 祢是我們心愛救主﹔
ContentEN: We cannot from His praise forbear;

ContentCN: 我們舌頭急要唱出﹕
ContentEN: Our ready tongues make haste to sing

ContentCN: 天上君王榮耀萬古﹗
ContentEN: The glories of the heavenly King.

ContentCN: 祢比世上一切眾生﹐
ContentEN: Fairer than all the earth-born race,

ContentCN: 都更美麗﹐都更成聖﹗
ContentEN: Perfect in comeliness Thou art;

ContentCN: 祢心有愛﹐祢口有恩﹔
ContentEN: Replenished are Thy lips with grace,

ContentCN: 祢既受苦﹐祢又捨身﹔
ContentEN: And full of love Thy tender heart.

ContentCN: 祢這永受頌讚的神﹗
ContentEN: God ever blest; we bow the knee,

ContentCN: 我們敬拜以靈以誠。
ContentEN: And own all fullness dwells in Thee.

ContentCN: 世上罪人﹐為何徬徨、遁走、驚懼如迷羊﹖
ContentEN: Souls of men, why will ye scatter like a crowd of frightened sheep?

ContentCN: 我真今俯伏主面前﹐我希奇主恩典﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 像我這樣的罪魁﹐主竟拯救歸回﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我本罪人貪世福﹐那裡想到要主﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 為何無端來尋我﹐用愛圍繞著我﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 當時我心因罪惡﹐糾纏得真難過﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但我並未求解脫﹐祢卻前來尋我﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 當時我雖聽見祢﹐但我總是不理﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 並且多次反對祢﹐實是祢的仇敵。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我實不知為何故﹐祢竟為我罪辜﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 釘死在十字架上﹐使我得著平康﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的罪惡比人多﹐我為肉體而活﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的性情比人壞﹐祢為什麼要愛﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢生馬槽何寒微﹗祢的生活何卑﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢到加略受折磨﹗祢的全是為我﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢在何處看上我﹖為何又愛上我﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 所以才如此受苦﹐為要使我得福﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我比別人有何長﹖有何比人高尚﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 因此使祢離天上﹐為我十架命喪﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主阿﹐當我想自己﹐實在無一可以
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 邀祢青眼﹐使祢喜﹐我就只得希奇﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 無他﹐我今只能說﹕祢是無故愛我﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 哦﹐祢是無故愛我﹗哦﹐這恩真難說﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 哦﹐不是因自己好﹐不是因自己高﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 乃是祢要愛罪魁﹐無故的愛罪魁﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我既如此的蒙恩﹐自然應當認真
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 愛祢、念祢、順服祢﹐才可對得住祢﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但是﹐可憐到如今我心仍冷如冰﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 雖然明知祢恩愛﹐仍是對祢懈怠﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢雖為我捨性命﹐我對祢仍無情﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢雖為我離天庭﹐我對祢只半心。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 隱藏世界離不得﹐祢道路嫌太窄﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 微小自己捨不得﹐祢生命苦太默﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 當我想到這裡時﹐我心若有所失﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 自恨性情太敗壞﹐自恨生活太歹。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但是﹐主﹐祢豈不知我心將要如此﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢既豫知我心冷﹐當初何必施恩﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 難道祢為我捨命﹐擔當痛苦、罪、病﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 受盡人世的艱辛﹐就是為此冷心﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢既知道我如此﹐何苦為我受死﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢既知道我無良﹐何竟為我受傷﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢雖豫知我冷淡﹐對祢刻變時翻﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但祢仍然要愛我﹐為我死﹐為我活。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 來阿﹐祢這萬福泉源﹗
ContentEN: Come, Thou Fount of ev'ry blessing,

ContentCN: 調我心弦來稱頌﹗
ContentEN: Tune my heart to sing Thy grace;

ContentCN: 憐憫江河湧流不斷﹐
ContentEN: Streams of mercy, never ceasing,

ContentCN: 迫我不斷來歌詠。
ContentEN: Call for songs of loudest praise.

ContentCN: 我本外人任意流蕩﹐
ContentEN: Jesus sought me when a stranger,

ContentCN: 基督卻親來尋還﹔
ContentEN: Wand'ring from the fold of God;

ContentCN: 因著救我脫離死亡﹐
ContentEN: He to save my soul from danger,

ContentCN: 竟然血濺加略山。
ContentEN: Interposed His precious blood.

ContentCN: 我今天天被祢激勵﹐
ContentEN: Oh to grace how great a debtor

ContentCN: 感覺虧欠你恩典﹔
ContentEN: Daily I'm constrained to be!

ContentCN: 我主﹐讓此恩典維繫
ContentEN: Let that grace, Lord, like a fetter,

ContentCN: 流蕩的心歸祢前。
ContentEN: Bind my wand'ring heart to Thee.

ContentCN: 我承認我趨向流蕩﹐
ContentEN: Prone to wander, Lord, I feel it;

ContentCN: 趨向離開神的愛﹔
ContentEN: Prone to leave the God I love;

ContentCN: 但祢竟用聖靈力量﹐
ContentEN: Take my heart, Oh, take and seal it

ContentCN: 將我吸引歸祢來。
ContentEN: With Thy Spirit from above.

ContentCN: 我今已得寶血救恩﹐
ContentEN: Rescued thus from sin and danger,

ContentCN: 脫離罪惡和死亡﹔
ContentEN: Purchased by the Saviour's blood,

ContentCN: 但願我作脫俗的人﹐
ContentEN: May I walk on earth a stranger,

ContentEN: That bids our sorrows cease!

ContentCN: 人世所有苦楚﹔
ContentEN: That bids our sorrows cease!

ContentCN: 打破罪的捆綁能力﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis music in the sinner's ears,

ContentCN: 打破罪的捆綁能力﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis music in the sinner's ears,

ContentCN: 釋放罪的囚徒。
ContentEN: 'Tis life, and health, and peace.

ContentCN: 釋放罪的囚徒。
ContentEN: 'Tis life, and health, and peace.

ContentEN: His blood can make the foulest clean,

ContentEN: His blood avails for me.

ContentCN: 甘心作到永久﹔
ContentEN: His captive would I be,

ContentCN: 因祂為我受死、受辱﹐
ContentEN: For He was bound, and scourged and died,

ContentCN: 因祂為我受死、受辱﹐
ContentEN: For He was bound, and scourged and died,

ContentCN: 使我得以自由。
ContentEN: My captive soul to free.

ContentCN: 使我得以自由。
ContentEN: My captive soul to free.

ContentCN: 我既從祢可愛的名﹐
ContentEN: So now Thy blessed Name I love,

ContentCN: 我既從祢可愛的名﹐
ContentEN: So now Thy blessed Name I love,

ContentCN: 知祢待我美意﹔
ContentEN: Thy will would e'er be mine,

ContentCN: 知祢待我美意﹔
ContentEN: Thy will would e'er be mine,

ContentCN: 假若我有千萬的心﹐
ContentEN: Had I a thousand hearts to give,

ContentCN: 假若我有千萬的心﹐
ContentEN: Had I a thousand hearts to give,

ContentCN: 也當一一歸祢。
ContentEN: My Lord, they all were Thine!

ContentEN: My Lord, they all were Thine!

ContentEN: His love my heart has captive made,

ContentCN: 甘心作到永久﹔
ContentEN: His captive would I be,

ContentEN: For He was bound, and scourged and died,

ContentEN: My captive soul to free.

ContentEN: My captive soul to free.

ContentEN: So now Thy blessed Name I love,

ContentCN: 我既從祢可愛的名﹐
ContentEN: So now Thy blessed Name I love,

ContentCN: 知祢待我美意﹔
ContentEN: Thy will would e'er be mine,

ContentCN: 知祢待我美意﹔
ContentEN: Thy will would e'er be mine,

ContentCN: 假若我有千萬的心﹐
ContentEN: Had I a thousand hearts to give,

ContentCN: 假若我有千萬的心﹐
ContentEN: Had I a thousand hearts to give,

ContentCN: 也當一一歸祢。
ContentEN: My Lord, they all were Thine!

ContentCN: 也當一一歸祢。
ContentEN: My Lord, they all were Thine!

ContentCN: 主﹐接納我們的詩歌﹐
ContentEN: Lord, accept our feeble song!

ContentCN: 雖然聲音頂柔弱﹔
ContentEN: Pow'r and praise to Thee belong;

ContentCN: 我們述說祢的恩篤﹐
ContentEN: We would all Thy grace record,

ContentCN: 因祢是我們救主。
ContentEN: Holy, gracious, loving Lord!

ContentCN: 因祢捨去榮耀、豐富﹐
ContentEN: Rich in glory, Thou didst stoop,

ContentCN: 祢的信徒纔得福﹔
ContentEN: Thence is all Thy people's hope;

ContentCN: 祢變貧窮﹐叫祢信徒
ContentEN: Thou wast poor, that we might be

ContentCN: 因祢享榮耀、豐富。
ContentEN: Rich in glory, Lord, with Thee.

ContentCN: 天堂有何使祢心厭﹖
ContentEN: Wherefore Thou high heav'n didst spurn?

ContentCN: 世界有何使祢羨﹖
ContentEN: Wherefore Thou to earth didst turn?

ContentCN: 因而祢就離天臨世﹐
ContentEN: Why leave heav'n to come to earth

ContentCN: 孤單、淒涼直到死﹖
ContentEN: Lonely, scorned, e'en suff'ring death?

ContentCN: 祢在天上何等榮耀﹗
ContentEN: Thou in heav'n the Glorious One!

ContentCN: 祢在世上何蕭條﹗
ContentEN: Thou on earth, the Outcast Man!

ContentCN: 祢早已知此行艱難﹐
ContentEN: Though this suff'ring Thou didst know,

ContentCN: 只因愛我不計算。
ContentEN: Love would come to bear our woe.

ContentCN: 當我想到祢的良善﹐
ContentEN: When we think of love like this,

ContentCN: 就不禁又喜又慚﹗
ContentEN: Joy and shame our hearts possess;

ContentCN: 喜﹐因祢能這樣愛好﹔
ContentEN: Joy, that Thou couldst pity thus;

ContentCN: 慚﹐因我這樣還報。
ContentEN: Shame, for such returns from us.

ContentCN: 但我們望那日快到﹐
ContentEN: Yet we hope the day to see

ContentCN: 脫盡所有的阻撓﹔
ContentEN: When from ev’ry hindrance free,

ContentCN: 那時我們進榮耀裏﹐
ContentEN: When to Thee, in glory, brought,

ContentCN: 要照本分服事祢。
ContentEN: We shall serve Thee as we ought.

ContentCN: 現今我們等在這裏﹐
ContentEN: Now, O Lord, we wait for Thee,

ContentCN: 因這盼望受策勵﹔
ContentEN: Wait "the blessed hope" to see.

ContentCN: 主﹐使我們活著為祢﹐
ContentEN: May we ever for Thee live,

ContentCN: 直到天上同聚集。
ContentEN: Till Thy church Thou dost receive.

ContentCN: 我們從前所有，
ContentEN: All that we were – our sin, our guilt,

ContentCN: 不過就是死亡、罪惡；
ContentEN: Our death was all our own;

ContentCN: 我們現今所有福分，
ContentEN: All that we are we owe to Thee,

ContentCN: 都是來自我神。
ContentEN: Thou God of grace alone.

ContentCN: 我在罪中，祢愛來尋，
ContentEN: Thy mercy found us in our sins,

ContentCN: 感動我心相信；
ContentEN: And gave us to believe,

ContentCN: 叫我因信得著安樂，
ContentEN: Then, in believing, peace we found,

ContentCN: 因著基督得活。
ContentEN: And in Thy Christ we live.

ContentCN: 我為聖徒，現在所享，
ContentEN: All that we are, as saints on earth,

ContentCN: 和我將來盼望，
ContentEN: All that we hope to be,

ContentCN: 無一是我自已配得，
ContentEN: When Jesus comes and glory dawns,

ContentCN: 都是因祢恩澤。
ContentEN: We owe it all to Thee.

ContentCN: 主，祢這樣豐富的愛，
ContentEN: O God, how rich, how vast Thy love,

ContentCN: 誰能還清這債？
ContentEN: Whoe’er can Thee repay?

ContentCN: 祢愛真是超人意外，
ContentEN: Thy love is past man’s finding out,

ContentCN: 神聖！不可疑猜！
ContentEN: Thy grace no man can say.

ContentCN: 哦主但願祢今使我，
ContentEN: But Lord, to me I pray Thee grant,

ContentCN: 時刻明白更多：
ContentEN: More clearly may I see,

ContentCN: 像祢這樣寬大的主，
ContentEN: That I may e’er more fully know

ContentCN: 我當永作債戶。
ContentEN: How much I owe to Thee.

ContentCN: 我心若說要報主恩，
ContentEN: But if man’s heart should e’er suppose

ContentCN: 聊以表明微忱，
ContentEN: He could repay Thy love,

ContentCN: 我就還是不知祢恩，
ContentEN: It only means he nothing knows

ContentCN: 究有多闊多深。
ContentEN: Of love, all loves above.

ContentCN: 但願我們對祢恩愛，
ContentEN: So may we never bargains make

ContentCN: 不致當作買賣；
ContentEN: With that dear love of Thine:

ContentCN: 祢為我們所歷艱辛，
ContentEN: The love that made Thine heart once break,

ContentCN: 我們怎能報盡。
ContentEN: Whoe’er that love could win?

ContentCN: 因此我們不再說報
ContentEN: Then nevermore suggest return,

ContentCN: 祢恩實是太高—
ContentEN: His love is far too high;

ContentCN: 我們惟有滿心感戴，
ContentEN: But let our hearts with rapture burn

ContentCN: 樂意永遠負債。
ContentEN: That He for us should die.

ContentCN: 哦，主耶穌，我們欠祢，
ContentEN: O Father God, we owe Thee all!

ContentCN: 一切都欠了祢，
ContentEN: All that we are and have!

ContentCN: 我們只好一面感激，
ContentEN: With grateful thanks before Thee fall,

ContentCN: 一面因祢安息。
ContentEN: ‘Tis all that we can give.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹗耶穌﹗耶穌﹗地上最甜名﹔
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, Jesus, sweetest name I know,

ContentCN: 滿足我的要求﹐使我能邊唱邊行。
ContentEN: Fills my every longing, keeps me singing as I go.

ContentCN: 彷彿音樂湧在我心懷﹐
ContentEN: There's within my heart a melody,

ContentCN: 耶穌正在柔聲說﹕
ContentEN: Jesus whispers sweet and low:

ContentCN: “平安﹐平安﹐我與你同在﹐
ContentEN:

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: Only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: Only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 這是我身分﹐榮耀歸給神﹐
ContentEN: This is my story, to God be the glory,

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: I'm only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 一切我所有﹐無非是接受﹐
ContentEN: Naught have I gotten but what I received;

ContentCN: 全是恩所賜﹐在我信之後﹔
ContentEN: Grace hath bestowed it since I have believed;

ContentCN: 所以不自誇﹐也不自尊﹐
ContentEN: Boasting excluded, pride I abase;

ContentCN: 我是一個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: I'm only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: Only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: Only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 這是我身分﹐榮耀歸給神﹐
ContentEN: This is my story, to God be the glory,

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: I'm only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 從前我愚昧﹐罪惡轄我心﹐
ContentEN: Once I was foolish, and sin ruled my heart,

ContentCN: 使我的腳步完全遠離神﹔
ContentEN: Causing my footsteps from God to depart;

ContentCN: 今被主尋回﹐能不歡欣﹖
ContentEN: Jesus hath found me, happy my case;

ContentCN: 現今是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: I now am a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: Only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: Only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 這是我身分﹐榮耀歸給神﹐
ContentEN: This is my story, to God be the glory,

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: I'm only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 流淚有何用﹐功行有何效﹖
ContentEN: Tears unavailing, no merit had I;

ContentCN: 若非神憐憫﹐滅亡怎能逃﹖
ContentEN: Mercy had saved me, or else I must die;

ContentCN: 前我因有罪﹐不敢近神﹐
ContentEN: Sin had alarmed me, fearing God's face;

ContentCN: 現今是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: But now I'm a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: Only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: Only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 這是我身分﹐榮耀歸給神﹐
ContentEN: This is my story, to God be the glory,

ContentCN: 我是個罪人蒙主恩﹗
ContentEN: I'm only a sinner saved by grace!

ContentCN: 我愛我救主﹐心中樂歡騰﹐
ContentEN: Suffer a sinner whose heart overflows,

ContentCN: 我這蒙恩人不能不說明﹔
ContentEN: Loving his Saviour to tell what he knows;

ContentCN: 讓我再說明-用盡聲音﹕

ContentEN: And I’m shouting, glory! Till I get home.

ContentCN: 我若曾愛祢﹐主﹐應當是現在﹗

ContentCN: 主阿！我深愛祢﹐我是永遠屬祢﹔
ContentEN: O Lord how I love thee; I'm thine, I'll always be.

ContentCN: 因祢已先愛我﹐為我捨己。
ContentEN: For thou hast first loved me, Gave thy life for me.

ContentCN: 主阿！我深愛祢﹐甚願我永屬祢﹔
ContentEN: O Lord, how I love thee; I'm thine, I'll always be.

ContentCN: 願祢居我靈裏﹐永不分離。
ContentEN: Thy abode is in my heart, Never depart.

ContentCN: 主阿！我深愛祢﹐我是永遠屬祢﹔
ContentEN: O Lord how I love thee; I'm thine, I'll always be.

ContentCN: 因祢已先愛我﹐為我捨己。
ContentEN: For thou hast first loved me, Gave thy life for me.

ContentCN: 在天﹐我還有誰﹖在地﹐亦無所愛！
ContentEN: In heav'n, whom shall I find? On earth, I've no desire.

ContentCN: 惟願掬我衷情﹐傾於主宰。
ContentEN: Take my Lord, my love for thee, 'Tis my humble plea.

ContentCN: 主阿！我深愛祢﹐我是永遠屬祢﹔
ContentEN: O Lord how I love thee; I'm thine, I'll always be.

ContentCN: 因祢已先愛我﹐為我捨己。
ContentEN: For thou hast first loved me, Gave thy life for me.

ContentCN: 金銀雖有千萬﹐聲譽可遍塵寰﹔
ContentEN: Though my riches be untold; And fame be all aglow.

ContentCN: 一旦若失了祢﹐我心何安﹖
ContentEN: If thy face be hid'n from me, How alone I'll be!

ContentCN: 主阿！我深愛祢﹐我是永遠屬祢﹔
ContentEN: O Lord how I love thee; I'm thine, I'll always be.

ContentCN: 因祢已先愛我﹐為我捨己。
ContentEN: For thou hast first loved me, Gave thy life for me.

ContentCN: 除祢﹐別無所求﹐惟祢﹐能解我憂﹔
ContentEN: I long none other but thee, Through thee, sorrows will flee.

ContentCN: 世人都難久靠﹐祢愛無休。
ContentEN: This world will soon fade away, But thy love shall stay.

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 因耶穌先愛我。
ContentEN: Because He first loved me!

ContentCN: 有一尊名我最愛聽，
ContentEN: There is a name I love to hear,

ContentCN: 我最愛唱不已；
ContentEN: I love to sing its worth;

ContentCN: 這是地上最甜之名，
ContentEN: It sounds like music in my ear,

ContentCN: 其音悅耳無比。
ContentEN: The sweetest name on earth.

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 因耶穌先愛我。
ContentEN: Because He first loved me!

ContentCN: 這名說出救主大愛，
ContentEN: It tells me of a Savior’s love,

ContentCN: 捨命償我罪債；
ContentEN: Who died to set me free;

ContentCN: 祂流寶血為我受害，
ContentEN: It tells me of His precious blood,

ContentCN: 罪人惟此是賴。
ContentEN: The sinner’s perfect plea.

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 因耶穌先愛我。
ContentEN: Because He first loved me!

ContentCN: 這名說出父神豐富，
ContentEN: It tells me what my Father hath

ContentCN: 天天賜福豐盈；
ContentEN: In store for every day,

ContentCN: 我雖行經黑暗窄途，
ContentEN: And though I tread a darksome path,

ContentCN: 有祂光照引領。
ContentEN: Yields sunshine all the way.

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 我何等愛耶穌，
ContentEN: O, how I love Jesus,

ContentCN: 因耶穌先愛我。
ContentEN: Because He first loved me!

ContentCN: 這名說出主的心腸，
ContentEN: It tells of One whose loving heart

ContentCN: 能感最深痛楚；
ContentEN: Can feel my deepest woe,

ContentCN: 誰能像祂分我憂傷，
ContentEN: Who in each sorrow bears a part,

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌我主。
ContentEN: That none can bear below.

ContentCN: 主，我愛祢。
ContentEN: I love Thee, Lord;

ContentCN: 但不是我有愛能以傾入愛主廣大胸壞；
ContentEN: Yet ‘tis no love of mine That goeth forth to that great heart of Thine;

ContentCN: 是祢大愛今在我心湧溢，
ContentEN: ‘Tis Thine own love which Thou hast given me

ContentCN: 迫我向主歸還祢愛，愛祢。
ContentEN: Returning back, O loving Lord, to Thee.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐祢的全勝的愛﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, Thine all victorious love

ContentCN: 已經澆灌我心﹔
ContentEN: Shed in my soul abroad;

ContentCN: 我心就不再會搖擺﹐
ContentEN: Then shall my heart no longer rove,

ContentCN: 就能生根於神﹐
ContentEN: Rooted and fix’d in God,

ContentCN: 就能生根於神。
ContentEN: Rooted and fix’d in God.

ContentCN: 但願聖火今在我心﹐
ContentEN: Oh, that in me the sacred fire

ContentCN: 就已發旺不休﹐
ContentEN: Might now begin to glow!

ContentCN: 燒掉所有卑情下品﹐
ContentEN: Burn up the dross of base desire,

ContentCN: 並使高山鎔流﹐
ContentEN: And make the mountains flow,

ContentCN: 並使高山鎔流。
ContentEN: And make the mountains flow.

ContentCN: 祢曾賜下祭壇火炭﹐
ContentEN: Thou, who at Pentecost didst fall,

ContentCN: 求祢燒掉我罪﹔
ContentEN: Do Thou my sins consume;

ContentCN: 我向焚燒的靈呼喊﹐
ContentEN: Come, Holy Ghost, for Thee I call;

ContentCN: 聖靈滿我心內﹐
ContentEN: Spirit of burning, come!

ContentCN: 聖靈滿我心內。
ContentEN: Spirit of burning, come!

ContentCN: 我心要接鍛鍊的火﹐
ContentEN: Refining Fire, go through my heart,

ContentCN: 照亮我魂光耀﹔
ContentEN: Illuminate my soul;

ContentCN: 散佈生命在每角落﹐
ContentEN: Scatter Thy life through every part,

ContentCN: 並使全人聖潔﹐
ContentEN: And sanctify the whole,

ContentCN: 並使全人聖潔。
ContentEN: And sanctify the whole.

ContentCN: 搖動的心求祢扶掖﹐
ContentEN: My steadfast soul, from falling free,

ContentCN: 使它變成堅崖﹔
ContentEN: Shall then no longer move,

ContentCN: 基督成為我的世界﹐
ContentEN: While Christ is all the world to me

ContentCN: 我的全心成愛﹐
ContentEN: And all my heart is love,

ContentCN: 我的全心成愛。
ContentEN: And all my heart is love.

ContentCN: 主，祢所有一切工作，
ContentEN: In all Thy work, O Lord, Thou didst

ContentCN: 並非到了十架為止；
ContentEN: At Calv’ry’s cross once come to rest;

ContentCN: 祢今乃是仍舊生活，
ContentEN: Yet Thou art working still today,

ContentCN: 從祢另一形態表示。
ContentEN: But in another form expressed.

ContentCN: 祢今仍舊施行拯救，
ContentEN: Thy saving pow’r Thou still dost show;

ContentCN: 仍舊說話，仍舊引導；
ContentEN: Thou still dost speak, enlighten, guide;

ContentCN: 祢與聖靈已成一流，
ContentEN: Thou and the Spirit in one stream

ContentCN: 仍舊光照，使人仆倒。
ContentEN: Sweep many in Thy living tide.

ContentCN: 藉祂，祢不停止能力，
ContentEN: Through Him Thy power’s not withheld;

ContentCN: 藉祂，祢不停止運行；
ContentEN: Through Him Thy working does not cease;

ContentCN: 祢的感動，祢的鼓勵，
ContentEN: Thou still dost comfort and command,

ContentCN: 祢仍安慰，祢仍命令。
ContentEN: Encourage, strengthen, and release.

ContentCN: 自從祢藉聖靈內住，
ContentEN: Since Thou dost in the Spirit dwell,

ContentCN: 祂來就是祢又來地；
ContentEN: His coming means that Thou hast come,

ContentCN: 祂的內住是祢充盈，
ContentEN: And His indwelling is Thine own,

ContentCN: 祂代表祢，祂又是祢。
ContentEN: For Thou and He are truly one.

ContentCN: 祂今在我心中執行，
ContentEN: He executes within my heart

ContentCN: 祢的一切命令希翼；
ContentEN: All Thy desires and Thy demands,

ContentCN: 有如從前祢在世境，
ContentEN: As for the Father here on earth

ContentCN: 執行父神所有旨意。
ContentEN: Thou hast performed all His commands.

ContentCN: 我們識祂，就是識祢，
ContentEN: By knowing Him we know Thyself;

ContentCN: 服祂，就是服祢旨意；
ContentEN: Obeying Him we Thee obey;

ContentCN: 我們被祂滲透、洋溢，
ContentEN: Allowing Him ourselves to fill,

ContentCN: 就是充滿祢的自己。
ContentEN: We’re filled with Thee, O wondrous way!

ContentCN: 祢今不是遠在高天，
ContentEN: Thou art not far away in heav’n,

ContentCN: 不是一去就不復返；
ContentEN: Leaving us here alone, apart;

ContentCN: 乃是仍舊在這世間，
ContentEN: But Thou art still on earth; how grand!

ContentCN: 奇哉！並住在我心坎。
ContentEN: Thou livest right within my heart.

ContentCN: 我是呼出我的愁苦﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my sorrow,

ContentCN: 呼出我罪污﹔
ContentEN: Breathing out my sin;

ContentCN: 我是吸入﹐一直吸入﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing, breathing, breathing,

ContentCN: 祢所有豐富。
ContentEN: All Thy fullness in.

ContentCN: 主﹐求祢向我吹聖靈﹐
ContentEN: O Lord, breathe Thy Spirit on me,

ContentCN: 教我如何吸入祢﹔
ContentEN: Teach me how to breathe Thee in;

ContentCN: 助我向祢胸懷一傾
ContentEN: Help me pour into Thy bosom,

ContentCN: 我的犯罪與自己。
ContentEN: All my life of self and sin.

ContentCN: 我是呼出我的愁苦﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my sorrow,

ContentCN: 呼出我罪污﹔
ContentEN: Breathing out my sin;

ContentCN: 我是吸入﹐一直吸入﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing, breathing, breathing,

ContentCN: 祢所有豐富。
ContentEN: All Thy fullness in.

ContentCN: 我是呼出我的生命﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my own life,

ContentCN: 我才可能被充滿﹔
ContentEN: That I may be filled with Thine;

ContentCN: 放棄軟弱或是力勁﹐
ContentEN: Letting go my strength and weakness,

ContentCN: 吸入憐憫和恩湛。
ContentEN: Breathing in Thy life divine.

ContentCN: 我是呼出我的愁苦﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my sorrow,

ContentCN: 呼出我罪污﹔
ContentEN: Breathing out my sin;

ContentCN: 我是吸入﹐一直吸入﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing, breathing, breathing,

ContentCN: 祢所有豐富。
ContentEN: All Thy fullness in.

ContentCN: 呼出我的罪律桎梏﹐
ContentEN: Breathing out my sinful nature,

ContentCN: 祢已為我全除摒﹔
ContentEN: Thou hast borne it all for me;

ContentCN: 吸入祢的聖潔豐富﹐
ContentEN: Breathing in Thy cleansing fullness,

ContentCN: 發現惟祢是生命。
ContentEN: Finding all my life in Thee.

ContentCN: 我是呼出我的愁苦﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my sorrow,

ContentCN: 呼出我罪污﹔
ContentEN: Breathing out my sin;

ContentCN: 我是吸入﹐一直吸入﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing, breathing, breathing,

ContentCN: 祢所有豐富。
ContentEN: All Thy fullness in.

ContentCN: 我正呼出我的憂愁﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my sorrow,

ContentCN: 在祢慈愛的胸臆﹔
ContentEN: On Thy kind and gentle breast;

ContentCN: 吸入祢的喜樂、保守﹐
ContentEN: Breathing in Thy joy and comfort,

ContentCN: 吸入祢的甜安息。
ContentEN: Breathing in Thy peace and rest.

ContentCN: 我是呼出我的愁苦﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my sorrow,

ContentCN: 呼出我罪污﹔
ContentEN: Breathing out my sin;

ContentCN: 我是吸入﹐一直吸入﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing, breathing, breathing,

ContentCN: 祢所有豐富。
ContentEN: All Thy fullness in.

ContentCN: 我正呼出我的病勢﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my sickness,

ContentCN: 祢早已為我負擔﹔
ContentEN: Thou hast borne its burden too;

ContentCN: 我正吸入祢的醫治﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing in Thy healing,

ContentCN: 因祢早已賜平安。
ContentEN: Ever promised, ever new.

ContentCN: 我是呼出我的愁苦﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my sorrow,

ContentCN: 呼出我罪污﹔
ContentEN: Breathing out my sin;

ContentCN: 我是吸入﹐一直吸入﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing, breathing, breathing,

ContentCN: 祢所有豐富。
ContentEN: All Thy fullness in.

ContentCN: 我今呼出我的羨慕﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my longings

ContentCN: 入祢慈愛的耳中﹔
ContentEN: In Thy list'ning, loving ear;

ContentCN: 我今吸入祢的答覆﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing in Thy answers,

ContentCN: 平靜疑惑和驚恐。
ContentEN: Stilling every doubt and fear.

ContentCN: 我是呼出我的愁苦﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing out my sorrow,

ContentCN: 呼出我罪污﹔
ContentEN: Breathing out my sin;

ContentCN: 我是吸入﹐一直吸入﹐
ContentEN: I am breathing, breathing, breathing,

ContentCN: 祢所有豐富。
ContentEN: All Thy fullness in.

ContentCN: 我今每刻都在呼吸
ContentEN: I am breathing every moment,

ContentCN: 祢的生命作生命﹔
ContentEN: Drawing all my life from Thee;

ContentCN: 一呼一吸都在乎祢﹐
ContentEN: Breath by breath I live upon Thee,

ContentCN: 求祢由我來顯明。
ContentEN: Lord, Thy Spirit breathe in me.

ContentCN: 聖靈顯現在我衷﹐
ContentEN: Yes, the Spirit dwells in me,

ContentCN: 聖靈解開我捆綁﹔
ContentEN: Giving me such liberty.

ContentCN: 我就從罪得釋放﹐
ContentEN: He hast set me free from sin,

ContentCN: 我就心口滿頌揚﹐
ContentEN: Brought new songs of praise within;

ContentCN: 聖靈顯現在我衷。
ContentEN: Yes, the Spirit dwells in me.

ContentCN: 我在主前等候﹐並且專心祈禱﹐
ContentEN: Oft before the Lord, I was praying earnestly,

ContentCN: 盼望能以從罪得釋放﹔
ContentEN: Hoping I from sin might be set free;

ContentCN: 一日主施憐憫﹐答應我的求告﹐
ContentEN: Then one day in mercy the Lord revealed in me

ContentCN: 聖靈顯現在我衷。
ContentEN: How the Spirit dwells in me.

ContentCN: 聖靈顯現在我衷﹐
ContentEN: Yes, the Spirit dwells in me,

ContentCN: 聖靈解開我捆綁﹔
ContentEN: Giving me such liberty.

ContentCN: 我就從罪得釋放﹐
ContentEN: He hast set me free from sin,

ContentCN: 我就心口滿頌揚﹐
ContentEN: Brought new songs of praise within;

ContentCN: 聖靈顯現在我衷。
ContentEN: Yes, the Spirit dwells in me.

ContentCN: 我是多年軟弱、殘廢、無用孩子﹐
ContentEN: Such a crippled child, full of weakness for so long,

ContentCN: 而又明知自己當行動﹔
ContentEN: I knew well that I should be made strong.

ContentCN: 主是忽然施恩﹐使我滿口是詩﹐
ContentEN: Joy swept o'er my soul, when the Spirit came along

ContentCN: 聖靈顯現在我衷。
ContentEN: And revealed that He's in me.

ContentEN: Yes, the Spirit dwells in me,

ContentEN: Brought new songs of praise within;

ContentCN: 聖靈顯現在我衷。
ContentEN: Yes, the Spirit dwells in me.

ContentCN: 我今能以見證聖靈奇妙能力﹐
ContentEN: I can testify of the Spirit's pow'r inside,

ContentCN: 因為我心已經被倒空﹐
ContentEN: For my heart is fully opened wide.

ContentCN: 我已脫離驕傲﹐我已洗淨罪習﹐
ContentEN: I have turned away from all works of sin and pride,

ContentCN: 聖靈顯現在我衷。
ContentEN: For the Spirit dwells in me.

ContentEN: Yes, the Spirit dwells in me,

ContentEN: Brought new songs of praise within;

ContentCN: 聖靈顯現在我衷。
ContentEN: Yes, the Spirit dwells in me.

ContentCN: 我今已有把握﹐我能看見神面﹐
ContentEN: Now I know for sure I can see my Savior's face,

ContentCN: 因主已經將我洗透通﹔
ContentEN: For the Lord did all my sin erase;

ContentCN: 主已登記我名配給榮耀冠冕﹐
ContentEN: And a crown for me is prepared in that blest place.

ContentCN: 聖靈顯現在我衷。
ContentEN: Yes, He ever lives in me!

ContentCN: 行走﹐我是行走在聖靈的能力中！
ContentEN: Walking, yes, I'm walking in the Spirit of my Lord!

ContentCN: 生活﹐我是生活在話語的信實中！
ContentEN: Living, yes, I'm living now by faith in His word;

ContentCN: 是祂保守我﹐是祂帶領我﹐
ContentEN: So He keeps me still, strong to do His will,

ContentCN: 逐日逐時蒙祂安慰我。
ContentEN: Walking in His comfort day by day.

ContentEN: Walking in the comfort of the Holy Ghost,

ContentEN: Oh! what peace my heart now doth know;

ContentCN: 活在祂光中﹐歌唱在祂甜美﹐
ContentEN: Living in His light, singing in His joy!

ContentEN: How sweet is my life in the Lord!

ContentCN: 聽祂的聲音﹐遵行祂的智慧﹐
ContentEN: List'ning to His voice, doing His good will,

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐只有纏綿。
ContentEN: Conquering thro' faith in His word.

ContentEN: Walking in the comfort of the Holy Ghost,

ContentCN: 脫罪﹐脫慮﹐也能脫害﹔
ContentEN: Free from all sin, all care and pain;

ContentCN: 一路的甘甜禱告﹐相信﹐作為﹐
ContentEN: Praying, working, trusting sweetly all the way,

ContentCN: 一直等候我主回來。
ContentEN: Waiting ‘til my Lord comes again.

ContentEN: The Comforter has come, the Comforter has come!

ContentEN: Wherever human hearts and human woes abound;

ContentCN: 弟兄應當殷勤﹐傳此喜樂信息-
ContentEN: Let ev’ry Christian tongue proclaim the joyful sound:

ContentEN: And hushed the dreadful wail and fury of the blast,

ContentCN: 遠山現出金絲﹐晨曦逐漸炳爍﹐
ContentEN: As o'er the golden hills the day advances fast!

ContentEN: Lo, the great King of kings, with healing in His wings,

ContentEN: To ev’ry captive soul a full deliv'rance brings;

ContentCN: 現今空虛監房﹐無不凱歌高唱﹕
ContentEN: And thro' the vacant cells the song of triumph rings:

ContentCN: 無限神聖愛疼﹐我口有何能耐
ContentEN: O boundless love divine! How shall this tongue of mine

ContentCN: 向著流浪的人﹐說祢無比大愛﹗
ContentEN: To wond'ring mortals tell the matchless grace divine —

ContentCN: 我真是個罪身﹐怎能活祢心懷﹗
ContentEN: That I, a child of hell, should in His image shine!

ContentCN: 保惠師已經來﹗
ContentEN: The Comforter has come!

ContentEN: The Comforter has come!

ContentCN: 唱阿﹐直到回響﹐飛射上下碧蒼﹔
ContentEN: Sing till the echoes fly above the vaulted sky,

ContentCN: 所有眾聖在上﹐響應在下聲浪。
ContentEN: And all the saints above to all below reply,

ContentCN: 無窮的愛提倡﹐我來引吭歌唱﹕
ContentEN: In strains of endless love, the song that ne'er will die:

ContentCN: 保惠師已經來﹗
ContentEN: The Comforter has come!

ContentCN: 井阿！請你湧上水來！
ContentEN: “Spring up, spring up, spring up,

ContentCN: 請將活水來湧流！
ContentEN: O well! Let the living waters flow,”

ContentCN: 疲倦客旅，為何等待？
ContentEN: Tarry not, O weary pilgrim,

ContentCN: 這是父神的應許。
ContentEN: God’s own promise here to know.

ContentCN: 只要憑信向井歌唱，
ContentEN: Sing unto the well with boldness,

ContentCN: 甘甜活水就湧流；
ContentEN: Bid the water to o’erflow;

ContentCN: 枯萎心靈頓覺歡暢，
ContentEN: With’ring souls shall leap with gladness.

ContentCN: 看哪！活水正湧流。
ContentEN: Lo! how living waters flow.

ContentCN: 基督靈磐早經裂開，
ContentEN: Christ the rock has long been smitten,

ContentCN: 活水早已在湧流；
ContentEN: Living water ever flows.

ContentCN: 清涼甘甜永不中斷，
ContentEN: Sweet, fresh, cool stream never ceasing,

ContentCN: 澆灌乾渴的群眾。
ContentEN: Quenching all the thirsty souls.

ContentCN: 滿帶天上非常能耐，
ContentEN: ‘Tis the heavenly endurance

ContentCN: 滿帶非常的大愛；
ContentEN: That it brings with love divine.

ContentCN: 自從我識救主丰采，
ContentEN: Since I’ve seen my Savior’s glory,

ContentCN: 此水流動在我懷。
ContentEN: How the waters stir my soul.

ContentCN: 何等滿足！何等喜歡！
ContentEN: What contentment! O how joyous-

ContentCN: 自從我心湧活泉；
ContentEN: Since the water flood’d my soul.

ContentCN: 忽然有日來至井旁，
ContentEN: One day at the well arriving

ContentCN: 發現活水已中斷。
ContentEN: No more could I find its flow,

ContentCN: 我心充滿莫名傍徨，
ContentEN: How perplexing and distressing!

ContentCN: 流淚投向救主前；
ContentEN: To the Lord in tears I fled.

ContentCN: 泥土、石塊，充塞心房，
ContentEN: Stones and earth had blocked the passage.

ContentCN: 失望痛苦常悲歎。
ContentEN: Sadly then I bowed my head.

ContentCN: 尊貴救主忽然來蒞，
ContentEN: Suddenly appeared my Savior,

ContentCN: 用祂臉光來尋搜；
ContentEN: With His holy searching light.

ContentCN: “勿憑己意，勿用己力，
ContentEN: “Stop your struggling and your striving,

ContentCN: 只需將心交我手。”
ContentEN: Only give to me thine heart.

ContentCN: 主要用祂能力權杖，
ContentEN: With my strength and rod so mighty

ContentCN: 再將此心來挖透；
ContentEN: Thor’ly I will dig again,

ContentCN: 心愛偶像盡都拋棄，
ContentEN: Root out idols and obstructions,

ContentCN: 看哪！活水又暢流。
ContentEN: And the spring will flow again!

ContentCN: 神哪，祢在聖所之內﹐
ContentEN: O God, within the holy place,

ContentEN: O God, within the holy place,

ContentCN: 能力﹐能力﹐能力從上傾﹔
ContentEN: Power, power, power from on high.

ContentCN: 求主藉著聖靈﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Send us by Thy Spirit power from on high.

ContentCN: 懇求慈愛父神﹐聽祢民呼聲﹐
ContentEN: Gracious heav'nly Father, hear Thy people's cry;

ContentCN: 我們又軟又弱﹐靠祢纔得活﹔
ContentEN: See us how we languish, help us ere we die.

ContentCN: 求主藉著聖靈﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Send us by Thy Spirit power from on high.

ContentCN: 能力﹐能力﹐能力從上傾﹔
ContentEN: Power, power, power from on high.

ContentCN: 求主藉著聖靈﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Send us by Thy Spirit power from on high.

ContentCN: 父神寶貴應許﹐靈裏永同居﹔
ContentEN: Promise of the Father, Spirit, ever nigh,

ContentCN: 為何我們軟弱﹐無力又死涸?
ContentEN: Wherefore should we languish, wherefore should we die?

ContentCN: 現今祢已來臨﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Thou hast come to bring us power from on high.

ContentCN: 能力﹐能力﹐能力從上傾﹔
ContentEN: Power, power, power from on high.

ContentCN: 求主藉著聖靈﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Send us by Thy Spirit power from on high.

ContentCN: 苦苦掙扎努力﹐長年無安息﹔
ContentEN: O how long we struggle, O how hard we try;

ContentCN: 工作徒勞無益﹐常歎息不已﹔
ContentEN: Helplessly we labor, helplessly we sigh,

ContentCN: 直到榮耀聖靈﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Till Thy Spirit gives us power from on high.

ContentCN: 能力﹐能力﹐能力從上傾﹔
ContentEN: Power, power, power from on high.

ContentCN: 求主藉著聖靈﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Send us by Thy Spirit power from on high.

ContentCN: 正當天風激颺﹐飛越大海洋﹔
ContentEN: As the winds of heaven o'er the ocean fly,

ContentCN: 正當電光烈燄﹐閃耀跨高天﹔
ContentEN: As the flaming light’nings flashing o'er the sky,

ContentCN: 父阿﹗我們懇請能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Send us, mighty Father, power from on high.

ContentCN: 能力﹐能力﹐能力從上傾﹔
ContentEN: Power, power, power from on high.

ContentCN: 求主藉著聖靈﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Send us by Thy Spirit power from on high.

ContentCN: 正當天日高照﹐夏令何豐饒﹔
ContentEN: As the heav'nly sunshine bringing summer nigh,

ContentCN: 正當甘雨淋漓﹐澆降沙漠地﹔
ContentEN: As the showers that water deserts parched and dry,

ContentCN: 使人甦醒聖靈﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Quick'ning Spirit bring us power from on high.

ContentCN: 能力﹐能力﹐能力從上傾﹔
ContentEN: Power, power, power from on high.

ContentCN: 求主藉著聖靈﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Send us by Thy Spirit power from on high.

ContentCN: 父阿﹗在祢腳前﹐子民求恩憐﹔
ContentEN: Father at Thy footstool, low Thy people lie,

ContentCN: 等候祢的應許﹐聽我們呼籲﹕
ContentEN: Waiting for Thy promise; hear our helpless cry;

ContentCN: 父阿﹗為祢聖民﹐能力從上傾。
ContentEN: Send us, Father, send us power from on high.

ContentCN: 謙卑俯伏﹐我在此等候﹐
ContentEN: We are waiting, and to Thee we bow,

ContentCN: 我的光景祢前都赤露﹔
ContentEN: In Thy presence all our need avow;

ContentCN: 給我能力﹐就在這時候﹐
ContentEN: Give us Thy power, give even now,

ContentCN: 給我﹐毫無保留﹗
ContentEN: Clothe us with pow'r today.

ContentCN: 主﹐祢能力我今在尋求﹐
ContentEN: O Lord, we seek the power we need;

ContentCN: 我們軟弱已經夠長久﹔
ContentEN: We are so weak in word and in deed,

ContentCN: 話語軟弱﹐事奉無成就﹐
ContentEN: And in Thy service cannot proceed,

ContentCN: 給我穿上能力﹗
ContentEN: Clothe us with pow'r we pray!

ContentCN: 謙卑俯伏﹐我在此等候﹐
ContentEN: We are waiting, and to Thee we bow,

ContentCN: 我的光景祢前都赤露﹔
ContentEN: In Thy presence all our need avow;

ContentCN: 給我能力﹐就在這時候﹐
ContentEN: Give us Thy power, give even now,

ContentCN: 給我﹐毫無保留﹗
ContentEN: Clothe us with pow'r today.

ContentCN: 正當祈求﹐祢忽顯光輝﹐
ContentEN: Lord, come and visit us at this place,

ContentCN: 將祢恩賜分給祢教會﹔
ContentEN: Grant to Thy Church the gifts of Thy grace,

ContentCN: 使我事奉充滿大能力﹐
ContentEN: Fully with might our service embrace,

ContentCN: 給我穿上能力﹗
ContentEN: Clothe us with pow'r we pray.

ContentCN: 謙卑俯伏﹐我在此等候﹐
ContentEN: We are waiting, and to Thee we bow,

ContentCN: 我的光景祢前都赤露﹔
ContentEN: In Thy presence all our need avow;

ContentCN: 給我能力﹐就在這時候﹐
ContentEN: Give us Thy power, give even now,

ContentCN: 給我﹐毫無保留﹗
ContentEN: Clothe us with pow'r today.

ContentCN: 賜下能力﹗帶著祢權柄﹗
ContentEN: Send us Thy power with its full sway,

ContentCN: 如同祢在五旬節所行﹔
ContentEN: As Thou didst send on Pentecost Day;

ContentCN: 答應所求﹐答應不稍等﹐
ContentEN: Answer our prayer and make no delay,

ContentCN: 給我穿上能力﹗
ContentEN: Clothe us with pow'r we pray!

ContentCN: 謙卑俯伏﹐我在此等候﹐
ContentEN: We are waiting, and to Thee we bow,

ContentCN: 我的光景祢前都赤露﹔
ContentEN: In Thy presence all our need avow;

ContentCN: 給我能力﹐就在這時候﹐
ContentEN: Give us Thy power, give even now,

ContentCN: 給我﹐毫無保留﹗
ContentEN: Clothe us with pow'r today.

ContentCN: 祢的子民﹐滿足此心願﹐
ContentEN: Here, as Thy Body, Thy pow'r we claim;

ContentCN: 靠著祢名﹐因信求成全﹔
ContentEN: Claiming by faith in Thy mighty Name,

ContentCN: 降下透雨﹐並賜下火燄﹐
ContentEN: Thy heav'nly show'r with Thy heav'nly flame,

ContentCN: 給我穿上能力﹗
ContentEN: Clothe us with pow'r we pray!

ContentCN: 主﹐我舉杯﹐求祢來充溢！
ContentEN: Fill my cup, Lord, I lift it up, Lord!

ContentCN: 求主解我心靈的乾渴﹔
ContentEN: Come and quench this thirsting of my soul;

ContentCN: 賜我靈糧﹐餵養我使我飽足。
ContentEN: Bread of heaven, feed me till I want no more,

ContentCN: 我舉杯﹐求充溢﹐使我完全！
ContentEN: Fill my cup, fill it up and make me whole!

ContentCN: 聖靈的愛從天傾瀉，
ContentEN: Descend on me, Spirit of love!

ContentCN: 將我高舉諸天境界，
ContentEN: Lift me into the realms above,

ContentCN: 喜樂滿足我心。
ContentEN: With joy to fill my heart!

ContentCN: 使我困苦疲倦的魂，
ContentEN: Come make this weary soul of mine,

ContentCN: 忽然平安甜蜜充盈，
ContentEN: Full of Thy peace and grace divine. ]

ContentCN: 榮耀滿我眼睛。
ContentEN: May glory fill my eyes.

ContentCN: 聖靈是我希望定質，
ContentEN: Thy Spirit is my pledge of hope

ContentCN: 使我立足最高天次–
ContentEN: To set my feet on utmost heights

ContentCN: 迦南榮耀之境。
ContentEN: Of Canaan’s glorious sight!

ContentCN: 生命活水長流不止，
ContentEN: There springs of life are flowing free,

ContentCN: 樂園所有佳美果實，
ContentEN: And fruits of Paradise I see

ContentCN: 永遠享用不盡。
ContentEN: And taste unendingly!

ContentCN: 聖靈的愛超越萬愛，
ContentEN: Thy Spirit in surpassing love

ContentCN: 以這賤軀作祢居宅，
ContentEN: Indwells a wretched man like me.

ContentCN: 復以我心為座。
ContentEN: My heart Thine throne shall be!

ContentCN: 甘甜能力不斷灌注，
ContentEN: Thy loving power ever pour

ContentCN: 使我經歷救主內住，
ContentEN: On me to make Thy presence sure.

ContentCN: 永遠不再失落。
ContentEN: Depart from me no more!

ContentCN: 充滿我！充滿我！耶穌今來充滿我！
ContentEN: Fill me now, fill me now, Jesus come and fill me now;

ContentCN: 以祢同在將我淹沒，願主現今充滿我！
ContentEN: Fill me with Thy hallowed presence, Come, oh, come and fill me now.

ContentCN: 願主聖靈前來覆翼，漫我心靈沐我魂；
ContentEN: Hover o’er me, Holy Spirit; Bathe my trembling heart and brow;

ContentCN: 以祢神聖同在臨蒞，今來充滿我全人。
ContentEN: Fill me with Thy hallowed presence, Come, oh, come and fill me now.

ContentCN: 充滿我！充滿我！耶穌今來充滿我！
ContentEN: Fill me now, fill me now, Jesus come and fill me now;

ContentCN: 以祢同在將我淹沒，願主現今充滿我！
ContentEN: Fill me with Thy hallowed presence, Come, oh, come and fill me now.

ContentCN: 祢能充滿我的表裡，不須求祢如何作；
ContentEN: Thou canst fill me, gracious Spirit, Tho’ I cannot tell Thee how;

ContentCN: 哦，我要祢，切切要祢，求祢今來充滿我。
ContentEN: But I need Thee, greatly need Thee; Come, oh, come and fill me now.

ContentCN: 充滿我！充滿我！耶穌今來充滿我！
ContentEN: Fill me now, fill me now, Jesus come and fill me now;

ContentCN: 以祢同在將我淹沒，願主現今充滿我！
ContentEN: Fill me with Thy hallowed presence, Come, oh, come and fill me now.

ContentCN: 我真軟弱，極其軟弱，只能俯服祢腳前；
ContentEN: I am weakness, full of weakness, At Thy sacred feet I bow;

ContentCN: 求主聖靈來充滿我，以祢大愛溢心間。
ContentEN: Blest, divine, eternal Spirit, Fill with love, and fill me now.

ContentCN: 充滿我！充滿我！耶穌今來充滿我！
ContentEN: Fill me now, fill me now, Jesus come and fill me now;

ContentCN: 以祢同在將我淹沒，願主現今充滿我！
ContentEN: Fill me with Thy hallowed presence, Come, oh, come and fill me now.

ContentCN: 前來潔淨，祝福、安慰，以靈浸透我心魂；
ContentEN: Cleanse and comfort, bless and save me, Bathe, oh, bathe my heart and brow.

ContentCN: 何等甜美！天來恩惠，祢正充滿我全人。
ContentEN: Thou art comforting and saving; Thou art sweetly filling now.

ContentCN: 有福的安靜﹐聖潔的安靜﹐
ContentEN: Blessed quietness, holy quietness,

ContentCN: 我心有了大把握﹐
ContentEN: What assurance in my soul!

ContentCN: 水正起波瀾﹐祂在說平安﹐
ContentEN: On the stormy sea, He speaks peace to me,

ContentCN: 我心不再有起落。
ContentEN: How the billows cease to roll!

ContentCN: 喜樂湧流有如河海﹐
ContentEN: Joys are flowing like a river,

ContentCN: 自從主賜保惠師﹔
ContentEN: Since the Comforter has come;

ContentCN: 祂是永遠與我同在﹐
ContentEN: He abides with us forever,

ContentCN: 祂以我心作居室。
ContentEN: Makes the trusting heart His home.

ContentCN: 有福的安靜﹐聖潔的安靜﹐
ContentEN: Blessed quietness, holy quietness,

ContentCN: 我心有了大把握﹐
ContentEN: What assurance in my soul!

ContentCN: 水正起波瀾﹐祂在說平安﹐
ContentEN: On the stormy sea, He speaks peace to me,

ContentCN: 我心不再有起落。
ContentEN: How the billows cease to roll!

ContentCN: 生命豐盛﹐康健豐富,
ContentEN: Bringing life and health and gladness,

ContentCN: 自從主賜保惠師﹔
ContentEN: All around, this heav'nly Guest,

ContentCN: 趕走不信﹐消滅愁苦﹐
ContentEN: Banished unbelief and sadness,

ContentCN: 使我疲倦得止息。
ContentEN: Changed our weariness to rest.

ContentCN: 有福的安靜﹐聖潔的安靜﹐
ContentEN: Blessed quietness, holy quietness,

ContentCN: 我心有了大把握﹐
ContentEN: What assurance in my soul!

ContentEN: On the stormy sea, He speaks peace to me,

ContentCN: 我心不再有起落。
ContentEN: How the billows cease to roll!

ContentCN: 有如甘霖從天而降﹐
ContentEN: Like the rain that falls from heaven,

ContentCN: 有如日光從天照﹔
ContentEN: Like the sunlight from the sky,

ContentCN: 聖靈同樣顯出力量﹐
ContentEN: So the Holy Ghost is given,

ContentCN: 使我滿受神恩膏。
ContentEN: Coming on us from on high.

ContentCN: 有福的安靜﹐聖潔的安靜﹐
ContentEN: Blessed quietness, holy quietness,

ContentCN: 我心有了大把握﹐
ContentEN: What assurance in my soul!

ContentCN: 水正起波瀾﹐祂在說平安﹐
ContentEN: On the stormy sea, He speaks peace to me,

ContentCN: 我心不再有起落。
ContentEN: How the billows cease to roll!

ContentCN: 現今果園已滿果實﹐
ContentEN: See, a fruitful field is growing,

ContentCN: 就是內住的公義﹔
ContentEN: Blessed fruits of righteousness;

ContentCN: 生命水流湧流不滯﹐
ContentEN: And the streams of life are flowing

ContentCN: 在那荒涼孤單地。
ContentEN: In the lonely wilderness.

ContentCN: 有福的安靜﹐聖潔的安靜﹐
ContentEN: Blessed quietness, holy quietness,

ContentCN: 我心有了大把握﹐
ContentEN: What assurance in my soul!

ContentCN: 水正起波瀾﹐祂在說平安﹐
ContentEN: On the stormy sea, He speaks peace to me,

ContentCN: 我心不再有起落。
ContentEN: How the billows cease to roll!

ContentCN: 這是何等奇妙救恩﹐
ContentEN: What a wonderful salvation,

ContentCN: 我能時常見主面！
ContentEN: Where we always see His face!

ContentCN: 這是何等奇妙居所﹐
ContentEN: What a perfect habitation,

ContentCN: 何等安靜安息天！
ContentEN: What a quiet resting place!

ContentCN: 聖靈發出祂光芒，榮耀充滿我心房；
ContentEN: Holy Ghost with light divine, Shine upon this heart of mine;

ContentCN: 黑暗陰翳消除盡，使黑夜變為光明。
ContentEN: Chase the shades of night away, Turn my darkness into day.

ContentCN: 聖靈彰顯祂恩能，我心完全洗潔淨。
ContentEN: Holy Ghost, with power divine, Cleanse this guilty heart of mine;

ContentCN: 願我罪身釘十架，我靈魂歸祢管轄。
ContentEN: Long hath sin without control Held dominion o’er my soul.

ContentCN: 聖靈恩惠賜歡欣，撫慰我的憂鬱心，
ContentEN: Holy Ghost, with joy divine, Cheer this saddened heart of mine;

ContentCN: 使愁苦遠遠離開，醫治我傷痛情懷。
ContentEN: Bid my many woes depart, Heal my wounded, bleeding heart.

ContentCN: 聖靈降臨來保惠，永遠安居我心內；
ContentEN: Holy Spirit, all divine, Dwell within this heart of mine;

ContentCN: 偶像座位盡除淨，使主在我心為尊。
ContentEN: Cast down every idol-throne, Reign supreme - and reign alone.

ContentCN: 求祢賜下焚燒靈，成我畢生大事情；
ContentEN: Come, oh Lord, Great Spirit, come! Let the mighty deed be done!

ContentCN: 滿足我心的要求，用火焚燒到無有；
ContentEN: Satisfy our soul’s desire, See us waiting for the fire,

ContentCN: 等候，等候，我們等候焚燒靈。
ContentEN: Waiting, waiting, See us waiting for the fire.

ContentCN: 我今舉手向祢請，
ContentEN: Come, Lord, in Thy Spirit come,

ContentCN: 要祢賜下焚燒靈；
ContentEN: Lo! We stretch our hands to Thee;

ContentCN: 焚燒一切所歡喜，
ContentEN: From the Father to the Son,

ContentCN: 不留一點為自己。
ContentEN: Let us now Thy glory see.

ContentCN: 求祢賜下焚燒靈，成我畢生大事情；
ContentEN: Come, oh Lord, Great Spirit, come! Let the mighty deed be done!

ContentCN: 滿足我心的要求，用火焚燒到無有；
ContentEN: Satisfy our soul’s desire, See us waiting for the fire,

ContentCN: 等候，等候，我們等候焚燒靈。
ContentEN: Waiting, waiting, See us waiting for the fire.

ContentCN: 我今壇上來獻祭，
ContentEN: On the alter now we lay

ContentCN: 擺上全人靈魂體；
ContentEN: Soul and body, mind and will;

ContentCN: 求將惡慾全解脫，
ContentEN: All the evil passions slay,

ContentCN: 並來充滿每角落。
ContentEN: Come, and every corner fill.

ContentCN: 求祢賜下焚燒靈，成我畢生大事情；
ContentEN: Come, oh Lord, Great Spirit, come! Let the mighty deed be done!

ContentCN: 滿足我心的要求，用火焚燒到無有；
ContentEN: Satisfy our soul’s desire, See us waiting for the fire,

ContentCN: 等候，等候，我們等候焚燒靈。
ContentEN: Waiting, waiting, See us waiting for the fire.

ContentCN: 我今真切已犧牲
ContentEN: Now the sacrifice we make,

ContentCN: 我所寶貝的一生；
ContentEN: Though as dear as a right eye,

ContentCN: 完全為著寶貝主，
ContentEN: For our blessed Savior’s sake,

ContentCN: 因祂流血來救贖。
ContentEN: Who for us did bleed and die.

ContentCN: 求祢賜下焚燒靈，成我畢生大事情；
ContentEN: Come, oh Lord, Great Spirit, come! Let the mighty deed be done!

ContentCN: 滿足我心的要求，用火焚燒到無有；
ContentEN: Satisfy our soul’s desire, See us waiting for the fire,

ContentCN: 等候，等候，我們等候焚燒靈。
ContentEN: Waiting, waiting, See us waiting for the fire.

ContentCN: 我今以信來領取
ContentEN: Now, by faith, the gift I claim,

ContentCN: 血下權利的給予；
ContentEN: Bought for me by blood divine;

ContentCN: 靠祢得勝的名字，
ContentEN: Through the all-prevailing Name

ContentCN: 所有應許成現實。
ContentEN: All the promises are mine.

ContentCN: 哦，求主救我脫離這個可憐的自己！
ContentEN: Oh, from myself deliver, From all its misery;

ContentCN: 好使我從今天起，完全充滿了祢。
ContentEN: I’d henceforth be forever Completely filled with Thee.

ContentCN: 求主寶血潔淨我，洗盡所有罪過；
ContentEN: Lord, may Thy blood now cleanse me, Wash all my sins away,

ContentCN: 將祢聖潔的膏油，重新為我塗抹。
ContentEN: That with Thy Holy Spirit Thou may anoint, I pray.

ContentCN: 我認自己的生活，真是失敗、軟弱；
ContentEN: My life is full of failures, My service is so weak;

ContentCN: 我望充滿祢的靈，完全為祢而活。
ContentEN: The filling of Thy Spirit To live for Thee I seek.

ContentCN: 哦，求主救我脫離這個可憐的自己！
ContentEN: Oh, from myself deliver, From all its misery;

ContentCN: 好使我從今天起，完全充滿了祢。
ContentEN: I’d henceforth be forever Completely filled with Thee.

ContentCN: 我心何等的乾旱，常為軟弱悲歎；
ContentEN: Oh, Lord, how dry my heart is, It yearns and pants for Thee;

ContentCN: 我是何等的盼望能被聖靈充滿。
ContentEN: The filling of Thy Spirit Is now my fervent plea.

ContentCN: 求主讓我今隱藏在祢擊傷石磐；
ContentEN: Within the smitten Rock, Lord, I would entirely hide;

ContentCN: 求主今聽我呼求，讓祢活水氾濫。
ContentEN: Pour thro’ Thy living water, Till I am satisfied.

ContentCN: 哦，求主救我脫離這個可憐的自己！
ContentEN: Oh, from myself deliver, From all its misery;

ContentCN: 好使我從今天起，完全充滿了祢。
ContentEN: I’d henceforth be forever Completely filled with Thee.

ContentCN: 我心何等的冷淡，順服何等遲慢；
ContentEN: How cold my heart has been, Lord, How slow obeying Thee;

ContentCN: 願主聖靈充滿我，使我不再背叛。
ContentEN: So fill me with Thy Spirit, I’ll ne’er rebellious be.

ContentCN: 我今躺臥在祭壇，不敢稍微動彈；
ContentEN: I lie upon Thy altar And dare not move away;

ContentCN: 求主烈火從天降，把我所有燒乾。
ContentEN: Oh, may Thy flame descending, Consume my all, I pray.

ContentCN: 哦，求主救我脫離這個可憐的自己！
ContentEN: Oh, from myself deliver, From all its misery;

ContentCN: 好使我從今天起，完全充滿了祢。
ContentEN: I’d henceforth be forever Completely filled with Thee.

ContentCN: 求主十架在我身，天天作工更深；
ContentEN: Oh, may Thy Cross within me Deepen its work and burn,

ContentCN: 把我度量擴充大，使我化為灰塵。
ContentEN: In me enlarge Thy measure, And me to ashes turn.

ContentCN: 好叫聖靈充滿我，天天比前更多；
ContentEN: Oh, may Thy Spirit fill me Each day more than before,

ContentCN: 祢的活水到處流，解除眾人乾渴。
ContentEN: And may Thy living water On me and thro’ me pour.
