ContentCN: 樂哉﹐能向寶座投下所有冠冕！
ContentEN: The kingdom of our God and His incarnate Son.

ContentCN: 現在主要充滿你心，直到滿溢，
ContentEN: He will fill your heart today to overflowing,

ContentCN: 正如主神聖吩咐：“將器皿多多騰出！”
ContentEN: As the Lord commandeth you,“Bring your vessels, not a few;”

ContentCN: 現今主要充滿你心，直到滿溢，
ContentEN: He will fill your heart today to overflowing

ContentCN: 充滿聖靈和能力。
ContentEN: With the Holy Ghost and pow’r.

ContentCN: 你是否已長久渴慕得著主豐滿福分，
ContentEN: Are you looking for the fullness of the blessing of the Lord

ContentCN: 今就在你心傾注？
ContentEN: In your heart and life today?

ContentCN: 何不按照主話來得父神應許的聖靈，
ContentEN: Claim the promise of your Father, come according to His word,

ContentCN: 如當日五旬祝福？
ContentEN: In the blessed oldtime way.

ContentCN: 現在主要充滿你心，直到滿溢，
ContentEN: He will fill your heart today to overflowing,

ContentCN: 正如主神聖吩咐：“將器皿多多騰出！”
ContentEN: As the Lord commandeth you,“Bring your vessels, not a few;”

ContentCN: 現今主要充滿你心，直到滿溢，
ContentEN: He will fill your heart today to overflowing

ContentCN: 充滿聖靈和能力。
ContentEN: With the Holy Ghost and pow’r.

ContentCN: 帶上你倒空的器皿，藉主寶血得潔淨，
ContentEN: Bring your empty earthen vessels, clean thro’ Jesus precious blood,

ContentCN: 來吧！你這窮乏人；
ContentEN: Come, ye needy, one and all;

ContentCN: 謙卑俯伏神寶座前，一心奉獻成為聖，
ContentEN: And in human consecration wait before the throne of God,

ContentCN: 直到聖靈從上傾。
ContentEN: Till the Holy Ghost shall fall.

ContentCN: 現在主要充滿你心，直到滿溢，
ContentEN: He will fill your heart today to overflowing,

ContentCN: 正如主神聖吩咐：“將器皿多多騰出！”
ContentEN: As the Lord commandeth you,“Bring your vessels, not a few;”

ContentCN: 現今主要充滿你心，直到滿溢，
ContentEN: He will fill your heart today to overflowing

ContentCN: 充滿聖靈和能力。
ContentEN: With the Holy Ghost and pow’r.

ContentCN: 主恩好比無限膏油，傾倒充滿器皿裡，
ContentEN: Like the cruse of oil unfailing is His grace forevermore,

ContentCN: 祂愛仍然不搖移；
ContentEN: And His love unchanging still;

ContentCN: 要照父的寶貴應許，將神膏油與能力，
ContentEN: And according to His promise with the Holy Ghost and pow’r,

ContentCN: 今日，充滿器皿裡。
ContentEN: He will ev’ry vessel fill.

ContentCN: 求祢多賜我們以聖靈﹐
ContentEN: Holy Ghost come down upon Thy children,

ContentCN: 讓祂光照並焚燒﹐
ContentEN: Give us grace, and make us Thine;

ContentCN: 將“祢”供給我們作生命﹐
ContentEN: Thy cleansing fires within us kindle,

ContentCN: 使我不住的禱告。
ContentEN: Blessed Spirit, Dove Divine!

ContentCN: 主﹐我曾否叫聖靈憂愁﹐
ContentEN: Oh, have we grieved Thee, gracious Spirit?

ContentCN: 流蕩、隨便並冷落﹖
ContentEN: Wayward, wanton, cold are we;

ContentCN: 然而我的犯罪和退後﹐
ContentEN: And still our sins, and many wand'rings,

ContentCN: 未曾叫祂厭倦過。
ContentEN: Never yet have wearied Thee.

ContentCN: 求祢多賜我們以聖靈﹐
ContentEN: Holy Ghost come down upon Thy children,

ContentCN: 讓祂光照並焚燒﹐
ContentEN: Give us grace, and make us Thine;

ContentCN: 將“祢”供給我們作生命﹐
ContentEN: Thy cleansing fires within us kindle,

ContentCN: 使我不住的禱告。
ContentEN: Blessed Spirit, Dove Divine!

ContentCN: 祢的聖靈曾如何忍耐﹐
ContentEN: Dear Paraclete! how hast Thou waited

ContentCN: 等我慢慢心轉變﹔
ContentEN: While our hearts were slowly turned!

ContentCN: 我曾如何棄絕祢熱愛﹐
ContentEN: How often hath Thy love been slighted,

ContentCN: 當祂為我憂心煎。
ContentEN: While for us it grieved and burned!

ContentCN: 求祢多賜我們以聖靈﹐
ContentEN: Holy Ghost come down upon Thy children,

ContentCN: 讓祂光照並焚燒﹐
ContentEN: Give us grace, and make us Thine;

ContentCN: 將“祢”供給我們作生命﹐
ContentEN: Thy cleansing fires within us kindle,

ContentCN: 使我不住的禱告。
ContentEN: Blessed Spirit, Dove Divine!

ContentCN: 祢的聖靈今在我心內﹐
ContentEN: Now in our hearts, O blessed Spirit,

ContentCN: 我要以祂為我主﹔
ContentEN: We would take Thee for our Lord;

ContentCN: 因為愛祢使我能敬畏﹐
ContentEN: In perfect love now make us faithful,

ContentCN: 祢的最小的宣佈。
ContentEN: To Thy least and lightest word.

ContentCN: 求祢多賜我們以聖靈﹐
ContentEN: Holy Ghost come down upon Thy children,

ContentCN: 讓祂光照並焚燒﹐
ContentEN: Give us grace, and make us Thine;

ContentCN: 將“祢”供給我們作生命﹐
ContentEN: Thy cleansing fires within us kindle,

ContentCN: 使我不住的禱告。
ContentEN: Blessed Spirit, Dove Divine!

ContentCN: 我們現今雖不能愛祢
ContentEN: O Comforter! tho' now we cannot

ContentCN: 如祢那樣愛我們﹔
ContentEN: Love Thee as Thou lovest us;

ContentCN: 祢在我心若將火點起﹐
ContentEN: If in our hearts Thy flame be kindled,

ContentCN: 它就不會終冷沉。
ContentEN: They shall not be always thus.

ContentCN: 我神﹐求祢用聖靈再充滿我﹗
ContentEN: Spirit of the living God, fall fresh on me;

ContentCN: 我神﹐求祢用聖靈再充滿我﹗
ContentEN: Spirit of the living God, fall fresh on me.

ContentCN: 破我、鎔我、模我、造我﹐
ContentEN: Break me, melt me, mold me, fill me.

ContentCN: 我神﹐求祢用聖靈再充滿我﹗
ContentEN: Spirit of the living God, fall fresh on me.

ContentCN: 因此﹐求主藉十字架﹐治死我的魂生命﹔
ContentEN: Work in me, Lord - work thro' the cross, that my soul-life deceased be.

ContentCN: 使我願出重大代價﹐來滿受祢的聖靈。
ContentEN: Whate'er the price, I would receive Thy Spirit's fullness in me.

ContentCN: 後是膏油先是血﹐要得滋潤先得潔﹔
ContentEN: First the blood, then anointing oil; cleansing, then can blessing flow.

ContentCN: 若非經過各各他﹐必不能到五旬節。
ContentEN: Without passing through Calvary, Pentecost we'll never know.

ContentCN: 我們若未蒙洗淨﹐能力必不從上傾﹔
ContentEN: Without purging of the soul, pow'r from on high cannot flow.

ContentCN: 我們若要作見證﹐必須釘死己生命。
ContentEN: If true witnesses we would be, self-life to the cross must go.

ContentCN: 因此﹐求主藉十字架﹐治死我的魂生命﹔
ContentEN: Work in me, Lord - work thro' the cross, that my soul-life deceased be.

ContentCN: 使我願出重大代價﹐來滿受祢的聖靈。
ContentEN: Whate'er the price, I would receive Thy Spirit's fullness in me.

ContentCN: 先是用杖擊石磐﹐後來活水纔溢漫﹔
ContentEN: Christ, the Rock, must be smitten first; then the living waters flow.

ContentCN: 死亡若未作過工﹐聖靈必定不充滿。
ContentEN: If death has not performed its work, then the Spirit ne'er can flow.

ContentCN: 我們若真同主死﹐願意萬有都損失﹔
ContentEN: If we truly died with Christ, counting all things to be loss,

ContentCN: 主的能力要降臨﹐使用我們來救世。
ContentEN: Then God's power will surely come down upon us in due course.

ContentCN: 因此﹐求主藉十字架﹐治死我的魂生命﹔
ContentEN: Work in me, Lord - work thro' the cross, that my soul-life deceased be.

ContentCN: 使我願出重大代價﹐來滿受祢的聖靈。
ContentEN: Whate'er the price, I would receive Thy Spirit's fullness in me.

ContentCN: 先是祭壇後是火﹐若沒喪失就沒果﹔
ContentEN: First the altar, and then the fire; without loss, there is no gain.

ContentCN: 若非所有先奉獻﹐必定不能登寶座。
ContentEN: If we fail to surrender all, we will never with Him reign.

ContentCN: 我們若真肯犧牲﹐捨棄萬事降服神﹔
ContentEN: If our all we yield to God a true sacrifice to make,

ContentCN: 我們必定得能力﹐因主信託順從人。
ContentEN: God will surely entrust these ones of His power to partake.

ContentCN: 因此﹐求主藉十字架﹐治死我的魂生命﹔
ContentEN: Work in me, Lord - work thro' the cross, that my soul-life deceased be.

ContentCN: 使我願出重大代價﹐來滿受祢的聖靈。
ContentEN: Whate'er the price, I would receive Thy Spirit's fullness in me.

ContentCN: 先是預備瓶子空﹐後是膏油盛其中﹔
ContentEN: First, the vessel must emptied be, then the oil can it contain.

ContentCN: 先是山谷挖成溝﹐後來活水才深泓﹔
ContentEN: First, the ditches must be dug out, then much water will remain.

ContentCN: 先是經過約但河﹐後是靈感加倍得﹔
ContentEN: First, the Jordan must be passed, double portion then bestowed.

ContentCN: 先受死亡的浸洗﹐後得榮耀的聖鴿。
ContentEN: First the baptism, then the dove; first the death, then life be showed.

ContentCN: 因此﹐求主藉十字架﹐治死我的魂生命﹔
ContentEN: Work in me, Lord - work thro' the cross, that my soul-life deceased be.

ContentCN: 使我願出重大代價﹐來滿受祢的聖靈。
ContentEN: Whate'er the price, I would receive Thy Spirit's fullness in me.

ContentCN: 當你舉目望禾田﹐金穀豐盈你稱羨﹔
ContentEN: When we look at the harvest field — how the golden grains abound —

ContentCN: 當念果實未生時﹐就有麥種死在先。
ContentEN: We should know how a grain of wheat had its death below the ground.

ContentCN: 若要生命的子粒﹐須有死亡的經歷﹔
ContentEN: To obtain the grains of life, there must be death's awesome hour.

ContentCN: 凡未到過髑髏地﹐就無聖靈的能力。
ContentEN: Without going through Calvary, there can be no Spirit's pow'r.

ContentCN: 因此﹐求主藉十字架﹐治死我的魂生命﹔
ContentEN: Work in me, Lord - work thro' the cross, that my soul-life deceased be.

ContentCN: 使我願出重大代價﹐來滿受祢的聖靈。
ContentEN: Whate'er the price, I would receive Thy Spirit's fullness in me.

ContentCN: 既是這樣﹐求我主﹐使我忠誠走窄路﹔
ContentEN: Since the truth is revealed, my Lord, help me go the narrow way.

ContentCN: 除去雄心和自負﹐只願順服並受苦。
ContentEN: Strip me of all my self and pride; suff'ring all, I would obey.

ContentCN: 更大能力我不取﹐更深的死我所需﹔
ContentEN: I pray not for greater pow'r - deeper death is all I need.

ContentCN: 但願加略的意義﹐完全成功在我軀。
ContentEN: Let the full meaning of the cross be fulfilled in me, I plead.

ContentCN: 求用聖靈施憐憫﹐作工在我裏面﹔
ContentEN: O Spirit of faith and love, come in our midst, we pray,

ContentCN: 潔淨每個等候的心﹐賜下能力作恩典。
ContentEN: And purify each seeking heart; baptize us with pow'r today.

ContentCN: 我主﹐只有祢的聖靈﹐能救我心脫罪﹔
ContentEN: Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, alone, can turn our hearts from sin;

ContentCN: 只有祂的能力﹐能清裏面所有污穢。
ContentEN: His pow’r alone can sanctify and keep us pure within.

ContentCN: 求用聖靈施憐憫﹐作工在我裏面﹐
ContentEN: O Spirit of faith and love, come in our midst, we pray,

ContentCN: 潔淨每個等候的心﹐賜下能力作恩典。
ContentEN: And purify each seeking heart; baptize us with pow'r today.

ContentCN: 我主﹐只有祢的聖靈能生更深的愛﹔
ContentEN: Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, alone can deeper love inspire;

ContentCN: 只有祂的能力﹐能令這個聖火燒開。
ContentEN: His power alone within our souls can light the sacred fire.

ContentCN: 求用聖靈施憐憫﹐作工在我裏面﹐
ContentEN: O Spirit of faith and love, come in our midst, we pray,

ContentCN: 潔淨每個等候的心﹐賜下能力作恩典。
ContentEN: And purify each seeking heart; baptize us with pow'r today.

ContentCN: 我主﹐只有祢的聖靈﹐能賜所求恩賜﹔
ContentEN: Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, can bring the gifts we seek in prayer;

ContentCN: 只有祂能安慰苦情﹐祂能平靜憂思。
ContentEN: His voice can words of comfort speak and still each wave of care.

ContentCN: 求用聖靈施憐憫﹐作工在我裏面﹐
ContentEN: O Spirit of love, descend, come in our midst, we pray,

ContentCN: 好像五旬靈風吹臨﹐今日吹進我心坎。
ContentEN: And like a rushing, mighty wind sweep over our souls today.

ContentCN: 我主﹐只有祢的聖靈,能賜所需恩惠﹔
ContentEN: Thy Holy Spirit, Lord, can give the grace we need this hour;

ContentCN: 正當我們等候命令﹐祢來聖別充沛。
ContentEN: And while we wait, O Spirit, come in sanctifying power.

ContentCN: 焚燒在我心內﹐焚燒在我心內﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis burning in my soul, 'tis burning in my soul;

ContentCN: 愛焰自天傾下﹐焚燒在我心內﹔
ContentEN: The fire of heav'nly love is burning in my soul.

ContentCN: 聖靈已來保惠﹐主名應當讚美﹐
ContentEN: The Holy Spirit came, all glory to His name!

ContentCN: 愛焰自天傾下﹐焚燒在我心內﹗
ContentEN: The fire of heav'nly love is burning in my soul.

ContentCN: 神賜祂的能力﹐在我窮苦心內﹐
ContentEN: God sent His mighty pow'r, to this poor sinful heart,

ContentCN: 時刻保守提挈﹐灌以必需恩惠﹔
ContentEN: To keep me every hour, and needful grace impart;

ContentCN: 藉靈住我裏面﹐掌管我的全人﹐
ContentEN: And since His Spirit came to take supreme control,

ContentCN: 用愛發出火焰﹐在我心內直焚。
ContentEN: The love-enkindled flame is burning in my soul.

ContentCN: 焚燒在我心內﹐焚燒在我心內﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis burning in my soul, 'tis burning in my soul;

ContentCN: 愛焰自天傾下﹐焚燒在我心內﹔
ContentEN: The fire of heav'nly love is burning in my soul.

ContentCN: 聖靈已來保惠﹐主名應當讚美﹐
ContentEN: The Holy Spirit came, all glory to His name!

ContentCN: 愛焰自天傾下﹐焚燒在我心內﹗
ContentEN: The fire of heav'nly love is burning in my soul.

ContentCN: 我在架下低頭﹐我在壇上奉獻﹔
ContentEN: Before the cross I bow, upon the altar lay

ContentCN: 此生一切所有﹐都呈我主腳前。
ContentEN: A willing off'ring now, my all from day to day.

ContentCN: 祂為我付贖價﹐祂召我得安息﹔
ContentEN: My Savior paid the price; my name He sweetly calls.

ContentCN: 祂使天火降下﹐悅納我的活祭。
ContentEN: Upon the sacrifice the fire from heaven falls.

ContentCN: 焚燒在我心內﹐焚燒在我心內﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis burning in my soul, 'tis burning in my soul;

ContentCN: 愛焰自天傾下﹐焚燒在我心內﹔
ContentEN: The fire of heav'nly love is burning in my soul.

ContentCN: 聖靈已來保惠﹐主名應當讚美﹐
ContentEN: The Holy Spirit came, all glory to His name!

ContentCN: 愛焰自天傾下﹐焚燒在我心內﹗
ContentEN: The fire of heav'nly love is burning in my soul.

ContentCN: 我無任何功行﹐惟有神的應許﹔
ContentEN: No good that I have done, His promise I embrace;

ContentCN: 我藉愛子受刑﹐蒙恩作神兒女。
ContentEN: Accepted in the Son, He saves me by His grace.

ContentCN: 榮耀歸於我神﹐哈利路亞﹗阿們﹗
ContentEN: All glory be to God! let hallelujahs roll;

ContentCN: 這愛激勵至深﹐如火內心在焚。
ContentEN: His love is shed abroad, the fire is in my soul.

ContentCN: 神的聖靈已住你心間，
ContentEN: Speak to the Rock, bid the waters flow,

ContentCN: 為何到如今不見活水流？
ContentEN: Doubt not the Spirit, given long ago;

ContentCN: 一切的豐盛，等候你發現，
ContentEN: Take what He waiteth freely to bestow.

ContentCN: 你用信相信，就甚麼都有。
ContentEN: Drink ‘till its fullness all thy being know.

ContentCN: 在曠野加低斯，有神的選民，
ContentEN: Fainting in the desert, Israel’s thousands stand

ContentCN: 因乾渴快要死；忽聽見聲音：
ContentEN: At the rock of Kadesh, Hark! the Lord’s command,

ContentCN: “吩咐磐石，發出活水來！”
ContentEN: Speak to the Rock, bid the waters flow;

ContentCN: 不是要擊打，不是要等待；
ContentEN: Strike not its bosom, opened long ago,

ContentCN: 只要吩咐，活水就流開。
ContentEN: Speak to the Rock, ‘till the waters flow.

ContentCN: 神的聖靈已住你心間，
ContentEN: Speak to the Rock, bid the waters flow,

ContentCN: 為何到如今不見活水流？
ContentEN: Doubt not the Spirit, given long ago;

ContentCN: 一切的豐盛，等候你發現，
ContentEN: Take what He waiteth freely to bestow.

ContentCN: 你用信相信，就甚麼都有。
ContentEN: Drink ‘till its fullness all thy being know.

ContentCN: 主耶穌的聖名，是信心根據，
ContentEN: Blessed Rock of Ages, Thou art open still,

ContentCN: 神永遠的聖靈，已住你深處；
ContentEN: Blessed Holy Spirit, all our being fills;

ContentCN: 祂今發問：掙扎果為何？
ContentEN: Still Thou dost say, wherefore struggle so?

ContentCN: 聯合是事實，為何仍乾渴？
ContentEN: Call to the Spirit, whisper soft and low.

ContentCN: 約但河上，仍舊有聖鴿。
ContentEN: Speak to the Rock, bid the waters flow.

ContentCN: 神的聖靈已住你心間，
ContentEN: Speak to the Rock, bid the waters flow,

ContentCN: 為何到如今不見活水流？
ContentEN: Doubt not the Spirit, given long ago;

ContentCN: 一切的豐盛，等候你發現，
ContentEN: Take what He waiteth freely to bestow.

ContentCN: 你用信相信，就甚麼都有。
ContentEN: Drink ‘till its fullness all thy being know.

ContentCN: 但願心意簡單，完全的相信！
ContentEN: Oh, for trust more simple, fully to believe,

ContentCN: 但願心思平安，不再苦苦尋！
ContentEN: Oh, for hearts more childlike, freely to receive;

ContentCN: 如同嬰孩，靜臥主懷間，
ContentEN: E’en as a babe, on its mother’s breast,

ContentCN: 向世界斷奶，認識主愛甜，
ContentEN: So on Thy bosom let my spirit rest,

ContentCN: 享祂豐富，順服祂差遣。
ContentEN: Filled with Thy life, with Thy blessing blest.

ContentCN: 哦，主耶穌，當祢在地，
ContentEN: Oh, Jesus, Lord, when Thou on earth

ContentCN: 他們與祢多年同處；
ContentEN: Accompanied Thy faithful band,

ContentCN: 但是他們對祢自己，
ContentEN: It seemed thy knew, but knew Thee not,

ContentCN: 似識不識似悟不悟。
ContentEN: Thyself they did not understand.

ContentCN: 他們聽過祢的聲音，
ContentEN: They heard Thy voice, beheld Thy form,

ContentCN: 他們見過祢的丰姿，
ContentEN: Thy beauteous stature unforgot!

ContentCN: 他們擠過祢的肉身，
ContentEN: Thy crowded ‘round Thee, met Thy gaze,

ContentCN: 但祢是誰，似知不知。
ContentEN: But who Thou art, they knew it not.

ContentCN: 我們好像蓋重幔子，
ContentEN: As they of old we too are veiled;

ContentCN: 彷彿知道，又不透明，
ContentEN: We’ve known Thee long apparently;

ContentCN: 說不認識，早已認識，
ContentEN: Yet if we say we know, at best

ContentCN: 說已認識，認識不清。
ContentEN: We know Thee not transparently.

ContentCN: 但祢今已在靈裏面，
ContentEN: But in the Spirit now Thou art,

ContentCN: 成為另一位保惠師；
ContentEN: Another Comforter become;

ContentCN: 祢已使我成祢聖殿，
ContentEN: Reveal Thyself within my heart,

ContentCN: 在我裡面，將祢啟示。
ContentEN: Since to Thy temple Thou hast come.

ContentCN: 但願祢用聖靈充滿
ContentEN: With Thy blest Spirit, Lord, fill me,

ContentCN: 在我全人每一角落；
ContentEN: Fill every corner of my soul;

ContentCN: 沒有一處不受祢感，
ContentEN: May Thou inspire my every part,

ContentCN: 沒有一處不被祢摸。
ContentEN: Oh may Thou touch, renew the whole.

ContentCN: 求祢自己藉靈顯現，
ContentEN: The Spirit then revealing make

ContentCN: 加倍實在，在我心懷；
ContentEN: Thyself more real within my heart,

ContentCN: 無耳所聽，無目所見，
ContentEN: That ear not hear, nor eye may see

ContentCN: 無手所摸，如此實在。
ContentEN: How very real to me Thou art.

ContentCN: 當祢憐憫，肯來啟示，
ContentEN: When Thou in mercy dost reveal

ContentCN: 將祢自己給了我們，
ContentEN: And give Thyself in Spirit thus,

ContentCN: 世上有誰比祢更實？
ContentEN: What in the world can be more real,

ContentCN: 世上有何比祢更真？
ContentEN: More true than what Thou art to us?

ContentCN: 求祢用靈從我的靈，
ContentEN: Thy Spirit, Lord, in mine, I pray,

ContentCN: 如同洪水漫溢全人–
ContentEN: O’erflow my being as a flood,

ContentCN: 到處榮耀，到處光明，
ContentEN: That every part with glory shine

ContentCN: 到處是祢，到處是神。
ContentEN: And everywhere be Thee and God.

ContentCN: 這個生活何等親近！
ContentEN: How close we are in such a life,

ContentCN: 祢使我已在地若天；
ContentEN: In one is blended earth with heav’n;

ContentCN: 讚美滿口，喜樂滿心，
ContentEN: Thy presence sweetly fills our souls;

ContentCN: 同在滿魂，一切甘甜。
ContentEN: Our hearts are to Thy praises giv’n.

ContentCN: 祢被父神右手高舉，進入榮耀喜樂騰騰；
ContentEN: Exalted by Thy Father’s hand, Into Thy joyous reign so grand.

ContentCN: 歡登寶座應驗應許，差遣聖靈滿我器皿。
ContentEN: Thy promise filled, Thy Spirit sent; My vessel filled at Thy command.

ContentCN: 榮耀聖潔，耶穌的靈，自天傾下，充滿我心；
ContentEN: Divinely pure, Spirit of Christ, Poured from on high to fill my soul.

ContentCN: 天上聖火，內心直焚，無限榮光，溢我心魂。
ContentEN: The heav’nly fire is burning bright, Flooding my heart with endless glow.

ContentCN: 充滿我靈，充滿我魂，充滿愛好，充滿思想；
ContentEN: Fill Thou my spirit and my soul, Fill Thou my thoughts and my desire.

ContentCN: 充滿全人，每一部分，使我意志，喜樂服降。
ContentEN: Fill Thou my all, my every part, My will I yield in full delight.

ContentCN: 成了！祢已藉靈充滿，愛慕之情，如火熒熒；
ContentEN: ‘Tis done! Thy Spirit fills my heart! My love for Thee is burning bright.

ContentCN: 我膝跪拜，我口承認，俯伏向祢，獻上一生。
ContentEN: My knees do bow, my lips confess: “My will, my all, to Thee I yield.”

ContentCN: 起來！我魂，起來！歌唱你的救主得勝詩篇；
ContentEN: Arise, my soul! Arise and sing The psalms of triumph to the King.

ContentCN: 盡你有限年日力量，高舉祂名，從地到天。
ContentEN: In all thy days, with all thy might, From earth to heav’n exalt His name.

ContentCN: 進來，我主，心門現已全開，
ContentEN: Come in, O come! The door stand open now;

ContentCN: 我識聲音，我知是祢等待；
ContentEN: I knew Thy voice, Lord Jesus, it was Thou.

ContentCN: 自己無力，祢又被我見外，
ContentEN: The sun has set long since; the storm begin;

ContentCN: 正是時候，我主，求祢進來！
ContentEN: ‘Tis time for Thee, my Savior, O come in!

ContentCN: 可憐！荒涼房間，何等零亂，
ContentEN: Alas, ill-order’d shows the dreary room;

ContentCN: 堆堆都是雜物，何等難看，
ContentEN: The household stuff lies heap’d amidst the gloom,

ContentCN: 牆壁污穢，器具收拾不淨，
ContentEN: The table empty stands, the couch undress’d;

ContentCN: 我主，這是我給祢的歡迎。
ContentEN: Ah, what a welcome for th’Eternal Guest!

ContentCN: 但是，我真歡迎你這貴賓，
ContentEN: Yet welcome, and tonight, this doleful scene

ContentCN: 我的情形是我歡迎原因；
ContentEN: Is e’en itself my cause to hail Thee in;

ContentCN: 我主，如此紛亂，需要接受
ContentEN: This dark confusion e’en at once demands

ContentCN: 祢的同在和祢安排的手。
ContentEN: Thine own bright presence, Lord and ord’ring hands.

ContentCN: 在這偉大朋友顯現之前，
ContentEN: I seek no more to alter things, or mend,

ContentCN: 我不尋求補救或者改變；
ContentEN: Before the coming of so great a Friend;

ContentCN: 我的最好還是非常難看，
ContentEN: All were at best unseemly; and ‘twere ill

ContentCN: 叫祢再等，乃是最壞習慣。
ContentEN: Beyond all else to keep Thee waiting still.

ContentCN: 求來，不是發現，乃是要使
ContentEN: Come, not to find, but make this troubled heart

ContentCN: 這個亂心配作祢的居止。
ContentEN: A dwelling worthy of Thee as Thou art;

ContentCN: 除去黑暗、恐怕、犯罪失敗，
ContentEN: To chase the gloom, the terror, and the sin;

ContentCN: 進來，我主，祢的所有全來。
ContentEN: Come, all Thyself, yea come, Lord Jesus, in!

ContentCN: 哦﹐神﹐是祢召我們來看祢的兒子﹐
ContentEN: By Thee, O God, invited, we look unto the Son,

ContentEN: Thine own pure love we measure, Thy willing mind to save.

ContentEN: O God of mercy Father! The one unchanging claim,

ContentCN: 纔敢向祢常求恩﹐纔有永遠生命。
ContentEN: The brightest hopes, we gather from Christ's most precious name:

ContentCN: 何等慚愧﹐何等痛悔﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the bitter shame and sorrow,

ContentCN: 當我流淚想當時﹐
ContentEN: That a time could ever be,

ContentCN: 如何剛硬拒主深愛﹐
ContentEN: When I proudly said to Jesus,

ContentCN: 竟敢驕傲對主說﹕
ContentEN: “All of self and none of Thee. "

ContentCN: 專為己﹐全不為祢﹐
ContentEN: “All of self and none of Thee. "

ContentCN: 專為己﹐全不為祢﹗
ContentEN: “All of self and none of Thee. "

ContentCN: 竟敢驕傲對主說：
ContentEN: When I proudly said to Jesus,

ContentCN: 專為己﹐全不為祢﹗
ContentEN: All of self, and none of Thee.

ContentCN: 祂愛尋我，開我心眼，
ContentEN: Yet He found me; I beheld Him

ContentCN: 見祂十架流血景；
ContentEN: Bleeding on th'accursed tree

ContentCN: “父啊﹐赦免！”深感我心﹐
ContentEN: And my wistful heart said faintly,

ContentCN: 我就微弱向主說：
ContentEN: Some of self and some of Thee.

ContentCN: 雖為己﹐少許為祢！
ContentEN: Some of self and some of Thee.

ContentCN: 雖為己﹐少許為祢！
ContentEN: Some of self and some of Thee.

ContentCN: 我就微弱向主說：
ContentEN: And my wistful heart said faintly,

ContentCN: 雖為己﹐少許為祢！
ContentEN: Some of self, and some of Thee.

ContentCN: 醫治！扶持！釋放！
ContentEN: Day by day His tender mercy,

ContentCN: 滿溢！祂愛洋溢終不息！
ContentEN: Healing, helping, full and free,

ContentCN: 甜蜜堅強勝我剛硬﹐
ContentEN: Brought me lower while I whispered,

ContentCN: 使我自卑低聲說：
ContentEN: Less of self and more of Thee.

ContentCN: 少為己﹐更多為祢！
ContentEN: Less of self and more of Thee.

ContentCN: 少為己﹐更多為祢！
ContentEN: Less of self and more of Thee.

ContentCN: 使我自卑低聲說：
ContentEN: Brought me lower while I whispered,

ContentCN: 少為己﹐更多為祢！
ContentEN: Less of self, and more of Thee.

ContentCN: 祂愛高過最高天庭﹐
ContentEN: Higher than the highest heavens,

ContentCN: 深過最深的海洋；
ContentEN: Deeper than the deepest sea,

ContentCN: 主﹐祢得勝﹐我今服矣！
ContentEN: Lord, Thy love at last has conquered;

ContentCN: 允我誠懇的禱祈：
ContentEN: None of self and all of Thee.

ContentCN: 不為己﹐全都為祢！
ContentEN: None of self and all of Thee.

ContentCN: 不為己﹐全都為祢！
ContentEN: None of self and all of Thee.

ContentCN: 允我誠懇的禱祈：
ContentEN: Lord, Thy love at last has conquered;

ContentCN: 不為己﹐全都為祢！
ContentEN: None of self, and all of Thee.

ContentCN: 我豈可再冷淡退後，
ContentEN: How can I ever stay away and grieve

ContentCN: 使神聖靈終日擔憂，
ContentEN: Thy Spirit all the day

ContentCN: 救主也在等候，救主也在等候！
ContentEN: While Thou dost wait for me? While Thou dost wait for me!

ContentCN: 我今願意轉身回頭，
ContentEN: I now am willing to return

ContentCN: 不再留戀，不再逗遛，
ContentEN: And wait no longer, for I yearn

ContentCN: 就此跟主而走，就此跟主而走！
ContentEN: Hence-forth to follow Thee, Hence-forth to follow Thee.

ContentCN: 我今將我所是所有，
ContentEN: I offer now without reserve

ContentCN: 完全奉獻，一無保留，
ContentEN: All that I am and all I have

ContentCN: 從今直到永久，從今直到永久；
ContentEN: Thy purpose to fulfill, Thy purpose to fulfill.

ContentCN: 惟願恩主悅納保守，
ContentEN: Oh, may the Lord accept and keep,

ContentCN: 使我今後無望無求，
ContentEN: That henceforth I may only seek

ContentCN: 惟願神旨成就，惟願神旨成就。
ContentEN: To do the Father’s will, To do the Father’s will.

ContentCN: 回顧已往，又慚又羞，
ContentEN: When I look back, what grief and shame

ContentCN: 無一靈魂是我所救–
ContentEN: That I’ve brought none to trust Thy name,

ContentCN: 救恩被我扣留，救恩被我扣留；
ContentEN: Thy word I’ve locked within, Thy word I’ve locked within.

ContentCN: 今求恩主用祢膏油，
ContentEN: Oh, may the Lord anointing give

ContentCN: 將我全人厚厚澆透，
ContentEN: And richly through my being live,

ContentCN: 使成救恩出口，使成救恩出口。
ContentEN: That I may speak of Him, That I may speak of Him.

ContentCN: 恩主一向施恩深厚，
ContentEN: My Lord is so gracious to me,

ContentCN: 待我遠勝知己愛友，
ContentEN: Exceeds what my best friend can be;

ContentCN: 我願作祂配偶，我願作祂配偶；
ContentEN: I fain would be His bride, I fain would be His bride,

ContentCN: 今後向主時常依投，
ContentEN: I’d share His life and suffer loss,

ContentCN: 十字苦架甘心接受，
ContentEN: Accepting willingly the cross,

ContentCN: 將主生命流露，將主生命流露。
ContentEN: With Him identified, With Him identified.

ContentCN: 願更與神親密同行，
ContentEN: Oh, for a closer walk with God,

ContentCN: 心境安靜、屬天；
ContentEN: A calm and heav’nly frame;

ContentCN: 願光照明我的途徑，
ContentEN: A light to shine upon the road

ContentCN: 直到救主身邊。
ContentEN: That leads me to the Lamb!

ContentCN: 初次見主，我的安舒，
ContentEN: Where is the blessedness I knew,

ContentCN: 現今是在哪裡？
ContentEN: When first I saw the Lord?

ContentCN: 當我初次發現耶穌，
ContentEN: Where is the soul-refreshing view

ContentCN: 喜樂消逝何地？
ContentEN: Of Jesus and His word?

ContentCN: 從前我享何等交通，
ContentEN: What peaceful hours I once enjoyed!

ContentCN: 回憶仍是甘甜！
ContentEN: How sweet their memory still!

ContentCN: 現今留下痛苦虛空，
ContentEN: But they have left an aching void

ContentCN: 無何可以補滿。
ContentEN: The world can never fill.

ContentCN: 回來，聖鴿！求祢即回，
ContentEN: Return, O holy Dove, return,

ContentCN: 甘甜、安息使者！
ContentEN: Sweet messenger of rest!

ContentCN: 我恨使祢生悲的罪，
ContentEN: I hate the sins that made Thee mourn

ContentCN: 使祢離我若捨。
ContentEN: And drove Thee from my breast.

ContentCN: 我所認識，不論甚麼，
ContentEN: The dearest idol I have known,

ContentCN: 最可寶貝偶像，
ContentEN: Whate’er that idol be,

ContentCN: 使我扯它離祢寶座，
ContentEN: Help me to tear it from Thy throne,

ContentCN: 對祢完全傾向。
ContentEN: And worship only Thee.

ContentCN: 我是如此與神同行，
ContentEN: So shall my walk be close with God,

ContentCN: 心境安靜、屬天；
ContentEN: Calm and serene my frame;

ContentCN: 有光照明我的途徑，
ContentEN: So purer light shall mark the road

ContentCN: 直到救主身邊！
ContentEN: That leads me to the Lamb.

ContentCN: 我帶我罪就祢，我勝不過的罪，
ContentEN: I bring my sins to Thee, The sins I cannot count,

ContentCN: 願你在祢血裡，洗淨我的污穢；
ContentEN: That all may cleansed be In Thy once opened Fount;

ContentCN: 我帶我罪就祢，救主！
ContentEN: I bring them, Savior all to Thee;

ContentCN: 重擔太重，我不能負！
ContentEN: The burden is too great for me,

ContentCN: 重擔太重，我不能負！
ContentEN: The burden is too great for me.

ContentCN: 我帶我心就祢，我不明白的心；
ContentEN: My heart to Thee I bring, The heart I cannot read;

ContentCN: 無信無定東西，實在又惡又陰；
ContentEN: A faithless, wandering thing, An evil heart indeed.

ContentCN: 救主，我今帶它就祢，
ContentEN: I bring it, Savior, now to Thee,

ContentCN: 叫它成為可信不移，
ContentEN: That fixed and faithful it may be,

ContentCN: 叫它成為可信不移。
ContentEN: That fixed and faithful it may be.

ContentCN: 我帶我憂就祢，我逃不脫的憂，
ContentEN: I bring my grief to Thee, The grief I cannot tell;

ContentCN: 不只祢要同歷，並要完全拯救；
ContentEN: No words shall needed be, Thou knowest all so well.

ContentCN: 我來，就祢，親愛救主，
ContentEN: I bring the sorrow laid on me,

ContentCN: 帶著使我疲倦包袱，
ContentEN: O suff’ring Savior all to Thee,

ContentCN: 帶著使我疲倦包袱。
ContentEN: O suff’ring Savior all to Thee.

ContentCN: 我帶我苦就祢，我說不出的苦，
ContentEN: To Thee I bring my care, The care I cannot flee,

ContentCN: 實在毋需再題，祢早知道清楚；
ContentEN: Thou wilt not only share, But bear it all for me.

ContentCN: 我帶我心感覺的苦，
ContentEN: O loving Savior, now to Thee

ContentCN: 來就祢這受苦救主，
ContentEN: I bring the load that wearies me,

ContentCN: 來就祢這受苦救主。
ContentEN: I bring the load that wearies me.

ContentCN: 我帶我樂就祢，祢愛所賜的樂，
ContentEN: My joys to Thee I bring, The joys Thy love hath given

ContentCN: 每樂有如一翼，使我更近寶座；
ContentEN: That each may be a wing, To lift me nearer heaven.

ContentCN: 我帶它們前來就祢，
ContentEN: I bring them, Savior all to Thee,

ContentCN: 因為所有來自救贖，
ContentEN: For Thou hast purchased all for me,

ContentCN: 因為所有來自救贖。
ContentEN: For Thou hast purchased all for me.

ContentCN: 我帶我心就祢，我不要屬自己，
ContentEN: My life I bring to Thee, I would not be my own;

ContentCN: 救主使我能以，永遠成為祢的；
ContentEN: O Savior, let me be, Thine ever, Thine alone.

ContentCN: 我帶我心，生命，所有，
ContentEN: My heart, my life, my all I bring

ContentCN: 就祢，救主，直到永久，
ContentEN: To Thee, my savior and my King!

ContentCN: 就祢，救主，直到永久。
ContentEN: To Thee, my savior and my King!

ContentCN: 當向標竿力前！
ContentEN: On toward the goal! press on!

ContentCN: 雖然孤單﹐不變；
ContentEN: Alone yet unafraid;

ContentCN: 那開路者現在召你﹐
ContentEN: He cut the path who beckons thee,

ContentCN: 所以當前勿延。
ContentEN: On then, and undismayed!

ContentCN: 當向標竿力前！
ContentEN: On toward the goal! press on!

ContentCN: 主眼睛像火燄﹐
ContentEN: The eyes that are a flame

ContentCN: 正在看你；人算甚麼？
ContentEN: Are watching thee, what then are men?

ContentCN: 何必管他喜厭！
ContentEN: What matter praise, or blame?

ContentCN: 當向標竿力前！
ContentEN: On toward the goal! press on!

ContentCN: 不要再望後面；
ContentEN: Look not behind thee now,

ContentCN: 因為前頭就是獎賞﹐
ContentEN: When just ahead lies His "Well done,"

ContentCN: 主要賜給冠冕。
ContentEN: And crowns await thy brow.

ContentCN: 當向標竿力前！
ContentEN: On toward the goal! press on!

ContentCN: 塞耳、啞口、閉眼﹐
ContentEN: Blind, deaf and sometimes dumb

ContentCN: 在崎嶇的血跡路上﹐
ContentEN: Along the blood-marked, uphill way,

ContentCN: 緊隨基督向前！
ContentEN: Hard after Christ, press on!

ContentCN: 我心所追求乃是神自己﹐
ContentEN: My goal is God Himself, not joy, nor peace,

ContentCN: 不是樂與安﹐也不是福氣﹔
ContentEN: Nor even blessing, but Himself, my God;

ContentCN: 我能出代價﹐達到這聖地﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis His to lead me there, not mine, but His,

ContentCN: 不是我自己﹐乃是祂恩力。
ContentEN: At any cost, dear Lord, by any road!

ContentCN: 因信而向前﹐要得神自己﹐
ContentEN: So faith bounds forward to its goal in God,

ContentCN: 憑愛而跟隨﹐永遠不他依﹔
ContentEN: And love can trust her Lord to lead her there;

ContentCN: 因祂扶持我﹐我追隨不已﹐
ContentEN: Upheld by Him, my soul is foll'wing hard

ContentCN: 直到神答我最深的禱祈。
ContentEN: Till God hath full fulfilled my deepest prayer.

ContentCN: 雖然這道路有時很困難﹐
ContentEN: No matter if the way be sometimes dark,

ContentCN: 雖然這代價常是很重大﹐
ContentEN: No matter though the cost be oft times great,

ContentCN: 但祂最知道我需負何擔﹐
ContentEN: He knoweth how I best shall reach the mark,

ContentCN: 因到神的路必須是直達。
ContentEN: The way that leads to Him must need be straight.

ContentCN: 一事我所知﹐祂是我所要﹐
ContentEN: One thing I know, I cannot say Him nay;

ContentCN: 一事我所作﹐祂是我所望﹔
ContentEN: One thing I do, I press towards my Lord;

ContentCN: 在此日復日﹐神是我榮耀﹐
ContentEN: My God my glory here, from day to day,

ContentCN: 在彼榮耀裏﹐神是我獎賞。
ContentEN: And in the glory there my Great Reward.

ContentCN: 進入幔內，就必出到營外，
ContentEN: Enter the veil and go without the camp,

ContentCN: 嘗到天美，就必丟棄地愛；
ContentEN: Taste heaven’s sweetness, thus the earth forsake;

ContentCN: 聖中之聖，如果滿足我心，
ContentEN: If by the Holiest I am satisfied,

ContentCN: 空中之空，豈能欺騙我魂？
ContentEN: How can I of earth’s vanities partake?

ContentCN: 進入幔內，就必出到營外，
ContentEN: Enter the veil and go without the camp,

ContentCN: 天一同在，就必使地離開；
ContentEN: By heaven’s presence will the earth depart;

ContentCN: 天上榮耀，如果吸引我靈，
ContentEN: If heaven’s glory doth my spirit charm,

ContentCN: 地上福樂，豈能霸佔我情？
ContentEN: How can earth’s happiness possess my heart?

ContentCN: 進入幔內，瞻仰榮耀基督，
ContentEN: Enter the veil, behold the glorious Christ,

ContentCN: 出到營外，跟隨卑微耶穌；
ContentEN: Go out the camp to Jesus, let Him lead;

ContentCN: 寶座，冠冕，如果將我鼓舞，
ContentEN: If throne and crown my spirit here enthrall,

ContentCN: 馬槽，十架，豈能使我裹足？
ContentEN: Manger and cross cannot my steps impede.

ContentCN: 進入幔內，吸取復活大能，
ContentEN: Enter the veil for resurrection pow’r,

ContentCN: 出到營外，奔跑十架路程；
ContentEN: Go out the camp to bear the cross and woe,

ContentCN: 我若看見祂在天上面容，
ContentEN: If I His radiant face in heaven see,

ContentCN: 就必步武祂在地上腳踪。
ContentEN: His footsteps I will follow here below.

ContentCN: 進入幔內，飽嘗天上肥甘，
ContentEN: Enter the veil, on heaven’s fatness feast,

ContentCN: 出到營外，忍受地上艱難；
ContentEN: Without the camp, in hardship persevere;

ContentCN: 地上經歷，雖使我心酸痛，
ContentEN: Thou earthly trials sorely pain my heart,

ContentCN: 天上交通，卻叫我靈讚頌。
ContentEN: Heaven’s communion doth my spirit cheer.

ContentCN: 進入幔內，享受主的上好，
ContentEN: Enter the veil, Christ’s riches there enjoy,

ContentCN: 出到營外，供應人的需要；
ContentEN: Without the camp, the needs of men supply;

ContentCN: 天上生命，如果從我活出，
ContentEN: The life of heaven living out thru me

ContentCN: 地上靈魂，就必因我得福。
ContentEN: The souls of earth will bless and satisfy.

ContentCN: 進入幔內，直到幔子不存，
ContentEN: Enter the veil till tit exists no more,

ContentCN: 出到營外，直到營都滅盡；
ContentEN: Go out the camp till all the camps are gone;

ContentCN: 直到天地所有同歸於一，
ContentEN: Until the heavens and the earth unite,

ContentCN: 直到神人永遠不再分離。
ContentEN: Till God and man together dwell in one.

ContentCN: 我為甚麼憂懼疑惑﹖
ContentEN: Why should I worry, doubt and fear?

ContentEN: Why should I worry, doubt and fear?

ContentCN: 我為甚麼憂懼疑惑﹖

ContentCN: 不怕神再將你棄絕﹐因主已為你死。

ContentCN: 願祢為大﹐哦﹐主耶穌！
ContentEN: Be Thou supreme, O Jesus Christ,

ContentCN: 信條、話語、虛儀、
ContentEN: Nor creed, nor form, nor word;

ContentCN: 屬人的會、屬世的愛﹐
ContentEN: Nor holy church, nor human love,

ContentCN: 不能與祢相比。
ContentEN: Compare with Thee, my Lord!

ContentCN: 願祢為大﹐哦﹐主耶穌！
ContentEN: Be Thou supreme, O Jesus Christ,

ContentCN: 祢愛征服了我﹔
ContentEN: Thy love has conquered me;

ContentCN: 靠祢十架﹐我向己死﹐
ContentEN: Beneath Thy cross I die to self,

ContentCN: 完全為祢而活。
ContentEN: And live alone to Thee.

ContentCN: 願祢為大﹐哦﹐主耶穌！
ContentEN: Be Thou supreme, O Jesus Christ,

ContentCN: 全人被祢充滿﹔
ContentEN: My inmost being fill;

ContentCN: 使我思想像祢思想﹐
ContentEN: So shall I think as Thou dost think,

ContentCN: 喜歡像祢喜歡。
ContentEN: And will as Thou dost will.

ContentCN: 願祢為大﹐哦﹐主耶穌！
ContentEN: Be Thou supreme, O Jesus Christ,

ContentCN: 把我改變全備﹔
ContentEN: Thy life transfigure mine;

ContentCN: 從這幔子（軟弱肉體）﹐
ContentEN: And through this veil of mortal flesh,

ContentCN: 顯出祢的榮美。
ContentEN: Lord, let Thy splendor shine.

ContentCN: 願祢為大﹐哦﹐主耶穌！
ContentEN: Be Thou supreme, O Jesus Christ,

ContentCN: 我心真是要求﹕
ContentEN: My soul exults in Thee;

ContentCN: 作祢奴僕﹐行祢旨意﹐
ContentEN: To be Thy slave, to do Thy will,

ContentCN: 一生不再自由。
ContentEN: Is my felicity.

ContentCN: 神在天上有一寶貝，
ContentEN: God in heaven hath a treasure,

ContentCN: 豐富無人能言述；
ContentEN: Riches none may count or tell;

ContentCN: 永遠心愛祂所寶貴，
ContentEN: Hath a deep eternal pleasure

ContentCN: 就是祂子主基督。
ContentEN: Christ the Son, He loveth well.

ContentCN: 神在地上有一寶貝，
ContentEN: God hath here on earth a treasure,

ContentCN: 價值惟有神知悉；
ContentEN: None but He its price may know

ContentCN: 極深、心愛、人難測窺：
ContentEN: Deep, unfathomable pleasure,

ContentCN: 基督啟示我心裡。
ContentEN: Christ revealed in saints below.

ContentCN: 神藉火燄舌頭臨到，
ContentEN: God in tongues of fire descending,

ContentCN: 用這永遠無窮盡、
ContentEN: Chosen vessels thus to fill

ContentCN: 取用不竭的無價寶，
ContentEN: With the treasure never ending,

ContentCN: 充滿所選的器皿。
ContentEN: Ever spent – unfailing still.

ContentCN: 神從天上榮耀裡頭，
ContentEN: God’s own hand the vessels filling

ContentCN: 親來充滿這器皿；
ContentEN: From the glory far above,

ContentCN: 用祂愛的無限富有，
ContentEN: Longing hearts forever stilling

ContentCN: 滿足所有渴慕心。
ContentEN: With the riches of His love.

ContentCN: 雖受折磨、試煉、試探，
ContentEN: Thus though worn, and tried, and tempted,

ContentCN: 榮耀呼召仍不變；
ContentEN: Glorious calling, saint, is thine;

ContentCN: 葡萄樹枝與樹相聯，
ContentEN: Let the Lord but find thee emptied,

ContentCN: 向主倒空你自己。
ContentEN: Living branch in Christ the vine!

ContentCN: 泥土器皿世人鄙視，
ContentEN: Vessels of the world’s despising,

ContentCN: 軟弱、貧窮又卑賤；
ContentEN: Vessels weak and poor and base,

ContentCN: 裝著寶貝神聖火焰，
ContentEN: Bearing wealth God’s heart is prizing,

ContentCN: 將主榮耀來彰顯。
ContentEN: Glory from Christ’s blessed face.

ContentCN: 願我更加倒空、謙卑，
ContentEN: Oh to be but emptier, lowlier,

ContentCN: 不為人知、不顯揚；
ContentEN: Mean, unnoticed and unknown,

ContentCN: 作神器皿，更為尊貴，
ContentEN: And to God a vessel holier,

ContentCN: 充滿基督的榮光！
ContentEN: Filled with Christ and Christ alone!

ContentCN: 無何事物遮此榮光，
ContentEN: Naught of earth to cloud the glory,

ContentCN: 也無自己的遮蔽；
ContentEN: Naught of self the light to dim,

ContentCN: 將這奇妙救恩宣揚，
ContentEN: Telling forth His wondrous story,

ContentCN: 倒空、充滿祂自己。
ContentEN: Emptied to be filled with Him.

ContentCN: 我們乃是朝聖旅客﹐
ContentEN: Thro' the night of doubt and sorrow

ContentCN: 經過疑惑與憂悒﹔
ContentEN: Onward goes the pilgrim band,

ContentCN: 手拿枴杖﹐口唱詩歌﹐
ContentEN: Singing songs of expectation,

ContentCN: 面向神的應許地。
ContentEN: Marching to the Promised Land.

ContentCN: 白日時候﹐黑夜時候﹐
ContentEN: Clear before us thro' the darkness,

ContentCN: 雲柱火柱正引領﹔
ContentEN: Gleams and burns the guiding Light;

ContentCN: 弟兄手握弟兄的手﹐
ContentEN: Brother clasps the hand of brother,

ContentCN: 一步一步在進行。
ContentEN: Stepping fearless thro' the night.

ContentCN: 同一位神同在亮光﹐
ContentEN: One the light of God's own presence

ContentCN: 照明所有得贖人﹔
ContentEN: O'er His ransomed people shed,

ContentCN: 除去疑惑﹐除去愚妄﹐
ContentEN: Chasing far the gloom and terror,

ContentCN: 照明我們的疑問。
ContentEN: Bright'ning all the path we tread;

ContentCN: 同一目的在於高天﹐
ContentEN: One the object of our journey,

ContentCN: 同一信心不疲倦﹐
ContentEN: One the faith which never tires,

ContentCN: 同一定質來看前面﹐
ContentEN: One the earnest looking forward,

ContentCN: 同一希望得完全。
ContentEN: One the hope our God inspires.

ContentCN: 同一詩歌千萬嘴唇﹐
ContentEN: One the strain that lips of thousands

ContentCN: 同唱有如只一心﹔
ContentEN: Lift as from the heart of one;

ContentCN: 同一爭戰同一標準﹐
ContentEN: One the conflict, one the peril,

ContentCN: 同一向神求相親。
ContentEN: One the march in God begun;

ContentCN: 同一喜樂中的氣氛﹐
ContentEN: One the gladness of rejoicing

ContentCN: 在於永遠的岸前﹔
ContentEN: On the far eternal shore,

ContentCN: 在彼惟一全能的神﹐
ContentEN: Where the One Almighty Father

ContentCN: 掌權愛中至永遠。
ContentEN: Reigns in love for evermore.

ContentCN: 應當前進﹐旅客弟兄﹐
ContentEN: Onward, therefore, pilgrim brothers,

ContentCN: 前進倚著十字架﹔
ContentEN: Onward with the cross our aid;

ContentCN: 忍受羞辱﹐受它貧窮﹐
ContentEN: Bear its shame, and fight its battle

ContentCN: 直到休息它蔭下。
ContentEN: Till we rest beneath its shade.

ContentCN: 不久墳墓都要裂開﹐
ContentEN: Soon shall come the great awaking,

ContentCN: 不久死者要醒來﹐
ContentEN: Soon the rending of the tomb;

ContentCN: 所有陰影都要失在﹐
ContentEN: Then the scatt'ring of all shadows,

ContentCN: 最終生命滿情愛。
ContentEN: And the end of toil and gloom.

ContentCN: 求主助我進深！
ContentEN: Oh, deeper yet I pray,

ContentCN: 我願登峰造極！
ContentEN: And higher ev’ry day,

ContentCN: 使我悟性更新，
ContentEN: And wiser, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 領我進入真理。
ContentEN: In Thy precious, holy Word.

ContentCN: 進深，進深，進入耶穌大愛，
ContentEN: Deeper, deeper in the love of Jesus

ContentCN: 每日更進深；
ContentEN: Daily let me go;

ContentCN: 登高，登高，在主智慧學校
ContentEN: Higher, higher in the school of wisdom,

ContentCN: 經歷主恩深。
ContentEN: More of grace to know.

ContentCN: 求主助我進深！
ContentEN: Oh, deeper yet I pray,

ContentCN: 我願登峰造極！
ContentEN: And higher ev’ry day,

ContentCN: 使我悟性更新，
ContentEN: And wiser, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 領我進入真理。
ContentEN: In Thy precious, holy Word.

ContentCN: 進深，進深，藉著全能聖靈，
ContentEN: Deeper, deeper! blessed Holy Spirit,

ContentCN: 不斷的進深；
ContentEN: Take me deeper still,

ContentCN: 直到生命消失在基督裡，
ContentEN: Till my life is wholly lost in Jesus

ContentCN: 溶於祂旨意。
ContentEN: And His perfect will.

ContentCN: 求主助我進深！
ContentEN: Oh, deeper yet I pray,

ContentCN: 我願登峰造極！
ContentEN: And higher ev’ry day,

ContentCN: 使我悟性更新，
ContentEN: And wiser, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 領我進入真理。
ContentEN: In Thy precious, holy Word.

ContentCN: 進深，進深，雖經艱難試煉，
ContentEN: Deeper, deeper! tho’ it cost hard trials.

ContentCN: 仍不斷進深；
ContentEN: Deeper let me go!

ContentCN: 根深蒂固在主神聖愛中，
ContentEN: Rooted in the holy love of Jesus,

ContentCN: 結果好收成。
ContentEN: Let me fruitful grow.

ContentCN: 求主助我進深！
ContentEN: Oh, deeper yet I pray,

ContentCN: 我願登峰造極！
ContentEN: And higher ev’ry day,

ContentCN: 使我悟性更新，
ContentEN: And wiser, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 領我進入真理。
ContentEN: In Thy precious, holy Word.

ContentCN: 進深，登高，每日活在主裡，
ContentEN: Deeper, higher, ev’ry day in Jesus,

ContentCN: 直到爭戰過；
ContentEN: Till all conflict past

ContentCN: 靠主得勝，長成基督形像，
ContentEN: Finds me conqu’ror, and in His own image,

ContentCN: 豐富進天國。
ContentEN: Perfected at last.

ContentCN: 主﹐扶持我﹐使我上升﹐
ContentEN: Lord, lift me up and let me stand,

ContentCN: 憑信站立天的高峰﹔
ContentEN: By faith, on Heaven's tableland,

ContentCN: 更高生活我已可睹﹐
ContentEN: A higher plane than I have found;

ContentCN: 使我立足更高之處。
ContentEN: Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.

ContentCN: 我今面向高處直登﹐
ContentEN: I'm pressing on the upward way,

ContentCN: 天天努力﹐天天上升﹔
ContentEN: New heights I'm gaining ev’ry day;

ContentCN: 在我途中﹐我惟禱祝﹐
ContentEN: Still praying as I'm onward bound,

ContentCN: 使我立足更高之處。
ContentEN: Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.

ContentCN: 主﹐扶持我﹐使我上升﹐
ContentEN: Lord, lift me up and let me stand,

ContentCN: 憑信站立天的高峰﹔
ContentEN: By faith, on Heaven's tableland,

ContentCN: 更高生活我已可睹﹐
ContentEN: A higher plane than I have found;

ContentCN: 使我立足更高之處。
ContentEN: Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.

ContentCN: 我心不欲繼續住於
ContentEN: My heart has no desire to stay,

ContentCN: 疑惑﹑恐懼充斥之域﹔
ContentEN: Where doubts arise and fears dismay;

ContentCN: 雖也有人居此地步﹐
ContentEN: Tho' some may dwell where these abound,

ContentCN: 我卻心在更高之處。
ContentEN: My prayer, my aim, is higher ground.

ContentCN: 主﹐扶持我﹐使我上升﹐
ContentEN: Lord, lift me up and let me stand,

ContentCN: 憑信站立天的高峰﹔
ContentEN: By faith, on Heaven's tableland,

ContentCN: 更高生活我已可睹﹐
ContentEN: A higher plane than I have found;

ContentCN: 使我立足更高之處。
ContentEN: Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.

ContentCN: 我要居住超俗之境﹐
ContentEN: I want to live above the world,

ContentCN: 不怕撒但火箭欺凌﹔
ContentEN: Tho' Satan's darts at me are hurled;

ContentCN: 憑信我已能以接觸
ContentEN: For faith has caught the joyful sound,

ContentCN: 聖樂傳自更高之處。
ContentEN: The song of saints on higher ground.

ContentCN: 主﹐扶持我﹐使我上升﹐
ContentEN: Lord, lift me up and let me stand,

ContentCN: 憑信站立天的高峰﹔
ContentEN: By faith, on Heaven's tableland,

ContentCN: 更高生活我已可睹﹐
ContentEN: A higher plane than I have found;

ContentCN: 使我立足更高之處。
ContentEN: Lord, plant my feet on higher ground.

ContentCN: 我願靠恩登峰造極﹐
ContentEN: I want to scale the utmost height,

ContentCN: 在彼瞥見榮耀無比﹔
ContentEN: And catch a gleam of glory bright;

ContentCN: 但我仍然禱告不住﹐
ContentEN: But still I'll pray till heav'n I've found,

ContentCN: 求領我到更高之處。
ContentEN: Lord, lead me on to higher ground.

ContentCN: 莫把世俗來流連，往前走！往前走！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 放下重擔脫貪戀，往前走！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 父神召你來成聖，基督是你的得勝，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 聖靈作你的功能，往前走！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 手莫扶犁向後看，往前走！往前走！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 腳莫躊躇中途站，往前走！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 仰望耶穌免勞煩，手不下垂，腿不酸，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 越往前走越追趕，往前走！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 追趕至終不改變，往前走！往前走！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 向著標竿直往前，往前走！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 往前！直到晨星現，往前！直到國度見
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 往前！直到得冠冕，往前走！

ContentEN: More and more, more and more, Always more to follow;

ContentEN: Come speak, O Lord, into my ears;

ContentCN: 消除惡者一切謊言。
ContentEN: All evil lies will disappear.

ContentCN: 恩主﹐我今尋求祢面﹐
ContentEN: Earnestly now I seek Thee, Lord,

ContentCN: 願祢不再向我隱瞞﹔
ContentEN: Hide not from me Thy blessed face;

ContentCN: 開啟我耳﹐使我聽見
ContentEN: Open my ears that I may hear

ContentCN: 祢的聖言！
ContentEN: Thy words of grace.

ContentCN: 主﹐祢自己是我所羨﹐
ContentEN: Thyself, O Lord, is my desire,

ContentCN: 開啟我心使我愛戀﹔
ContentEN: Open my heart that I may love;

ContentCN: 願祢豐滿溢我心間﹐
ContentEN: Let me be wholly lost in Thee,

ContentCN: 使我失去在祢裏面。
ContentEN: Pour down Thy fullness from above.

ContentCN: 恩主﹐我今尋求祢面﹐
ContentEN: Earnestly now I seek Thee, Lord,

ContentCN: 願祢不再向我隱瞞﹔
ContentEN: Hide not from me Thy blessed face;

ContentCN: 開啟我心﹐使我愛戀
ContentEN: Open my heart to love Thee, Lord,

ContentCN: 祢的顯現！
ContentEN: Through all my days.

ContentCN: 求主耶穌銘刻我心；
ContentEN: Jesus! engrave it on my heart,

ContentCN: 惟祢是我所需、所親。
ContentEN: That Thou the One thing needful art;

ContentCN: 地上萬事均可仳離，
ContentEN: I could from all things part-ed be,

ContentCN: 但我永遠不能離祢。
ContentEN: But never, never, Lord, from Thee!

ContentCN: 耶穌，到底是否可能？
ContentEN: Jesus and shall it ever be?

ContentCN: 竟然有人羞認祢名？
ContentEN: A mortal man ashamed of Thee?

ContentCN: 天使所頌榮耀光輝，
ContentEN: Ashamed of Thee, Whom angels praise,

ContentCN: 竟會有人羞認祢名！
ContentEN: Whose glories shine thro’ endless days?

ContentCN: 竟然有人羞認主名，
ContentEN: Ashamed of Jesus! Sooner far

ContentCN: 無異黑夜羞認明星！
ContentEN: Let night disown each radiant star;

ContentCN: 我心本來就是夜央，
ContentEN: ‘Tis midnight with my soul, till He,

ContentCN: 祢為晨星使黑變明。
ContentEN: Bright Morning Star, bid darkness flee.

ContentCN: 竟然有人羞認主名，
ContentEN: Ashamed of Jesus! O as soon

ContentCN: 無異清晨羞認朝陽！
ContentEN: Let morning blush to own the sun;

ContentCN: 主是朝陽光華四射，
ContentEN: He sheds the beams of light divine,

ContentCN: 照明我的如夜天良。
ContentEN: O’er this benighted soul of mine.

ContentCN: 竟然有人羞認主名，
ContentEN: Ashamed of Jesus! That dear friend

ContentCN: 我們上天希望所寄；
ContentEN: On whom my hopes of heav’n depend?

ContentCN: 我心慚愧我臉含羞，
ContentEN: No, when I blush, be this my shame,

ContentCN: 因我不認祢名無比。
ContentEN: That I no more revere His Name.

ContentCN: 直到那日，我心所誇，
ContentEN: Till then – nor is the boasting vain

ContentCN: 仍是救主為我受死；
ContentEN: Till then, I boast a Savior slain;

ContentCN: 這是我的永遠榮耀，
ContentEN: And, O may this my glory be,

ContentCN: 基督竟不以我為恥。
ContentEN: That Christ is not ashamed of me.

ContentCN: 要思想耶穌﹐以祂作模型﹐
ContentEN: Consider Him, let Christ thy pattern be,

ContentCN: 好在你身上顯出祂榮形﹔
ContentEN: And know that He hath apprehended thee

ContentCN: 祂已經賜你永遠的生命﹐
ContentEN: To share His very life, His pow'r divine,

ContentCN: 並使你享受復活的大能。
ContentEN: And in the likeness of thy Lord to shine.

ContentCN: 要思想耶穌﹐天天都如此﹐
ContentEN: Consider Him so shalt thou, day by day,

ContentCN: 要自甘卑微﹐不再有大志﹔
ContentEN: Seek out the lowliest place, and therein stay,

ContentCN: 那無窮生命也要多認識﹐
ContentEN: Content to pass away, a thing of nought,

ContentCN: 靠復活大能經歷主的死。
ContentEN: That glory to the Father's name be brought.

ContentCN: 要思想耶穌﹐一生當這樣﹐
ContentEN: Consider Him, and thus thy life shall be

ContentCN: 要活在幔內﹐常見主榮光﹔
ContentEN: Filled with self-sacrifice and purity;

ContentCN: 若棄掉自己﹐必知主心意﹐
ContentEN: God will work out in thee the pattern true.

ContentCN: 一脫離自己﹐純潔又安息。
ContentEN: And Christ's example ever keep in view.

ContentCN: 要思想耶穌﹐當你在向前﹐
ContentEN: Consider Him, and as you run the race,

ContentCN: 要一直向上瞻仰祂榮面﹔
ContentEN: Keep ever upward looking in His face;

ContentCN: 必榮上加榮﹐變成祂形狀﹐
ContentEN: And thus transformed, illumined thou shalt be,

ContentCN: 使祂的形像顯在你身上。
ContentEN: And Christ's own image shall be seen in thee.

ContentCN: 求主賜給我至好，讓他人選次好；
ContentEN: Give me, O Lord, Thy best things, Let others take the rest;

ContentCN: 他們好處我不要，因我已得至寶。
ContentEN: I do not want their good things, For I have got the best.

ContentCN: 為那忍受試驗的人，神給的是至好；
ContentEN: God has His best things for the few That dare to stand the test;

ContentCN: 為那不要至好的人，神給的是次好。
ContentEN: God has His second choice for those Who will not have His best.

ContentCN: 求主賜給我至好，讓他人選次好；
ContentEN: Give me, O Lord, Thy best things, Let others take the rest;

ContentCN: 他們好處我不要，因我已得至寶。
ContentEN: I do not want their good things, For I have got the best.

ContentCN: 喪失應許安息之由，往往不是艱勞；
ContentEN: It is not always open ill That risks the promised rest;

ContentCN: 次好事物常成我仇，使我難得至好。
ContentEN: The better often is the foe That keeps us from the best.

ContentCN: 求主賜給我至好，讓他人選次好；
ContentEN: Give me, O Lord, Thy best things, Let others take the rest;

ContentCN: 他們好處我不要，因我已得至寶。
ContentEN: I do not want their good things, For I have got the best.

ContentCN: 哪裡有人不要祝福，絲毫祝福不要？
ContentEN: There’s scarcely one but vaguely wants In some way to be blest;

ContentCN: 但我不求祢的祝福，我只要祢至好。
ContentEN: ‘Tis not Thy blessing, Lord, I seek, I want Thy very best.

ContentCN: 求主賜給我至好，讓他人選次好；
ContentEN: Give me, O Lord, Thy best things, Let others take the rest;

ContentCN: 他們好處我不要，因我已得至寶。
ContentEN: I do not want their good things, For I have got the best.

ContentCN: 至上揀選也有人要，但當試煉來到–
ContentEN: And others make the highest choice, But when by trials pressed,

ContentCN: 畏縮、妥協、十架脫逃，至好，跟著丟掉。
ContentEN: They shrink, they yield, they shun the Cross, And so they lose the best.

ContentCN: 求主賜給我至好，讓他人選次好；
ContentEN: Give me, O Lord, Thy best things, Let others take the rest;

ContentCN: 他們好處我不要，因我已得至寶。
ContentEN: I do not want their good things, For I have got the best.

ContentCN: 我要趁此年日短少，盡其壓迫臨到；
ContentEN: I want, in this short life of mine, As much as can be pressed,

ContentCN: 忠於職守讓主稱道，助我達到至好。
ContentEN: Of service true for God and man; Help me to be my best.

ContentCN: 求主賜給我至好，讓他人選次好；
ContentEN: Give me, O Lord, Thy best things, Let others take the rest;

ContentCN: 他們好處我不要，因我已得至寶。
ContentEN: I do not want their good things, For I have got the best.

ContentCN: 得勝群眾當主點校，我要有分點召；
ContentEN: I want, among the victor throng, To have my name confessed;

ContentCN: 且聽救主慈聲說道：“你已力求至好。”
ContentEN: And hear my Master say at last, “Well done, you did your best.”

ContentCN: 只有一事，我主，
ContentEN: There is one thing, O Lord!

ContentEN: There is one thing I desire of Thee;

ContentCN: 只有一事如大衛：
ContentEN: There is one thing, like David:

ContentCN: 我只尋求能居住在祢殿，
ContentEN: That I may dwell in the house of the Lord

ContentCN: 在我一生之久，在我一生之久，
ContentEN: All the days of my life, All the days of my life,

ContentCN: 讓我瞻仰主祢的榮美，
ContentEN: To behold the beauty of the Lord,

ContentCN: 並讓我求問於你殿內。
ContentEN: And to inquire in His temple.

ContentCN: 只有一事，我主，
ContentEN: There is one thing, O Lord,

ContentCN: 只有一事如馬利亞：
ContentEN: There is one thing like Mary:

ContentCN: 在我一生之久，在我一生之久，

ContentCN: 讓我聆聽主恩言意深，
ContentEN: Just to hear His word and feel His heart,

ContentCN: 我要揀選這上好福分。

ContentCN: 只有一事，我主，

ContentCN: 只有一事，我心稱羨–

ContentCN: 只有一事如保羅：

ContentCN: 我要忘記背後努力面前，

ContentCN: 向著標竿直奔，向著標竿直奔，

ContentEN: I will press toward the mark for the prize

ContentCN: 從上召我來得的獎賞。

ContentCN: 我為得聖潔﹐一切都願割愛﹐

ContentEN: And help me to make a complete sacrifice;

ContentCN: 祢所流寶血﹐我今完全信賴﹐
ContentEN: By faith, for my cleansing, I see Thy blood flow,

ContentCN: 求主洗淨我﹐使我比雪更白。

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐祢已看見我在求尋﹐

ContentCN: 求祢今就來﹐賜給一個清心﹔
ContentEN: Come now, and within me a new heart create;

ContentCN: 凡向祢求的﹐祢永不會不睬﹐
ContentEN: To those who have sought Thee, Thou never saidst No;

ContentCN: 祢這神的隱藏的愛﹐
ContentEN: Thou hidden love of God, whose height,

ContentCN: 長闊高深﹐無人知悉﹔
ContentEN: Whose depth unfathom’d no man knows,

ContentCN: 遠遠我見祢的光采﹐
ContentEN: I see from far Thy beauteous light,

ContentCN: 我就歎息望得安息﹔
ContentEN: In-ly I sigh for Thy repose;

ContentCN: 我心痛苦﹐不能安息﹐
ContentEN: My heart is pained, nor can it be

ContentCN: 除非我心安息於祢。
ContentEN: At rest, till it finds rest in Thee.

ContentCN: 祢的聲音﹐仍然隱招
ContentEN: Thy secret voice invites me still

ContentCN: 我來負祢甜美的軛﹔
ContentEN: The sweetness of Thy yoke to prove;

ContentCN: 我雖幾乎前來應召﹐
ContentEN: And fain I would, but though my will

ContentCN: 但是懼怕前途阻隔﹔
ContentEN: Seems fixed, yet wide my passions rove;

ContentCN: 我志雖定﹐我情卻離﹐
ContentEN: Yet hindrances strew all the way;

ContentCN: 我欲向祢﹐反而背祢。
ContentEN: I aim at Thee, yet from Thee stray.

ContentCN: 全是恩典！使祢吸引
ContentEN: 'Tis mercy all, that Thou hast brought

ContentCN: 我心向祢追求安息﹔
ContentEN: My mind to seek her peace in Thee;

ContentCN: 我雖追求﹐不能親近﹐
ContentEN: Yet, while I seek but find Thee not,

ContentCN: 流蕩的我無所憑依﹔
ContentEN: No peace my wand'ring soul shall see.

ContentCN: 哦﹐要何時不再流蕩﹐
ContentEN: Oh, when shall all my wand'rings end

ContentCN: 所有腳踪向祢而往﹖
ContentEN: And all my steps to Thee-ward tend!

ContentCN: 日下有無甚麼東西﹐
ContentEN: Is there a thing beneath the sun

ContentCN: 與祢相爭來分我心﹖
ContentEN: That strives with Thee my heart to share?

ContentCN: 呀﹐我求祢把它割棄﹐
ContentEN: Ah! tear it thence, and reign alone,

ContentCN: 讓祢作王無人與競﹔
ContentEN: The Lord of every motion there.

ContentCN: 我心纔會不再拘泥﹐
ContentEN: Then shall my heart from earth be free,

ContentCN: 當它藉祢得了安息。

ContentCN: 哦﹐我求祢埋藏這己﹐
ContentEN: Oh, hide this self from me, that I

ContentCN: 使主(非我)從我而活﹗
ContentEN: No more, but Christ in me may live;

ContentCN: 惡慾邪情釘死絕跡﹐
ContentEN: My vile affections mortify,

ContentCN: 不私留一寶貝罪惡﹔
ContentEN: Nor let one darling sin survive.

ContentCN: 除祢之外﹐在凡事上﹐
ContentEN: In all things nothing may I see,

ContentCN: 使我無求﹐使我無望。
ContentEN: Nothing desire or seek but Thee.

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐給我無上之助﹐
ContentEN: O Lord, Thy sovereign aid impart,

ContentCN: 救我脫離無用之慮﹔
ContentEN: To save me from low-thoughted care;

ContentCN: 趕出己意離我心府﹐
ContentEN: Chase this self-will through all my heart

ContentCN: 離我全人隱密之域﹔
ContentEN: Through all its latent mazes there.

ContentCN: 使我作個順命的人﹐
ContentEN: Make me Thy duteous child, that I

ContentCN: 不斷稱頌﹐時常感恩。
ContentEN: Ceaseless may Abba, Father, cry.

ContentCN: 求祢使我時刻離地﹐
ContentEN: Each moment draw from earth away

ContentCN: 謙卑等候聽祢吩咐﹔
ContentEN: My heart which lowly waits Thy call;

ContentCN: 求祢對我時常題起﹕
ContentEN: Speak to my inmost soul and say,

ContentCN: “我是你愛、你命、你主。”
ContentEN: I am thy love, thy God, thy all.

ContentCN: 來聽祢聲﹐來覺祢力﹐
ContentEN: To feel Thy power, to hear Thy voice,

ContentCN: 來嘗祢愛﹐是我所期。
ContentEN: To taste Thy love, be all my choice.

ContentCN: 求主把我捆綁，
ContentEN: Make me a captive, Lord,

ContentCN: 我纔得著釋放；
ContentEN: And then I shall be free;

ContentCN: 願主迫我向主繳械，
ContentEN: Force me to render up my sword,

ContentCN: 我纔得勝奏捷。
ContentEN: And I shall conq’ror be.

ContentCN: 當我倚靠自己，
ContentEN: I sink in life’s alarms

ContentCN: 我就失敗危亟；
ContentEN: When by myself I stand,

ContentCN: 當主膀臂將我監禁，
ContentEN: Imprison me within Thine arms,

ContentCN: 我手就更奮興。
ContentEN: And strong shall be my hand.

ContentCN: 我心未交主時，
ContentEN: My heart is weak and poor

ContentCN: 真是軟弱愚癡；
ContentEN: Until it master find;

ContentCN: 自己所願自己不行，
ContentEN: It has no spring of action sure,

ContentCN: 萬事漂流無定。
ContentEN: It varies with the wind;

ContentCN: 主若未加鎖鍊，
ContentEN: It cannot freely move

ContentCN: 就難自由進前；
ContentEN: Till Thou hast wrought its chain;

ContentCN: 求主慈愛將它奴隸，
ContentEN: Enslave it with Thy matchless love,

ContentCN: 它纔會得能力。
ContentEN: And deathless it shall reign.

ContentCN: 我的生命未死，
ContentEN: My power is faint and low

ContentCN: 終身總是喪失；
ContentEN: Till I have learned to serve;

ContentCN: 勝少敗多，實無能力，
ContentEN: It wants the needed fire to glow,

ContentCN: 時為肉體嘆息。
ContentEN: It wants the breeze to nerve;

ContentCN: 我若沒有死過，
ContentEN: It cannot drive the world

ContentCN: 我就難以活著；
ContentEN: Until itself be driven;

ContentCN: 求主使我脫離自己，
ContentEN: Its flag can only be unfurled

ContentCN: 纔會完全得祢。
ContentEN: When Thou shalt breathe from heaven.

ContentCN: 我今認識了祢，
ContentEN: My will is not my own

ContentCN: 也略知道自己，
ContentEN: Till Thou hast made it Thine;

ContentCN: 所以今後真不願意，
ContentEN: If it would reach the monarch’s throne

ContentCN: 再藉天然能力。
ContentEN: It must its crown resign;

ContentCN: 求主永遠的靈，
ContentEN: It only stands unbent

ContentCN: 使我生命全釘；
ContentEN: Amid the clashing strife,

ContentCN: 使我治死肉體行為，
ContentEN: When on Thy bosom it has leant,

ContentCN: 主興盛，我衰微。
ContentEN: And found in Thee its life.

ContentCN: 接受我心，我只願意屬祢；
ContentEN: Take Thou my heart, I would be Thine alone;

ContentCN: 接受我心，不要將我丟棄！
ContentEN: Take Thou my heart, and make it all Thine own;

ContentCN: 聽我祈求，使我與罪隔離；
ContentEN: Purge me from sin, O Lord, I now implore,

ContentCN: 洗我，保守我，永遠是為著祢。
ContentEN: Wash me and keep me Thine forever more.

ContentCN: 我要更像主，我天天追求，
ContentEN: More like the Master I would ever be,

ContentCN: 更像祂謙卑，更像祂溫柔；
ContentEN: More of His meekness, more humility;

ContentCN: 更熱心工作，更勇敢去救人，
ContentEN: More zeal to labor, more courage to be true,

ContentCN: 更多的奉獻去接受祂委任。
ContentEN: More consecration for work He bids me do.

ContentCN: 接受我心，我只願意屬祢；
ContentEN: Take Thou my heart, I would be Thine alone;

ContentEN: Purge me from sin, O Lord, I now implore,

ContentCN: 洗我，保守我，永遠是為著祢。
ContentEN: Wash me and keep me Thine forever more.

ContentCN: 我要更像主，求天天賜下；
ContentEN: More like the Master is my daily prayer;

ContentCN: 更多的恩惠，來背我十架；
ContentEN: More strength to carry crosses I must bear;

ContentCN: 更倚靠聖靈，去將浪子帶領；
ContentEN: More earnest effort to bring His kingdom in;

ContentCN: 更多的努力，豫備國度到境。
ContentEN: More of His Spirit, the wanderer to win.

ContentCN: 洗我，保守我，永遠是為著祢。

ContentCN: 我要更像主，來活並來忍，
ContentEN: More like the Master I would live and grow;

ContentCN: 更顯出祂愛，來對待別人，
ContentEN: More of His love to others I would show;

ContentCN: 更多的捨己，像祂在加利利，
ContentEN: More self-denial, like His in Galilee,

ContentCN: 我要更像主，這永是我心意。
ContentEN: More like the Master I long to ever be.

ContentCN: 哦，我要像祢﹗哦﹐我要像祢﹗
ContentEN: O to be like Thee! O to be like Thee,

ContentCN: 可愛的救主﹐像祢模樣﹔
ContentEN: Blessed Redeemer, pure as Thou art!

ContentCN: 像祢的甘甜﹐像祢的貞堅﹐
ContentEN: Come in Thy sweetness, come in Thy fullness;

ContentCN: 在我的衷心刻祢形像。
ContentEN: Stamp Thine own image deep on my heart.

ContentCN: 哦，我要像祢﹗可愛的救主﹗
ContentEN: O to be like Thee! blessed Redeemer,

ContentCN: 這是我所求﹐是我所慕﹔
ContentEN: This is my constant longing and prayer.

ContentCN: 我歡喜丟棄一切的富足﹐
ContentEN: Gladly I'll forfeit all of earth's treasures,

ContentCN: 盼望能和祢形像合符。
ContentEN: Jesus, Thy perfect likeness to wear.

ContentEN: O to be like Thee! O to be like Thee,

ContentEN: Come in Thy sweetness, come in Thy fullness;

ContentCN: 在我的衷心刻祢形像。
ContentEN: Stamp Thine own image deep on my heart.

ContentCN: 哦，我要像祢﹐那樣的柔細﹐
ContentEN: O to be like Thee! full of compassion,

ContentCN: 寬恕又憐憫、仁愛、良善﹔
ContentEN: Loving, forgiving, tender and kind,

ContentCN: 幫助孤單的﹐勉勵灰心的﹐
ContentEN: Helping the helpless, cheering the fainting,

ContentCN: 尋找犯罪人﹐不辭危難。
ContentEN: Seeking the wand'ring sinners to find.

ContentCN: 哦，我要像祢﹗那樣的忍耐﹐
ContentEN: O to be like Thee! lowly in spirit,

ContentCN: 聖潔而謙卑﹐於人無傷﹔
ContentEN: Holy and harmless, patient and brave;

ContentCN: 溫和的接受無理的苦待﹐
ContentEN: Meekly enduring cruel reproaches,

ContentCN: 更深進入聖潔生活：
ContentEN: Deeper into the holy life-

ContentCN: 不再掙扎，何等安息！
ContentEN: O, what a rest from inward strife!

ContentCN: 逐日脫離罪、己捆鎖，
ContentEN: Daily from self and sin be free,

ContentCN: 直到全人消失於祢。
ContentEN: Till I be wholly lost in Thee.

ContentCN: 脫離捆綁、憂愁與黑影﹐
ContentEN: Out of my bondage, sorrow, and night,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來﹗耶穌﹐我來﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come! Jesus, I come!

ContentCN: 進入自由、喜樂與光明﹐
ContentEN: Into Thy freedom, gladness, and light,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來就祢﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come to Thee!

ContentCN: 脫離疾病﹐進入祢健全﹔
ContentEN: Out of my sickness into Thy health,

ContentCN: 脫離貧乏﹐進入祢富源﹔
ContentEN: Out of my want and into Thy wealth,

ContentCN: 脫離罪惡﹐進入祢救援﹐
ContentEN: Out of my sin and into Thyself,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來就祢﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come to Thee!

ContentCN: 脫離失敗、羞恥與無能﹐
ContentEN: Out of my shameful failure and loss,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來﹗耶穌﹐我來﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come! Jesus, I come!

ContentCN: 進入十架榮耀的得勝﹐
ContentEN: Into the glorious gain of Thy cross,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來就祢﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come to Thee!

ContentCN: 脫離痛苦﹐進入祢安寧﹔
ContentEN: Out of earth's sorrows into Thy balm,

ContentCN: 脫離風波﹐進入祢平靜﹔
ContentEN: Out of life's storm and into Thy calm,

ContentCN: 脫離怨歎﹐進入祢歡欣﹔
ContentEN: Out of distress to jubilant psalm,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來就祢﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come to Thee!

ContentCN: 脫離狂傲不平的血氣﹐
ContentEN: Out of unrest and arrogant pride,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來﹗耶穌﹐我來﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come! Jesus, I come!

ContentCN: 進入完全有福的旨意﹐
ContentEN: Into Thy blessed will to abide,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來就祢﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come to Thee!

ContentCN: 脫離自己﹐住在祢愛裏﹐
ContentEN: Out of myself to dwell in Thy love,

ContentCN: 脫離絕望﹐等候祢來提﹔
ContentEN: Out of despair into raptures above,

ContentCN: 離地上騰﹐如鴿展雙翼﹔
ContentEN: Upward for aye on wings like a dove,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來就祢﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come to Thee!

ContentCN: 脫離幽暗可怕的死亡﹐
ContentEN: Out of the fear and dread of the tomb,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來﹗耶穌﹐我來﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come! Jesus, I come!

ContentCN: 進入光明歡樂的家鄉﹐
ContentEN: Into the joy and light of Thy home,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來就祢﹗
ContentEN: Jesus, I come to Thee!

ContentCN: 脫離敗壞無底的深淵﹐
ContentEN: Out of the depths of ruin untold,

ContentCN: 進入護庇安歇的羊圈﹔
ContentEN: Into the peace of Thy sheltering fold,

ContentCN: 永永遠遠瞻仰祢榮顏﹐
ContentEN: Ever Thy glorious face to behold,

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我來就祢﹗
ContentEN: Jesus I come to Thee!

ContentCN: 我今轉身背向俗世，
ContentEN: I’ve turned my back upon the world

ContentCN: 和它一切的歡娛；
ContentEN: With all its idle pleasures,

ContentCN: 我今心向更美的事，
ContentEN: And set my heart on better things,

ContentCN: 就是天上的儲蓄。
ContentEN: On higher holier treasures;

ContentCN: 一切寶貝，一切榮顯，
ContentEN: No more its glitter and its glare,

ContentCN: 不能使我再逗遛；
ContentEN: And vanity shall blind me;

ContentCN: 我今越過分別界線，
ContentEN: I’ve cross’d the separating line,

ContentCN: 世界丟棄在背後。
ContentEN: And left the world behind me.

ContentCN: 遠遠在背後，遠遠在背後，
ContentEN: Far, far behind me, Far, far behind me!

ContentCN: 我今越過分別界線，
ContentEN: I’ve cross’d the separating line,

ContentCN: 世界丟棄在背後。
ContentEN: And left the world behind me.

ContentCN: 我今脫離罪的生活，
ContentEN: I’ve left the old sad life of sin,

ContentCN: 棄絕所有的愚行；
ContentEN: Its follies all forsaken;

ContentCN: 我今接受主的領率，
ContentEN: My standing place is now in Christ,

ContentCN: 願意聽祂的命令。
ContentEN: His holy vows I’ve taken;

ContentCN: 我既靠主免為死囚，
ContentEN: Beneath the standard of the cross

ContentCN: 主今作我的元首；
ContentEN: The world henceforth shall find me;

ContentCN: 我願為祂捨去所有，
ContentEN: I’ve passed in Christ from death to life,

ContentCN: 世界丟棄在背後。
ContentEN: And left the world behind me.

ContentCN: 遠遠在背後，遠遠在背後，
ContentEN: Far, far behind me! Far, far behind me!

ContentCN: 我願為祂捨去所有，
ContentEN: I’ve passed in Christ from death to life,

ContentCN: 世界丟棄在背後。
ContentEN: And left the world behind me.

ContentCN: 我今永遠不再返回，
ContentEN: My soul shall ne’er return again

ContentCN: 救日愚昧的境地；
ContentEN: Back to its former station,

ContentCN: 惟獨在此纔不定罪，
ContentEN: For here alone is perfect peace,

ContentCN: 在此纔會有安息。
ContentEN: And rest from condemnation;

ContentCN: 我今已經更換主人，
ContentEN: I’ve made exchange of masters now,

ContentCN: 對祂，我要永伺候；
ContentEN: The vows of glory bind me,

ContentCN: 地的捆綁就此脫盡，
ContentEN: And once for all I’ve left the world,

ContentCN: 世界丟棄在背後。
ContentEN: Yes, left the world behind me.

ContentCN: 遠遠在背後，遠遠在背後，
ContentEN: Far, far behind me! Far, far behind me!

ContentCN: 地的捆綁就此脫盡，
ContentEN: And once for all I’ve left the world,

ContentCN: 世界丟棄在背後。
ContentEN: Yes, left the world behind me.

ContentCN: 我的前途一定永定，
ContentEN: My choice is made forevermore,

ContentCN: 我並不要別救主；
ContentEN: I want no other Savior;

ContentCN: 我也不求更好福音，
ContentEN: I ask no purer happiness

ContentCN: 過於祂賜的寬恕。
ContentEN: Than His sweet love and favor;

ContentCN: 我心已經決定事神，
ContentEN: My heart is fixed on Jesus Christ,

ContentCN: 無論如何不回頭，
ContentEN: No more the world shall blind me;

ContentCN: 已往一切實為可恨，
ContentEN: I’ve crossed the Red Sea of His death,

ContentCN: 世界丟棄在背後。
ContentEN: And left the world behind me.

ContentCN: 遠遠在背後，遠遠在背後，
ContentEN: Far, far behind me! Far, far behind me!

ContentCN: 已往一切實為可恨，
ContentEN: I’ve crossed the Red Sea of His death,

ContentCN: 世界丟棄在背後。
ContentEN: And left the world behind me.

ContentCN: 主榮上加榮正在改變我，
ContentEN: From glory to glory He’s changing me,

ContentCN: 改變我，改變我。
ContentEN: Changing me, changing me;

ContentCN: 使我得完全變成主的形像，
ContentEN: His likeness and image to perfect in me,

ContentCN: 流露神大愛在世間。
ContentEN: The love of God shown to the world.

ContentCN: 主在改變，改變我，
ContentEN: For He’s changing, changing me,

ContentCN: 使屬地形像變成屬天，
ContentEN: From earthly things to the heavenly,

ContentCN: 使我得完全變成主的形像，
ContentEN: His likeness and image to perfect in me,

ContentCN: 流露神大愛在世間。
ContentEN: The love of God shown to the world.

ContentCN: 為你﹐我捨生命﹐為你﹐我流寶血﹔
ContentEN: I gave my life for thee; My precious blood I shed,

ContentCN: 將你洗得潔淨﹐使你與神和諧。
ContentEN: That thou might'st ransomed be and quickened from the dead.

ContentCN: 為你﹐為你﹐我捨生命﹐為我﹐你捨甚情﹖
ContentEN: For thee, for thee, I gave my life; what hast thou giv'n for Me?

ContentCN: 為你﹐為你﹐我捨生命﹐為我﹐你捨甚情﹖
ContentEN: For thee, for thee, I gave my life; what hast thou giv'n for Me?

ContentCN: 為你﹐我費多年﹐憂患苦難遍嘗﹐
ContentEN: I spent long years for thee in weariness and woe,

ContentCN: 好使快樂永遠﹐你也得以安享。
ContentEN: That an eternity of joy thou mightest know.

ContentCN: 為你﹐為你﹐我費多年﹐為我﹐你費幾天﹖
ContentEN: For thee, for thee, I spent long years; hast thou spent one for Me?

ContentCN: 為你﹐為你﹐我費多年﹐為我﹐你費幾天﹖
ContentEN: For thee, for thee, I spent long years; hast thou spent one for Me?

ContentCN: 我父光明之家﹐我的榮耀寶座﹐
ContentEN: My Father's house of light, My rainbow circled throne,

ContentCN: 為你﹐我都撇下﹐來到此地漂泊。
ContentEN: I left for earthly night, for wand'rings sad and lone.

ContentCN: 為你﹐為你﹐我撇這些﹐為我﹐你何所撇﹖
ContentEN: For thee, for thee, I left it all; hast thou left aught for Me?

ContentCN: 為你﹐為你﹐我撇這些﹐為我﹐你何所撇﹖
ContentEN: For thee, for thee, I left it all; hast thou left aught for Me?

ContentCN: 為你﹐我受痛苦﹐過於你口能述﹔
ContentEN: I suffer’d much for thee — more than thy tongue can tell,

ContentCN: 受了極大辛楚﹐救你脫離陰府。
ContentEN: Of bitt'rest agony — to rescue thee from hell.

ContentCN: 為你﹐為你﹐苦受許多﹐為我﹐你受甚麼﹖
ContentEN: For thee, for thee, I suffer’d much; what canst thou bear for Me?

ContentCN: 為你﹐為你﹐苦受許多﹐為我﹐你受甚麼﹖
ContentEN: For thee, for thee, I suffer’d much; what canst thou bear for Me?

ContentCN: 為你﹐我從天家﹐為你﹐我已帶來：
ContentEN: And I have brought to thee down from My home above,

ContentCN: 救恩無以復加﹐赦免、自由、慈愛。
ContentEN: Salvation full and free, My pardon and My love.

ContentCN: 為你﹐為你﹐我帶許多﹐你帶甚麼給我﹖
ContentEN: To thee, to thee, great gifts I brought; what hast thou brought to Me?

ContentCN: 為你﹐為你﹐我帶許多﹐你帶甚麼給我﹖
ContentEN: To thee, to thee, great gifts I brought; what hast thou brought to Me?

ContentCN: 主﹐我獻上生命﹐和我所有時間﹐
ContentEN: Lord, let my life be given and every moment spent,

ContentCN: 完全聽祢使令﹐脫離己的鎖鍊。
ContentEN: For God, for souls, for heav'n, and all earth's ties be rent.

ContentCN: 為我﹐為我﹐祢的全休﹔為祢﹐我棄所有。
ContentEN: For me, for me, Thou gavest Thyself; now I give all for Thee.

ContentCN: 為我﹐為我﹐祢的全休﹔為祢﹐我棄所有。
ContentEN: For me, for me, Thou gavest Thyself; now I give all for Thee.

ContentCN: “將心給我，將心給我！”
ContentEN: “Give Me thy heart, give Me thy heart,”

ContentCN: 聽見嗎?這隨時隨地呼召;
ContentEN: Hear the soft whisper, wherever thou art:

ContentCN: 祂要救你，脫離俗世漩渦，
ContentEN: From this dark world He would draw thee apart;

ContentCN: 慈聲向你呼召，“將心給我!”
ContentEN: Speaking so tenderly, “Give Me thy heart.”

ContentCN: “將心給我!”天父呼召聲音，
ContentEN: “Give Me thy heart,” says the Father above,

ContentCN: 這是獻給祂最珍貴禮物;
ContentEN: No gift so precious to Him as our love;

ContentCN: 隨時隨地祂對你細聲說:
ContentEN: Softly He whispers, wherever thou art,

ContentCN: ”甘心交託我，並將心給我。”
ContentEN: “Gratefully trust Me, and give Me thy heart.”

ContentCN: “將心給我，將心給我！”
ContentEN: “Give Me thy heart, give Me thy heart,”

ContentCN: 聽見嗎?這隨時隨地呼召;
ContentEN: Hear the soft whisper, wherever thou art:

ContentCN: 祂要救你，脫離俗世漩渦，
ContentEN: From this dark world He would draw thee apart;

ContentCN: 慈聲向你呼召，“將心給我!”
ContentEN: Speaking so tenderly, “Give Me thy heart.”

ContentCN: “將心給我!”救主呼召聲音，
ContentEN: “Give Me thy heart,” says the Savior of men,

ContentCN: 憐愛的呼聲一次又一次，
ContentEN: Calling in mercy again and again;

ContentCN: ”轉回迷途，遠離惡者罪過，
ContentEN: “Turn now from sin, and from evil depart,

ContentCN: 我已為你死，請將心給我。”
ContentEN: Have I not died for thee? give Me thy heart.”

ContentCN: “將心給我，將心給我！”
ContentEN: “Give Me thy heart, give Me thy heart,”

ContentCN: 聽見嗎?這隨時隨地呼召;
ContentEN: Hear the soft whisper, wherever thou art:

ContentCN: 祂要救你，脫離俗世漩渦，
ContentEN: From this dark world He would draw thee apart;

ContentCN: 慈聲向你呼召，“將心給我!”
ContentEN: Speaking so tenderly, “Give Me thy heart.”

ContentCN: “將心給我!”聖靈呼召聲音，
ContentEN: “Give Me thy heart,” says the Spirit divine,

ContentCN: ”願你將一切，聽從我指導，
ContentEN: “All that thou hast, to My keeping resign;

ContentCN: 你必享受主恩，多而又多;
ContentEN: Grace more abounding is Mine to impart,

ContentCN: 完全順服吧!並將心給我。”
ContentEN: Make full surrender and give Me thy heart.”

ContentCN: 我願作合乎祂心意的人，

ContentEN: Gratefully seeking to serve Him,

ContentCN: 將你最好獻與主。
ContentEN: Give Him the best that you have.

ContentCN: 將你最好的獻與主﹐
ContentEN: Give of your best to the Master,

ContentCN: 獻你年輕的力量﹗
ContentEN: Give of the strength of your youth;

ContentCN: 穿上救恩全副軍裝﹐
ContentEN: Clad in salvation's full armor,

ContentCN: 勇敢赴真理戰場﹗
ContentEN: Join in the battle for truth.

ContentCN: 將你最好的獻與主﹐
ContentEN: Give of your best to the Master,

ContentCN: 主愛浩大無可比﹔
ContentEN: Naught else is worthy His love;

ContentCN: 離開天上榮耀居所﹐
ContentEN: He gave Himself for your ransom,

ContentCN: 將自己作你贖價。
ContentEN: Gave up His glory above;

ContentCN: 祂捨生命毫無怨言﹐
ContentEN: Laid down His life without murmur,

ContentCN: 拯救我滅亡罪人﹔
ContentEN: You from sin's ruin to save;

ContentCN: 獻上自己作為敬拜﹐
ContentEN: Give Him your heart's adoration,

ContentCN: 將你最好獻與主﹗
ContentEN: Give Him the best that you have.

ContentCN: 救主受死大愛已賜給我，
ContentEN: Savior, Thy dying love Thou gavest me,

ContentCN: 主，我不願為己保留甚麼；
ContentEN: Nor should I aught withhold, Dear Lord, from Thee;

ContentCN: 我在愛中瞻仰，將我心願還償；
ContentEN: In love my soul would bow, My heart fulfill its vow,

ContentCN: 今將供物獻上，奉獻與你。
ContentEN: Some offering bring Thee Now, Something for Thee.

ContentCN: 主在父寶座前為我求呼，
ContentEN: At the blest mercy seat Pleading for me,

ContentCN: 我的微弱信心只看耶穌；
ContentEN: My feeble faith looks up, Jesus to Thee:

ContentCN: 助我十架背上，將你大愛傳揚；
ContentEN: Help me the cross to bear, Thy wondrous love declare,

ContentCN: 以禱告和歌唱，奉獻與你。
ContentEN: Some song to raise, or prayer Something for Thee.

ContentCN: 賜我一顆忠心，像你榮形，
ContentEN: Give me a faithful heart, Likeness to Thee,

ContentCN: 一日又過一日，靠主顯明；
ContentEN: That each departing day Henceforth may see

ContentCN: 一些愛的工作，一些良善之果，
ContentEN: Some work of love begun, Some deed of kindness done,

ContentCN: 一些罪人心奪，奉獻與你。
ContentEN: Some wand’rer sought and won, Something for Thee.

ContentCN: 一切所是所有，是你眷顧；
ContentEN: All that I am and have- Thy gifts so free-

ContentCN: 一生全是為主，或樂或苦！
ContentEN: In joy, in grief, thro’ life, Dear Lord, for Thee!

ContentCN: 一日見你榮面，因你贖回恩典
ContentEN: And when Thy face I see, My ransomed soul shall be

ContentCN: 得進無限永遠，奉獻與你。
ContentEN: Through all eternity, Something for Thee.

ContentCN: 我今屬於耶穌，不再屬自已；
ContentEN: I belong to Jesus, I am not mine own;

ContentCN: 我所是並我所有全都歸於你。
ContentEN: All I have and all I am shall be His alone.

ContentCN: 主﹐祢得勝﹐我今服矣﹗
ContentEN: Lord, Thou hast won, at length I yield;

ContentCN: 恩典強迫我的心意﹐
ContentEN: My heart by mighty grace compell’d

ContentCN: 奉獻一切於祢﹔
ContentEN: Surrenders all to Thee;

ContentCN: 祢的可怕我能久排﹐
ContentEN: Against Thy terrors long I strove,

ContentCN: 但誰能抗祢的大愛﹖
ContentEN: But who can stand against Thy love?

ContentCN: 愛大﹐我無能力。
ContentEN: Love conquers even me.

ContentCN: 祢若命祢萬鈞雷霆﹐
ContentEN: If Thou hadst bid Thy thunders roll,

ContentCN: 轟我靈魂向我施刑﹐
ContentEN: And light’nings flash to blast my soul,

ContentCN: 我仍固執不悔﹔
ContentEN: I still had stubborn been;

ContentCN: 但是憐憫征服我心﹐
ContentEN: But mercy has my heart subdued,

ContentCN: 以往抵擋銷化淨盡﹐
ContentEN: A bleeding Savior I have viewed,

ContentCN: 現今我恨我罪﹗
ContentEN: And now I hate my sin.

ContentCN: 我今羨慕單獨歸祢﹐
ContentEN: Now, Lord, I would be Thine alone,

ContentCN: 主﹐來佔領這個陋器﹐
ContentEN: Come, take possession of Thine own,

ContentCN: 作為祢的所有﹔
ContentEN: For Thou hast set me free;

ContentCN: 我既脫離撒但暴手﹐
ContentEN: Released from Satan's hard command,

ContentCN: 就願全人毫無保留﹐
ContentEN: See all my powers waiting stand,

ContentCN: 服事祢到永久。
ContentEN: To be employed by Thee.

ContentCN: 無論何處我要跟隨，
ContentEN: Where He leads me I will follow.

ContentCN: 無論何時我要跟隨，
ContentEN: Where He leads me I will follow.

ContentCN: 無論禍福，無論安危，
ContentEN: Where He leads me I will follow.

ContentCN: 我要跟隨，跟隨，不稍退。
ContentEN: I'll go with Him, with Him, all the way.

ContentCN: 一直向前，必不回顧，
ContentEN: He will give me grace and glory,

ContentCN: 一直向前，必不回顧，
ContentEN: He will give me grace and glory,

ContentCN: 一直向前，必不回顧，
ContentEN: He will give me grace and glory,

ContentCN: 甘願一生，一生，跟隨主。
ContentEN: And go with me, with me, all the way.

ContentCN: 我當如何愛我的主﹖
ContentEN: How shall I follow Him I serve?

ContentCN: 如何奉獻使祂歡喜﹖
ContentEN: How shall I copy Him I love?

ContentCN: 不稍離開祂的道路﹐
ContentEN: Nor from those blessed footsteps swerve,

ContentCN: 學習如何與祂親密。
ContentEN: Which lead me to His seat above?

ContentCN: 我的途徑若是痛苦﹐
ContentEN: Lord, should my path through suffering lie,

ContentCN: 主﹐我求祢禁我退縮﹔
ContentEN: Forbid that I should e'er repine;

ContentCN: 使我仍然向祢順服﹐
ContentEN: Still let me turn to Calvary,

ContentCN: 追憶祢的十架重負。
ContentEN: Nor heed my griefs, remembering Thine.

ContentCN: 讓我思念祢曾如何
ContentEN: O, let me think how Thou didst leave

ContentCN: 離開許多純潔樂事﹐
ContentEN: Untasted every pure delight,

ContentCN: 來憂﹐來餓﹐來倦﹐來渴﹐
ContentEN: To fast, to faint, to watch, to grieve,

ContentCN: 無家之夜﹐不息之日。
ContentEN: Through toilsome days, through homeless nights.

ContentCN: 為我來憂﹐來倦﹐來死﹐
ContentEN: To faint, to grieve, to die for me!

ContentCN: 祢來不求自己喜悅﹔
ContentEN: Thou camest not Thyself to please;

ContentCN: 地上安逸雖難恝置﹐
ContentEN: And, dear though earthly comforts be,

ContentCN: 我豈愛祢不勝這些﹖
ContentEN: Shall I not love Thee more than these?

ContentCN: 是的﹐我算萬事為損﹐
ContentEN: Yes! I would count them all but loss,

ContentCN: 為要來得祢的注意﹔
ContentEN: To gain the notice of Thine eye.

ContentCN: 丟棄萬事雖如土糞﹐
ContentEN: Flesh shrinks and trembles at the cross,

ContentCN: 為著愛祢有何可惜﹖
ContentEN: But Thou canst give the victory.

ContentCN: 主愛長闊高深﹐
ContentEN: What length, breadth, height, and depth!

ContentCN: 實在不能推測﹔
ContentEN: What greatness is His love!

ContentCN: 不然﹐像我這樣罪人﹐
ContentEN: How else could I, a sinner vile,

ContentCN: 怎能滿被恩澤。
ContentEN: Be in such grace and bliss?

ContentCN: 我主出了重價﹐
ContentEN: My Savior paid a price

ContentCN: 買我回來歸祂﹔
ContentEN: That I might ransomed be;

ContentCN: 我今願意背十字架﹐
ContentEN: Now willingly I'd bear the cross,

ContentCN: 忠心一路跟祂。
ContentEN: And follow faithfully.

ContentCN: 我今撇下一切﹐
ContentEN: The dearest things of earth

ContentCN: 為要得著基督﹔
ContentEN: I gladly leave behind;

ContentCN: 生也、死也﹐想都不屑﹐
ContentEN: Nor life, nor death can hold me back –

ContentCN: 有何使我回顧﹖
ContentEN: 'Tis Christ my soul would find.

ContentCN: 親友、欲好、利名﹐
ContentEN: All worldly gains or fame —

ContentCN: 於我夫復何用﹖
ContentEN: What good are they to me?

ContentCN: 恩主為我變作苦貧﹐
ContentEN: The Lord didst become poor for me,

ContentCN: 我今為主亦窮。
ContentEN: Poor like Him I would be.

ContentCN: 我愛我的救主﹐
ContentEN: My Savior do I love;

ContentCN: 我求祂的稱是﹔
ContentEN: His smile I would obtain.

ContentCN: 為祂之故﹐安逸變苦﹐
ContentEN: For Him, let gain be turned to loss,

ContentCN: 利益變為損失。
ContentEN: Let ease be turned to pain.

ContentCN: 祢是我的安慰﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, my gracious Lord,

ContentCN: 我的恩主耶穌！
ContentEN: My true comfort to be.

ContentCN: 除祢之外在天何歸﹖
ContentEN: Whom have I on earth or in heav'n

ContentCN: 在地何所愛慕﹖
ContentEN: To love, save only Thee?

ContentCN: 艱苦、反對、飄零﹐
ContentEN: Let oppositions come,

ContentCN: 我今一起不理﹔
ContentEN: And hardships from above;

ContentCN: 只求我主用祢愛情﹐
ContentEN: I only ask that Thou wouldst but

ContentCN: 繞我靈、魂、身體。
ContentEN: Enfold me in Thy love.

ContentCN: 主阿﹐我今求祢﹐
ContentEN: Lord, I now ask of Thee,

ContentCN: 施恩引導小子﹐
ContentEN: By grace lead Thou me on;

ContentCN: 立在我旁﹐常加我力﹐
ContentEN: Stand by my side to be my strength

ContentCN: 平安經過此世。
ContentEN: Till all dark days are gone.

ContentCN: 撒但、世界、肉體﹐
ContentEN: For Satan often tries

ContentCN: 時常試探、欺凌﹔
ContentEN: To hold me in restraint;

ContentCN: 祢若不加小子能力﹐
ContentEN: Unless Thou wouldst empow'r me, Lord,

ContentCN: 恐將貽羞祢名！
ContentEN: Thy name I might attaint.

ContentCN: 現今時候不多﹐
ContentEN: While time is short indeed,

ContentCN: 求主使我脫塵﹔
ContentEN: Uphold me, Lord, till then;

ContentCN: 祢一再來﹐我即唱說﹕
ContentEN: At Thy return, I'll sing at once:

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！阿門！
ContentEN: Hallelujah! Amen.
