ContentCN: 跟隨！跟隨！我願跟隨耶穌！
ContentEN: Follow! Follow! I would follow Jesus!

ContentCN: 不論我往何處，我必跟隨主！
ContentEN: Anywhere, everywhere, I would follow on!

ContentCN: 跟隨！跟隨！我願跟隨耶穌！
ContentEN: Follow! Follow! I would follow Jesus!

ContentCN: 不論領我何處，我必跟隨主！
ContentEN: Ev’rywhere He leads me I would follow on!

ContentCN: 我今願跟隨耶穌，不論走何路；
ContentEN: Down in the valley with my Savior I would go,

ContentCN: 或是平坦大路，或是崎嶇窄途；
ContentEN: Where the flow’rs are blooming and the sweet waters flow;

ContentCN: 既有救主親自相輔，我就不躊躇，
ContentEN: Ev’rywhere He leads me I would follow, follow on,

ContentCN: 一路跟隨耶穌，直到進天府。
ContentEN: Walking in His footsteps till the crown be won.

ContentCN: 跟隨！跟隨！我願跟隨耶穌！
ContentEN: Follow! Follow! I would follow Jesus!

ContentCN: 不論我往何處，我必跟隨主！
ContentEN: Anywhere, everywhere, I would follow on!

ContentCN: 跟隨！跟隨！我願跟隨耶穌！
ContentEN: Follow! Follow! I would follow Jesus!

ContentCN: 不論領我何處，我必跟隨主！
ContentEN: Ev’rywhere He leads me I would follow on!

ContentCN: 我今願跟隨耶穌，不論在何處；
ContentEN: Down in the valley with my Savior I would go,

ContentCN: 或在明媚樂土，或在死蔭幽谷；
ContentEN: Where the storms are sweeping and the dark waters flow;

ContentCN: 既有救主親自照護，我就不感苦，
ContentEN: With His hand to lead me I will never, never fear;

ContentCN: 處處跟隨耶穌，直到末一步。
ContentEN: Danger cannot harm me if my Lord is near.

ContentCN: 跟隨！跟隨！我願跟隨耶穌！
ContentEN: Follow! Follow! I would follow Jesus!

ContentCN: 不論我往何處，我必跟隨主！
ContentEN: Anywhere, everywhere, I would follow on!

ContentCN: 跟隨！跟隨！我願跟隨耶穌！
ContentEN: Follow! Follow! I would follow Jesus!

ContentCN: 不論領我何處，我必跟隨主！
ContentEN: Ev’rywhere He leads me I would follow on!

ContentCN: 我今願跟隨耶穌，不論時何如；
ContentEN: Down in the valley or upon the mountain steep,

ContentCN: 或是陽光滿目，或是黑雲密佈；
ContentEN: Close beside my Savior would my soul ever keep;

ContentCN: 既有救主親自部署，我就無所顧，
ContentEN: He will lead me safely in the path that He has trod,

ContentCN: 時時跟隨耶穌，一直到天府。
ContentEN: Up to where they gather on the hills of God.

ContentCN: 步步追，步步隨，步步跟隨耶穌；
ContentEN: Step by step, step by step, I would walk with Jesus,

ContentCN: 天天追，天天隨，天天行走窄路。
ContentEN: All the day, all the way, Keeping step with Jesus.

ContentCN: 耶穌，我今撇下所有，
ContentEN: Jesus, I my cross have taken,

ContentCN: 背起十架跟隨你；
ContentEN: All to leave and follow Thee;

ContentCN: 甘受藐視、艱苦、恥羞，
ContentEN: Destitute, despised, forsaken,

ContentCN: 心惟歡然作活祭。
ContentEN: Thou from hence, my all shalt be;

ContentCN: 前所追求，愛慕、盼望，
ContentEN: Perish every fond ambition,

ContentCN: 一切雄心全敗亡；
ContentEN: All I’ve sought, and hoped, and known;

ContentCN: 但我景況何等寬廣，
ContentEN: Yet how rich is my condition,

ContentCN: 仍然有神與天堂。
ContentEN: God and heav’n are still my own.

ContentCN: 任憑世界棄我嫌我，
ContentEN: Let the world despise and leave me,

ContentCN: 主，你也曾被棄嫌；
ContentEN: They have left my Savior, too;

ContentCN: 人面人心欺我騙我，
ContentEN: Human hearts and looks deceive me;

ContentCN: 惟神永遠不欺騙。
ContentEN: Thou art not, like man, untrue;

ContentCN: 當你向我顯出笑臉，
ContentEN: And, while Thou shalt smile upon me,

ContentCN: 友雖生疏敵雖險；
ContentEN: God of wisdom, love, and might,

ContentCN: 我心平安，處之泰然，
ContentEN: Foes may hate, and friends may shun me;

ContentCN: 因我得見你歡顏。
ContentEN: Show Thy face and all is bright.

ContentCN: 去罷，罪的名利福樂，
ContentEN: Go, then, earthly fame and treasure;

ContentCN: 來罷，艱難和諷嘲；
ContentEN: Come disaster, scorn, and pain!

ContentCN: 為你生活，失即是得，
ContentEN: In Thy service, pain is pleasure;

ContentCN: 有你喜悅，卑也高。
ContentEN: With Thy favour, loss is gain.

ContentCN: 我既稱祂阿爸父親，
ContentEN: I have called Thee, Abba, Father;

ContentCN: 我既靠你定我心；
ContentEN: I have stayed my heart on Thee;

ContentCN: 所有狂風，怒雨厚雲，
ContentEN: Storms may howl, and clouds may gather,

ContentCN: 都成益我的器皿。
ContentEN: All must work for good to me.

ContentCN: 我所受的試煉苦痛，
ContentEN: Man may trouble and distress me,

ContentCN: 不過驅我到你前；
ContentEN: ‘Twill but drive me to Thy breast;

ContentCN: 我的困難壓我愈重，
ContentEN: Life with trials hard may press me,

ContentCN: 天上平安愈甘甜。
ContentEN: Heav’n will bring me sweeter rest.

ContentCN: 有何憂愁能將我襲，
ContentEN: O ‘tis not in grief to harm me,

ContentCN: 當你榮面向我顯？
ContentEN: While Thy love is left to me;

ContentCN: 有何快樂能將我迷，
ContentEN: O ‘twere not in joy to charm me,

ContentCN: 若你不在它中間？
ContentEN: Were that joy unmixed with Thee.

ContentCN: 心哪，當脫恐懼掛慮，
ContentEN: Know, my soul, thy full salvation,

ContentCN: 接受完全的救恩；
ContentEN: Rise o’er sin and worldly care,

ContentCN: 無論面臨何種境遇，
ContentEN: Joy to find in every station,

ContentCN: 欣然忍受或前行。
ContentEN: Something still to do or bear.

ContentCN: 試想：有主作你罪祭，
ContentEN: Think what spirit dwells within thee,

ContentCN: 有父向你顯慈顏，
ContentEN: What a Father’s love is thine,

ContentCN: 有靈運行在你心裡，
ContentEN: What a Savior died to win thee,

ContentCN: 你是神子何可怨？
ContentEN: Child of heav’n, should’st thou repine?

ContentCN: 快由恩典進入榮耀，
ContentEN: Haste thee on from grace to glory,

ContentCN: 信當籐牌，求當翼，
ContentEN: Armed by faith, and winged by prayer;

ContentCN: 眼前天國就要破曉，
ContentEN: Heav’n’s eternal day’s before thee,

ContentCN: 神必親自領到底。
ContentEN: God’s own hand shall guide thee there.

ContentCN: 地上職事就要停止，
ContentEN: Soon shall close Thy earthly mission,

ContentCN: 人生程途就要完；
ContentEN: Swift shall pass thy pilgrim days,

ContentCN: 盼望就要變成事實，
ContentEN: Hope shall change to glad fruition,

ContentCN: 信變眼見禱變讚。
ContentEN: Faith to sight and prayer to praise.

ContentCN: 我曾行在孤單路上，擔子重壓肩頭，
ContentEN: I traveled down a lonely road and no one seemed to care,

ContentCN: 痛苦疲乏幾至絕望，竟無人施援手；
ContentEN: The burden on my weary back had bowed me to despair;

ContentCN: 我到主座前傾訴所遭無情冷落，
ContentEN: I oft complained to Jesus how folks were treating me,

ContentCN: 即聞主溫柔聲向我細說：
ContentEN: And then I heard Him say so tenderly;

ContentCN: “我腳何曾不疲乏，踏上加略山道？
ContentEN: “My feet were also weary upon the Calv’ry road,

ContentCN: 十架是這樣沉重，我被壓至仆倒；
ContentEN: The cross became so heavy, I fell beneath the load;

ContentCN: 疲倦路客要起來，黎明在我掌握，
ContentEN: Be faithful, weary pilgrims, the morning I can see —

ContentCN: 背起你十架，緊緊跟隨我。“
ContentEN: Just lift your cross and follow close to me.”

ContentCN: 我常向主得意誇口：“日夜奔波勞苦，
ContentEN: “I work so hard for Jesus” – I often boast and say-

ContentCN: 我已犧牲許多事物，為走十架窄路；
ContentEN: “I’ve sacrificed a lot of things to walk the narrow way;

ContentCN: 名譽、財富全拋棄，身價必值許多。“
ContentEN: I gave up fame and fortune – I’m worth a lot to Thee!”

ContentCN: 然而我聞主柔聲對我說：
ContentEN: And then I hear Him gently say to me:

ContentCN: “我離開榮耀寶座，捨去天上榮華，
ContentEN: “I left the throne of glory, and counted it but loss;

ContentCN: 我雙手曾被兵丁怒釘殘酷十架；
ContentEN: My hands were nailed in anger upon a cruel cross;

ContentCN: 將你手交我掌握，前行必得穩妥，
ContentEN: But now we’ll make the journey with your hand safe in mine-

ContentCN: 背起你十架，緊緊跟隨我。“
ContentEN: So lift your cross and follow close to me.”

ContentCN: 哦，主耶穌，若我一日死於異地、他鄉，
ContentEN: O Jesus, if I die upon a foreign field some day,

ContentCN: 也不會超愛所要求，縱使一切擺上。
ContentEN: ‘Twould be no more than love demands – no less could I repay;

ContentCN: “世人的愛莫過於人為朋友捨命。”
ContentEN: “No greater love hath mortal man than for a friend to die” –

ContentCN: 這是祂向我低語的聲音：
ContentEN: These are the words He gently spoke to me:

ContentCN: “若我放在你手中只是一杯涼水，
ContentEN: “If just a cup of water I place within your hand,

ContentCN: 我向你所有要求不過只這一杯。“
ContentEN: Then just a cup of water is all that I demand;”

ContentCN: 若因我死，而有人見你榮耀國度，
ContentEN: But if by death to living, they can Thy glory see,

ContentCN: 我願背十架，緊緊跟隨主。
ContentEN: I’ll take my cross and follow close to Thee.

ContentCN: 因祢名，寶貴的名，
ContentEN: In the name, the precious name

ContentCN: 因祢為我捨命；
ContentEN: Of Him who died for me,

ContentCN: 靠恩，無論如何艱難，
ContentEN: Thro' grace I'll win the promised crown,

ContentCN: 我要求祢喜歡。
ContentEN: Whate'er my cross may be!

ContentCN: 我是否要背負十架，
ContentEN: Am I a soldier of the Cross —

ContentCN: 跟從神的羔羊？
ContentEN: A follow'r of the Lamb?

ContentCN: 我豈可以怕出代價，
ContentEN: And shall I fear to own His cause,

ContentCN: 要得世界原諒？
ContentEN: Or blush to speak His name?

ContentCN: 因祢名，寶貴的名，
ContentEN: In the name, the precious name

ContentCN: 因祢為我捨命；
ContentEN: Of Him who died for me,

ContentCN: 靠恩，無論如何艱難，
ContentEN: Thro' grace I'll win the promised crown,

ContentCN: 我要求祢喜歡。
ContentEN: Whate'er my cross may be!

ContentCN: 別人苦戰要得榮耀﹐
ContentEN: Must I be carried to the skies

ContentCN: 血汗滿被沙場﹔
ContentEN: On flow'ry beds of ease,

ContentCN: 我豈可以安坐花轎﹐
ContentEN: While others fought to win the prize

ContentCN: 盼望抬進天堂？
ContentEN: And sailed through bloody seas?

ContentCN: 因祢名，寶貴的名，
ContentEN: In the name, the precious name

ContentCN: 因祢為我捨命；
ContentEN: Of Him who died for me,

ContentCN: 靠恩，無論如何艱難，
ContentEN: Thro' grace I'll win the promised crown,

ContentCN: 我要求祢喜歡。
ContentEN: Whate'er my cross may be!

ContentCN: 難道我無仇敵當拒？
ContentEN: Are there no foes for me to face?

ContentCN: 我無破口當堵？
ContentEN: Must I not stem the flood?

ContentCN: 難道俗世也可相與？
ContentEN: Is this vile world a friend to grace,

ContentCN: 也可作我幫助？
ContentEN: To help me on to God?

ContentCN: 因祢名，寶貴的名，
ContentEN: In the name, the precious name

ContentCN: 因祢為我捨命；
ContentEN: Of Him who died for me,

ContentCN: 靠恩，無論如何艱難，
ContentEN: Thro' grace I'll win the promised crown,

ContentCN: 我要求祢喜歡。
ContentEN: Whate'er my cross may be!

ContentCN: 我要掌權﹐就得爭戰﹐
ContentEN: Since I must fight if I would reign;

ContentCN: 哦主﹐加我力量﹔
ContentEN: Increase my courage, Lord.

ContentCN: 我願受辱﹐我不畏難﹐
ContentEN: I'll bear the toil, endure the pain,

ContentCN: 靠祢話語剛強。
ContentEN: Supported by Thy word.

ContentCN: 榮耀之光福樂之光
ContentEN: O there’s sunshine, blessed sunshine,

ContentCN: 當我平安喜樂在主前
ContentEN: While the peaceful, happy moments roll;

ContentCN: 當主向我顯現衪笑臉
ContentEN: When Jesus shows His smiling face,

ContentCN: 是有光在我魂間
ContentEN: There is sunshine in my soul.

ContentCN: 在我魂間，今天有陽光，
ContentEN: There is sunshine in my soul today,

ContentCN: 遠勝世界太陽–
ContentEN: More glorious and bright,

ContentCN: 更為榮耀、新鮮而輝煌，
ContentEN: Than glows in any earthly sky,

ContentCN: 因主就是這光。
ContentEN: For Jesus is my light.

ContentCN: 榮耀之光福樂之光
ContentEN: O there’s sunshine, blessed sunshine,

ContentCN: 當我平安喜樂在主前
ContentEN: While the peaceful, happy moments roll;

ContentCN: 當主向我顯現衪笑臉
ContentEN: When Jesus shows His smiling face,

ContentCN: 是有光在我魂間
ContentEN: There is sunshine in my soul.

ContentCN: 在我魂間，今天有音樂，
ContentEN: There is music in my soul today,

ContentCN: 頌讚我主不止；
ContentEN: A carol to my King;

ContentCN: 主在聽著，因衪能了解
ContentEN: And Jesus, listening, can hear

ContentCN: 我唱不出的詩。
ContentEN: The songs I cannot sing.

ContentCN: 榮耀之光福樂之光
ContentEN: O there’s sunshine, blessed sunshine,

ContentCN: 當我平安喜樂在主前
ContentEN: While the peaceful, happy moments roll;

ContentCN: 當主向我顯現衪笑臉
ContentEN: When Jesus shows His smiling face,

ContentCN: 是有光在我魂間
ContentEN: There is sunshine in my soul.

ContentCN: 在我魂間，今天有春天，
ContentEN: There is springtime in my soul today,

ContentCN: 因主與我相愛；
ContentEN: For when the Lord is near,

ContentCN: 平安之鴿吟詠在裏面，
ContentEN: The dove of peace sings in my heart,

ContentCN: 恩典開花在外。
ContentEN: The flow’rs of grace appear.

ContentCN: 榮耀之光福樂之光
ContentEN: O there’s sunshine, blessed sunshine,

ContentCN: 當我平安喜樂在主前
ContentEN: While the peaceful, happy moments roll;

ContentCN: 當主向我顯現衪笑臉
ContentEN: When Jesus shows His smiling face,

ContentCN: 是有光在我魂間
ContentEN: There is sunshine in my soul.

ContentCN: 在我魂間，今天有喜樂，
ContentEN: There is gladness in my soul today,

ContentCN: 希望、讚美和愛；
ContentEN: And hope, and praise, and love,

ContentCN: 因為現在衪賜我聯合，
ContentEN: For blessings which He gives me now,

ContentCN: 將來賜我賞賚。
ContentEN: For joys laid up above.

ContentCN: 祂是明亮的晨星﹐是谷中百合花﹐
ContentEN: He's the Lily of the Valley, the Bright and Morning Star,

ContentCN: 超乎萬人奪我心坎主無雙。
ContentEN: He's the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

ContentCN: 主耶穌是我密友﹐又是我的萬有﹐
ContentEN: I have found a friend in Jesus, He's ev'rything to me,

ContentCN: 超乎萬人奪我心坎主無雙﹔
ContentEN: He's the fairest of ten thousand to my soul;

ContentCN: 祂是谷中百合花﹐我心單獨愛祂﹐
ContentEN: The Lily of the Valley, In Him alone I see,

ContentCN: 洗我潔淨﹐使我完全再無瑕。
ContentEN: All I need to cleanse and make me fully whole.

ContentCN: 憂慮祂是我安慰﹔患難有祂抵擋﹐
ContentEN: In sorrow He's my comfort, in trouble He's my stay,

ContentCN: 一切重擔都擔在祂肩上。
ContentEN: He tells me ev'ry care on Him to roll;

ContentCN: 祂是明亮的晨星﹐是谷中百合花﹐
ContentEN: He's the Lily of the Valley, the Bright and Morning Star,

ContentCN: 超乎萬人奪我心坎主無雙。
ContentEN: He's the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

ContentCN: 主擔我一切憂傷﹐背負我的痛苦﹐
ContentEN: He all my griefs has taken, and all my sorrows borne;

ContentCN: 試探來臨﹐祂是我堅固保障﹔
ContentEN: In temptation He's my strong and mighty tower;

ContentCN: 為祂﹐我丟棄萬事﹐驅逐一切偶像﹐
ContentEN: I have all for Him forsaken, and all my idols torn

ContentCN: 現今蒙祂能力保守何安康。
ContentEN: From my heart, and now He keeps me by His pow'r,

ContentCN: 縱然世界嫌棄我﹐縱然仇敵猖狂﹐
ContentEN: Though all the world forsake me, and Satan tempt me sore,

ContentCN: 有主﹐仍勇至終點﹐無懼怕。
ContentEN: Through Jesus I shall safely reach the goal.

ContentCN: 祂是明亮的晨星﹐是谷中百合花﹐
ContentEN: He's the Lily of the Valley, the Bright and Morning Star,

ContentCN: 超乎萬人奪我心坎主無雙。
ContentEN: He's the fairest of ten thousand to my soul.

ContentCN: 主永不將我丟棄﹐也不將我撇下﹐
ContentEN: He will never, never leave me, Nor yet forsake me here,

ContentCN: 行祂有福旨意﹐因信而生活﹔
ContentEN: While I live by faith and do His blessed will

ContentCN: 祂作我四圍火城﹐我就無所懼怕﹐
ContentEN: A wall of fire about me, I've nothing now to fear,

ContentCN: 饑餓靈魂常因靈糧得飽享。
ContentEN: With His manna He my hungry soul shall fill;

ContentCN: 當我榮耀被提時﹐見祂可頌面容﹐
ContentEN: Then sweeping up to glory to see His blessed face,

ContentCN: 喜樂河滾滾﹐湧流何久長。
ContentEN: Where rivers of delight shall ever roll.

ContentCN: 今主耶穌滿足我心，並無別人如祂；
ContentEN: Now none but Christ can satisfy, None other name for me;

ContentCN: 歷久愛情、生命、歡欣，都由耶穌賜下。
ContentEN: There’s love and life and lasting joy, Lord Jesus, found in Thee.

ContentCN: 以前我心苦楚悲傷，永生之福無望；
ContentEN: O Christ, in Thee my soul hath found, And found in Thee alone,

ContentCN: 惟有基督今為我王，我心充滿歡暢。
ContentEN: The peace, the joy I sought so long, The bliss till now unknown.

ContentCN: 今主耶穌滿足我心，並無別人如祂；
ContentEN: Now none but Christ can satisfy, None other name for me;

ContentCN: 歷久愛情、生命、歡欣，都由耶穌賜下。
ContentEN: There’s love and life and lasting joy, Lord Jesus, found in Thee.

ContentCN: 以前我心思慕祝福，並不來尋基督；
ContentEN: I sighed for rest and happiness, I yearned for them, not Thee;

ContentCN: 我雖忽略我的救主，祂愛卻來尋吾。
ContentEN: But while I passed my Savior by, His love laid hold on me.

ContentCN: 今主耶穌滿足我心，並無別人如祂；
ContentEN: Now none but Christ can satisfy, None other name for me;

ContentCN: 歷久愛情、生命、歡欣，都由耶穌賜下。
ContentEN: There’s love and life and lasting joy, Lord Jesus, found in Thee.

ContentCN: 我曾試過破裂水池，希望痛快而喝；
ContentEN: I tried the broken cisterns, Lord, But, ah, the waters failed!

ContentCN: 哎喲，水卻完全漏失，譏諷我的乾渴。
ContentEN: E’en as I stooped to drink they fled, And mocked me as I wailed.

ContentCN: 今主耶穌滿足我心，並無別人如祂；
ContentEN: Now none but Christ can satisfy, None other name for me;

ContentCN: 歷久愛情、生命、歡欣，都由耶穌賜下。
ContentEN: There’s love and life and lasting joy, Lord Jesus, found in Thee.

ContentCN: 祝福喪失，我心悲哀，仍未想到祂來；
ContentEN: The pleasures lost I sadly mourned, But never wept for Thee,

ContentCN: 蒙昧心目，祂為我開，始知祂是可愛。
ContentEN: Till grace the sightless eyes received, Thy loveliness to see.

ContentCN: 當我不見基督容華，
ContentEN: How tedious and tasteless the hours,

ContentCN: 時間何等無味、可厭！
ContentEN: When Jesus no longer I see!

ContentCN: 甘甜的鳥甘甜的花，
ContentEN: Sweet prospects, sweet birds and sweet flow’rs,

ContentCN: 對我就不再是甘甜；
ContentEN: Have all lost their sweetness to me.

ContentCN: 可愛太陽如失光線，
ContentEN: The mid-summer sun shines but dim,

ContentCN: 田野枉欲表現歡喜，
ContentEN: The fields strive in vain to look gay;

ContentCN: 當我快樂在祂裡面，
ContentEN: But when I am happy in Him,

ContentCN: 陰霾也如晴空美麗。
ContentEN: December’s as pleasant as May.

ContentCN: 祂名發出最美香味，
ContentEN: His name yields the richest perfume,

ContentCN: 祂聲成為最甜音樂；
ContentEN: And sweeter than music His voice;

ContentCN: 祂的同在展我愁眉，
ContentEN: His presence disperses my gloom,

ContentCN: 使我裡面盡都歡悅。
ContentEN: And makes all within me rejoice,

ContentCN: 祂若如此不斷親密，
ContentEN: I should, were He always thus nigh,

ContentCN: 我就無何可怕、可求；
ContentEN: Have nothing to wish or to fear;

ContentCN: 無人快樂與我可比，
ContentEN: No mortal so happy as I;

ContentCN: 我的春日常年長有。
ContentEN: My summer would last all the year.

ContentCN: 看見祂面我就甘甜，
ContentEN: Content with beholding His face,

ContentCN: 我就只求祂的歡喜；
ContentEN: My all to His pleasure resigned;

ContentCN: 不論時地有何改變，
ContentEN: No changes of season or place,

ContentCN: 不能改變我的心意。
ContentEN: Would make any change in my mind.

ContentCN: 只要感覺祂的愛戀，
ContentEN: While blessed with a sense of His love,

ContentCN: 宮殿也成可笑玩具，
ContentEN: A palace a toy would appear;

ContentCN: 監獄可成榮耀宮殿，
ContentEN: And prisons would palaces prove,

ContentCN: 如果基督和我同居。
ContentEN: If Jesus would dwell with me there.

ContentCN: 我主，若我真是屬你，
ContentEN: My Lord, if indeed I am Thine,

ContentCN: 你若是我詩歌、太陽，
ContentEN: If Thou art my sun and my song,

ContentCN: 請問為何我仍憂悒？
ContentEN: Say, why do I languish and pine?

ContentCN: 為何嚴冬這樣久長？
ContentEN: And why are my winters so long?

ContentCN: 或將黑雲趕離我天，
ContentEN: Oh, drive these dark clouds from the sky,

ContentCN: 恢復你的歡樂同在；
ContentEN: Thy soul-cheering presence restore;

ContentCN: 或接我到你的面前，
ContentEN: Or take me to Thee up on high,

ContentCN: 無冬昏昧，無雲靉靆。
ContentEN: Where winter and clouds are no more.

ContentCN: 惟主耶穌沐我心靈﹐
ContentEN: All that thrills my soul is Jesus,

ContentCN: 寶貴遠勝我生命﹐
ContentEN: He is more than life to me;

ContentCN: 千萬人中祂最榮美﹐
ContentEN: And the fairest of ten thousand,

ContentCN: 合當永頌主尊名。
ContentEN: In my blessed Lord I see.

ContentCN: 誰如耶穌樂我心靈﹐
ContentEN: Who can cheer the heart like Jesus,

ContentCN: 藉祂神聖的同在﹖
ContentEN: By His presence all divine?

ContentCN: 信實溫柔無限寶貴﹐
ContentEN: True and tender, pure and precious,

ContentCN: 何等福分主屬我﹗
ContentEN: O how blest to call Him mine!

ContentCN: 惟主耶穌沐我心靈﹐
ContentEN: All that thrills my soul is Jesus,

ContentCN: 寶貴遠勝我生命﹐
ContentEN: He is more than life to me;

ContentCN: 千萬人中祂最榮美﹐
ContentEN: And the fairest of ten thousand,

ContentCN: 合當永頌主尊名。
ContentEN: In my blessed Lord I see.

ContentCN: 主的大愛何等豐富﹐
ContentEN: Love of Christ so freely given,

ContentCN: 主的恩典何難測﹔
ContentEN: Grace of God beyond degree,

ContentCN: 主的憐憫高過諸天﹐
ContentEN: Mercy higher than the heaven,

ContentCN: 最深淵海無可比。
ContentEN: Deeper than the deepest sea.

ContentCN: 惟主耶穌沐我心靈﹐
ContentEN: All that thrills my soul is Jesus,

ContentCN: 寶貴遠勝我生命﹐
ContentEN: He is more than life to me;

ContentCN: 千萬人中祂最榮美﹐
ContentEN: And the fairest of ten thousand,

ContentCN: 合當永頌主尊名。
ContentEN: In my blessed Lord I see.

ContentCN: 何等奇妙救贖恩功﹐
ContentEN: What a wonderful redemption!

ContentCN: 遠非心思能明白﹔
ContentEN: Never can a mortal know

ContentCN: 我眾罪孽雖如硃紅﹐
ContentEN: How my sin, tho' red like crimson,

ContentCN: 今白如雪全洗淨。
ContentEN: Can be whiter than the snow.

ContentEN: All that thrills my soul is Jesus,

ContentEN: He is more than life to me;

ContentCN: 合當永頌主尊名。
ContentEN: In my blessed Lord I see.

ContentCN: 世界雖大﹐我心雖小﹐
ContentEN: Though very great is all the world

ContentCN: 大者難使小者富﹔
ContentEN: And very small is my own heart,

ContentCN: 小小之心所有需要﹐
ContentEN: Yet this great world with all its wealth

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌能滿足。
ContentEN: Can fill this small heart but in part.

ContentCN: 祂的豐滿我不能言！
ContentEN: He is so rich! He is so full!

ContentCN: 但這豐滿我知道﹔
ContentEN: How can I tell all that I know?

ContentCN: 祂的自己真是甘甜！
ContentEN: He is so sweet! He is so true!

ContentCN: 而這甘甜我嘗到。
ContentEN: This I have tasted in my soul.

ContentCN: 有了耶穌我能歡唱﹐
ContentEN: When I have Christ, I sing with joy;

ContentCN: 沒有耶穌我憂鬱﹔
ContentEN: When I have not, I sigh in woe.

ContentCN: 耶穌同在就是天堂﹐
ContentEN: Where Jesus is, 'tis heaven here;

ContentCN: 耶穌不在是地獄。
ContentEN: Where He is not, 'tis hell below.

ContentCN: 以愛為旗在我以上，以愛為旗在我以上，
ContentEN: His banner over me is love, His banner over me is love,

ContentCN: 祂帶我進入祂的筵宴所，
ContentEN: He brought me into His banqueting House

ContentCN: 並以愛為旗在我以上。
ContentEN: And His banner over me is love.

ContentCN: 以愛，以愛，以愛為旗在我以上，
ContentEN: Is love, is love, His banner over me is love.

ContentCN: 祂帶我進入祂的筵宴所，
ContentEN: He brought me into His banqueting House

ContentCN: 並以愛為旗在我以上。
ContentEN: And His banner over me is love.

ContentCN: 勝過作君王﹐雖統治萬方﹐
ContentEN: Than to be the king of a vast domain,

ContentCN: 卻仍受罪惡捆綁﹔
ContentEN: And be held in sin's dread sway;

ContentCN: 我寧願有耶穌﹐勝於世上
ContentEN: I'd rather have Jesus than anything,

ContentCN: 榮華、富貴、聲望。
ContentEN: This world affords today.

ContentCN: 我寧願有耶穌﹐勝於金銀﹐
ContentEN: I'd rather have Jesus than silver or gold,

ContentCN: 我寧屬耶穌﹐勝過財富無邊﹔
ContentEN: I'd rather be His than have riches untold;

ContentCN: 我寧願有耶穌﹐勝過地土﹐
ContentEN: I'd rather have Jesus than houses or lands,

ContentCN: 願主釘痕手引導我前途。
ContentEN: I'd rather be led by His nail-pierced hand.

ContentCN: 勝過作君王﹐雖統治萬方﹐
ContentEN: Than to be the king of a vast domain,

ContentCN: 卻仍受罪惡捆綁﹔
ContentEN: And be held in sin's dread sway;

ContentCN: 我寧願有耶穌﹐勝於世上
ContentEN: I'd rather have Jesus than anything,

ContentCN: 榮華、富貴、聲望。
ContentEN: This world affords today.

ContentCN: 我寧願有耶穌﹐勝於稱揚﹐
ContentEN: I'd rather have Jesus than men's applause,

ContentCN: 我寧忠於主﹐滿足主的心腸﹔
ContentEN: I'd rather be faithful to His dear cause;

ContentCN: 我寧願有耶穌﹐勝於美名﹐
ContentEN: I'd rather have Jesus than world wide fame,

ContentCN: 願對主忠誠﹐宣揚主聖名。
ContentEN: I'd rather be true to His holy name.

ContentCN: 勝過作君王﹐雖統治萬方﹐
ContentEN: Than to be the king of a vast domain,

ContentCN: 卻仍受罪惡捆綁﹔
ContentEN: And be held in sin's dread sway;

ContentCN: 我寧願有耶穌﹐勝於世上
ContentEN: I'd rather have Jesus than anything,

ContentCN: 榮華、富貴、聲望。
ContentEN: This world affords today.

ContentCN: 祂是美中最美﹐遠勝百合﹐
ContentEN: He's fairer than lilies of rarest bloom,

ContentCN: 祂是甜中甜﹐遠勝蜂房滴蜜﹐
ContentEN: He's sweeter than honey from out the comb;

ContentCN: 祂是一切一切﹐餵我饑靈﹔
ContentEN: He's all that my hungering spirit needs,

ContentCN: 寧願有耶穌﹐跟隨祂率領。
ContentEN: I'd rather have Jesus and let Him lead.

ContentCN: 祂是一切最親﹐
ContentEN: He is most dear to me,

ContentCN: 我所一切最愛﹔
ContentEN: The loveliest of all,

ContentCN: 人生平常所尋﹐
ContentEN: One whom my soul does seek,

ContentCN: 人生終久所賴。
ContentEN: On whom I ever call.

ContentCN: 缺乏之時﹐預備﹐
ContentEN: He is my aid, in need,

ContentCN: 無倚之時﹐扶持，
ContentEN: My help, in helpless hours;

ContentCN: 所有美時﹐最美﹐
ContentEN: Most precious at all times,

ContentCN: 無論何時﹐信實。
ContentEN: Most faithful at all hours.

ContentCN: 無窮喜樂﹐原因﹐
ContentEN: He is my endless joy,

ContentCN: 年日展開﹐不改﹔
ContentEN: Changeless as years go by;

ContentCN: 祂是一切最親﹐
ContentEN: He is most dear to me,

ContentCN: 我所一切最愛。
ContentEN: No greater love have I.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐只要一想到祢﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, the very thought of Thee,

ContentCN: 我心就滿甘甜﹔
ContentEN: With sweetness fills my breast;

ContentCN: 但這甘甜還遠不及
ContentEN: But sweeter far Thy face to see,

ContentCN: 親眼看見祢面。
ContentEN: And in Thy presence rest.

ContentCN: 無口能唱﹐無心能思﹐
ContentEN: Nor voice can sing, nor heart can frame,

ContentCN: 也無記性能憶﹐
ContentEN: Nor can the mem'ry find

ContentCN: 一種聲音比祢名字﹐
ContentEN: A sweeter sound than Thy blest Name,

ContentCN: 更為甘甜、可喜﹗
ContentEN: O Savior of mankind!

ContentCN: 祢是痛悔者的希望﹐
ContentEN: O Hope of every contrite heart,

ContentCN: 溫柔者的喜樂﹔
ContentEN: O Joy of all the meek,

ContentCN: 祢對尋求者何善良﹐
ContentEN: To those who fall, how kind Thou art!

ContentCN: 跌倒者何仁德。
ContentEN: How good to those who seek!

ContentCN: 但對尋得祢者如何﹖
ContentEN: But what to those who find? Ah, this

ContentCN: 無口無筆能述﹔
ContentEN: Nor tongue nor pen can show;

ContentCN: 耶穌的愛﹐其深、其闊﹐
ContentEN: The love of Jesus, what it is

ContentCN: 惟被愛者略熟。
ContentEN: None but His loved ones know.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹗祢是世人之光﹐
ContentEN: O Jesus, light of all below!

ContentCN: 祢是生命之源﹗
ContentEN: Thou fount of life and fire!

ContentCN: 遠超一切我所能享、
ContentEN: Surpassing all the joys we know,

ContentCN: 一切我所能羨。
ContentEN: And all we can desire.

ContentCN: 祢外我無別的源頭
ContentEN: No other source have we but Thee,

ContentCN: 能解我心乾渴﹔
ContentEN: Soul-thirst to satisfy!

ContentCN: 無窮寶泉﹗活水湧流﹗
ContentEN: Exhaustless spring! the waters free!

ContentCN: 別流全都乾涸。
ContentEN: All other streams are dry.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐祢今是我喜樂﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, our only Joy be Thou,

ContentCN: 將來是我賞賜﹔
ContentEN: As Thou our Prize wilt be;

ContentCN: 祢是我的榮耀、詩歌﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, be Thou our Glory now,

ContentCN: 從今直到永世。
ContentEN: And through eternity.

ContentCN: 救主耶穌，愛者之樂，世人之光，生命之歌；
ContentEN: Jesus, Thou Joy of loving hearts, Thou Fount of life, Thou Light of men,

ContentCN: 世上福樂我盡撇棄，再帶虛心向你投依。
ContentEN: From the best bliss that earth imparts, We turn unfilled to Thee again.

ContentCN: 你是真理，永存不變，凡呼求者必蒙救援，
ContentEN: Thy truth unchanged hath ever stood, Thou savest those that on Thee call;

ContentCN: 凡尋求者必能尋見，凡尋見者必蒙恩眷。
ContentEN: To them that seek Thee, Thou art good, To them that find Thee, all in all.

ContentCN: 不論一生境遇如何，我靈慕主如饑如渴；
ContentEN: Our restless spirits yearn for Thee, Where’er our changeful lot is cast;

ContentCN: 見主笑臉我便心悅，以信靠主福樂無缺。
ContentEN: Glad when Thy gracious smile we see, Blest when our faith can hold Thee fast.

ContentCN: 求主耶穌與我同行，時刻賜我平安、光明；
ContentEN: O Jesus, ever with us stay, Make all our moments calm and bright;

ContentCN: 驅除一切罪惡黑影聖潔之光照遍四境。
ContentEN: Chase the dark night of sin away, Shed o’er the world Thy holy light.

ContentCN: 主，我還有誰在天上？
ContentEN: Whom have I, Lord, in heav’n but Thee?

ContentCN: 惟有你！惟有你！
ContentEN: None but Thee! None but Thee!

ContentCN: 我的一生只此可唱：
ContentEN: And this my song thro’ life shall be:

ContentCN: 主為我！主為我！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 祂已為我流血辛勞，
ContentEN: He hath for me the serpent trod,

ContentCN: 祂作我的贖罪羊羔；
ContentEN: He hath redeemed me “by His blood,”

ContentCN: 使我這人與神和好，
ContentEN: And reconciled my soul to God;

ContentCN: 主為我！主為我！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 我不追求自私福氣，
ContentEN: I envy not the rich their joys;

ContentCN: 我要主！我要主！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 我不羨慕鍍金玩意，
ContentEN: I covet not earth’s glitt’ring toys:

ContentCN: 我要主！我要主！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 自私福氣不能長久，
ContentEN: Earth can no lasting bliss bestow,

ContentCN: 性質定規瞬息罷休，
ContentEN: “Fading” is stamped on all below;

ContentCN: 我的喜樂永遠存留，
ContentEN: Mine is a joy no end can know:

ContentCN: 我要主！我要主！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 我今棄絕為富思想，
ContentEN: Though with the poor be cast my lot:

ContentCN: 主為我！主為我！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 我不盼望自己安享，
ContentEN: “He knoweth best,” I murmur not;

ContentCN: 主為我！主為我！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 無花果樹雖不發旺，
ContentEN: Though “vine” and “fig-tree” blight assail,

ContentCN: 葡萄、橄欖無一可享；
ContentEN: The “labor of the olive fail,”

ContentCN: 棚內無牛，圈中無羊，
ContentEN: And death o’er flock and herd prevail;

ContentCN: 主為我！主為我！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 我心現今完全安息，
ContentEN: Though I am now on hostile ground,

ContentCN: 主為我！主為我！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 不怕試探常來攻擊，
ContentEN: And sin beset me all around,

ContentCN: 主為我！主為我！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 任憑引誘力量洶湧，
ContentEN: Let earth her fiercest battles wage,

ContentCN: 我們靠主能夠強勇，
ContentEN: And foes against my soul engage,

ContentCN: 能夠冷笑它們無用，
ContentEN: Strong in His strength I scorn their rage;

ContentCN: 主為我！主為我！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 當我人生路程將畢，
ContentEN: And when my life draws to its close,

ContentCN: 我要主！我要主！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 安全倚靠祂的手臂，
ContentEN: Safe in His arms I shall repose,

ContentCN: 我要主！我要主！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 我的軀殼雖有痛苦，
ContentEN: When sharpest pains my frame pervade,

ContentCN: 所有自然力量都無，
ContentEN: And all the powers of nature fade,

ContentCN: 我仍高聲歌唱歡呼，
ContentEN: Still will I sing through death’s cold shade:

ContentCN: 我要主！我要主！
ContentEN: Christ for me! Christ for me!

ContentCN: 永遠住在我心，耶穌屬我；
ContentEN: Constantly abiding, Jesus is mine;

ContentCN: 永遠住在我心，無窮喜樂；
ContentEN: Constantly abiding, rapture divine;

ContentCN: 祂永不會離棄我，慈聲對我說：
ContentEN: He never leaves me lonely, whispers O so kind:

ContentCN: “我永不離棄你，”耶穌屬我。
ContentEN: “I will never leave thee,” Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 有平安在我心，
ContentEN: There’s a peace in my heart

ContentCN: 非世界所能賜，
ContentEN: That the world never gave,

ContentCN: 這平安無人能奪去；
ContentEN: A peace it can not take away;

ContentCN: 雖一生多試煉，
ContentEN: Tho’ the trials of life

ContentCN: 如愁雲環繞我，
ContentEN: May surround like a cloud,

ContentCN: 這平安永遠住在我心。
ContentEN: I’ve a peace that has come there to stay!

ContentCN: 永遠住在我心，耶穌屬我；
ContentEN: Constantly abiding, Jesus is mine;

ContentCN: 永遠住在我心，無窮喜樂；
ContentEN: Constantly abiding, rapture divine;

ContentCN: 祂永不會離棄我，慈聲對我說：
ContentEN: He never leaves me lonely, whispers O so kind:

ContentCN: “我永不離棄你，”耶穌屬我。
ContentEN: “I will never leave thee,” Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 全世界都洋溢
ContentEN: All the world seemed to sing

ContentCN: 我救主君王頌，
ContentEN: Of a Savior and King,

ContentCN: 當平安甘甜滿我心；
ContentEN: When peace sweetly came to my heart:

ContentCN: 眾愁苦皆逃避，
ContentEN: Troubles all fled away

ContentCN: 使黑夜變白晝，
ContentEN: And my night turned to day,

ContentCN: 何榮耀，何有福，我耶穌！
ContentEN: Blessed Jesus, how glorious Thou art!

ContentCN: 永遠住在我心，耶穌屬我；
ContentEN: Constantly abiding, Jesus is mine;

ContentCN: 永遠住在我心，無窮喜樂；
ContentEN: Constantly abiding, rapture divine;

ContentCN: 祂永不會離棄我，慈聲對我說：
ContentEN: He never leaves me lonely, whispers O so kind:

ContentCN: “我永不離棄你，”耶穌屬我。
ContentEN: “I will never leave thee,” Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 我已有“這珍寶，”
ContentEN: This treasure I have

ContentCN: 深藏我心殿中，
ContentEN: In a temple of clay,

ContentCN: 正當流浪崎嶇世途；
ContentEN: While here on His footstool I roam;

ContentCN: 哦，榮耀之大日，
ContentEN: But He’s coming to take

ContentCN: 祂必來提我去，
ContentEN: Me some glorious day,

ContentCN: 平安回到我天父家中。
ContentEN: Over there to my heavenly home!

ContentCN: 主永遠的愛愛我﹐
ContentEN: Loved with ever-lasting love,

ContentCN: 這愛藉恩我深知﹔
ContentEN: Led by grace that love to know;

ContentCN: 聖靈從上正輕語﹐
ContentEN: Spirit, breathing from above,

ContentCN: 為將此愛來指示。
ContentEN: Thou hast taught me it is so.

ContentCN: 哦﹐這豐滿的平安﹗
ContentEN: Oh, this full and perfect peace!

ContentCN: 哦﹐這神聖的歡樂﹗
ContentEN: Oh, the transport all divine!

ContentCN: 在這不息愛裏面﹐
ContentEN: In a love which cannot cease,

ContentCN: 我是屬祂﹐祂屬我﹔
ContentEN: I am His, and He is mine;

ContentCN: 在這不息愛裏面﹐
ContentEN: In a love which cannot cease,

ContentCN: 我是屬祂﹐祂屬我。
ContentEN: I am His, and He is mine.

ContentCN: 頭上之天何蔚藍﹐
ContentEN: Heaven above is softer blue,

ContentCN: 四周之地也青綠﹔
ContentEN: Earth around is sweeter green;

ContentCN: 有一景色更鮮艷﹐
ContentEN: Something lives in every hue

ContentCN: 無主之目從未睹﹔
ContentEN: Christless eyes have never seen;

ContentCN: 鳥鳴聲音更可悅﹐
ContentEN: Birds with gladder songs o'erflow,

ContentCN: 花美使我更快活﹔
ContentEN: Flow'rs with deeper beauties shine,

ContentCN: 自從我心能領略﹕
ContentEN: Since I know, as now I know,

ContentCN: 我是屬祂﹐祂屬我﹔
ContentEN: I am His, and He is mine.

ContentCN: 自從我心能領略﹕
ContentEN: Since I know, as now I know,

ContentCN: 我是屬祂﹐祂屬我。
ContentEN: I am His, and He is mine.

ContentCN: 有事曾使我驚恐﹐
ContentEN: Things that once were wild alarms

ContentCN: 今不再擾我安息﹔
ContentEN: Cannot now disturb my rest;

ContentCN: 靠在永久膀臂中﹐
ContentEN: Closed in everlasting arms,

ContentCN: 枕在愛的胸懷裏。
ContentEN: Pillowed on the loving breast.

ContentCN: 哦﹐願永遠臥於此﹐
ContentEN: Oh, to lie forever here,

ContentCN: 憂疑、自己﹐全逃脫﹔
ContentEN: Doubt and care and self resign,

ContentCN: 當祂柔聲的指示﹐
ContentEN: While He whispers in my ear,

ContentCN: 我是屬祂﹐祂屬我﹔
ContentEN: I am His, and He is mine.

ContentCN: 當祂柔聲的指示﹐
ContentEN: While He whispers in my ear,

ContentCN: 我是屬祂﹐祂屬我。
ContentEN: I am His, and He is mine.

ContentCN: 我是永遠只屬祂﹐
ContentEN: His forever, only His:

ContentCN: 誰能使祂與我分?
ContentEN: Who the Lord and me shall part?

ContentCN: 祂在我心來安家﹐
ContentEN: Ah, with what a rest of bliss

ContentCN: 有福安息滿我心。
ContentEN: Christ can fill the loving heart.

ContentCN: 天地可以都廢去﹐
ContentEN: Heav’n and earth may fade and flee,

ContentCN: 日月也可全衰落﹔
ContentEN: Firstborn light in gloom decline;

ContentCN: 但主與我永同居﹐
ContentEN: But, while God and I shall be,

ContentCN: 我是屬祂﹐祂屬我﹔
ContentEN: I am His, and He is mine.

ContentCN: 但主與我永同居﹐
ContentEN: But, while God and I shall be,

ContentCN: 我是屬祂﹐祂屬我。
ContentEN: I am His, and He is mine.

ContentCN: 哦，在榮耀裡的基督，已將我心全照亮；
ContentEN: Marvel not that Christ in glory All my inmost heart hath won;

ContentCN: 非像微星暗中光顧，乃是明光勝太陽。
ContentEN: Not a star to cheer my darkness, But a light beyond the sun.

ContentCN: 地上全是黑暗、陰影，無何能以得我心，
ContentEN: All below lies dark and shadowed, Nothing here to claim my heart,

ContentCN: 惟祂所行艱苦途徑，值得我心來寶珍。
ContentEN: Save the lonely track of sorrow Where of old He walked apart.

ContentCN: 世人乃靠屬地之光，艱苦疲困度人生；
ContentEN: Others in the earthly sunshine, Wearily may journey on,

ContentCN: 我見之光來自天上，遠勝午日放光明；
ContentEN: I have seen a light from heaven, Past the brightness of the sun-

ContentCN: 毫無遮蔽，永不衰虧，使我得見祂榮面，
ContentEN: Light that knows no cloud, no waning, Light wherein I see His face,

ContentCN: 和祂愛的無限寶貴，並祂恩典的豐滿。
ContentEN: All His love’s uncounted treasures, All the riches of His grace:

ContentCN: 得見祂的奇妙榮耀，並祂更妙的奇愛；
ContentEN: All the wonders of His glory, Deeper wonders of His love-

ContentCN: 如何為我已經得到高超地位到萬代。
ContentEN: How for me He won, He keepeth, That high standing all above;

ContentCN: 幔子已撤，非僅一瞥，乃是幔內來安居；
ContentEN: Not a glimpse-the veil uplifted- But within the veil to dwell,

ContentCN: 注視祂面，無間無歇，得聽隱密的話語。
ContentEN: Gazing on His face forever; Hearing words unspeakable.

ContentCN: 我已看見基督榮面，別事請勿向我題；
ContentEN: I have seen the face of Jesus- Tell me not of aught beside;

ContentCN: 我已聽見祂的恩言，這已夠使我滿意。
ContentEN: I have heard the voice of Jesus- All my soul is satisfied.

ContentCN: 藉祂榮耀所發光輝，可頌榮面我已見，
ContentEN: In the radiance of the glory, First I saw His blessed face,

ContentCN: 這個榮耀且要成為，我的住處到永遠。
ContentEN: And forever shall that glory, Be my home, my dwelling-place.

ContentCN: 我要抬頭﹐向眾山嶺舉目﹐切切仰望﹕
ContentEN: Unto the hills around do I lift up my longing eyes;

ContentCN: 我要抬頭﹐向眾山嶺舉目﹐切切仰望﹕
ContentEN: Unto the hills around do I lift up my longing eyes;

ContentCN: 我要抬頭﹐向眾山嶺舉目﹐切切仰望﹕
ContentEN: Unto the hills around do I lift up my longing eyes;

ContentCN: 我要抬頭﹐向眾山嶺舉目﹐切切仰望﹕
ContentEN: Unto the hills around do I lift up my longing eyes;

ContentCN: 我的幫助﹐我切需的幫助﹐來自何方﹖
ContentEN: O whence for me shall my salvation come, from whence arise?

ContentCN: 因祢保守從今時到永遠。
ContentEN: Shall keep thee henceforth, yea, forevermore.

ContentCN: 因祢保守從今時到永遠。
ContentEN: Shall keep thee henceforth, yea, forevermore.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌，惟有耶穌，惟祂使我滿足;
ContentEN: Only Jesus! Only Jesus! Only He can satisfy;

ContentCN: 當我知道有我主親近，一切重擔變祝福。
ContentEN: Ev’ry burden becomes a blessing, when I know my Lord is nigh.

ContentCN: 我已尋獲主耶穌作避難所，
ContentEN: I’ve found a refuge from life’s care in Jesus,

ContentCN: 在祂愛中，我得享穩妥；
ContentEN: I am hiding in His love divine;

ContentCN: 祂完全領會我深處的饑渴，
ContentEN: He fully understands my soul’s deep longing,

ContentCN: 就柔聲對我說：“你屬我！”
ContentEN: And He whispers softly, “Thou art mine.”

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌，惟有耶穌，惟祂使我滿足;
ContentEN: Only Jesus! Only Jesus! Only He can satisfy;

ContentCN: 當我知道有我主親近，一切重擔變祝福。
ContentEN: Ev’ry burden becomes a blessing, when I know my Lord is nigh.

ContentCN: 我已尋獲主耶穌作我喜樂，
ContentEN: I’ve found a precious joy in knowing Jesus,

ContentCN: 愁苦世人從夢想不到；
ContentEN: Never dreamed of in this world of woe;

ContentCN: 儘管烏雲再黑，也不能掩遮
ContentEN: No clouds, however dark, can dim the radiance

ContentCN: 祂賜屬天光輝的榮耀。
ContentEN: Of the heav’nly light He doth bestow.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌，惟有耶穌，惟祂使我滿足;
ContentEN: Only Jesus! Only Jesus! Only He can satisfy;

ContentCN: 當我知道有我主親近，一切重擔變祝福。
ContentEN: Ev’ry burden becomes a blessing, when I know my Lord is nigh.

ContentCN: 我已尋獲主耶穌作我盼望，
ContentEN: I’ve found a blessed hope divine in Jesus,

ContentCN: 有如旭日越照越明朗；
ContentEN: ‘Tis a Day Star ever shining bright;

ContentCN: 叫我在地路程滿了天榮光，
ContentEN: It fills my earthly way with heav’nly glory,

ContentCN: 所有人生幽暗變光亮。
ContentEN: And it turns life’s darkness into light.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！我尋得祂–我靈久慕，心所求；
ContentEN: Hallelujah! I have found Him Whom my soul so long has craved!

ContentCN: 耶穌滿足我所缺乏，藉祂生命我得救。
ContentEN: Jesus satisfies my longings, Thro’ His life I now am saved.

ContentCN: 我今屬於主耶穌，主耶穌也屬我，
ContentEN: Now I belong to Jesus, Jesus belongs to me,

ContentCN: 並非暫時與祂結聯，乃是直到永遠。
ContentEN: Not for the years of time alone, But for eternity.

ContentCN: 耶穌我救主愛我無止息，
ContentEN: Jesus my Lord will love me forever,

ContentCN: 無權勢能叫我與主分離，
ContentEN: From Him no pow’r of evil can sever,

ContentCN: 為救贖我捨命於十架，
ContentEN: He gave His life to ransom my soul,

ContentCN: 我今永遠屬祂。
ContentEN: Now I belong to Him.

ContentCN: 我今屬於主耶穌，主耶穌也屬我，
ContentEN: Now I belong to Jesus, Jesus belongs to me,

ContentCN: 並非暫時與祂結聯，乃是直到永遠。
ContentEN: Not for the years of time alone, But for eternity.

ContentCN: 從前在罪中我迷醉浮沉，
ContentEN: Once I was lost in sin’s degradation,

ContentCN: 耶穌降世為我帶來救恩；
ContentEN: Jesus came down to bring me salvation,

ContentCN: 拯救我脫離羞恥、懼怕，
ContentEN: Lifted me up from sorrow and shame,

ContentCN: 我今永遠屬祂。
ContentEN: Now I belong to Him.

ContentCN: 我今屬於主耶穌，主耶穌也屬我，
ContentEN: Now I belong to Jesus, Jesus belongs to me,

ContentCN: 並非暫時與祂結聯，乃是直到永遠。
ContentEN: Not for the years of time alone, But for eternity.

ContentCN: 喜樂溢我魂，因我蒙拯救；
ContentEN: Joy floods my soul for Jesus has saved me,

ContentCN: 前我為罪奴，今得主自由；
ContentEN: Freed me from sin that long had enslaved me,

ContentCN: 為救贖我，祂寶血流下，
ContentEN: His precious blood He gave to redeem,

ContentCN: 我今永遠屬祂。
ContentEN: Now I belong to Him.

ContentCN: 美哉，主耶穌，
ContentEN: Fairest Lord Jesus!

ContentCN: 統管宇宙萬物，
ContentEN: Ruler of all nature,

ContentCN: 道成肉身，人世親臨；
ContentEN: O Thou of God and man the Son!

ContentCN: 我心所珍愛，
ContentEN: Thee will I cherish,

ContentCN: 我靈所感戴，
ContentEN: Thee will I honor,

ContentCN: 我的榮耀、冠冕、歡欣！
ContentEN: Thou, my soul’s glory, joy, and crown!

ContentCN: 草地何青綠！
ContentEN: Fair are the meadows,

ContentCN: 樹木更加悅目！
ContentEN: Fairer still the woodlands,

ContentCN: 披著春光盛開爭艷！
ContentEN: Robed in the blooming garb of spring:

ContentCN: 耶穌更鮮艷！
ContentEN: Jesus is fairer,

ContentCN: 耶穌更香甜！
ContentEN: Jesus is purer,

ContentCN: 傷痛之心因祂歡讚。
ContentEN: Who makes the woeful heart to sing.

ContentCN: 日光何晴美！
ContentEN: Fair is the sunshine,

ContentCN: 月光更加明媚！
ContentEN: Fairer still the moonlight,

ContentCN: 群星閃爍，光輝奪目，
ContentEN: And all the twinkling starry host:

ContentCN: 耶穌更明亮！
ContentEN: Jesus shines brighter,

ContentCN: 耶穌更晴朗！
ContentEN: Jesus shines purer,

ContentCN: 勝過天上一切景物！
ContentEN: Than all the angels heav’n can boast.

ContentCN: 所有的美麗，
ContentEN: All scenes of beauty,

ContentCN: 在天或是在地，
ContentEN: All on earth, above the sky,

ContentCN: 在你身上全都見到；
ContentEN: Are to be found, O Lord, in Thee.

ContentCN: 無何更光彩！
ContentEN: None can be brighter,

ContentCN: 無何更可愛！
ContentEN: None can be sweeter,

ContentCN: 惟我救主，你最高超！
ContentEN: Than Jesus, Lord, Thou art to me.

ContentCN: 今世福樂沒滅，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Fade, fade, each earthly joy, Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 地上愛情斷絕，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Break ev’ry tender tie; Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 在此幽暗野地，無處可以安息，
ContentEN: Dark is the wilderness, Earth has no resting place,

ContentCN: 惟有基督可倚，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Jesus alone can bless; Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 莫誘我心離開，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Tempt not my soul away; Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 我願與主同在，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Here would I ever stay; Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 你這今世歡娛，一時騙人之局，
ContentEN: Perishing things of clay, Born but for one brief day,

ContentCN: 從我心中離去，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Pass from my heart away; Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 去罷，今世幻夢，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Farewell, ye dreams of night; Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 我今已經清醒，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Lost in this dawning bright; Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 凡我從前所慕，不過使我痛苦；
ContentEN: All that my soul has tried left but a dismal void;

ContentCN: 惟主使我滿足，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Jesus has satisfied; Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 去罷，短暫今時，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Farewell, mortality; Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 來罷，長久永世，基督屬我！
ContentEN: Welcome, eternity; Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 來罷，可愛福氣！來罷，甜美安息！
ContentEN: Welcome, O Loved and Blest, Welcome, sweet scenes of rest,

ContentCN: 來罷，恩主自己！基督屬我！
ContentEN: Welcome, my Savior’s breast; Jesus is mine.

ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 耶穌，耶穌，祂乃是我滿足！

ContentCN: 是祂消除我的要求，平靜我的意願。

ContentCN: 祂愛比死更堅強，眾水不能淹沒。

ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂愛比死更堅強，眾水不能淹沒。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 願我的所愛到這裏來，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 與我永同在，嘗我純潔愛；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 與我永同在，嘗我純潔愛。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 除你以外，在高天我還可以有誰？
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 除你以外，在人間我也別無所歸。

ContentCN: 祢名似膏香﹐祢愛比酒美﹐
ContentEN: Thy name is sweet as ointment poured forth;

ContentCN: 祢若來吸引﹐有誰不跟隨﹖
ContentEN: Better Thy love than wine. O draw Thou me!

ContentCN: 我們若跟隨羊群的腳蹤﹐
ContentEN: If we but trace the footsteps of the flock,

ContentCN: 我們必進入祢愛的交通。
ContentEN: Brought in Thy fellowship of love we'll be.

ContentCN: 祂是我良人﹐我是祂佳偶﹐
ContentEN: He's my Beloved, I am His own love;

ContentCN: 祂將我吸引﹐我將祂追求﹔
ContentEN: He draweth me, pursue I after Him.

ContentCN: 祂香如沒藥﹐我願藏心房﹐
ContentEN: Fragrant as myrrh, I'd hide Him in my heart;

ContentCN: 祂美似鳳仙﹐我願戴身上。
ContentEN: Beauteous as henna, I'd be clothed with Him.

ContentCN: 進入祂愛裏﹐享受祂肥甘﹐
ContentEN: Bathe in His love, and of His fatness taste,

ContentCN: 躺在祂懷中﹐飽嘗祂香甜﹔
ContentEN: Lie on His breast, His sweetness there enjoy;

ContentCN: 祂愛為旌旗﹐將我身遮藏﹐
ContentEN: His love the banner, His affection shown

ContentCN: 祂情似美物﹐使我心舒暢。
ContentEN: Tenderly soothes my heart to purest joy.

ContentCN: 良人屬於我﹐我也屬於祂﹐
ContentEN: Oh, my Beloved's mine, and I am His;

ContentCN: 祂是牧養者﹐我是百合花。
ContentEN: I am a lily and my Shepherd He;

ContentCN: 惟願天快曙﹐黑影全飛散﹐
ContentEN: May daybreak come, the shadows flee away,

ContentCN: 見祂如朝鹿﹐顯在比特山。
ContentEN: Him on the mountains as a hart I'd see.

ContentCN: 同死的沒藥﹐復活的乳香﹐
ContentEN: Come Thou, with myrrh of death and frankincense

ContentCN: 來將我薰透﹐好給祂欣賞﹔
ContentEN: Of resurrection, permeate my heart;

ContentCN: 北風阿﹐興起﹔南風阿﹐吹來﹐
ContentEN: Awake, O north wind, let the south wind come

ContentCN: 來使我心園﹐成為祂心愛。
ContentEN: Make my heart's garden pleasant to His heart.

ContentCN: 願在祂眼中﹐美麗如良鴿﹐
ContentEN: I'd be to Him a dove that's undefiled,

ContentCN: 願在祂面前﹐皎潔似百合﹔
ContentEN: As a pure lily in His presence be,

ContentCN: 願我全屬祂﹐作祂樂中樂﹐
ContentEN: His, wholly His, the joy of all His joys,

ContentCN: 像祂全屬我﹐是我歌中歌。
ContentEN: He wholly mine, the Song of songs to me.

ContentCN: 美麗如月亮﹐得有祂形像﹐
ContentEN: Fair as the moon, conformed to Him I'd be,

ContentCN: 光明似太陽﹐得有祂身量﹔
ContentEN: Clear as the sun, unto His stature grown;

ContentCN: 全屬我良人﹐使祂命顯彰﹐
ContentEN: For my Beloved, all to please His heart,

ContentCN: 全為我良人﹐使祂心舒暢。
ContentEN: For my Beloved, that His life be shown.

ContentCN: 祢是我生命﹐我是祢活像﹐
ContentEN: Thou art my life, and I Thine image real;

ContentCN: 愛情的聯結﹐如死之堅強﹐
ContentEN: Love in such union is as death most strong,

ContentCN: 無何能消滅﹐無何能替換﹐
ContentEN: Ne'er can it be destroyed or e'er replaced

ContentCN: 直到祢顯現﹐在那香草山。
ContentEN: Till Thou on mounts of spices come ere long.

ContentCN: 主阿，在你面前我心何其樂！
ContentEN: O Thou, in whose presence my soul takes delight,

ContentCN: 遭難時你懷中可投；
ContentEN: On whom in affliction I call,

ContentCN: 我白晝之安慰，我黑夜之歌，
ContentEN: My comfort by day and my song in the night,

ContentCN: 我指望，我救主，我友！
ContentEN: My hope, my salvation, my all!

ContentCN: 哎，親愛的牧者去那裏放羊？
ContentEN: Where dost Thou, dear Shepherd, resort with Thy sheep,

ContentCN: 以愛領到那塊草地？
ContentEN: To feed them in pastures of love;

ContentCN: 為何我在死蔭之幽谷心傷？
ContentEN: Say, why in the valley of death should I weep,

ContentCN: 為何我在曠野飲泣？
ContentEN: Or alone in this wilderness rove?

ContentCN: 為何我要飄流而遠離了你？
ContentEN: Oh, why should I wander, an alien from Thee,

ContentCN: 在沙漠中哭號求肉？
ContentEN: Or cry in the desert for bread?

ContentCN: 你仇敵一見我流淚必暗喜，
ContentEN: Thy foes will rejoice when my sorrows they see,

ContentCN: 必笑我因貪食淚流。
ContentEN: And smile at the tears I have shed.

ContentCN: 問錫安眾女子，請妳告訴我，
ContentEN: Ye daughters of Zion, declare, have you seen

ContentCN: 有否看見雅各之星？
ContentEN: The Star that on Israel shone?

ContentCN: 我良人曾否由妳帳棚經過？
ContentEN: Say, if in your tents my Beloved has been,

ContentCN: 祂何處將羊群前領？
ContentEN: And where with His flocks He is gone?

ContentCN: 阿，良人一舉目，眾天使下拜，
ContentEN: He looks! And ten thousands of angels rejoice,

ContentCN: 祂面前有萬軍敬候；
ContentEN: And myriads wait for His word;

ContentCN: 我良人一開口，全宇宙傳開，
ContentEN: He speaks! And eternity, filled with His voice,

ContentCN: 到永遠應聲讚美主。
ContentEN: Re-echoes the praise of the Lord.

ContentCN: 最親愛的牧者，我來跟隨你，
ContentEN: Dear Shepherd! I hear, and will follow Thy call;

ContentCN: 我認得你召我美音；
ContentEN: I know the sweet sound of Thy voice;

ContentCN: 求甦醒我靈魂，惟你合我意，
ContentEN: Restore and defend me, for Thou art my all,

ContentCN: 惟你常常滿足我心。
ContentEN: And in Thee I will ever rejoice.

ContentCN: 住在祢裏面這是我心願，
ContentEN: Abide in Thee! in that deep love of Thine.

ContentCN: 住在祢裏面時刻不間斷；
ContentEN: My Jesus, Lord, Thou Lamb of God divine;

ContentCN: 枝子如何與葡萄樹相聯，
ContentEN: Down, closely down, as living branch with tree.

ContentCN: 主我也深願住在祢裏面。
ContentEN: I would abide my Lord, my Christ, in Thee.

ContentCN: 住在祢裏面享受祢豐富，
ContentEN: Abide in Thee! my Savior God, I know

ContentCN: 祢所是一切得藉我流露；
ContentEN: How Love of Thine so vast in me may flow,

ContentCN: 願作祢身上常新的枝子，
ContentEN: My empty vessel, running o’er with joy.

ContentCN: 彰顯祢生命結果永不止。
ContentEN: Must overflow to Thee without alloy.

ContentCN: 住在祢裏面罪己失權能，
ContentEN: Abide in Thee! nor doubt, nor self, nor sin,

ContentCN: 再無法勝過祢內住生命；
ContentEN: Can e’er prevail with Thy blest life within;

ContentCN: 與祢相結聯深處互交通，
ContentEN: Joined to Thyself, communing deep, my soul

ContentCN: 靈就能管治魂一切活動。
ContentEN: Knows naught besides its motions to control.

ContentCN: 住在祢裏面得知祢心意，
ContentEN: Abide in Thee! ‘tis thus I only know

ContentCN: 摸著祢同在進入祢祕密；
ContentEN: The secrets of Thy mind e’en while below –

ContentCN: 喜樂與平安要將我充溢，
ContentEN: All joy and peace, and knowledge of Thy word,

ContentCN: 祢話的供應也作我能力。
ContentEN: All pow’r and fruit, and service for the Lord.

ContentCN: 哦，主，我已在此嘗到天堂，
ContentEN: O Lord, I know I’m tasting heaven here,

ContentCN: 我心已經再無別的盼望；
ContentEN: No other longing do I now hold dear,

ContentCN: 愛如浪潮滾滾，
ContentEN: Love like sea billows roll

ContentCN: 陣陣漫我心魂，
ContentEN: Flooding over my soul,

ContentCN: 我知現今我正住在天堂。
ContentEN: Yes, Lord, I know in heav’n I’m dwelling here.

ContentCN: 在至高者的隱密處，
ContentEN: Within His secret place I hide,

ContentCN: 在全能者的手蔭下；
ContentEN: Under His shadow I abide,

ContentCN: 我靠寶血得以進入，
ContentEN: For by His blood I’ve entered in,

ContentCN: 在彼諸天榮耀下降；
ContentEN: Heaven is bowed, glory is seen;

ContentCN: 救主衣裳將我遮藏，
ContentEN: His royal train o’er me is spread,

ContentCN: 我心歡樂我靈歌唱。
ContentEN: My heart exults a new song glad.

ContentCN: 哦，主，我已在此嘗到天堂，
ContentEN: O Lord, I know I’m tasting heaven here,

ContentCN: 我心已經再無別的盼望；
ContentEN: No other longing do I now hold dear,

ContentCN: 愛如浪潮滾滾，
ContentEN: Love like sea billows roll

ContentCN: 陣陣漫我心魂，
ContentEN: Flooding over my soul,

ContentCN: 我知現今我正住在天堂。
ContentEN: Yes, Lord, I know in heav’n I’m dwelling here.

ContentCN: 救主高踞施恩寶座，
ContentEN: Exalted on the throne of grace,

ContentCN: 召我進前瞻仰君王；
ContentEN: He bids me gaze upon His face.

ContentCN: 衣裳垂下，活水流淌，
ContentEN: His train like living water flows,

ContentCN: 賜我護庇，賜我安康；
ContentEN: Giving me shelter and repose.

ContentCN: 喜樂的油親注頭上，
ContentEN: The oil of joy He e’er bestows;

ContentCN: 我魂滿溢，何等歡暢。
ContentEN: My soul o’erflows, my hear extols.

ContentCN: 哦，主，我已在此嘗到天堂，
ContentEN: O Lord, I know I’m tasting heaven here,

ContentCN: 我心已經再無別的盼望；
ContentEN: No other longing do I now hold dear,

ContentCN: 愛如浪潮滾滾，
ContentEN: Love like sea billows roll

ContentCN: 陣陣漫我心魂，
ContentEN: Flooding over my soul,

ContentCN: 我知現今我正住在天堂。
ContentEN: Yes, Lord, I know in heav’n I’m dwelling here.

ContentCN: 榮耀重重使我俯伏，
ContentEN: His dazzling glory makes me bow;

ContentCN: 恩典浩大迫我順服；
ContentEN: His grace has won my homage now.

ContentCN: 天國勝景我已目睹，
ContentEN: I’ve seen His kingdom and I shout,

ContentCN: 罪勢、死權盡都消失；
ContentEN: Here sin and death are put to rout!

ContentCN: 愛望常新，信心飛揚，
ContentEN: Love, hope e’er fresh, faith soaring high.

ContentCN: 你已使天榮耀下降。
ContentEN: Heaven is bowed – glory is nigh!

ContentCN: 何等奇妙救主是耶穌我主﹐
ContentEN: A wonderful Saviour is Jesus my Lord,

ContentCN: 祂是我的奇妙救主！
ContentEN: A wonderful Saviour to me;

ContentCN: 祂隱藏我魂在磐石的穴中﹐
ContentEN: He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock,

ContentCN: 那裡我見樂泉湧流。
ContentEN: Where rivers of pleasure I see.

ContentCN: 祂隱藏我魂在磐石的穴中﹐
ContentEN: He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock,

ContentCN: 蔭庇乾旱疲乏之地﹔
ContentEN: That shadows a dry, thirsty land;

ContentCN: 祂將我生命藏祂愛的深處﹐
ContentEN: He hideth my life in the depths of His love,

ContentCN: 又用祂聖手來遮蔽﹐
ContentEN: And covers me there with His hand,

ContentCN: 又用祂聖手來遮蔽。
ContentEN: And covers me there with His hand.

ContentCN: 何等奇妙救主是耶穌我主,
ContentEN: A wonderful Savior is Jesus my Lord,

ContentCN: 祂背去我一切重負﹔
ContentEN: He taketh my burden away;

ContentCN: 祂用手緊握住使我不搖動﹐
ContentEN: He holdeth me up, and I shall not be moved,

ContentCN: 一生賜我力量無窮。
ContentEN: He giveth me strength as my day.

ContentCN: 祂隱藏我魂在磐石的穴中﹐
ContentEN: He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock,

ContentCN: 蔭庇乾旱疲乏之地﹔
ContentEN: That shadows a dry, thirsty land;

ContentCN: 祂將我生命藏祂愛的深處﹐
ContentEN: He hideth my life in the depths of His love,

ContentCN: 又用祂聖手來遮蔽﹐
ContentEN: And covers me there with His hand,

ContentCN: 又用祂聖手來遮蔽。
ContentEN: And covers me there with His hand.

ContentCN: 時刻祂以無窮恩典為冠冕﹐
ContentEN: With numberless blessings each moment He crowns,

ContentCN: 以祂豐滿溢我心中﹔
ContentEN: And, filled with His fullness divine,

ContentCN: 當我被提時﹐我要歌唱歡呼﹕
ContentEN: I sing in my rapture, oh, glory to God,

ContentCN: 何等奇妙我主我神！
ContentEN: For such a Redeemer as mine!

ContentCN: 祂隱藏我魂在磐石的穴中﹐
ContentEN: He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock,

ContentCN: 蔭庇乾旱疲乏之地﹔
ContentEN: That shadows a dry, thirsty land;

ContentCN: 祂將我生命藏祂愛的深處﹐
ContentEN: He hideth my life in the depths of His love,

ContentCN: 又用祂聖手來遮蔽﹐
ContentEN: And covers me there with His hand,

ContentCN: 又用祂聖手來遮蔽。
ContentEN: And covers me there with His hand.

ContentCN: 復活變化我以祂光明為衣﹐
ContentEN: When clothed in His brightness, transported I rise

ContentCN: 與祂相遇空中雲外﹔
ContentEN: To meet Him in clouds of the sky,

ContentCN: 與億萬眾聖唱在穹蒼高處﹐
ContentEN: His perfect salvation, His wonderful love,

ContentCN: 一同喊出祂愛無窮。
ContentEN: I'll shout with the millions on high.

ContentCN: 與億萬眾聖唱在穹蒼高處﹐
ContentEN: He hideth my soul in the cleft of the rock,

ContentCN: 一同喊出祂愛無窮﹔
ContentEN: That shadows a dry, thirsty land;

ContentCN: 我願將全人仍藏祂深愛中﹐
ContentEN: He hideth my life in the depths of His love,

ContentCN: 仍由祂聖手來遮蔽﹐
ContentEN: And covers me there with His hand,

ContentCN: 仍由祂聖手來遮蔽。
ContentEN: And covers me there with His hand.

ContentCN: 主耶穌，親愛救主，降自父神懷中；
ContentEN: O Jesus, blest Redeemer, Sent from the heart of God,

ContentCN: 求主使我得能力，靠近父神懷中！
ContentEN: Hold us, who wait before Thee, Near to the heart of God.

ContentCN: 有一安靜隱密之處，靠近父神懷中；
ContentEN: There is a place of quiet rest, Near to the heart of God,

ContentCN: 在彼罪惡不能侵襲，靠近父神懷中。
ContentEN: A place where sin cannot molest, Near to the heart of God.

ContentCN: 主耶穌，親愛救主，降自父神懷中；
ContentEN: O Jesus, blest Redeemer, Sent from the heart of God,

ContentCN: 求主使我得能力，靠近父神懷中！
ContentEN: Hold us, who wait before Thee, Near to the heart of God.

ContentCN: 有一甘甜安慰之處，靠近父神懷中；
ContentEN: There is a place of comfort sweet, Near to the heart of God,

ContentCN: 在彼我們與主相會，靠近父神懷中。
ContentEN: A place where we our Savior meet, Near to the heart of God.

ContentCN: 主耶穌，親愛救主，降自父神懷中；
ContentEN: O Jesus, blest Redeemer, Sent from the heart of God,

ContentCN: 求主使我得能力，靠近父神懷中！
ContentEN: Hold us, who wait before Thee, Near to the heart of God.

ContentCN: 有一自由釋放之處，靠近父神懷中；
ContentEN: There is a place of full release, Near to the heart of God,

ContentCN: 在彼充滿喜樂平安，靠近父神懷中。
ContentEN: A place where all is joy and peace, Near to the heart of God.

ContentCN: 住在主裏﹐何等甘甜﹗
ContentEN: Abiding, oh, so wondrous sweet!

ContentCN: 我今安息救主腳前﹔
ContentEN: I'm resting at the Savior's feet;

ContentCN: 完全信靠﹐完全滿足﹐
ContentEN: I trust in Him; I'm satisfied,

ContentCN: 安息在於受死的主。
ContentEN: I'm resting in the Crucified!

ContentCN: 在主裏﹐在主裏﹐哦﹐何等甘甜﹗
ContentEN: Abiding, abiding, Oh, how wondrous sweet!

ContentCN: 我安息﹐安息在救主腳前。
ContentEN: I'm resting, resting, At the Savior's feet.

ContentCN: 應當時常喜樂，當時常喜樂，
ContentEN: Then rejoice evermore, rejoice evermore;

ContentCN: 無論如何，歌唱總勝歎息，
ContentEN: It is better to sing than be sighing;

ContentCN: 無論如何，生存總勝死寂，
ContentEN: It is better to live than be dying;

ContentCN: 所以應當時常喜樂！
ContentEN: So let us rejoice evermore.

ContentCN: 哦，讓我們在主裏面常喜樂，
ContentEN: O let us rejoice in the Lord evermore,

ContentCN: 雖然遭遇了誤會、猜疑；
ContentEN: Tho’ all things around us be trying.

ContentCN: 雖然患難如同衝擊的風波，
ContentEN: Tho’ floods of affliction like sea billows roar;

ContentCN: 但是歌唱總勝似歎息。
ContentEN: It is better to sing than be sighing.

ContentCN: 應當時常喜樂，當時常喜樂，
ContentEN: Then rejoice evermore, rejoice evermore;

ContentCN: 無論如何，歌唱總勝歎息，
ContentEN: It is better to sing than be sighing;

ContentCN: 無論如何，生存總勝死寂，
ContentEN: It is better to live than be dying;

ContentCN: 所以應當時常喜樂！
ContentEN: So let us rejoice evermore.

ContentCN: 哦，讓我們在主裏面常喜樂，
ContentEN: O let us rejoice in the Lord evermore,

ContentCN: 雖然火箭暗中常紛飛；
ContentEN: When the darts of the tempter are flying.

ContentCN: 因為撒但還是像從前那樣
ContentEN: For Satan still dreads, as he oft did of yore;

ContentCN: 懼怕讚美遠過於傷悲。
ContentEN: Our singing much more than our sighing.

ContentCN: 應當時常喜樂，當時常喜樂，
ContentEN: Then rejoice evermore, rejoice evermore;

ContentCN: 無論如何，歌唱總勝歎息，
ContentEN: It is better to sing than be sighing;

ContentCN: 無論如何，生存總勝死寂，
ContentEN: It is better to live than be dying;

ContentCN: 所以應當時常喜樂！
ContentEN: So let us rejoice evermore.

ContentCN: 哦，讓我們在主裏面常喜樂，
ContentEN: O let us rejoice in the Lord evermore,

ContentCN: 雖然精神在病中消失；
ContentEN: When sickness upon us is stealing.

ContentCN: 因主的喜樂就是你的力量，
ContentEN: No cordial like gladness our strength can restore,

ContentCN: 靠主喜樂你就得醫治。
ContentEN: For joy is the fountain of healing.

ContentCN: 應當時常喜樂，當時常喜樂，
ContentEN: Then rejoice evermore, rejoice evermore;

ContentCN: 無論如何，歌唱總勝歎息，
ContentEN: It is better to sing than be sighing;

ContentCN: 無論如何，生存總勝死寂，
ContentEN: It is better to live than be dying;

ContentCN: 所以應當時常喜樂！
ContentEN: So let us rejoice evermore.

ContentCN: 哦，讓我們在主裏面常喜樂，
ContentEN: O let us rejoice in the Lord evermore,

ContentCN: 因主愛我們是愛到底；
ContentEN: For His love is love everlasting.

ContentCN: 我們要在天家與主在一起，
ContentEN: When we dwell with Him in the heavenly places,

ContentCN: 不再有何憂愁與歎息。
ContentEN: There will be no more sighing and sorrow.

ContentCN: 在祂同在的隱密處﹐
ContentEN: In the secret of His presence

ContentCN: 我得安居何甘美﹗
ContentEN: How my soul delights to hide!

ContentCN: 在祂面前時常俯伏﹐
ContentEN: Oh, how precious are the lessons

ContentCN: 所學功課何寶貴﹗
ContentEN: Which I learn at Jesus' side!

ContentCN: 憂慮不能將我攪擾﹐
ContentEN: Earthly cares can never vex me,

ContentCN: 試煉也不能壓住﹔
ContentEN: Neither trials lay me low;

ContentCN: 每逢撒但引誘吼叫﹐
ContentEN: For when Satan comes to tempt me,

ContentCN: 我就到祂隱密處﹐
ContentEN: To the secret place I go,

ContentCN: 我就到祂隱密處。
ContentEN: To the secret place I go.

ContentCN: 當我帶著疲倦、乾渴﹐
ContentEN: When my soul is faint and thirsty,

ContentCN: 來到祂的翅膀間﹐
ContentEN: 'Neath the shadow of His wing

ContentCN: 就得蔭庇﹐涼爽、快樂﹐
ContentEN: There is cool and pleasant shelter,

ContentCN: 活泉清澈而新鮮﹔
ContentEN: And a fresh and crystal spring;

ContentCN: 在此投身救主胸懷﹐
ContentEN: And my Savior rests beside me,

ContentCN: 彼此交通滿香甜﹐
ContentEN: As we hold communion sweet;

ContentCN: 我雖嘗試﹐也說不來﹐
ContentEN: If I tried, I could not utter

ContentCN: 祂那祕密的語言﹐
ContentEN: What He says when thus we meet,

ContentCN: 祂那祕密的語言。
ContentEN: What He says when thus we meet.

ContentCN: 但有一事是我所知﹕
ContentEN: Only this I know; I tell Him

ContentCN: 當我向祂訴苦情﹐
ContentEN: All my doubts and griefs and fears;

ContentCN: 祂就耐心聽我心事﹐
ContentEN: Oh, how patiently He listens!

ContentCN: 並且鼓舞我萎靈﹔
ContentEN: And my drooping soul He cheers;

ContentCN: 你想從來祂不責備﹖
ContentEN: Do you think He ne'er reproves me?

ContentCN: 那祂就是很虛偽﹐
ContentEN: What a false friend He would be,

ContentCN: 如果祂是從來也未
ContentEN: If He never, never told me

ContentCN: 責備祂所見的罪﹐
ContentEN: Of the sins which He must see!

ContentCN: 責備祂所見的罪。
ContentEN: Of the sins which He must see!

ContentCN: 這隱密處如何美佳﹐
ContentEN: Would you like to know that sweetness

ContentCN: 如果你也願知曉﹐
ContentEN: Of the secret of the Lord?

ContentCN: 請去住在祂的蔭下﹐
ContentEN: Go and hide beneath His shadow;

ContentCN: 就必嘗到這味道﹔
ContentEN: This shall then be your reward;

ContentCN: 若你的靈與祂相交﹐
ContentEN: And whene'er you leave the silence

ContentCN: 安靜住於祂榮光﹐
ContentEN: Of that happy meeting-place,

ContentCN: 你的臉面就必反照
ContentEN: By the Spirit bear the image

ContentCN: 祂那榮美的形像﹐
ContentEN: Of the Master in your face,

ContentCN: 祂那榮美的形像。
ContentEN: Of the Master in your face.

ContentCN: 在衪翼下，在衪翼下，誰能使我離祂愛！
ContentEN: Under His wings, Under His wings, Who from His love can sever?

ContentCN: 在衪翼下，這是我的家，我必與主永同在。
ContentEN: Under His wings my soul shall abide, Safely abide for ever.

ContentCN: 在衪翼下，平安穩妥我居住，
ContentEN: Under His wings I am safely abiding;

ContentCN: 不管夜色多深，且有風雨；
ContentEN: Tho’ the night deepens and tempests are wild,

ContentCN: 但我能信靠，我知祂必眷顧，
ContentEN: Still I can trust Him, I know He will keep me;

ContentCN: 因祂已救我，我是祂兒女。
ContentEN: He has redeemed me, and I am His child.

ContentCN: 在衪翼下，在衪翼下，誰能使我離祂愛！
ContentEN: Under His wings, Under His wings, Who from His love can sever?

ContentCN: 在衪翼下，這是我的家，我必與主永同在。
ContentEN: Under His wings my soul shall abide, Safely abide for ever.

ContentCN: 在衪翼下，我能躲過我憂傷，
ContentEN: Under His wings – what a refuge in sorrow!

ContentCN: 我心滿足，我能在此安歇；
ContentEN: How the heart yearningly turns to His rest!

ContentCN: 世上並無膏油可治我病創，

ContentCN: 在此我得祝福，我得慰籍。

ContentCN: 在衪翼下，在衪翼下，誰能使我離祂愛！
ContentEN: Under His wings, Under His wings, Who from His love can sever?

ContentCN: 在衪翼下，這是我的家，我必與主永同在。
ContentEN: Under His wings my soul shall abide, Safely abide for ever.

ContentCN: 在衪翼下，何等寶貴的享受！

ContentCN: 一生在此，直到試煉過去；

ContentCN: 安息於主，我是永遠無虞。
ContentEN: Resting in Jesus I’m safe evermore.

ContentCN: 藏身主裏，藏身主裏，
ContentEN: Hiding in Thee, Hiding in Thee,

ContentCN: 祢是“永久磐石，”我藏身主裏。
ContentEN: Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

ContentCN: 在憂傷、痛苦、危險四圍之時，
ContentEN: O safe to the Rock that is higher than I,

ContentCN: 我要飛至更高磐石得安息；
ContentEN: My soul in its conflicts and sorrows would fly;

ContentCN: 雖然常跌倒、軟弱，我仍屬祢，
ContentEN: So sinful, so weary, Thine, Thine would I be;

ContentCN: 祢是“永久馨石，”我藏身主裏。
ContentEN: Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

ContentCN: 藏身主裏，藏身主裏，

ContentCN: 祢是“永久磐石，”我藏身主裏。
ContentEN: Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

ContentCN: 有時歷平順，有時孤單難忍，
ContentEN: In the calm of the noontide, in sorrow’s lone hour,

ContentCN: 有時遭試煉如波浪猛沖擊，
ContentEN: In times when temptation casts o’er me its power;

ContentCN: 人生的風波如海濤湧不息，
ContentEN: In the tempests of life, on its wide, heaving sea,

ContentCN: 祢是“永久磐石，”我藏身主裏。
ContentEN: Thou blest “Rock of Ages,” I’m hiding in Thee.

ContentCN: 有時遇仇敵壓迫，竭盡全力，
ContentEN: How oft in the conflict, when pressed by the foe,

ContentCN: 我立磐石上，勝過四面仇敵；
ContentEN: I have fled to my Refuge and breathed out my woe;

ContentCN: 我心得安穩，雖有風雨襲擊，
ContentEN: How often, when trials like seabillows roll,

ContentCN: 祢是“永久磐石，”我藏身主裏。
ContentEN: Have I hidden in Thee, O Thou Rock of my soul.

ContentCN: “進入幔內，”願這福分你珍藏，
ContentEN: “Within the Veil:” Be this, belov’d, thy portion,

ContentCN: 永遠居住至高者隱密處；
ContentEN: Within the secret of Thy Lord to dwell;

ContentCN: 瞻祂榮臉，至你反映祂榮光，
ContentEN: Beholding Him, until thy face His glory,

ContentCN: 至你生命成祂愛的流露。
ContentEN: Thy life His love, thy lips His praise shall tell.

ContentCN: “進入幔內，”惟在此至聖之殿，
ContentEN: “Within the Veil,” for only as thou gazest

ContentCN: 方能注視祂無比的榮美；
ContentEN: Upon the matchless beauty of His face,

ContentCN: 你纔可能成為祂活的彰顯，
ContentEN: Canst thou become a living revelation

ContentCN: 祂愛的泱漭，祂恩的廣沛。
ContentEN: Of His great heart of love, His untold grace.

ContentCN: “進入幔內，”祂馨香將你熏浸，
ContentEN: “Within the Veil,” His fragrance poured upon thee,

ContentCN: 出到幔外，流露祂的香味；
ContentEN: Without the Veil, that fragrance shed abroad;

ContentCN: “進入幔內，”祂親手調弦定音，
ContentEN: “Within the Veil,” His hand shall tune the music

ContentCN: 使你在地奏出祂的讚美。
ContentEN: Which sounds on earth the praises of thy Lord.

ContentCN: “進入幔內，”你魂已拋錨天界，
ContentEN: “Within the Veil,” thy spirit deeply anchored,

ContentCN: 使你在世超越紛亂之境；
ContentEN: Thou walkest calm above a world of strife;

ContentCN: “進入幔內，”你靈與祂緊聯結，
ContentEN: “Within the Veil” thy soul with Him united,

ContentCN: 使你在地活出復活生命。
ContentEN: Shall live on earth His resurrection life.

ContentCN: 與我同住，夕陽西沉迅速，
ContentEN: Abide with me: fast falls the even tide;

ContentCN: 黑暗漸深，求主與我同住；
ContentEN: The darkness deepens; Lord, with me abide!

ContentCN: 安慰消逝，其他幫助俱無，
ContentEN: When other helpers fail, and comforts flee,

ContentCN: 無助之助，求祢與我同住。
ContentEN: Help of the helpless, oh, abide with me!

ContentCN: 人生短日，轉瞬就已昏暮，
ContentEN: Swift to its close ebbs out life’s little day;

ContentCN: 我樂漸殘，我的榮耀漸枯；
ContentEN: Earth’s joys grow dim, its glories pass away;

ContentCN: 四境所見盡是變遷朽腐，
ContentEN: Change and decay in all around I see;

ContentCN: 永不變者，求來與我同住。
ContentEN: O Thou, Who changest not, abide with me!

ContentCN: 莫帶威嚴，有如王中之王，
ContentEN: Come not in terrors, as the King of kings;

ContentCN: 只帶慈惠，並祢施醫翅膀；
ContentEN: But kind and good, with healing in Thy wings;

ContentCN: 淚來洗憂，心來聽我求訴，
ContentEN: Tears for all woes, a heart for every plea;

ContentCN: 罪人之友，請來與我同住。
ContentEN: Come, Friend of sinners, thus abide with me.

ContentCN: 祢的同在，時時我都需要，
ContentEN: I need Thy presence every passing hour;

ContentCN: 除祢恩典，何能使魔敗逃；
ContentEN: What but Thy grace can foil the tempter’s power?

ContentCN: 有誰像祢，將我引導扶助，
ContentEN: Who like Thyself my guide and stay can be?

ContentCN: 或陰或晴，求祢與我同住。
ContentEN: Through cloud and sunshine, Oh, abide with me.

ContentCN: 有你賜福，我就不怕受攻，
ContentEN: I fear no foe, with Thee at hand to bless;

ContentCN: 病而不苦，流淚也不酸痛；
ContentEN: Ills have no weight, and tears no bitterness;

ContentCN: 甚麼毒鉤！甚麼死亡墳墓！
ContentEN: Where is death’s sting? where grave, thy victory?

ContentCN: 依然勝過，若祢與我同住。
ContentEN: I triumph still, if Thou abide with me.

ContentCN: 我正閉目，願你在我身邊，
ContentEN: Be Thou Thyself before my closing eyes;

ContentCN: 照明幽地，指我向著諸天；
ContentEN: Shine through the gloom, and point me to the skies;

ContentCN: 天晨破曉，夜影消散盡無，
ContentEN: Heav’ns morning breaks, and earth’s vain shadows flee.

ContentCN: 或生或死，求主與我同住。
ContentEN: In life, in death, O Lord, abide with me!

ContentCN: 你們能否順從所事奉的主，
ContentEN: Can you be obedient, To the Lord you serve,

ContentCN: 不稍軟弱、驚恐，也不稍讓步？
ContentEN: Never even flinch, friend, Never even swerve;

ContentCN: 雖然你的前途好像是死路，
ContentEN: Though your next step onward Seems to lead to death?

ContentCN: 此時能否順服，而不一自顧？
ContentEN: Can you then obey Him Without bated breath?

ContentCN: 你真能否順從，如果主召你
ContentEN: Can you trust your Leader When He bids you go

ContentCN: 加入前線進攻，抵禦兇仇敵？
ContentEN: Right into a battle With a mighty foe?

ContentCN: 你真能否立前，歡喜受差遣？
ContentEN: Can you step up briskly And with joy obey?

ContentCN: 你真能否爭戰，直到晚色偏？
ContentEN: Can you fight the battle, Till the end of day?

ContentCN: 能否？我的弟兄，你神已久等；
ContentEN: Can you? The beloved, God just waits for you;

ContentCN: 應當服祂權柄，遵行祂命令。
ContentEN: Listen for His orders, Glad His will to do;

ContentCN: 你若作主精兵，當祂再降臨，
ContentEN: Then when soldiers muster, At the set of sun,

ContentCN: 祂要題起你名，並說，“你忠心！”
ContentEN: And your name is mentioned Christ will say, “Well done.”

ContentCN: 我為基督而生，苦難使我得益；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 背負十架以辱為榮，雖憂仍然樂極。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我願跟隨耶穌，樂行祂的路程；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 以弱為能，雖貧猶富，似敗，實是得勝。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 雲外有我美家，暫居曠野陋室；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 夜宿帳棚，黎明出發，上升日高一日。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 遠山露出晨曦，照明一切深谷，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 所有黑影速速逃避，天光滿我眼目。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 不日行到終點，脫離所有掛牽；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 無心在此徘徊流連，急去戴我冠冕。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 神是我盼望，是我喜樂；
ContentEN: God is my hope and God is my joy;

ContentCN: 是祂叫無變有，叫死人復活！
ContentEN: He is the resurrection life I enjoy.

ContentCN: 壓得太緊，壓得無處可逃生；
ContentEN: Pressed out of measure, press’d beyond all length;

ContentCN: 壓到極點，好像力不能勝；
ContentEN: Pressed so intensely, seeming beyond strength;

ContentCN: 壓到四顧茫然，惟有獨流淚；
ContentEN: Pressed in the body, pressed within the soul,

ContentCN: 壓得無可奈何，望絕心灰。
ContentEN: Pressed in the mind till darksome surges roll.

ContentCN: 神是我盼望，是我喜樂；
ContentEN: God is my hope and God is my joy;

ContentCN: 是祂叫無變有，叫死人復活！
ContentEN: He is the resurrection life I enjoy.

ContentCN: 壓迫在身，無處可算是平安；
ContentEN: Pressure by foes, and pressure from our friends;

ContentCN: 壓迫在心，四圍都是黑暗；
ContentEN: Pressure on pressure, till life nearly ends;

ContentCN: 迫於仇敵，有時也迫於朋友；
ContentEN: Pressed into knowing none to help but God,

ContentCN: 迫上加迫，性命幾歸烏有。
ContentEN: Pressed into loving both the staff and rod.

ContentCN: 神是我盼望，是我喜樂；
ContentEN: God is my hope and God is my joy;

ContentCN: 是祂叫無變有，叫死人復活！
ContentEN: He is the resurrection life I enjoy.

ContentCN: 迫到除神之外，別無人幫助；
ContentEN: Pressed into liberty where nothing clings,

ContentCN: 迫到喜歡貧窮，如同豐富；
ContentEN: Pressed into faith for hard and hopeless things;

ContentCN: 迫到接受鞭杖，如同蒙雨露；
ContentEN: Pressed into life, a life in Christ the Lord.

ContentCN: 迫到除主之外，別無愛慕。
ContentEN: Pressed into life, the life of Christ outpoured.

ContentCN: 神是我盼望，是我喜樂；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 是祂叫無變有，叫死人復活！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 迫到脫塵，現今就登天逍遊；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 迫到無一纏累，完全自由；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 迫到信神來作不可能的事；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 迫到必須靠主而生而死。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 神是我盼望，是我喜樂；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 是祂叫無變有，叫死人復活！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: “迫得太緊！”我們如此的哭泣；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 迫到如此，壓迫已竭其力；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 壓迫餘生已非壓迫所能及；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 迫過之後，已得永遠安息。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 神是我盼望，是我喜樂；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 是祂叫無變有，叫死人復活！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: “迫得太緊！”實在乃是大利益；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 壓迫不過顯明神的手臂；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 迫過之後，旁觀者都要看見；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 迫上加迫，不會搖動一點。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 神是我盼望，是我喜樂；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 是祂叫無變有，叫死人復活！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 壓迫雖緊，我們仍舊的進前；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 壓迫續來，我們的望在天；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 壓迫續來，已經無可再壓迫；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 壓迫續來，心仍因神自得。
ContentEN: NULL
