ContentCN: “父阿，是的！”偉大得勝，父神旨意何等寶貝！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 雖為兒子，仍學順從，親手接過祂賜苦杯。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 因愛無比飲之如飴，纔知入口滴滴甘美；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 雖然我眼難免流淚，我心充滿何等安慰。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: “父阿，是的！”何等順服，我心安歇一無怨懟！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 親人友朋儘可背離，仇敵逼攻無處逃圍。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 救主榮光忽然降臨，有祂同行我心高興；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 甜美的愛激勵深沉，難忍壓力消蹤失影。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: “父阿，是的！”無比權能，凡祂所許充滿恩惠！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 試煉的火雖加七倍，救主能力更無窮盡。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 壓迫續增傾逼我身，不過使我更親我神；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 忽然我靈向天歡吟，黑暗環境大放光明。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: “父阿，是的！”神聖宣明，父手所量沉重福分！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 救主呼召充滿我心，“學我樣式效我生命。”
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我心慕祂溫柔低微，服主軛下隨主蹤影；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 諸天安息心中輝映，當我與主同奔天程。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 親愛的主，祢曾為我釘十架；
ContentEN: My dearest Lord didst die for me at Calv’ry,

ContentCN: 如此恩愛，我豈敢往後退？
ContentEN: What matchless love! How dare I to draw back?

ContentCN: 求主使我注目仰望主十架；
ContentEN: Fix Thou my eyes upon Thy Cross of glory;

ContentCN: 輕看世界名利，勇敢往前追！
ContentEN: Help me press on boldly Thy steps to retrack.

ContentCN: 我若稍微偏離正路﹐
ContentEN: If from the right course I depart,

ContentCN: 我要立刻舒服﹔
ContentEN: At once comfort I'd find.

ContentCN: 但我記念我主基督﹐
ContentEN: But I remember how my Lord

ContentCN: 如何忠心受苦。
ContentEN: Did suffer agony.

ContentCN: 我今已經撇棄世界﹐
ContentEN: I'll utterly forsake this world,

ContentCN: 所有關係都解﹔
ContentEN: And sever all the ties.

ContentCN: 雖然道路越走越窄﹐
ContentEN: My path may narrow more and more;

ContentCN: 但我在此是客。
ContentEN: I'm but a pilgrim here.

ContentCN: 儘管別人藐視冷嘲﹐
ContentEN: Though men may scowl and laugh to scorn,

ContentCN: 我只求主微笑﹔
ContentEN: I only want His smile.

ContentCN: 別人雖然喜歡外貌﹐
ContentEN: Let others fancy outward shows,

ContentCN: 但我要主的“好”。
ContentEN: His "best" is my desire.

ContentCN: 我心所望不是偉大﹐
ContentEN: Not after greatness do I seek,

ContentCN: 不是今生通達﹔
ContentEN: Nor success in this life.

ContentCN: 我願現在卑微事主﹐
ContentEN: But humbly I would serve the Lord,

ContentCN: 那日得祂稱祝。
ContentEN: That day to gain His praise.

ContentCN: 我今每日舉目細望
ContentEN: I'm daily gazing at the light

ContentCN: 審判台前亮光﹔
ContentEN: Out of His judgement seat,

ContentCN: 願我所有生活、工作﹐
ContentEN: That all my living and my works

ContentCN: 那日都能耐火。
ContentEN: May stand the test of fire.

ContentCN: 讓你們去得著名聲、
ContentEN: Let others seek for name and fame,

ContentCN: 富足、榮耀、友朋﹔
ContentEN: For glory, wealth and friends.

ContentCN: 讓你們去得著成功、
ContentEN: Let them procure their great success,

ContentCN: 讚美、從者、興隆。
ContentEN: Their followers and praise.

ContentCN: 但我只願孤單、貧窮﹐
ContentEN: In solitude and poverty,

ContentCN: 在此不求亨通﹔
ContentEN: I wish to prosper not;

ContentCN: 我心切望忠誠跟從
ContentEN: But faithfully I'll follow Him.

ContentCN: 我主到了路終。
ContentEN: Until I reach the goal.

ContentCN: 因我知道﹐主在此世
ContentEN: I know, while here to earth He came,

ContentCN: 不過得著一死,
ContentEN: His only gain was "death."

ContentCN: 所以現在我無他志﹐
ContentEN: That's why no other wish have I,

ContentCN: 只願與祂損失。
ContentEN: But with Him to suffer loss.

ContentCN: 我的榮耀還在將來﹐
ContentEN: Since all my glories lie ahead,

ContentCN: 今日只得忍耐﹔
ContentEN: Now patient I must be.

ContentCN: 我決不肯先我的主
ContentEN: I will not go before my Lord,

ContentCN: 在此得榮、得福。
ContentEN: Much glory to receive.

ContentCN: 那日﹐我要得著尊貴﹐
ContentEN: That day, my honor I'll receive;

ContentCN: 主要擦乾眼淚﹔
ContentEN: The Lord will dry my tears.

ContentCN: 今日﹐主既仍舊遲延﹐
ContentEN: Today, while He must tarry still,

ContentCN: 我要忠心進前。
ContentEN: I'll press on faithfully.

ContentCN: 祂的臉面﹐祂的天使常看見﹐
ContentEN: His angels His countenance always behold,

ContentCN: 但不認識祂的大愛﹔
ContentEN: But never experience His grace,

ContentCN: 祂的聖徒雖然認識愛無限﹐
ContentEN: While saints on the earth know His love that enfolds,

ContentCN: 卻未看見祂的丰采。
ContentEN: Yet never have looked on His face.

ContentCN: 他們不久也要看見祂臉面﹐
ContentEN: They soon shall arise in His presence with awe,

ContentCN: 認識祂的榮耀光明﹔
ContentEN: The sight of His glory to gain.

ContentCN: 但馬利亞曾看見祂的淚眼﹐
ContentEN: But Mary, one day, in His tear-stained eyes saw

ContentCN: 知道祂心痛的情形﹐
ContentEN: His heartbreak of anguish and pain,

ContentCN: 知道祂心痛的情形。
ContentEN: His heartbreak of anguish and pain.

ContentCN: 我們快要完全知道我們主﹐
ContentEN: We want to know Jesus, our Lord,

ContentCN: 已往從未如此知道﹔
ContentEN: To know Him as never before.

ContentCN: 但是今日醫治傷心的摸撫﹐
ContentEN: In heaven there's no need for a hand such as His

ContentCN: 不是上面感覺得到。
ContentEN: To heal a heart broken and sore.

ContentCN: 那日雖有無窮無盡的讚美﹐
ContentEN: Above where we offer Him praise without end,

ContentCN: 卻無流淚迫切禱告﹐
ContentEN: No praying with tears needed there;

ContentCN: 卻無傷心痛苦所得的安慰﹐
ContentEN: Nor ever a burden to roll on our Friend,

ContentCN: 也無困難所生依靠﹐
ContentEN: Or place for importunate prayer,

ContentCN: 也無困難所生依靠。
ContentEN: Or place for importunate prayer.

ContentCN: 天上雖有無比榮耀的冠冕﹐
ContentEN: In heavenly glory we'll wear a bright crown,

ContentCN: 但無十架可以順從﹔
ContentEN: And never more carry a cross.

ContentCN: 祂為我們所受一切的磨碾﹐
ContentEN: It's only on earth where His life was disowned,

ContentCN: 在地才能與祂交通。
ContentEN: We share His rejection and loss.

ContentCN: 進入安息﹐就再尋不到疲倦﹐
ContentEN: Ent'ring into rest; in the morning so fair,

ContentCN: 再無機會為祂受苦﹐
ContentEN: Our anguish and trials will end.

ContentCN: 再也不能為祂經過何試煉﹐
ContentEN: His sorrow and shame we no more with Him share,

ContentCN: 再為祂捨棄何幸福﹐
ContentEN: Or sacrifice pleasures for Him,

ContentCN: 再為祂捨棄何幸福。
ContentEN: Or sacrifice pleasures for Him.

ContentCN: 哎阿﹐為祂﹐機會已是何等少﹐
ContentEN: Alas, we're now left with few chances to share,

ContentCN: 所有機會快要過去﹐
ContentEN: To learn and to taste of His grief.

ContentCN: 機會無多﹐為祂﹐蒙羞和受嘲﹐
ContentEN: Still yet for His sake, man's reproaches to bear,

ContentCN: 為祂﹐再來分心、分慮。
ContentEN: Such time we may never retrieve.

ContentCN: 不久就無誤會、怒罵與凌辱﹐
ContentEN: These sorrows and pain, shall we still here bemoan,

ContentCN: 就無孤單、寂寞、離別﹔
ContentEN: When they will soon no longer be.

ContentCN: 我當寶貝這些不久的祝福﹐
ContentEN: I treasure now Lord, all the pain I have known,

ContentCN: 我藉這些與祢聯結﹐
ContentEN: For through it I'm made one with Thee,

ContentCN: 我藉這些與祢聯結。
ContentEN: For through it I'm made one with Thee.

ContentCN: 主﹐我羨慕早日看見祢臉面﹐
ContentEN: I long, Lord, to look on Thy wonderful face,

ContentCN: 那是實在好得無比﹔
ContentEN: 'Twould surely be better by far.

ContentCN: 但是﹐我也不願免去祢試煉﹐
ContentEN: But rather I choose now Thy suffering grace

ContentCN: 失去如此交通甜蜜。
ContentEN: Than have our sweet fellowship marred.

ContentCN: 求祢憐憫﹐使我充滿祢大愛﹐
ContentEN: Have mercy, dear Lord, fill me full of Thy love,

ContentCN: 不顧一切為祢生活﹔
ContentEN: My life shall be wholly for Thee.

ContentCN: 免祢僕人今天急切望將來﹐
ContentEN: Lest longing for joy in a heaven above,

ContentCN: 將來又悔今天錯過﹐
ContentEN: I fail here to suffer with Thee,

ContentCN: 將來又悔今天錯過。
ContentEN: I fail here to suffer with Thee.

ContentCN: 願神美旨緊緊環抱我，
ContentEN: Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,

ContentCN: 使我全然消失於祢。
ContentEN: Till I am wholly lost in Thee;

ContentCN: 願神美旨緊緊環抱我，
ContentEN: Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,

ContentCN: 使我全然消失於祢。
ContentEN: Till I am wholly lost in Thee.

ContentCN: 頑梗我心已終於屈服，
ContentEN: My stubborn will at last hath yielded;

ContentCN: 今願屬主，惟願屬主！
ContentEN: I would be Thine, and Thine alone;

ContentCN: 我心禱告，我口今求呼：
ContentEN: And this the prayer my lips are bringing,

ContentCN: “願主旨意於我無阻！”
ContentEN: “Lord, let in me Thy will be done.”

ContentCN: 願神美旨緊緊環抱我，
ContentEN: Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,

ContentCN: 使我全然消失於祢。
ContentEN: Till I am wholly lost in Thee;

ContentCN: 願神美旨緊緊環抱我，
ContentEN: Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,

ContentCN: 使我全然消失於祢。
ContentEN: Till I am wholly lost in Thee.

ContentCN: 久困罪行，厭倦而思歸，
ContentEN: I’m tired of sin, footsore and weary,

ContentCN: 幽暗世路，煩悶淒涼；
ContentEN: The darksome path hath dreary grown,

ContentCN: 忽見一光，射入我心內，
ContentEN: But now a light has ris’n to cheer me;

ContentCN: “哦，祢是我晨星、朝陽！”
ContentEN: I find in Thee my Star, my Sun.

ContentCN: 願神美旨緊緊環抱我，
ContentEN: Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,

ContentCN: 使我全然消失於祢。
ContentEN: Till I am wholly lost in Thee;

ContentCN: 願神美旨緊緊環抱我，
ContentEN: Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,

ContentCN: 使我全然消失於祢。
ContentEN: Till I am wholly lost in Thee.

ContentCN: 得勝的主，祢寶貝旨意
ContentEN: Thy precious will, O conqu’ring Savior,

ContentCN: 繞我懷我直到永久；
ContentEN: Doth now embrace and compass me;

ContentCN: 紛亂消失，平安何滿溢，
ContentEN: All discords hushed, my peace a river,

ContentCN: 又如困鳥釋放自由。
ContentEN: My soul a prisoned bird set free.

ContentCN: 願神美旨緊緊環抱我，
ContentEN: Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,

ContentCN: 使我全然消失於祢。
ContentEN: Till I am wholly lost in Thee;

ContentCN: 願神美旨緊緊環抱我，
ContentEN: Sweet will of God, still fold me closer,

ContentCN: 使我全然消失於祢。
ContentEN: Till I am wholly lost in Thee.

ContentCN: 禁閉於祢，與祢永相依，
ContentEN: Shut in with Thee, O Lord, forever,

ContentCN: 流蕩腳蹤不再游移；
ContentEN: My wayward feet no more to roam;

ContentCN: 無何能使我與祢相離，
ContentEN: What pow’r from Thee my soul can sever?

ContentCN: 我要永住祢美旨裏。
ContentEN: The center of God’s will my home.

ContentCN: 主耶穌，親愛救主，多以自己給我；
ContentEN: Lord Jesus, blessed Savior, More of Thyself I need.

ContentCN: 我向祢完全順服，多以自己給我。
ContentEN: To Thee I now surrender, “More of Thyself!” I plead.

ContentCN: 祢若取去我的心愛，求以自己給我；
ContentEN: If Thou shouldst take my love away, Give me Thyself, I pray.

ContentCN: 祢若仍定我受疑猜，求以自己給我。
ContentEN: If Thou shouldst let me be misjudged, Give me Thyself today.

ContentCN: 主耶穌，親愛救主，多以自己給我；
ContentEN: Lord Jesus, blessed Savior, More of Thyself I need.

ContentCN: 我向祢完全順服，多以自己給我。
ContentEN: To Thee I now surrender, “More of Thyself!” I plead.

ContentCN: 祢使我的望星迷糊，求以自己給我；
ContentEN: If Thou shouldst let my hope be blurred, Give me Thyself, I pray.

ContentCN: 祢許我的心緒起伏，求以自己給我。
ContentEN: If Thou shouldst let me be disturbed, Give me Thyself today.

ContentCN: 主耶穌，親愛救主，多以自己給我；
ContentEN: Lord Jesus, blessed Savior, More of Thyself I need.

ContentCN: 我向祢完全順服，多以自己給我。
ContentEN: To Thee I now surrender, “More of Thyself!” I plead.

ContentCN: 祢既拆毀我所倚靠，求以自己給我；
ContentEN: If Thou shouldst take my trust away, Give me Thyself, I pray.

ContentCN: 祢既拒絕我的禱告，求以自己給我。
ContentEN: If Thou shouldst now my pray’r refuse, Give me Thyself today.

ContentCN: 主耶穌，親愛救主，多以自己給我；
ContentEN: Lord Jesus, blessed Savior, More of Thyself I need.

ContentCN: 我向祢完全順服，多以自己給我。
ContentEN: To Thee I now surrender, “More of Thyself!” I plead.

ContentCN: 我若需要仍舊忍耐，仍以自己給我；
ContentEN: If I should need to more endure, Still give Thyself, I pray.

ContentCN: 祢若尚未立即再來，再加自己給我。
ContentEN: If Thy return will be delayed, I need Thyself today.

ContentCN: 主阿，照祢旨意，願我能以順服！
ContentEN: My Jesus, as Thou wilt! Oh, may Thy will be mine!

ContentCN: 在祢愛的手裏，凡事我都聽主；
ContentEN: Into Thy hand of love I would my all resign;

ContentCN: 歷憂或是歷樂，領我沒有歎聲，
ContentEN: Thro’ sorrow, or thro’ joy, conduct me as Thine own,

ContentCN: 助我仍能來歌：主，祢旨意得成。
ContentEN: And help me still to say, My Lord, Thy will be done!

ContentCN: 主阿，照祢旨意，莫容我的望星
ContentEN: My Jesus, as Thou wilt! Though seen through many a tear,

ContentCN: 因被淚眼所迷，失蹤或是失明！
ContentEN: Let not my star of hope Grow dim or disappear;

ContentCN: 祢既在世痛苦，也曾流淚傷心；
ContentEN: Since Thou on earth hast wept, And sorrowed oft alone,

ContentCN: 若須與祢同哭，主，祢旨意得成。
ContentEN: If I must weep with Thee, My Lord, Thy will be done!

ContentCN: 主阿，照祢旨意，一切都是美好；
ContentEN: My Jesus, as Thou wilt! All shall be well for me;

ContentCN: 每一變化境地，歡然交祢引導。
ContentEN: Each changing future scene I gladly trust with Thee.

ContentCN: 方寸純全無障，向前直趨天城；
ContentEN: Straight to Thy rest above I travel calmly on.

ContentCN: 或生或死常唱：主，祢旨意得成。
ContentEN: And sing, in life or death, My Lord, Thy will be done!

ContentCN: 我對撒但總是說﹕“不﹐”
ContentEN: No! to the will of the devil,

ContentCN: 我對父神就說﹕“是﹐”
ContentEN: Yes! to the will of the Lord,

ContentCN: 好叫我主所有部署﹐
ContentEN: So Lord Thy purpose shall triumph,

ContentCN: 全得成功不受阻。
ContentEN: Thro' Thine omni-potent Word.

ContentCN: 當我這樣聽主號令﹐
ContentEN: With Thine authority clothe me,

ContentCN: 求主賜給我權柄﹐
ContentEN: Now, as I stand in Thy will,

ContentCN: 使我滿有能力聖靈﹐
ContentEN: With Thine own Spirit empow'r me,

ContentCN: 成功主永遠定命。
ContentEN: All Thine own plan to fulfill.

ContentCN: 我對撒但總是說﹕“不﹐”
ContentEN: No! to the will of the devil,

ContentCN: 我對父神就說﹕“是﹐”
ContentEN: Yes! to the will of the Lord,

ContentCN: 這個是我永遠態度﹐
ContentEN: This be my attitude always,

ContentCN: 求神施恩加扶持。
ContentEN: Saviour, protection afford,

ContentCN: 不然當我實行順服﹐
ContentEN: Lest, as I move at Thy bidding

ContentCN: 撒但就要攔去路﹔
ContentEN: Satan should close up the way.

ContentCN: 當我正在聽祢吩咐﹐
ContentEN: Stand with me, blessed Lord Jesus,

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐求祢看顧！
ContentEN: As I Thy precepts obey.

ContentCN: 我對撒但總是說﹕“不﹐”
ContentEN: No! to the will of the devil,

ContentCN: 我對父神就說﹕“是﹐”
ContentEN: Yes! to the will of the Lord,

ContentCN: 我願完全絕對順服﹐
ContentEN: Over the mountains so rugged,

ContentCN: 不論如何受損失。
ContentEN: Over the seas at Thy Word,

ContentCN: 當我與主同前時候﹐
ContentEN: Naught shall deter or molest me,

ContentCN: 主若肯拯救保守﹐
ContentEN: If, Blessed Lord, Thou wilt be

ContentCN: 無論甚麼威脅、引誘﹐
ContentEN: Saviour, Defender, and Keeper,

ContentCN: 不會使我一回頭。
ContentEN: As I go onward with Thee.

ContentCN: 非我願作何事，非我願去何地，
ContentEN: Not what I wish to be, Nor where I wish to go,

ContentCN: 我是何人，竟敢選擇己路！
ContentEN: For who am I that I should choose my way?

ContentCN: 救主為我揀選，這是好得無比，
ContentEN: The Lord shall choose for me, ‘Tis better far, I know,

ContentCN: 去留只願遵主命令。
ContentEN: So let Him bid me go, or stay.

ContentCN: 我所經過道路，雖然滿佈痛苦，
ContentEN: The path that I have trod, Has bro’t me nearer God,

ContentCN: 欲是引我更近天父；
ContentEN: Tho’ oft it led thro’ sorrow’s gates.

ContentCN: 雖非我願選擇，但若行走己路，
ContentEN: Tho’ not the way I’d choose, In my way I might lose

ContentCN: 我將喪失天樂無窮。
ContentEN: The joy that yet for me awaits.

ContentCN: 非我願作何事，非我願去何地，
ContentEN: Not what I wish to be, Nor where I wish to go,

ContentCN: 我是何人，竟敢選擇己路！
ContentEN: For who am I that I should choose my way?

ContentCN: 救主為我揀選，這是好得無比，
ContentEN: The Lord shall choose for me, ‘Tis better far, I know,

ContentCN: 去留只願遵主命令。
ContentEN: So let Him bid me go, or stay.

ContentCN: 若只為得冠冕，使我去負十架，
ContentEN: The cross that I must bear, If I a crown would wear,

ContentCN: 十架就失該有價值；
ContentEN: Is not the cross that I should take;

ContentCN: 既為主所頒賜，我就背負無懼，
ContentEN: But, since on me ’tis laid, I’ll take it, unafraid,

ContentCN: 負架原因只為我主。
ContentEN: And bear it for the Master’s sake.

ContentCN: 非我願作何事，非我願去何地，
ContentEN: Not what I wish to be, Nor where I wish to go,

ContentCN: 我是何人，竟敢選擇己路！
ContentEN: For who am I that I should choose my way?

ContentCN: 救主為我揀選，這是好得無比，
ContentEN: The Lord shall choose for me, ‘Tis better far, I know,

ContentCN: 去留只願遵主命令。
ContentEN: So let Him bid me go, or stay.

ContentCN: 惟我順服神旨，主愛必然充溢，
ContentEN: Submission to the will Of Him who guides me still

ContentCN: 一路既由祂手引領；
ContentEN: Is surety of His love revealed;

ContentCN: 主將我心高舉，遠超所居之世，
ContentEN: My soul shall rise above This world in which I move;

ContentCN: 順服，立見完全得勝。
ContentEN: I conquer only where I yield.

ContentCN: 主阿，祢不可讓步，遲早我是要順服；
ContentEN: Do not yield Thy way to mine, Soon I’ll yield my will to Thine.

ContentCN: 讓我改變我意圖–主阿！來順服。
ContentEN: Let me change my view and way, Dear Lord, to obey.

ContentCN: 這是十架道路﹗你願否走這個?
ContentEN: 'Tis the way of the cross — are you willing for this?

ContentCN: 你曾否背十架為你主?
ContentEN: What does bearing the cross mean to you?

ContentCN: 你這奉獻一切給神的人﹗
ContentEN: You who've given yourself, your all to God,

ContentCN: 對神你是否全貞?
ContentEN: To God are you wholly true?

ContentCN: 十字架的道路要犧牲﹐
ContentEN: The way of the cross means sacrifice

ContentCN: 要將一切獻於神﹔
ContentEN: As to God you yield your all,

ContentCN: 將一切放在死的祭壇上面﹐
ContentEN: To be laid on the altar, the place of death,

ContentCN: 火纔在這裏顯現。
ContentEN: Where fire will surely fall.

ContentCN: 這是十架道路﹗你願否走這個?
ContentEN: 'Tis the way of the cross — are you willing for this?

ContentCN: 你曾否背十架為你主?
ContentEN: What does bearing the cross mean to you?

ContentCN: 你這奉獻一切給神的人﹗
ContentEN: You who've given yourself, your all to God,

ContentCN: 對神你是否全貞?
ContentEN: To God are you wholly true?

ContentCN: 當我們唱詩禱告時候﹐
ContentEN: As the voice of song and prayer we raise,

ContentCN: 何等願說“獻所有﹗”
ContentEN: How easy to say“we give all”

ContentCN: 但前面有更沉重的十字架﹗
ContentEN: Till some rougher cross lies just before

ContentCN: 有更艱難的生涯﹗
ContentEN: And sterner is duty's call.

ContentCN: 這是十架道路﹗你願否走這個?
ContentEN: 'Tis the way of the cross — are you willing for this?

ContentCN: 你曾否背十架為你主?
ContentEN: What does bearing the cross mean to you?

ContentCN: 你這奉獻一切給神的人﹗
ContentEN: You who've given yourself, your all to God,

ContentCN: 對神你是否全貞?
ContentEN: To God are you wholly true?

ContentCN: 你要變節﹔或忠心到死﹐
ContentEN: Do you falter then, or true to death

ContentCN: 讓一切完全損失﹐
ContentEN: Just die on the cross in the way,

ContentCN: 直等到永活主的豐盛生命
ContentEN: Till the fullness of life from the Loving One

ContentCN: 天天充滿在你靈﹖
ContentEN: Is filling you day by day?

ContentCN: 這是十架道路﹗你願否走這個?
ContentEN: 'Tis the way of the cross — are you willing for this?

ContentCN: 你曾否背十架為你主?
ContentEN: What does bearing the cross mean to you?

ContentCN: 你這奉獻一切給神的人﹗
ContentEN: You who've given yourself, your all to God,

ContentCN: 對神你是否全貞?
ContentEN: To God are you wholly true?

ContentCN: 神的救法是由死得生
ContentEN: 'Tis the plan of life, for you die to live,

ContentCN: -你與主合為一人-
ContentEN: One with Jesus crucified;

ContentCN: 在十架﹐你因信已與祂同釘﹐
ContentEN: With the life alone to be lived thro' you

ContentCN: 從你身活出祂命。
ContentEN: Of the risen, the glorified.

ContentCN: 這是十架道路﹗你願否走這個?
ContentEN: 'Tis the way of the cross — are you willing for this?

ContentCN: 你曾否背十架為你主?
ContentEN: What does bearing the cross mean to you?

ContentCN: 你這奉獻一切給神的人﹗
ContentEN: You who've given yourself, your all to God,

ContentCN: 對神你是否全貞?
ContentEN: To God are you wholly true?

ContentCN: 我們的得失並不要緊﹐
ContentEN: Look not at your gains or at your loss

ContentCN: 神的旨意當留心﹔
ContentEN: But take heed to the will of God.

ContentCN: 我們若將萬事都看如糞土﹐
ContentEN: Let us look upon all things as worthless dross,

ContentCN: 主纔不會受攔阻。
ContentEN: The steps of the Lord to follow.

ContentCN: 讓我愛而不受感戴，讓我事而不受賞賜；
ContentEN: Let me love and not be respected; Let me serve and not be rewarded;

ContentCN: 讓我盡力而不被人記，
ContentEN: Let me labor and not be remembered;

ContentCN: 讓我受苦而不被人睹。
ContentEN: Let me suffer and not be regarded.

ContentCN: 只知傾酒，不知飲酒；只想擘餅，不想留餅。
ContentEN: ’Tis the pouring, not the drinking; ’Tis the breaking, not the keeping-

ContentCN: 倒出生命來使人得幸福，
ContentEN: A life suff’ring to seek other’s blessing,

ContentCN: 捨棄安寧而使人得舒服。
ContentEN: A life loving and true comfort giving.

ContentCN: 不受體恤，不受眷顧，不受推崇，不受安撫；
ContentEN: Not expecting pity and concern, Not accepting solace and applause;

ContentCN: 寧可淒涼，寧可孤苦，寧可無告，寧可被負。
ContentEN: Even lonely, even forgotten, Even wordless, even forsaken.

ContentCN: 願意以血淚作為冠冕的代價，
ContentEN: Tears and blood my price for the righteous crown shall be;

ContentCN: 願意受虧損來度旅客的生涯。
ContentEN: Losing all, my cost for a faithful pilgrim’s life.

ContentCN: 因為當祢活在這裡時，
ContentEN: ’Twas the life, O Lord, that you chose to live

ContentCN: 祢也是如此過日子，
ContentEN: In those days when on earth you walked,

ContentCN: 欣然忍受一切的損失
ContentEN: Gladly suff’ring all injuries and loss

ContentCN: 好使近祢的人得安適。
ContentEN: So that all might draw near and repose.

ContentCN: 我今不知前途究有多遠，
ContentEN: I cannot see how much farther I shall go;

ContentCN: 這條道路一去就不再還原；
ContentEN: Still I press on, knowing there is no return.

ContentCN: 所以讓我學習祢那樣的完全，
ContentEN: Let me follow your pattern so perfect and true,

ContentCN: 時常被人辜負心不生怨。
ContentEN: Bearing in gratitudes without complaint.

ContentCN: 求祢在這慘淡時期之內，
ContentEN: In this time of trial, O my Lord, I pray

ContentCN: 擦乾我一切暗中的眼淚；
ContentEN: That you’d wipe all my hidden tears away;

ContentCN: 學習知道祢是我的安慰，
ContentEN: Let me learn, O Lord, you are my reward,

ContentCN: 並求別人喜悅以度此歲。
ContentEN: Let me be others’ blessing all my days.

ContentCN: 主十字架是我誇耀，
ContentEN: In the cross of Christ I glory,

ContentCN: 年代滅沒它獨存；
ContentEN: Tow’ring o’er the wrecks of time;

ContentCN: 神聖事蹟光輝環繞，
ContentEN: All the light of sacred story,

ContentCN: 十架巍然是中心。
ContentEN: Gathers round its head sublime.

ContentCN: 當我遭遇患難折磨，
ContentEN: When the woes of life o’ertake me,

ContentCN: 希望成空，憂懼纏；
ContentEN: Hopes deceive, and fears annoy,

ContentCN: 主十字架永不棄我，
ContentEN: Never shall the cross forsake me;

ContentCN: 看哪！喜樂與平安。
ContentEN: Lo! it glows with peace and joy.

ContentCN: 福樂太陽，以光以愛
ContentEN: When the sun of bliss is beaming

ContentCN: 照耀在我道路上；
ContentEN: Light and love upon my way,

ContentCN: 主十字架放射光彩，
ContentEN: From the cross the radiance streaming

ContentCN: 使我人生更光亮。
ContentEN: Adds more luster to the day.

ContentCN: 是禍是福，是苦是樂，
ContentEN: Bane and blessing, pain and pleasure,

ContentCN: 十字架全使成聖；
ContentEN: By the cross are sanctified;

ContentCN: 在此平安深廣莫測，
ContentEN: Peace is there that knows no measure,

ContentCN: 喜樂永遠不變更。
ContentEN: Joys that through all time abide.

ContentCN: 主十字架是我誇耀，
ContentEN: In the cross of Christ I glory,

ContentCN: 年代滅沒它獨存；
ContentEN: Tow’ring o’er the wrecks of time;

ContentCN: 神聖事蹟光輝環繞，
ContentEN: All the light of sacred story

ContentCN: 十架巍然是中心。
ContentEN: Gathers round its head sublime.

ContentCN: 救主十架永遠是我誇耀原因，
ContentEN: The cross of Christ shall ever be my boast and pride,

ContentCN: 雖然有時屈身喘息力不能勝；
ContentEN: Tho’ there be times the heavy weight seems hard to bear,

ContentCN: 但是長久旅居經歷已足證明，
ContentEN: But long has since this pilgrim journey testified:

ContentCN: 惟有十架能醫一切心靈傷痕。
ContentEN: Only the cross can heal the wound of deep despair,

ContentCN: 麻雀在彼找到安息之所，
ContentEN: Sparrows can find a place of quiet rest;

ContentCN: 燕子在彼找到抱雛之窩；
ContentEN: Swallows can build for their young ones a nest.

ContentCN: 經過十架我已達到通天之門，
ContentEN: Now by the cross I have come thro’ this heav’nly gate,

ContentCN: 在此我心充滿安息感激聲音。
ContentEN: Therefore my heart is filled with peace and songs of praise!

ContentCN: 救主十架永遠是我誇耀原因，
ContentEN: The cross of Christ shall ever be my boast and pride,

ContentCN: 雖然有時心肉衰殘，淚眼不明；
ContentEN: Tho’ there be times tears from within may dim my eyes,

ContentCN: 但你是我心中力量，心中生命，
ContentEN: But in this vale, a spring shall flow to calm my sighs;

ContentCN: 流淚谷中活泉湧流慰我衷心。
ContentEN: For Thou art mine, my strength, my heart, my very life.

ContentCN: 哦主我的在世旅居寒暑，
ContentEN: Yes, Lord, through these summer and winter times,

ContentCN: 在此充滿何等甘甜滿足；
ContentEN: Oh what contentment filled with mirth is mine.

ContentCN: 依靠十架乃是無窮喜樂原因，
ContentEN: Trusting the cross shall be my cause for endless joy;

ContentCN: 在此我心歡樂反覆稱頌主名。
ContentEN: Therefore my heart shall bless Thy name with cheerful voice!

ContentCN: 救主十架永遠是我誇耀原因，
ContentEN: The cross of Christ shall ever be my boast and pride,

ContentCN: 雖然有時旅足紅熱疼痛難行；
ContentEN: Tho’ there be times my feet be burned from painful strides,

ContentCN: 在此我聞聖靈溫柔指引聲音，
ContentEN: But here I hear Thy tender voice so sweetly guides;

ContentCN: 惟有十架乃是炎熱沙地涼亭。
ContentEN: Only the cross gives shelter in this desert land.

ContentCN: 祢的清涼活泉在此流奔，
ContentEN: How fresh and clear Thy spring with ease has flown.

ContentCN: 飲我枯萎心田甦我疲魂；
ContentEN: Drink to the full, O dry and weary soul!

ContentCN: 就近十架我常獲得能力充盈，
ContentEN: Drawn to the cross my strength can be revived once more;

ContentCN: 在此我心浸於甘源讚美不停！
ContentEN: Therefore my heart shall flood with praises evermore!

ContentCN: 救主十架永遠是我誇耀原因，
ContentEN: The cross of Christ shall ever be my boast and pride,

ContentCN: 雖然有時心頹力竭難免呻吟；
ContentEN: Tho’ there be times my heart’s so burdened with complaints.

ContentCN: 倦眼忽見榮光一閃來自天庭，
ContentEN: Suddenly then, Thy glory ’fore my eyes appears;

ContentCN: 十架今正帶我進入榮耀之境。
ContentEN: The cross now brings me to behold Thee face to face.

ContentCN: 我要低頭吻你痛苦腳印，
ContentEN: And there I kiss the imprint of Thy feet;

ContentCN: 每一腳印都成通天途徑；
ContentEN: Thy every step has paved a path for me.

ContentCN: 堅持十架神的榮耀終滿我心，
ContentEN: O blessed cross, Thy glory has now filled my heart;

ContentCN: 在此我要歡呼我已跑完全程。
ContentEN: Therefore I sing for I have won the crown of Life!

ContentCN: 惟恐我忘客西馬尼﹐
ContentEN: Lest I forget Gethsemane,

ContentCN: 惟恐我忘祢心憂急﹐
ContentEN: Lest I forget Thine agony,

ContentCN: 惟恐我忘祢愛無極﹐
ContentEN: Lest I forget Thy love for me,

ContentCN: 領我去髑髏地。
ContentEN: Lead me to Calvary.

ContentCN: 我今俯伏﹐生命的王﹐
ContentEN: King of my life, I crown Thee now;

ContentCN: 奉獻榮耀於祢﹔
ContentEN: Thine shall the glory be.

ContentEN: To speak of Calvary.

ContentCN: 我是黑夜行人，星光朦朧前引；
ContentEN: I, pilgrim of the night; His star so faintly steers.

ContentCN: 雖然黑夜四圍緊壓我身，
ContentEN: Although the darkness has enveloped me,

ContentCN: 難掩星光輝映。
ContentEN: Its glimmer still appears!

ContentCN: 荊刺我足使我傷痛難忍，
ContentEN: Thro’ piercing thorns I walk in agony,

ContentCN: 迫我緊靠我神；
ContentEN: My God I must draw near.

ContentCN: 有時深夜歌唱，聲聞天庭，
ContentEN: My song at midnight gloom shall rise to Thee,

ContentCN: 經常堅忍無聲，經常堅忍無聲。
ContentEN: In silence I endure, In silence I endure.

ContentCN: 我是黑夜行人，祂聲甦我疲魂；
ContentEN: I, pilgrim of the night; His voice my soul revives.

ContentCN: 野地陷阱密佈，使我心驚，
ContentEN: Though snares around me cause my heart to fear,

ContentCN: 幸祂能手引領。
ContentEN: His hand does surely guide.

ContentCN: 一路遭遇使我膽怯意冷，
ContentEN: Though tests along my way cause hopeless drear,

ContentCN: 得祂慈聲慰問；
ContentEN: His voice my heart consoles.

ContentCN: 祂手光線射出醫治大能，
ContentEN: With healing in His wings my Lord appears,

ContentCN: 祂手繞我胸頸，祂手繞我胸頸。
ContentEN: Embracing me in love, Embracing me in love.

ContentCN: 我是黑夜行人，晨光逐漸露影；
ContentEN: I, pilgrim of the night; The twilight’s flick’ring on.

ContentCN: 我眼流淚，我魂爆發歡聲，
ContentEN: Though weeping, still my soul bursts with delight-

ContentCN: 遙見恩主慈容。
ContentEN: His radiance I behold!

ContentCN: 回顧來程，臉上猶留淚痕，
ContentEN: With tear-stained face I glance back thro’ the night;

ContentCN: 一切已近尾聲；
ContentEN: My journey nears its close,

ContentCN: 前面榮耀正在急速降臨，
ContentEN: Descending is the glory, O, so bright!

ContentCN: 我要向主急奔，我要向主急奔。
ContentEN: To Him I swiftly run! To Him I swiftly run!

ContentCN: 如主﹐你若愛主﹐如土﹐你若愛土。

ContentCN: 少有願飄泊。

ContentCN: 卑賤卻都畏。

ContentCN: 當主凡事為他預備﹐
ContentEN: Many, should He smile upon them,

ContentCN: 他就大讚美﹔
ContentEN: Will His praise proclaim;

ContentCN: 當主稍微求他一點﹐
ContentEN: Then if for a while He leave them,

ContentCN: 但那誠實愛主的人﹐
ContentEN: But the souls who love Him truly,

ContentCN: 禍福都不問﹔
ContentEN: Let woe come or bliss,

ContentCN: 就是他們寶貴心血﹐
ContentEN: These will count their dearest hearts' blood

ContentCN: 也願為主捨。
ContentEN: Not their own but His.

ContentCN: 求主給我這樣心志﹐
ContentEN: Saviour, Thou who thus hast loved me,

ContentCN: 赤忠忘生死。

ContentEN: Give me love like this.

ContentCN: “破毀帶我到主懷！”
ContentEN: “Wrecked outright on Jesus’ breast:”

ContentCN: 毀後如此唱出來！
ContentEN: Only “wrecked” souls thus can sing;

ContentCN: 小船若是緊靠岸，
ContentEN: Little boats that hug the shore,

ContentCN: 深怕風浪的為患，
ContentEN: Fearing what the storm may bring,

ContentCN: 難知在主的懷裏，
ContentEN: Never find on Jesus’ breast,

ContentCN: 毀後所享的安息。
ContentEN: All that “wrecked” souls mean by rest.

ContentCN: 我們哀歎：“被破毀！”
ContentEN: “Wrecked outright!” So we lament;

ContentCN: 豈知“破毀”當讚美！
ContentEN: But when storms have done their worst,

ContentCN: 風浪無情的損傷，
ContentEN: Then the soul, surviving all,

ContentCN: 使我主懷享餵養。
ContentEN: In Eternal arms is nursed;

ContentCN: 在此安息主懷中，
ContentEN: There to find that nought can move

ContentCN: 何能再將我搖動？
ContentEN: One, embosomed in such love.

ContentCN: “破毀”之後，不需要
ContentEN: “Wrecked outright!” No more to own

ContentCN: 任何航行的技巧；
ContentEN: E’en a craft to sail the sea;

ContentCN: 雖然仍舊在航行，
ContentEN: Still a voyager, yet now

ContentCN: 卻是拋錨在天庭；
ContentEN: Anchored to Infinity;

ContentCN: 再不需要作或慮，
ContentEN: Nothing left to do but fling

ContentCN: 只要我和主同居。
ContentEN: Care aside, and simply cling.

ContentCN: “破毀！”成為我純益，
ContentEN: “Wrecked outright!” ‘Twas purest gain,

ContentCN: 其他航者要驚奇；
ContentEN: Henceforth other craft can see

ContentCN: 像似殘忍的摧毀，
ContentEN: That the storm may be a boon,

ContentCN: 實是化裝的恩惠！
ContentEN: That, however rough the sea,

ContentCN: 毀後乃是在主手，
ContentEN: God Himself doth watchful stand,

ContentCN: 有主自己來看守。
ContentEN: For the “wreck” is in His hand.

ContentCN: 惟有常出代價，願背十字架，
ContentEN: Cross of Christ! Lead onward, Thro’ the Holy War;

ContentCN: 我們纔會得勝，纔會得權能。
ContentEN: In this sign we conquer, Now and ever more.

ContentCN: 惟有常出代價，願背十字架，
ContentEN: Cross of Christ! Lead onward, Thro’ the Holy War:

ContentCN: 我們纔會得勝，纔會得權能。
ContentEN: In this sign we conquer, Now and ever more.

ContentCN: 不是自己力量，不是人思想，
ContentEN: Not of man the power, Not to man the fame;

ContentCN: 乃是耶穌尊名，使我們得勝。
ContentEN: We are victors only In our leader’s name.

ContentCN: 惟有常出代價，願背十字架，
ContentEN: Cross of Christ! Lead onward, Thro’ the Holy War;

ContentCN: 我們纔會得勝，纔會得權能。
ContentEN: In this sign we conquer, Now and ever more.

ContentCN: 應當除去誇耀，絕一切機巧；
ContentEN: Not with pomp and pageant, Not in earthly pride;

ContentCN: 我們應當爭戰，像耶穌一般：
ContentEN: We must fight our battles Like the Crucified.

ContentCN: 藉死亡得權能，藉失敗得勝；
ContentEN: Overcome by suff’ring, Conquer thro’ defeat;

ContentCN: 因十字架苦難，毀壞了撒但。
ContentEN: Tried and tested daily In the furnace heat.

ContentCN: 惟有常出代價，願背十字架，
ContentEN: Cross of Christ! Lead onward, Thro’ the Holy War;

ContentCN: 我們纔會得勝，纔會得權能。
ContentEN: In this sign we conquer, Now and ever more.

ContentCN: 既勇敢，又溫柔，慈仁且奮鬥；
ContentEN: Panoplied in graces, Bold, yet humbly meek;

ContentCN: 雖工作，亦安息，剛強卻無力。
ContentEN: Resting while we’re working, Strong, but ever weak.

ContentCN: 欲得反倒賜給，有能卻無依；
ContentEN: Timid, tho’ courageous, Gaining as we give;

ContentCN: 雖與救主同釘，卻滿有生命。
ContentEN: Crucified with Jesus, Yet in Him, we live.

ContentCN: 惟有常出代價，願背十字架，
ContentEN: Cross of Christ! Lead onward, Thro’ the Holy War;

ContentCN: 我們纔會得勝，纔會得權能。
ContentEN: In this sign we conquer, Now and ever more.

ContentCN: 我們若隨救主，走祂的道路，
ContentEN: Marching in the pathway That the Master trod,

ContentCN: 必須背十字架，與祂纔融洽。
ContentEN: Walks One daily with us Like the Son of God.

ContentCN: 應當忍耐到底，雖死亦不避，
ContentEN: To the end enduring, Armour ne’er laid down

ContentCN: 直等我們上天，得血染冠冕。
ContentEN: Till the Cross leads upward To the blood-bought crown.

ContentCN: 由死而生–恩主，這乃是說明
ContentEN: Life out of death - dear Master, is it spoken

ContentCN: 生命在此，或是在於來世？
ContentEN: Of the life here, or in the better land?

ContentCN: 不必等候！毀壞破碎的器皿，
ContentEN: Nay, wherefore wait? The vessel marred and broken

ContentCN: 即今可在陶人手中陶製。
ContentEN: Shall now be moulded by the Potter’s hand.

ContentCN: 由死而生–何等奇妙的復活，
ContentEN: Life out of death – oh, wondrous resurrection!

ContentCN: 種時明感軟弱，起時強壯！
ContentEN: Seed sown in conscious weakness, raised in power.

ContentCN: 祢的生命顯於勞碌和折磨，
ContentEN: Thy life lived out in days of toil and friction,

ContentCN: 時刻非我，乃是基督我王。
ContentEN: “Not I, but Christ” in me – from hour to hour.

ContentCN: 由死而生–客旅道路何孤單，
ContentEN: Life out of death - a pilgrim path and lonely,

ContentCN: 認識十架者卻都願同行；
ContentEN: Trodden by those who glory in the Cross;

ContentCN: 效法祂死，他們與祂同苦難，
ContentEN: They live in fellowship with Jesus only,

ContentCN: 因祂，就將萬事當作有損。
ContentEN: And for His sake count earthly gain but loss.

ContentCN: 由死而生–福哉，使命能長遠！
ContentEN: Life out of death – blest mission to be ever

ContentCN: 從天上的清澈純淨江河，
ContentEN: Bearing the living water, brimming o’er,

ContentCN: 生命豐盛，帶著洋溢的活泉，
ContentEN: With life abundant from the clear, pure river,

ContentCN: 告訴渴人，從茲無需再渴。
ContentEN: Telling that thirsty souls need thirst no more.

ContentCN: 哦﹐我願成為無有﹐
ContentEN: Oh, to be nothing, nothing!

ContentCN: 惟在祂腳前守候﹔
ContentEN: Only to lie at His feet,

ContentCN: 願我器皿破碎倒空﹐
ContentEN: A broken and emptied vessel

ContentCN: 好適合我主來使用。
ContentEN: For the Master's use made meet!

ContentCN: 哦﹐我願成為無有﹐
ContentEN: Oh, to be nothing, nothing!

ContentCN: 惟在祂腳前守候﹔
ContentEN: Only to lie at His feet,

ContentCN: 願我器皿破碎倒空﹐
ContentEN: A broken and emptied vessel

ContentCN: 好適合我主來使用。
ContentEN: For the Master's use made meet!

ContentCN: 倒空﹐使祂充滿我衷﹐
ContentEN: Emptied that He might fill me

ContentCN: 使我出去作祂聖工﹔
ContentEN: As forth to His service I go;

ContentCN: 破碎﹐使祂不受攔阻﹐
ContentEN: Broken that so unhinder’d

ContentCN: 使祂生命從我流出。
ContentEN: His life through me might flow.

ContentCN: 哦﹐我願成為無有﹐
ContentEN: Oh, to be nothing, nothing!

ContentCN: 惟在祂腳前守候﹔
ContentEN: Only to lie at His feet,

ContentCN: 願我器皿破碎倒空﹐
ContentEN: A broken and emptied vessel

ContentCN: 好適合我主來使用。
ContentEN: For the Master's use made meet!

ContentCN: 哦﹐我願成為無有﹐
ContentEN: Oh to be nothing, nothing!

ContentCN: 惟讓祂聖手導誘﹔
ContentEN: Only as led by His hand;

ContentCN: 作祂信使侍立門口﹐
ContentEN: A messenger at His gateway,

ContentCN: 祂的吩咐我來聽候。
ContentEN: Only waiting for His command.

ContentCN: 作祂樂器隨時預備﹐
ContentEN: Only an instrument ready

ContentCN: 照祂喜歡向祂讚美﹔
ContentEN: His praises to sound at His will;

ContentCN: 祂若無需﹐我也願意
ContentEN: Willing, should He not require me,

ContentCN: 在祂面前安靜侍立。
ContentEN: In silence to wait on Him still.

ContentCN: 哦﹐我願成為無有﹐
ContentEN: Oh, to be nothing, nothing!

ContentCN: 惟在祂腳前守候﹔
ContentEN: Only to lie at His feet,

ContentCN: 願我器皿破碎倒空﹐
ContentEN: A broken and emptied vessel

ContentCN: 好適合我主來使用。
ContentEN: For the Master's use made meet!

ContentCN: 哦﹐我願成為無有﹐
ContentEN: Oh to be nothing, nothing!

ContentCN: 降卑或許會苦憂﹔
ContentEN: Painful the humbling may be,

ContentCN: 但我願意臥於塵土﹐
ContentEN: Yet low in the dust I'd lay me

ContentCN: 好讓世人見我救主。
ContentEN: That the world might my Saviour see.

ContentCN: 甘願成為無有！無有！
ContentEN: Rather be nothing, nothing!

ContentCN: 好讓世人讚祂不休﹕
ContentEN: To Him let our voices be raised;

ContentCN: “祂是一切祝福源頭﹐
ContentEN: He is the Fountain of blessing,

ContentCN: 讚美之聲﹐惟祂配受。”
ContentEN: He only is meet to be praised.

ContentCN: 哦﹐求主救我脫離自己！
ContentEN: Oh, to be saved from myself, dear Lord,

ContentCN: 失去在祢裏面！
ContentEN: Oh, to be lost in Thee;

ContentCN: 哦﹐但願不再是自己﹐
ContentEN: Oh, that it may be no more I,

ContentCN: 惟主活我裏面！
ContentEN: But Christ that lives in me.

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐被人高舉並愛敬﹔
ContentEN: Not I, but Christ, be honoured, loved, exalted;

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐被人傳揚相信﹔
ContentEN: Not I, but Christ, be seen, be known, be heard;

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐顯在言語和步武﹔
ContentEN: Not I, but Christ, in every look and action;

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐顯在思想態度。
ContentEN: Not I, but Christ, in ev’ry tho’t and word.

ContentCN: 哦﹐求主救我脫離自己！
ContentEN: Oh, to be saved from myself, dear Lord,

ContentCN: 失去在祢裏面！
ContentEN: Oh, to be lost in Thee;

ContentCN: 哦﹐但願不再是自己﹐
ContentEN: Oh, that it may be no more I,

ContentCN: 惟主活我裏面！
ContentEN: But Christ that lives in me.

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐是我一切的起首﹔
ContentEN: Not I, but Christ, my every need supplying;

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐是供給的源頭。
ContentEN: Not I, but Christ, my strength and health to be.

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐是我所為而工作﹔
ContentEN: Christ, only Christ, for body, soul and spirit;

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐是我所為生活。
ContentEN: Christ, only Christ, live then Thy life in me.

ContentCN: 哦﹐求主救我脫離自己！
ContentEN: Oh, to be saved from myself, dear Lord,

ContentCN: 失去在祢裏面！
ContentEN: Oh, to be lost in Thee;

ContentCN: 哦﹐但願不再是自己﹐
ContentEN: Oh, that it may be no more I,

ContentCN: 惟主活我裏面！
ContentEN: But Christ that lives in me.

ContentCN: 主﹐惟有主﹐所以不再有閒言﹐
ContentEN: Christ, only Christ, no idle word e'er falling;

ContentCN: 主﹐惟有主﹐所以不再自憐﹐
ContentEN: Christ, only Christ, no needless bustling sound;

ContentCN: 主﹐惟有主﹐所以不再為自己﹐
ContentEN: Christ, only Christ, no self-important bearing;

ContentCN: 主﹐惟有主﹐所以不再自義。
ContentEN: Christ, only Christ, no trace of "I" be found.

ContentCN: 哦﹐求主救我脫離自己！
ContentEN: Oh, to be saved from myself, dear Lord,

ContentCN: 失去在祢裏面！
ContentEN: Oh, to be lost in Thee;

ContentCN: 哦﹐但願不再是自己﹐
ContentEN: Oh, that it may be no more I,

ContentCN: 惟主活我裏面！
ContentEN: But Christ that lives in me.

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐故無一可以自傲﹔
ContentEN: Not I, but Christ, to gently soothe in sorrow;

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐故無一可自暴。
ContentEN: Not I, but Christ, to wipe the falling tear;

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐因此不再有重擔﹔
ContentEN: Not I, but Christ, to lift the weary burden;

ContentCN: 非我惟主﹐因此不怕危難。
ContentEN: Not I, but Christ, to hush away all fear.

ContentCN: 哦﹐求主救我脫離自己！
ContentEN: Oh, to be saved from myself, dear Lord,

ContentCN: 失去在祢裏面！
ContentEN: Oh, to be lost in Thee;

ContentCN: 哦﹐但願不再是自己﹐
ContentEN: Oh, that it may be no more I,

ContentCN: 惟主活我裏面！
ContentEN: But Christ that lives in me.

ContentCN: 主﹐惟有主﹐不久充滿我眼睛﹔
ContentEN: Christ, only Christ, ere long will fill my vision;

ContentCN: 榮耀無比﹐不久就要顯明。
ContentEN: Glory excelling, soon, full soon, I'll see —

ContentCN: 主﹐惟有主﹐要永受我的感謝﹔
ContentEN: Christ, only Christ, my every wish fulfilling;

ContentCN: 耶穌基督﹐要永是我一切。
ContentEN: Christ, only Christ, my all in all to be.

ContentCN: “十架曾否使你疲倦？”恩主柔聲詢問。
ContentEN: “Have you grown weary of the cross?” Tenderly asked the Lord.

ContentCN: 你心曾否懊悔揀選祂來作你的分？
ContentEN: Have you regretted choosing Him to be your all in all?

ContentCN: 你心曾否意欲收回立志遵祂命令？
ContentEN: Have you intended to withdraw The loyal pledge you’ve made?

ContentCN: 親愛的主受苦雖多，愛卻是何等深；
ContentEN: My dearest Lord, tho’ deep the pain, Yet deeper is Thy love.

ContentCN: 沒有一種痛苦打擊，能稍移愛你心。
ContentEN: No suff’ring blow or painful tears can move my love for Thee.

ContentCN: 雖然道路崎嶇難行，使我發出呻吟；
ContentEN: Tho’ dark the night and rough the way, My soul does groan and sigh,

ContentCN: 靠恩我仍柔聲歌唱：我要與你同行！
ContentEN: Still by Thy grace I will softly sing, “I’ll keep walking by Thy side.”

ContentCN: “你要思想我的道路，”思想就會興奮；
ContentEN: “Reflect upon my path on earth.” This doing, lifts my heart,

ContentCN: 祂為尋我流落迷人，竟來此地微行。
ContentEN: For seeking me a wand’ring soul, He deigned to come to earth.

ContentCN: 祂受鼓舞何等的少，四圍都是虛偽；
ContentEN: Throughout His way was ruggedness, Loneliness e’er untold

ContentCN: 祂受誤會攻擊，竟在親近祂的圈內；
ContentEN: His life, so oft not understood E’en by His faithful band.

ContentCN: 祂心感覺何等孤單，雖有萬人在圍。
ContentEN: His heart, did feel such solitude, While thousands thronged His side.

ContentCN: 愛何無私！祂的行徑，感動我心欲淚；
ContentEN: His love, so selfless yet so great, Does move my tears to flow.

ContentCN: 恩何希奇！此愛今正催我效祂行為。
ContentEN: Amazing grace! Such wondrous love Prompts me His way to go.

ContentCN: 再無任何荒涼力量，能來掩蔽摧毀；
ContentEN: No more can pow’r of barrenness Encase me to destroy.

ContentCN: 因祢所賜喜樂光亮，使我疲魂甦醒，
ContentEN: The joy and light Thou givest me, Awake my weary soul,

ContentCN: 導我進入甘甜交通，迫我服祢命令。
ContentEN: Bring me into sweet fellowship, Constrain my will to yield.

ContentCN: 為此正當他人安眠，讓我深夜不睡；
ContentEN: For that, while others sweetly sleep Let me Thy vigil keep;

ContentCN: 為此正當他人歡笑，讓我座前流淚；
ContentEN: For that, while others gayly laugh, Let me before Thee weep.

ContentCN: 為此正當他人安息，讓我收割疲憊；
ContentEN: For that, while others quietly rest, Let me in labor reap.

ContentCN: 好使我能與主同帶豐滿禾捆而歸。
ContentEN: O that I may with the Lord return Bringing in sheaves one day.

ContentCN: 我以死向世上一切，因主正在招呼；
ContentEN: I’d die to all this world can give, For He is calling me;

ContentCN: 我寧捨棄一切自由，好使多人得甦；
ContentEN: I’d rather all my freedom lose, That others be revived;

ContentCN: 願意以死向我自己，來領浪子歸回。
ContentEN: I’d die to self throughout my days, Bringing the wand’rers home.

ContentCN: 恩何希奇喪失一切，所得何其豐多；
ContentEN: What wondrous grace! While losing all, O how my gains abound!

ContentCN: 撇下所有，全心跟隨，反覺萬有在握。
ContentEN: Forfeiting all to follow on, I find all in my hands.

ContentCN: 失喪生命，為我換來無窮喜樂生活；
ContentEN: This path of loss has won for me A life of endless joy.

ContentCN: 直等今生時日過盡，進入諸天居所。
ContentEN: Then to my glorious home I’ll fly, At the ending of my time.

ContentCN: 耶穌豈當獨背十架，世人卻可逃脫？
ContentEN: Must Jesus bear the cross alone, and all the world go free?

ContentCN: 不，不，每人皆有十架，也有一架為我。
ContentEN: No, there’s a cross for everyone, And there’s a cross for me.

ContentCN: 我要背負捨己之架，未死，不求豁免，
ContentEN: How happy are the saints above, Who once went sorr’wing here;

ContentCN: 有日當我歸回天家，頭戴榮耀冠冕。
ContentEN: But now they taste unmingled love, And joy without a tear.

ContentCN: 當我俯伏耶穌腳前，在那光明天庭；
ContentEN: The consecrated cross I’ll bear, Till death shall set me free,

ContentCN: 我要歡然投下冠冕，反覆稱頌主名。
ContentEN: And then go home my crown to wear, For there’s a crown for me.

ContentCN: 寶貴十架，榮耀冠冕！榮耀復活之晨！
ContentEN: Upon the crystal pavement, down At Jesus’ pierced feet,

ContentCN: 天使自天來我身邊，接我往上飛奔。
ContentEN: Joyful, I’ll cast my golden crown, And His dear name repeat.

ContentCN: 你怎沒有傷痕？
ContentEN: Hast thou no scar?

ContentCN: 沒有傷痕在你肋旁？
ContentEN: No hidden scar on foot, or side or hand?

ContentCN: 你名反倒遠播四方，
ContentEN: I hear thee sung throughout the land,

ContentCN: 你光反倒照射輝煌，
ContentEN: I hear them hail thy shining star,

ContentCN: 你怎沒有傷痕？
ContentEN: Hast thou no scar? no scar?

ContentCN: 你怎沒有傷痕？
ContentEN: Hast thou no wound?

ContentCN: 我是受迫掛在樹上，
ContentEN: Yet I was wounded by the archers, spent,

ContentCN: 四圍盡是殘忍、狂妄，
ContentEN: Leaned Me against a tree; and rent

ContentCN: 我是受盡一切創傷，
ContentEN: By ravening beasts ‘round me, I swooned:

ContentCN: 你怎沒有傷痕？
ContentEN: Hast thou no wound? no wound?

ContentCN: 怎能你無傷痕？
ContentEN: No wound? no scar?

ContentCN: 僕人該與主人同樣！
ContentEN: Yet, as the Master shall the servant be,

ContentCN: 本該與我同受創傷，
ContentEN: And pierced the feet that follow Me;

ContentCN: 而你卻是完整無恙！
ContentEN: But whole? Can he have followed far

ContentCN: 怎能你無傷痕？
ContentEN: Who has no wound nor scar?

ContentCN: 怎能你無傷痕？

ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 枷鎖、監禁，並且流放，

ContentCN: 或是捨身，餵獅廣場，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 怎能你無傷痕？
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 你是沒有傷痕！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我受摧殘，飲人鋒鋩，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 他們忍受忌恨、刀棒，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 你卻平安，不缺寧康，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 你卻沒有傷痕！

ContentCN: 直到同樂在那地。
ContentEN: Till all be joy above.

ContentCN: 我們現在默思，葡萄一生的事：
ContentEN: Consider now, dear ones, the life of a grapevine.

ContentCN: 其路並不容易，其境也不安逸；
ContentEN: It has no easy life, its hardships intertwine;

ContentCN: 不像，不像野地野花，隨地隨意吐華，
ContentEN: Unlike wild flowers in the field that gayly, wildly bloom,

ContentCN: 生成，生成曲徑迷堂，生成款式百樣。
ContentEN: In countless patterns up they grow, full liberty assume.

ContentCN: 反之葡萄開花，非常渺小無華，
ContentEN: The flowers of the vine are plain and small in size;

ContentCN: 人幾不能辨省，牠竟也曾有英；
ContentEN: So humbly do they bloom, unnoticed by most eyes.

ContentCN: 花未，花未開得一日，即已結為果實，
ContentEN: The time for blossoms is so short, soon into fruit they grow.

ContentCN: 不得，不得成為驕葩，自感丰姿可誇。
ContentEN: No charm is there for them to boast, no elegance to show.

ContentCN: 牠是拴在樁上，不能隨意生長，
ContentEN: So fastened to a post, it cannot freely grow;

ContentCN: 牠如伸肢展臂，也是架上被繫；
ContentEN: Up to the trellises its branches tied must go.

ContentCN: 牠就，牠就從了礫土，吸取牠的食物，
ContentEN: From stony soil the vine is forced to draw its food supply;

ContentCN: 道路，道路不能揀選，不能想要變遷。
ContentEN: It has no way to change its course, or from its hardship fly.

ContentCN: 是的，綠衣秀美，春地披上明媚，
ContentEN: How lovely is the green of Spring's beautiful scene!

ContentCN: 因著生命豐裕，自然生長有餘；
ContentEN: So natural is its growth, with brightness so serene.

ContentCN: 滿身，滿身嫩枝細苗，開始飄浮盤繞，
ContentEN: Out of the vine's abundant life so full and so complete,

ContentCN: 在於，在於青藍空中，得嘗甘美無窮。
ContentEN: Against the azure, branches flow to taste the air so sweet.

ContentCN: 但是園主園工，對牠並不放鬆，
ContentEN: Behold, the master comes His guidance to provide;

ContentCN: 帶著刈剪修刀，要剝牠的驕傲；
ContentEN: The pruning knife he brings to strip it of its pride,

ContentCN: 毫不，毫不顧惜細嫩，將牠割到標準，
ContentEN: Not minding all its tender shoots, to cleanse and cleanse again,

ContentCN: 所有，所有多餘美穗，都被斷折破碎。
ContentEN: Till all excessive branches fall to comply with his plan.

ContentCN: 在牠損失期間，牠並不敢自憐，
ContentEN: During this time of loss, dare it self-pity show?

ContentCN: 乃是反將自己，更為完全徹底；
ContentEN: No, no, it yields but more to him who wounds it so,

ContentCN: 交給，交給剝奪所有，使牠虛空的手，
ContentEN: Yes, to the hand that strips it of all glory and all pride.

ContentCN: 牠力，牠力不肯損失，一切都為結實。
ContentEN: The vine thus keeps the strength of life that much fruit may abide.

ContentCN: 那些流血的枝，漸變堅硬木質，
ContentEN: To hardened wood is turned each stump of bleeding shoot,

ContentCN: 那些存留的穗，也漸結果纍纍；
ContentEN: And each remaining branch brings forth abundant fruit.

ContentCN: 太陽，太陽迫牠枯乾，牠葉開始落散，
ContentEN: Scorched by the burning sun, its leaves turn dry and fall away.

ContentCN: 使牠，使牠果子盛紫，直至收成日子。
ContentEN: The fruit thus ripens more and more until the harvest day.

ContentCN: 牠因負重過甚，致牠無枝不沉-
ContentEN: Due to the fruitful load, the branches are brought low,

ContentCN: 這是長期努力，受盡琢磨來的-
ContentEN: The consequence of pain and many a thoughtful blow.

ContentCN: 現今，現今果已全美，自然牠可自慰；
ContentEN: In bearing clusters of fine fruit, comforted it must be;

ContentCN: 但是，但是收成已到，欣慰日子已少。
ContentEN: But soon will come the harvest time, the days of comfort flee.

ContentCN: 有手要來摘下，有腳要來踐踏，
ContentEN: Upon the hand-picked fruit comes treading of the feet.

ContentCN: 葡萄所有寶藏，在於酒醡之上，
ContentEN: The greatest treasure lies where grapes and wine-press meet.

ContentCN: 直到，直到豐富紅酒，有如長江大流，
ContentEN: When grapes are crushed inside the press, red wine begins to flow,

ContentCN: 源源，源源滾湧不息，喜樂遍滿全地。
ContentEN: Like surging rivers bringing joy the earth to overflow.

ContentCN: 但是葡萄形狀，乃是剝光淒涼，
ContentEN: So barren is the vine, its all is spent in full,

ContentCN: 已經給了一切，又將進入黑夜；
ContentEN: And now its plight again is dreary night and woe.

ContentCN: 無人，無人向牠償還，牠所給人醉歡，
ContentEN: No one would stoop to thank the vine for cheering wine that's drunk;

ContentCN: 反而，反而將牠再砍，成為無枝禿幹。
ContentEN: Instead, more stripping is at hand to make a branchless trunk.

ContentCN: 然而全冬之間，牠酒卻賜甘甜，
ContentEN: Throughout the winter time, its wine gives warmth, and cheers

ContentCN: 給那寒冷之中，憂鬱愁苦之眾；
ContentEN: The shiv'ring ones whose chill is mixed with grief and tears.

ContentCN: 但牠，但牠卻在外面，經歷雪地冰天，
ContentEN: But midst the ice and snow without, the vine is thus to stand.

ContentCN: 前來，前來忍受一切，一切何其難解。
ContentEN: Why does it strive to bear it all? It's hard to understand.

ContentCN: 直到寒冬已過，牠又豫備結果，
ContentEN: When winter's o'er, it yearns once more much fruit to bear.

ContentCN: 重新萌芽生枝，再來放綠成姿，
ContentEN: New shoots come forth again to weave its garment fair.

ContentCN: 不因，不因所受磨難，心中埋怨不甘，
ContentEN: It has no murm'ring or complaint for winter's sore abuse.

ContentCN: 不因，不因損失無限，而欲減少奉獻。
ContentEN: Its all it gives, and still wills not its off'ring to reduce.

ContentCN: 牠的所有呼吸，盡是高天清氣，
ContentEN: It stretches up toward heav'n, and breathes the fresh clean air.

ContentCN: 並不半點沾染不潔屬己情感；
ContentEN: Untouched by earthly joy, self-love it does not bear.

ContentCN: 面向，面向犧牲含笑，再來接受雕削，
ContentEN: It smiles at sacrifice ahead, accepting odds once more;

ContentCN: 有如，有如從未遇過損失或者折磨。
ContentEN: As if no strokes, no stripping sore can it ever recall.

ContentCN: 葡萄從牠肢枝，流酒、流血、流汁，
ContentEN: Much sap and wine and blood out from its branches flow.

ContentCN: 是否因己捨盡，牠就變為更貧？
ContentEN: Does emptying itself cause it more poor to grow?

ContentCN: 世上，世上醉人浪者，從牠暢飲、作樂，
ContentEN: From it, drunkards and wanderers do drink and merry make.

ContentCN: 他們，他們是否享福？能否變為更富？
ContentEN: Do they, from pleasure much, become more wealthy when they wake?

ContentCN: 估量生命原則，以失不是以得；
ContentEN: Measure your life by loss, never measure by gain;

ContentCN: 不視酒飲幾多，乃視酒傾幾何；
ContentEN: Not by much wine consumed, but wine poured out in pain.

ContentCN: 因為，因為愛的能力，是在愛的捨棄；
ContentEN: The strength of love stands ever in love's sacrifice to show.

ContentCN: 誰苦，誰苦受得最深，最有可以給人。
ContentEN: The more one suffers, then the more true love can he bestow.

ContentCN: 誰待自己最苛，最易為神選擇；
ContentEN: He who spares not himself is best for God to gain;

ContentCN: 誰傷自己最狠，最能擦人淚痕；
ContentEN: Who hurts himself the most can best soothe those in pain.

ContentCN: 誰不，誰不熟練剝奪，誰是鳴鈸響鑼；
ContentEN: Unless well-learned in being stripped, a sounding brass is he.

ContentCN: 誰能，誰能拯救自己，誰就不能樂極。
ContentEN: Unless averse to saving self, ne'er can he blissful be.

ContentCN: 領我,領我去加畧，在彼主為我捨身；
ContentEN: Lead, lead me to Calvary - there where Jesus died for me,

ContentCN: 被人藐視,被神定罪厭棄，
ContentEN: Despised by men and forsaken by God,

ContentCN: 甘忍苦痛無怨恨。
ContentEN: Suffered of His own accord.

ContentCN: 領我，領我去加畧，在彼你示愛奇、真；
ContentEN: Lead, lead me to Calvary - there reveal Thy love for me.

ContentCN: 領我，領我去加畧，加畧今成我永分。
ContentEN: Lead, lead me to Calvary - there where my portion shall be.

ContentCN: 領我，領我去加畧，那是我惟一途徑；
ContentEN: Lead, lead me to Calvary - yes, there, where my path shall be!

ContentCN: 我願有分救主羞辱、痛傷，
ContentEN: One with my Saviour in suffering and loss,

ContentCN: 歷十架殺死功效。
ContentEN: Dying the death of the cross.

ContentCN: 領我，領我去加畧，那是我得勝之境；
ContentEN: Lead, lead me to Calvary - yes, there is my victory!

ContentCN: 領我，領我去加畧，那是我永遠榮耀。
ContentEN: Lead, lead me to Calvary - there, where my glory shall be!

ContentCN: 主，我今背十架，前來跟隨祢，
ContentEN: Lord, here I take my cross now to follow Thee,

ContentCN: 浮名利，虛榮華，一概都捨棄；
ContentEN: Worldly gain, empty fame are but dross to me.

ContentCN: 人譏笑，人辱罵，我全不在意，
ContentEN: Men may sneer, men may jeer, pain may come or stay;

ContentCN: 雖受苦，雖受壓，窄路不稍離。
ContentEN: Naught can cause me to stray from the narrow way.

ContentCN: 靠主恩，遵主話，忠心直到底；
ContentEN: Thro' His word, by His grace, I would faithful be;

ContentCN: 到那日，回天家，冠冕榮無比，
ContentEN: Till at last I reach home, there's a crown for me,…

ContentCN: 冠冕榮無比，冠冕榮無比。
ContentEN: A bright crown for me, … yes, a crown for me.

ContentCN: 聯於基督得勝的主，並祂十架工夫；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我處艱難仍覺穩固，因祂必定扶助。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 聯於基督復活的主，現今居於天府；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 十架榮光立時彰顯無限希奇恩典。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 聯於基督完全得勝，我靈立即飛騰；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 靠主聖名我一宣告，黑暗權勢即逃。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 復活基督，祢真莊嚴！願我與祢相聯；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢十字架時常得勝，敗壞撒但兇橫。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 聯於基督，何等尊大！這是神的救法；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 這叫我們永遠讚美，因為羔羊真配。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 與祢合一﹐永遠之子﹐因信與祢成一靈﹔
ContentEN: One with Thee, Thou Son eternal, joined by faith in spirit one,

ContentCN: 得祢包羅萬有的死﹐和非受造的生命。
ContentEN: Share we in Thy death inclusive and Thy life, O God the Son.

ContentCN: 與祢合一﹐蒙愛之子﹐藉恩成為祢一部﹔
ContentEN: One with Thee, Thou Son beloved, part of Thee become through grace,

ContentCN: 與祢同為父的後嗣﹐並作聖靈的房屋。
ContentEN: Heirs with Thee of our one Father, we're Thy Spirit's dwelling place.

ContentCN: 與祢合一﹐化身之子﹐作祢奧秘的肢體﹔
ContentEN: One with Thee, Thou Son incarnate, born with Thee, the Man of worth,

ContentCN: 因祢誕生與祢連枝﹐與祢一同客此地。
ContentEN: We the members of Thy body sojourn with Thee here on earth.

ContentCN: 與祢合一﹐受膏之子﹐同得聖靈的能力﹔
ContentEN: One with Thee, Thou Son anointed, sharing too the Spirit's power,

ContentCN: 日復一日﹐時復一時﹐與祢合作不稍離。
ContentEN: We in full cooperation labor with Thee hour by hour.

ContentCN: 與祢合一﹐被棄之子﹐經過審判和咒詛﹔
ContentEN: One with Thee, Thou Son forsaken, judgment and the curse we've passed;

ContentCN: 永遠同祢向罪而死﹐並勝兇惡的陰府。
ContentEN: We to sin are dead forever, hell beneath our feet is cast.

ContentCN: 與祢合一﹐復活之子﹐脫離墳墓的埋沒﹔
ContentEN: One with Thee in resurrection, death can never us oppress;

ContentCN: 因祢更生﹐同祢更始﹐靠祢逐日結義果。
ContentEN: Live we in Thy new creation, bearing fruits of righteousness.

ContentCN: 與祢合一﹐升天之子﹐同登寶座來管治﹔
ContentEN: One with Thee, Thou Son ascended, seated with Thee on the throne,

ContentCN: 祢的權柄我也掌執﹐因我和祢同位置。
ContentEN: Thine authority we share and rule with Thee, Thy rank our own.

ContentCN: 與祢合一﹐再來之子﹐同得榮耀同臨世﹔
ContentEN: One with Thee, Thou Son returning, glorified with Thee we'll be,

ContentCN: 那時都要顯祢殊姿﹐與祢合一無已時。
ContentEN: E'er to manifest Thy beauty, one with Thee eternally.

ContentCN: 充滿我心境﹐神聖救主﹐
ContentEN: Fill all my vision, Savior divine,

ContentCN: 直到主榮耀從我靈反映﹔
ContentEN: Till with Thy glory my spirit shall shine.

ContentCN: 充滿我心境﹐使人共睹
ContentEN: Fill all my vision, that all may see

ContentCN: 主聖潔榮形﹐從我內反映。
ContentEN: Thy holy image reflected in me.

ContentCN: 充滿我心境﹐榮耀異象﹗
ContentEN: Fill all my vision, Savior, I pray,

ContentCN: 今只見耶穌﹐是我懇請﹔
ContentEN: Let me see only Jesus today;

ContentCN: 雖經死蔭谷﹐救主前領﹐
ContentEN: Tho' through the valley Thou leadest me,

ContentCN: 主榮耀四繞漫溢不稍停。
ContentEN: Thy fadeless glory encompasseth me.

ContentCN: 充滿我心境﹐神聖救主﹐
ContentEN: Fill all my vision, Savior divine,

ContentCN: 直到主榮耀從我靈反映﹔
ContentEN: Till with Thy glory my spirit shall shine.

ContentCN: 充滿我心境﹐使人共睹
ContentEN: Fill all my vision, that all may see

ContentCN: 主聖潔榮形﹐從我內反映。
ContentEN: Thy holy image reflected in me.

ContentCN: 充滿我心境﹗使每慾求
ContentEN: Fill all my vision, every desire

ContentCN: 皆為主榮耀﹐而蒙保守﹔
ContentEN: Keep for Thy glory; my soul inspire

ContentCN: 願祢的完全﹐激勵我心,
ContentEN: With Thy perfection, Thy holy love,

ContentCN: 傾注祢大愛﹐漫溢我全程。
ContentEN: Flooding my pathway with light from above.

ContentCN: 充滿我心境﹐神聖救主﹐
ContentEN: Fill all my vision, Savior divine,

ContentCN: 直到主榮耀從我靈反映﹔
ContentEN: Till with Thy glory my spirit shall shine.

ContentCN: 充滿我心境﹐使人共睹
ContentEN: Fill all my vision, that all may see

ContentCN: 主聖潔榮形﹐從我內反映。
ContentEN: Thy holy image reflected in me.

ContentCN: 充滿我心境﹗使無罪影﹐
ContentEN: Fill all my vision, let naught of sin

ContentCN: 免遮蔽我衷﹐榮耀輝映﹔
ContentEN: Shadow the brightness shining within.

ContentCN: 使我只見祢可頌面容﹐
ContentEN: Let me see only Thy blessed face,

ContentCN: 我魂常飽享祢無限恩中。
ContentEN: Feasting my soul on Thy infinite grace.

ContentCN: 我主，祢說祢是真樹，
ContentEN: Thou hast said Thou art the Vine,

ContentCN: 我是祢的真枝子；
ContentEN: Lord, And that I'm a branch in Thee,

ContentCN: 但我不知為何緣故，
ContentEN: But I do not know the reason

ContentCN: 我是如此不結實。
ContentEN: Why I should so barren be.

ContentCN: 我心羨慕結果更多，
ContentEN: Bearing fruit is my deep longing,

ContentCN: 更能彰顯祢生命；
ContentEN: More Thy life to manifest,

ContentCN: 更能榮耀歸與寶座，
ContentEN: To Thy throne to bring more glory,

ContentCN: 更能禱告得答應。
ContentEN: That Thy will may be expressed.

ContentCN: 但是，主阿，我不明白，
ContentEN: But I fail to understand, Lord,

ContentCN: 常在裏面的聖言；
ContentEN: What it means-“abide in Me,”

ContentCN: 我越追求要去"常在，"
ContentEN: For the more I seek “abiding,”

ContentCN: 我越發現在外邊。
ContentEN: More I feel I'm not in Thee.

ContentCN: 我不覺得我在裏面，
ContentEN: How I feel I'm not abiding;

ContentCN: 我也禱告並立志！
ContentEN: Though I pray and strongly will,

ContentCN: 但祢都像隔開很遠，
ContentEN: Yes from me Thou seemest distant,

ContentCN: 生命仍然無果子。
ContentEN: And my life is barren still.

ContentCN: 但祢是說，祢已是樹，
ContentEN: Yet Thou art the Vine, Thou saidst it,

ContentCN: 我也已是祢枝子；
ContentEN: And I am a branch in Thee;

ContentCN: 當我信祢作我救主，
ContentEN: When I take Thee as my Savior,

ContentCN: 聖靈已成此事實。
ContentEN: Then this fact is wrought in me.

ContentCN: 我今已是在祢裏面，
ContentEN: Now I'm in Thee and I need not

ContentCN: 再也不必求加入；
ContentEN: Seek into Thyself to come,

ContentCN: 我是已經與祢結聯，
ContentEN: For I'm joined to Thee already,

ContentCN: 完全合一的骨肉。
ContentEN: With Thy flesh and bones I'm one.

ContentCN: 祕訣不是要我"去在，"
ContentEN: Not to “go in” is the secret,

ContentCN: 事實是我"已在"內；
ContentEN: But that I'm “already in!”

ContentCN: 所求乃是不要離開，
ContentEN: That I ne'er may leave I'd ask Thee,

ContentCN: 不是如何得地位。
ContentEN: Not how I may get within.

ContentCN: 我已在內，已在祢內！
ContentEN: I am in, already in Thee!

ContentCN: 這是神作的事實！
ContentEN: What a place to which I'm brought!

ContentCN: 不必禱告，不必作為，
ContentEN: There's no need for prayer or struggling,

ContentCN: 乃是神手的設施。
ContentEN: God Himself the work has wrought.

ContentCN: 我已在內，怎求入內？
ContentEN: Since I'm in, why ask to enter?

ContentCN: 我是何等的愚昧；
ContentEN: O how ignorant I've been!

ContentCN: 現今我只歡樂讚美，
ContentEN: Now with praise and much rejoicing

ContentCN: 相信聖言的無偽。
ContentEN: For Thy Word, I dwell therein.

ContentCN: 我今只有完全安息，
ContentEN: Now in Thee I rest completely,

ContentCN: 知道祢是我一切；
ContentEN: With myself I gladly part;

ContentCN: 祢是生命，祢是能力，
ContentEN: Thou art life and Thou art power,

ContentCN: 而我一切都了結。
ContentEN: All in all to me Thou art.

ContentCN: 哦，耶穌我主，我救主，
ContentEN: O Jesus, my Lord and Savior,

ContentCN: 使我能專心跟從主；
ContentEN: Help me to fully follow Thee;

ContentCN: 祢怎樣為我而死而活，
ContentEN: In life and death and loving service,

ContentCN: 讓我照樣為祢死活。
ContentEN: As Thou hast lived and died for me.

ContentCN: 祂為我死，我纔能活，
ContentEN: He died for me that I might live;

ContentCN: 我今為祂活著；
ContentEN: I live for Him who died,

ContentCN: 我命、我愛，我都獻給
ContentEN: My life, my love to Him I give,

ContentCN: 那為我釘死的。
ContentEN: Jesus, the Crucified.

ContentCN: 哦，耶穌我主，我救主，
ContentEN: O Jesus, my Lord and Savior,

ContentCN: 使我能專心跟從主；
ContentEN: Help me to fully follow Thee;

ContentCN: 祢怎樣為我而死而活，
ContentEN: In life and death and loving service,

ContentCN: 讓我照樣為祢死活。
ContentEN: As Thou hast lived and died for me.

ContentCN: 祂為我死，我纔能死，
ContentEN: He died for me that I might die

ContentCN: 脫離罪、己、俗世；
ContentEN: To Satan, self, and sin;

ContentCN: 哦，死何奧，哦，生何高，
ContentEN: O death so deep! O life so high!

ContentCN: 願我聯合倚靠！
ContentEN: Help me to enter in.

ContentCN: 哦，耶穌我主，我救主，
ContentEN: O Jesus, my Lord and Savior,

ContentCN: 使我能專心跟從主；
ContentEN: Help me to fully follow Thee;

ContentCN: 祢怎樣為我而死而活，
ContentEN: In life and death and loving service,

ContentCN: 讓我照樣為祢死活。
ContentEN: As Thou hast lived and died for me.

ContentCN: 祂為我活，我纔能活，
ContentEN: He lives for me that I may live

ContentCN: 像祂那樣"無我；"
ContentEN: As spotless e'en as He;

ContentCN: 求主從我顯祢性情，
ContentEN: Savior, to me Thy nature give,

ContentCN: 活出祢的生命。
ContentEN: And live Thy life in me.

ContentCN: 哦，耶穌我主，我救主，
ContentEN: O Jesus, my Lord and Savior,

ContentCN: 使我能專心跟從主；
ContentEN: Help me to fully follow Thee;

ContentCN: 祢怎樣為我而死而活，
ContentEN: In life and death and loving service,

ContentCN: 讓我照樣為祢死活。
ContentEN: As Thou hast lived and died for me.

ContentCN: 祂為我活，我願一生
ContentEN: He lives for me that I may give

ContentCN: 把祂分給眾人；
ContentEN: His love to hearts that pine;

ContentCN: 讓我像主為人而活，
ContentEN: Let me like Him for others live,

ContentCN: 跟隨主的領率。
ContentEN: And trace His steps divine.

ContentEN: Moment by moment I'm kept in His love,

ContentCN: 我時時刻刻從祂得生命﹔
ContentEN: Moment by moment I've life from above;

ContentEN: Looking to Jesus till glory doth shine;

ContentEN: Moment by moment O Lord, I am Thine.

ContentEN: Never a burden that He doth not bear,

ContentEN: Never a sorrow that He doth not share —

ContentCN: 我時時刻刻在祂眷顧中。
ContentEN: Moment by moment I'm under His care.

ContentEN: Never a heartache, and never a groan,

ContentCN: 沒有一歎息﹐沒有一鬱悶﹐
ContentEN: Never a teardrop, and never a moan,

ContentCN: 沒有一艱難-因在寶座上﹐
ContentEN: Never a danger — but there on the throne

ContentCN: 祂時時刻刻思念祂的人。
ContentEN: Moment by moment He thinks of His own.

ContentCN: 我時時刻刻蒙祂愛保守,
ContentEN: Moment by moment I'm kept in His love,

ContentEN: Moment by moment O Lord, I am Thine.

ContentCN: 沒有一軟弱﹐祂不曾扶助﹐
ContentEN: Never a weakness that He doth not feel,

ContentCN: 沒有一疾病﹐祂不能醫治﹔
ContentEN: Never a sickness that He cannot heal;

ContentCN: 時時刻刻﹐無論是樂是苦﹐
ContentEN: Moment by moment in woe or in weal,

ContentCN: 耶穌我救主﹐與我同行止。
ContentEN: Jesus, my Savior, abides with me still.

ContentCN: 我的心愛主﹐祢是我異象﹐
ContentEN: Be Thou my Vision, O Lord of my heart;

ContentCN: 惟祢是我一切﹐他皆虛幻﹔
ContentEN: Naught be all else to me, save that Thou art —

ContentCN: 白晝或黑夜﹐我最甜思想﹐
ContentEN: Thou my best thought by day or by night,

ContentCN: 行走或安息﹐祢是我光亮。
ContentEN: Waking or sleeping, Thy presence my light.

ContentCN: 祢是我活道﹐祢是我智慧﹐
ContentEN: Be Thou my Wisdom, and Thou my true Word;

ContentCN: 主﹐我永屬於祢﹐祢永屬我﹔
ContentEN: I ever with Thee and Thou with me, Lord;

ContentCN: 祢是我慈父﹐我是祢真子﹐
ContentEN: Thou my great Father and I Thy true son,

ContentCN: 祢居我衷裡﹐我與祢合一。
ContentEN: Thou in me dwelling and I with Thee one.

ContentCN: 財富與稱讚﹐非我所傾意﹐
ContentEN: Riches I heed not, nor man's empty praise,

ContentCN: 惟祢是我基業﹐直到永遠﹔
ContentEN: Thou mine inheritance, now and always,

ContentCN: 主﹐祢﹐惟獨祢﹐居我心首位﹐
ContentEN: Thou and Thou only first in my heart,

ContentCN: 諸天之君尊﹐祢是我寶庫。
ContentEN: High King of heaven, my Treasure Thou art.

ContentCN: 諸天之君尊﹐祢為我奏凱﹐
ContentEN: High King of heaven, my victory won,

ContentCN: 使我充滿天樂﹐充滿我心﹔
ContentEN: May I reach heaven's joys, O bright heav'n's Sun!

ContentCN: 祢是我心愛﹐無論何遭遇﹐
ContentEN: Heart of my own heart, whatever befall,

ContentCN: 有祢在掌權﹐仍是我異象﹗
ContentEN: Still be my Vision, O Ruler of all.

ContentEN: Jesus! I am resting, resting, in the joy of what Thou art;

ContentCN: 因祢柔愛我所素悉﹐何等廣無邊。
ContentEN: I am finding out the greatness of Thy loving heart.

ContentCN: 祢的慈愛何其泱漭﹐遠超地上的海洋﹐
ContentEN: Oh, how great Thy loving kindness, vaster, broader than the sea;

ContentCN: 祢的良善何其深長﹐盡耗我身上﹔
ContentEN: Oh, how marvelous Thy goodness, lavished all on me!

ContentCN: 愛主﹐我今能夠安息﹐因知祢恩何豐富﹐
ContentEN: Yes, I rest in Thee, Beloved. Know what wealth of grace is Thine,

ContentCN: 又因應許堅定不移﹐都完全賜吾！
ContentEN: Know Thy certainty of promise, and have made it mine.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我今歡然安息在"祢是誰"的上面﹐
ContentEN: Jesus! I am resting, resting, in the joy of what Thou art;

ContentCN: 因祢柔愛我所素悉﹐何等廣無邊。
ContentEN: I am finding out the greatness of Thy loving heart.

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐我惟簡單信祢﹐看見祢到底是誰﹐
ContentEN: Simply trusting Thee, Lord Jesus, I behold Thee as Thou art,

ContentCN: 並看見愛純淨不移﹐滿足我心內﹔
ContentEN: And Thy love, so pure, so changeless, satisfies my heart -

ContentCN: 滿足它的最深渴慕﹐供應它的大需要﹐
ContentEN: Satisfies its deepest longings, meets, supplies its every need,

ContentCN: 四圍都是祢的祝福﹐這愛真榮耀！
ContentEN: Compasseth me round with blessings, Thine is love indeed.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐我今歡然安息在"祢是誰"的上面﹐
ContentEN: Jesus! I am resting, resting, in the joy of what Thou art;

ContentCN: 因祢柔愛我所素悉﹐何等廣無邊。
ContentEN: I am finding out the greatness of Thy loving heart.

ContentCN: 或是工作﹐或是等候﹐求主常用臉光照﹐
ContentEN: Ever lift Thy face upon me, as I work and wait for Thee,

ContentCN: 祢的笑容使我歌謳﹐沉悶陰影消﹔
ContentEN: Resting 'neath Thy smile, Lord Jesus, earth's dark shadows flee.

ContentCN: 祢是父的光明榮耀﹐是父臉上的丰采﹐
ContentEN: Brightness of my Father's glory, sunshine of my Father's face,

ContentCN: 保守我心安息、信靠﹐並滿祢的愛。
ContentEN: Keep me ever trusting, resting, fill me with Thy grace.

ContentCN: 求主啟示主自己，使我認識我肉體；
ContentEN: Lord, reveal Thyself to me, That the flesh I'll fully know;

ContentCN: 願主亮光大作工，使我俯伏灰塵中。
ContentEN: May Thy grace so work in me, That in dust I'll lowly bow.

ContentCN: 追憶我已久求勝，直到今日仍無能！
ContentEN: How I long for victory, Yet, thru all my life, how weak!

ContentCN: 善雖願意作不來，惡雖恨惡脫不開。
ContentEN: Evil things I cannot leave, Nor can do the good I seek.

ContentCN: 裏面意思雖要神，一行出來總可恨；
ContentEN: Inwardly I want the Lord, But my conduct hateful is;

ContentCN: 愛莫能助將奈何！事與願違真束縛！
ContentEN: Though I would, I cannot change, O what real bondage it is!

ContentCN: 神律纔顯罪便在，善念一動惡也來；
ContentEN: By God's law my sin's revealed, But the law of sin doth bind;

ContentCN: 肢體的律擄了我，掙扎奮鬥終難脫。
ContentEN: Though I struggle to be free, No release my soul can find.

ContentCN: 多次跌倒，多次起，時而立志，時而遺，
ContentEN: Many times I fall and rise, Oft resolve and often fail;

ContentCN: 要求得勝反退潰，願意成聖倒污穢。
ContentEN: Craving vict'ry, I retreat, And my sad defeat bewail.

ContentCN: 我實已是賣給罪，我真已經無能為，
ContentEN: Truly I am sold to sin and completely powerless;

ContentCN: 我的肉體沒良善，我的自己乃黑暗。
ContentEN: There's no good within my flesh, All is dark and sinfulness.

ContentCN: 我今已略識自己，實在沒有一點力，
ContentEN: Now I know myself in part, And confess my helplessness;

ContentCN: 我的性情真古怪，我的生命全敗壞，
ContentEN: All my temperament is odd, All my life corrupted is.

ContentCN: 我心詭詐不可靠，我人軟弱不能保，
ContentEN: Subtle self I cannot trust, Nor to fleshly strength can cling;

ContentCN: 我今所有的盼望，都在耶穌我的王。
ContentEN: All my trust and all my hope is in Jesus Christ my King.

ContentCN: 求主十架治死我，使我靠主而生活；
ContentEN: May the Cross put me to death that on Christ I may rely;

ContentCN: 求主聖靈充滿我，使我憑主而工作。
ContentEN: May His Holy Spirit fill, That Himself I may apply.

ContentCN: 願主的死在我身，天天作工比前深；
ContentEN: May His death so work in me daily deeper than before,

ContentCN: 讓我自己全消滅，讓主生命來提挈。
ContentEN: That my self may be destroyed, And His life thru me may pour.

ContentCN: 我的光景真是苦，誰能使我不為奴-
ContentEN: O how bitter is my case! Who this wretched slave can free,

ContentCN: 救我脫離取死身，使我能夠常得勝？
ContentEN: Who deliver from this death, To a life of victory?

ContentCN: 耶穌為我流寶血，基督作我的聖潔；
ContentEN: Jesus shed His blood for me, Christ is now my holiness;

ContentCN: 我今接祂為生命，我今服祂的號令。
ContentEN: I receive Him as my life and my portion measureless.

ContentCN: 完全聖潔無惡意！完全順服無自己-
ContentEN: Now I'm wholly sanctified, Selfless, I obey His word;

ContentCN: 不再覺羞到父前！不再難過見主面！
ContentEN: Nevermore to feel ashamed when I come before the Lord.

ContentCN: 哦，這生命何等高！一信，主恩即臨到！
ContentEN: How transcendent is this life! Grace thru faith He gives to me!

ContentCN: 感謝主今聽呼求，使我完全得自由。
ContentEN: Praise the Lord, He heard my cry and has made me wholly free.

ContentCN: 當我憑著自己思想，
ContentEN: When I am in the natural man,

ContentCN: 我覺自己很是剛強；
ContentEN: How very strong I feel I am;

ContentCN: 不知自己卻是怎樣
ContentEN: I do not know, I cannot scan,

ContentCN: 沒有力量。
ContentEN: How very weak I am.

ContentCN: 當我生活世人中間，
ContentEN: When in the world I have my life,

ContentCN: 我就不覺自己虧欠；
ContentEN: I cannot sense my failure rife,

ContentCN: 只覺自己如何奮勉，
ContentEN: But boasting in my earnest strife,

ContentCN: 如何上前。
ContentEN: Proudly I forward press.

ContentCN: 當我住在黑暗裏面，
ContentEN: When I within the darkness dwell,

ContentCN: 我就不知自己浮淺；
ContentEN: My shallow state I cannot tell;

ContentCN: 以為自己何等無限，
ContentEN: I only think how I excel,

ContentCN: 不必虛謙。
ContentEN: Needing no modesty.

ContentCN: 當我來到祢的面前，
ContentEN: But when at last I come to Thee,

ContentCN: 亮光刺破遮蔽幕簾；
ContentEN: Thy searching light uncovers me;

ContentCN: 我就看見前所未見，
ContentEN: I see what I could never see -

ContentCN: 完全露現。
ContentEN: My ugly self exposed.

ContentCN: 在祢面前我只萎縮，
ContentEN: Wither'ng beneath Thy scorching ray,

ContentCN: 一切萎縮、一切消沒；
ContentEN: I find my all fading away.

ContentCN: 所有驕傲都變軟弱，
ContentEN: My self-esteem in dust I lay,

ContentCN: 都變赤裸。
ContentEN: My weakness I embrace.

ContentCN: 沒有可驕，沒有可傲，
ContentEN: There's not a thing that pride can claim;

ContentCN: 沒有可依，沒有可靠；
ContentEN: There's not a member but is lame;

ContentCN: 只有自慚，只有自懊，
ContentEN: There's only deep regret and shame;

ContentCN: 能否禱告？
ContentEN: O Lord, how can I pray?

ContentCN: 幸有祢血免我定罪，
ContentEN: Thy blood from judgment sets me free;

ContentCN: 祢的生命免我銷燬；
ContentEN: Thy life from doom delivers me.

ContentCN: 但我真是何等污穢，
ContentEN: How filthy yet I still must be,

ContentCN: 何等慚愧。
ContentEN: In shame my head I bow.

ContentCN: 所有驕傲都是愚昧，
ContentEN: In blindness I'm puffed up with pride,

ContentCN: 看見實在，何必謙卑；
ContentEN: Thinking no need the facts to hide.

ContentCN: 所有自恃都是因為
ContentEN: My self-conceit has multiplied,

ContentCN: 心中墨黑。
ContentEN: While I in darkness boast.

ContentCN: 靜，我也錯；動，我也錯；
ContentEN: Whether I stay or move along,

ContentCN: 不說，不安；說，又太過；
ContentEN: Whate'er I say, I'm always wrong!

ContentCN: 都是失敗，都是軟弱，
ContentEN: So weak am I and never strong,

ContentCN: 都是不妥。
ContentEN: Nothing I do is right.

ContentCN: 我要禱告，沒有信心，
ContentEN: I want to pray, but faith have not,

ContentCN: 我要倚靠，如何求尋？
ContentEN: I fain would seek Thee as Thou art,

ContentCN: 不知如何方能重新…
ContentEN: Oh, canst Thou e'er renew my heart,

ContentCN: 主阿，憐憫！
ContentEN: Have mercy, Lord, on me!

ContentCN: 意志薄弱，能力軟弱，
ContentEN: My will is weak, my strength is frail,

ContentCN: 盼望已經全都消滅﹔
ContentEN: And all my hope is nearly gone;

ContentCN: 只有信託祢的工作，
ContentEN: I can but trust Thy working true

ContentCN: 將我這人溫柔提挈。
ContentEN: To gently hold and lead me on.

ContentCN: 盡我所有，所有失敗，
ContentEN: I've tried my best, but still have failed,

ContentCN: 失敗至今，失敗頻頻﹔
ContentEN: E'en as before I've failed and erred;

ContentCN: 無何可信，信祢能耐，
ContentEN: Thy patience is my only trust,

ContentCN: 能夠促我聽祢聲音。
ContentEN: To hold and keep me to Thy word.

ContentCN: 當我的心稍微高仰，
ContentEN: Whene'er my heart is lifted up,

ContentCN: 我就近乎跌倒危地；
ContentEN: How very near I am to fall;

ContentCN: 我不敢作，我不敢想，
ContentEN: I dare not do, I dare not think,

ContentCN: 事事處處，我需要祢。
ContentEN: I need Thyself in great or small.

ContentCN: 祢是救主…剛強…體貼，
ContentEN: Thou art my Savior, strength and stay,

ContentCN: 哦，主，我今尋求祢面；
ContentEN: O Lord, I come to seek Thy face;

ContentCN: 雖然我是弱中弱者，
ContentEN: Though I'm the weakest of the weak,

ContentCN: 我的能力惟祢恩典。
ContentEN: My strength is nothing but Thy grace.

ContentCN: 嘴唇不潔，心思不潔，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 都是失敗，都是污穢；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 前所盼望，今已消滅，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主，祢是否仍有恩惠？
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 聖潔裏面，仍有行為，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 謙卑時候，仍憑自己；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 連我流淚為罪懊悔，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 都需祢血把它潔淨。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 最好存心，仍存自己，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 最大捨己，仍有動機；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我心就是我的仇敵，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主，我希望可否在祢？
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 事奉神中，有己意思，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 愛別人中，有己興趣；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我不能動，我不敢止，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 事事處處有己寄寓。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的所有，無一純潔，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 只要一動，就有自己；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 何等羨慕祢的榮耀，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 完全充滿蒙福心地。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 不敢祈求，不敢應許，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主，我只能向祢注視；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 可否差遣祢的話語，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 將祢榮耀向我啟示？
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 當我蒙恩能夠施恩，可憐，我竟自己知道；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我是如何超越本分，自己覺得，自己記牢；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我想我是活在神前，但我暗許自己敬虔。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的一生充滿試煉，大至不是常人可忍；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 人雖不知我的苦艱，我卻知道自己堅靭；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我想我是丟棄自己，但我不忘自己經歷！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我知我是滿受恩惠，已至地上無人似我；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 在我身上，在我心內，我能尋出神的工作；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 神的工作在我身上，我全知道如何欣賞。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我知我的所有登造，我知我的一切善義；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 不知不覺我覺自豪，中心從神移到自己；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的手中隔夜嗎哪，已變臭壞，已被蹧蹋。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 當有朋友向我慰問，向我苦情表示同情；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的驕傲不再隱悶，我的忍耐立即空罄；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我就失敗如同常人，咒詛生日顯出根本。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 神阿，我是風聞有祢，講祢論祢，我是都能；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但是我的敗壞自己，從未因祢有何變更；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我用你賜，固我驕傲，我因祢恩，加我自高。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但我現今親眼見祢，祢的聖潔顯我污穢，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢的亮光使我傾圯，祢的榮耀使我痛悔；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 使我痛悔我怎能以，對我自己如此著迷？
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 何等慚愧，何等慚愧，將祢恩典裝飾自己！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 高抬自己用祢作為，無一動機不是可鄙；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的失敗不可收拾，我的得勝更為羞恥。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 何等羞恥，我能驕傲！何等瞎眼，我能愚昧！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 污穢，竟會以為潔好，肉體，竟會以為佳美；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我是何等無知自義！我偷多少榮耀歸己！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢早知我何等敗壞，但我竟然一無所知，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 竟然以為自己可賴，豈知乃是十分可恥；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主阿，可否求祢救我，今天為我開此捆鎖？
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主阿，我心是在希望能有塵土給我躺臥，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 能有爐灰撒我身上，讓我懊悔我的墮落；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我是羞恥，羞恥無盡，我有如此敗壞的心。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的言語何等不準，我的生命何等膚淺，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的存心無不濁溷，我的一切無不可厭；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我今恨惡我的自己，主阿，我的希望在祢。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 一生聰明未遇敵手，以掃、以撒均成往事；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我今到了生死關頭，雖然絕望仍然自恃；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 束手就縛我不能受，我要用力，我要用謀。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 彷彿我見有人偷營，我心害怕但我倔強：
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 惟恐我的末日已定，用盡全身所有力量；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂來摔跤，我要招架，未到死地還要掙扎。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 奇哉！我用已往經驗，摔跤一夜祂仍不倒；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的力量眼見將減，但是祂像無意回報；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 奇哉！又像無法脫身，我的膽量又復加甚。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 如此對手從未得會，祂雖告我祂的名字，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我仍不知所戰為誰，只知祂有很大賞賜；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我就迫祂向我賜福，迫祂向我賜福、屈服。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 天已黎明難分勝負：好像無法，好像無能，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂就被迫向我賜福，並且稱許，說我得勝，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 說我新名是以色列；當我起來，我腿已瘸！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 有了微光進我暗心，開始照亮使我領會：
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 若我有能，為何扭筋？若我得勝，為何瘸腿？
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 是祂得勝留下記號，使我愚昧受了警告。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 瞬息之間，光滿我心，如同洪流沖破堤防，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我就看見榮耀無盡，迫我敬拜，迫我隱藏；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我纔知道我的大罪，我的不軌，我的污穢。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 哎阿，想到我曾勝過造物的主，全能的神！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 荒謬之極，該當有禍！該死之至，該死無恩！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我這雙手竟然背叛，強迫主神不得動彈！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢是何等榮耀的神，萬軍之主何等顯赫！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我一認識祢是誰人，並一看見祢是如何，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我要長號，我要流淚，我要懊悔，我要下跪。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 怎麼可能，怎麼可以見神的面，與神相持！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我恨不得有縫入地，纔可稍微掩我羞恥：
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 為何我不在此以先，即已毀滅，離世長眠？
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我恨自己過於昏沉，因為驕傲瞎了眼睛；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 想到我是得勝了神，我就不禁膽戰心驚：
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 渾身無力，何只一腿？百節俱脫，全人崩潰！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我今回顧我的一生，全是充滿敗壞事體：
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 保全自己，將神犧牲，愚昧的心只知快意；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我還以為祝福在於強神來聽我的所欲。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我有欲望，天來順服，我出主張，天來安排，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我有喜好，望神讓步，我有工作，望神領帥；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我若急切，天須趕快，那有一次神不失敗。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 世界竟有如此邪惡：驕傲、頑固、詭詐的人！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主，祢知道我是雅各，充滿敗壞，充滿可恨；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我無可望，只望憐憫，祢來憐憫敗壞這心。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我今已蒙憐憫一摸，舉步蹣跚、恩典遺跡；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我若忘記，新的腿窩要使我感何等無倚；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢雖許我作以色列，但是雅各永遠病瘸。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主，我服了，是祢得勝：因祢失敗我求失敗，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 因我得勝我來投誠，祢的輭弱領我下拜；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我願一生戰戰兢兢行祢旨意，榮耀祢名。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 求主倒空我脫自己，裏面無良善；
ContentEN: Come empty me of self, O Lord, no good there is inside.

ContentCN: 我的一生全是受欺，驕傲因黑暗；
ContentEN: Deceived by pride, thro' out my life, in darkness do I hide.

ContentCN: 求主倒空我脫自己，裏面真黑暗。
ContentEN: Come empty me of self, so I can at last be revived.

ContentCN: 求主倒空我脫自己，我心滿詭詐；
ContentEN: Come empty me of self, O Lord, my cunning heart renew.

ContentCN: 這個重大聖潔成績，只祢有辦法。
ContentEN: So wondrous holy is this work, no one but Thou can do.

ContentCN: 求主倒空我脫自己，裏面無良善；
ContentEN: Come empty me of self, O Lord, no good there is inside.

ContentCN: 我的一生全是受欺，驕傲因黑暗；
ContentEN: Deceived by pride, thro' out my life, in darkness do I hide.

ContentCN: 求主倒空我脫自己，裏面真黑暗。
ContentEN: Come empty me of self, so I can at last be revived.

ContentCN: 求祢聽我向祢呼祈，罪過何難除！
ContentEN: Hear Thou my cry to Thee, O Lord, cleanse Thou these sins of mine!

ContentCN: 自己越看越不滿意，何況祢聖目？
ContentEN: I cannot bear to see myself, more so those eyes of Thine.

ContentCN: 求主倒空我脫自己，裏面無良善；
ContentEN: Come empty me of self, O Lord, no good there is inside.

ContentEN: Why do I live in restlessness? Show me what to discard!

ContentEN: My conscience keeps accusing me - what sin do I regard?

ContentEN: In fellowship with Thee, Thy face is oft' hidden and veiled;

ContentCN: 到底是在那裏有失，信心不坦然？
ContentEN: Why is my faith so insecure? Show me where I have failed!

ContentEN: All the way to Calvary, where my Savior went for me,

ContentEN: Help me, Lord, to go with Thee all the way to Calvary.

ContentCN: 我已與基督同釘死﹐脫自己、罪惡、俗世﹔
ContentEN: Crucified with Christ my Savior, to the world and self and sin;

ContentCN: 所以我能平安接領主從死得生的命。
ContentEN: To the death-born life of Jesus I am sweetly ent'ring in;

ContentCN: 我甘願和祂同受苦﹐效法祂至死順服﹔
ContentEN: In His fellowship of suff'ring, to His death conformed to be,

ContentEN: I am going with my Savior all the way to Calvary.

ContentCN: 我何難與基督同死﹐因復活﹐我已認識﹔
ContentEN: 'Tis not hard to die with Jesus when His risen life we know;

ContentCN: 我何難與基督同苦﹐因神旨﹐我願順服。
ContentEN: 'Tis not hard to share His suff'rings when our hearts with joy o'erflow.

ContentCN: 主藉著復活的能力﹐今居住在我靈裏﹔
ContentEN: In His resurrection power He has come to dwell in me,

ContentCN: 因此﹐我歡樂著舉足﹐直走十字架的路。
ContentEN: And my heart is gladly going all the way to Calvary.

ContentCN: 一直走十架窄路﹗主是受死在那裏﹗
ContentEN: All the way to Calvary, where my Savior went for me,

ContentCN: 求主使我能同祢一直走十架窄路﹗
ContentEN: Help me, Lord, to go with Thee all the way to Calvary.

ContentCN: 同主死﹐就必同主生﹐同受苦﹐必同高升﹔
ContentEN: If we die we'll live with Jesus, if we suffer we shall reign;

ContentCN: 得勝者惟獨照這樣﹐纔能蒙基督獎賞。
ContentEN: Only thus the prize of glory can the conqueror attain.

ContentCN: 以為你曾忠心順服-直走十字架的路﹗
ContentEN: Yes, My child, thou didst go with Me all the way to Calvary.

ContentCN: 先是死亡，後是榮耀，
ContentEN: And like Him our path to glory,

ContentCN: 主既如此我倣效。
ContentEN: Ever leads through death alone.
