ContentCN: 就是我同祢死的理；
ContentEN: How on the Cross I died with Thee;

ContentCN: 不用別法，不用別能，
ContentEN: I need no other pow'r or way

ContentCN: 我就看見完全得勝。
ContentEN: That I may triumph day by day.

ContentCN: 祢的十架就是我的，
ContentEN: That cross of Thine is also mine,

ContentCN: 其光照耀我生命裏；
ContentEN: Into my life its light doth shine;

ContentCN: 一信與祢同釘那裏，
ContentEN: When I believe I'm dead with Thee,

ContentCN: 世界失去它的能力。
ContentEN: The world has lost its pow'r o'er me.

ContentCN: 我既與祢十架同釘，
ContentEN: Since I am crucified with Thee,

ContentCN: 勝過罪惡、自己、人情；
ContentEN: From sin and self I am set free;

ContentCN: 我怎追求它們事物？
ContentEN: How can I still enjoy the world

ContentCN: 我怎盼望它們安福？
ContentEN: Or seek its vanities unfurled?

ContentCN: 因此，我便到祢那裏，
ContentEN: I take my place, dear Lord, with Thee

ContentCN: 與祢同站十架死地，
ContentEN: Upon the cross of Calvary.

ContentCN: 祢命、祢權，全是我的，
ContentEN: Thy life and power then are mine,

ContentCN: 因我與祢合而為一。
ContentEN: Since Thou and I in oneness twine.

ContentCN: 祢既是來敗壞魔鬼
ContentEN: Since Thou didst come to slay the foe,

ContentCN: 一切權力、捆綁、作為，
ContentEN: His work and power to overthrow,

ContentCN: 我自然可和祢同勝，
ContentEN: I too can overcome in Thee

ContentCN: 天天經歷祢的大能。
ContentEN: And prove Thy mighty pow'r in me.

ContentCN: 但是我主，我們只能
ContentEN: Yet, for the vict'ry we rely

ContentCN: 靠著祢的十架得勝；
ContentEN: Upon the death which Thou didst die;

ContentCN: 祢走的路，我們當走，
ContentEN: We tread the path which Thou hast trod

ContentCN: 直到與祢見面時候。
ContentEN: Until we reach the goal in God.

ContentCN: 我今接受祢的同釘，
ContentEN: My death with Thee I now believe

ContentCN: 求祢所賜永遠的靈；
ContentEN: And all its meaning would receive.

ContentCN: 使我明白祢死更深，
ContentEN: Thy death more deeply show to me,

ContentCN: 使我喪失魂的生命。
ContentEN: That from my flesh I may be free.

ContentCN: 我願得勝像祢得勝！
ContentEN: I long to win as Thou hast won,

ContentCN: 與祢同王，同得權能！
ContentEN: To reign with Thee when Thou dost come.

ContentCN: 背負十架，我們若肯，
ContentEN: If we the cross will gladly bear,

ContentCN: 這些榮耀必定有分！
ContentEN: Then in Thy glory we will share.

ContentCN: 主，祢知道所有乾渴，在這不足尋求心；
ContentEN: Lord, Thou knowest all the hunger of the heart that seeks Thee now;

ContentCN: 我心羨慕何等深刻，惟祢能使不饑饉。
ContentEN: How my soul hath long been craving what Thou only canst bestow.

ContentCN: 今尋求，今尋求，賜祢聖靈的富有。
ContentEN: Seeking now, seeking now. Let Thy Spirit meet me now.

ContentCN: 行為失敗，見證失敗，工作失敗已明顯；
ContentEN: Failure in my walk and witness, failure in my work I see;

ContentCN: 無果之勞，非主之態，對祢沒有讚美獻。
ContentEN: Fruitless toil, un-Christ like living, calling forth no praise to Thee.

ContentCN: 今尋求，今尋求，賜祢聖靈的富有。
ContentEN: Seeking now, seeking now. Let Thy Spirit meet me now.

ContentCN: 我今向祢承認我的所有失敗和邪惡，
ContentEN: Now to Thee my soul confesses all its failure, all its sin;

ContentCN: 所有自滿，所有剛愎，所有心裏的隱慝。
ContentEN: All the pride, the self-contentment, all the "secret faults" within.

ContentCN: 今尋求，今尋求，賜祢聖靈的富有。
ContentEN: Seeking now, seeking now. Let Thy Spirit meet me now.

ContentCN: 父阿，救我脫離自己，脫離化裝的驕傲；
ContentEN: Save me from myself, my father, from each subtle form of pride;

ContentCN: 帶我與主同到死地，知道同釘的奇道。
ContentEN: Lead me now with Christ to Calv'ry, show me I with Him have died.

ContentCN: 今尋求，今尋求，賜祢聖靈的富有。
ContentEN: Seeking now, seeking now. Let Thy Spirit meet me now.

ContentCN: 從今不再是我工作，我想、我愛或我說；
ContentEN: No more let it be my working, Nor my wisdom, love, or pow'r,

ContentCN: 惟獨乃是基督生活，時時刻刻通過我。
ContentEN: But the life of Jesus only, passing through me hour by hour.

ContentCN: 今尋求，今尋求，賜祢聖靈的富有。
ContentEN: Seeking now, seeking now. Let Thy Spirit meet me now.

ContentCN: 但願祢的滿有聖靈，流通在我的衷表；
ContentEN: Let the fullness of Thy Spirit, resting on Him cover me,

ContentCN: 好叫對人，我是證明，對祢，乃是歸榮耀。
ContentEN: That the witness borne to others, may bring glory, Lord, to Thee.

ContentCN: 今尋求，今尋求，賜祢聖靈的富有。
ContentEN: Seeking now, seeking now. Let Thy Spirit meet me now.

ContentCN: 父阿，我奉子名禱告，我信禱告已答應；
ContentEN: Father, in Thy Son's Name, pleading, I believe my prayer is heard;

ContentCN: 我今讚美，答應可靠，安息，只因話足憑。
ContentEN: And I praise Thee for the answer, resting simply on Thy word.

ContentCN: 就讚美，就讚美，因祢已聼我禱告。
ContentEN: Praising now, praising now, thou hast answered, Lord, I know!

ContentCN: 祢是"平靜"祕密之源，祢是神聖全足的愛；
ContentEN: Thou hidden source of calm repose, thou all sufficient love divine;

ContentCN: 我們靠祢，所以安全，我的幫助，我的山寨；
ContentEN: My help and refuge from my foes, secure I am, if Thou art mine;

ContentCN: 耶穌，我們是藉祢名，能脫犯罪、憂愁、震驚。
ContentEN: From sin and grief, from guilt and shame, I hide me, Jesus, in Thy name.

ContentCN: 祢名乃是我們救恩，賞賜喜樂入我心懷；
ContentEN: Thy mighty name salvation is, and keeps my happy soul above;

ContentCN: 祢名帶來平安、興奮、能力，並加永遠的愛；
ContentEN: Comfort it brings, and pow'r, and peace, and joy, and everlasting love;

ContentCN: 祢名已經賜給我們赦免、聖潔，並加天門。
ContentEN: To me, with Thy dear name, are giv'n pardon, and holiness, and heav'n.

ContentCN: 耶穌，祢是我們一切：痛時，安舒；苦時，安息；
ContentEN: Jesus, my All in all Thou art, my rest in toil, mine ease in pain;

ContentCN: 傷心之時，祢是音樂；亂時，平安；失時，利益；
ContentEN: The med'cine of my broken heart; in war, my peace; in loss, my gain;

ContentCN: 怒目冷眼，祢是笑臉；羞辱，祢是榮耀冠冕。
ContentEN: My smile beneath the tyrant's frown; in shame, my glory and my crown.

ContentCN: 缺乏，祢是我們富有；軟弱，祢是我們能力；
ContentEN: In want, my plentiful supply; in weakness, mine almighty pow'r;

ContentCN: 束縛，祢是完全自由；試探，祢是可靠逃避；
ContentEN: In bonds, my perfect liberty; my light in Satan's darkest hour;

ContentCN: 失望、憂愁，祢是喜悅；死亡，生命；我主，一切。
ContentEN: In grief, my joy unspeakable; my life in death; my Lord, my all.

ContentCN: 耶穌為我！耶穌為我！每時候，每處所，耶穌為我！
ContentEN: Jesus for me! Jesus for me! All the time, ev'ry-where, Jesus for me!

ContentCN: 耶穌，我救主，祂是我一切！
ContentEN: Jesus, my Saviour, is all things to me;

ContentCN: 奇妙的救主，何等的可悅！
ContentEN: Oh, what a wonderful Saviour is He!

ContentCN: 引導和保護，所有安渡過，
ContentEN: Guiding, protecting, o'er life's troubled sea,

ContentCN: 大能的救主-耶穌為我。
ContentEN: Mighty Deliv'rer – Jesus for me!

ContentCN: 耶穌為我！耶穌為我！每時候，每處所，耶穌為我！
ContentEN: Jesus for me! Jesus for me! All the time, ev'ry-where, Jesus for me!

ContentCN: 耶穌於康健，耶穌於病痛，
ContentEN: Jesus in sickness, and Jesus in health,

ContentCN: 耶穌於富裕，或是於貧窮；
ContentEN: Jesus in poverty, comfort or wealth,

ContentCN: 無論是日光，無論是風波，
ContentEN: Sunshine or tempest, whatever it be,

ContentCN: 祂是我平安-耶穌為我。
ContentEN: He is my Safety – Jesus for me!

ContentCN: 耶穌為我！耶穌為我！每時候，每處所，耶穌為我！
ContentEN: Jesus for me! Jesus for me! All the time, ev'ry-where, Jesus for me!

ContentCN: 祂是我磐石、堡壘和盾牌，
ContentEN: He is my Refuge, my Rock, and my tow'r,

ContentCN: 祂是我生命、亮光和高臺；
ContentEN: He is my Fortress, my strength and my Pow'r;

ContentCN: 我的保護者，我的避難所，
ContentEN: Life everlasting, my Daysman is He,

ContentCN: 我的救贖主-耶穌為我。
ContentEN: Blessed Redeemer – Jesus for me!

ContentCN: 耶穌為我！耶穌為我！每時候，每處所，耶穌為我！
ContentEN: Jesus for me! Jesus for me! All the time, ev'ry-where, Jesus for me!

ContentCN: 祂是我先知、祭司和君王，
ContentEN: He is my Prophet, my Priest, and my King;

ContentCN: 我的生命泉，我的生命糧；
ContentEN: He is my Bread of Life, Fountain and Spring;

ContentCN: 祂是我信實和我的寄託，
ContentEN: Bright Sun of Righteousness, Day-star is He.

ContentCN: 我的拯救角-耶穌為我。
ContentEN: Horn of Salvation – Jesus for me!

ContentCN: 耶穌為我！耶穌為我！每時候，每處所，耶穌為我！
ContentEN: Jesus for me! Jesus for me! All the time, ev'ry-where, Jesus for me!

ContentCN: 耶穌於喜樂，或是於痛苦，
ContentEN: Jesus in sorrow, in joy, or in pain;

ContentCN: 損失或利益，祂是我寶庫；
ContentEN: Jesus my treasure, in loss or in gain;

ContentCN: 無論在何處，祂顧我軟弱，
ContentEN: Constant Companion where'er I may be;

ContentCN: 留世或離世-耶穌為我。
ContentEN: Living or dying – Jesus for me!

ContentCN: 永遠舉起耶穌﹐讚美主不歇﹔
ContentEN: All in all forever, Jesus will I sing,

ContentCN: 一切在基督裏﹐主是我一切。
ContentEN: Ev'rything in Jesus, and Jesus ev'rything.

ContentCN: 前要的是祝福﹐今要主自己﹔
ContentEN: Once it was the blessing, now it is the Lord;

ContentCN: 前要的是醫治﹐今要主而己﹔
ContentEN: Once it was the feeling, now it is His word;

ContentCN: 前我貪求恩賜﹐今要賜恩者﹔
ContentEN: Once His gifts I wanted, now the Giver own;

ContentCN: 前我尋求能力﹐今要全能者。
ContentEN: Once I sought for healing, now Himself alone.

ContentCN: 永遠舉起耶穌﹐讚美主不歇﹔
ContentEN: All in all forever, Jesus will I sing,

ContentCN: 一切在基督裏﹐主是我一切。
ContentEN: Ev'rything in Jesus, and Jesus ev'rything.

ContentCN: 前常用手抓主﹐今主手牽我；
ContentEN: Once 'twas painful trying, now 'tis perfect trust,

ContentCN: 前常無所適從﹐今拋錨穩妥；
ContentEN: Once a half salvation, now the uttermost;

ContentCN: 前是寶貴感覺﹐今憑主口說；
ContentEN: Once 'twas ceaseless holding, now He holds me fast;

ContentCN: 前是頻頻苦試﹐今完全信託。
ContentEN: Once 'twas constant drifting, now my anchor's cast.

ContentCN: 永遠舉起耶穌﹐讚美主不歇﹔
ContentEN: All in all forever, Jesus will I sing,

ContentCN: 一切在基督裏﹐主是我一切。
ContentEN: Ev'rything in Jesus, and Jesus ev'rything.

ContentCN: 前是忙於打算﹐今則靠祈求；
ContentEN: Once 'twas busy planning, now 'tis trustful prayer;

ContentCN: 前是懸切掛慮﹐今則主擔憂；
ContentEN: Once 'twas anxious caring, now He has the care;

ContentCN: 前隨我之所欲﹐今聽主支配；
ContentEN: Once 'twas what I wanted, now what Jesus says;

ContentCN: 前不住的討問﹐今不斷讚美。
ContentEN: Once 'twas constant asking, now 'tis ceaseless praise.

ContentCN: 永遠舉起耶穌﹐讚美主不歇﹔
ContentEN: All in all forever, Jesus will I sing,

ContentCN: 一切在基督裏﹐主是我一切。
ContentEN: Ev'rything in Jesus, and Jesus ev'rything.

ContentCN: 前我欲利用主﹐今則主用我；
ContentEN: Once it was my working, His it hence shall be;

ContentCN: 前是我的事業﹐今為主工作；
ContentEN: Once I tried to use Him, now He uses me;

ContentCN: 前欲得人稱讚﹐今求主歡喜；
ContentEN: Once the pow'r I wanted, now the Mighty One;

ContentCN: 前不過半得救﹐今被救到底。
ContentEN: Once for self I labored, now for Him alone.

ContentCN: 永遠舉起耶穌﹐讚美主不歇﹔
ContentEN: All in all forever, Jesus will I sing,

ContentCN: 一切在基督裏﹐主是我一切。
ContentEN: Ev'rything in Jesus, and Jesus ev'rything.

ContentCN: 前羨慕得著主﹐今知主屬我；
ContentEN: Once I hoped in Jesus, now I know He's mine;

ContentCN: 前我燈將熄滅﹐今則光炳爍；
ContentEN: Once my lamps were dying, now they brightly shine;

ContentCN: 前所望的是死﹐今等候被提；
ContentEN: Once for death I waited, now His coming hail;

ContentCN: 我所有的一切﹐都在主自已。
ContentEN: And my hopes are anchored safe within the veil.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌﹐永是耶穌﹐我們歌頌這耶穌﹔
ContentEN: Jesus only, Jesus ever, Jesus all in all we sing,

ContentCN: 祂是救主、生命、大夫﹐祂是君王建國度。
ContentEN: Saviour, Sanctifier, Healer, glorious Lord, and coming King.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌是我題目﹐我的信息是耶穌﹔
ContentEN: Jesus only is our message, Jesus all our theme shall be;

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌是我歌賦﹐我所仰望是耶穌。
ContentEN: We will lift up Jesus ever, Jesus only will we see.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌﹐永是耶穌﹐我們歌頌這耶穌﹔
ContentEN: Jesus only, Jesus ever, Jesus all in all we sing,

ContentCN: 祂是救主、生命、大夫﹐祂是君王建國度。
ContentEN: Saviour, Sanctifier, Healer, glorious Lord, and coming King.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌是我救主﹐擔當我的所有罪﹔
ContentEN: Jesus only is our Saviour, all our guilt He bore away,

ContentCN: 一次成功永遠救贖﹐使我得以蒙恩惠。
ContentEN: All our righteousness He gives us, all our strength from day to day.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌﹐永是耶穌﹐我們歌頌這耶穌﹔
ContentEN: Jesus only, Jesus ever, Jesus all in all we sing,

ContentCN: 祂是救主、生命、大夫﹐祂是君王建國度。
ContentEN: Saviour, Sanctifier, Healer, glorious Lord, and coming King.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌是我生命﹐救我脫離罪與己﹔
ContentEN: Jesus is our Sanctifier, cleansing us from self and sin,

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌用祂聖靈﹐充滿我心作我力。
ContentEN: And with all His Spirit's fullness, filling all our hearts within.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌﹐永是耶穌﹐我們歌頌這耶穌﹔
ContentEN: Jesus only, Jesus ever, Jesus all in all we sing,

ContentCN: 祂是救主、生命、大夫﹐祂是君王建國度。
ContentEN: Saviour, Sanctifier, Healer, glorious Lord, and coming King.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌是我大夫﹐擔當我的病與疾﹔
ContentEN: Jesus only is our Healer, all our sicknesses He bare;

ContentCN: 復活生命﹐升天豐富﹐祂都分賜祂肢體。
ContentEN: And His risen life and fullness, all His members still may share.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌﹐永是耶穌﹐我們歌頌這耶穌﹔
ContentEN: Jesus only, Jesus ever, Jesus all in all we sing,

ContentCN: 祂是救主、生命、大夫﹐祂是君王建國度。
ContentEN: Saviour, Sanctifier, Healer, glorious Lord, and coming King.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌是我能力﹐是祂賜下五旬節﹔
ContentEN: Jesus only is our power, He the gift of Pentecost,

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐求祢使我得以充滿聖靈常勝捷。
ContentEN: Jesus breathe Thy pow'r upon us, fill us with the Holy Ghost.

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌﹐永是耶穌﹐我們歌頌這耶穌﹔
ContentEN: Jesus only, Jesus ever, Jesus all in all we sing,

ContentCN: 祂是救主、生命、大夫﹐祂是君王建國度。
ContentEN: Saviour, Sanctifier, Healer, glorious Lord, and coming King.

ContentCN: 我們現在等候耶穌﹐要聽祂來的召呼﹔
ContentEN: And for Jesus we are waiting, list'ning for the Advent call;

ContentCN: 始終惟有耶穌可慕﹐惟有耶穌萬有主。
ContentEN: But 'twill still be Jesus only, Jesus ever, all in all.

ContentCN: 基督就是我的世界﹐生命、喜樂、一切﹔
ContentEN: Jesus is all the world to me, my life, my joy, my all;

ContentCN: 祂是能力﹐時時提挈﹐離祂我就傾跌。
ContentEN: He is my strength from day to day, Without Him I should fall.

ContentCN: 當我憂愁﹐我來就祂﹐
ContentEN: When I am sad, to Him I go;

ContentCN: 無人如此樂於接納﹔
ContentEN: No other one can cheer me so;

ContentCN: 使我心樂﹐消我心憂﹐祂是我友﹗
ContentEN: When I am sad, He makes me glad; He is my Friend!

ContentCN: 基督就是我的世界﹐百般試煉之助﹔
ContentEN: Jesus is all the world to me, my Friend in trials sore;

ContentCN: 處處照顧﹐事事體貼﹐一再向我賜福。
ContentEN: I go to Him for blessings, and He gives them o'er and o'er.

ContentCN: 祂賜水流﹐又賜日光﹐
ContentEN: He sends the sunshine and the rain,

ContentCN: 祂賜豐收﹐金穀興旺﹔
ContentEN: He sends the harvest's golden grain —

ContentCN: 日光水流﹐金穀豐收﹐祂是我友﹗
ContentEN: Sunshine and rain, and golden grain, He is my Friend.

ContentCN: 基督就是我的世界﹐對祂我必效忠﹗
ContentEN: Jesus is all the world to me, and true to Him I'll be;

ContentCN: 我怎能夠將祂棄絕﹐當祂施恩重重﹖
ContentEN: Oh, how could I this Friend deny when He's so true to me?

ContentCN: 隨祂行走﹐必不會錯﹐
ContentEN: Following Him I know I'm right,

ContentCN: 有祂引領﹐晝夜無輟﹔
ContentEN: Keeping His cross within my sight;

ContentCN: 隨祂行走﹐夜以繼晝﹐祂是我友﹗
ContentEN: Following Him by day and night; He is my Friend!

ContentCN: 基督就是我的世界﹐更好朋友無需﹔
ContentEN: Jesus is all the world to me - I want no better Friend;

ContentCN: 現今聯結﹐將來聯結﹐直到永久不渝。
ContentEN: I trust Him now, I'll trust Him when life's fleeting days shall end.

ContentCN: 美麗生命有此朋友﹐
ContentEN: Beautiful life with such a Friend!

ContentCN: 美麗生命﹐直到永久﹔
ContentEN: Beautiful life that has no end!

ContentCN: 永久生命﹐快樂永久﹐祂是我友﹗
ContentEN: Eternal life, eternal joy; He is my Friend.

ContentCN: 祂不誤事﹐因祂是神﹔
ContentEN: He faileth not, for He is God;

ContentCN: 祂不誤事﹐祂樂施恩﹔
ContentEN: He faileth not, His grace how good!

ContentCN: 祂不誤事﹐祂已許過﹔
ContentEN: He faileth not, His word is clear;

ContentCN: 我們有神﹐還怕誰何﹖
ContentEN: If we have God, whom need we fear?

ContentCN: 有何高山祢不能鋤﹐
ContentEN: The highest mount, He can make plain;

ContentCN: 有何深水祢不能渡﹔
ContentEN: The wildest flood, He can restrain.

ContentCN: 我們的神專門處置
ContentEN: God of impossibilities!

ContentCN: 人所以為不能的事。
ContentEN: Poor puny man, now learn His ways.

ContentCN: 是祂使鐵浮水而起﹐
ContentEN: The axe did swim on Jordan's wave;

ContentCN: 是祂使海分成乾地﹐
ContentEN: Our God the Red Sea's waters clave!

ContentCN: 是祂使日半空停止﹐
ContentEN: He stopped the sun, made long the day!

ContentCN: 我們的神並無難事！
ContentEN: This is the God to Whom we pray.

ContentCN: 祂使軟沙作海界限﹐
ContentEN: He bars the sea with feeble sand!

ContentCN: 波浪雖狂不能再前﹔
ContentEN: The proud waves bow at His command!

ContentCN: 祂是你神﹐還有甚麼
ContentEN: If God is thine, what more your need?

ContentCN: 祂是不能為你工作﹖
ContentEN: Can He not work for you indeed?

ContentCN: 祂心愛你﹐知你難處﹐
ContentEN: Our God is love, your needs are known,

ContentCN: 所以應許祂要照顧﹔
ContentEN: His promises He'll fully own,

ContentCN: 我們的神充滿憐憫﹐
ContentEN: Our gracious God bows down His ear

ContentCN: 對待祂的無告子民。
ContentEN: The feeblest, weakest cry to hear.

ContentCN: 我們的神不能不義﹐
ContentEN: Our God is light, and never yet,

ContentCN: 不能將祂應許忘記﹔
ContentEN: One promise did He e'er forget;

ContentCN: 祂的應許在基督裏﹐
ContentEN: His promises in Christ the Son

ContentCN: 都是阿們﹐都是是的。
ContentEN: Are fully pledged, yea and amen.

ContentCN: 我們的神不能失信﹐
ContentEN: Our faithful God, faith cannot break;

ContentCN: 祂的恩約永遠堅定﹔
ContentEN: Nor death, nor hell, His promise shake!

ContentCN: 祂要照祂應許答應
ContentEN: Who ask in faith, He'll not deny;

ContentCN: 我們因信所發呼聲。
ContentEN: His word is sure, He must reply.

ContentCN: 我們因信歡樂唱說﹕
ContentEN: He faileth not, let all men hear,

ContentCN: 祂不誤我﹐祂已許過！
ContentEN: He faileth not, His word is clear,

ContentCN: 祂不誤我﹐祂樂施恩！
ContentEN: He faileth not, His grace how good,

ContentCN: 祂不誤我﹐因祂是神！
ContentEN: He faileth not, for He is God.

ContentCN: 再唱信心的歌﹗
ContentEN: Keep up the song of faith,

ContentCN: 無論夜如何黑﹔
ContentEN: However dark the night;

ContentCN: 你若讚美﹐神要工作﹐
ContentEN: And as you praise, the Lord will work

ContentCN: 使你所信能得﹐
ContentEN: To change your faith to sight,

ContentCN: 使你所信能得。
ContentEN: To change your faith to sight.

ContentCN: 再唱信心的歌！
ContentEN: Keep up the song of faith,

ContentCN: 你魂應當讚頌﹔
ContentEN: And let your heart be strong,

ContentCN: 因神喜悅信心唱歌﹐
ContentEN: For God delights when faith can praise,

ContentCN: 於漫漫長夜中﹐
ContentEN: Though dark the night and long,

ContentCN: 於漫漫長夜中。
ContentEN: Though dark the night and long.

ContentCN: 再唱信心的歌！
ContentEN: Keep up the song of faith,

ContentCN: 仇敵聽見要抖﹔
ContentEN: The foe will hear and flee;

ContentCN: 讚美原來會勝鬼魔﹐
ContentEN: Oh, let not Satan hush your song,

ContentCN: 何致被他箝口﹐
ContentEN: For praise is victory,

ContentCN: 何致被他箝口。
ContentEN: For praise is victory.

ContentCN: 再唱信心的歌！
ContentEN: Keep up the song of faith,

ContentCN: 不久天就要曙﹔
ContentEN: The dawn will break ere long,

ContentCN: 我們要唱無終的歌﹐
ContentEN: And we shall go to meet the Lord

ContentCN: 我們要去見主﹐
ContentEN: And join the endless song,

ContentCN: 我們要去見主。
ContentEN: And join the endless song.

ContentCN: 惟知道我所信的是誰﹐
ContentEN: But I know whom I have believed,

ContentCN: 並且也深信祂實在是能
ContentEN: And am persuaded that He is able

ContentCN: 保守我所信託祂的﹐都全備直到那日﹗
ContentEN: To keep that which I've committed unto Him against that day.

ContentCN: 我真不知神的奇恩﹐為何臨到我身﹔
ContentEN: I know not why God's wondrous grace, to me hath been made known;

ContentCN: 我也不知不堪如我﹐救來有何足多。
ContentEN: Nor why unworthy as I am, He claimed me for His own.

ContentCN: 惟知道我所信的是誰﹐
ContentEN: But I know whom I have believed,

ContentCN: 並且也深信祂實在是能
ContentEN: And am persuaded that He is able

ContentCN: 保守我所信託祂的﹐都全備直到那日﹗
ContentEN: To keep that which I've committed unto Him against that day.

ContentCN: 我真不知救我的信如何進入我心﹐
ContentEN: I know not how this saving faith to me He did impart;

ContentCN: 我也不知何以一信﹐便得一個新心。
ContentEN: Or how believing in His word wrought peace within my heart.

ContentCN: 惟知道我所信的是誰﹐
ContentEN: But I know whom I have believed,

ContentCN: 並且也深信祂實在是能
ContentEN: And am persuaded that He is able

ContentCN: 保守我所信託祂的﹐都全備直到那日﹗
ContentEN: To keep that which I've committed unto Him against that day.

ContentCN: 我真不知聖靈如何引人知道己過﹐
ContentEN: I know not how the Spirit moves, convincing men of sin;

ContentCN: 並由聖經顯明耶穌﹐使人接祂為主。
ContentEN: Revealing Jesus through the Word, creating faith in Him.

ContentCN: 惟知道我所信的是誰﹐
ContentEN: But I know whom I have believed,

ContentCN: 並且也深信祂實在是能
ContentEN: And am persuaded that He is able

ContentCN: 保守我所信託祂的﹐都全備直到那日﹗
ContentEN: To keep that which I've committed unto Him against that day.

ContentCN: 我真不知我的前途﹐到底是甘是苦﹔
ContentEN: I know not what of good or ill may be reserved for me -

ContentCN: 我也不知未見主前﹐還有甚麼試煉。
ContentEN: Of weary ways or golden days before His face I see.

ContentCN: 惟知道我所信的是誰﹐
ContentEN: But I know whom I have believed,

ContentCN: 並且也深信祂實在是能
ContentEN: And am persuaded that He is able

ContentCN: 保守我所信託祂的﹐都全備直到那日﹗
ContentEN: To keep that which I've committed unto Him against that day.

ContentCN: 我真不知何時主來﹐那時我是何在–
ContentEN: I know not when my Lord may come, at night or noonday fair,

ContentCN: 到底我當經過死谷﹖或將空中遇主﹖
ContentEN: Nor if I'll walk the vale with Him or meet Him in the air.

ContentCN: 在神沒有難成事，正當全心倚賴祂；
ContentEN: Nothing is impossible when you put your trust I God;

ContentCN: 在神沒有難成事，正當全心信祂話。
ContentEN: Nothing is impossible when you're trusting in His word.

ContentCN: 請聽神的聲音何明朗："在我豈有難成的事麼？"
ContentEN: Hearken to the voice of God to thee: "Is there anything too hard for me?"

ContentCN: 你當專心完全靠神，安息在祂話中；
ContentEN: Then put your trust in God along and rest up-on His Word;

ContentCN: 每一件事，每一件事，每一件事神都必能成就！成就！
ContentEN: For ev'rything, Oh eve'rything, yes ev'rything is possible with God!

ContentCN: 從聖經中我領受寶貴應許-
ContentEN: I read in the Bible the promise of God,

ContentCN: 在神沒有難成的事；
ContentEN: That nothing for Him is too hard.

ContentCN: 若我們能全心相信他話語，
ContentEN: Impossible things He has promised to do

ContentCN: 祂能做不可能的事。
ContentEN: If we faithfully trust in His Word.

ContentCN: 在神沒有難成事，正當全心倚賴祂；
ContentEN: Nothing is impossible when you put your trust I God;

ContentCN: 在神沒有難成事，正當全心信祂話。
ContentEN: Nothing is impossible when you're trusting in His word.

ContentCN: 請聽神的聲音何明朗："在我豈有難成的事麼？"
ContentEN: Hearken to the voice of God to thee: "Is there anything too hard for me?"

ContentCN: 你當專心完全靠神，安息在祂話中；
ContentEN: Then put your trust in God along and rest up-on His Word;

ContentCN: 每一件事，每一件事，每一件事神都必能成就！成就！
ContentEN: For ev'rything, Oh eve'rything, yes ev'rything is possible with God!

ContentCN: 因神的話語如同錨拋穩固，
ContentEN: The word of the Lord is an anchor secure

ContentCN: 正當無定狂風飄搖；
ContentEN: When winds of uncertainty blow;

ContentCN: 縱因人軟弱常會失敗傾覆，
ContentEN: Though man in his weakness may falter and fail,

ContentCN: 神話語永遠不動搖。
ContentEN: His word will not fail us we know.

ContentCN: 在神沒有難成事，正當全心倚賴祂；
ContentEN: Nothing is impossible when you put your trust I God;

ContentCN: 在神沒有難成事，正當全心信祂話。
ContentEN: Nothing is impossible when you're trusting in His word.

ContentCN: 請聽神的聲音何明朗："在我豈有難成的事麼？"
ContentEN: Hearken to the voice of God to thee: "Is there anything too hard for me?"

ContentCN: 你當專心完全靠神，安息在祂話中；
ContentEN: Then put your trust in God along and rest up-on His Word;

ContentCN: 每一件事，每一件事，每一件事神都必能成就！成就！
ContentEN: For ev'rything, Oh eve'rything, yes ev'rything is possible with God!

ContentCN: 在我凡事都能聽你神話語，
ContentEN: All things are possible, this is His Word.

ContentCN: 這是為你，何不領受？
ContentEN: Receive it, 'tis written for you.

ContentCN: 神永不能失信-這是祂應許，
ContentEN: Believe in His promises, God cannot fail;

ContentCN: 凡祂所說，祂必成就！
ContentEN: For what He has said He will do.

ContentCN: 站立，站立在神話語的信實上面；
ContentEN: Standing, standing on the faithfulness of God's own Word;

ContentCN: 安息，安息在神應許的能力上面。
ContentEN: Resting, resting on the promise of His pow'r and might.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞，哈利路亞！這裏就是最高祕密天！
ContentEN: Hallelujah, hallelujah! Here I find the heav'nly secret heights.

ContentCN: 站立在神話語的信實上面,
ContentEN: Standing on the faithfulness of God's own Word,

ContentCN: 我要讚美祂的榮耀無窮盡!
ContentEN: I shall praise His endless glory evermore.

ContentCN: 因信舉目透過重幔直達最高天;
ContentEN: For by faith thru heavy veils the highest heav'n I see,

ContentCN: 遙見救主慈愛面容，喜樂滿我心。
ContentEN: From afar His loving face brings floods of joy to me.

ContentCN: 站立，站立在神話語的信實上面；
ContentEN: Standing, standing on the faithfulness of God's own Word;

ContentCN: 安息，安息在神應許的能力上面。
ContentEN: Resting, resting on the promise of His pow'r and might.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞，哈利路亞！這裏就是最高祕密天！
ContentEN: Hallelujah, hallelujah! Here I find the heav'nly secret heights.

ContentCN: 站立在神話語的信實上面，
ContentEN: Standing on the faithfulness of God's own Word,

ContentCN: 我要讚美祂的能力無窮盡！
ContentEN: I shall praise His endless power evermore.

ContentCN: 血灑約言永不搖移，神話成利劍；
ContentEN: Sprinkled by the blood, His word is living, sharp and firm.

ContentCN: 砍斷一切不信鎖鍊，榮耀歸主名。
ContentEN: Broken are my chains of doubt, O Glory to His name.

ContentCN: 站立，站立在神話語的信實上面；
ContentEN: Standing, standing on the faithfulness of God's own Word;

ContentCN: 安息，安息在神應許的能力上面。
ContentEN: Resting, resting on the promise of His pow'r and might.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞，哈利路亞！這裏就是最高祕密天！
ContentEN: Hallelujah, hallelujah! Here I find the heav'nly secret heights.

ContentCN: 站立在神話語的信實上面，
ContentEN: Standing on the faithfulness of God's own Word,

ContentCN: 我要讚美祂的慈愛無窮盡！
ContentEN: I shall praise His endless mercy evermore.

ContentCN: 靠主寶血我蒙恩寵，常近祂身邊；
ContentEN: By his blood and through His grace, drawn near His side I'd be.

ContentCN: 慈繩愛索深繫我心，與主永相連。
ContentEN: Cords of love do bind my heart to Him eternally!

ContentCN: 站立，站立在神話語的信實上面；
ContentEN: Standing, standing on the faithfulness of God's own Word;

ContentCN: 安息，安息在神應許的能力上面。
ContentEN: Resting, resting on the promise of His pow'r and might.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞，哈利路亞！這裏就是最高祕密天！
ContentEN: Hallelujah, hallelujah! Here I find the heav'nly secret heights.

ContentCN: 站立在神話語的信實上面，
ContentEN: Standing on the faithfulness of God's own Word,

ContentCN: 我要讚美祂的道路無窮盡！
ContentEN: I shall praise His endless path for evermore.

ContentCN: 時刻儆醒，緊隨聖靈，直到過約但；
ContentEN: Ever watchful in Him till I'll cross the Jordan's tide;

ContentCN: 傷痛得醫，仇敵失蹤，抵家樂無盡。
ContentEN: Gone my pain and foes when I shall reach my home sweet home.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐何等可靠﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, how I trust Him!

ContentCN: 我曾試祂多少次﹔
ContentEN: How I've proved Him o'er and o'er!

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐我的至寶﹐祂是活神不誤事。
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus! O for grace to trust Him more!

ContentCN: 信靠耶穌何其甘甜﹐抓祂話語作把握﹔
ContentEN: 'Tis so sweet to trust in Jesus, just to take Him at His word;

ContentCN: 安息在祂應許上面﹐只知主曾如此說。
ContentEN: Just to rest upon His promise; just to know, "Thus saith the Lord."

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐何等可靠﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, how I trust Him!

ContentCN: 我曾試祂多少次﹔
ContentEN: How I've proved Him o'er and o'er!

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐我的至寶﹐祂是活神不誤事。
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus! O for grace to trust Him more!

ContentCN: 信靠耶穌﹐何其甘甜﹐信祂寶血能潔淨﹔
ContentEN: Oh how sweet to trust in Jesus, just to trust His cleansing blood;

ContentCN: 信心簡單﹐血有效驗﹐疾病醫治﹐罪洗清。
ContentEN: Just in simple faith to plunge me 'neath the healing, cleansing flood.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐何等可靠﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, how I trust Him!

ContentCN: 我曾試祂多少次﹔
ContentEN: How I've proved Him o'er and o'er!

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐我的至寶﹐祂是活神不誤事。
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus! O for grace to trust Him more!

ContentCN: 信靠耶穌﹐真是甘甜﹐救我遠離罪與己﹔
ContentEN: Yes, 'tis sweet to trust in Jesus, just from sin and self to cease;

ContentCN: 從祂接受無限恩典﹕生命、喜樂和安息。
ContentEN: Just from Jesus simply taking life and rest, and joy and peace.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐何等可靠﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, how I trust Him!

ContentCN: 我曾試祂多少次﹔
ContentEN: How I've proved Him o'er and o'er!

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐我的至寶﹐祂是活神不誤事。
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus! O for grace to trust Him more!

ContentCN: 何等喜樂﹐我能信祢﹐至寶耶穌﹐我救主！
ContentEN: I'm so glad I learned to trust Thee, precious Jesus, Savior, Friend;

ContentCN: 信祢與我是在一起﹐一直一起到永古。
ContentEN: And I know that Thou art with me, wilt be with me to the end.

ContentCN: 不斷信靠主，祂正親近；
ContentEN: Keep on believing, Jesus is near,

ContentCN: 不斷信靠主，無驚懼可侵。
ContentEN: Keep on believing, there's nothing to fear.

ContentCN: 不斷信靠主，沿此路走；
ContentEN: Keep on believing, this is the way,

ContentCN: 信心在夜裹，如在白晝。
ContentEN: Faith in the night as well as the day.

ContentCN: 我安心靠主，因主必豫備；
ContentEN: Then we'll trust in the Lord, and He will provide;

ContentCN: 我完全望主，因主要豫備。
ContentEN: Yes, we'll trust in the Lord, and He will provide.

ContentCN: 或這樣，或那樣，主總必豫備：
ContentEN: In some way or other the Lord will provide:

ContentCN: 雖不照我方法，也不照你方法，
ContentEN: It may not be my way, it may not be the way;

ContentCN: 主要照祂方法，為我們豫備。
ContentEN: And yet in His own way, "the Lord will provide."

ContentCN: 我安心靠主，因主必豫備；
ContentEN: Then we'll trust in the Lord, and He will provide;

ContentCN: 我完全望主，因主要豫備。
ContentEN: Yes, we'll trust in the Lord, and He will provide.

ContentCN: 或這時，或那時，主總必豫備：
ContentEN: At some time or other the Lord will provide:

ContentCN: 雖不照我時候，也不照你時候，
ContentEN: It may not be my time, it may not be thy time;

ContentCN: 在主所定時候，主總必豫備。
ContentEN: And yet in His own time, "The Lord will provide."

ContentCN: 我安心靠主，因主必豫備；
ContentEN: Then we'll trust in the Lord, and He will provide;

ContentCN: 我完全望主，因主要豫備。
ContentEN: Yes, we'll trust in the Lord, and He will provide.

ContentCN: 所以不要懷疑，因主必豫備：
ContentEN: Despond then no longer, the Lord will provide:

ContentCN: 我主所有應許，那裏曾有一句
ContentEN: And this be the token-no word He hath spoken

ContentCN: 變作烏有空虛？主總必豫備。
ContentEN: Was ever yet broken: "The Lord will provide."

ContentCN: 我安心靠主，因主必豫備；
ContentEN: Then we'll trust in the Lord, and He will provide;

ContentCN: 我完全望主，因主要豫備。
ContentEN: Yes, we'll trust in the Lord, and He will provide.

ContentCN: 因此，應當進前，進前不疲憊；
ContentEN: March on then right boldly; the sea shall divide;

ContentCN: 海水必定分開，嗎哪要從天來，
ContentEN: The pathway made glorious, with shoutings victorious,

ContentCN: 仇敵都要失敗，主總必豫備。
ContentEN: We'll join in the chorus, "The Lord will provide."

ContentCN: 主阿，即或盡是黑暗，盡是坎坷憂悒；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但我仍要鎮定安然，尋求祢的心意。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢有憐憫，祢有恩慈，祢有寶貴應許；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢不會錯，祢不會遲，祢不翻雲覆雨。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 大能的主，說有就有，命立沒有不立；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 有主就可無掛無憂，就可不焦不急。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主阿，因祢我心定了，因祢我魂安歇；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我讚美說：有主夠了！主是包括一切！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主，我還要求祢的靈，使我信心充足；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 領我更深認識祢名，進入祢的豐富。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 要對這山說："去，離此，投在海裏！"
ContentEN: Say to this mountain, "go, be cast into the sea!"

ContentCN: 心中若不疑惑，就必成就於你。
ContentEN: And doubt not in thine heart, that it shall be to thee.

ContentCN: 相信主話，必要成全，在主裏面你能移山！
ContentEN: It shall be done, doubt not His Word, command thy mountain in the Lord!

ContentCN: 取用救贖權利，主的寶血所買；
ContentEN: Claim thy redemption right, purchased by precious blood;

ContentCN: 使這權利有效，三一之神同來。
ContentEN: The Trinity unite to make it true and good.

ContentCN: 順服主話，必要成全，在主裏面你能移山！
ContentEN: It shall be done, obey the Word, command thy mountain in the Lord!

ContentCN: 自己、罪惡、病痛，主已全部擔當；
ContentEN: Self, sickness, sorrow, sin, the Lord did meet that day

ContentCN: 神的要求滿足，你已得著釋放。
ContentEN: On his beloved One, and thou art "loosed away."

ContentCN: 倚靠主話，必要成全，在主裏面你能移山！
ContentEN: It shall be done, rest on His Word! Command thy mountain in the Lord!

ContentCN: 圍繞高大牆垣，憑信禱告放膽；
ContentEN: Compass the frowning wall. With silent prayer, then raise-

ContentCN: 在牆末倒之先，喊出得勝頌讚。
ContentEN: Before its ramparts fall- the victor's shout of praise.

ContentCN: 安心相信，必要成全，在主裏面你能移山！
ContentEN: It shall be done, faith rests assured, command thy mountain in the Lord!

ContentCN: 所有銅門鐵閂，全都仆倒降服；
ContentEN: The two-leaved gates of brass, the bars of iron yield,

ContentCN: 讓那相信戰士，高唱凱歌進入。
ContentEN: To let the faithful pass, Conqu'rors in every field.

ContentCN: 不睬仇敵，必要成全，在主裏面你能移山！
ContentEN: It shall be done, the foe ignored, command thy mountain in the Lord!

ContentCN: 取用神的信心，脫去不信恥辱；
ContentEN: Take then the faith of God, free from the taint of doubt;

ContentCN: 廣行神蹟之杖，要將理由盡逐。
ContentEN: The wonder-working rod that casts all reasoning out.

ContentCN: 站在主話，必要成全，在主裏面你能移山！
ContentEN: It shall be done, stand on the Word. Command thy mountain in the Lord!

ContentCN: 主，我相信！主，我相信！
ContentEN: Lord, I believe! Lord, I believe!

ContentCN: 求提高我信祢的心，使我能以移山；
ContentEN: Savior, raise my faith in Thee till it can move a mountain.

ContentCN: 主，我相信！主，我相信！
ContentEN: Lord, I believe! Lord, I believe!

ContentCN: 我的疑慮全投在祢身畔。
ContentEN: All my doubts I'll bury in the Fountain.

ContentCN: 當我在我路上遇見試探時，
ContentEN: When sorrows and storms are besetting my track,

ContentCN: 撒但就在耳語叫我可放弛；
ContentEN: And Satan is whisp'ring, "You'd better go back,"

ContentCN: 但是負擔雖重我已不發愁，
ContentEN: Oh, then I have prov'd it tho' dark be the way,

ContentCN: 只要一點相信就趕難處走。
ContentEN: A little believing drives clouds right away.

ContentCN: 主，我相信！主，我相信！
ContentEN: Lord, I believe! Lord, I believe!

ContentCN: 求提高我信祢的心，使我能以移山；
ContentEN: Savior, raise my faith in Thee till it can move a mountain.

ContentCN: 主，我相信！主，我相信！
ContentEN: Lord, I believe! Lord, I believe!

ContentCN: 我的疑慮全投在祢身畔。
ContentEN: All my doubts I'll bury in the Fountain.

ContentCN: 當我航行海上順風的時候，
ContentEN: How easy when sailing the sea at a calm

ContentCN: 何等容易相信耶和華的手；
ContentEN: To trust in the strength of Jehovah's great arm,

ContentCN: 但我發現正當波浪漫船來，
ContentEN: But somehow I find when the waves swamp the boat,

ContentCN: 需要好多相信纔能不沉埋。
ContentEN: It takes some believing to keep things afloat.

ContentCN: 主，我相信！主，我相信！
ContentEN: Lord, I believe! Lord, I believe!

ContentCN: 求提高我信祢的心，使我能以移山；
ContentEN: Savior, raise my faith in Thee till it can move a mountain.

ContentCN: 主，我相信！主，我相信！
ContentEN: Lord, I believe! Lord, I believe!

ContentCN: 我的疑慮全投在祢身畔。
ContentEN: All my doubts I'll bury in the Fountain.

ContentCN: 我常聽人說，"我要堅持到底，
ContentEN: I'll stand to the end, I have heard people say,

ContentCN: 我要忠心至死，我絕不逃避；"
ContentEN: I'll fight till I die, and I'll ne'er run away;

ContentCN: 但當試探來得特別兇猛時，
ContentEN: But when the temptations so fiercely assailed,

ContentCN: 他就停止相信，甚麼都喪失。
ContentEN: They left off believing, and terribly failed.

ContentCN: 主，我相信！主，我相信！
ContentEN: Lord, I believe! Lord, I believe!

ContentCN: 求提高我信祢的心，使我能以移山；
ContentEN: Savior, raise my faith in Thee till it can move a mountain.

ContentCN: 主，我相信！主，我相信！
ContentEN: Lord, I believe! Lord, I believe!

ContentCN: 我的疑慮全投在祢身畔。
ContentEN: All my doubts I'll bury in the Fountain.

ContentCN: 還有別人滿有勇敢與熱心，
ContentEN: And others there are full of courage and zeal,

ContentCN: 他們參加事奉如同鋼鐵人；
ContentEN: Who go to the battle like warriors of steel;

ContentCN: 但是正當與罪摔跤最熱時，
ContentEN: But right in the heat of the conflict with sin,

ContentCN: 他們不是相信，乃是怕損失。
ContentEN: Instead of believing, they faint and give in.

ContentCN: 主，我相信！主，我相信！
ContentEN: Lord, I believe! Lord, I believe!

ContentCN: 求提高我信祢的心，使我能以移山；
ContentEN: Savior, raise my faith in Thee till it can move a mountain.

ContentCN: 主，我相信！主，我相信！
ContentEN: Lord, I believe! Lord, I believe!

ContentCN: 我的疑慮全投在祢身畔。
ContentEN: All my doubts I'll bury in the Fountain.

ContentCN: 但願我們記得，在屬靈生活，
ContentEN: Oh, let us remember, in running our race,

ContentCN: 信心不是感覺，信靠非撫摸；
ContentEN: That faith is not feeling, and trust is not trace;

ContentCN: 正當一切好像最看不見時，
ContentEN: And when all is seeming as black as the night,

ContentCN: 我們仍要相信，因而仍堅持。
ContentEN: We'll keep on believing, and go on with the fight.

ContentCN: 相信！瓶子不至乾涸，永遠不空，也不滿。
ContentEN: Trust! the cruse will yet supply thee, never empty never filled.

ContentCN: 縱使百合缺了衣衫，縱使小鳥無食啄，
ContentEN: Should the lilies lack apparel? Should the ravens cry in vain?

ContentCN: 但是寡婦微小麵罈，必定依然有一握。
ContentEN: Even then the widow's barrel shall its handful still retain.

ContentCN: 仍然當愛，仍然當給，照舊你還餘一握；
ContentEN: Keep on loving, keep on giving, still you'll find one handful more.

ContentCN: 所有的愛，所有的給，要使神賜加倍多。
ContentEN: Loving is the truest living, God will double all thy store.

ContentCN: 何必豫料明天境遇，目前夠了就可樂；
ContentEN: Why shouldst thou forecast the morrow? Take with gladness while you may;

ContentCN: 何必先借明天憂慮，手裏豈非還有著！
ContentEN: Why, dismayed, forbodings borrow? See! Thou hast enough today:

ContentCN: 愛是生活，給反存留，種得多的，收也多；
ContentEN: 'Tis by loving that thou livest, spending doth not waste thy store,

ContentCN: 好像你已罄你所有，看哪！你還有一握！
ContentEN: Tho' it seems the last thou givest, there is, aye, one handful more.

ContentCN: 只要相信﹐只要相信﹐
ContentEN: Only believe, only believe;

ContentCN: 凡事在神都能﹐只要相信﹔
ContentEN: All things are possible, only believe!

ContentCN: 只要相信﹐只要相信﹐
ContentEN: Only believe, only believe;

ContentCN: 凡事在神都能﹐只要相信。
ContentEN: All things are possible, only believe!

ContentCN: 我唱，因我得自由，我唱，因我無憂；
ContentEN: I sing because I'm happy, I sing because I'm free,

ContentCN: 我救主既看顧麻雀，深知我必蒙眷佑。
ContentEN: For His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me.

ContentCN: 為何灰心常怨歎？為何黑影瀰漫？
ContentEN: Why should I feel discouraged, why should the shadows come,

ContentCN: 為何心靈覺孤單，甚至欲脫塵寰？
ContentEN: Why should my heart be lonely, and long for heav'n and home,

ContentCN: 耶穌是我的永分，是我良友恩深。
ContentEN: When Jesus is my portion? My constant friend is He:

ContentCN: 祂既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷佑；
ContentEN: His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me;

ContentCN: 祂既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷佑。
ContentEN: His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me.

ContentCN: 我唱，因我得自由，我唱，因我無憂；
ContentEN: I sing because I'm happy, I sing because I'm free,

ContentCN: 我救主既看顧麻雀，深知我必蒙眷佑。
ContentEN: For His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me.

ContentCN: 你心裏不要憂愁！祂柔聲來勸誘；
ContentEN: Let not your heart be troubled,His tender word I hear,

ContentCN: 在祂愛中我安息，不再懼怕、憂疑；
ContentEN: And resting on His goodness, I lose my doubts and fears;

ContentCN: 雖我只見前一步，祂正引領無誤。
ContentEN: Tho' by the path He leadeth, but one step I may see:

ContentCN: 祂既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷佑；
ContentEN: His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me;

ContentCN: 祂既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷佑。
ContentEN: His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me.

ContentCN: 我唱，因我得自由，我唱，因我無憂；
ContentEN: I sing because I'm happy, I sing because I'm free,

ContentCN: 我救主既看顧麻雀，深知我必蒙眷佑。
ContentEN: For His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me.

ContentCN: 每當試探來引誘，烏雲密佈四周；
ContentEN: Whenever I am tempted, whenever clouds arise,

ContentCN: 每當歎息勝歌唱，心中滿了絕望；
ContentEN: When songs give place to sighing, when hope within me dies,

ContentCN: 我就向祂更靠近，讓祂解我憂心。
ContentEN: I draw the closer to Him, from care He sets me free:

ContentCN: 祂既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷佑；
ContentEN: His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me;

ContentCN: 祂既看顧小麻雀，深知我必蒙眷佑。
ContentEN: His eye is on the sparrow, and I know He watches me.

ContentCN: 我願跟隨祂帶領，對祂完全信靠；
ContentEN: Where he may lead I'll follow, my trust in Him repose;

ContentCN: 隨時隨在安然唱道："祂知道，祂知道；"
ContentEN: And ev'ry hour in perfect peace, I'll sing, "He knows! He knows!"

ContentCN: 隨時隨在安然唱道："祂知道，祂知道；"
ContentEN: And ev'ry hour in perfect peace, I'll sing, "He knows! He knows!"

ContentCN: 前途如何我不知，神將我眼遮蔽；
ContentEN: I know not what awaits me, God kindly veils my eyes,

ContentCN: 在我向前每步路上，都有新的境地；
ContentEN: And o'er each step of my on – ward way, He makes new scenes to rise;

ContentCN: 祂所賜的每一喜樂，也都令人驚奇。
ContentEN: And ev'ry joy He sends me comes a sweet and glad surprise.

ContentCN: 我願跟隨祂帶領，對祂完全信靠；
ContentEN: Where he may lead I'll follow, my trust in Him repose;

ContentCN: 隨時隨在安然唱道："祂知道，祂知道；"
ContentEN: And ev'ry hour in perfect peace, I'll sing, "He knows! He knows!"

ContentCN: 隨時隨在安然唱道："祂知道，祂知道；"
ContentEN: And ev'ry hour in perfect peace, I'll sing, "He knows! He knows!"

ContentCN: 眼前一步我看見，已夠應付需要；
ContentEN: One step I see before me, 'tis all I need to see,

ContentCN: 屬地幻想若肯去掉，天光就必照耀；
ContentEN: The light of heaven more brightly shines when earth's illusions flee;

ContentCN: 靜中也必甜然聽見："你要將我信靠。"
ContentEN: And sweetly through the silence comes, His loving, "Trust in Me!"

ContentCN: 我願跟隨祂帶領，對祂完全信靠；
ContentEN: Where he may lead I'll follow, my trust in Him repose;

ContentCN: 隨時隨在安然唱道："祂知道，祂知道；"
ContentEN: And ev'ry hour in perfect peace, I'll sing, "He knows! He knows!"

ContentCN: 隨時隨在安然唱道："祂知道，祂知道；"
ContentEN: And ev'ry hour in perfect peace, I'll sing, "He knows! He knows!"

ContentCN: 哦，那有福的"無智"，"不知"真是福氣！
ContentEN: Oh, blissful lack of wisdom, 'tis blessed not to know;

ContentCN: 祂用右手將我握住，不肯讓我稍離，
ContentEN: He holds me with His own right hand, and will not let me go,

ContentCN: 並使我的受驚心魂，在祂愛中安息。
ContentEN: And lulls my troubled soul to rest In Him who loves me so.

ContentCN: 我願跟隨祂帶領，對祂完全信靠；
ContentEN: Where he may lead I'll follow, my trust in Him repose;

ContentCN: 隨時隨在安然唱道："祂知道，祂知道；"
ContentEN: And ev'ry hour in perfect peace, I'll sing, "He knows! He knows!"

ContentCN: 隨時隨在安然唱道："祂知道，祂知道；"
ContentEN: And ev'ry hour in perfect peace, I'll sing, "He knows! He knows!"

ContentCN: 如此不知而向前，能知，我也不願；
ContentEN: So on I go not knowing; I would not if I might;

ContentCN: 寧願暗中與神同行，不願光中孤單；
ContentEN: I'd rather walk in the dark with God than go alone in the light;

ContentCN: 寧願憑信與神同行，不願憑著眼見。
ContentEN: I'd rather walk by faith with Him than go alone by sight.

ContentEN: God said it, and I believe it; That settles it,

ContentCN: 我宣告祂話。祂無謊言，
ContentEN: So I proclaim it. He cannot fail,

ContentCN: 也從不誤事；祂是何等的信實。
ContentEN: Nor can He ever lie; What a faithful God have I.

ContentEN: Tempests may rage and thunder , Mountains be rent asunder,

ContentCN: 但那相信主的人，必見主話得成。
ContentEN: Nations may fear and wonder - Trust, and be undismayed.

ContentEN: All that our Savior hath spoken , Came from the heart of God;

ContentCN: 信心從來不用憑據，因神言出必行。

ContentCN: 應當住在神恩翅下，神必定顧念你；
ContentEN: Be not dismayed whate'er betide, God will take care of you!

ContentCN: 任何遭遇不要驚怕，神必定顧念你。
ContentEN: Beneath His wings of love abide, God will take care of you!

ContentCN: 時遇險惡無處隱藏，神必定顧念你。
ContentEN: When dangers fierce your path assail, God will take care of you!

ContentCN: 緊握我手！我是這樣的無依，
ContentEN: Hold Thou my hand! So weak I am, and helpless,

ContentCN: 沒有扶助，一步我不敢走；
ContentEN: I dare not take one step without Thy aid;

ContentCN: 緊握我手！親愛救主，
ContentEN: Hold Thou my hand! For then, O loving Saviour,

ContentCN: 求提攜，禍害恐嚇纔不使我戰抖。
ContentEN: No dread of ill shall make my soul afraid.

ContentCN: 緊握我手！求祢更緊的拉我
ContentEN: Hold Thou my hand! And closer, closer draw me

ContentCN: 近祢自己，我一切中一切；
ContentEN: To Thy dear self – my hope, my joy, my all;

ContentCN: 緊握我手！免得偶然我流落，
ContentEN: Hold Thou my hand, lest haply I should wander;

ContentCN: 迷失了祢，我腳發輭滑跌。
ContentEN: And missing Thee, my trembling feet should fall.

ContentCN: 緊握我手！前面道路不豫曉，
ContentEN: Hold Thou my hand! The way is dark before me

ContentCN: 因為沒有祢臉上的亮光；
ContentEN: Without the sunlight of Thy face Divine;

ContentCN: 但是當我藉信瞥見祢榮耀，
ContentEN: But when by faith I catch its radiant glory,

ContentCN: 我的喜樂立即發音成唱。
ContentEN: What heights of joy, what rapturous songs are mine!

ContentCN: 緊握我手！當我走到祢為我
ContentEN: Hold Thou my hand! That when I reach the margin

ContentCN: 所經過的黑河孤單邊界，
ContentEN: Of that lone river thou didst cross for me.

ContentCN: 屬天的光纔會照射到此河，
ContentEN: A heav'nly light flash along its waters,

ContentCN: 其中黑水纔會不像黑夜。
ContentEN: And every wave like crystal bright shall be.

ContentCN: 神阿﹐祢名何等廣大泱漭﹗
ContentEN: Deep down into the depths of this Thy name,

ContentCN: 我今投身其中﹐心頂安然﹔
ContentEN: My God, I sink and dwell in calm delight;

ContentCN: 有祢夠了﹐無論日有多長﹐
ContentEN: Thou art enough however long the day,

ContentCN: 有祢夠了﹐無論夜有多暗。
ContentEN: Thou art enough however dark the night.

ContentCN: 有祢夠了﹐無論事多紛煩﹔
ContentEN: Thou art enough, however great the trial;

ContentCN: 有祢夠了﹐無論境多寂寞﹔
ContentEN: Thou art enough, however lone the scene.

ContentCN: 有祢﹐我就已經能夠盡歡﹐
ContentEN: With Thee alone, there's fullness of Thy joy;

ContentCN: 有祢﹐我就已經能夠唱歌。
ContentEN: With Thee alone, there's singing of Thy song.

ContentCN: 祢是我神﹗全有﹗全足﹗全豐﹗
ContentEN: Thou art my God, the All-Sufficient One;

ContentCN: 祢能為我創造我所缺乏﹔
ContentEN: Thou canst create for me whate'er I lack.

ContentCN: 有祢自己﹐在我回家途中﹐
ContentEN: Thy mighty Hand has strewn the homeward track

ContentCN: 無論有何需要﹐都必無差。
ContentEN: With miracles of love and tender care.

ContentCN: 我的神阿﹐祢在已過路上﹐
ContentEN: For me Thy trusting one, my God I dare

ContentCN: 曾用愛的神蹟多方眷顧﹔
ContentEN: Once more to fly myself upon Thy breast

ContentCN: 故我敢再投入祢的胸膛﹐
ContentEN: And there adore Thy ways in faith's deep rest

ContentCN: 因信心安﹐讚美祢的道路。
ContentEN: And there adore Thy ways in faith's quiet rest.

ContentCN: 無祢，我就無法想，不能立定地位；
ContentEN: I could not do without Thee! I cannot stand alone,

ContentCN: 我無力量和善良，我無自己智慧。
ContentEN: I have no strength or goodness, no wisdom of my own.

ContentCN: 但祢，親愛的救主，一切中的一切，
ContentEN: But Thou, beloved Saviour, art all in all to me

ContentCN: 輭弱要變成祝福，如果我被提挈。
ContentEN: And weakness will be power, if leaning hard on Thee.

ContentCN: 無祢，我就無法想，這路何等的長；
ContentEN: I could not do without Thee! For oh! the way is long,

ContentCN: 我是疲倦身不強，歎息代替詩章。
ContentEN: And I am often weary, and sigh replaces song.

ContentCN: 我怎可以能無祢？我並不能識路；
ContentEN: How could I do without Thee? I do not know the way;

ContentCN: 但祢識路直到底，不肯讓我迷途。
ContentEN: Thou knowest and Thou leadest, and wilt not let me stray.

ContentCN: 無祢，我就無法想，耶穌親愛救主；
ContentEN: I could not do without Thee! Jesus, Savior dear!

ContentCN: 就是我眼無印象，祢仍親近無誤。
ContentEN: E'en when my eyes are holden, I know that Thou art near.

ContentCN: 何等孤單何等痛，在這生疏人地；
ContentEN: How dreary and how lonely this changeful life would be,

ContentCN: 若無甘甜的交通，若無祢的安息。
ContentEN: Without the sweet communion, the secret rest with Thee!

ContentCN: 無祢，我就無法想，無人能夠認識
ContentEN: I could not do without Thee! No other friend can read

ContentCN: 我靈奇深的意向，將它需要解釋；
ContentEN: The spirit's strange deep longings, interpreting its need.

ContentCN: 我心祕密的角落，無人能夠進入，
ContentEN: No human heart could enter each dim recess of mine,

ContentCN: 來慰，來靜，並來託，只有祢能，我主！
ContentEN: And soothe and hush and calm it, blessed Lord, but Thine!

ContentCN: 無祢，我就無法想，年日已經不多；
ContentEN: I could not do without Thee! For years are fleeting fast,

ContentCN: 我是須與人同樣孤獨渡河而過。
ContentEN: And soon, in solemn loneliness, the river must be passed.

ContentCN: 但祢永遠不離開，不管浪有幾多；
ContentEN: But Thou wilt never leave me, and, though the waves roll high,

ContentCN: 我知祢仍要施愛，並低聲說："是我。"
ContentEN: I know Thou wilt be near me, and whisper, "It is I."

ContentCN: 祢信實何廣大﹗祢信實何廣大﹗
ContentEN: Great is Thy faithfulness! Great is Thy faithfulness!

ContentCN: 祢的憐憫每晨都是新鮮﹗
ContentEN: Morning by morning new mercies I see;

ContentCN: 凡所需祢聖手都豫備完全﹐
ContentEN: All I have needed Thy hand hath provided.

ContentCN: 祢的信實極其廣大無邊﹗
ContentEN: Great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto me!

ContentCN: 父阿﹐在祢並無轉動的影兒﹐
ContentEN: Great is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father!

ContentCN: 祢的信實極其廣大無邊﹔
ContentEN: There is no shadow of turning with Thee;

ContentCN: 千萬億載祢的恩惠永存在﹐
ContentEN: Thou changest not; Thy compassions, they fail not;

ContentCN: 祢的憐憫像祢永遠不變。
ContentEN: As Thou hast been Thou forever wilt be.

ContentCN: 祢信實何廣大﹗祢信實何廣大﹗
ContentEN: Great is Thy faithfulness! Great is Thy faithfulness!

ContentCN: 祢的憐憫每晨都是新鮮﹗
ContentEN: Morning by morning new mercies I see;

ContentCN: 凡所需祢聖手都豫備完全﹐
ContentEN: All I have needed Thy hand hath provided.

ContentCN: 祢的信實極其廣大無邊﹗
ContentEN: Great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto me!

ContentCN: 冬夏時令﹐莊稼及時的供應﹐
ContentEN: Summer and winter and springtime and harvest,

ContentCN: 日月星辰﹐晝夜不斷運轉﹔
ContentEN: Sun, moon, and stars in their courses above

ContentCN: 祢的創造﹐多方都在作見證﹐
ContentEN: Join with all nature in manifold witness

ContentCN: 祢的信實極其廣大無邊。
ContentEN: To Thy great faithfulness, mercy, and love.

ContentCN: 祢信實何廣大﹗祢信實何廣大﹗
ContentEN: Great is Thy faithfulness! Great is Thy faithfulness!

ContentCN: 祢的憐憫每晨都是新鮮﹗
ContentEN: Morning by morning new mercies I see;

ContentCN: 凡所需祢聖手都豫備完全﹐
ContentEN: All I have needed Thy hand hath provided.

ContentCN: 祢的信實極其廣大無邊﹗
ContentEN: Great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto me!

ContentCN: 祢的赦免﹐所給平安與喜樂﹐
ContentEN: Pardon for sin and a peace that endureth,

ContentCN: 祢的同在﹐所賜安撫、引導﹔
ContentEN: Thine own dear presence to cheer and to guide,

ContentCN: 今日力量﹐明日光明的盼望﹐
ContentEN: Strength for today and bright hope for tomorrow,

ContentCN: 全都屬我﹐福分一無缺少。
ContentEN: Blessings all mine, with ten thousand beside!

ContentCN: 看哪，看哪，神是我的拯救！
ContentEN: Behold, Behold, God is my salvation,

ContentCN: 我倚靠祂必不懼怕；
ContentEN: I will trust and not be afraid,

ContentCN: 看哪，看哪，神是我的拯救！
ContentEN: Behold, Behold, God is my salvation,

ContentCN: 我倚靠祂必不懼怕；
ContentEN: I will trust and not be afraid,

ContentCN: 哈利路亞，哈利路亞，哈利路亞，我必不懼怕。
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah, I'll not be afraid.

ContentCN: 許多事明天將臨到﹐許多事難以明瞭﹔
ContentEN: Many things about tomorrow I don't seem to understand,

ContentCN: 但我知主掌握明天﹐祂必要領我向前。
ContentEN: But I know who holds tomorrow and I know who holds my hand.

ContentCN: 我不知明日將如何﹐每時刻安然度過﹔
ContentEN: I don't know about tomorrow, I just live from day to day;

ContentCN: 我不求明天的陽光﹐因明天或轉陰暗。
ContentEN: I don't borrow from its sunshine, for its skies may turn to gray.

ContentCN: 我不為將來而憂慮﹐因我知主所應許﹔
ContentEN: I don't worry o'er the future, for I know what Jesus said;

ContentCN: 今天我必與主同行﹐祂深知前途光景。
ContentEN: And today I'll walk beside Him, for He knows what is ahead.

ContentCN: 許多事明天將臨到﹐許多事難以明瞭﹔
ContentEN: Many things about tomorrow I don't seem to understand,

ContentCN: 但我知主掌握明天﹐祂必要領我向前。
ContentEN: But I know who holds tomorrow and I know who holds my hand.

ContentCN: 我不知明日將如何﹐或遭遇貧苦饑餓﹔
ContentEN: I don't know about tomorrow; it may bring me poverty;

ContentCN: 那看顧麻雀的恩主﹐必隨我時刻看顧。
ContentEN: But the One who feeds the sparrow is the One who stands by me.

ContentCN: 我前程雖經歷水火﹐或快樂或有災禍﹔
ContentEN: And the path that be my portion may be through the flame or flood,

ContentCN: 但我主引導我路途﹐祂寶血將我抹塗。
ContentEN: But His presence goes before me and I'm covered with His blood.

ContentCN: 許多事明天將臨到﹐許多事難以明瞭﹔
ContentEN: Many things about tomorrow I don't seem to understand,

ContentCN: 但我知主掌握明天﹐祂必要領我向前。
ContentEN: But I know who holds tomorrow and I know who holds my hand.

ContentCN: 每一步越走越光明﹐像攀登黃金階梯﹔
ContentEN: Every step is getting brighter as the golden stairs I climb;

ContentCN: 每重擔越挑越輕省﹐每朵雲披上銀衣。
ContentEN: Every burden's getting lighter, every cloud is silver-lined.

ContentCN: 在那裡陽光常普照﹐在那裡沒有眼淚﹔
ContentEN: There the sun is always shining, there no tear will dim the eye,

ContentCN: 在美麗彩虹的盡頭﹐眾山嶺與天相連。
ContentEN: At the ending of the rainbow, where the mountains touch the sky.

ContentCN: 務要靠主，專心靠主，
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord with all thy heart,

ContentCN: 凡你所行都要認定主， 祂必指引你的路。
ContentEN: And in all the ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct thy paths.

ContentCN: 務要靠主，專心靠主，
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord with all thy heart,

ContentCN: 凡你所行都要認定主， 祂必指引你的路。
ContentEN: And in all the ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct thy paths.

ContentCN: 誰若倚靠耶和華，真有福，
ContentEN: Blessed is he that is trusting the Lord,

ContentCN: 必得著應時的幫助；
ContentEN: For the help that he daily needs;

ContentCN: 你若處處緊緊的跟隨主，
ContentEN: He shall inherit the promised reward,

ContentCN: 必承受應許的好處。
ContentEN: If he follow where Jesus leads.

ContentCN: 務要靠主，專心靠主，
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord with all thy heart,

ContentCN: 凡你所行都要認定主，祂必指引你的路。
ContentEN: And in all thy ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct thy paths.

ContentCN: 務要靠主，專心靠主，
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord with all thy heart,

ContentCN: 凡你所行都要認定主，祂必指引你的路。
ContentEN: And in all thy ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct thy paths.

ContentCN: 誰若倚靠耶和華，真有福，
ContentEN: Blessed is he that is trusting the Lord.

ContentCN: 就是走屬天的道路；
ContentEN: Who doth follow the heav'nly way;

ContentCN: 你若時時不斷的仰望主，
ContentEN: Keeping with patience and hope the path,

ContentCN: 必能有穩健的腳步。
ContentEN: All his steps shall be guarded each day.

ContentCN: 務要靠主，專心靠主，
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord with all thy heart,

ContentCN: 凡你所行都要認定主，祂必指引你的路。
ContentEN: And in all the ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct thy paths.

ContentCN: 務要靠主，專心靠主，
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord with all thy heart,

ContentCN: 凡你所行都要認定主，祂必指引你的路。
ContentEN: And in all the ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct thy paths.

ContentCN: 真是有福，有天父來扶助，
ContentEN: Blessed is he whom the Father will aid.

ContentCN: 並且有救主來照顧；
ContentEN: And the Savior will e'er befriend.

ContentCN: 你若得著主與父來同住，
ContentEN: He shall not fear, and shall not be dismayed,

ContentCN: 就永遠不再感孤苦。
ContentEN: For the Lord will his soul defend.

ContentCN: 務要靠主，專心靠主，
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord with all thy heart,

ContentCN: 凡你所行都要認定主，祂必指引你的路。
ContentEN: And in all the ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct thy paths.

ContentCN: 務要靠主，專心靠主，
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord with all thy heart,

ContentCN: 凡你所行都要認定主，祂必指引你的路。
ContentEN: And in all the ways acknowledge Him, and He shall direct thy paths.

ContentCN: 真是有福，你不斷走正路，
ContentEN: Blessed is he who will keep in the way.

ContentCN: 向上又向前不受阻；
ContentEN: That will upward and onward lead;

ContentCN: 你若得著主同在的豐富，
ContentEN: Walking by faith in His love every day,

ContentCN: 就必得應時的幫助。
ContentEN: Who supplieth his daily need.

ContentCN: 永不灰心﹐永不灰心﹐
ContentEN: Never give up, never give up,

ContentCN: 永不因愁苦而灰心﹐
ContentEN: Never give up to thy sorrows;

ContentCN: 主能使天光照臨。
ContentEN: Jesus will bid them depart.

ContentCN: 專心靠主﹐專心靠主﹐
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord, trust in the Lord;

ContentCN: 試煉中仍歌唱不住﹐
ContentEN: Sing when your trials are greatest;

ContentCN: 剛強壯膽信靠主。
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord and take heart.

ContentCN: 永不灰心﹐永不沮喪﹐
ContentEN: Never be sad or desponding,

ContentCN: 相信主是你盼望﹔
ContentEN: If thou hast faith to believe;

ContentCN: 將所需求陳明祂前﹐
ContentEN: Grace for the duties before thee,

ContentCN: 必領受夠用恩典。
ContentEN: Ask of thy God and receive.

ContentCN: 永不灰心﹐永不灰心﹐
ContentEN: Never give up, never give up,

ContentCN: 永不因愁苦而灰心﹐
ContentEN: Never give up to thy sorrows;

ContentCN: 主能使天光照臨。
ContentEN: Jesus will bid them depart.

ContentCN: 專心靠主﹐專心靠主﹐
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord, trust in the Lord;

ContentCN: 試煉中仍歌唱不住﹐
ContentEN: Sing when your trials are greatest;

ContentCN: 剛強壯膽信靠主。
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord and take heart.

ContentCN: 雖你有重擔壓心頭﹐
ContentEN: What if thy burdens oppress thee,

ContentCN: 雖你生活滿苦憂﹔
ContentEN: What though thy life may be drear;

ContentCN: 仰望主必得祂恩光﹐
ContentEN: Look on the side that is brightest;

ContentCN: 求主開路可前往。
ContentEN: Pray and thy path will be clear.

ContentCN: 永不灰心﹐永不灰心﹐
ContentEN: Never give up, never give up,

ContentCN: 永不因愁苦而灰心﹐
ContentEN: Never give up to thy sorrows;

ContentCN: 主能使天光照臨。
ContentEN: Jesus will bid them depart.

ContentCN: 專心靠主﹐專心靠主﹐
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord, trust in the Lord;

ContentCN: 試煉中仍歌唱不住﹐
ContentEN: Sing when your trials are greatest;

ContentCN: 剛強壯膽信靠主。
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord and take heart.

ContentCN: 永不灰心﹐永不沮喪﹐
ContentEN: Never be sad or desponding;

ContentCN: 黑夜過必露晨光﹔
ContentEN: There is a morrow for thee.

ContentCN: 不久﹐在榮光照耀處﹐
ContentEN: Soon thou shalt dwell in its brightness;

ContentCN: 你要與主永同住。
ContentEN: There with the Lord thou shalt be.

ContentCN: 永不灰心﹐永不灰心﹐
ContentEN: Never give up, never give up,

ContentCN: 永不因愁苦而灰心﹐
ContentEN: Never give up to thy sorrows;

ContentCN: 主能使天光照臨。
ContentEN: Jesus will bid them depart.

ContentCN: 專心靠主﹐專心靠主﹐
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord, trust in the Lord;

ContentCN: 試煉中仍歌唱不住﹐
ContentEN: Sing when your trials are greatest;

ContentCN: 剛強壯膽信靠主。
ContentEN: Trust in the Lord and take heart.

ContentCN: 永不灰心﹐永不沮喪﹐
ContentEN: Never be sad or desponding;

ContentCN: 主膀臂是你依傍﹔
ContentEN: Lean on the arm of thy Lord,

ContentCN: 常在主深恩中躲藏﹐
ContentEN: Dwell in the depths of His mercy;

ContentCN: 直等那日得獎賞。
ContentEN: Thou shalt receive thy reward.

ContentCN: 我是一個異鄉旅客，跋涉遙遠的道路；
ContentEN: I'm a pilgrim and a stranger. Rough and thorny is the road,

ContentCN: 雖然有時遇見阻隔，引我親天父。
ContentEN: Often in the midst of danger, but it leads to God.

ContentCN: 途中雖有烏雲籠罩，也有意外的打擾；
ContentEN: Clouds and darkness oft distress me, great and many are my foes;

ContentCN: 思慮、煩惱把我壓倒，但我父知道。
ContentEN: Anxious cares and thoughts oppress me, but my Father knows.

ContentCN: 父是知道，何等保證！沿途試煉有何害？
ContentEN: Oh, how sweet is this assurance, 'mid the conflict and the strife!

ContentCN: 縱然它們隨我一生，不容易忍耐。
ContentEN: Although sorrows past endurance follow me through life.

ContentCN: 家已在望，莫大鼓勵，使我安息不動搖！
ContentEN: Home in prospect still can cheer me, yes, and give me sweet repose,

ContentCN: 祂的同在何其甜蜜，我天父知道。
ContentEN: While I feel His presence near me; for my Father knows

ContentCN: 我父每日都知道我，看守我在愛裏面；
ContentEN: Yes, He sees and knows me duly, watches over me in love;

ContentCN: 艱難來襲，祂來助我，叫我往上看。
ContentEN: Sends me help when foes assail me –bids me look above.

ContentCN: 不久旅程到達止境，今生就要告終了，
ContentEN: Soon my journey will be ended, life is drawing to a close;

ContentCN: 我將如何進入光明，這事父知道。
ContentEN: I shall then be well attended; this my Father knows.

ContentCN: 那時我在父的面前，親眼看見祂慈顏；
ContentEN: I shall then with joy behold Him –face to face my Father see;

ContentCN: 滿心歡喜，俯伏朝見，感謝祂恩典。
ContentEN: Fall with rapture, and adore Him for His love to me.

ContentCN: 在那甜美安息之地，再無意外的攪擾；
ContentEN: Nothing more shall then distress me in the land of sweet repose;

ContentCN: 神的應許全得應驗，這事父知道。
ContentEN: Jesus stand engaged to bless me; this my Father knows.

ContentCN: 時時刻刻靠耶穌，朝朝暮暮靠耶穌；
ContentEN: Trusting as the moments fly, trusting as the days go by;

ContentCN: 無論遭遇何事故，一切惟靠主耶穌。
ContentEN: Trusting Him whate'er befall, trusting Jesus that is all.

ContentCN: 日日專心靠救主，每逢患難主幫助；
ContentEN: Simply trusting every day, trusting thro' a stormy way;

ContentCN: 雖我信心或不足，一切惟靠主耶穌。
ContentEN: Even when my faith is small, trusting Jesus that is all.

ContentCN: 時時刻刻靠耶穌，朝朝暮暮靠耶穌；
ContentEN: Trusting as the moments fly, trusting as the days go by;

ContentCN: 無論遭遇何事故，一切惟靠主耶穌。
ContentEN: Trusting Him whate'er befall, trusting Jesus that is all.

ContentCN: 靠主聖靈來光照，使我心中滿榮耀；
ContentEN: Brightly doth His Spirit shine into this poor heart of mine;

ContentCN: 賴主扶持免跌倒，一切惟靠主引導。
ContentEN: While He leads I cannot fall, trusting Jesus–that is all.

ContentCN: 時時刻刻靠耶穌，朝朝暮暮靠耶穌；
ContentEN: Trusting as the moments fly, trusting as the days go by;

ContentCN: 無論遭遇何事故，一切惟靠主耶穌。
ContentEN: Trusting Him whate'er befall, trusting Jesus that is all.

ContentCN: 前途光明歌不休，路徑陰暗殷勤求；
ContentEN: Singing if my way is clear, praying if the path be drear;

ContentCN: 危時憑主我無憂，一切惟靠主拯救。
ContentEN: If in danger, for Him call, trusting Jesus–that is all.

ContentCN: 時時刻刻靠耶穌，朝朝暮暮靠耶穌；
ContentEN: Trusting as the moments fly, trusting as the days go by;

ContentCN: 無論遭遇何事故，一切惟靠主耶穌。
ContentEN: Trusting Him whate'er befall, trusting Jesus that is all.

ContentCN: 依靠耶穌度今生，仰賴救主不變更；
ContentEN: Trusting Him while life shall last, trusting Him till earth be past;

ContentCN: 直到離世進天城，靠託救主到永恆。
ContentEN: Till within the jasper wall, trusting Jesus–that is all.

ContentCN: 哦，何等奇妙，奇妙安息！
ContentEN: Oh! What wonderful, wonderful rest!

ContentCN: 全然倚靠主，我便蒙福祉；
ContentEN: Trusting completely in Jesus I'm blest;

ContentCN: 每逢遇災害，主安慰護庇，
ContentEN: Sweetly He comforts and shields from alarms,

ContentCN: 使我安穩在祂大能膀臂。
ContentEN: Holding me safe in His mighty arms.

ContentCN: 不，永不孤單，不，永不孤單，
ContentEN: No, Never alone; No, never alone;

ContentCN: 主曾應許不離開我，永遠不使我孤單；
ContentEN: He promised never to leave me, never to leave me alone.

ContentCN: 不，永不孤單，不，永不孤單，
ContentEN: No, Never alone; No, never alone;

ContentCN: 主曾應許不離開我，永遠不使我孤單！
ContentEN: He promised never to leave me, never to leave me alone.

ContentCN: 我必與你同在！甜美的應許，
ContentEN: Fear not, I am with thee! Blessed golden ray,

ContentCN: 照明我的腳步，消除我畏懼！
ContentEN: Like a star of glory, lighting up my way!

ContentCN: 在於午夜沉寂，安慰我心懷，
ContentEN: Through the clouds of midnight, this bright promise shone,

ContentCN: 永不將我棄絕，必與我同在。
ContentEN: I will never leave thee, never will leave thee alone.

ContentCN: 不，永不孤單，不，永不孤單，
ContentEN: No, Never alone; No, never alone;

ContentCN: 主曾應許不離開我，永遠不使我孤單；
ContentEN: He promised never to leave me, never to leave me alone.

ContentCN: 不，永不孤單，不，永不孤單，
ContentEN: No, Never alone; No, never alone;

ContentCN: 主曾應許不離開我，永遠不使我孤單！
ContentEN: He promised never to leave me, never to leave me alone.

ContentCN: 四圍鮮花敗落，主愛不凋殘，
ContentEN: Roses fade around me, lilies bloom and die,

ContentCN: 地上夕陽滅沒，天光仍燦爛；
ContentEN: Earthly sunbeams vanish, radiant still the day!

ContentCN: 主如一袋沒藥，整夜在我懷，
ContentEN: Jesus, Rose of Sharon, Blooming for His own,

ContentCN: 直到晨曦破曉，必與我同在。
ContentEN: Jesus, heaven's sunshine, never will leave me alone.

ContentCN: 不，永不孤單，不，永不孤單，
ContentEN: No, Never alone; No, never alone;

ContentCN: 主曾應許不離開我，永遠不使我孤單；
ContentEN: He promised never to leave me, never to leave me alone.

ContentCN: 不，永不孤單，不，永不孤單，
ContentEN: No, Never alone; No, never alone;

ContentCN: 主曾應許不離開我，永遠不使我孤單！
ContentEN: He promised never to leave me, never to leave me alone.

ContentCN: 前途雖然艱難，試煉要來臨，
ContentEN: Steps unseen before me, hidden dangers near;

ContentCN: 但主必更親近，並說，"可放心；"
ContentEN: Nearer still my Saviour, whispering, "Be of cheer,"

ContentCN: 喜樂猶如春鳥，飛入我心懷，
ContentEN: Joys, like birds of spring-time, to my heart have flown,

ContentCN: 使我甜美唱道："主與我同在！"
ContentEN: Singing all so sweetly, "He will not leave me alone."

ContentCN: 奇妙又奇妙的耶穌，祂培養一詩歌在我心；
ContentEN: Wonderful, Wonderful Jesus, in the heart He implanteth a song;

ContentCN: 使我釋放，使我歡暢得力量，
ContentEN: A song of deliv'rance, of courage, of strength,

ContentCN: 使我心靈歡樂而歌唱。
ContentEN: In the heart He implanteth a song.

ContentCN: 決不會覺得白日淒涼，決不會覺得夜太長；
ContentEN: There is never a day so dreary, there is never a night so long,

ContentCN: 我心若真能信靠耶穌，必能隨時歌唱。
ContentEN: But the soul that is trusting Jesus, will somewhere find a song.

ContentCN: 奇妙又奇妙的耶穌，祂培養一詩歌在我心；
ContentEN: Wonderful, Wonderful Jesus, in the heart He implanteth a song;

ContentCN: 使我釋放，使我歡暢得力量，
ContentEN: A song of deliv'rance, of courage, of strength,

ContentCN: 使我心靈歡樂而歌唱。
ContentEN: In the heart He implanteth a song.

ContentCN: 決不會覺得十架難當，決不會覺得苦難堪；
ContentEN: There is never a cross so heavy, there is never a weight of woe,

ContentCN: 主耶穌必親自來背負，祂愛無法測量。
ContentEN: But that Jesus will help to carry because He loveth so.

ContentCN: 奇妙又奇妙的耶穌，祂培養一詩歌在我心；
ContentEN: Wonderful, Wonderful Jesus, in the heart He implanteth a song;

ContentCN: 使我釋放，使我歡暢得力量，
ContentEN: A song of deliv'rance, of courage, of strength,

ContentCN: 使我心靈歡樂而歌唱。
ContentEN: In the heart He implanteth a song.

ContentCN: 決不會有重擔難卸下，決不會損失難補償；
ContentEN: There is never a care or burden, there is never a grief or loss,

ContentCN: 凡事若能帶到十架前，必使擔子輕省。
ContentEN: But that Jesus in love will lighten when carried to the cross.

ContentCN: 奇妙又奇妙的耶穌，祂培養一詩歌在我心；
ContentEN: Wonderful, Wonderful Jesus, in the heart He implanteth a song;

ContentCN: 使我釋放，使我歡暢得力量，
ContentEN: A song of deliv'rance, of courage, of strength,

ContentCN: 使我心靈歡樂而歌唱。
ContentEN: In the heart He implanteth a song.

ContentCN: 決不會再有無告罪人，決不會再有流浪客；
ContentEN: There is never a guilty sinner, there is never a wand'ring one,

ContentCN: 藉著祂愛子耶穌恩典，必能完全拯救。
ContentEN: But that God can in mercy pardon thro' Jesus Christ, His Son.

ContentCN: 我惟靠祢，祢是盾牌常護庇，
ContentEN: We rest on Thee, our Shield and our Defender:

ContentCN: 我不孤單，因祢為我迎敵；
ContentEN: We go not forth alone against the foe;

ContentCN: 我能平安，因祢剛強有能力，
ContentEN: Strong in Thy strength, safe in Thy keeping tender,

ContentCN: 我能靠祢，祢名作我旌旗。
ContentEN: We rest on Thee, and in Thy Name we go.

ContentCN: 只靠祢名，榮耀救恩的元帥，
ContentEN: Yea, in Thy Name, O Captain of salvation!

ContentCN: 靠祢聖名，祢名遠超萬名；
ContentEN: In Thy dear Name, all other names above;

ContentCN: 是我公義，作我根基永堅定，
ContentEN: Jesus our Righteousness, our sure Foundation,

ContentCN: 慈愛君王，祢名榮耀尊崇。
ContentEN: Our Prince of glory and our King of love.

ContentCN: 我惟信祢，軟弱乃得變剛強，
ContentEN: We go in faith, our own great weakness feeling,

ContentCN: 日日來嘗祢的恩典豐盛；
ContentEN: And needing more each day Thy grace to know;

ContentCN: 心靈深處湧出得勝凱歌聲，
ContentEN: Yet from our hearts a song of triumph pealing;

ContentCN: 欣然靠託，奉祢尊名前行。
ContentEN: We rest on Thee, and in Thy Name we go.

ContentCN: 我惟靠祢，祢是盾牌常護庇，
ContentEN: We rest on Thee, our Shield and our Defender;

ContentCN: 因主得勝，一切讚美歸祢；
ContentEN: Thine is the battle, Thine shall be the praise.

ContentCN: 戰爭完畢，進入榮耀聖城裏，
ContentEN: When reigning in the Kingdom of Thy splendor,

ContentCN: 同祢相聚，永遠喜樂安息。
ContentEN: Victors, we rest with Thee, through endless days.

ContentCN: 我靈，鎮靜！主正在你身旁，
ContentEN: Be still, my soul! The Lord is on thy side;

ContentCN: 憂傷十架，務要忍耐擔當；
ContentEN: Bear patiently the cross of grief or pain;

ContentCN: 信靠父神，由祂安排主張，
ContentEN: Leave to thy God to order and provide;

ContentCN: 萬變之中，惟主信實久長；我靈，鎮靜！
ContentEN: In every change He faithful will remain. Be still, my soul!

ContentCN: 天友最是良善，經過荊棘，引到歡樂之疆。
ContentEN: Thy best, they heav'nly Friend Through thorny ways leads to a joyful end.

ContentCN: 我靈，鎮靜！一切有主擔當，
ContentEN: Be still, my soul! Thy God doth undertake

ContentCN: 未來引導，必與過去一樣；
ContentEN: To guide the future as He has the past.

ContentCN: 任何遭遇，莫讓信、望動搖，
ContentEN: Thy hope, thy confidence let nothing shake;

ContentCN: 眼前隱密終必成為明朗；我靈，鎮靜！
ContentEN: All now mysterious shall be bright at last. Be still, my soul!

ContentCN: 風浪仍在聽命，有如當年主使風浪平靜。
ContentEN: The waves and wind still know His voice who ruled them while He dwelt below.

ContentCN: 我靈，鎮靜！時間過去何速，
ContentEN: Be still, my soul! The hour is hast'ning on

ContentCN: 即將與主永遠同在一處；
ContentEN: When we shall be forever with the lord,

ContentCN: 失望、驚恐，那時遠遠離我，
ContentEN: When disappointment, grief, and fear are gone,

ContentCN: 愛何無窮，忘記一切憂傷；我靈，鎮靜！
ContentEN: Sorrow forget, love's purest joys restored. Be still, my soul!

ContentCN: 當主擦我眼淚，平安滿溢，當在天家相逢。
ContentEN: When change and tears are past, all safe and blessed we shall meet at last.

ContentCN: 每一天所度過每一時刻﹐
ContentEN: Day by day, and with each passing moment,

ContentCN: 我獲得力量勝過試煉﹔
ContentEN: Strength I find to meet my trials here;

ContentCN: 我信靠我天父智慧計劃﹐
ContentEN: Trusting in my Father's wise bestowment,

ContentCN: 無理由再憂慮並掛念。
ContentEN: I've no cause for worry or for fear.

ContentCN: 祂心仁慈遠超一切度量﹐
ContentEN: He whose heart is kind beyond all measure

ContentCN: 逐日賜我祂手所量定﹔
ContentEN: Gives unto each day what He deems best:

ContentCN: 憂或喜都顯明祂的慈愛﹐
ContentEN: Lovingly its part of pain and pleasure,

ContentCN: 勞苦中融主甘甜。
ContentEN: Mingling toil with peace and rest.

ContentCN: 每一天﹐主自己與我相親﹐
ContentEN: Every day the Lord Himself is near me

ContentCN: 每時刻賜下應時憐憫﹔
ContentEN: With a special mercy for each hour;

ContentCN: 每重擔主甘願背負安慰﹐
ContentEN: All my cares He fain would bear and cheer me,

ContentCN: 祂名稱為策士、全能者。
ContentEN: He whose name is Counsellor and Pow'r.

ContentCN: 主保護祂兒女如同珍寶﹐
ContentEN: The protection of His child and treasure

ContentCN: 為成全此使命不稍卻﹔
ContentEN: Is a charge that on Himself He laid.

ContentCN: 你能力必像你日子一般﹐
ContentEN: As thy days, thy strength shall be in measure:

ContentCN: 所賜保證何甘甜。
ContentEN: This the pledge to me He made.

ContentCN: 每試煉都彰顯救主恩助﹐
ContentEN: Help me then, in every tribulation,

ContentCN: 我只要信靠寶貴應許﹔
ContentEN: So to trust Thy promises, O Lord,

ContentCN: 甜安慰﹐使我信心更堅定﹐
ContentEN: That I lose not faith's sweet consolation,

ContentCN: 祢神聖話語成我供應﹐
ContentEN: Offered me within Thy holy Word.

ContentCN: 每一次我遇見痛苦患難﹐
ContentEN: Help me, Lord, when toil and trouble meeting,

ContentCN: 都願從父手歡然接受﹔
ContentEN: E'er to take, as from a father's hand,

ContentCN: 每件事隨時光如水逝去﹐
ContentEN: One by one, the days, the moments fleeting

ContentCN: 我要與主永同在。
ContentEN: Till with Christ the Lord I stand.

ContentCN: 安息！安息！平安穩妥，一無驚恐；
ContentEN: Resting, resting, Safe and secure from all alarms;

ContentCN: 安息！安息！安息在那永久膀臂中。
ContentEN: Resting, resting, resting on the everlasting arms.

ContentCN: 交通何甜美，喜樂何豐盈，
ContentEN: What a fellowship, what a joy divine,

ContentCN: 安息在那永久膀臂中；
ContentEN: Resting on the everlasting arms;

ContentCN: 福氣何全備，平安何神聖，
ContentEN: What a blessedness, what a peace is mine,

ContentCN: 安息在那永久膀臂中。
ContentEN: Resting on the everlasting arms.

ContentCN: 安息！安息！平安穩妥，一無驚恐；
ContentEN: Resting, resting, Safe and secure from all alarms;

ContentCN: 安息！安息！安息在那永久膀臂中。
ContentEN: Resting, resting, resting on the everlasting arms.

ContentCN: 今行這旅程，心中滿平安，
ContentEN: Oh, how sweet to walk in this pilgrim way,

ContentCN: 安息在那永久膀臂中；
ContentEN: Resting on the everlasting arms;

ContentCN: 越行越光明，恩光照燦爛，
ContentEN: Oh, how bright the path grows from day to day,

ContentCN: 安息在那永久膀臂中。
ContentEN: Resting on the everlasting arms.

ContentCN: 安息！安息！平安穩妥，一無驚恐；
ContentEN: Resting, resting, Safe and secure from all alarms;

ContentCN: 安息！安息！安息在那永久膀臂中。
ContentEN: Resting, resting, resting on the everlasting arms.

ContentCN: 有何我所懼？有何我所怕？
ContentEN: What have I to dread, what have I to fear,

ContentCN: 安息在那永久膀臂中；
ContentEN: Resting on the everlasting arms?

ContentCN: 與主永同居，平安無復加，
ContentEN: I have blessed peace with my Lord so near,

ContentCN: 安息在那永久膀臂中。
ContentEN: Resting on the everlasting arms.

ContentCN: 將一切憂慮卸給神，因為祂顧念你們；
ContentEN: Cast all your care upon Him, because He cares for you.

ContentCN: 將一切憂慮卸給神，因為祂顧念你們。
ContentEN: Cast all your care upon Him, because He cares for you.

ContentCN: 信靠親愛救主，真奇妙甜蜜；
ContentEN: Trusting in the Saviour – O 'tis wondrous sweet;

ContentCN: 甚麼安慰可比在祂前屈膝？
ContentEN: Just to have Him with us, worship at His feet.

ContentCN: 信靠親愛救主，時刻不離開；
ContentEN: Trusting in the Savior, through each passing day;

ContentCN: 祂常與我同在，與我同在，常與我同在。
ContentEN: Just to feel His presence with us always, yes, with us always.

ContentCN: 信靠親愛救主，真奇妙甜蜜；
ContentEN: Trusting in the Saviour – O 'tis wondrous sweet;

ContentCN: 甚麼安慰可比在祂前屈膝？
ContentEN: Just to feel His presence, worship at His feet.

ContentCN: 世界充塞憂傷，惟主我頌揚；
ContentEN: Through the passing moment, singing joyful praise,

ContentCN: 祂恩眼常眷顧，祂慈愛無量。
ContentEN: Unto Him who ever crowns with love our days.

ContentCN: 信靠親愛救主，真奇妙甜蜜；
ContentEN: Trusting in the Saviour – O 'tis wondrous sweet;

ContentCN: 甚麼安慰可比在祂前屈膝？
ContentEN: Just to have Him with us, worship at His feet.

ContentCN: 信靠親愛救主，時刻不離開；
ContentEN: Trusting in the Savior, through each passing day;

ContentCN: 祂常與我同在，與我同在，常與我同在。
ContentEN: Just to feel His presence with us always, yes, with us always.

ContentCN: 信靠親愛救主，可站立得穩；
ContentEN: Trusting in the Savior, we can never fail;

ContentCN: 祂有大能大力，勝過罪、黑暗。
ContentEN: 'Gainst the pow'rs of darkness, we will e'er prevail.

ContentCN: 世界何能害我？因祂不離我；
ContentEN: For His mighty power ever is the same,

ContentCN: 祂是我的能力，也是我詩歌。
ContentEN: And He'll ne'er forsake us, praise, O praise His name.

ContentCN: 信靠親愛救主，真奇妙甜蜜；
ContentEN: Trusting in the Saviour – O 'tis wondrous sweet;

ContentCN: 甚麼安慰可比在祂前屈膝？
ContentEN: Just to have Him with us, worship at His feet.

ContentCN: 信靠親愛救主，時刻不離開；
ContentEN: Trusting in the Savior, through each passing day;

ContentCN: 祂常與我同在，與我同在，常與我同在。
ContentEN: Just to feel His presence with us always, yes, with us always.

ContentCN: 雖經深谷、高山，迭遭苦與難；
ContentEN: Over hill and valley, swells the glad refrain

ContentCN: 惟想主愛偉大，哭泣變頌讚。
ContentEN: Of His love and mercy, ever more the same.

ContentCN: 主是寶貴之友，常導我前行；
ContentEN: Precious Friend and Savior, with our hand in Thine,

ContentCN: 恩典長闊高深，足夠用一生。
ContentEN: We can never falter, held by Love Divine.

ContentCN: 是愛的神作我牧人﹐
ContentEN: The Lord my shepherd is;

ContentCN: 祂常餵養﹐祂常施恩﹔
ContentEN: I shall be well supplied.

ContentCN: 祂是屬我﹐我是屬祂﹐
ContentEN: Since He is mine and I am His,

ContentCN: 何來需要﹖何來缺乏﹖
ContentEN: What can I want beside?

ContentCN: 祂帶我到嫩草地場﹐
ContentEN: He leads me to the place

ContentCN: 使我感覺滿足歡唱﹔
ContentEN: Where heav'nly pasture grows,

ContentCN: 又帶我到平靜溪流﹐
ContentEN: Where living waters gently pass

ContentCN: 交通不斷﹐安息無憂。
ContentEN: And full salvation flows.

ContentCN: 我時迷路﹐祂來截回﹐
ContentEN: If e'er I go astray,

ContentCN: 再側我心受祂支配﹔
ContentEN: He doth my soul reclaim

ContentCN: 我常搖動﹐不甚堅定﹐
ContentEN: And guides me in His own right way

ContentCN: 祂引導我﹐是為祂名。
ContentEN: For His most holy name.

ContentCN: 何等不明﹐何等可疑﹐
ContentEN: While He affords His aid,

ContentCN: 怎能行走無所顧忌﹖
ContentEN: I cannot yield to fear;

ContentCN: 祢竿扶持﹐祢杖引領﹐
ContentEN: Tho' I should walk thro' death's dark shade,

ContentCN: 祢的同在滿我途徑。
ContentEN: My Shepherd's with me there.

ContentCN: 祢使我能大膽誇勝﹐
ContentEN: In spite of all my foes,

ContentCN: 敵雖四佈﹐享恩如恆﹔
ContentEN: Thou dost my table spread;

ContentCN: 我頭油潤﹐我杯酒溢﹐
ContentEN: My cup with blessings overflows,

ContentCN: 我神從來不曾吝惜。
ContentEN: And joy exalts my head.

ContentCN: 祢的甘甜、奇妙的愛﹐
ContentEN: The bounties of Thy love

ContentCN: 測量我的一生年代﹔
ContentEN: Shall crown my future days;

ContentCN: 祢愛既然永不改變﹐
ContentEN: Nor from Thy house will I remove

ContentCN: 我的讚美還要加添。
ContentEN: Nor cease to speak Thy praise.

ContentCN: 耶穌是我牧者，將我淚拭去；
ContentEN: Jesus is our Shepherd, wiping ev'ry tear;

ContentCN: 抱我在祂懷裏，我復有何懼？
ContentEN: Folded in His bosom, what have we to fear?

ContentCN: 我惟跟隨我主，聽從祂旨意，
ContentEN: Only let us follow, whither He doth lead,

ContentCN: 或至安歇水旁，或至沙漠地。
ContentEN: To the thirsty desert, or the dewy mead.

ContentCN: 耶穌是我牧者，我識祂聲音！
ContentEN: Jesus is our Shepherd, well we know his voice,

ContentCN: 一聽祂的召呼，喜樂滿我心！
ContentEN: How its gentlest whisper makes our heart rejoice;

ContentCN: 雖然有時責備，祂聲仍柔細；
ContentEN: Even when He chideth, tender is His tone:

ContentCN: 只有祂能領我，我原是祂的。
ContentEN: None but He shall guide us; we are His alone.

ContentCN: 耶穌是我牧者，曾為羊捨命；
ContentEN: Jesus is our Shepherd, for the sheep He bled;

ContentCN: 群羊都灑上血，污穢得潔淨。
ContentEN: Ev'ry lamb is sprinkled with the blood He shed;

ContentCN: 又在羊的身上，蓋上祂印記：
ContentEN: Then on each He setteth His own secret sign:

ContentCN: 凡有祂的靈者，都是屬祂的。
ContentEN: They that have my Spirit, these, saith He, are Mine.

ContentCN: 耶穌是我牧者，能手常護我，
ContentEN: Jesus is our Shepherd, guarded by His arm,

ContentCN: 縱遇豺狼怒嗥，無一能害我；
ContentEN: Though the wolves may raven, none can do us harm;

ContentCN: 雖過幽谷死蔭，黑暗深可怖，
ContentEN: When we tread death's valley, dark with fearful gloom,

ContentCN: 我無絲毫懼怕，完全勝墳墓。
ContentEN: We will fear no evil, victors o'er the tomb.

ContentEN: Yea, though I walk through the valley of

ContentCN: 也不怕遭害﹐因為祢
