ContentCN: 一路我蒙救主引領﹐陳腐事物何必求﹖
ContentEN: All the way my Savior leads me. What have I to ask beside?

ContentCN: 難道我還疑祂愛情﹐畢生既由祂拯救﹖
ContentEN: Can I doubt His tender mercy, who thro' life has been my guide?

ContentCN: 神聖安慰、屬天生活﹐憑信我可從祂得﹐
ContentEN: Heav'nly peace, divinest comfort, here by faith in Him to dwell;

ContentCN: 我深知道凡事臨我﹐祂有美意不必測。
ContentEN: For I know whate'er befall me, Jesus doeth all things well;

ContentCN: 我深知道凡事臨我﹐祂有美意不必測。
ContentEN: For I know whate'er befall me, Jesus doeth all things well.

ContentCN: 一路我蒙救主引領﹐鼓勵我走每步路﹔
ContentEN: All the way my Savior leads me, cheers each winding path I tread,

ContentCN: 供我靈糧﹐長我生命﹐幫助我歷每次苦。
ContentEN: Gives me grace for every trial, feeds me with the living bread;

ContentCN: 旅程雖然力不能支﹐心靈雖然渴難當﹐
ContentEN: Though my weary steps may falter and my soul athirst may be,

ContentCN: 看哪﹐面前就是磐石﹐喜樂活泉可來嚐。
ContentEN: Gushing from the Rock before me, lo, a spring of joy I see;

ContentCN: 看哪﹐面前就是磐石﹐喜樂活泉可來嚐。
ContentEN: Gushing from the Rock before me, lo, a spring of joy I see!

ContentCN: 一路我蒙救主引領﹐哦﹐主大愛何豐滿﹔
ContentEN: All the way my Savior leads me. Oh, the fullness of His love!

ContentCN: 不久我到父的家庭﹐得享應許的平安。
ContentEN: Perfect rest to me is promised in my Father's house above.

ContentCN: 我靈披上榮耀身軀﹐飛入天上光明處﹔
ContentEN: When my spirit clothed immortal wings its flight to realms of day,

ContentCN: 我要永遠唱此佳句﹕"蒙祂引領我一路。"
ContentEN: This my song through endless ages: Jesus led me all the way!

ContentCN: 我要永遠唱此佳句﹕"蒙祂引領我一路。"
ContentEN: This my song through endless ages: Jesus led me all the way!

ContentCN: 指示祢路，我主，指示祢路！
ContentEN: Teach me Thy way, O Lord, teach me Thy way.

ContentCN: 用祢恩力賜助，使知祢路！
ContentEN: Thy gracious aid afford, teach me Thy way.

ContentCN: 使我行走正直，憑信不憑眼見，
ContentEN: Help me to walk aright; more by faith, less by sight;

ContentCN: 用祢天光引我，使知祢路！
ContentEN: Lead me with heav'nly light, teach me Thy way.

ContentCN: 正當疑慮四湧，指示祢路！
ContentEN: When doubts and fears arise, teach me Thy way;

ContentCN: 正當風雨蔽空，指示祢路！
ContentEN: When storms o'erspread the skies, teach me Thy way;

ContentCN: 陽光破雲而來，穿透痛苦憂患，
ContentEN: Shine thro' the cloud and rain, thro' sorrow, toil, and pain,

ContentCN: 使我前途平坦，指示祢路！
ContentEN: Make Thou my pathway plain, teach me Thy way.

ContentCN: 盡我一生年日，指示祢路！
ContentEN: Long as my life shall last, teach me Thy way;

ContentCN: 無論處何境遇，使知祢路！
ContentEN: Where'er my lot be cast, teach me Thy way;

ContentCN: 直到行至終點，勝過一切苦煉，
ContentEN: Until the race is run, until the journey's done,

ContentCN: 贏得榮耀冠冕，使知祢路！
ContentEN: Until the crown is won, teach me thy way.

ContentCN: 求握我手引領我，祢親選我足跡；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 父阿，求使我能說："完全服祢旨意。"
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 若是意外起狂風，祢眼明察底細；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 慈愛膀臂環繞中，疲魂思慕安息。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 求握我手引領我，我只永遠屬祢；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 賜祢聖靈加倍多，充滿柔軟能力。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 好使苦煉的時候，仍能靠祢站立；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 無論行止或忍受，完全取決於祢。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 求握我手引領我，前面路途茫茫；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 照祢榮形雕製我，助我不斷生長。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 依然在祢隱密處，將我遮藏隱蔽；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 父阿，保守我對祢不斷親近親密。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 領我﹐大哉﹐主耶和華﹗經過荒涼曠野地﹔
ContentEN: Guide me, O Thou great Jehovah, pilgrim thro' this barren land.

ContentCN: 我是軟弱﹐祢是大能﹐全能膀臂常扶持。
ContentEN: I am weak, but Thou art mighty, hold me with Thy pow'rful hand.

ContentCN: 天上靈糧﹐天上靈糧﹐
ContentEN: Bread of heaven, Bread of heaven,

ContentCN: 餵我直至再無需﹗餵我直至再無需﹗
ContentEN: Feed me till I want no more, feed me till I want no more.

ContentCN: 生命靈磐今為我開﹐醫治活水常湧流﹔
ContentEN: Open now the crystal fountain, whence the healing stream doth flow;

ContentCN: 雲柱火柱正在前行﹐領我直至路盡頭﹗
ContentEN: Let the fire and cloudy pillar lead me all my journey through;

ContentCN: 全能救主﹐全能救主﹐
ContentEN: Strong Deliv'rer, strong Deliv'rer,

ContentCN: 作我盾牌和保護﹗作我盾牌和保護﹗
ContentEN: Be Thou still my strength and shield, be Thou still my strength and shield.

ContentCN: 當我行至約但河邊﹐憂慮恐懼無蹤影﹔
ContentEN: When I tread the verge of Jordan, bid my anxious fears subside,

ContentCN: 地獄死權全都摧毀﹐使我安抵迦南境。
ContentEN: Bear me thro' the swelling current, land me safe on Canaan's side.

ContentCN: 無窮讚美﹐無窮讚美﹐
ContentEN: Songs of praises, songs of praises

ContentCN: 我必永遠向祢獻﹗我必永遠向祢獻﹗
ContentEN: I will ever give to Thee, I will ever give to Thee.

ContentCN: 引我，柔愛的光，陰影四圍，求祢引我；
ContentEN: Lead, kindly light, amid th'encircling gloom, lead Thou me on;

ContentCN: 黑夜又黑，我又家鄉遠違，求祢引我；
ContentEN: The night is dark, and I am far from home, lead Thou me on;

ContentCN: 保守我腳，我不求見遠景，
ContentEN: Keep Thou my feet; I do not ask to see

ContentCN: 一步，已可使我知足心定。
ContentEN: The distant scene-one step enough for me.

ContentCN: 我從不是如此，也不求尋祢來引我，
ContentEN: I was not ever thus, nor prayed that Thou shouldst lead me on;

ContentCN: 我喜揀選、看見我路，現今求祢引我；
ContentEN: I loved to choose and see my path; but now lead Thou me on.

ContentCN: 我愛炫耀之時，雖然受創，
ContentEN: I loved the garish day, and, spite of fears,

ContentCN: 驕傲仍制我心-忘記已往！
ContentEN: Pride ruled my will, remember not past years.

ContentCN: 祢的能力既然賜福，祢必仍然引我，
ContentEN: So long Thy pow'r hath blest me, sure it still will lead me on.

ContentCN: 過野，過澤，過崖，過沼，以及夜影全過；
ContentEN: O'er moor and fen, o'er crag and torrent, till the night is gone,

ContentCN: 晨光帶來，那些臉如天使，
ContentEN: And with the morn those angel faces smile,

ContentCN: 我所心愛多年，契闊一時。
ContentEN: Which I have loved long since, and lost awhile!

ContentCN: 慈愛天父，求引領我，人生怒海安然渡；
ContentEN: Lead us, Heav'nly Father, lead us o'er the world's tempestuous sea;

ContentCN: 領我，助我，餵我，護我，祢外，無處得幫助；
ContentEN: Guide us, guard us, keep us, feed us, for we have no help but Thee;

ContentCN: 每一祝福無不我獲，因有我神為我父。
ContentEN: Yet possessing ev'ry blessing, if our God our Father be.

ContentCN: 神用奧祕行動前來，成功祂的奇蹟；
ContentEN: God moves in a mysterious way His wonders to perform;

ContentCN: 祂將腳蹤印在滄海，車騎駕於暴風。
ContentEN: He plants His footsteps in the sea, and rides upon the storm.

ContentCN: 深不可測，祂的蘊藏，巧妙永不失敗；
ContentEN: Deep in unfathomable mines of never-failing skill,

ContentCN: 隱藏祂的智慧設計，行祂獨立旨意。
ContentEN: He treasures up His bright designs, and works His sovereign will.

ContentCN: 畏怯聖徒從此放心！你們所怕厚雲，
ContentEN: Ye fearful saints, fresh courage take; the clouds ye so much dread

ContentCN: 現在滿載神的憐憫，即降福雨無窮！
ContentEN: Are big with mercy, and shall break in blessings on your head.

ContentCN: 莫憑感覺議論主愛，惟要信祂恩典；
ContentEN: Judge not the Lord by feeble sense, but trust Him for His grace;

ContentCN: 祂的笑臉常是藏在嚴厲天命後面。
ContentEN: Behind a frowning providence He hides a smiling face.

ContentCN: 祂的計劃逐漸成熟，正沿時日推展；
ContentEN: His purposes will ripen fast, unfolding every hour;

ContentCN: 苞雖難免生澀帶苦，花卻必定芳甘。
ContentEN: The bud may have a bitter taste, but sweet will be the flower.

ContentCN: 盲目不信必致錯誤，觀察必定昏迷；
ContentEN: Blind unbelief is sure to err, and scan His work in vain;

ContentCN: 惟神是祂自己證明，祂必證明一切。
ContentEN: God is His own Interpreter, and He will make it plain.

ContentCN: 求主耶穌操我舵，人生風波安渡過：
ContentEN: Jesus, Savior, pilot me, over life's tempestuous sea;

ContentCN: 前面是未識水道，浮沙外加上暗礁；
ContentEN: Chart and compass come from Thee, Jesus, Savior, pilot me!

ContentCN: 南針海圖主掌握，求主耶穌操我舵。
ContentEN: Unknown waves before me roll, hiding rock and treach'rous shoal;

ContentCN: 慈母能平靜幼嬰，祢能令狂海無聲；
ContentEN: As a mother still her child, Thou canst hush the ocean wild;

ContentCN: 當祢說，"應當安靜，"風和浪立服命令；
ContentEN: Boist'rous waves obey Thy will When Thou say'st to them, "Be still!"

ContentCN: 祢真是奇妙的王，求主耶穌導我行。
ContentEN: Wondrous Sov'reign of the sea, Jesus, Savior, pilot me!

ContentCN: 到至終我近彼岸，海中巨浪猶搖撼；
ContentEN: When at last I near the shore, and the fearful breakers roar

ContentCN: 在我抵彼岸之前，當我正倚祢身邊，
ContentEN: Twixt me and the peaceful rest, then, while leaning on Thy breast,

ContentCN: 讓我聽祢微聲說："不要怕，是我操舵！"
ContentEN: May I hear Thee say to me, "Fear not – I will pilot thee!"

ContentCN: 祂帶領我，祂帶領我，祂是親手在帶領我；
ContentEN: He leadeth me! He leadeth me! By His own hand He leadeth me!

ContentCN: 無論如何，我都隨著，因祂親手在帶領我。
ContentEN: His faithful follow'r I would be, for by His hand He leadeth me!

ContentCN: 祂帶領我！此意何美！此言何等滿有安慰！
ContentEN: He lead-eth me! Oh, blessed thought! Oh, words with heav'nly comfort fraught!

ContentCN: 無論何在，無論何作，仍有神手來帶領我。
ContentEN: What'e'er I do, where'er I be, still 'tis God's hand that leadeth me

ContentCN: 祂帶領我，祂帶領我，祂是親手在帶領我；
ContentEN: He leadeth me! He leadeth me! By His own hand He leadeth me!

ContentCN: 無論如何，我都隨著，因祂親手在帶領我。
ContentEN: His faithful follow'r I would be, for by His hand He leadeth me!

ContentCN: 有時似墮痛苦深淵，有時似在快樂伊甸；
ContentEN: Sometimes 'mid scenes of deepest gloom, sometimes where Eden's bowers bloom,

ContentCN: 或遇靜水，或遭風波，都有神手來帶領我。
ContentEN: By waters still, o'er troubled sea, still 'tis His hand that leadeth me.

ContentCN: 祂帶領我，祂帶領我，祂是親手在帶領我；
ContentEN: He leadeth me! He leadeth me! By His own hand He leadeth me!

ContentCN: 無論如何，我都隨著，因祂親手在帶領我。
ContentEN: His faithful follow'r I would be, for by His hand He leadeth me!

ContentCN: 主阿，願祢緊握我手，永無埋怨隨祢而走；
ContentEN: Lord, I would clasp Thy hand in mine, nor ever murmur or repine;

ContentCN: 苦樂求祢為我定奪，我靠祢手來帶領我。
ContentEN: Content, whatever lot I see, since it is Thou that leadest me.

ContentCN: 祂帶領我，祂帶領我，祂是親手在帶領我；
ContentEN: He leadeth me! He leadeth me! By His own hand He leadeth me!

ContentCN: 無論如何，我都隨著，因祂親手在帶領我。
ContentEN: His faithful follow'r I would be, for by His hand He leadeth me!

ContentCN: 等我行完今生路程，靠祢憐憫能以得勝；
ContentEN: And when my task on earth is done, when, by Thy grace, the vict'ry's won,

ContentCN: 死河寒波我亦不躲，因祢至終親手領我。
ContentEN: E'en death's cold wave I will not flee, since Thou in triumph leadest me

ContentCN: 牧人有何大喜悅﹐快樂歌聲不休歇﹖
ContentEN: Shepherds, why this jubilee? Why your joyous strains prolong?

ContentCN: 牧人有何大喜悅﹐快樂歌聲不休歇﹖
ContentEN: Shepherds, why this jubilee? Why your joyous strains prolong?

ContentCN: 牧人有何大喜悅﹐快樂歌聲不休歇﹖

ContentCN: 有何喜訊感心弦﹐齊發歌聲美難言﹖
ContentEN: Say what may the tidings be, which inspire your heav'nly song?

ContentCN: 有何喜訊感心弦﹐齊發歌聲美難言﹖

ContentCN: 聖靈真實引導者，一直親近我身側；
ContentEN: Holy Spirit, faithful guide, ever near the Christian's side,

ContentCN: 祢用溫柔手引領，我作旅客過野境。
ContentEN: Gently lead us by the hand, pilgrims in a desert land;

ContentCN: 疲魂希望今頓萌，得聽聖靈慈愛聲，
ContentEN: Weary souls fore'er rejoice, while they hear that sweetest voice

ContentCN: 輕說："遊子，跟隨罷！我必領你安抵家。"
ContentEN: Whisper softly, "Wand'rer, come! Follow me, I'll guide thee home."

ContentCN: 祂是我的真實友，一路扶持到盡頭；
ContentEN: Ever present, truest friend, ever near Thine aid to lend,

ContentCN: 保守今生無疑懼，不至暗中迷崎嶇。
ContentEN: Leave us not to doubt and fear, groping on in darkness drear;

ContentCN: 有時駭浪驚濤來，盼望漸逝，心漸衰；
ContentEN: When the storms are raging sore, hearts grow faint, and hopes give o'er,

ContentCN: 忽聞"遊子，跟隨罷！我必領你安抵家。"
ContentEN: Whisper softly, "Wand'rer, come! Follow me, I'll guide thee home."

ContentCN: 勞苦日子不久畢，望早釋放享安息；
ContentEN: When our days of toil shall cease, waiting still for sweet release,

ContentCN: 惟有等候與禱告，豫備那日忽臨到。
ContentEN: Nothing left but heav'n and prayer, knowing that our names are there;

ContentCN: 死河寒波極可怖，幸靠主血安然渡；
ContentEN: Wading deep the dismal flood, pleading naught but Jesus' blood,

ContentCN: 又聞"遊子，跟隨罷！我必領你安抵家。"
ContentEN: Whisper softly, "Wand'rer, come! Follow me, I'll guide thee home."

ContentCN: 領我，領我，救主，領我免迷途；
ContentEN: Lead me, lead me, Savior, lead me, lest I stray;

ContentCN: 我的前面無把握，救主，領我完世路。
ContentEN: Gently down the stream of time, lead me, Savior, all the way.

ContentCN: 救主領我免迷途，溫柔領我完世路；
ContentEN: Savior, lead me, lest I stray, gently lead me all the way;

ContentCN: 在祢身邊我穩固，在祢愛裏我居住。
ContentEN: I am safe when by Thy side, I would in Thy love abide.

ContentCN: 領我，領我，救主，領我免迷途；
ContentEN: Lead me, lead me, Savior, lead me, lest I stray;

ContentCN: 我的前面無把握，救主，領我完世路。
ContentEN: Gently down the stream of time, lead me, Savior, all the way.

ContentCN: 祢是我魂避難所，何怕人生起風波！
ContentEN: Thou the refuge of my soul, when life's stormy billows roll,

ContentCN: 有祢親近我安全，有祢憐憫我無怨。
ContentEN: I am safe when Thou art nigh, all my hopes on Thee rely.

ContentCN: 領我，領我，救主，領我免迷途；
ContentEN: Lead me, lead me, Savior, lead me, lest I stray;

ContentCN: 我的前面無把握，救主，領我完世路。
ContentEN: Gently down the stream of time, lead me, Savior, all the way.

ContentCN: 救主領我到盡頭，人生結束的時候，
ContentEN: Savior, lead me, then at last, when the storm of life is past,

ContentCN: 我要飛去光明地，不再流淚永安息。
ContentEN: To the land of endless day, where all tears are wiped away.

ContentCN: 天上的榮光，天上的榮光，
ContentEN: Heavenly sunshine, heavenly sunshine,

ContentCN: 照耀我魂間，榮耀無比！
ContentEN: Flooding my soul with glory divine;

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！我心在歡跳，
ContentEN: Hallelujah, I am rejoicing,

ContentCN: 永唱此讚美，耶穌屬我。
ContentEN: Singing His praises, Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 在我旅途中，榮光在前引，
ContentEN: Walking in sunshine all of my journey;

ContentCN: 越過深幽谷和眾山嶺；
ContentEN: Over the mountains, thro' the deep vale;

ContentCN: 主曾應許說："我永不棄你，"
ContentEN: Jesus has said, "I'll never forsake thee,"

ContentCN: 神聖的應許，永不搖移。
ContentEN: Promise divine that never can fail.

ContentCN: 天上的榮光，天上的榮光，
ContentEN: Heavenly sunshine, heavenly sunshine,

ContentCN: 照耀我魂間，榮耀無比！
ContentEN: Flooding my soul with glory divine;

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！我心在歡跳，
ContentEN: Hallelujah, I am rejoicing,

ContentCN: 永唱此讚美，耶穌屬我。
ContentEN: Singing His praises, Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 陰影籠罩我，四面圍困我，
ContentEN: Shadows around me, shadows above me,

ContentCN: 無法遮蔽主面光引領；
ContentEN: Never conceal my Savior and Guide;

ContentCN: 祂就是真光，在祂無黑暗，
ContentEN: He is the light, in Him is no darkness;

ContentCN: 緊靠祂身邊，歡然奔路。
ContentEN: Ever I'm walking close to His side.

ContentCN: 天上的榮光，天上的榮光，
ContentEN: Heavenly sunshine, heavenly sunshine,

ContentCN: 照耀我魂間，榮耀無比！
ContentEN: Flooding my soul with glory divine;

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！我心在歡跳，
ContentEN: Hallelujah, I am rejoicing,

ContentCN: 永唱此讚美，耶穌屬我。
ContentEN: Singing His praises, Jesus is mine.

ContentCN: 榮耀明光中，歡樂真無窮，
ContentEN: In the bright sunshine, ever rejoicing,

ContentCN: 上行再上行，更近我家；
ContentEN: Pressing my way to mansions above;

ContentCN: 當我邊行走，邊讚美不停，
ContentEN: Singing His praises gladly I'm walking,

ContentCN: 祂愛的榮光，正在前引。
ContentEN: Walking in sunshine, sunshine of love.

ContentCN: 緊握我手引領我，揀選我路；
ContentEN: Take Thou my hand, and lead me – choose Thou my way!

ContentCN: 不是照我的意思，是我所祈。
ContentEN: Not as I will, O Father, teach me to say.

ContentCN: 縱使風浪即來臨，祢全清楚；
ContentEN: What tho' the storms may gather, Thou knowest best;

ContentCN: 因祢保守和護庇，我得安息。
ContentEN: Safe in Thy holy keeping, there would I rest.

ContentCN: 溫柔引領我，父阿，引領我回家，
ContentEN: Lead me gently home, Father, lead me gently home, Father,

ContentCN: 父阿，惟恐我在中途失迷，引領我回家！
ContentEN: Lest I fall upon the wayside, lead me gently home.

ContentCN: 溫柔引領我，父阿，引領我回家！
ContentEN: Lead me gently home, Father, lead me gently home,

ContentCN: 我本多為難，父阿，我憂苦交加。
ContentEN: When life's toils are ended, and parting days have come,

ContentCN: 不使我心遠離，不使我腳滑；
ContentEN: Sin no more shall tempt me, ne'er from Thee I'll roam,

ContentCN: 惟恐我在中途失迷，引領我回家！
ContentEN: If Thou'lt only lead me, Father, lead me gently home.

ContentCN: 溫柔引領我，父阿，引領我回家，
ContentEN: Lead me gently home, Father, lead me gently home, Father,

ContentCN: 父阿，惟恐我在中途失迷，引領我回家！
ContentEN: Lest I fall upon the wayside, lead me gently home.

ContentCN: 溫柔引領我，父阿，引領我回家！
ContentEN: Lead me gently home, Father lead me gently home,

ContentCN: 惟有祢引領，否則我就會走岔。
ContentEN: In life's darkest hours, Father, when life's troubles come;

ContentCN: 一路跟隨祢行，試煉我不怕；
ContentEN: Keep my feet from wandering, lest form Thee I roam,

ContentCN: 全仗祢手提挈，父阿，引領我回家！
ContentEN: Lest I fall upon the wayside, lead me gently home.

ContentCN: 溫柔引領我，父阿，引領我回家，
ContentEN: Lead me gently home, Father, lead me gently home, Father,

ContentCN: 父阿，惟恐我在中途失迷，引領我回家！
ContentEN: Lest I fall upon the wayside, lead me gently home.

ContentCN: 溫柔引領我，父阿，引領我回家！
ContentEN: Lead me gently home, Father, lead me gently home,

ContentCN: 塵世旅程畢，遙見天上的榮華，
ContentEN: In temptation's hours, Father, when sore trials come;

ContentCN: 重擔我始卸脫，勞苦我息下；
ContentEN: Be Thou near to keep me, take me as Thine own,

ContentCN: 引領我到終點，父阿，引領我回家！
ContentEN: For I cannot live without Thee, lead me gently home.

ContentCN: 我要引導，我要引導，我用眼睛引導你；	I will guide thee, I will guide thee, I will guide thee with Mine eye;
從地去天疲倦客旅，我用眼晴引導你。"
ContentEN: On the way from earth to heaven, I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 從地去天疲倦客旅，半途停頓思安息；
ContentEN: Precious promise God hath given to the weary passerby;

ContentCN: 神曾賜下寶貴應許："我用眼睛引導你。"
ContentEN: On the way from earth to heaven, "I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 我要引導，我要引導，我用眼睛引導你；	I will guide thee, I will guide thee, I will guide thee with Mine eye;
從地去天疲倦客旅，我用眼晴引導你。"
ContentEN: On the way from earth to heaven, I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 雖然心中常是紛亂，情緒擾人欲昏迷；
ContentEN: When thy pressure becomes greater, and thy troubles multiply,

ContentCN: 但有應許排解萬難："我用眼睛引導你。"
ContentEN: Let this promise be thy answer: "I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 我要引導，我要引導，我用眼睛引導你；	I will guide thee, I will guide thee, I will guide thee with Mine eye;
從地去天疲倦客旅，我用眼晴引導你。"
ContentEN: On the way from earth to heaven, I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 雖然試探幾乎得勝，可靠親友也遠離；
ContentEN: When temptations almost win thee, and thy trusted watchers fly,

ContentCN: 但這應許發出微聲："我用眼睛引導你。"
ContentEN: Let this promise ring within thee: "I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 我要引導，我要引導，我用眼睛引導你；	I will guide thee, I will guide thee, I will guide thee with Mine eye;
從地去天疲倦客旅，我用眼晴引導你。"
ContentEN: On the way from earth to heaven, I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 你的暗中盼望消逝，埋在年日墳墓裏；
ContentEN: When thy secret hopes have perish'd in the grave of years gone by,

ContentCN: 讓這應許將你支持："我用眼睛引導你。"
ContentEN: Let this promise still be cherish'd: "I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 我要引導，我要引導，我用眼睛引導你；	I will guide thee, I will guide thee, I will guide thee with Mine eye;
從地去天疲倦客旅，我用眼晴引導你。"
ContentEN: On the way from earth to heaven, I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 生命陰影逐漸加深，要穿榮耀的身體；
ContentEN: When the shades of life are falling, and the hour has come to die;

ContentCN: 神這應許顯為更真："我用眼睛引導你。"
ContentEN: Hear thy trusted Leader calling, "I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 我要引導，我要引導，我用眼睛引導你；	I will guide thee, I will guide thee, I will guide thee with Mine eye;
從地去天疲倦客旅，我用眼晴引導你。"
ContentEN: On the way from earth to heaven, I will guide thee with Mine eye."

ContentCN: 但願我靈以神為樂，我心以祂為至寶；
ContentEN: So rejoice in Christ thy treasure, all thy needs He will supply;

ContentCN: 與祂交通一無間隔，常得眼睛的引導。
ContentEN: Live each day to seek His pleasure, let Him guide thee with His eye.

ContentCN: 是的，救主一直對我說，一直，一直，一直的說：
ContentEN: Yes, over and over and over, my Savior keeps saying to me;

ContentCN: 我的恩典是夠你使用，我的能力顯於輭弱。
ContentEN: My strength is made perfect in weakness. My grace is sufficient for thee.

ContentCN: 我要歌唱那奇妙應許，就是耶穌親口所說：
ContentEN: I'll sing of the wonderful promise, that Jesus has given to me;

ContentCN: 我的恩典是夠你使用，我的能力顯於輭弱。
ContentEN: My strength is made perfect in weakness, my grace is sufficient for thee.

ContentCN: 惟恐我這惡心會忘記，忘記這應許的光榮，
ContentEN: And lest my poor heart should forget it, or ever forgetful should be,

ContentCN: 所以祂一直一直的說："我的恩典夠你使用。"
ContentEN: He still keeps repeating the promise, "My grace is sufficient for thee."

ContentCN: 是的，救主一直對我說，一直，一直，一直的說：
ContentEN: Yes, over and over and over, my Savior keeps saying to me;

ContentCN: 我的恩典是夠你使用，我的能力顯於輭弱。
ContentEN: My strength is made perfect in weakness. My grace is sufficient for thee.

ContentCN: 祂的恩典夠使我得救，脫離罪惡得著新心；
ContentEN: His grace is sufficient to save me, and cleanse me from guilt and from sin;

ContentCN: 夠使我靈、魂、體都聖潔，並且滿有主的聖靈。
ContentEN: Sufficient to sanctify wholly, and give me His Spirit within.

ContentCN: 祂的恩典夠助我經過各種試煉，無論多兇；
ContentEN: His grace is sufficient for trials, no matter how hard they may be,

ContentCN: 祂的應許抵擋了它們，"我的恩典夠你使用。"
ContentEN: This promise stands over against them: "My grace is sufficient for thee,"

ContentCN: 是的，救主一直對我說，一直，一直，一直的說：
ContentEN: Yes, over and over and over, my Savior keeps saying to me;

ContentCN: 我的恩典是夠你使用，我的能力顯於輭弱。
ContentEN: My strength is made perfect in weakness. My grace is sufficient for thee.

ContentCN: 祂的恩典夠為我疾病：一面扶持，一面施醫；
ContentEN: His grace is sufficient for sickness, sustaining and making me whole;

ContentCN: 祂的恩典夠助我經過一切苦楚，一切攻擊。
ContentEN: His grace is sufficient when sorrows like billows roll over the soul.

ContentCN: 祂的恩典是夠我工作，使我能夠幫助弟兄；
ContentEN: His grace is sufficient for service, it sets us from selfishness free,

ContentCN: 並使他們與我同知道，祂的恩典足夠使用。
ContentEN: And sends us to tell to the tried ones, His grace is sufficient for thee.

ContentCN: 是的，救主一直對我說，一直，一直，一直的說：
ContentEN: Yes, over and over and over, my Savior keeps saying to me;

ContentCN: 我的恩典是夠你使用，我的能力顯於輭弱。
ContentEN: My strength is made perfect in weakness. My grace is sufficient for thee.

ContentCN: 祂的恩典是夠我生活，我若要離此世生涯；
ContentEN: His grace is sufficient to live by, and should we be summoned to die,

ContentCN: 它要發光照亮死蔭谷，逐步帶領我回到家。
ContentEN: 'Twill light up the valley of shadows, and bear us away to Him nigh.

ContentCN: 在那邊當我看見救主-祂的美麗，祂的光榮，
ContentEN: Or when we shall stand in His vict'ry, and Christ in His glory shall see,

ContentCN: 我就要俯伏並承認說："祢的恩典夠我使用。"
ContentEN: We'll fall at His footstool confessing: "Thy grace was sufficient for me."

ContentCN: 是的，救主一直對我說，一直，一直，一直的說：
ContentEN: Yes, over and over and over, my Savior keeps saying to me;

ContentCN: 我的恩典是夠你使用，我的能力顯於輭弱。
ContentEN: My strength is made perfect in weakness. My grace is sufficient for thee.

ContentCN: 我們的恩典並不夠用，夠用，惟有祂的恩典；
ContentEN: It is not our grace that's sufficient, but His grace, it ever must be;

ContentCN: 我們的，常是曇花一現，但是祂的，永不改變。
ContentEN: Our graces are transient and changing, His grace is unfailing as He.

ContentCN: 因此我就不斷的背誦祂曾對我親口所說：
ContentEN: And so I am ever repeating His wonderful promise to me:

ContentCN: 我的恩典是夠你使用，我的能力顯在輭弱。
ContentEN: My strength is made perfect in weakness, my grace is sufficient for thee.

ContentCN: 無論誰願意信靠主，可來！無論誰願意信靠主，可來！
ContentEN: Whosoever will to the Lord may come, whosoever will to the Lord may come,

ContentCN: 無論誰願意信靠主，可來！沒有一個撇開！
ContentEN: Whosoever will to the Lord may come, He'll not turn one away.

ContentCN: 耶穌，耶穌，醫治破碎心懷，耶穌，耶穌，醫治破碎心懷，
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus heals the broken hearted, Jesus, Jesus heals the broken hearted,

ContentCN: 耶穌，耶穌，醫治破碎心懷，將捆鎖解開。
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus heals the broken hearted, He will set you free.

ContentCN: 盼望之主，祢的聲音何甜！
ContentEN: Lord of all hope, O how sweet is Thy voice,

ContentCN: 在祢面前，我心因此暢歡！
ContentEN: Making my heart in Thy presence rejoice.

ContentCN: 新鮮如同清晨甘露，帶來暢爽的甘美；
ContentEN: Fresh as the dew of the morning, bringing a sweet rest unheard,

ContentCN: 基督藉祂溫情恩膏，柔聲細語的安慰：
ContentEN: Christ, in the gentle anointing, whispers His comforting word:

ContentCN: 站住，直到試煉過去，站住，直到風波平；
ContentEN: Stand till the trial is over, stand till the tempest is gone,

ContentCN: 站住，為著神的榮耀，站住，與主同得勝。
ContentEN: Stand for the glory of Jesus, stand till the kingdom is won.

ContentCN: 盼望之主，祢的聲音何甜！
ContentEN: Lord of all hope, O how sweet is Thy voice,

ContentCN: 在祢面前，我心因此暢歡！
ContentEN: Making my heart in Thy presence rejoice.

ContentCN: 如果在我苦煉之中，我靈，我心皆衰弱，
ContentEN: If in the test of my trouble, faint be my spirit and heart,

ContentCN: 信心和那盼望之星，也都退落不閃爍；
ContentEN: Faith, with the star of hope glimm'ring, shall all be taken apart;

ContentCN: 願祢信心和祢能力，盡其全力抓住我，
ContentEN: May then Thy faith with Thy life-pow'r over me hold its full sway,

ContentCN: 使祢所有榮耀豐富，我可無間的嘗著。
ContentEN: That all Thy riches of glory now I may share and for aye.

ContentCN: 盼望之主，祢的聲音何甜！
ContentEN: Lord of all hope, O how sweet is Thy voice,

ContentCN: 在祢面前，我心因此暢歡！
ContentEN: Making my heart in Thy presence rejoice.

ContentCN: 主，像清晨放明日光，驅盡所有的黑暗；
ContentEN: Lord, as the morning sun dawning, chase all my darkness away,

ContentCN: 並且用祢醫治光線，使我黑暗變中天。
ContentEN: And with Thy kind wings of healing turn all my night into day;

ContentCN: 安慰之主，求祢就來，來到憂苦、疲倦心；
ContentEN: Come Thou, O come, Lord of Comfort, come to my sad, weary heart,

ContentCN: 祢這有福、榮耀盼望，哦，來與我永親近。
ContentEN: Come, O Thou blest hope of glory, never, O never depart.

ContentCN: 我常居住天愛中，不怕改變一點；
ContentEN: In heav'nly love abiding, no change my heart shall fear;

ContentCN: 如此把握不落空，在此沒有改變。
ContentEN: And safe is such confiding, for nothing changes here.

ContentCN: 也許狂風四面起，也許無多希望；
ContentEN: The storm may roar without me; my heart may low be laid;

ContentCN: 但神四面來護庇，我怎能夠徬徨？
ContentEN: But God is round about me; and can I be dismayed?

ContentCN: 窮困難迫我回頭，任主領我何方；
ContentEN: Wherever He may guide me, no want shall turn me back;

ContentCN: 我不至有何不夠，我的牧人在旁。
ContentEN: My Shepherd is beside me, and nothing can I lack:

ContentCN: 祂的慧心常清醒，祂的明眼不眛；
ContentEN: His wisdom ever waketh, His sight is never dim;

ContentCN: 祂知祂行的路徑，我要始終跟隨。
ContentEN: He knows the way He taketh, and I will walk with Him.

ContentCN: 青草地場尚在前，是我從所未見；
ContentEN: Green pastures are before me, which yet I have not seen;

ContentCN: 再過就是晴朗天，今雖稠雲綿綿。
ContentEN: Bright skies will soon be o'er me, where the dark clouds have been.

ContentCN: 我的希望真久長，我的途徑光明；
ContentEN: My hope I cannot measure, my path of life is free;

ContentCN: 救主掌握我寶藏，祂要和我同行。
ContentEN: My Savior has my treasure, and He will walk with me.

ContentCN: 或許明朝天未曉，我靈不及等待，
ContentEN: In heav'nly love abiding, no change my heart shall fear;

ContentCN: 就脫肉體全不要，主，就與祢同在。
ContentEN: And safe is such confiding, for nothing changes here.

ContentCN: 安息！睡眠！何寶貴，有祢保護照顧；
ContentEN: The storm may roar without me; my heart may low be laid;

ContentCN: 或許祢忽榮耀歸，召我座前相晤！
ContentEN: But God is round about me; and can I be dismayed?

ContentCN: 那時看見祢自己，被眾選民擁擠；
ContentEN: Wherever He may guide me, no want shall turn me back;

ContentCN: 又是榮耀，又美麗，又是歌唱無已。
ContentEN: My Shepherd is beside me, and nothing can I lack:

ContentCN: 奇妙應許的日期，我們能夠同祢
ContentEN: His wisdom ever waketh, His sight is never dim;

ContentCN: 永遠享受神安息，永遠喜樂滿意。
ContentEN: He knows the way He taketh, and I will walk with Him.

ContentCN: 安穩在耶穌手臂，安穩在主懷裏；
ContentEN: Safe in the arms of Jesus, safe on His gentle breast,

ContentCN: 在此祂愛常覆翼，我得甜美安息。
ContentEN: There by His love o'er shaded, sweetly my soul doth rest.

ContentCN: 這是天來的音樂，經由詩歌傾吐；
ContentEN: Hark! 'tis a song of heaven borne in a song to me,

ContentCN: 飄過榮耀的天野，飄過碧玉之土。
ContentEN: Over the fields of glory, over the jasper sea.

ContentCN: 安穩在耶穌手臂，安穩在主懷裏；
ContentEN: Safe in the arms of Jesus, safe on His gentle breast,

ContentCN: 在此祂愛常覆翼，我得甜美安息。
ContentEN: There by His love o'er shaded, sweetly my soul doth rest.

ContentCN: 安穩在耶穌手臂，安穩脫離掛礙；
ContentEN: Safe in the arms of Jesus, safe from corroding care,

ContentCN: 脫離試探與攻擊，在此罪不為害。
ContentEN: Safe from the world's temptations, sin cannot harm me there

ContentCN: 脫離痛苦的熬煎，脫離疑惑、驚畏；
ContentEN: Free from the blight of sorrow, free from my doubts and fears;

ContentCN: 只有幾個小試煉，只有幾滴眼淚。
ContentEN: Only a few more trials, only a few more tears.

ContentCN: 安穩在耶穌手臂，安穩在主懷裏；
ContentEN: Safe in the arms of Jesus, safe on His gentle breast,

ContentCN: 在此祂愛常覆翼，我得甜美安息。
ContentEN: There by His love o'er shaded, sweetly my soul doth rest.

ContentCN: 耶穌是我避難所，耶穌為我受死；
ContentEN: Jesus, my heart's dear Refuge, Jesus has died for me;

ContentCN: 我的信心要信託神的萬世磐石。
ContentEN: Firm on the Rock of Ages ever my trust shall be.

ContentCN: 在此讓我忍耐等，等到忍耐已過；
ContentEN: Here let me wait with patience, wait till the night is o'er,

ContentCN: 等到羔羊從新城成全我所信託。
ContentEN: Wait till I see the morning break on the golden shore.

ContentCN: 耶穌深知我掙扎苦楚，
ContentEN: Jesus knows all about our struggles,

ContentCN: 祂要引導直到永久；
ContentEN: He will guide till the day is done;

ContentCN: 無一朋友能像謙卑耶穌，絕沒有！絕沒有！
ContentEN: There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus, no, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 無一朋友能像謙卑耶穌，絕沒有！絕沒有！
ContentEN: There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus, no, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 無人能醫我的靈魂痛苦，絕沒有！絕沒有！
ContentEN: None else could heal all our soul's diseases, no, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 耶穌深知我掙扎苦楚，
ContentEN: Jesus knows all about our struggles,

ContentCN: 祂要引導直到永久；
ContentEN: He will guide till the day is done;

ContentCN: 無一朋友能像謙卑耶穌，絕沒有！絕沒有！
ContentEN: There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus, no, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 無一朋友像祂這聖這高，絕沒有，絕沒有！
ContentEN: No friend like Him is so high and holy, no, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 無一朋友像祂這柔這好，絕沒有，絕沒有！
ContentEN: And yet no friend is so meek and lowly, no, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 耶穌深知我掙扎苦楚，
ContentEN: Jesus knows all about our struggles,

ContentCN: 祂要引導直到永久；
ContentEN: He will guide till the day is done;

ContentCN: 無一朋友能像謙卑耶穌，絕沒有！絕沒有！
ContentEN: There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus, no, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 無一時間祂不與我同處，絕沒有，絕沒有！
ContentEN: There's not an hour that He is not near us, No, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 無一時間祂不用愛眷顧，絕沒有，絕沒有！
ContentEN: No night so dark but His love can cheer us, no, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 耶穌深知我掙扎苦楚，
ContentEN: Jesus knows all about our struggles,

ContentCN: 祂要引導直到永久；
ContentEN: He will guide till the day is done;

ContentCN: 無一朋友能像謙卑耶穌，絕沒有！絕沒有！
ContentEN: There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus, no, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 有無聖徒被這朋友所欺？絕沒有，絕沒有！
ContentEN: Did ever saint find this Friend forsake him? No, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 有無朋友被這救主所棄？絕沒有，絕沒有！
ContentEN: Or sinner find that He would not take him? No, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 耶穌深知我掙扎苦楚，
ContentEN: Jesus knows all about our struggles,

ContentCN: 祂要引導直到永久；
ContentEN: He will guide till the day is done;

ContentCN: 無一朋友能像謙卑耶穌，絕沒有！絕沒有！
ContentEN: There's not a friend like the lowly Jesus, no, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 有無恩賜比這救主更奇？絕沒有，絕沒有！
ContentEN: Was e'er a gift like the Savior given? No, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 有無信徒祂不能救到底？絕沒有，絕沒有！
ContentEN: Will He refuse us a home in heaven? No, not one! No, not one!

ContentCN: 是否疲倦？是否憂悒？是否受攻擊？
ContentEN: Art thou weary, heavy laden, art thou sore distrest?

ContentCN: 主柔聲說："你來這裏得安息。"
ContentEN: Come to Me, saith One, "and, coming, be at rest."

ContentCN: 我若隨祂，有何標記-祂是領路人？
ContentEN: Hath He marks to lead me to Him, if He be my Guide?

ContentCN: 只看祂肋，祂手，祂足，滿傷痕。
ContentEN: In His feet and hands are wound-prints, and his side.

ContentCN: 是否祂有榮耀冠冕，加額像君王？
ContentEN: Is there diadem, as Monarch, that His brow adorns?

ContentCN: 誠然祂有！卻是棘編，痛難當！
ContentEN: Yes, a crown, in very surety, but of thorns.

ContentCN: 我若尋找，我若跟隨，祂如何報酬？
ContentEN: If I find Him, if I follow, what His guerdon here?

ContentCN: 許多勞碌，許多眼淚，許多愁！
ContentEN: Many a sorrow, many a labor, many a tear!

ContentCN: 我若始終緊隨我主，將有何結果？
ContentEN: If I still hold closely to Him, what hath He at last?

ContentCN: 勝過勞碌，克服愁苦，約但過！
ContentEN: Sorrow vanquished labor ended, Jordan passed.

ContentCN: 我若求主將我收留，祂會否推辭？
ContentEN: If I ask Him to receive me, will He say me nay?

ContentCN: 天地雖廢，祂言不改，無已時。
ContentEN: Not till earth and not till heaven pass away.

ContentCN: 追求，跟隨，持守，事奉，是否有賞賜？
ContentEN: Finding, following, keeping, struggling, is He sure to bless?

ContentCN: 使徒，烈士，先知，眾聖，都答："是。"
ContentEN: Saints, apostles, prophets, martyrs, answer, "Yes."

ContentCN: 堅定倚靠救主，必全然蒙福，
ContentEN: Stayed upon Jehovah, hearts are fully blest;

ContentCN: 得祂應許護庇，完全的安息。
ContentEN: Finding, as He promised, perfect peace and rest.

ContentCN: 神完全的平安，像長江大河；
ContentEN: Like a river glorious is God's perfect peace,

ContentCN: 不斷向前淹漫，全勝不退落。
ContentEN: Over all victorious in its bright increase;

ContentCN: 完全，卻是天天越流越深浡；
ContentEN: Perfect, yet it floweth fuller every day,

ContentCN: 完全，卻是面面越流越廣闊。
ContentEN: Perfect yet it growth deeper all the way.

ContentCN: 堅定倚靠救主，必全然蒙福，
ContentEN: Stayed upon Jehovah, hearts are fully blest;

ContentCN: 得祂應許護庇，完全的安息。
ContentEN: Finding, as He promised, perfect peace and rest.

ContentCN: 藏在祂恩手中-何等的護庇！
ContentEN: Hidden in the hollow of His blessed hand,

ContentCN: 仇敵無法追蹤，對頭難站立。
ContentEN: Never foe can follow, never traitor stand;

ContentCN: 無擔憂的波濤，無掛慮黑影；
ContentEN: Not a surge of worry, not a shade of care,

ContentCN: 無慌張的風暴能攪擾我靈。
ContentEN: Not a blast of hurry touch the spirit there.

ContentCN: 堅定倚靠救主，必全然蒙福，
ContentEN: Stayed upon Jehovah, hearts are fully blest;

ContentCN: 得祂應許護庇，完全的安息。
ContentEN: Finding, as He promised, perfect peace and rest.

ContentCN: 每喜樂或憂傷，皆從天下降；
ContentEN: Every joy or trial falleth from above,

ContentCN: 隨著愛的太陽，畫我晷儀上。
ContentEN: Traced upon our dial by the Sun of Love;

ContentCN: 我的所有辦法，就是全心信；
ContentEN: We may trust Him fully all for us to do;

ContentCN: 誰是全心靠祂，必識祂全真。
ContentEN: They who trust Him wholly find Him wholly true.

ContentCN: 哦﹐我魂﹐可無恐﹗哦﹐我魂﹐可安息﹐可無恐﹗
ContentEN: It is well with my soul! It is well, it is well with my soul!

ContentCN: 平安如水流﹐正一路跟隨我﹐
ContentEN: When peace like a river attendeth my way,

ContentCN: 憂慮如怒濤勢橫湧﹔
ContentEN: When sorrows like sea billows roll;

ContentCN: 任何的遭遇﹐祢已教我能說﹕
ContentEN: Whatever my lot Thou hast taught me to say,

ContentCN: 我的魂﹐當安息﹐無所恐﹗
ContentEN: It is well, it is well with my soul!

ContentCN: 哦﹐我魂﹐可無恐﹗哦﹐我魂﹐可安息﹐可無恐﹗
ContentEN: It is well with my soul! It is well, it is well with my soul!

ContentCN: 撒但雖肆虐﹐試煉雖如烈火﹐
ContentEN: Though Satan should buffet, though trials should come,

ContentCN: 我心﹐你應當有把握﹔
ContentEN: Let this blest assurance control:

ContentCN: 因主明瞭我是何等的軟弱﹐
ContentEN: That Christ hath regarded my helpless estate

ContentCN: 已流出祂寶血為著我。
ContentEN: And hath shed His own blood for my soul.

ContentCN: 哦﹐我魂﹐可無恐﹗哦﹐我魂﹐可安息﹐可無恐﹗
ContentEN: It is well with my soul! It is well, it is well with my soul!

ContentCN: 我罪﹐哦﹐這是何等榮耀思想﹐
ContentEN: My sin — oh, the bliss of this glorious thought —

ContentCN: 我罪﹐非局部﹐是一切
ContentEN: My sin — not in part but the whole —

ContentCN: 釘在祂十架﹐不壓在我身上﹐
ContentEN: Is nailed to His Cross, and I bear it no more.

ContentCN: 哦﹐我魂﹐當歌頌﹐當稱謝。
ContentEN: Praise the Lord, praise the Lord, O my soul!

ContentCN: 哦﹐我魂﹐可無恐﹗哦﹐我魂﹐可安息﹐可無恐﹗
ContentEN: It is well with my soul! It is well, it is well with my soul!

ContentCN: 活著是基督﹐是主基督執政﹐
ContentEN: For me, be it Christ, be it Christ hence to live;

ContentCN: 即使約但河起波瀾,
ContentEN: Though Jordan about me shall roll,

ContentCN: 我也無痛苦﹐雖經死猶如生﹐
ContentEN: No pang shall be mine, for in death as in life,

ContentCN: 仍聽祂低聲說﹕"你平安。"
ContentEN: Thou wilt whisper Thy peace to my soul.

ContentCN: 哦﹐我魂﹐可無恐﹗哦﹐我魂﹐可安息﹐可無恐﹗
ContentEN: It is well with my soul! It is well, it is well with my soul!

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐我救主﹐我等候祢再臨﹐
ContentEN: And, Lord, haste the day when the faith shall be sight,

ContentCN: 我眼是望天﹐不望墓﹔
ContentEN: The clouds be rolled back as a scroll,

ContentCN: 哦﹐號筒吹響﹐哦﹐我主的聲音﹗
ContentEN: The trump shall resound, and the Lord shall descend.

ContentCN: 哦﹐何等的盼望﹐何等福﹗
ContentEN: Even so — it is well with my soul.

ContentCN: 任你風急浪又高，我錨已經安然拋，
ContentEN: And it holds, my anchor holds; blow your wildest, then, O gale,

ContentCN: 雖我人輕船又小，靠主恩典不動搖，
ContentEN: On my bark so small and frail, by His grace I shall not fail,

ContentCN: 我錨穩固安全又可靠。
ContentEN: For my anchor holds, my anchor holds.

ContentCN: 波浪怒濤勢洶湧，滾滾欲吞我驚魂，
ContentEN: Tho' the angry surges roll on my tempest driven soul,

ContentCN: 狂風怒號聲可怖，但我已知得安穩；
ContentEN: I am peaceful, for I know, wildly though the winds may blow,

ContentCN: 因我有一堅固錨，永永遠遠不動搖！
ContentEN: I've an anchor safe and sure, that can ever more endure.

ContentCN: 任你風急浪又高，我錨已經安然拋，
ContentEN: And it holds, my anchor holds; blow your wildest, then, O gale,

ContentCN: 雖我人輕船又小，靠主恩典不動搖，
ContentEN: On my bark so small and frail, by His grace I shall not fail,

ContentCN: 我錨穩固安全又可靠。
ContentEN: For my anchor holds, my anchor holds.

ContentCN: 雖然浪潮如山倒，隱伏危機四圍繞；
ContentEN: Mighty tides about me sweep, perils lurk within the deep,

ContentCN: 雖然滿天烏雲罩，雖然風暴雨又狂；
ContentEN: Angry clouds o'er-shade the sky, and the tempest rises high;

ContentCN: 安然站立不動搖，我錨緊拋磐石上。
ContentEN: Still I stand the tempest's shock, for my anchor grips the Rock.

ContentCN: 任你風急浪又高，我錨已經安然拋，
ContentEN: And it holds, my anchor holds; blow your wildest, then, O gale,

ContentCN: 雖我人輕船又小，靠主恩典不動搖，
ContentEN: On my bark so small and frail, by His grace I shall not fail,

ContentCN: 我錨穩固安全又可靠。
ContentEN: For my anchor holds, my anchor holds.

ContentCN: 風浪交加愈緊迫，愈覺我錨真牢靠；
ContentEN: I can feel the anchor fast as I meet each sudden blast,

ContentCN: 眼不能見信心鍊，緊繫我心抗狂瀾；
ContentEN: And the cable, though unseen, bears the heavy strain between;

ContentCN: 使我能駕風暴上，直到風暴全止消。
ContentEN: Thro' the storm I safely ride, till the turning of the tide.

ContentCN: 任你風急浪又高，我錨已經安然拋，
ContentEN: And it holds, my anchor holds; blow your wildest, then, O gale,

ContentCN: 雖我人輕船又小，靠主恩典不動搖，
ContentEN: On my bark so small and frail, by His grace I shall not fail,

ContentCN: 我錨穩固安全又可靠。
ContentEN: For my anchor holds, my anchor holds.

ContentCN: 憂患幾乎漫我魂，傷痛猶如浪滾滾；
ContentEN: Troubles almost 'whelm the soul; griefs like billows o'er me roll:

ContentCN: 正當惡者在引誘，正當風雨掩日頭；
ContentEN: Tempters seek to lure astray; storms obscure the light of day;

ContentCN: 我靠基督能強勇，因我有一堅固錨！
ContentEN: But in Christ I can be bold, I've an anchor that shall hold.

ContentCN: 耶穌，靈魂的愛人，求祢許我來藏身；
ContentEN: Jesus, lover of my soul, let me to Thy bosom fly,

ContentCN: 正當波浪滾滾近，正當風雨陣陣緊。
ContentEN: While the nearer waters roll, while the tempest still is high;

ContentCN: 藏我，哦主，求藏我，直到今生風波過；
ContentEN: Hide me, O my savior hide, till the storm of life is past;

ContentCN: 引我平安進天門，至終求接我靈魂！
ContentEN: Safe in to the haven guide; O receive my soul at last.

ContentCN: 我無別的逃避所，無助靈魂向祢託；
ContentEN: Other refuge have I none, hangs my helpless soul on Thee;

ContentCN: 求主莫將我丟棄，安慰保守無時已。
ContentEN: Leave, oh, leave me not alone, still support and comfort me.

ContentCN: 所有倚靠寄祢身，所有救助在祢恩；
ContentEN: All my trust on Thee is stayed, all my help from Thee I bring;

ContentCN: 我頭無遮、身無蔽，求祢聖翼來覆庇。
ContentEN: Cover my defenseless head with the shadow of Thy wing.

ContentCN: 主阿，祢是我所需，夠我一切還有餘；
ContentEN: Thou, O Christ, art all I want; more than all in Thee I find;

ContentCN: 輭弱、跌倒祢扶持，疾病、瞎眼祢醫治。
ContentEN: Raise the fallen, cheer the faint, heal the sick and lead the blind.

ContentCN: 祢名至義、至聖潔，我全不義滿罪孽；
ContentEN: Just and holy is Thy name, I am all unrighteousness;

ContentCN: 我是邪惡沒良善，真理、恩典祢充滿。
ContentEN: Vile and full of sin I am, Thou art full of truth and grace.

ContentCN: 祢前我遇浩大恩，恩足赦免我罪深；
ContentEN: Plenteous grace with Thee is found, grace to cover all my sin;

ContentCN: 醫治活水望湧流，使我清潔蒙保守。
ContentEN: Let the healing streams abound; make and keep me pure within.

ContentCN: 祢是永遠生命源，望在我心成活泉；
ContentEN: Thou of life the fountain art, freely let me take of Thee;

ContentCN: 從我裏面來湧流，一直湧流到永久。
ContentEN: Spring Thou up within my heart, rise to all eternity.

ContentCN: 你這因著奔正路，手垂腿酸之人，
ContentEN: O eyes that are weary and hearts that are sore,

ContentCN: 望斷以及於耶穌，免得疲倦煩悶；
ContentEN: Look off unto Jesus, and sorrow no more;

ContentCN: 祂的面光照輝煌，驅盡黑暗不見，
ContentEN: The light of His countenance shineth so bright,

ContentCN: 你若仰望祂面光，就必輝煌如天。
ContentEN: That on earth as in heaven there need be no night.

ContentCN: 望斷以及於耶穌，你就必不看見
ContentEN: Looking off unto Jesus, my eyes cannot see

ContentCN: 逼迫、艱難與貧苦，如何四圍為患；
ContentEN: The troubles and dangers that throng around me;

ContentCN: 沒有憂傷的眼淚，能使你眼失明，
ContentEN: They cannot be blinded with sorrowful tears;

ContentCN: 沒有驚險的可畏，能使你心迷蒙。
ContentEN: They cannot be shadow'd with unbelieving fears.

ContentCN: 望斷以及於耶穌，你靈必蒙恩湛，
ContentEN: Looking off unto Jesus, my spirit is blest;

ContentCN: 雖在世上有苦楚，在祂裏面平安；
ContentEN: In the world I have turmoil, in Him I have rest.

ContentCN: 雖在人生大海中，時有波浪澎湃，
ContentEN: The sea of my life all about me may roar;

ContentCN: 你若仰望祂面容，你心必不驚駭。
ContentEN: When I look unto Jesus, I hear it no more.

ContentCN: 望斷以及於耶穌，你就不會迷糊，
ContentEN: Looking off unto Jesus, I go not astray;

ContentCN: 你若向祂常舉目，祂必指你正路；
ContentEN: My eyes are on Him, and He shows me the way.

ContentCN: 當祂領你向前走，即使遇到雲霧，
ContentEN: The path may seem dark as He leads me along,

ContentCN: 你若向祂常仰首，祂必不會錯誤。
ContentEN: But following Jesus, I cannot go wrong.

ContentCN: 望斷以及於耶穌，直到被提上天，
ContentEN: Looking off unto Jesus, until in Heav'n I see

ContentCN: 直到榮耀的面目，完全顯你眼前；
ContentEN: The full beauty and grace of Jesus my Lord.

ContentCN: 今日仰望之榮面，使你途中得力，
ContentEN: I shall know how His love went before me each day

ContentCN: 那日變作你歌頌，使你永遠歡喜。
ContentEN: And wonder that ever my eyes turned away.

ContentCN: 你當一生信靠救主，
ContentEN: Then trust in God thro' all thy days;

ContentCN: 不必懼怕，主在攙扶；
ContentEN: Fear not, for He doth hold thy hand;

ContentCN: 路雖陰暗，仍當讚美，
ContentEN: Though dark thy way, still sing and praise,

ContentCN: 有日，有日都要領會。
ContentEN: Sometime, sometime we'll understand.

ContentCN: 不在此時，許在將來，
ContentEN: Not now, but in the coming years,

ContentCN: 不在這裏，許在美地，
ContentEN: It may be when with Christ we stand.

ContentCN: 我們纔能完全領會歎息、
ContentEN: We'll read the meaning of our tears,

ContentCN: 眼淚所有意義。
ContentEN: And there, sometime, we'll understand.

ContentCN: 你當一生信靠救主，
ContentEN: Then trust in God thro' all thy days;

ContentCN: 不必懼怕，主在攙扶；
ContentEN: Fear not, for He doth hold thy hand;

ContentCN: 路雖陰暗，仍當讚美，
ContentEN: Though dark thy way, still sing and praise,

ContentCN: 有日，有日都要領會。
ContentEN: Sometime, sometime we'll understand.

ContentCN: 中斷線索，都將接上，
ContentEN: We'll catch the broken thread again,

ContentCN: 一生經過，必有路軌；
ContentEN: And finish what we here began;

ContentCN: 天能解釋各樣祕藏，
ContentEN: God will the mysteries explain,

ContentCN: 那日，那日都必領會。
ContentEN: And then, ah, then, we'll understand.

ContentCN: 你當一生信靠救主，
ContentEN: Then trust in God thro' all thy days;

ContentCN: 不必懼怕，主在攙扶；
ContentEN: Fear not, for He doth hold thy hand;

ContentCN: 路雖陰暗，仍當讚美，
ContentEN: Though dark thy way, still sing and praise,

ContentCN: 有日，有日都要領會。
ContentEN: Sometime, sometime we'll understand.

ContentCN: 何故厚雲遮蔽太陽？
ContentEN: We'll know why clouds instead of sun

ContentCN: 何故寂寞代替安慰？
ContentEN: Were over many a cherished plan;

ContentCN: 何故歎息多過歌唱？
ContentEN: Why song has ceased when scarce begun;

ContentCN: 有日，我們就要領會。
ContentEN: 'Tis then, sometime, we'll understand.

ContentCN: 你當一生信靠救主，
ContentEN: Then trust in God thro' all thy days;

ContentCN: 不必懼怕，主在攙扶；
ContentEN: Fear not, for He doth hold thy hand;

ContentCN: 路雖陰暗，仍當讚美，
ContentEN: Though dark thy way, still sing and praise,

ContentCN: 有日，有日都要領會。
ContentEN: Sometime, sometime we'll understand.

ContentCN: 何以祈求未見答應？
ContentEN: Why what we long for most of all,

ContentCN: 何以將成終又不遂？
ContentEN: Eludes so oft our eager hand;

ContentCN: 何以盼望終成泡影？
ContentEN: Why hopes are crushed and castles fall,

ContentCN: 那日，那裏，我必領會。
ContentEN: Up there, sometime, we'll understand.

ContentCN: 你當一生信靠救主，
ContentEN: Then trust in God thro' all thy days;

ContentCN: 不必懼怕，主在攙扶；
ContentEN: Fear not, for He doth hold thy hand;

ContentCN: 路雖陰暗，仍當讚美，
ContentEN: Though dark thy way, still sing and praise,

ContentCN: 有日，有日都要領會。
ContentEN: Sometime, sometime we'll understand.

ContentCN: 神知我路，手拿它鑰，
ContentEN: God knows the way, He holds the key,

ContentCN: 祂的帶領充滿智慧；
ContentEN: He guides us with unerring hand;

ContentCN: 有日我眼看見一切，
ContentEN: Sometime with tearless eyes we'll see,

ContentCN: 就在那日，我必領會。
ContentEN: Yes, then, 'tis then, we'll understand.

ContentCN: 那時我必完全知道，像主對我一樣明瞭；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 那時我必親見主面，在祂座前頌讚無間。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我今所知主恩有限，我雖也曾瞥見主臉；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 等我與祂美地相見，對祂認識纔能完全。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 那時我必完全知道，像主對我一樣明瞭；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 那時我必親見主面，在祂座前頌讚無間。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我今所知主愛有限，雖有明光照我心間；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 更有榮耀極重無比，就要光照十分明晰。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 那時我必完全知道，像主對我一樣明瞭；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 那時我必親見主面，在祂座前頌讚無間。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我今所能明白有限，父手如何帶領向前；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 等我一到光明的家，就知祂路極妙絕佳。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 那時我必完全知道，像主對我一樣明瞭；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 那時我必親見主面，在祂座前頌讚無間。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 今雖有限，但何甘甜，因信安息在祂腳前；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 今雖彷彿對鏡觀看，帕子一去，陰影全散。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 當我來到我盡頭時候，祢就在那裏；

ContentEN: When I come to the end of all that I have,

ContentCN: 主阿，我就俯伏在祢前；
ContentEN: And I fall on my face before you,

ContentCN: 我知在我盡頭，祢要遇見我。
ContentEN: Lord, I'll always know that You will meet me there.

ContentCN: 重擔當託耶和華，重擔當託耶和華，
ContentEN: Cast thy burden on the Lord! Cast thy burden on the Lord!

ContentCN: 主會安慰你，又會堅固你，
ContentEN: And He will strengthen thee, Sustain and comfort thee.

ContentCN: 重擔當託耶和華。
ContentEN: Cast thy burden on the Lord.

ContentCN: 路途遙遠，負擔沉重，力盡身疲想回家；
ContentEN: Weary pilgrim on life's pathway, Struggling on beneath thy load,

ContentCN: 請聽主聲，柔然輕說：重擔當託耶和華。
ContentEN: Hear these words of consolation, "Cast thy burden on the Lord."

ContentCN: 重擔當託耶和華，重擔當託耶和華，
ContentEN: Cast thy burden on the Lord! Cast thy burden on the Lord!

ContentCN: 主會安慰你，又會堅固你，
ContentEN: And He will strengthen thee, Sustain and comfort thee.

ContentCN: 重擔當託耶和華。
ContentEN: Cast thy burden on the Lord.

ContentCN: 雙腳已輭，雙手已酸，燈火將滅，目又花；
ContentEN: Are thy tired feet unsteady? Does thy lamp no light afford?

ContentCN: 眼見就要心灰氣短，重擔當託耶和華。
ContentEN: Is thy cross too great and heavy? "Cast thy burden on the Lord."

ContentCN: 重擔當託耶和華，重擔當託耶和華，
ContentEN: Cast thy burden on the Lord! Cast thy burden on the Lord!

ContentCN: 主會安慰你，又會堅固你，
ContentEN: And He will strengthen thee, Sustain and comfort thee.

ContentCN: 重擔當託耶和華。
ContentEN: Cast thy burden on the Lord.

ContentCN: 親友離散，遭遇淒涼，憂心難解常懸掛；
ContentEN: Are the ties of friendship severed? Hushed the voices fondly heard?

ContentCN: 一身難受如此創傷，重擔當託耶和華。
ContentEN: Breaks thy heart with weight of anguish? "Cast thy burden on the Lord."

ContentCN: 重擔當託耶和華，重擔當託耶和華，
ContentEN: Cast thy burden on the Lord! Cast thy burden on the Lord!

ContentCN: 主會安慰你，又會堅固你，
ContentEN: And He will strengthen thee, Sustain and comfort thee.

ContentCN: 重擔當託耶和華。
ContentEN: Cast thy burden on the Lord.

ContentCN: 孤單輭弱，無所傍倚，心緒起落亂如麻；
ContentEN: Does thy heart with faintness falter? Does thy mind forget His word?

ContentCN: 都是因為我們忘記重擔當託耶和華。
ContentEN: Does thy strength succumb to weakness? "Cast thy burden on the Lord."

ContentCN: 重擔當託耶和華，重擔當託耶和華，
ContentEN: Cast thy burden on the Lord! Cast thy burden on the Lord!

ContentCN: 主會安慰你，又會堅固你，
ContentEN: And He will strengthen thee, Sustain and comfort thee.

ContentCN: 重擔當託耶和華。
ContentEN: Cast thy burden on the Lord.

ContentCN: 祂會安慰，祂會堅固，祂要使你力有加，
ContentEN: He will hold thee up from falling; He will guide thy steps aright;

ContentCN: 祂要使你心境安舒，重擔當託耶和華。
ContentEN: He will strengthen each endeavor; He will keep thee by His might.

ContentCN: 十架不會重逾祂恩典，
ContentEN: The Cross is not greater than His grace,

ContentCN: 風波不會掩蔽祂榮臉；我心歡樂，因我知
ContentEN: The storm can not hide His blessed face; I am satisfied to know

ContentCN: 有主耶穌同在此，我就勝過敵權勢。
ContentEN: That with Jesus here below, I can conquer ev'ry foe.

ContentCN: 祂賜的十架雖然沉重，不會重逾祂恩典；
ContentEN: The cross that He gave may be heavy, but it ne'er out-weighs His grace;

ContentCN: 我怕的風波雖然洶湧，不致掩蔽祂榮臉。
ContentEN: The storm that I feared may surround me, but it ne'er excludes His face.

ContentCN: 十架不會重逾祂恩典，
ContentEN: The Cross is not greater than His grace,

ContentCN: 風波不會掩蔽祂榮臉；我心歡樂，因我知
ContentEN: The storm can not hide His blessed face; I am satisfied to know

ContentCN: 有主耶穌同在此，我就勝過敵權勢。
ContentEN: That with Jesus here below, I can conquer ev'ry foe.

ContentCN: 我路上荊棘，並不會比祂頭上的荊冕利；
ContentEN: The thorns in my path are not sharper than composed His crown for me;

ContentCN: 我喝的苦杯，還遠不及祂的在客西馬尼。
ContentEN: The cup that I drink not more bitter than He drank in Gethsemane.

ContentCN: 十架不會重逾祂恩典，
ContentEN: The Cross is not greater than His grace,

ContentCN: 風波不會掩蔽祂榮臉；我心歡樂，因我知
ContentEN: The storm can not hide His blessed face; I am satisfied to know

ContentCN: 有主耶穌同在此，我就勝過敵權勢。
ContentEN: That with Jesus here below, I can conquer ev'ry foe.

ContentCN: 祂光照耀得更加昭明，在危難的道路中；
ContentEN: The light of His love shineth brighter, as it falls on paths of woe;

ContentCN: 我擔子變得更為省輕，當我為人來任重。
ContentEN: The toil of my work groweth lighter, as I stoop to raise the low.

ContentCN: 十架不會重逾祂恩典，
ContentEN: The Cross is not greater than His grace,

ContentCN: 風波不會掩蔽祂榮臉；我心歡樂，因我知
ContentEN: The storm can not hide His blessed face; I am satisfied to know

ContentCN: 有主耶穌同在此，我就勝過敵權勢。
ContentEN: That with Jesus here below, I can conquer ev'ry foe.

ContentCN: 我今生活在祂的面前，歡然順服祂旨意；
ContentEN: His will I have joy in fulfilling, as I'm walking in His sight;

ContentCN: 我知我所受各種試煉，都是化裝的福庇。
ContentEN: My all to the blood I am bringing, it alone can keep me right.

ContentCN: 重擔可解脫在加略山，加略山，加略山；
ContentEN: Burdens are lifted at Calvary, Calvary, Calvary;

ContentCN: 重擔可解脫在加略山，耶穌何等親近。
ContentEN: Burdens are lifted at Calvary, Jesus is very near.

ContentCN: 日日充滿憂傷重擔，心中苦悶孤單；
ContentEN: Days are filled with sorrow and care, hearts are lonely and drear;

ContentCN: 重擔可解脫在加略山，耶穌何等親近。
ContentEN: Burdens are lifted at Calvary, Jesus is very near.

ContentCN: 重擔可解脫在加略山，加略山，加略山；

ContentCN: 重擔可解脫在加略山，耶穌何等親近。
ContentEN: Burdens are lifted at Calvary, Jesus is very near.

ContentCN: 今向主交託你重擔-一切恐懼、愁煩；
ContentEN: Cast your care on Jesus today, leave your worry and fear,

ContentCN: 重擔可解脫在加略山，耶穌何等親近。
ContentEN: Burdens are lifted at Calvary, Jesus is very near.

ContentCN: 重擔可解脫在加略山，加略山，加略山；
ContentEN: Burdens are lifted at Calvary, Calvary, Calvary;

ContentCN: 重擔可解脫在加略山，耶穌何等親近。
ContentEN: Burdens are lifted at Calvary, Jesus is very near.

ContentCN: 主看見你一切艱難-眼淚、苦痛、悲歎；
ContentEN: Troubled soul, the Saviour can see ev'ry heartache and tear.

ContentCN: 重擔可解脫在加略山，耶穌何等親近。
ContentEN: Burdens are lifted at Calvary, Jesus is very near.

ContentCN: 神仍坐著為王，祂必將你記在心上；
ContentEN: God is still on the throne, And He will remember His own;

ContentCN: 雖有暫時風浪，雖有撒但虛謊，祂必不會叫你獨當。
ContentEN: Though trials may press us and burdens distress us, He never will leave us alone.

ContentCN: 神仍坐著為王，祂必將你記在心上；祂不會說謊，
ContentEN: God is still on the throne, He never forsaketh His own; His promise is true,

ContentCN: 也不將你遺忘，神仍坐著為王。
ContentEN: He will not forget you, God is still on the throne.

ContentCN: 神卻曾應許:生活有力，
ContentEN: But God hath promised strength for the day,

ContentCN: 行路有光亮，作工得息，
ContentEN: Rest for the labor, light for the way,

ContentCN: 試煉得恩勗，危難有賴，
ContentEN: Grace for the trials, help from above,

ContentCN: 無限的體諒，不死的愛。
ContentEN: Unfailing kind-ness, undying love.

ContentCN: 神未曾應許：天色常藍，
ContentEN: God hath not promised skies always blue,

ContentCN: 人生的路途花香常漫；
ContentEN: Flower strewn pathways all our lives thro';

ContentCN: 神未曾應許：常晴無雨，
ContentEN: God hath not promised sun without rain,

ContentCN: 常樂無痛苦，常安無虞。
ContentEN: Joy without sorrow, peace without pain.

ContentCN: 神卻曾應許:生活有力，
ContentEN: But God hath promised strength for the day,

ContentCN: 行路有光亮，作工得息，
ContentEN: Rest for the labor, light for the way,

ContentCN: 試煉得恩勗，危難有賴，
ContentEN: Grace for the trials, help from above,

ContentCN: 無限的體諒，不死的愛。
ContentEN: Unfailing kind-ness, undying love.

ContentCN: 神未曾應許：我們不遇
ContentEN: God hath not promised we shall not know

ContentCN: 苦難和試探，懊惱、憂慮；
ContentEN: Toil and temptation, trouble and woe;

ContentCN: 神未曾應許：我們不負
ContentEN: He hath not told us we shall not bear

ContentCN: 許多的重擔，許多事務。
ContentEN: Many a burden, many a care.

ContentCN: 神卻曾應許:生活有力，
ContentEN: But God hath promised strength for the day,

ContentCN: 行路有光亮，作工得息，
ContentEN: Rest for the labor, light for the way,

ContentCN: 試煉得恩勗，危難有賴，
ContentEN: Grace for the trials, help from above,

ContentCN: 無限的體諒，不死的愛。
ContentEN: Unfailing kind-ness, undying love.

ContentCN: 神未曾應許：前途盡是
ContentEN: God hath not promised smooth roads and wide,

ContentCN: 平坦的大路，任意驅馳；
ContentEN: Swift, easy travel, needing no guide;

ContentCN: 沒有深水拒-汪洋一片，
ContentEN: Never a mountain, rocky and steep,

ContentCN: 沒有大山阻-高薄雲天。
ContentEN: Never a river, turbid and deep.

ContentCN: 來罷，憂傷的人，隨帶你煩惱，
ContentEN: Come, ye disconsolate, where'er ye languish;

ContentCN: 向著施恩寶座虔誠屈膝；
ContentEN: Come to the mercy seat, fervently kneel;

ContentCN: 來陳你心創痕，來訴你困擾，
ContentEN: Here bring your wounded hearts, here tell your anguish,

ContentCN: 地無一個憂傷天不能醫。
ContentEN: Earth has no sorrow that heav'n can not heal.

ContentCN: 孤單中的喜樂，迷途的光照，
ContentEN: Joy of the comfortless, light of the straying,

ContentCN: 痛悔者的希望-祂永不變；
ContentEN: Hope of the penitent, fadeless and pure;

ContentCN: 保惠師正在此柔聲的說道：
ContentEN: Here speaks the Comforter, tenderly saying-

ContentCN: 地無一個憂傷天不能遣。
ContentEN: Earth has no sorrow that heav'n cannot cure.

ContentCN: 這是生命的餅，滋養又甘甜，
ContentEN: Here see the Bread of Life; see waters flowing

ContentCN: 這是生命的水，流自寶座；
ContentEN: Forth from the throne of God, pure from above;

ContentCN: 來赴主的愛筵，心中常思念：
ContentEN: Come to the feast of love; come, ever knowing

ContentCN: 地無一個憂傷天不能脫。
ContentEN: Earth has no sorrow but heav'n can remove.

ContentCN: 神的路是正路，神的路是善路，
ContentEN: God's way is the best way, God's way is the right way,

ContentCN: 我願經常倚靠，惟神知最好！
ContentEN: I'll trust in Him alway, He knoweth the best.

ContentCN: 神的路是正路，雖我不明瞭，
ContentEN: God's way is the best way, Tho' I may not see,

ContentCN: 為何憂愁試煉，常把我環繞；
ContentEN: Why sorrows and trials, oft gather 'round me;

ContentCN: 主用各樣方法，煉我像精金，
ContentEN: He ever is seeking my gold to refine,

ContentCN: 故我謙卑信靠，我至聖救主。
ContentEN: So humbly I trust Him, my Savior divine.

ContentCN: 神的路是正路，神的路是善路，
ContentEN: God's way is the best way, God's way is the right way,

ContentCN: 我願經常倚靠，惟神知最好！
ContentEN: I'll trust in Him alway, He knoweth the best.

ContentCN: 神的路是善路，計劃我道路，
ContentEN: God's way is the best way, my path He hath planned,

ContentCN: 我願時常倚靠，憑祂手攙扶；
ContentEN: I'll trust in Him alway while holding His hand.

ContentCN: 不論黑暗光明，祂永遠相近，
ContentEN: In shadow or sunshine He ever is near,

ContentCN: 有祂作避難所，我無需憂驚。
ContentEN: With Him for my refuge, I never need fear.

ContentCN: 神的路是正路，神的路是善路，
ContentEN: God's way is the best way, God's way is the right way,

ContentCN: 我願經常倚靠，惟神知最好！
ContentEN: I'll trust in Him alway, He knoweth the best.

ContentCN: 神的路成我路，神所知最好，
ContentEN: God's way shall be my way, He knoweth the best,

ContentCN: 何等甜美安息，我全心投靠；
ContentEN: And leaning upon Him, sweet, sweet is my rest.

ContentCN: 災害不能臨到，平安無煩惱，
ContentEN: No harm can befall me, safe, safe shall I be,

ContentCN: 我要永遠靠主，祂何等可寶。
ContentEN: I'll cling to Him ever, so precious is He.

ContentCN: 父，我知道我的一生祢已替我分好，
ContentEN: Father, I know that all my life is portioned out for me;

ContentCN: 所有必須發生變更，我不害怕看到；
ContentEN: The changes that are sure to come I do not fear to see;

ContentCN: 我求祢賜長久忠誠，存心討祢歡笑。
ContentEN: I ask Thee for a present mind, Intent on pleasing Thee.

ContentCN: 我求要得"有意"的愛，時常儆醒的慧，
ContentEN: I ask Thee for a thoughtful love, through constant watching wise,

ContentCN: 常以笑容歡迎事態，擦乾不禁眼淚，
ContentEN: To meet the glad with joyful smiles, to wipe the weeping eyes,

ContentCN: 心能與它自己合拍，好來同情、安慰。
ContentEN: A heart at leisure from itself, to soothe and sympathize.

ContentCN: 我不要有不安意志，急忙到東到西，
ContentEN: I would not have the restless will that hurries to and fro,

ContentCN: 要求要作幾件大事，或要明白祕密；
ContentEN: Seeking for some great thing to do, or secret thing to know;

ContentCN: 我要被待如同孩子，所往都是受意。
ContentEN: I would be treated as a child, and guided where I go.

ContentCN: 無論我在世界何地，是有何種情況，
ContentEN: Wherever in the world I am, in what-soe'er estate,

ContentCN: 我與人心有個交契，我要保守發旺，
ContentEN: I have a fellowship with hearts to keep and cultivate;

ContentCN: 我要為愛出我微力，為著事奉我王。
ContentEN: A work of lowly love to do for Him on whom I wait.

ContentCN: 我求祢賜每日恩澤，使我能常受教；
ContentEN: I ask Thee for the daily strength, to none that ask denied,

ContentCN: 心能從裏與外調和，當我與祢契交；
ContentEN: A mind to blend with outward life, while keeping at Thy side;

ContentCN: 滿意只佔微小旁側，若祢能得榮耀。
ContentEN: Content to fill a little space, If Thou be glorified.

ContentCN: 每條路上都有虛假，是祢要我忍耐；
ContentEN: On every path there is untruth, that I might patient be;

ContentCN: 每種境遇都有十架，是祢引我倚賴；
ContentEN: In every way there is a cross, that I might lean on Thee.

ContentCN: 但心靠祢若是卑下，無論那裏，可愛。
ContentEN: A lowly heart will find each place a paradise for me.

ContentCN: 如果在我幸福之中，有何尚未求祈，
ContentEN: And if some things I ask not in my cup of blessing be,

ContentCN: 我是渴慕我的內衷，向祢能滿愛意；
ContentEN: I'd have my spirit filled the more with grateful love to Thee;

ContentCN: 寧願不多為祢作工，完全使祢歡喜。
ContentEN: More careful-not to serve Thee much, but please Thee perfectly.

ContentCN: 祢愛所定我的選擇，不是我的捆繩；
ContentEN: In service which Thy will appoints, there are no bonds for me;

ContentCN: 我在暗中受祢領帥，已識祢的見證：
ContentEN: My inmost heart is taught the truth that makes Thy children free;

ContentCN: 一生充滿捨己的愛，就是自由一生。
ContentEN: A life of self-renouncing love is one of liberty.

ContentCN: 當轉眼仰望耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Turn your eyes upon Jesus,

ContentCN: 注目仰望祂的慈容﹐
ContentEN: Look full in His wonderful face,

ContentCN: 所有事物在祂榮耀光中﹐
ContentEN: And the things of earth will grow strangely dim,

ContentCN: 都要次第變色成朦朧。
ContentEN: In the light of His glory and grace.

ContentCN: 暗中摸索無一線亮光,
ContentEN: O soul, are you weary and troubled?

ContentCN: 何等疲乏﹐何等憂愁﹗
ContentEN: No light in the darkness you see?

ContentCN: 一見主面就立刻明朗﹐
ContentEN: There's light for a look at the Saviour

ContentCN: 生命豐盛加上自由。
ContentEN: And life more abundant and free.

ContentCN: 當轉眼仰望耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Turn your eyes upon Jesus,

ContentCN: 注目仰望祂的慈容﹐
ContentEN: Look full in His wonderful face,

ContentCN: 所有事物在祂榮耀光中﹐
ContentEN: And the things of earth will grow strangely dim,

ContentCN: 都要次第變色成朦朧。
ContentEN: In the light of His glory and grace.

ContentCN: 經過死亡方能得生命﹐
ContentEN: Thro' death into life everlasting

ContentCN: 祂已前行﹐我們隨趨﹔
ContentEN: He passed, and we follow Him there.

ContentCN: 罪能現今已經失權柄﹐
ContentEN: O'er us sin no more hath dominion,

ContentCN: 因為我們得勝有餘。
ContentEN: For more than conqu'rors we are!

ContentCN: 當轉眼仰望耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Turn your eyes upon Jesus,

ContentCN: 注目仰望祂的慈容﹐
ContentEN: Look full in His wonderful face,

ContentCN: 所有事物在祂榮耀光中﹐
ContentEN: And the things of earth will grow strangely dim,

ContentCN: 都要次第變色成朦朧。
ContentEN: In the light of His glory and grace.

ContentCN: 祂的應許從不至落空﹐
ContentEN: His word shall not fail you, He promised;

ContentCN: 祂是全能﹐祂是都肯﹔
ContentEN: Believe Him and all will be well;

ContentCN: 我們應當進到世人中﹐
ContentEN: Then go to a world that is dying,

ContentCN: 盡力顯明祂的救恩。
ContentEN: His perfect salvation to tell!

ContentCN: 當我在於最暗時間，測視人生變化；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 其中照出安慰光線，荊棘雜生香花。

ContentCN: 主，教我來緊握祢手，當我憂苦加添；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 從這低處使我看透，直至平安高天。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 不管任何地的歡樂，祢手加以否定；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但願在祢施恩寶座，讓我如此求情：
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN:
賜我安靜感激的心，脫離任何怨聲；	NULL	1	4	Verse
H510	賜我恩典，能力充盈，使我為祢而生。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢是屬我，甜美盼望，陪伴我的一生；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢的同在，照耀輝煌我的一生路程！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂必顧念，祂必顧念，因祂同情我憂楚；
ContentEN: O yes, He cares; I know He cares, His heart is touched with my grief;

ContentCN: 雖白晝苦難訴，黑夜長難度，我知祂仍顧念。
ContentEN: When the days are weary, the long nights dreary, I know my Savior cares.

ContentCN: 主顧念嗎？當我心痛傷，不再喜笑與歡唱；
ContentEN: Does Jesus care when my heart is pained too deeply for mirth and song;

ContentCN: 當重壓難當，道路阻且長，主耶穌是否仍顧念？
ContentEN: As the burdens press and the cares distress, and the way grows weary and long?

ContentCN: 祂必顧念，祂必顧念，因祂同情我憂楚；
ContentEN: O yes, He cares; I know He cares, His heart is touched with my grief;

ContentCN: 雖白晝苦難訴，黑夜長難度，我知祂仍顧念。
ContentEN: When the days are weary, the long nights dreary, I know my Savior cares.

ContentCN: 主顧念嗎？當我路不明，心中有莫名駭驚；
ContentEN: Does Jesus care when my way is dark with a nameless dread and fear?

ContentCN: 當日光消逝，當黑影來迎，主耶穌是否仍顧念？
ContentEN: As the daylight fades into deep night shades, does He care enough to be near?

ContentCN: 祂必顧念，祂必顧念，因祂同情我憂楚；
ContentEN: O yes, He cares; I know He cares, His heart is touched with my grief;

ContentCN: 雖白晝苦難訴，黑夜長難度，我知祂仍顧念。
ContentEN: When the days are weary, the long nights dreary, I know my Savior cares.

ContentCN: 主顧念嗎？當我屢失敗，敵不住試探苦害；
ContentEN: Does Jesus care when I've tried and failed to resist some temptation strong;

ContentCN: 當無何事物能解我悲哀，主耶穌是否仍顧念？
ContentEN: When for my deep grief I find no relief, though my tears flow all the night long?

ContentCN: 祂必顧念，祂必顧念，因祂同情我憂楚；
ContentEN: O yes, He cares; I know He cares, His heart is touched with my grief;

ContentCN: 雖白晝苦難訴，黑夜長難度，我知祂仍顧念。
ContentEN: When the days are weary, the long nights dreary, I know my Savior cares.

ContentCN: 主顧念嗎？當我心無力與我所最愛別離；
ContentEN: Does Jesus care when I've said goodby to the dearest on earth to me,

ContentCN: 當我心絞痛，止不住哭泣，主耶穌是否仍顧念？
ContentEN: And my sad heart aches till it nearly breaks- is it aught to Him? Does He see?

ContentCN: 主，祢正懷念我。主，祢正懷念我。
ContentEN: Thou thinkest, Lord, of me! Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!

ContentCN: 我怕甚麼？有祢親近，並且還懷念我！
ContentEN: What need I fear when Thou art near, and thinkest, Lord, of me!

ContentCN: 當我遇見試煉災殃，經過荊棘豺狼之疆，
ContentEN: A mid the trials that I meet, a mid the thorns that pierce my feet,

ContentCN: 我有一個甘美思想，就是主懷念我。
ContentEN: One thought remains supremely sweet: Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!

ContentCN: 主，祢正懷念我。主，祢正懷念我。
ContentEN: Thou thinkest, Lord, of me! Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!

ContentCN: 我怕甚麼？有祢親近，並且還懷念我！
ContentEN: What need I fear when Thou art near, and thinkest, Lord, of me!

ContentCN: 今生憂慮、苦難、折磨，使我心思都變昏黑；
ContentEN: The cares of life come thronging fast, upon my soul their shadows cast;

ContentCN: 但是苦境使我記得：主，祢正懷念我。
ContentEN: Their gloom reminds my heart at last - Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!

ContentCN: 主，祢正懷念我。主，祢正懷念我。
ContentEN: Thou thinkest, Lord, of me! Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!

ContentCN: 我怕甚麼？有祢親近，並且還懷念我！
ContentEN: What need I fear when Thou art near, and thinkest, Lord, of me!

ContentCN: 所以，無論愁雲多少，無論安樂，或是苦惱，
ContentEN: Let shadows come, let shadows go, let life be bright, or dark with woe,

ContentCN: 我已滿足，因我知道：主還是懷念我。
ContentEN: I am content, for this I know – Thou thinkest, Lord, of me!

ContentCN: 主已知道你的挫折!

ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂知你是需何恩典；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂早知你所有遭遇，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂是你主，何必疑懼。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 雖然多人譏諷、反對，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 親友離棄，旅伴誤會；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但祂深知你的一切，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentEN: NULL

ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 嘆息只要向祂傾吐；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂心愛你，知你憂苦，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂必施恩，祂必看顧。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主既知道，足慰我心，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 親愛主，握我手，使穩步，向前走；
ContentEN: Precious Lord, take my hand, lead me on, help me stand,

ContentCN: 敵雖吼，友雖疏，不驚憂。
ContentEN: I am tired, I am weak, I am worn;

ContentCN: 經風波，歷黑影，得穩妥，入光明；
ContentEN: Thro' the storm, thro' the night, lead me on to the light;

ContentCN: 握我手，親愛主，向前走！
ContentEN: Take my hand, precious Lord, lead me home.

ContentCN: 涉長途，多艱困，親愛主，願你近；
ContentEN: When my way grows drear, Precious Lord, linger near;

ContentCN: 你保守，你扶助，不退後！
ContentEN: When my life is almost gone,

ContentCN: 聽我求，常引導，加我力，免跌倒；
ContentEN: Hear my cry, hear my call, hold my hand lest I fall;

ContentCN: 握我手，親愛主，向前走！
ContentEN: Take my hand, precious Lord, lead me home.

ContentCN: 現今時候已不多，旅世程途快要過；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 被提鐘點已在望，我們快要見天王；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但願我們常殷勤，直到救主再降臨。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 殷勤服事不冷淡，竭力作工不畏難；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 背負十架不自憐，願意為主歷苦艱；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 一直"買賣"到主來，若未回家終不改。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 時時倚靠主大名，殷勤討伐眾惡靈；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 雖遇危難仍得勝，未見平安不收陣；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 晝夜不斷靠祈禱，在戰場上站得牢。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 現今光陰如箭飛，我們盼望快得慰；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 願主保守靈、魂、體，完全順服主管理；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但願我們常豫備，直到主來不疲憊。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 豫備，雖然受試煉；豫備，雖然無臉面；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 豫備，直到我生活不能不向主求說：
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 求主快來不遲延！求主快來在今天！

ContentCN: 當我恩主降臨時候，我要脫盡所有憂愁，
ContentEN: When my blest Lord will come again, I will be saved from all my pain,

ContentCN: 同眾聖徒跟祂而走，哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: With all the saints I'll follow Him, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 哦！讚美主！哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 同眾聖徒跟祂而走，哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: With all the saints I'll follow Him, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 當我親眼見我救主，與祂永世永遠同住；
ContentEN: When I shall see Him face to face, and dwell with Him thro' endless days,

ContentCN: 我心快樂，我口歡呼，哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: I will rejoice and sing His praise, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 哦！讚美主！哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 我心快樂，我口歡呼，哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: I will rejoice and sing His praise, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 當我見主在那空中，我十字架就不苦重；
ContentEN: When I meet Him before the Throne, my suff'rings then will all be gone,

ContentCN: 何等暢樂與主相逢！哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: The joy of vict'ry will be won, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 哦！讚美主！哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 何等暢樂與主相逢！哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: The joy of vict'ry will be won, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 當那時候，我要證明無何能勝主的生命；
ContentEN: In that day I will testify that nothing with Christ's life can vie,

ContentCN: 被提空中何等歡欣！哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: What glorious rapture to the sky, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 哦！讚美主！哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 被提空中何等歡欣！哦！讚美主！
ContentEN: What glorious rapture to the sky, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 但願我們與主為伴，合而為一不再離散，
ContentEN: May we in our Lord's side e'er hide, be always one and ne'er divide,

ContentCN: 好叫耶穌意足心滿，在祂來時！
ContentEN: That His heart may be satisfied, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 在祂來時！在祂來時！
ContentEN: O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 好叫耶穌意足心滿！在祂來時！
ContentEN: That His heart may be satisfied, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 來罷，我王，願祢就來！接等祢者與祢同在，
ContentEN: O come, our King, O come, dear Lord! Receive us by Thy promised word,

ContentCN: 使愛祢者得祢賞賚，主阿，快來！
ContentEN: And give the victors Thy reward, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 主阿，快來！主阿，快來！
ContentEN: O praise the Lord! O praise the Lord!

ContentEN: And give the victors Thy reward, O praise the Lord!

ContentCN: 但我醒來何等喜歡，竟然得以面見我王。

ContentCN: 有日主來召我歸回，我魂就要飛投主懷。

ContentCN: 從天上降臨﹐祂來接我﹐接我﹗
ContentEN: Descend from the sky, coming for me, for me!

ContentCN: 你要不死，你要被提見主！
ContentEN: We may not die, but rise and meet the Lord!

ContentCN: 這是父神最近所示道路；
ContentEN: This blessed hope, God shows us in His Word;

ContentCN: 聖靈今向我們這樣明說，
ContentEN: The Spirit makes it plain to us His own -

ContentCN: 要使我們全心轉向寶座。
ContentEN: He'll catch us from this world, to His own throne.

ContentCN: 你要不死，你要被提見主！
ContentEN: We may not die, but rise and meet the Lord!

ContentCN: 哦，何榮耀！我要歸回天府！
ContentEN: Oh, the bright glory these few words afford!

ContentCN: 眨眼之間，我要完全改變！
ContentEN: Changed instantly, the twinkling of an eye,

ContentCN: 被提上升，與我主面對面！
ContentEN: And see Thee face to face, our Lord for aye!

ContentCN: 你要不死，你要被提見主！
ContentEN: Some shall not die, but rise and meet the Lord,

ContentCN: 這樣應許實在可信可服；
ContentEN: O precious promise! Faithful, true and good!

ContentCN: 我們雖然不知其時其日，
ContentEN: Although we do not know the day or hour,

ContentCN: 卻能覺得那個時日已至。
ContentEN: We know that He Himself shall come in power.

ContentCN: 你要不死，因此你當自潔，
ContentEN: We may not die, then let us more pure be,

ContentCN: 一切罪惡，你當完全斷絕；
ContentEN: Cut off each sin, unseen, or that men see,

ContentCN: 世界快過，天上榮光快顯，
ContentEN: This world is passing, Heaven will quickly come,

ContentCN: 所以我們度日應當敬虔。
ContentEN: Then let us day by day, be more like Him!

ContentCN: 你要被提直到空中見主，
ContentEN: We shall arise, and meet Him in the air!

ContentCN: 所以你當保守你靈脫俗；
ContentEN: Then let us not entangled be down here!

ContentCN: 我們現在並非在此等死，
ContentEN: We look for Christ! We do not look for death!

ContentCN: 乃是隨時仰望被提離世。
ContentEN: Our hope at any hour, to leave this earth.

ContentCN: 你要不死，你要被提上升！
ContentEN: We shall arise, and to our Lord ascend,

ContentCN: 神的兒女，這是何種得勝！
ContentEN: When His victorious shout the air shall rend!

ContentCN: 你靈當說：來吧！主，求祢來！
ContentEN: O come! Lord Jesus, come! His saints now cry,

ContentCN: 願祢快來，使我們永同在。
ContentEN: Come quickly! So, we e'er shall be with Thee.

ContentCN: 哦，主，還需多久！多久！
ContentEN: O Lord Jesus, how long, how long

ContentCN: 我們纔能高歌：基督降臨，哈利路亞！
ContentEN: Ere we shout the glad song, Christ returneth! Hallelujah!

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！阿們！哈利路亞！阿們！
ContentEN: Hallelujah! Amen, Hallelujah! Amen.

ContentCN: 或許在清晨，或在夢醒的黎明，
ContentEN: It may be at morn when the day is awaking,

ContentCN: 長夜初過盡，日光正驅散黑影；
ContentEN: When sun light through darkness and shadow is breaking,

ContentCN: 那時主耶穌滿披榮耀再降臨，
ContentEN: That Jesus will come in the fullness of glory,

ContentCN: 當主提接祂子民。
ContentEN: To receive from the world His own.

ContentCN: 哦，主，還需多久！多久！
ContentEN: O Lord Jesus, how long, how long

ContentCN: 我們纔能高歌：基督降臨，哈利路亞！
ContentEN: Ere we shout the glad song, Christ returneth! Hallelujah!

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！阿們！哈利路亞！阿們！
ContentEN: Hallelujah! Amen, Hallelujah! Amen.

ContentCN: 或許在正午，或在薄暮的黃昏，
ContentEN: It may be at midday, it may be at twilight,

ContentCN: 也許在午夜，黑暗深沉的時辰；
ContentEN: It may be, perchance, that the blackness of midnight

ContentCN: 主榮耀光芒劃破最深的黑蔭，
ContentEN: Will burst into light in the blaze of His glory,

ContentCN: 當主提接祂子民。
ContentEN: When Jesus receives His own.

ContentCN: 哦，主，還需多久！多久！
ContentEN: O Lord Jesus, how long, how long

ContentCN: 我們纔能高歌：基督降臨，哈利路亞！
ContentEN: Ere we shout the glad song, Christ returneth! Hallelujah!

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！阿們！哈利路亞！阿們！
ContentEN: Hallelujah! Amen, Hallelujah! Amen.

ContentCN: 和散那聲高，當主自高天降臨，
ContentEN: While hosts cry Hosanna, from heaven descending,

ContentCN: 得榮眾聖徒與天使一起歡吟；
ContentEN: With glorified saints and the angels attending,

ContentCN: 主榮面射出無限恩典的光明，
ContentEN: With grace on His brow, like a halo of glory,

ContentCN: 當主提接祂子民。
ContentEN: Will Jesus receive His own.

ContentCN: 哦，主，還需多久！多久！
ContentEN: O Lord Jesus, how long, how long

ContentCN: 我們纔能高歌：基督降臨，哈利路亞！
ContentEN: Ere we shout the glad song, Christ returneth! Hallelujah!

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！阿們！哈利路亞！阿們！
ContentEN: Hallelujah! Amen, Hallelujah! Amen.

ContentCN: 何等大欣喜，倘若不死即被提！
ContentEN: O joy! O delight! Should we go without dying,

ContentCN: 再沒有疾病、憂傷、痛苦和哭泣；
ContentEN: No sickness, no sadness, no dread and no crying,

ContentCN: 與主永同在，共享榮耀於天庭，
ContentEN: Caught up through the clouds with our Lord into glory,

ContentCN: 當主提接祂子民。
ContentEN: When Jesus receives His own.

ContentCN: 有福時刻終於來臨，羔羊婚筵準備完成；
ContentEN: The blessed moment has at last arrived: the marriage supper of the Lamb and Bride.

ContentCN: 眾優勝者蒙召有分，被提上升喜樂融融；
ContentEN: All overcomers take their place, caught up to heav'n in ceaseless praise!

ContentCN: 祕密傷痕無處可尋，背人淚痕也都擦淨。
ContentEN: All hidden tears are wiped away, and secret scars no longer stay.

ContentCN: 細麻白衣皎潔晶瑩，馨香四溢聖徒義行；
ContentEN: The righteous acts of saints in grand display: fine linen brightly shines in full array,

ContentCN: 沒藥乳香膏我全人，聖靈傑作新婦榮形。
ContentEN: With precious ointment well applied, the Spirit's master work: the Bride!

ContentCN: 盛筵之上歌聲歡騰，永頌羔羊蒙福無窮！
ContentEN: Rejoicing o'er the marriage feast, I sing. I'm blessed forever! Let His praises ring!

ContentCN: 前在塵世稍嘗天恩，五穀新酒樂我心靈；
ContentEN: His grace I tasted once in part: much corn and new wine filled my heart.

ContentCN: 十架路程雖然難行，下滴脂油潤我途徑。
ContentEN: Tho' rough the journey of the cross, yet fatness dropped along my course.

ContentCN: 如今被提天的宮禁，沐於、浸於榮耀無盡；
ContentEN: Now raptured to resplendent courts divine, Immersed in glory naught can e'er outshine,

ContentCN: 纔知損失何足介意，換來今日極重福分。
ContentEN: Then do I know: my loss and pain has won for me this blessed gain.

ContentCN: 坐祂席上瞻祂慈顏，我臉反映榮耀無限；
ContentEN: Feasting with Him, His radiance I behold. My face reflects His glory e'er untold.

ContentCN: 我心驚愕，我魂感讚，正當與主甘甜結聯；
ContentEN: In union sweet, my Lord does raise my heart to awe and soul to praise!

ContentCN: 當日每一辛酸經驗，今日都成何等記念。
ContentEN: Each painful blow portioned to me now is a precious memory.

ContentCN: 新婦所獲無上禮聘，乃是救主所受傷痕；
ContentEN: The loving gift presented to the Bible is the dear Savior's scars – there's none beside.

ContentCN: 從此神人一同君臨，在於新造無窮光陰。
ContentEN: Henceforward, men with God shall reign through endless days, in new domain!

ContentCN: 我將站在王面前，與眾天使同頌讚：
ContentEN: We shall stand before the King, with the angels we shall sing:

ContentCN: 榮耀歸王到永遠！哈利路亞！
ContentEN: Glory, glory to our King! Hallelujah!

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！我將站在王面前。
ContentEN: Hallelujah! We shall stand before the King.

ContentCN: 我將站在王面前，與眾天使同頌讚，
ContentEN: We shall stand before the King, with the angels we shall sing,

ContentCN: 再不久！再不久！在那光明精金岸，
ContentEN: By and by, by and by! Walk the bright, the golden shore,

ContentCN: 頌讚我王到永遠，再不久！再不久！
ContentEN: Praising Him for ever more, by and by, by and by!

ContentCN: 我將站在王面前，與眾天使同頌讚：
ContentEN: We shall stand before the King, with the angels we shall sing:

ContentCN: 榮耀歸王到永遠！哈利路亞！
ContentEN: Glory, glory to our King! Hallelujah!

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！我將站在王面前。
ContentEN: Hallelujah! We shall stand before the King.

ContentCN: 天上聲音要呼喊，我將站在王面前，
ContentEN: Ring, ye bells of heaven, ring! We shall stand before the King,

ContentCN: 再不久！再不久！在彼不再有哀歎，
ContentEN: By and by, by and by! There our sorrows will be o'er;

ContentCN: 在彼盡都是頌讚，再不久！再不久！
ContentEN: There His name we will adore, By and by, by and by!

ContentCN: 我將站在王面前，與眾天使同頌讚：
ContentEN: We shall stand before the King, with the angels we shall sing:

ContentCN: 榮耀歸王到永遠！哈利路亞！
ContentEN: Glory, glory to our King! Hallelujah!

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！我將站在王面前。
ContentEN: Hallelujah! We shall stand before the King.

ContentCN: 儆醒，我魂，免怠慢，不久要到王面前，
ContentEN: Wake, my soul! Thy tribute bring; Thou shalt stand before the King,

ContentCN: 再不久！再不久！將你珍寶向王獻，
ContentEN: By and by, by and by! Lay thy trophies at His feet;

ContentCN: 你必得著祂稱讚，再不久！再不久！
ContentEN: In His likeness stand complete, By and by, by and by!

ContentCN: 主耶穌，我正等待，被提到祢面前；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 除了祢的快再來，無別如此甘甜。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我今盼望你降臨，我知道祢已近；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我覺得祢的親近，已經包圍我心。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 在我全人最深處。我已聽見你話；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 感謝祢，因祢清楚語我以祢計劃。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢的再臨何等近！祢的顯現已快！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 恩典餘日何等緊！仇敵就要敗壞！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 求祢斬斷眾籐蔓，使我完全自由；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 使我順服不遲慢，緊緊跟隨祢走。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我願放下"合理事，"免得我心受拘；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 免得當祢再來時，我不能自由去。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 時刻等候並儆醒，這是我的心意；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 願我完全隨從靈，免得錯過被提。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 免得因我未豫備，因我打盹睡覺，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢就以為我不配，留我在地受熬。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我的心哪，這真是極莊嚴的儆戒；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 因此，你所愛的事，應當完全脫解。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 應當完全戀慕主，完全想念天家；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 無論何時主招呼，能將一切撇下。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 雖然有時爭戰猛，多有撒但折磨；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但是不久要高升，所以還怕甚麼！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 現今黑暗雖加增，救贖日子也近，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 所以你可昂首等，不久主必降臨。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 願我所愛惟有主，願我所想惟主；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 拒絕世界的賄賂，心今就在天府。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 地上束縛已經鬆，我主，求祢就來；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我心盼望到天中，看見我主我愛！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主，當我們被提上升，心要充滿喜樂得勝，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 並要何等驚愕！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 看見祢面，聽見祢聲，因祢完全的愛歡騰，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢的榮耀同得。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 哦，這偉大日子！哦，這榮耀俄頃，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 罪權消失，死除盡，撒但被毀，陰府傾；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 萬有震驚，我歡騰，和散那頌永無盡！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！哈利路亞！哈利路亞！阿們！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 當那偉大日子、時辰忽然降臨，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 宇宙將要充滿何等喜樂歡欣；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 救主臉面射出不可逼視光明，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 聖徒處處發出如雷得勝呼聲。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 哦，這偉大日子！哦，這榮耀俄頃，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 罪權消失，死除盡，撒但被毀，陰府傾；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 萬有震驚，我歡騰，和散那頌永無盡！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 哈利路亞！哈利路亞！哈利路亞！阿們！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 當那偉大日子、時辰忽然降臨，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 流蕩、冷落聖徒，相愛難解難分；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 再無墮落表現、肉體力量侵凌，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 內外無玷、無垢，顯祢聖潔榮形。

ContentCN: 哦，主，祢知我無良友像祢，
ContentEN: O Lord, you know I have no friend like you,

ContentCN: 天堂若非我家，主阿，我將何依？
ContentEN: If heaven's not my home, Then Lord, what will I do?

ContentCN: 天門為我大開，天使為我來迎，
ContentEN: The angels beckon me from heaven's open door,

ContentCN: 我何能再貪愛這世界為我家。
ContentEN: And I can't feel at home in this world anymore.

ContentCN: 這世界非我家，我不過是客旅，
ContentEN: This world is not my home I'm just a passing thru,

ContentCN: 我所珍愛財寶，遠藏高天深處；
ContentEN: My treasures are laid up some where beyond the blue;

ContentCN: 天門為我大開，天使為我來迎，
ContentEN: The angels beckon me from heaven's open door,

ContentCN: 我何能再貪愛這世界為我家。
ContentEN: And I can't feel at home in this world anymore.

ContentEN: O Lord, you know I have no friend like you,

ContentCN: 天堂若非我家，主阿，我將何依？
ContentEN: If heaven's not my home, Then Lord, what will I do?

ContentCN: 天門為我大開，天使為我來迎，
ContentEN: The angels beckon me from heaven's open door,

ContentCN: 我何能再貪愛這世界為我家。
ContentEN: And I can't feel at home in this world anymore.

ContentCN: 我心確知深信，天家正等我歸，
ContentEN: They're all expecting me, and that's one thing I know,

ContentCN: 救主既赦我罪，我就望天直奔；
ContentEN: My Savior pardoned me and now I onward go;

ContentCN: 雖我貧窮輭弱，一路祂正引領，
ContentEN: I know He'll take me thru tho' I am weak and poor,

ContentCN: 我何能再貪愛這世界為我家。
ContentEN: And I can't feel at home in this world anymore.

ContentCN: 我何能再貪愛這世界為我家。
ContentEN: And I can't feel at home in this world anymore.

ContentCN: 我心所愛救主，早已歸回天家，
ContentEN: I have a loving Father up in glory land,

ContentCN: 我心不能再等，急欲相晤美地；
ContentEN: I don't expect to stop until I hold His hand;

ContentCN: 因祂何等期待，速速帶我歸回，
ContentEN: He's waiting now for me in heaven's open door,

ContentCN: 我何能再貪愛這世界為我家。
ContentEN: And I can't feel at home in this world anymore.
