ContentEN: The angels beckon me from heaven's open door,

ContentCN: 我何能再貪愛這世界為我家。
ContentEN: And I can't feel at home in this world anymore.

ContentCN: 當我回家之日，會晤各方眾聖，
ContentEN: Just up in gloryland we'll live eternally,

ContentCN: 同心竭力呼喊，這個偉大得勝；
ContentEN: The saints on ev'ry hand are shouting victory,

ContentCN: 讚美聲音何甜，回響天家四野，
ContentEN: Their songs of sweetest praise drift back form heaven's shore,

ContentCN: 我何能再貪愛這世界為我家。
ContentEN: And I can't feel at home in this world anymore.

ContentCN: 在那邊，在那邊，我想我家鄉在那邊；
ContentEN: Over there, over there, oh, think of the home over there;

ContentCN: 在那邊，在那邊，在那邊，我想我家鄉在那邊。
ContentEN: Over there, over there, over there; oh, think of the home over there;

ContentCN: 我想我家鄉在那邊，在裏面充滿了光燦爛；
ContentEN: Oh, think of the home over there, by the side of the river of light,

ContentCN: 在那邊無痛苦，無辛酸，一切又喜樂又平安。
ContentEN: Where the saints, all immortal and fair, are robed in their garments of white.

ContentCN: 在那邊，在那邊，我想我家鄉在那邊；
ContentEN: Over there, over there, oh, think of the home over there;

ContentCN: 在那邊，在那邊，在那邊，我想我家鄉在那邊。
ContentEN: Over there, over there, over there; oh, think of the home over there;

ContentCN: 我想神羔羊在那邊，我羨慕能與祂面對面；
ContentEN: Oh, think of the friends over there, who before us the journey have trod;

ContentCN: 祂帶領我來到活水泉，使我享安息永新鮮。
ContentEN: Of the songs that they breathe on the air, in their home on the palace of God.

ContentCN: 在那邊，在那邊，我想我家鄉在那邊；
ContentEN: Over there, over there, oh, think of the home over there;

ContentCN: 在那邊，在那邊，在那邊，我想我家鄉在那邊。
ContentEN: Over there, over there, over there; oh, think of the home over there;

ContentCN: 我想我天父在那邊，我盼望能生活祂面前；
ContentEN: My Savior is now over there; there my kindred an friends are at rest

ContentCN: 祂安慰必擦乾我淚眼，使我享快樂永甘甜。
ContentEN: Then away from my sorrow and care, let me fly to the land of the blest.

ContentCN: 在那邊，在那邊，我想我家鄉在那邊；
ContentEN: Over there, over there, oh, think of the home over there;

ContentCN: 在那邊，在那邊，在那邊，我想我家鄉在那邊。
ContentEN: Over there, over there, over there; oh, think of the home over there;

ContentCN: 我想眾聖徒在那邊，許多人都是我所記念；
ContentEN: I'll soon be at home over there, for the end of my journey I see.

ContentCN: 我祈求與他們再會面，一同歌頌神大恩典。
ContentEN: Many dear to my heart over there are watching and waiting for me.

ContentCN: 我在異鄉作客，天是我家，
ContentEN: I'm but a stranger here, heav'n is my home;

ContentCN: 途經可畏曠野，天是我家；
ContentEN: Only a sojourner, heav'n is my home.

ContentCN: 憂愁、危險充斥，時刻環繞身側，
ContentEN: Danger and sorrow stand, round me on ev'ry hand,

ContentCN: 我本來自天鄉，天是我家。
ContentEN: Heav'n is my fatherland, heav'n is my home.

ContentCN: 試探風浪洶湧，天是我家，
ContentEN: What though the tempests rage, heav'n is my home;

ContentCN: 旅客生涯不長，天是我家；
ContentEN: Short is my pilgrim age, heav'n is my home;

ContentCN: 時間如風飛逝，轉眼一切消失，
ContentEN: And time's wild wintry blast soon will be over past;

ContentCN: 至終我將歸家，天是我家。
ContentEN: I shall reach home at last, heav'n is my home.

ContentCN: 為此再無怨聲，天是我家，
ContentEN: Therefore I'll murmur not, heav'n is my home;

ContentCN: 無懼世慮纏身，天是我家；
ContentEN: What'er my earthly lot, heav'n is my home;

ContentCN: 因我必將站立，救主寶座前面，
ContentEN: For I shall surely stand there at my Lord's right hand

ContentCN: 我本來自天鄉，天是我家。
ContentEN: Heav'n is my fatherland, heav'n is my home.

ContentCN: 今世原是曠野，天是我家，
ContentEN: Earth is a desert drear, heav'n is my home;

ContentCN: 我將榮耀返回，天是我家；
ContentEN: I shall be glorified, heav'n is my home;

ContentCN: 得見眾優勝者，素為我所羨愛，
ContentEN: There are the good and blest, those I loved most and best,

ContentCN: 永同安息彼岸，天是我家。
ContentEN: And there I too shall rest; heav'n is my home.

ContentCN: 我們必要聚集河邊，何等美麗又美麗的河邊；
ContentEN: Yes, we'll gather at the river, the beautiful, the beautiful river,

ContentCN: 與聚聖同聚集河邊-暢流自神寶座前。
ContentEN: Gather with the saints at the river that flows by the throne of God.

ContentCN: 我們將要聚集河邊，行走眾天使中間；
ContentEN: Shall we gather at the river, where bright angel feet have trod;

ContentCN: 那裏水流透亮清鮮，暢流自神寶座前。
ContentEN: With its crystal tide forever flowing by the throne of God?

ContentCN: 我們必要聚集河邊，何等美麗又美麗的河邊；
ContentEN: Yes, we'll gather at the river, the beautiful, the beautiful river,

ContentCN: 與聚聖同聚集河邊-暢流自神寶座前。
ContentEN: Gather with the saints at the river that flows by the throne of God.

ContentCN: 水晶河面明亮可鑑，如鏡反映主榮臉；
ContentEN: On the bosom of the river, where the Savior-King we own,

ContentCN: 不再分離，永遠相聯，聖徒頌讚永無間。
ContentEN: We shall meet, and sorrow never, 'neath the glory of the throne.

ContentCN: 我們必要聚集河邊，何等美麗又美麗的河邊；
ContentEN: Yes, we'll gather at the river, the beautiful, the beautiful river,

ContentCN: 與聚聖同聚集河邊-暢流自神寶座前。
ContentEN: Gather with the saints at the river that flows by the throne of God.

ContentCN: 在這美麗水晶河邊，平安無浪能飛濺；
ContentEN: Ere we reach the shining river, lay we ev'ry burden down;

ContentCN: 我們俯伏敬拜神前，歡樂直至無窮年。
ContentEN: Grace our spirits will deliver, and provide a robe and crown.

ContentCN: 我們必要聚集河邊，何等美麗又美麗的河邊；
ContentEN: Yes, we'll gather at the river, the beautiful, the beautiful river,

ContentCN: 與聚聖同聚集河邊-暢流自神寶座前。
ContentEN: Gather with the saints at the river that flows by the throne of God.

ContentCN: 我們快要聚集河邊，旅程快要到終點；
ContentEN: Soon we'll reach the shining river, soon our pilgrimage will cease;

ContentCN: 我們快要見主榮面，永遠歡唱祂恩典。
ContentEN: Soon our happy hearts will quiver with the melody of peace.

ContentCN: 更近天上美家，哦，是更近我家！
ContentEN: Yes, closer to my home, my heav'nly home, sweet home.

ContentCN: 我要永遠瞻祂慈顏，我要永遠傍祂身邊，
ContentEN: I will ever behold His face; I will ever stand by His side;

ContentCN: 我要永遠唱祂恩典；度過今日，
ContentEN: I will ever sing of His grace. Passing this day,

ContentCN: 更近一步，更近我父美家。
ContentEN: I'm closer home, one step closer to my home.

ContentCN: 何等甘甜迷人思想，
ContentEN: How enchanting and sweet the thought,

ContentCN: 又是何等榮耀臨近；
ContentEN: O what glory is drawing near;

ContentCN: 每過一日，更近我家，
ContentEN: And thro' each day, I'm closer home,

ContentCN: 更近一步，更近天境。
ContentEN: Closer to heav'n my Father's home.

ContentCN: 更近天上美家，哦，是更近我家！
ContentEN: Yes, closer to my home, my heav'nly home, sweet home.

ContentCN: 我要永遠瞻祂慈顏，我要永遠傍祂身邊，
ContentEN: I will ever behold His face; I will ever stand by His side;

ContentCN: 我要永遠唱祂恩典；度過今日，
ContentEN: I will ever sing of His grace. Passing this day,

ContentCN: 更近一步，更近我父美家。
ContentEN: I'm closer home, one step closer to my home.

ContentCN: 今天在此憂苦交加，
ContentEN: Grief is mingled with pain this day;

ContentCN: 渴望將我重擔卸下；
ContentEN: Soon I'll cast all my loads away.

ContentCN: 有你親近，我無懼怕，
ContentEN: But your nearness dispells my fears;

ContentCN: 又過一日，更近我家。
ContentEN: Another day! I'm closer home.

ContentCN: 更近天上美家，哦，是更近我家！
ContentEN: Yes, closer to my home, my heav'nly home, sweet home.

ContentCN: 我要永遠瞻祂慈顏，我要永遠傍祂身邊，
ContentEN: I will ever behold His face; I will ever stand by His side;

ContentCN: 我要永遠唱祂恩典；度過今日，
ContentEN: I will ever sing of His grace. Passing this day,

ContentCN: 更近一步，更近我父美家。
ContentEN: I'm closer home, one step closer to my home.

ContentCN: 生平何短，試煉重重，
ContentEN: Short is my life in constant trials;

ContentCN: 仇敵暗中四面環攻；
ContentEN: Foes surround me in raging plots.

ContentCN: 流淚谷中，主慰我衷，
ContentEN: He consoles me in vales of tears;

ContentCN: 遙見天家，塵影將終。
ContentEN: Above this earth, my home I see.

ContentCN: 更近天上美家，哦，是更近我家！
ContentEN: Yes, closer to my home, my heav'nly home, sweet home.

ContentCN: 我要永遠瞻祂慈顏，我要永遠傍祂身邊，
ContentEN: I will ever behold His face; I will ever stand by His side;

ContentCN: 我要永遠唱祂恩典；度過今日，
ContentEN: I will ever sing of His grace. Passing this day,

ContentCN: 更近一步，更近我父美家。
ContentEN: I'm closer home, one step closer to my home.

ContentCN: 疲倦的人，莫再吁歎，
ContentEN: Sigh no more – O weary souls!

ContentCN: 家已在望，再無阻攔；
ContentEN: Naught can impede – your home is nigh.

ContentCN: 哦，主，我心向你呼喊：
ContentEN: My heart cries out to you, my Lord,

ContentCN: 你若遲來，讓我早返。
ContentEN: If you must tarry, take me home.

ContentCN: 更近天上美家，哦，是更近我家！
ContentEN: Yes, closer to my home, my heav'nly home, sweet home.

ContentCN: 我要永遠瞻祂慈顏，我要永遠傍祂身邊，
ContentEN: I will ever behold His face; I will ever stand by His side;

ContentCN: 我要永遠唱祂恩典；度過今日，
ContentEN: I will ever sing of His grace. Passing this day,

ContentCN: 更近一步，更近我父美家。
ContentEN: I'm closer home, one step closer to my home.

ContentCN: 在彼再無尖刻忌猜，
ContentEN: No more envy nor bitter strife,

ContentCN: 死亡毀滅，時空聯結；
ContentEN: No more death, there – time, space entwined,

ContentCN: 交通何甜，歌聲何歡，
ContentEN: What sweet union and joyful praise!

ContentCN: 光明之中，同承基業。
ContentEN: Joint-heirs with Christ thro' endless days.

ContentCN: 玉漏沙殘時將盡﹐天國即將破曉﹔
ContentEN: The sands of time are sinking, the dawn of heaven breaks;

ContentCN: 所慕晨曦即降臨﹐甘甜加上奇妙。
ContentEN: The summer morn I've sighed for, the fair, sweet morn awakes.

ContentCN: 雖經黑暗四圍繞﹐晨光今已四照﹔
ContentEN: Dark, dark hath been the midnight, but dayspring is at hand,

ContentCN: 榮耀榮耀今充滿以馬內利之境。
ContentEN: And glory, glory dwelleth in Immanuel's land.

ContentCN: 哦﹐基督祢是泉源﹐源深甘愛充滿﹔
ContentEN: O Christ! He is the fountain, the deep, sweet well of love!

ContentCN: 既淺嘗此泉於地﹐定必暢飲於天。
ContentEN: The streams on earth I've tasted, more deep I'll drink above;

ContentCN: 那裏主愛直擴展﹐猶如海洋湧溢﹔
ContentEN: There, to an ocean fullness, His mercy doth expand,

ContentCN: 榮耀榮耀今充滿以馬內利之境。
ContentEN: And glory, glory dwelleth in Immanuel's land.

ContentCN: 祂以憐憫和審判﹐織成我的年代﹔
ContentEN: With mercy and with judgment my web of time He wove,

ContentCN: 我的憂傷的淚斑﹐也帶愛的光彩。
ContentEN: And aye the dews of sorrow were lustred with His love;

ContentCN: 領我手段何巧妙﹐祂計劃何純正﹔
ContentEN: I'll bless the hand that guided, I'll bless the heart that plann'd

ContentCN: 榮耀榮耀今充滿以馬內利之境。
ContentEN: When throned where glory dwelleth in Immanuel's land.

ContentCN: 哦﹐我是屬我良人﹐我良人也屬我﹔
ContentEN: Oh, I am my Beloved's and my Beloved's mine!

ContentCN: 祂帶我這卑賤身﹐進入祂的快樂。
ContentEN: He brings a poor vile sinner into His "house of wine."

ContentCN: 那時﹐我無他靠山﹐只靠救主功勞﹔
ContentEN: I stand upon His merit — I know no other stand,

ContentCN: 前來榮耀所充滿以馬內利之境。
ContentEN: Not e'en where glory dwelleth in Immanuel's land.

ContentCN: 新婦不看她衣裳﹐只看所愛新郎﹔
ContentEN: The bride eyes not her garment, but her dear Bridegroom's face;

ContentCN: 我也不看我榮耀﹐只是瞻仰我王。
ContentEN: I will not gaze at glory, but on my King of grace.

ContentCN: 不見祂賜的冠冕﹐只看祂手創傷﹔
ContentEN: Not at the crown He giveth, but on His pierced hand,

ContentCN: 羔羊榮耀今充滿以馬內利之境。
ContentEN: The Lamb is all the glory of Immanuel's land.

ContentCN: 更美地，更美地，由信我已得著；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我尋求長安息，榮耀在前領率。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我去風波不生之處，我去沒有眼淚之谷，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 沒有傷心、痛楚；我今要去朝見，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 朝見我救主。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 你儀仗，你儀仗，你迷人的推薦；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 你誘人的歡暢，空排在我面前。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我已聽見更甜故事，我已看見更真價值，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 得著更美衣裳；我已得著救主，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 救主和天堂。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我幕幔，我幕幔，支在野地沙土；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我不能稍轉彎，去流浪人之路。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 或者受惑要去尋覓甚麼虛榮，甚麼實利；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 或者我就安息，在於耶穌，耶穌
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 無枕首之地。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 有榮耀，有榮耀，正在前面呼召；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我在此不閒聊，不能在此耽誤。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 前面就是永遠安息，就是希奇可喜目的；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 前面就是天都，前面就是榮耀，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 榮耀是耶穌。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我心充滿喜樂，天是我家；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我口不住唱歌，天是我家；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 多人不能領會-我得甚麼恩惠
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 能以如此欣慰！天是我家。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 長驅直進新耶路撒冷光明境，
ContentEN: Sweeping thro' the gates of the New Jerusalem,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨；
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 長驅直進新耶路撒冷光明境，
ContentEN: Sweeping thro' the gates of the New Jerusalem,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨。
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 這些人是誰？安渡約但波，
ContentEN: Who, who are these beside the chilly wave,

ContentCN: 死亡的拘禁亦已被衝破；
ContentEN: Just on the borders of the silent grave,

ContentCN: 歡聚彼岸唱新歌，
ContentEN: Shouting Jesus' pow'r to save,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨。
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb?

ContentCN: 長驅直進新耶路撒冷光明境，
ContentEN: Sweeping thro' the gates of the New Jerusalem,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨；
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 長驅直進新耶路撒冷光明境，
ContentEN: Sweeping thro' the gates of the New Jerusalem,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨。
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 這些人乃是自幼篤信主，
ContentEN: These, these are they who, in their youthful days,

ContentCN: 捨棄諸福樂，緊隨祂腳步；
ContentEN: Found Jesus early, And in wisdom's ways,

ContentCN: 罪蒙赦免身得贖，
ContentEN: Proved the fullness of His grace,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨。
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 長驅直進新耶路撒冷光明境，
ContentEN: Sweeping thro' the gates of the New Jerusalem,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨；
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 長驅直進新耶路撒冷光明境，
ContentEN: Sweeping thro' the gates of the New Jerusalem,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨。
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 這些人乃是不顧得與失，
ContentEN: These, these are they who, in affliction's woes,

ContentCN: 隨地成戲景，到處受藐視；
ContentEN: Ever have found in Jesus calm repose,

ContentCN: 心中仍能湧美詞，
ContentEN: Such as from a pure heart flows,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨。
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 長驅直進新耶路撒冷光明境，
ContentEN: Sweeping thro' the gates of the New Jerusalem,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨；
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 長驅直進新耶路撒冷光明境，
ContentEN: Sweeping thro' the gates of the New Jerusalem,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨。
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 這些人乃是忠心直到死，
ContentEN: These, these are they who, in the conflict dire,

ContentCN: 為求主笑容，湯火都不辭；
ContentEN: Boldly have stood amid the hottest fire;

ContentCN: 雖經苦難仍堅持，
ContentEN: Jesus now says, "Come up higher!"

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨。
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 長驅直進新耶路撒冷光明境，
ContentEN: Sweeping thro' the gates of the New Jerusalem,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨；
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 長驅直進新耶路撒冷光明境，
ContentEN: Sweeping thro' the gates of the New Jerusalem,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨。
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 這些人乃是世界不配有，
ContentEN: Safe, safe upon the ever-shining shore,

ContentCN: 補充主患難，工作先告休；
ContentEN: Sin, pain, and death, and sorrow, all are o'er;

ContentCN: 歡繞主前到永久，
ContentEN: Happy now and evermore,

ContentCN: 因有羔羊血洗淨。
ContentEN: Washed in the blood of the Lamb.

ContentCN: 正當聖徒大隊回家﹐
ContentEN: There'll be singing, there'll be shouting,

ContentCN: 有人歡呼﹐有吟詩﹐
ContentEN: When the saints come marching home,

ContentCN: 新耶路撒冷﹐新耶路撒冷﹔
ContentEN: In Jerusalem, in Jerusalem;

ContentCN: 手拿棕枝﹐唱和散那﹐
ContentEN: Waving palms with loud hosannas,

ContentCN: 正是大君登基時﹐
ContentEN: As the King shall take His throne,

ContentCN: 在於新耶路撒冷。
ContentEN: In the new Jerusalem.

ContentCN: 當我跑盡應跑道路﹐
ContentEN: When the toils of life are over,

ContentCN: 打過當打的美仗﹐
ContentEN: And we lay our armor down,

ContentCN: 離別世界和它一切的痛苦﹐
ContentEN: And we bid farewell to earth with all its cares,

ContentCN: 我就要再見我親人﹐
ContentEN: We shall meet and greet our loved ones,

ContentCN: 並向救主大歌唱﹐
ContentEN: And our Christ we then shall crown

ContentCN: 在於新耶路撒冷。
ContentEN: In the new Jerusalem.

ContentCN: 正當聖徒大隊回家﹐
ContentEN: There'll be singing, there'll be shouting,

ContentCN: 有人歡呼﹐有吟詩﹐
ContentEN: When the saints come marching home,

ContentCN: 新耶路撒冷﹐新耶路撒冷﹔
ContentEN: In Jerusalem, in Jerusalem;

ContentCN: 手拿棕枝﹐唱和散那﹐
ContentEN: Waving palms with loud hosannas,

ContentCN: 正是大君登基時﹐
ContentEN: As the King shall take His throne,

ContentCN: 在於新耶路撒冷。
ContentEN: In the new Jerusalem.

ContentCN: 雖然道路有時難行﹐
ContentEN: Though the way is sometimes lonely,

ContentCN: 使我腿酸手下垂﹐
ContentEN: He will hold me with His hand,

ContentCN: 雖然難免流淚﹐難免心痛疼﹔
ContentEN: Through the testings and the trials I must go;

ContentCN: 但我欣然相信追隨﹐
ContentEN: But I'll trust and gladly follow,

ContentCN: 因我不久要體會﹐
ContentEN: For sometime I'll understand,

ContentCN: 在於新耶路撒冷。
ContentEN: In the new Jerusalem.

ContentCN: 正當聖徒大隊回家﹐
ContentEN: There'll be singing, there'll be shouting,

ContentCN: 有人歡呼﹐有吟詩﹐
ContentEN: When the saints come marching home,

ContentCN: 新耶路撒冷﹐新耶路撒冷﹔
ContentEN: In Jerusalem, in Jerusalem;

ContentCN: 手拿棕枝﹐唱和散那﹐
ContentEN: Waving palms with loud hosannas,

ContentCN: 正是大君登基時﹐
ContentEN: As the King shall take His throne,

ContentCN: 在於新耶路撒冷。
ContentEN: In the new Jerusalem.

ContentCN: 今在異地寄居作客﹐
ContentEN: When the last goodbye is spoken,

ContentCN: 雖受窘困仍歡暢﹐
ContentEN: And the tear-stains wiped away,

ContentCN: 因我不久必到更美的天城﹔
ContentEN: And our eyes shall catch a glimpse of glory fair,

ContentCN: 親朋雖以世俗為上﹐
ContentEN: Then with bounding hearts we'll meet Him

ContentCN: 但我天天的仰望﹐
ContentEN: Who hath washed our sins away,

ContentCN: 乃在新耶路撒冷。
ContentEN: In the new Jerusalem.

ContentCN: 正當聖徒大隊回家﹐
ContentEN: There'll be singing, there'll be shouting,

ContentCN: 有人歡呼﹐有吟詩﹐
ContentEN: When the saints come marching home,

ContentCN: 新耶路撒冷﹐新耶路撒冷﹔
ContentEN: In Jerusalem, in Jerusalem;

ContentCN: 手拿棕枝﹐唱和散那﹐
ContentEN: Waving palms with loud hosannas,

ContentCN: 正是大君登基時﹐
ContentEN: As the King shall take His throne,

ContentCN: 在於新耶路撒冷。
ContentEN: In the new Jerusalem.

ContentCN: 我今鬥拳不是打空﹐
ContentEN: When we join the ransomed army

ContentCN: 奔跑不是無定向﹐
ContentEN: In the summerland above,

ContentCN: 乃是愛神更深追求神見證﹔
ContentEN: And the face of our dear Saviour we behold,

ContentCN: 忘記背後﹐努力面前﹐
ContentEN: We will sing and shout forever

ContentCN: 向著標竿直奔跑﹐
ContentEN: And we'll grow in perfect love,

ContentCN: 要到新耶路撒冷。
ContentEN: In the new Jerusalem.

ContentCN: 正當聖徒大隊回家﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 有人歡呼﹐有吟詩﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentEN: NULL

ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 在於新耶路撒冷。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 當我最後告別之後﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 淚痕也都擦乾淨﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我心更要跳動﹐我不能再等﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我邊吟詩﹐我邊歡呼﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我要與主同高興﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 在於新耶路撒冷。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 向前直往錫安，美麗又美麗的錫安；
ContentEN: We're marching to Zion, beautiful, beautiful Zion;

ContentCN: 眾聖昂首齊奔錫安，直奔神美麗的聖城。
ContentEN: We're marching upward to Zion, the beautiful city of God.

ContentCN: 愛主的人都來，將你喜樂敞開；
ContentEN: Come, we that love the Lord, and let our joys be known;

ContentCN: 甘甜唱著主的奇愛，甘甜唱著主的奇愛，
ContentEN: Join in a song with sweet accord, join in a song with sweet accord,

ContentCN: 同到寶座前來，同到寶座前來！
ContentEN: And thus surround the throne, and thus surround the throne.

ContentCN: 向前直往錫安，美麗又美麗的錫安；
ContentEN: We're marching to Zion, beautiful, beautiful Zion;

ContentCN: 眾聖昂首齊奔錫安，直奔神美麗的聖城。
ContentEN: We're marching upward to Zion, the beautiful city of God.

ContentCN: 未識主名的人，讓他緘默無聲；
ContentEN: Let those refuse to sing who never knew our God;

ContentCN: 我們屬天君王兒女，我們屬天君王兒女，
ContentEN: But children of the heav'nly king, but children of the heav'nly king,

ContentCN: 應當喜樂歡騰，應當喜樂歡騰。
ContentEN: May speak their joys abroad, may speak their joys abroad.

ContentCN: 向前直往錫安，美麗又美麗的錫安；
ContentEN: We're marching to Zion, beautiful, beautiful Zion;

ContentCN: 眾聖昂首齊奔錫安，直奔神美麗的聖城。
ContentEN: We're marching upward to Zion, the beautiful city of God.

ContentCN: 未入榮耀之城，未履精金之街，
ContentEN: The hill of Zion yields a thousand sacred sweets,

ContentCN: 郇山佳果甜美豐盈，郇山佳果甜美豐盈，
ContentEN: Before we reach the heav'nly fields, before we reach the heav'nly fields,

ContentCN: 豫嘗何等喜悅，豫嘗何等喜悅。
ContentEN: Or walk the golden streets, or walk the golden streets.

ContentCN: 向前直往錫安，美麗又美麗的錫安；
ContentEN: We're marching to Zion, beautiful, beautiful Zion;

ContentCN: 眾聖昂首齊奔錫安，直奔神美麗的聖城。
ContentEN: We're marching upward to Zion, the beautiful city of God.

ContentCN: 故當高聲歌唱，忘記所有憂傷；
ContentEN: Then let our songs abound and every tear be dry;

ContentCN: 經過以馬內利境界，經過以馬內利境界，
ContentEN: We're marching through Emmanuel's ground, we're marching through Emmanuel's ground,

ContentCN: 直達更高天鄉，直達更高天鄉。
ContentEN: To fairer worlds on high, to fairer worlds on high.

ContentCN: 當我們都回天家，那是何等歡喜相聚之日！
ContentEN: When we all get to heaven, what a day of rejoicing that will be!

ContentCN: 我們要面見祂，並要高唱得勝新詩。
ContentEN: When we all see Jesus, we'll sing and shout the victory.

ContentCN: 歌頌耶穌奇妙大愛，讚祂憐憫與恩待；
ContentEN: Sing the wondrous love of Jesus, sing His mercy and His grace;

ContentCN: 何等居所光明、榮美，祂已為我們豫備。
ContentEN: In the mansions bright and blessed He'll prepare for us a place.

ContentCN: 當我們都回天家，那是何等歡喜相聚之日！
ContentEN: When we all get to heaven, what a day of rejoicing that will be!

ContentCN: 我們要面見祂，並要高唱得勝新詩。
ContentEN: When we all see Jesus, we'll sing and shout the victory.

ContentCN: 我今行走客旅路途，烏雲常瀰漫四佈；
ContentEN: While we walk the pilgrim pathway clouds will overspread the sky;

ContentCN: 有日當我旅程完畢，再無陰影與歎息。
ContentEN: But when trav'ling days are over, not a shadow, not a sigh.

ContentCN: 當我們都回天家，那是何等歡喜相聚之日！
ContentEN: When we all get to heaven, what a day of rejoicing that will be!

ContentCN: 我們要面見祂，並要高唱得勝新詩。
ContentEN: When we all see Jesus, we'll sing and shout the victory.

ContentCN: 我們今當忠誠、真摯，每日交託，勤服事；
ContentEN: Let us then be true and faithful, trusting, serving every day;

ContentCN: 只要那日榮面一瞥，所有辛酸得慰藉。
ContentEN: Just one glimpse of Him in glory will the toils of life repay.

ContentCN: 當我們都回天家，那是何等歡喜相聚之日！
ContentEN: When we all get to heaven, what a day of rejoicing that will be!

ContentCN: 我們要面見祂，並要高唱得勝新詩。
ContentEN: When we all see Jesus, we'll sing and shout the victory.

ContentCN: 恩賞不遠，努力向前！祂的榮面快望見；
ContentEN: Onward to the prize before us! Soon His beauty we'll behold;

ContentCN: 不久天城珠門將開，我們逍遙黃金街。
ContentEN: Soon the pearly gates will open, we shall tread the streets of gold.

ContentCN: 我認識祂！我認識祂！
ContentEN: I shall know Him, I shall know Him,

ContentCN: 當我得贖站在祂身邊；
ContentEN: And redeemed by His side I shall stand,

ContentCN: 我認識祂！我認識祂！
ContentEN: I shall know Him, I shall know Him,

ContentCN: 因祂手上有釘痕可見。
ContentEN: By the print of the nails in His hand.

ContentCN: 當我人生工作畢，要從漲潮橫渡過，
ContentEN: When my life work is ended, And I cross the swelling tide,

ContentCN: 離開所有試探、煩惱和火煉；
ContentEN: When the bright and glorious morning I shall see;

ContentCN: 當我一登彼岸時，我必認識我救主；
ContentEN: I shall know my Redeemer when I reach the other side,

ContentCN: 首先歡迎我的就是祂笑臉。
ContentEN: And His smile will be the first to welcome me.

ContentCN: 我認識祂！我認識祂！
ContentEN: I shall know Him, I shall know Him,

ContentCN: 當我得贖站在祂身邊；
ContentEN: And redeemed by His side I shall stand,

ContentCN: 我認識祂！我認識祂！
ContentEN: I shall know Him, I shall know Him,

ContentCN: 因祂手上有釘痕可見。
ContentEN: By the print of the nails in His hand.

ContentCN: 我心要如何震動，當我見祂久慕臉，
ContentEN: Oh, the soul-thrilling rapture when I view His blessed face,

ContentCN: 和祂慈愛發亮眼睛的光輝；
ContentEN: And the luster of His kindly beaming eye;

ContentCN: 我心要如何讚美祂的憐憫和恩典，
ContentEN: How my full heart will praise Him for the mercy, love, and grace,

ContentCN: 這樣為我預備永遠的歡樂。
ContentEN: That prepare for me a mansion in the sky.

ContentCN: 我認識祂！我認識祂！
ContentEN: I shall know Him, I shall know Him,

ContentCN: 當我得贖站在祂身邊；
ContentEN: And redeemed by His side I shall stand,

ContentCN: 我認識祂！我認識祂！
ContentEN: I shall know Him, I shall know Him,

ContentCN: 因祂手上有釘痕可見。
ContentEN: By the print of the nails in His hand.

ContentCN: 我回憶多少親人，曾在河邊悲離別，
ContentEN: Oh, the dear ones in glory, how they beckon me to come,

ContentCN: 現今他們向我招手去會晤，
ContentEN: And our parting at the river I recall;

ContentCN: 在那伊甸美麗谷，並要歌唱來迎接；
ContentEN: To the sweet vales of Eden they will sing my welcome home;

ContentCN: 但我第一羨慕是見我救主。
ContentEN: But I long to meet my Savior first of all.

ContentCN: 我認識祂！我認識祂！
ContentEN: I shall know Him, I shall know Him,

ContentCN: 當我得贖站在祂身邊；
ContentEN: And redeemed by His side I shall stand,

ContentCN: 我認識祂！我認識祂！
ContentEN: I shall know Him, I shall know Him,

ContentCN: 因祂手上有釘痕可見。
ContentEN: By the print of the nails in His hand.

ContentCN: 當我進永遠門戶，身穿光明潔白衣，
ContentEN: Thro' the gates to the city in a robe of spotless white,

ContentCN: 祂領我到永無眼淚的住處；
ContentEN: He will lead me where no tears will ever fall;

ContentCN: 與蒙愛者同歡唱，喜樂歌聲無窮盡，
ContentEN: In the glad song of ages I shall mingle with delight;

ContentCN: 但我第一羨慕是見我救主。
ContentEN: But I long to meet my Savior first of all.

ContentCN: 華美天庭—祂甘願離開﹐到此痛苦世間﹔
ContentEN: Out of the ivory palaces, into a world of woe.

ContentEN: Its fragrance reached to this heart of mine, with joy my being thrills.

ContentCN: 前去！我們口號！同聲並同步；
ContentEN: Forward! Be our watchword, steps and voices joined!

ContentCN: 向著標竿直跑，永不回頭顧。
ContentEN: Seek the things before us, not a look behind;

ContentCN: 隊前有柱如火，照明我的面；
ContentEN: Burns the fiery pillar at our army's head,

ContentCN: 耶和華在領率，誰敢想不前？
ContentEN: Who shall dream of shrinking, by our Captain led?

ContentCN: 前去！經過曠野，痛苦和試探；
ContentEN: Forward thro' the desert, Thro' the toil and fight;

ContentCN: 約但在此可越，明處是錫安。
ContentEN: Canaan lies before us, Zion beams with light.

ContentCN: 榮耀又加榮耀，我神已豫備；
ContentEN: Glories upon glories hath our God prepared,

ContentCN: 凡愛神者必要有日同在內：
ContentEN: By the souls that love Him one day to be shared;

ContentCN: 眼睛未曾看見，耳朵未曾聞，
ContentEN: Eye hath not beheld them; ear hath never heard;

ContentCN: 榮耀達到極點，思想未曾問。
ContentEN: Nor of these hath uttered thought or speech a word;

ContentCN: 前去！一直前進！直到光明天，
ContentEN: Forward, ever forward, where the heaven is bright;

ContentCN: 直到幔子不禁，信心變眼見。
ContentEN: Till the veil be lifted, till our faith be sight.

ContentCN: 遠在前面天涯，有城正昂聳；
ContentEN: Far o'er yon horizon rise the city towers,

ContentCN: 那是我們的家，神住的靈宮：
ContentEN: Where our God abideth; that fair home is ours,

ContentCN: 黃金街中四射，寶石牆上閃，
ContentEN: Flash the streets with jasper, shine the gates with gold!

ContentCN: 使人喜樂的河流出喜樂滿。
ContentEN: Flows the gladd'ning river, shedding joys untold;

ContentCN: 向彼，前去，向彼，靠聖靈能力；
ContentEN: Thither, onward thither, in the Spirit's might,

ContentCN: 旅客前去樂地，前去樂無極。
ContentEN: Pilgrims, to your country, forward into light.

ContentCN: 哦，這就是我的榮耀，
ContentEN: O that will be glory for me,

ContentCN: 我的榮耀，我的榮耀；
ContentEN: Glory for me, glory for me;

ContentCN: 靠祂恩典我得見祂榮面，
ContentEN: When by His grace I shall look on His face,

ContentCN: 這就是榮耀，是我的榮耀。
ContentEN: That will be glory, be glory for me.

ContentCN: 當我歇下我工作與試煉，
ContentEN: When all my labors and trials are o'er,

ContentCN: 當我安抵美麗河岸對面，
ContentEN: And I am safe on that beautiful shore,

ContentCN: 只要我能靠近愛主身邊，
ContentEN: Just to be near the dear Lord I adore

ContentCN: 這就永遠成為我的榮耀。
ContentEN: Will thro' the ages be glory for me.

ContentCN: 哦，這就是我的榮耀，
ContentEN: O that will be glory for me,

ContentCN: 我的榮耀，我的榮耀；
ContentEN: Glory for me, glory for me;

ContentCN: 靠祂恩典我得見祂榮面，
ContentEN: When by His grace I shall look on His face,

ContentCN: 這就是榮耀，是我的榮耀。
ContentEN: That will be glory, be glory for me.

ContentCN: 當我蒙祂無限恩典賜予，
ContentEN: When by the gift of His infinite grace,

ContentCN: 得以在天上同主永安居，
ContentEN: I am accorded in heaven a place,

ContentCN: 只要能在那裏與主相遇，
ContentEN: Just to be there and to look on His face

ContentCN: 這就永遠成為我的榮耀。
ContentEN: Will through the ages be glory for me.

ContentCN: 哦，這就是我的榮耀，
ContentEN: O that will be glory for me,

ContentCN: 我的榮耀，我的榮耀；
ContentEN: Glory for me, glory for me;

ContentCN: 靠祂恩典我得見祂榮面，
ContentEN: When by His grace I shall look on His face,

ContentCN: 這就是榮耀，是我的榮耀。
ContentEN: That will be glory, be glory for me.

ContentCN: 當我會見曾久別的親友，
ContentEN: Friends will be there I have loved long ago;

ContentCN: 喜樂如江河必繞我湧流，
ContentEN: Joy like a river around me will flow;

ContentCN: 只要救主笑臉向我一露，
ContentEN: Yet, just a smile form my Savior, I know,

ContentCN: 這就永遠成為我的榮耀。
ContentEN: Will through the ages be glory for me.

ContentCN: 再不久﹐再不久﹐
ContentEN: In the sweet by-and-by,

ContentCN: 將會晤眾聖徒於美地﹔
ContentEN: We shall meet on that beautiful shore;

ContentCN: 再不久﹐再不久﹐
ContentEN: In the sweet by-and-by,

ContentCN: 將會晤眾聖徒於美地。
ContentEN: We shall meet on that beautiful shore.

ContentCN: 有一地比正午更光明﹐
ContentEN: There's a land that is fairer than day,

ContentCN: 路遙遙我因信常望見﹐
ContentEN: And by faith we can see it afar,

ContentCN: 我天父久已在那邊等﹐
ContentEN: For the Father waits over the way,

ContentCN: 主為我備居所於裏面。
ContentEN: To prepare us a dwelling place there.

ContentCN: 再不久﹐再不久﹐
ContentEN: In the sweet by-and-by,

ContentCN: 將會晤眾聖徒於美地﹔
ContentEN: We shall meet on that beautiful shore;

ContentCN: 再不久﹐再不久﹐
ContentEN: In the sweet by-and-by,

ContentCN: 將會晤眾聖徒於美地。
ContentEN: We shall meet on that beautiful shore.

ContentCN: 到美地﹐同唱詩﹐同讚頌﹐
ContentEN: We shall sing on that beautiful shore

ContentCN: 眾聖徒心喜樂何久長﹔
ContentEN: The melodious songs of the blest,

ContentCN: 得安息﹐享永生﹐常交通﹐
ContentEN: And our spirits shall sorrow no more,

ContentCN: 無懼怕﹐無憂愁﹐無悲傷。
ContentEN: Not a sigh for the blessing of rest.

ContentCN: 再不久﹐再不久﹐
ContentEN: In the sweet by-and-by,

ContentCN: 將會晤眾聖徒於美地﹔
ContentEN: We shall meet on that beautiful shore;

ContentCN: 再不久﹐再不久﹐
ContentEN: In the sweet by-and-by,

ContentCN: 將會晤眾聖徒於美地。
ContentEN: We shall meet on that beautiful shore.

ContentCN: 再不久﹐同聚集來唱詩﹐
ContentEN: To our bountiful Father above

ContentCN: 同讚頌我聖父奇妙愛﹔
ContentEN: We will offer our tribute of praise,

ContentCN: 賜獨子來世界受苦死﹐
ContentEN: For the glorious gift of His love,

ContentCN: 使罪人能得救至萬代。
ContentEN: And the blessings that hallow our days.

ContentCN: 哦，主，撒冷是祢所建設，來賜給世上所有蒙恩的罪人；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 一切蒙血救贖，洗得潔淨者，祢都賜給權柄可入她的門。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 光是她榮耀已足使我羨慕，何況我主祢是住在她中間；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 怎不叫我被吸引注目遠處，就是不見天時，也在想著天。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 哦，主，當我每想到撒冷，我就切切想要看見祢的容顏；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我心盼望我能早日被提升，好使我能早日倚傍祢身邊。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我心真羨慕能早日到新地，能同所有愛祢的人來愛祢；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 時常歌頌祢的愛無邊無極，時常記念祢愛捨己的蹤跡。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 哦，主，我所歡喜和羨慕，不是紅石綠寶，也非碧玉精金；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我所想念乃是祢，愛我的主！祢是何等可愛，何等傾我心！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我求祢早日成全我的心願，提接我到祢前，不再有別離；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 好叫我與祢同住直到永遠，常能看見祢，也常能聽見祢。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 天堂是愛，是光，又是詩，因為有祢在內作中心，並獎賞；
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 因為有祢自己和祢的丰姿，纔使天堂對我能成為天堂！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 因為有了祢，萬物纔得更新，歎息纔成過去，眼淚纔會乾，
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我心纔會滿了安息與歡欣，主阿，為何祢不早日降郇山？
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 家！家！甘美家！
ContentEN: Home! Home! Home, sweet home!

ContentCN: 主耶穌在家等，要歡迎我們！
ContentEN: A welcome from Jesus awaits us at home.

ContentCN: 他等候一座城，卻住在帳棚，
ContentEN: He looked for a city and lived in a tent,

ContentCN: 這天城的旅客，一直奔前程；
ContentEN: A pilgrim to glory right onward he went;

ContentCN: 他有美好證據，前途實堪誇，
ContentEN: God's promise his solace, so royal his birth,

ContentCN: 難怪他不尋求地上的榮華。
ContentEN: No wonder he sought not the glories of earth.

ContentCN: 家！家！甘美家！
ContentEN: Home! Home! Home, sweet home!

ContentCN: 主耶穌在家等，要歡迎我們！
ContentEN: A welcome from Jesus awaits us at home.

ContentCN: 他等候一座城，他神的住處，
ContentEN: He looked for a city his God should prepare,

ContentCN: 他沒有，也不求地上的房屋；
ContentEN: No mansion on earth could he covet or share.

ContentCN: 因神豈非說過，屬天的家鄉，
ContentEN: For had not God told him that royal abode

ContentCN: 是那不離正道旅客所安享。
ContentEN: Awaited His pilgrims on ending the road.

ContentCN: 家！家！甘美家！
ContentEN: Home! Home! Home, sweet home!

ContentCN: 主耶穌在家等，要歡迎我們！
ContentEN: A welcome from Jesus awaits us at home.

ContentCN: 他等候一座城，雖然有時因
ContentEN: He looked for a city; if sometimes he sighed

ContentCN: 跋涉苦，喪失多，有歎息聲音；
ContentEN: To be trudging the road, all earth's glory denied,

ContentCN: 但一想到那城，就引聲歌唱，
ContentEN: The thought of that city changed sighing to song,

ContentCN: 因為路雖崎嶇，必定不會長。
ContentEN: For the road might be rough, but it could not be long.

ContentCN: 家！家！甘美家！
ContentEN: Home! Home! Home, sweet home!

ContentCN: 主耶穌在家等，要歡迎我們！
ContentEN: A welcome from Jesus awaits us at home.

ContentCN: 他等候一座城，我們今亦然：
ContentEN: He looked for a city; his goal, Lord, we share;

ContentCN: 望能在祢城中，同祢永為伴，
ContentEN: And know that bright city which Thou dost prepare

ContentCN: 享受祢的豫備；因此也願意
ContentEN: Is ever our portion, since willing to be

ContentCN: 以帳棚為寄廬，同祢客此地。
ContentEN: Just pilgrims with Jesus, our roof a tent tree.

ContentCN: 禱告乃是靈中所燒聖香﹐
ContentEN: Prayer is the incense of a holy heart

ContentCN: 經過破碎之人向神獻上﹔
ContentEN: Rising to God from bruised and broken things,

ContentCN: 乃是由焚燒之靈所點燃﹐
ContentEN: When kindled by the Spirit's burning breath

ContentCN: 並藉信心之翼升到神前。
ContentEN: And upward borne by faith's ascending wings.

ContentCN: 禱告乃是恩典芳香所播﹐
ContentEN: Prayer is the perfume of the plants of grace,

ContentCN: 信心、愛心、苦難澆灌花朵﹔
ContentEN: The flow'rs of patience, faith, and suff'ring love;

ContentCN: 藏在滿了香氣玉瓶裏面﹐
ContentEN: Treasured in "vials full of odors sweet,"

ContentCN: 給神吸入﹐欣賞其味之甜。
ContentEN: God breathes their fragrance in His courts above.

ContentCN: 禱告乃是上升含水之氣﹐
ContentEN: Prayer is th' ascending vapor which supplies

ContentCN: 供給甘雨﹐並使河流不息﹔
ContentEN: The showers of blessing, and the stream that flows

ContentCN: 灌溉乾地﹐直到地的四方﹐
ContentEN: Through earth's dry places, till on every side

ContentCN: 所有沙漠都像玫瑰開放。
ContentEN: The wilderness shall blossom as the rose.

ContentCN: 禱告乃是聖靈所滿金管﹐
ContentEN: Prayer is the golden pipes the Spirit fills,

ContentCN: 用神的油供給神的燈盞﹔
ContentEN: Which feed the lamps of God with oil divine,

ContentCN: 正當我們同心等候、禱告﹐
ContentEN: And, as with one accord we wait and pray,

ContentCN: 靈就充滿﹐燈就發光照耀。
ContentEN: The Spirit fills, the lamps with brightness shine.

ContentCN: 禱告乃是宇宙最大力量﹐
ContentEN: Prayer is the mightiest force of earth and heav'n,

ContentCN: 乃是神的炸藥﹐無何能擋﹔
ContentEN: Prayer is the very dynamite of God;

ContentCN: 推動那隻推動一切之手﹐
ContentEN: It moves the hand that all things moves, and turns

ContentCN: 轉動活輪﹐掠過全地無留。
ContentEN: The living wheels that sweep through earth abroad.

ContentCN: 教我禱告﹗運行在我靈中﹐
ContentEN: Teach us to pray! Move on our hearts, O Lord,

ContentCN: 直到全人被祢感覺推動﹗
ContentEN: Till Thine own passions all our being move!

ContentCN: 在我裏面禱告﹐直到顯出
ContentEN: Teach us! Pray in us, till our prayer shall be

ContentCN: 我裏基督禱告天上基督。
ContentEN: Christ in us praying to the Christ above!

ContentCN: 住在主裏面，主住我裏，
ContentEN: Living in Thee, Lord, and Thou in me,

ContentCN: 不斷的同住，我心所祈；
ContentEN: Constant abiding, this is my plea;

ContentCN: 無論與主或與人相處，
ContentEN: Grant me Thy power, boundless and free,

ContentCN: 使我得能力，無限豐富。
ContentEN: Power with men and power with Thee.

ContentCN: 教我禱告，主，教我禱告，
ContentEN: Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray;

ContentCN: 這是我逐日迫切呼求；
ContentEN: This is my heart cry day unto day;

ContentCN: 渴望能知你意與道路，
ContentEN: I long to know Thy will and Thy way;

ContentCN: 教我禱告，主，教我禱告。
ContentEN: Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray.

ContentCN: 住在主裏面，主住我裏，
ContentEN: Living in Thee, Lord, and Thou in me,

ContentCN: 不斷的同住，我心所祈；
ContentEN: Constant abiding, this is my plea;

ContentCN: 無論與主或與人相處，
ContentEN: Grant me Thy power, boundless and free,

ContentCN: 使我得能力，無限豐富。
ContentEN: Power with men and power with Thee.

ContentCN: 罪惡的權勢轄制此世，
ContentEN: Power in prayer, Lord, power in prayer!

ContentCN: 使我從禱告得著能力；
ContentEN: Here 'mid earth's sin and sorrow and care,

ContentCN: 眾多靈魂正沉淪失喪，
ContentEN: Men lost and dying, souls in despair;

ContentCN: 求主使我得禱告能力。
ContentEN: O give me power, power in prayer!

ContentCN: 住在主裏面，主住我裏，
ContentEN: Living in Thee, Lord, and Thou in me,

ContentCN: 不斷的同住，我心所祈；
ContentEN: Constant abiding, this is my plea;

ContentCN: 無論與主或與人相處，
ContentEN: Grant me Thy power, boundless and free,

ContentCN: 使我得能力，無限豐富。
ContentEN: Power with men and power with Thee.

ContentCN: 軟弱意志，主，祢能更新，
ContentEN: My weakened will, Lord, Thou canst renew;

ContentCN: 我罪惡天性，祢能制服；
ContentEN: My sinful nature Thou canst subdue;

ContentCN: 用祢新能力充滿我心，
ContentEN: Fill me just now with power anew;

ContentCN: 禱告或行事滿有權能。
ContentEN: Power to pray and power to do!

ContentCN: 住在主裏面，主住我裏，
ContentEN: Living in Thee, Lord, and Thou in me,

ContentCN: 不斷的同住，我心所祈；
ContentEN: Constant abiding, this is my plea;

ContentCN: 無論與主或與人相處，
ContentEN: Grant me Thy power, boundless and free,

ContentCN: 使我得能力，無限豐富。
ContentEN: Power with men and power with Thee.

ContentCN: 教我禱告，主，教我禱告，
ContentEN: Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray;

ContentCN: 逐時逐日祢是我榜樣；
ContentEN: Thou art my pattern day unto day;

ContentCN: 祢是我把握，直到永遠，
ContentEN: Thou art my surety, now and for aye;

ContentCN: 教我禱告，主，教我禱告。
ContentEN: Teach me to pray, Lord, teach me to pray.

ContentCN: 有福的良辰，有福的良辰，
ContentEN: Blessed hour of prayer, Blessed hour of prayer;

ContentCN: 困倦者得著膏抹，何等甜美之處。
ContentEN: What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

ContentCN: 是有福禱告良辰，我心謙卑俯伏；
ContentEN: 'Tis the blessed hour of prayer, when our hearts lowly bend，

ContentCN: 我們一同來親近恩友主耶穌。
ContentEN: And we gather to Jesus, our Savior and Friend;

ContentCN: 既憑信心到主前，就享主的眷顧；
ContentEN: If we come to Him in faith, His protection to share,

ContentCN: 困倦如我得膏抹，何等甜美之處。
ContentEN: What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

ContentCN: 有福的良辰，有福的良辰，
ContentEN: Blessed hour of prayer, Blessed hour of prayer;

ContentCN: 困倦者得著膏抹，何等甜美之處。
ContentEN: What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

ContentCN: 是有福禱告良辰，主來親密相交；
ContentEN: 'Tis the blessed hour of prayer, when the Savior draws near,

ContentCN: 滿帶慈愛與憐憫，傾聽我禱告。
ContentEN: With a tender compassion His children to hear;

ContentCN: 祂命我可將重負在祂腳前卸除，
ContentEN: When He tells us we may cast at His feet every care,

ContentCN: 壓傷如我得膏抹，何等甜美之處。
ContentEN: What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

ContentCN: 有福的良辰，有福的良辰，
ContentEN: Blessed hour of prayer, Blessed hour of prayer;

ContentCN: 困倦者得著膏抹，何等甜美之處。
ContentEN: What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

ContentCN: 是有福禱告良辰，愛主親來安撫；
ContentEN: 'Tis the blessed hour of prayer, when the tempted and tried

ContentCN: 凡被試煉重壓者，可向祂投訴。
ContentEN: To the Savior who loves them their sorrow confide;

ContentCN: 惟有祂能表同情，撫慰每一痛楚；
ContentEN: With a sympathizing heart He removes every care,

ContentCN: 傷痛如我得膏抹，何等甜美之處。
ContentEN: What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

ContentCN: 有福的良辰，有福的良辰，
ContentEN: Blessed hour of prayer, Blessed hour of prayer;

ContentCN: 困倦者得著膏抹，何等甜美之處。
ContentEN: What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

ContentCN: 是有福禱告良辰，憑信仰望恩主；
ContentEN: At the blessed hour of prayer, trusting Him we believe

ContentCN: 深知所需主供應，恩惠必豐足。
ContentEN: That the blessings we're needing we'll surely receive;

ContentCN: 主的應許極穩固，我不動搖躊躇；
ContentEN: In the fullness of this trust we shall lose every care;

ContentCN: 缺乏如我得膏抹，何等甜美之處。
ContentEN: What a balm for the weary! O how sweet to be there!

ContentCN: 每一禱告都有答應﹐
ContentEN: Ev'ry pray'r will find its answer,

ContentCN: 因主應許不落空﹔
ContentEN: For the word of God is sure;

ContentCN: 天地縱然都會變更﹐
ContentEN: Suns may fade and worlds may vanish,

ContentCN: 但主話語不搖動。
ContentEN: But His promise shall endure.

ContentCN: 每一禱告都有答應﹐
ContentEN: Ev'ry pray'r will find its answer,

ContentCN: 所以信心要堅定﹔
ContentEN: Ev'ry earnest, trusting plea;

ContentCN: 你只祈求﹐主必垂聽﹐
ContentEN: Pray, and know that God is faithful,

ContentCN: 縱然天地會變更。
ContentEN: Tho' the world unfaithful be!

ContentCN: 每一禱告都有答應﹐
ContentEN: Ev'ry pray'r will find its answer,

ContentCN: 因主應許不落空﹔
ContentEN: For the word of God is sure;

ContentCN: 天地縱然都會變更﹐
ContentEN: Suns may fade and worlds may vanish,

ContentCN: 但主話語不搖動。
ContentEN: But His promise shall endure.

ContentCN: 救主曾經如此應許﹕
ContentEN: He has promised, "Whatsoever

ContentCN: 凡是祈求就得著；
ContentEN: Ye shall ask, ye shall receive;"

ContentCN: 主的應許不能廢去，
ContentEN: Naught shall fail of blest fulfillment,

ContentCN: 只要相信不疑惑。
ContentEN: If we steadfastly believe.

ContentCN: 每一禱告都有答應﹐
ContentEN: Ev'ry pray'r will find its answer,

ContentCN: 因主應許不落空﹔
ContentEN: For the word of God is sure;

ContentCN: 天地縱然都會變更﹐
ContentEN: Suns may fade and worlds may vanish,

ContentCN: 但主話語不搖動。
ContentEN: But His promise shall endure.

ContentCN: 每一禱告都有答應，
ContentEN: Ev'ry pray'r will find its answer,

ContentCN: 雖然答應有早晚；
ContentEN: Tho' it be in distant years;

ContentCN: 也許經過許多曲徑，
ContentEN: Past our earthly time of testing,

ContentCN: 經過長時的試煉。
ContentEN: Past our pleading and our tears.

ContentCN: 每一禱告都有答應﹐
ContentEN: Ev'ry pray'r will find its answer,

ContentCN: 因主應許不落空﹔
ContentEN: For the word of God is sure;

ContentCN: 天地縱然都會變更﹐
ContentEN: Suns may fade and worlds may vanish,

ContentCN: 但主話語不搖動。
ContentEN: But His promise shall endure.

ContentCN: 所以當憑信心祈求，
ContentEN: Ev'ry pray'r will find its answer,

ContentCN: 充滿盼望和感讚；
ContentEN: Let us cling with hope sublime;

ContentCN: 直等時間到了盡頭，
ContentEN: To the promise everlasting,

ContentCN: 看見應許得成全。
ContentEN: Reaching past the bounds of time.

ContentCN: 憑信心求，奉主的名，
ContentEN: Ask in faith, in Jesus' dear Name,

ContentCN: 施恩座前來禱告；
ContentEN: Bring your pleas before the throne;

ContentCN: 你若相信，聽主答應：
ContentEN: As you trust, the Lord will whisper,

ContentCN: 看哪，小子，已成了。
ContentEN: See, my child, the work is done.

ContentCN: 憑信心求，神要成就
ContentEN: Ask in faith, God waits to answer

ContentCN: 聖靈組織的禱告；
ContentEN: Each petition, Spirit-wrought;

ContentCN: 祂必施行奇妙拯救，
ContentEN: He will work in wondrous power,

ContentCN: 遠超過你所意料。
ContentEN: Far beyond your highest thought.

ContentCN: 憑信心求，纔是禱告，
ContentEN: Ask in faith, 'tis just the asking,

ContentCN: 因信，你就敢站牢；
ContentEN: In a faith that dares to stand

ContentCN: 滿有平安、盼望、歡笑，
ContentEN: Full of joyful expectation,

ContentCN: 高張兩手向神要。
ContentEN: With an open, outstretched hand.

ContentCN: 憑信心求，神正等你
ContentEN: Ask in faith, for God is waiting

ContentCN: 能憑信心來求懇，
ContentEN: For thy faith-filled, earnest prayer,

ContentCN: 因為信心隨時隨地
ContentEN: Faith delights Him, faith can touch Him,

ContentCN: 得神喜悅摸著神。
ContentEN: Every moment, everywhere.

ContentCN: 主﹐我們願學祢低微﹐因這裡有安息。
ContentEN: And all our rest and pleasure find in learning, Lord, of Thee.

ContentCN: 何等朋友﹐我主耶穌﹗擔我罪孽負我憂﹔
ContentEN: What a Friend we have in Jesus, all our sins and griefs to bear!

ContentCN: 何等權利﹐能將難處到主面前去祈求。
ContentEN: What a privilege to carry everything to God in pray'r!

ContentCN: 多少平安屢屢喪失﹐多少痛苦無須受﹔
ContentEN: Oh, what peace we often forfeit, Oh, what needless pain we bear,

ContentCN: 無非我們未將萬事到主面前去祈求。
ContentEN: All because we do not carry everything to God in pray'r!

ContentCN: 我們有否苦難、艱辛﹖有否試探和引誘﹖
ContentEN: Have we trials and temptations? Is there trouble anywhere?

ContentCN: 不能因此失望、灰心﹐應當向主去祈求。
ContentEN: We should never be discouraged, take it to the Lord in pray'r.

ContentCN: 誰能像祂忠實、穩妥﹐背我重擔分我愁﹖
ContentEN: Can we find a friend so faithful who will all our sorrows share?

ContentCN: 惟祂知我每一軟弱﹐故當向主去祈求。
ContentEN: Jesus knows our every weakness, take it to the Lord in pray'r.

ContentCN: 我們是否疲倦﹐苦楚、思慮、重擔壓心頭﹖
ContentEN: Are we weak and heavy-laden, cumbered with a load of care?

ContentCN: 救主仍舊是避難處﹐應當向祂去祈求。
ContentEN: Precious Savior, still our refuge — take it to the Lord in pray'r.

ContentCN: 朋友有否賣你、棄你﹖應當向主去祈求﹔
ContentEN: Do thy friends despise, forsake thee? Take it to the Lord in pray'r.

ContentCN: 祂的懷抱是你護庇﹐經祂撫慰必無憂。
ContentEN: In His arms He'll take and shield thee; thou wilt find a solace there.

ContentCN: 求主教我如何禱告﹗
ContentEN: Teach us to pray that we can cause

ContentCN: 如何使敵遁逃﹔
ContentEN: The enemy to flee,

ContentCN: 如何捆綁滅其權勢﹐
ContentEN: That we his evil pow'r may bind

ContentCN: 使眾罪囚得釋。
ContentEN: His prisoners to free.

ContentCN: 求主教我如何禱告﹗
ContentEN: Teach us to pray and firmly stand

ContentCN: 如何陣地站牢﹔
ContentEN: Upon the battleground,

ContentCN: 如何奮進攻破營壘﹐
ContentEN: To fight and break the stronghold down,

ContentCN: 立使仇敵潰退。
ContentEN: The enemy confound.

ContentCN: 求主教我如何禱告﹗
ContentEN: Teach us to pray and use Thy rod

ContentCN: 明白神的最好﹔
ContentEN: In strong, prevailing prayer,

ContentCN: 如何禱告搖動天地﹐
ContentEN: Beneath Thy blood to shake the earth

ContentCN: 得著血下權利。
ContentEN: And power of the air.

ContentCN: 因著信心﹐藉著禱告﹐
ContentEN: By prayer and faith, O may we learn

ContentCN: 學習與主同勞﹔
ContentEN: To labor, Lord, with Thee,

ContentCN: 學知萬有全屬我們﹐
ContentEN: To know the victory is ours

ContentCN: 運用得勝權柄。
ContentEN: And Thine authority.

ContentCN: 禱告之時﹐甘甜之時﹗
ContentEN: Sweet hour of prayer! Sweet hour of prayer!

ContentCN: 使我離開煩惱之事﹔
ContentEN: That calls me from a world of care,

ContentCN: 來到神的座前發表
ContentEN: And bids me at my Father's throne

ContentCN: 所有意願﹐所有需要。
ContentEN: Make all my wants and wishes known.

ContentCN: 當我遇到重壓、憂愁﹐
ContentEN: In seasons of distress and grief,

ContentCN: 我靈卻常得著自由﹔
ContentEN: My soul has often found relief

ContentCN: 不陷惡者所有佈置﹐
ContentEN: And oft escaped the tempter's snare,

ContentCN: 因為有你-禱告之時﹗
ContentEN: By thy return, sweet hour of prayer!

ContentCN: 禱告之時﹐甘甜之時﹗
ContentEN: Sweet hour of prayer! Sweet hour of prayer!

ContentCN: 如有雙翼載我願辭﹐
ContentEN: Thy wings shall my petition bear

ContentCN: 到祂寶座向祂求懇﹐
ContentEN: To Him whose truth and faithfulness

ContentCN: 祂是信實﹐祂是全真。
ContentEN: Engage the waiting soul to bless;

ContentCN: 祂既命我尋求祂面﹐
ContentEN: And since He bids me seek His face,

ContentCN: 信祂話語﹐靠祂恩典﹔
ContentEN: Believe His word, and trust His grace,

ContentCN: 我要將我重擔卸釋﹐
ContentEN: I'll cast on Him my every care,

ContentCN: 在於你前-甘甜之時﹗
ContentEN: And wait for thee, sweet hour of prayer!

ContentCN: 禱告之時﹐甘甜之時﹗
ContentEN: Sweet hour of prayer! Sweet hour of prayer!

ContentCN: 每次相逢慰我心思﹔
ContentEN: May I thy consolation share

ContentCN: 直到我在毗斯迦山﹐
ContentEN: Till, from Mount Pisgah's lofty height,

ContentCN: 發現我家極目一看﹐
ContentEN: I view my home and take my flight.

ContentCN: 脫下帳棚﹐安靜等候﹐
ContentEN: This robe of flesh I'll drop, and rise

ContentCN: 信心變見﹐盼望成就﹔
ContentEN: To seize the everlasting prize;

ContentCN: 臨行我必大聲告辭﹕
ContentEN: And shout, while passing through the air,

ContentCN: 平安、平安﹐禱告之時﹗
ContentEN: Farewell, farewell, sweet hour of prayer.

ContentCN: 當告訴耶穌﹐當告訴耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Tell it to Jesus, Tell it to Jesus,

ContentEN: He is a friend that's well known;

ContentCN: 無朋友或兄弟能像主耶穌﹐
ContentEN: You have no other such a friend or brother,

ContentCN: 單要告訴主耶穌。
ContentEN: Tell it to Jesus alone.

ContentCN: 你若疲倦﹐心靈沉悶悲歎﹐
ContentEN: Are you weary, are you heavy hearted?

ContentEN: Tell it to Jesus, tell it to Jesus;

ContentEN: Are you grieving over joys departed?

ContentEN: Tell it to Jesus, tell it to Jesus,

ContentEN: Are you anxious what shall be tomorrow?

ContentEN: You have no other such a friend or brother,

ContentEN: Tell it to Jesus alone.

ContentCN: 你若心中切切愛慕恩主﹐
ContentEN: Are you troubled at the thought of dying?

ContentCN: 當告訴耶穌﹐當告訴耶穌﹔
ContentEN: Tell it to Jesus, tell it to Jesus,

ContentCN: 你若衷心盼望基督國度﹐
ContentEN: For Christ's coming Kingdom are you sighing?

ContentEN: Tell it to Jesus alone.

ContentEN: I must tell Jesus! I must tell Jesus!

ContentEN: I cannot bear my burdens alone;

ContentEN: I must tell Jesus! I must tell Jesus!

ContentCN: 惟主能安撫﹐惟有我主。
ContentEN: Jesus can help me, Jesus alone.

ContentCN: 我所有苦況﹐要告訴耶穌﹐
ContentEN: I must tell Jesus all of my trials;

ContentCN: 我不能獨自擔此憂鬱﹔
ContentEN: I cannot bear these burdens alone;

ContentCN: 我在患難中﹐惟主能安撫﹐
ContentEN: In my distress He kindly will help me;

ContentCN: 擦去我眼淚﹐將我體恤。
ContentEN: He ever loves and cares for His own.

ContentEN: I must tell Jesus all of my troubles;

ContentCN: 我不能獨自對付遭遇﹔
ContentEN: He is a kind, compassionate Friend;

ContentCN: 我一切事務﹐惟主能擔負﹐
ContentEN: If I but ask Him, He will deliver,

ContentCN: 使我得安息﹐慰我情緒。
ContentEN: And in my griefs with me He will blend.

ContentCN: 我所有缺乏﹐要告訴耶穌﹐

ContentCN: 我不能獨自卸去憂慮﹔
ContentEN: For I cannot rid myself of care.

ContentCN: 我所有需要﹐惟主能滿足﹐
ContentEN: Jesus alone can fully satisfy,

ContentCN: 使我享豐富﹐綽綽有餘。
ContentEN: He gives me riches beyond compare.

ContentEN: Jesus can help me, Jesus alone.

ContentCN: 我所有軟弱﹐要告訴耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Tempted and tried I need a great Saviour,

ContentCN: 我不能獨自勝過私慾﹔
ContentEN: One who can help my burdens to bear;

ContentCN: 我所有捆綁﹐惟主能幫助﹐
ContentEN: I must tell Jesus, I must tell Jesus;

ContentCN: 使我得釋放﹐脫離罪律。
ContentEN: He all my cares and sorrows will share.

ContentCN: 要告訴耶穌﹗全告訴耶穌﹗
ContentEN: I must tell Jesus! I must tell Jesus!

ContentCN: 將我的心事向主傾吐﹔
ContentEN: I cannot bear my burdens alone;

ContentCN: 要告訴耶穌﹗全告訴耶穌﹗
ContentEN: I must tell Jesus! I must tell Jesus!

ContentCN: 惟主能安撫﹐惟有我主。
ContentEN: Jesus can help me, Jesus alone.

ContentCN: 我所有試探﹐要告訴耶穌﹐
ContentEN: O how the world to evil allures me!

ContentCN: 我不能獨自抵擋鬼魔﹔
ContentEN: O how my heart is tempted to sin!

ContentCN: 主所受試探﹐與我無所殊﹐
ContentEN: I must tell Jesus; He will enable

ContentCN: 惟主能救我﹐脫離兇惡。
ContentEN: Over the world the vict'ry to win.

ContentCN: 尚未蒙允?你衷心禱告祈求﹐
ContentEN: Unanswered yet? The prayer your lips have pleaded

ContentCN: 憂傷痛苦多年充滿心頭?
ContentEN: In agony of heart these many years?

ContentCN: 信心是否衰退﹐盼望又破滅﹐
ContentEN: Does faith begin to fail, is hope departing,

ContentCN: 多少眼淚是否盡付東流?
ContentEN: And think you all in vain those falling tears?

ContentCN: 天父並非不垂聽你祈求﹐
ContentEN: Say not the Father hath not heard your prayer;

ContentCN: 到了時候﹐所望必得成就﹐
ContentEN: You shall have your desire, sometime, somewhere,

ContentCN: 到了時候﹐所望必得成就。
ContentEN: You shall have your desire, sometime, somewhere.

ContentCN: 尚未蒙允?不要說永不蒙允﹔
ContentEN: Unanswered yet? Nay, do not say ungranted;

ContentCN: 你的本分是否為主已盡?
ContentEN: Perhaps your part is not yet wholly done;

ContentCN: 當你開始禱告﹐祂已動聖工﹐
ContentEN: The work began when first your prayer was uttered,

ContentCN: 神的工作必按時候成功﹔
ContentEN: And God will finish what He has begun.

ContentCN: 只要你將心香點得久長﹐
ContentEN: If you will keep the incense burning there;

ContentCN: 到了時候﹐必見救主榮光﹐
ContentEN: His glory you shall see, sometime, somewhere,

ContentCN: 到了時候﹐必見救主榮光。
ContentEN: His glory you shall see, sometime, somewhere.

ContentCN: 尚未蒙允?信心終必蒙垂聽﹔
ContentEN: Unanswered yet? Faith cannot be unanswered;

ContentCN: 立在磐石兩足穩固堅定﹔
ContentEN: Her feet were firmly planted on the Rock;

ContentCN: 狂風暴雨之中﹐仍勇敢禱告﹐
ContentEN: Amid the wildest storm prayer stands undaunted,

ContentCN: 雷聲雖大﹐也不動搖絲毫﹔
ContentEN: Nor quails before the loudest thunder shock;

ContentCN: 我卻不住禱告﹐轉使仇敵遁逃﹔
ContentEN: He's up to ev'ry move, And yet thro' all I prove

ContentCN: 我雖經歷黑暗、崎嶇﹐雖遇疾風、暴雨﹐
ContentEN: Tho' dark the night and clouds look black and stormy overhead,

ContentCN: 雖然試煉不斷繼續﹐前途真是可慮﹔
ContentEN: And trials of almost ev'ry kind across my path are spread;

ContentEN: How soon I conquer all, As to the Lord I call,

ContentCN: 當我軟弱、孤單、無倚﹐被人誤會撇棄﹐

ContentCN: 逐日都是歡呼歌唱﹐穩靠救主胸膛﹔
ContentEN: And march along with cheerful song, enjoying liberty;

ContentCN: 我今倚主手臂﹐我要證明到底﹕
ContentEN: With Jesus as my Friend, I'll prove until the end,

ContentCN: 只要與主說一聲﹐甚麼就都好。
ContentEN: A little talk with Jesus makes it right, all right.

ContentCN: 親愛主﹐我不能禱告﹐幻想重重圍繞﹔
ContentEN: Ah, dearest Lord, I cannot pray my fancy is not free;

ContentCN: 紛亂雜念四面群起﹐迫我心思離祢。
ContentEN: Unmannerly distractions come, and force my tho'ts from Thee.

ContentCN: 黯淡俗世忽放光明﹐當我心趨天庭﹔
ContentEN: The world that looks so dull all day glows bright on me at pray'r,

ContentCN: 計劃、方案不思而起﹐不斷向我迎逼。
ContentEN: And plans that ask no tho't but then wake up and meet me there.

ContentCN: 一切天然﹐猶如水泉﹕聲影幻夢源源﹔
ContentEN: All nature one full fountain seems of dreamy sight and sound,

ContentCN: 當我屈膝﹐更如山洪﹐爆發聲勢洶洶。
ContentEN: Which, when I kneel, breaks up its deeps, and makes a deluge round.

ContentCN: 所有肉體趁勢發動﹐易變肢體協同﹔
ContentEN: My very flesh has restless fits; my changeful limbs conspire

ContentCN: 激起心思虛幻錯覺﹐使我深處厭倦。
ContentEN: With all these phantoms of the mind my inner self to tire.

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐教我寶貝這個疲乏、沉悶時刻﹔
ContentEN: Sweet Jesus! Teach me how to prize these tedious hours when I,

ContentCN: 雖然愚昧、無助、無言﹐仍俯伏在祢前。
ContentEN: Foolish and mute before Thy Face, in helpless worship lie.

ContentCN: 因祢常來親近懷抱﹐聽我微弱禱告﹔
ContentEN: Yet Thou art oft most present, Lord! In weak distracted prayer:

ContentCN: 只要罪人願脫自己﹐必定得尋見祢。
ContentEN: A sinner out of heart with self most often finds Thee there.

ContentCN: 是否我願時刻把守我心﹐我眼﹐我口﹖
ContentEN: Had I kept stricter watch each hour o'er tongue and eye and ear,

ContentCN: 是否我願終日抑制屬己宴樂之事﹖
ContentEN: Had I but mortified all day each joy as it came near,

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐是否除祢以外我無所樂﹐所愛﹖
ContentEN: Had I, dear Lord! No pleasure found but in the thought of Thee,

ContentCN: 如此禱告必然通暢﹐必然自由釋放。
ContentEN: Prayer would have come unsought, and been a truer liberty.

ContentCN: 既是如此﹐我有何慮﹖除罪﹐我有何懼﹖
ContentEN: My Saviour! Why should I complain, and why fear aught but sin?

ContentCN: 紛亂心思雖在外侵﹐平安卻在內盈。
ContentEN: Distractions are but outward things; Thy peace dwells far within.

ContentCN: 一切反覆煩惱折磨﹐猶如海面興波﹔
ContentEN: These surface-troubles come and go, like rufflings of the sea;

ContentCN: 但心深處無能震動﹐惟主掌權其衷。
ContentEN: The deeper depth is out of reach to all, my God, but Thee.

ContentCN: 主是我永遠的福分﹐勝過朋友與生命﹔
ContentEN: Thou, my everlasting portion, more than friend or life to me,

ContentCN: 在人生孤單旅程中﹐懇求主與我同行。
ContentEN: All along my pilgrim journey, Savior, let me walk with Thee.

ContentCN: 靠近主﹐靠近主﹐靠近主﹐靠近主﹔
ContentEN: Close to Thee, close to Thee, close to Thee, close to Thee;

ContentCN: 在人生孤單旅程中﹐懇求主與我同行。
ContentEN: All along my pilgrim journey, Savior, let me walk with Thee.

ContentCN: 我不求世界的歡樂﹐也不求世界美名﹔
ContentEN: Not for ease or worldly pleasure, nor for fame my prayer shall be;

ContentCN: 我願受任何的勞苦﹐只求主與我同行。
ContentEN: Gladly will I toil and suffer, only let me walk with Thee.

ContentCN: 靠近主﹐靠近主﹐靠近主﹐靠近主﹐
ContentEN: Close to Thee, close to Thee, close to Thee, close to Thee;

ContentCN: 我願受任何的勞苦﹐只求主與我同行。
ContentEN: Gladly will I toil and suffer, only let me walk with Thee.

ContentCN: 帶領我經黑暗幽谷﹐安然渡苦海危程﹔
ContentEN: Lead me through the vale of shadows, bear me o'er life's fitful sea;

ContentCN: 當天上永生門大開﹐願與主同進天庭。
ContentEN: Then the gate of life eternal may I enter, Lord, with Thee.

ContentCN: 靠近主﹐靠近主﹐靠近主﹐靠近主﹐
ContentEN: Close to Thee, close to Thee, close to Thee, close to Thee;

ContentCN: 當天上永生門大開﹐願與主同進天庭。
ContentEN: Then the gate of life eternal may I enter, Lord, with Thee.

ContentCN: 你們尋求﹐若專心尋求我﹐	If with all your hearts ye truly seek me,
你們就必定尋見我。"神如此說。
ContentEN: Ye shall ever surely find me." Thus saith our God.

ContentCN: 你們尋求﹐若專心尋求我﹐	If with all your hearts ye truly seek me,
你們就必定尋見我。"神如此說。
ContentEN: Ye shall ever surely find me." Thus saith our God.

ContentCN: 你們就必定尋見我。神如此說。
ContentEN: Ye shall ever surely find me. Thus saith our God.

ContentCN: 這是我自傳﹐是我詩歌﹐
ContentEN: This is my story, this is my song,

ContentCN: 讚美我救主﹐長日不息！
ContentEN: Praising my Saviour all the day long.

ContentCN: 這是我自傳﹐是我詩歌﹐
ContentEN: This is my story, this is my song,

ContentCN: 讚美我救主﹐長日不息！
ContentEN: Praising my Saviour all the day long.

ContentCN: 耶穌是我的﹐我有把握﹐
ContentEN: Blessed assurance, Jesus is mine!

ContentCN: 這使我豫嘗榮耀生活！
ContentEN: Oh, what a foretaste of glory divine!

ContentCN: 已蒙血贖回﹐已受恩賜﹐
ContentEN: Heir of salvation, purchase of God!

ContentCN: 已由靈重生﹐作神後嗣。
ContentEN: Born of His Spirit, washed in His blood.

ContentCN: 這是我自傳﹐是我詩歌﹐
ContentEN: This is my story, this is my song,

ContentCN: 讚美我救主﹐長日不息！
ContentEN: Praising my Saviour all the day long.

ContentCN: 這是我自傳﹐是我詩歌﹐
ContentEN: This is my story, this is my song,

ContentCN: 讚美我救主﹐長日不息！
ContentEN: Praising my Saviour all the day long.

ContentCN: 一完全順服﹐完全甘甜﹐
ContentEN: Perfect submission, perfect delight,

ContentCN: 被提之景象顯在眼前﹔
ContentEN: Visions of rapture now burst on my sight;

ContentCN: 似乎有聲音從天而來﹐
ContentEN: Angels descending, bring from above

ContentCN: 纏綿說憐憫﹐耳語述愛。
ContentEN: Echoes of mercy, whispers of love.

ContentCN: 這是我自傳﹐是我詩歌﹐
ContentEN: This is my story, this is my song,

ContentCN: 讚美我救主﹐長日不息！
ContentEN: Praising my Saviour all the day long.

ContentCN: 這是我自傳﹐是我詩歌﹐
ContentEN: This is my story, this is my song,

ContentCN: 讚美我救主﹐長日不息！
ContentEN: Praising my Saviour all the day long.

ContentCN: 一完全順服﹐所有安息﹐
ContentEN: Perfect submission, all is at rest,

ContentCN: 與主能交通﹐一無祕密﹔
ContentEN: I in my Saviour am happy and blest;

ContentCN: 能儆醒等候﹐仰望主來﹐
ContentEN: Watching and waiting, looking above,

ContentCN: 飽足主好處﹐迷於主愛。
ContentEN: Filled with His goodness, lost in His love.

ContentCN: 祂是我愛在破曉清晨﹐祂是我愛在午正﹐
ContentEN: He's the one I love in the morning, He's the one I love at noon.

ContentCN: 祂是我愛在於黃昏﹐祂是我愛在深更﹔
ContentEN: He's the one at evening twilight, He's the one at midnight gloom.

ContentCN: 祂是大樹﹐我是弱籐﹐祂是窯匠﹐我泥土﹔
ContentEN: He's the oak and I'm the ivy, He's the potter, I'm the clay.

ContentCN: 我和我主有勝於友朋﹐永不可分。
ContentEN: For my Lord and me, there'll never be aparting day.

ContentCN: 我有一位好朋友﹐我是非常寶貴﹔
ContentEN: I have a Friend so precious, so very dear to me,

ContentCN: 祂是愛我如此溫柔﹐祂愛非常甜美。
ContentEN: He loves me with such tender love, He loves so faithfully;

ContentCN: 我不能活無祂之處﹐我愛祂的提握﹔
ContentEN: I could not live apart from Him, I love to feel Him nigh,

ContentCN: 所以我們就同住﹐我主與我。
ContentEN: And so we dwell together, my Lord and I.

ContentCN: 有時我幾乎臥倒﹐祂知我的軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Sometimes I'm faint and weary, He knows that I am weak,

ContentCN: 當祂叫我向祂倚靠﹐我樂受祂扶托。
ContentEN: And as He bids me lean on Him, His help I gladly seek;

ContentCN: 祂帶我走光明途徑﹐日過光明生活﹔
ContentEN: He leads me in the paths of light, beneath a sunny sky,

ContentCN: 所以我們就同行﹐我主與我。
ContentEN: And so we walk together, my Lord and I.

ContentCN: 祂知我愛祂幾多﹐祂知我愛淺深﹔
ContentEN: He knows how much I love Him, He knows I love Him well;

ContentCN: 但祂是用何愛愛我﹐我永不能說清。
ContentEN: But with what love He loveth me my tongue can never tell;

ContentCN: 乃是一愛永遠不衰﹐越過越像熱火﹔
ContentEN: It is an everlasting love in ever rich supply,

ContentCN: 所以彼此就相愛﹐我主與我。
ContentEN: And so we love each other, my Lord and I.

ContentCN: 我告祂以我痛苦﹐告祂以我歡喜﹔
ContentEN: I tell Him all my sorrows, I tell Him all my joys,

ContentCN: 我告祂以我所羨慕﹐告祂以我刺激。
ContentEN: I tell Him all that pleases me, I tell Him what annoys;

ContentCN: 祂告我以所當策勵﹐告我以所當作﹔
ContentEN: He tells me what I ought to do, He tells me how to try,

ContentCN: 我們彼此吐心意﹐我主與我。
ContentEN: And so we talk together, my Lord and I.

ContentCN: 祂知我心真羨慕能救一個靈魂﹐
ContentEN: He knows how I am longing some weary soul to win,

ContentCN: 祂就叫我為祂外出﹐去報愛的新聞﹔
ContentEN: And so He bids me go and speak the loving Word for Him;

ContentCN: 祂叫我說祂的奇愛﹐並祂受死經過﹔
ContentEN: He bids me tell His wondrous love, and why He came to die,

ContentCN: 我們如此常同在﹐我主與我。
ContentEN: And so we work together, my Lord and I.

ContentCN: 祂告我以祂國度﹐離此並不太遠﹔
ContentEN: He tells me of His Kingdom, it is not far away;

ContentCN: 祂心切望能夠儘速把我帶到那邊。
ContentEN: And oh, His heart is longing to take me there some day.

ContentCN: 無終幸福﹐喜樂在望﹐還有榮耀寶座﹔
ContentEN: Immortal bliss is waiting and joys that never die;

ContentCN: 不久我們同作王﹐我主與我。
ContentEN: Soon there we'll reign together, my Lord and I.

ContentCN: 心中渴慕著耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Longing, longing for Jesus,

ContentCN: 我心中饑渴地愛慕耶穌﹔
ContentEN: I have a longing in my heart for Him;

ContentCN: 但求接近祂﹐常與祂同在﹐
ContentEN: Just to be near Him, to feel His presence,

ContentCN: 我心中饑渴地愛慕耶穌。
ContentEN: I have a longing in my heart for Him.

ContentCN: 我心中饑渴地愛慕著耶穌﹐
ContentEN: I have a longing in my heart for Jesus,

ContentCN: 我心中饑渴地愛慕著祂﹔
ContentEN: I have a longing in my heart for Him;

ContentCN: 雖然我知道祂常在我身旁﹐
ContentEN: Although I know His presence lingers near me,

ContentCN: 我仍要渴望見著祂的面。
ContentEN: I have a longing just to see His face.

ContentCN: 心中渴慕著耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Longing, longing for Jesus,

ContentCN: 我心中饑渴地愛慕耶穌﹔
ContentEN: I have a longing in my heart for Him;

ContentCN: 但求接近祂﹐常與祂同在﹐
ContentEN: Just to be near Him, to feel His presence,

ContentCN: 我心中饑渴地愛慕耶穌。
ContentEN: I have a longing in my heart for Him.

ContentCN: 我心中渴望能夠追隨耶穌﹐
ContentEN: I have a longing just to walk with Jesus,

ContentCN: 我心中渴望祂親手提挈﹔
ContentEN: I have a longing just to hold His hand,

ContentCN: 使我感到祂親自帶領著我﹐
ContentEN: To know He's there forever near to guide me,

ContentCN: 感到祂的愛永遠不離開。
ContentEN: To know His love will never let me go.

ContentCN: 心中渴慕著耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Longing, longing for Jesus,

ContentCN: 我心中饑渴地愛慕耶穌﹔
ContentEN: I have a longing in my heart for Him;

ContentCN: 但求接近祂﹐常與祂同在﹐
ContentEN: Just to be near Him, to feel His presence,

ContentCN: 我心中饑渴地愛慕耶穌。
ContentEN: I have a longing in my heart for Him.

ContentCN: 你也許並不知道誰是耶穌﹐
ContentEN: To you who do not know this man named Jesus,

ContentCN: 你還沒享受人生的最樂﹔
ContentEN: You've never lived or found life's greatest joy;

ContentCN: 啊﹐你能否接受祂作你救主﹐
ContentEN: Oh, won't you now take Him as Lord and Saviour,

ContentCN: 領受祂豐盛無量的恩典﹖
ContentEN: And know the fullness of His matchless love?

ContentCN: 祂摸我﹐哦﹐祂摸我﹐何等喜樂滿溢我心﹗
ContentEN: He touched me, O He touched me, and O the joy that floods my soul!

ContentCN: 奇事臨我﹐我今知道﹕祂一摸﹐我得更新。
ContentEN: Something happened, and now I know He touched me and made me whole.

ContentCN: 人生重擔將我枷鎖﹐滿了罪惡和羞辱﹔
ContentEN: Shackled by a heavy burden, 'neath a load of guilt and shame

ContentCN: 耶穌今來伸手一摸﹐我就立脫舊樣和罪污。
ContentEN: Then the hand of Jesus touched me, and now I am no longer the same.

ContentCN: 祂摸我﹐哦﹐祂摸我﹐何等喜樂滿溢我心﹗
ContentEN: He touched me, O He touched me, and O the joy that floods my soul!

ContentCN: 奇事臨我﹐我今知道﹕祂一摸﹐我得更新。
ContentEN: Something happened, and now I know He touched me and made me whole.

ContentCN: 自從遇見恩主耶穌﹐得著潔淨和痊愈﹔
ContentEN: Since I met this blessed Savior, since He cleansed and made me whole,

ContentCN: 我就不住讚美歡呼﹐歡呼直到永世不稍渝。
ContentEN: I will never cease to Praise Him – I'll shout it while eternity rolls.

ContentCN: 奇妙又奇妙的耶穌﹐誰能與祢相比?
ContentEN: Wonderful, wonderful Jesus! Who can compare with Thee?

ContentCN: 奇妙又奇妙的耶穌﹐祢比一切是最華美。
ContentEN: Wonderful, wonderful Jesus! Fairer than all art Thou to me.

ContentCN: 奇妙又奇妙的耶穌﹐我心最愛慕祢﹔
ContentEN: Wonderful, wonderful Jesus! O how my heart loves Thee!

ContentCN: 華美中祢最華美﹐耶穌是最華美。
ContentEN: Fairer than all the fairest, Jesus art Thou to me.

ContentCN: 吸引我近﹐更近﹐親愛主﹐
ContentEN: Draw me nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 直至祢流血身邊﹔
ContentEN: To the cross where Thou hast died;

ContentCN: 吸引我近﹐更近﹐更近﹐親愛主﹐
ContentEN: Draw me nearer, nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 直至祢同在中間。
ContentEN: To Thy precious, bleeding side.

ContentCN: 主﹐我是屬祢﹐我聽祢宣告﹐
ContentEN: I am Thine, O Lord, I have heard Thy voice,

ContentCN: 知祢愛我的無匹﹔
ContentEN: And it told Thy love to me;

ContentCN: 但我是渴望能因信升高﹐
ContentEN: But I long to rise in the arms of faith

ContentCN: 能以和祢更親密。
ContentEN: And be closer drawn to Thee.

ContentCN: 吸引我近﹐更近﹐親愛主﹐
ContentEN: Draw me nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 直至祢流血身邊﹔
ContentEN: To the cross where Thou hast died;

ContentCN: 吸引我近﹐更近﹐更近﹐親愛主﹐
ContentEN: Draw me nearer, nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 直至祢同在中間。
ContentEN: To Thy precious, bleeding side.

ContentCN: 靠著祢恩典﹐求祢分別我﹐
ContentEN: Consecrate me now to Thy service, Lord,

ContentCN: 從此專一事奉祢﹔
ContentEN: By the pow'r of grace divine;

ContentCN: 讓我靈望祢﹐有堅定把握﹐
ContentEN: Let my soul look up with a steadfast hope,

ContentCN: 我志消失祢旨裏。
ContentEN: And my will be lost in Thine.

ContentCN: 吸引我近﹐更近﹐親愛主﹐
ContentEN: Draw me nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 直至祢流血身邊﹔
ContentEN: To the cross where Thou hast died;

ContentCN: 吸引我近﹐更近﹐更近﹐親愛主﹐
ContentEN: Draw me nearer, nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 直至祢同在中間。
ContentEN: To Thy precious, bleeding side.

ContentCN: 費時雖不多﹐喜樂已難言﹐
ContentEN: Oh, the pure delight of a single hour

ContentCN: 當我座前小逗遛﹔
ContentEN: That before Thy throne I spend,

ContentCN: 俯伏祢腳前﹐和祢面對面﹐
ContentEN: When I kneel in prayer, and with Thee, my God,

ContentCN: 交通有如人間友。
ContentEN: I commune as friend with friend!

ContentCN: 吸引我近﹐更近﹐親愛主﹐
ContentEN: Draw me nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 直至祢流血身邊﹔
ContentEN: To the cross where Thou hast died;

ContentCN: 吸引我近﹐更近﹐更近﹐親愛主﹐
ContentEN: Draw me nearer, nearer, nearer, blessed Lord,

ContentCN: 直至祢同在中間。
ContentEN: To Thy precious, bleeding side.

ContentCN: 愛有其深處﹐我不能通曉﹐
ContentEN: There are depths of love that I yet may know

ContentCN: 除非有日到那邊﹔
ContentEN: Ere Thee face to face I see;

ContentCN: 樂有其高處﹐我無法達到﹐
ContentEN: There are heights of joy that I yet may reach

ContentCN: 除非安息祢面前。
ContentEN: Ere I rest in peace with Thee.

ContentCN: 願祢逐日維持的力﹐仍然顧我軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Each day let Thy supporting might my weakness still embrace,

ContentCN: 祢的亮光除我陰翳﹐生命吞我死涸。
ContentEN: My darkness vanish in Thy light, Thy life my death efface.

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐求祢長在我心﹐祢外再無他求﹔
ContentEN: O Jesus Christ, grow Thou in me, and all things else recede,

ContentCN: 使我逐日與祢更親﹐逐日向罪自由。
ContentEN: My heart be daily nearer Thee, from sin be daily freed.

ContentCN: 願祢逐日維持的力﹐仍然顧我軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Each day let Thy supporting might my weakness still embrace,

ContentCN: 祢的亮光除我陰翳﹐生命吞我死涸。
ContentEN: My darkness vanish in Thy light, Thy life my death efface.

ContentCN: 當祢榮光照我心頭﹐所有惡念都消﹔
ContentEN: In Thy bright beams which on me fall, fade every evil thought;

ContentCN: 我是無有﹐祢是萬有﹐我願常受此教。
ContentEN: That I am nothing, Thou art all, I would be daily taught.

ContentCN: 願祢逐日維持的力﹐仍然顧我軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Each day let Thy supporting might my weakness still embrace,

ContentCN: 祢的亮光除我陰翳﹐生命吞我死涸。
ContentEN: My darkness vanish in Thy light, Thy life my death efface.

ContentCN: 祢這聖潔、榮耀的主﹐讓我更多瞻仰﹔
ContentEN: More of Thy glory let me see, thou Holy, Wise, and True.

ContentCN: 無論快樂或是艱苦﹐我願作祢活像。
ContentEN: I would Thy living image be in joy and sorrow too.

ContentCN: 願祢逐日維持的力﹐仍然顧我軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Each day let Thy supporting might my weakness still embrace,

ContentCN: 祢的亮光除我陰翳﹐生命吞我死涸。
ContentEN: My darkness vanish in Thy light, Thy life my death efface.

ContentCN: 天上喜樂﹐求祢膏我﹐靈力﹐求祢助我﹔
ContentEN: Fill me with gladness from above, hold me by strength divine;

ContentCN: 但願祢的熱切愛火﹐從我全人射過。
ContentEN: Lord, let the glow of Thy great love through all my being shine.

ContentCN: 願祢逐日維持的力﹐仍然顧我軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Each day let Thy supporting might my weakness still embrace,

ContentCN: 祢的亮光除我陰翳﹐生命吞我死涸。
ContentEN: My darkness vanish in Thy light, Thy life my death efface.

ContentCN: 可憐的己﹐願其消沈﹐惟祢作我目標﹔
ContentEN: Make this poor self grow less and less; be Thou my life and aim.

ContentCN: 使我逐日藉著祢恩﹐更配與祢相交。
ContentEN: Oh, make me daily through Thy grace more meet to bear Thy name.

ContentCN: 主阿﹐祢面我正尋求﹐不要向我隱藏﹔
ContentEN: O Lord, Thy face I am seeking, hide not Thy face from me.

ContentCN: 我心歡暢於祢同在﹐我魂向祢歌唱。
ContentEN: Let my heart rejoice in Thy presence, let my soul sing praise to Thee.

ContentCN: 向我彰顯祢的榮耀﹔引我﹐使我緊隨趨。
ContentEN: Show me Thy glory, I plead, draw me – I'll run after Thee.

ContentCN: 主阿﹐祢面我正尋求﹐不要向我隱藏。
ContentEN: O Lord, Thy face I am seeking, hide not Thy face from me!

ContentCN: 出人意外神聖平安﹐是我時刻歌頌﹔
ContentEN: Oh, peace of God that passeth thought, I daily, hourly sing;

ContentCN: 我心今居祕密泉源﹐深嘗寶貴事物。
ContentEN: My heart is at the secret source of ev'ry precious thing.

ContentCN: 我神﹐我心充滿安寧﹐我要稱謝歌頌﹗
ContentEN: My heart is resting, O my God, I will give thanks and sing;

ContentCN: 我心今居祕密泉源﹐深嘗寶貴事物。
ContentEN: My heart is at the secret source of ev'ry precious thing.

ContentCN: 出人意外神聖平安﹐是我時刻歌頌﹔
ContentEN: Oh, peace of God that passeth thought, I daily, hourly sing;

ContentCN: 我心今居祕密泉源﹐深嘗寶貴事物。
ContentEN: My heart is at the secret source of ev'ry precious thing.

ContentCN: 這個微弱受造器皿﹐惟有祢能充滿﹔
ContentEN: Now this frail vessel thou hast made no hand but Thine shall fill;

ContentCN: 飲遍一切世上佳泉﹐我仍乾渴不休。
ContentEN: The waters of the earth have failed, and I am thirsty still.

ContentCN: 出人意外神聖平安﹐是我時刻歌頌﹔
ContentEN: Oh, peace of God that passeth thought, I daily, hourly sing;

ContentCN: 我心今居祕密泉源﹐深嘗寶貴事物。
ContentEN: My heart is at the secret source of ev'ry precious thing.

ContentCN: 我所渴慕生命泉源﹐如今終日湧流﹔
ContentEN: I thirst for springs of heav'nly life, and here all day they rise;

ContentCN: 祢愛所藏一切珍寶﹐隨手即可取用。
ContentEN: I seek the treasure of Thy love, and close at hand it lies.

ContentCN: 出人意外神聖平安﹐是我時刻歌頌﹔
ContentEN: Oh, peace of God that passeth thought, I daily, hourly sing;

ContentCN: 我心今居祕密泉源﹐深嘗寶貴事物。
ContentEN: My heart is at the secret source of ev'ry precious thing.

ContentCN: 喜樂新歌今在我口﹐我所久愛曲調﹔
ContentEN: A glad, new song is in my mouth, to long loved music set,

ContentCN: 此歌讚美無窮恩典﹐至今尚未盡嘗。
ContentEN: A song of praise for all the grace I have not tasted yet.

ContentCN: 出人意外神聖平安﹐是我時刻歌頌﹔
ContentEN: Oh, peace of God that passeth thought, I daily, hourly sing;

ContentCN: 我心今居祕密泉源﹐深嘗寶貴事物。
ContentEN: My heart is at the secret source of ev'ry precious thing.

ContentCN: 我的產業令我喜樂﹐雖我猶未盡歷﹔
ContentEN: I have a heritage of joy that yet I must not see;

ContentCN: 流血的手為我持守﹐使它完全屬我。
ContentEN: The hand that bled to make it mine is keeping it for me.

ContentCN: 耶穌我主榮耀王﹐你愛何等寬廣—
ContentEN: Jesus my King of glory, Your love captures my heart,

ContentEN: From Your throne You came to earth to seek the lost,

ContentEN: Nothing between, Lord, nothing between,
