ContentEN: Let me Thy glory see, draw my soul close to Thee,

ContentCN: 然後聽祢慈言﹔
ContentEN: Then speak in love to me

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐沒有間隔。
ContentEN: Nothing between, nothing between

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐主﹐沒有間隔﹐
ContentEN: Nothing between, Lord, nothing between;

ContentCN: 但願地上翻騰不亂祢的微聲﹐
ContentEN: Let not earth's din and noise stifle Thy still small voice;

ContentCN: 我願向祢忠誠﹔
ContentEN: In it let me rejoice -

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐沒有間隔。
ContentEN: Nothing between, nothing between

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐主﹐沒有間隔
ContentEN: Nothing between, Lord, nothing between

ContentCN: 沒有世上掛慮﹐沒有屬己興趣﹐
ContentEN: Nothing of earthly care, nothing of tear or prayer,

ContentCN: 沒有掩飾空虛﹔
ContentEN: No robe that self may wear -

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐沒有間隔。
ContentEN: Nothing between, nothing between.

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐主﹐沒有間隔﹐
ContentEN: Nothing between, Lord, nothing between;

ContentCN: 當祢親近我時﹐疑惑完全消失﹐
ContentEN: Unbelief disappear, vanish each doubt and fear,

ContentCN: 恐懼也都停止﹔
ContentEN: Fading when Thou art near -

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐沒有間隔。
ContentEN: Nothing between, nothing between.

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐主﹐沒有間隔﹐
ContentEN: Nothing between, Lord, nothing between;

ContentCN: 求祢照耀輝煌﹐消滅一切邪光﹐
ContentEN: Shine with unclouded ray, chasing each mist away,

ContentCN: 作我無限心王﹔
ContentEN: O'er my whole heart bear sway -

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐沒有間隔。
ContentEN: Nothing between, nothing between

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐主﹐沒有間隔﹐
ContentEN: Nothing between, Lord, nothing between,

ContentCN: 願我如此隨祢﹐願我所見惟祢﹐
ContentEN: Thus may I walk with Thee, Thee only may I see,

ContentCN: 願我所歸惟祢﹔
ContentEN: Thine only let me be -

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐沒有間隔。
ContentEN: Nothing between, nothing between.

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐主﹐沒有間隔﹐
ContentEN: Nothing between, Lord, nothing between;

ContentCN: 直到我眼看見﹐祢的永光顯現﹐
ContentEN: Till Thine eternal light, rising on earth's dark night,

ContentCN: 沒有任何試煉﹔
ContentEN: Bursts on my open sight -

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐沒有間隔。
ContentEN: Nothing between, nothing between.

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐主﹐沒有間隔﹐
ContentEN: Nothing between, Lord, nothing between;

ContentCN: 直到此生過去﹐我不再作客旅﹐
ContentEN: Till the last conflict o'er, I stand on Canaan's shore

ContentCN: 永遠與祢同居﹔
ContentEN: With Thee for evermore

ContentCN: 沒有間隔﹐沒有間隔。
ContentEN: Nothing between, nothing between.

ContentCN: 我需要祢﹐需要祢﹐無時不需要祢﹐
ContentEN: I need Thee, oh, I need Thee; ev'ry hour I need Thee;

ContentCN: 切切求主賜能力﹗我來就祢。
ContentEN: Oh, bless me now, my Saviour! I come to Thee.

ContentCN: 我時刻需要祢﹐親愛的主﹐
ContentEN: I need Thee ev'ry hour, most gracious Lord;

ContentCN: 祢的聲音有力﹐慰我孤苦。
ContentEN: No tender voice like Thine can peace afford.

ContentCN: 我需要祢﹐需要祢﹐無時不需要祢﹐
ContentEN: I need Thee, oh, I need Thee; ev'ry hour I need Thee;

ContentCN: 切切求主賜能力﹗我來就祢。
ContentEN: Oh, bless me now, my Saviour! I come to Thee.

ContentCN: 我時刻需要祢﹐與我親近﹔
ContentEN: I need Thee every hour, stay Thou near by;

ContentCN: 試探失去能力﹐當祢來臨。
ContentEN: Temptations lose their power when Thou art nigh.

ContentCN: 我需要祢﹐需要祢﹐無時不需要祢﹐
ContentEN: I need Thee, oh, I need Thee; ev'ry hour I need Thee;

ContentCN: 切切求主賜能力﹗我來就祢。
ContentEN: Oh, bless me now, my Saviour! I come to Thee.

ContentCN: 我時刻需要祢﹐或甘或苦﹔
ContentEN: I need Thee every hour, in joy or pain,

ContentCN: 若我與祢遠離﹐時刻虛度。
ContentEN: Come quickly and abide, or life is vain.

ContentCN: 我需要祢﹐需要祢﹐無時不需要祢﹐
ContentEN: I need Thee, oh, I need Thee; ev'ry hour I need Thee;

ContentCN: 切切求主賜能力﹗我來就祢。
ContentEN: Oh, bless me now, my Saviour! I come to Thee.

ContentCN: 我時刻需要祢﹐我今懇求﹕
ContentEN: I need Thee every hour, Teach me Thy will;

ContentCN: 祢所應許福氣﹐向我成就。
ContentEN: And Thy rich promises in me fulfill.

ContentCN: 我需要祢﹐需要祢﹐無時不需要祢﹐
ContentEN: I need Thee, oh, I need Thee; ev'ry hour I need Thee;

ContentCN: 切切求主賜能力﹗我來就祢。
ContentEN: Oh, bless me now, my Saviour! I come to Thee.

ContentCN: 我時刻需要祢﹐我神我主﹐
ContentEN: I need Thee every hour, Most Holy One;

ContentCN: 從此祢我合一﹐永遠無阻。
ContentEN: Oh, make me Thine indeed, Thou blessed Son.

ContentCN: 我如困鹿切慕溪水﹐
ContentEN: As pants the hart for cooling streams

ContentCN: 裏面乾渴難言﹔
ContentEN: When heated in the chase,

ContentCN: 哦﹐神﹐我心惟祢是追﹐
ContentEN: So longs my soul, O God,

ContentCN: 並祢復甦恩典。
ContentEN: For Thee, And Thy refreshing grace.

ContentCN: 我的救主﹐我無安息﹐
ContentEN: Why restless, why cast down, my soul?

ContentCN: 我心饑渴要祢﹔
ContentEN: Trust God, who will employ

ContentCN: 祢來相親﹐歎息逃避﹐
ContentEN: His aid for thee, and change these sighs

ContentCN: 充滿無限歡喜。
ContentEN: To thankful hymns of joy.

ContentCN: 祢是我的生命力量﹐
ContentEN: For Thee, my God, the living God,

ContentCN: 也是我的光亮﹔
ContentEN: My thirsty soul doth pine;

ContentCN: 祢是糧食使我飽嘗
ContentEN: Oh, when shall I behold Thy face,

ContentCN: 祢的恩典無量。
ContentEN: Thou Majesty Divine?

ContentCN: 祢的笑臉是我拯救﹐
ContentEN: God of my strength, how long shall I,

ContentCN: 向祢﹐我久仰望﹔
ContentEN: Like one forgotten, mourn,

ContentCN: 祢的同在是我所求﹐
ContentEN: Forlorn, forsaken and exposed

ContentCN: 願祢多加恩賞。
ContentEN: To my oppressor's scorn?

ContentCN: 我如困鹿切慕溪水﹐
ContentEN: Why restless, why cast down, my soul?

ContentCN: 我心乾渴難言﹔
ContentEN: Hope still, and thou shalt sing

ContentCN: 哦﹐神﹐除祢我還有誰﹖
ContentEN: The praise of Him who is thy God,

ContentCN: 惟祢滿我所願。
ContentEN: Thy health's eternal spring.

ContentCN: 僕人的眼睛怎樣望主人的手﹐
ContentEN: As the eyes of the servants look unto the hand of their masters,

ContentCN: 使女的眼睛怎樣望主母的手﹐
ContentEN: As the eyes of the maiden look unto the hand of her mistress,

ContentCN: 我們的眼睛也照樣望我們的神﹐
ContentEN: So our eyes look upon the Lord, the Lord our God,

ContentCN: 直到祂﹐直到祂憐憫我們。
ContentEN: Until He has mercy upon us.

ContentCN: 祂與我同行﹐又和我談心﹐
ContentEN: And He walks with me, and He talks with me,

ContentCN: 輕對我說我屬於祂﹔
ContentEN: And He tells me I am His own;

ContentCN: 我與祂在一起﹐情意殷殷﹐
ContentEN: And the joy we share as we tarry there,

ContentCN: 更誰知此中歡欣﹖
ContentEN: None other has ever known.

ContentCN: 我獨自來到花園中﹐
ContentEN: I come to the garden alone,

ContentCN: 玫瑰花上露珠亮晶晶﹔
ContentEN: While the dew is still on the roses,

ContentCN: 忽有溫柔聲向我細叮嚀﹐
ContentEN: And the voice I hear, falling on my ear,

ContentCN: 原來是神子耶穌﹗
ContentEN: The Son of God discloses.

ContentCN: 祂與我同行﹐又和我談心﹐
ContentEN: And He walks with me, and He talks with me,

ContentCN: 輕對我說我屬於祂﹔
ContentEN: And He tells me I am His own;

ContentCN: 我與祂在一起﹐情意殷殷﹐
ContentEN: And the joy we share as we tarry there,

ContentCN: 更誰知此中歡欣﹖
ContentEN: None other has ever known.

ContentCN: 祂說話聲何等美妙﹐
ContentEN: He speaks and the sound of His voice

ContentCN: 眾雀鳥都寂然而恭聽﹔
ContentEN: Is so sweet the birds hush their singing,

ContentCN: 天上恩愛語﹐天上好音調﹐
ContentEN: And the melody that He gave to me,

ContentCN: 在我心輕輕鳴應。
ContentEN: Within my heart is ringing.

ContentCN: 祂與我同行﹐又和我談心﹐
ContentEN: And He walks with me, and He talks with me,

ContentCN: 輕對我說我屬於祂﹔
ContentEN: And He tells me I am His own;

ContentCN: 我與祂在一起﹐情意殷殷﹐
ContentEN: And the joy we share as we tarry there,

ContentCN: 更誰知此中歡欣﹖
ContentEN: None other has ever known.

ContentCN: 當暮色漸漸滿園林﹐
ContentEN: I'd stay in the garden with Him

ContentCN: 我還依依不忍遽離開﹔
ContentEN: Tho' the night around me be falling,

ContentCN: 主卻輕囑說﹕"此去傳好音﹐
ContentEN: But He bids me go; thro' the voice of woe,

ContentCN: 我刻刻與你同去。"
ContentEN: His voice to me is calling.

ContentCN: 主﹐我願更親近祢﹐與主相親樂無比
ContentEN: Just a closer walk with Thee, grant it, Jesus, is my plea;

ContentCN: 每日同行更親密﹐親愛主﹐求祢﹐懇求祢。
ContentEN: Daily walking close to Thee, let it be, dear Lord, let it be.

ContentCN: 我本軟弱主剛強﹐求主保守離罪網﹔
ContentEN: I am weak, but Thou art strong; Jesus keep me from all wrong;

ContentCN: 心靈滿足無憂傷﹐當我走﹐求領我近祢旁。
ContentEN: I'll be satisfied as long as I walk, let me walk close to Thee.

ContentCN: 主﹐我願更親近祢﹐與主相親樂無比
ContentEN: Just a closer walk with Thee, grant it, Jesus, is my plea;

ContentCN: 每日同行更親密﹐親愛主﹐求祢﹐懇求祢。
ContentEN: Daily walking close to Thee, let it be, dear Lord, let it be.

ContentCN: 經勞苦罪網世界﹐若我跌倒誰關懷﹖
ContentEN: Thru this world of toil and snares, if I falter, Lord, who cares?

ContentCN: 若有重擔誰分負﹖親愛主﹐惟有祢﹐我救主。
ContentEN: Who with me my burden shares? None but Thee, dear Lord, None but Thee.

ContentCN: 主﹐我願更親近祢﹐與主相親樂無比
ContentEN: Just a closer walk with Thee, grant it, Jesus, is my plea;

ContentCN: 每日同行更親密﹐親愛主﹐求祢﹐懇求祢。
ContentEN: Daily walking close to Thee, let it be, dear Lord, let it be.

ContentCN: 當我脆弱今生完﹐走盡時間入永遠﹐
ContentEN: When my feeble life is o'er, time for me will be no more:

ContentCN: 在那光明黃金岸﹐親愛主﹐我要近祢身邊。
ContentEN: On that bright eternal shore, I will walk, dear Lord, close to Thee.

ContentCN: 我靈羨慕要祢﹐在我紛擾胸臆﹔
ContentEN: My spirit longs for Thee within my troubled breast,

ContentCN: 我實不配來得如此神聖之客。
ContentEN: Though I unworthy be of so divine a Guest.

ContentCN: 如此神聖之客﹐我雖不配來得﹔
ContentEN: Of so divine a Guest unworthy though I be,

ContentCN: 但我心無安息﹐若非祢將它給。
ContentEN: Yet has my heart no rest, unless it comes from Thee.

ContentCN: 若非祢將它給﹐我要四顧失依﹔
ContentEN: Unless it comes from Thee, in vain I look around;

ContentCN: 盡我所能發現﹐安息無處可見。
ContentEN: In all that I can see no rest is to be found.

ContentCN: 安息無處可見﹐只有在祢愛間﹔
ContentEN: No rest is to be found but in Thy blessed love

ContentCN: 願我羨慕得足﹐祢從高天傾注。
ContentEN: O let my wish be crowned, and send it from above!

ContentCN: 一半也猜想不到﹐金色海岸那邊﹔
ContentEN: The half cannot be fancied this side the golden shore;

ContentCN: 那日我主比以前更加美麗﹐更甘甜。
ContentEN: Oh, there He'll be still sweeter than He ever was before.

ContentCN: 我心感覺與主耶穌每日更加親近﹐
ContentEN: To Jesus ev'ry day I find my heart is closer drawn;

ContentCN: 祂比黎明燦爛金色榮光更加明艷﹔
ContentEN: He's fairer than the glory of the gold and purple dawn;

ContentCN: 祂就是我所追求的一切幻想美夢﹐
ContentEN: He's all my fancy pictures in its fairest dreams, and more;

ContentCN: 祂一天比一天更加美麗、芬芳、甘甜。
ContentEN: Each day He grows still sweeter than He was the day before.

ContentCN: 一半也猜想不到﹐金色海岸那邊﹔
ContentEN: The half cannot be fancied this side the golden shore;

ContentCN: 那日我主比以前更加美麗﹐更甘甜。
ContentEN: Oh, there He'll be still sweeter than He ever was before.

ContentCN: 當我遠遠見主祂的榮光向我照耀﹐
ContentEN: His glory broke upon me when I saw Him from afar;

ContentCN: 祂比晨星更明亮﹐比百合花更鮮艷﹔
ContentEN: He's fairer than the lily, brighter than the morning star;

ContentCN: 祂使我渴慕的心靈得著滋潤滿足﹐
ContentEN: He fills and satisfies my longing spirit o'er and o'er.

ContentCN: 祂一天比一天更加美麗、芬芳、甘甜。
ContentEN: Each day He grows still sweeter than He was the day before.

ContentCN: 一半也猜想不到﹐金色海岸那邊﹔
ContentEN: The half cannot be fancied this side the golden shore;

ContentCN: 那日我主比以前更加美麗﹐更甘甜。
ContentEN: Oh, there He'll be still sweeter than He ever was before.

ContentCN: 我心雖有時沉重﹐祂卻帶來甘甜愛﹐
ContentEN: My heart is sometimes heavy, but He comes with sweet relief;

ContentCN: 當我挫敗而喪氣﹐祂卻擁我入祂懷﹔
ContentEN: He folds me to His bosom when I droop with blighting grief;

ContentCN: 祂如此擔我重負﹐我心怎不將祂戀﹐
ContentEN: I love the Christ who all my burdens in His body bore;

ContentCN: 祂一天比一天更加美麗、芬芳、甘甜。
ContentEN: Each day He grows still sweeter than He was the day before.

ContentCN: 與主同行真榮耀無比﹐
ContentEN: It is glory just to walk with Him;

ContentCN: 與主同行真榮耀無比﹔
ContentEN: It is glory just to walk with Him,

ContentCN: 祂必引領我腳步﹐跨越山嶺經幽谷﹐
ContentEN: He will guide my steps aright thru the vale and o'er the height -

ContentCN: 與主同行真榮耀無比。
ContentEN: It is glory just to walk with Him.

ContentCN: 何等榮耀﹗因主血救贖﹐我能與祂同行﹐
ContentEN: It is glory just to walk with Him whose blood has ransomed me,

ContentCN: 每日歡樂在我魂湧溢﹔
ContentEN: It is rapture for my soul each day;

ContentCN: 無論何往﹐我感祂親近就喜樂蒙引領﹐
ContentEN: It is joy divine to feel Him near where'er my path may be -

ContentCN: 讚美主﹗一路榮耀無比。
ContentEN: Bless the Lord, it's glory all the way!

ContentCN: 與主同行真榮耀無比﹐
ContentEN: It is glory just to walk with Him;

ContentCN: 與主同行真榮耀無比﹔
ContentEN: It is glory just to walk with Him,

ContentCN: 祂必引領我腳步﹐跨越山嶺經幽谷﹐
ContentEN: He will guide my steps aright thru the vale and o'er the height -

ContentCN: 與主同行真榮耀無比。
ContentEN: It is glory just to walk with Him.

ContentCN: 何等榮耀﹗雖有黑影﹐我知道祂正同行﹐
ContentEN: It is glory when the shadows fall to know that He is near,

ContentCN: 仍喜樂向祂倚靠禱祈﹔
ContentEN: O what joy to simply trust and pray!

ContentCN: 何等榮耀﹗住在主裏﹐我常見晴天無影﹐
ContentEN: It is glory to abide in Him when skies above are clear -

ContentCN: 祂同行﹐一路榮耀無比。
ContentEN: Yes, with Him it's glory all the way!

ContentCN: 與主同行真榮耀無比﹐
ContentEN: It is glory just to walk with Him;

ContentCN: 與主同行真榮耀無比﹔
ContentEN: It is glory just to walk with Him,

ContentCN: 祂必引領我腳步﹐跨越山嶺經幽谷﹐
ContentEN: He will guide my steps aright thru the vale and o'er the height -

ContentCN: 與主同行真榮耀無比。
ContentEN: It is glory just to walk with Him.

ContentCN: 在彼黃金岸與祂同行﹐更是榮耀無比﹐
ContentEN: 'Twill be glory when I walk with Him on heaven's golden shore,

ContentCN: 不再遊蕩﹐或與祂稍離﹔
ContentEN: Never from His side again to stray;

ContentCN: 何等榮耀﹗奇妙榮耀﹗我與祂永在一起﹐
ContentEN: 'Twill be glory, wondrous glory with the Savior evermore -

ContentCN: 享榮耀直到永遠不已﹗
ContentEN: Everlasting glory all the way!

ContentCN: 祢是愛的溫柔氣息﹐怎能將祢吸透﹗
ContentEN: I cannot breathe enough of Thee, O gentle breeze of love;

ContentCN: 芬芳遠勝馨香花叢﹐
ContentEN: More fragrant than the myrtle tree,

ContentCN: 又如沒藥在我懷中﹐
ContentEN: The Henna flower is to me,

ContentCN: 又像天上膏油﹗又像天上膏油﹗
ContentEN: The Balm of Heav'n above, the Balm of Heav'n above.

ContentCN: 祢是美麗中的至美﹐怎能將祢賞透﹗
ContentEN: I cannot gaze enough on Thee, thou Fairest of the Fair;

ContentCN: 祢的面容所發光輝﹐
ContentEN: My heart is filled with ecstasy,

ContentCN: 使我更感祢美可貴﹕
ContentEN: As in Thy face of radiancy

ContentCN: 祢是美中最美﹗祢是美中最美﹗
ContentEN: I see such beauty there, I see such beauty there.

ContentCN: 祢是救主﹐我主﹐我友﹐怎能將祢事透﹗
ContentEN: I cannot work enough for Thee, my Savior, Master, Friend;

ContentCN: 我真不願隨意自由﹐
ContentEN: I do not wish to go out free,

ContentCN: 甘心、持久殷切不休﹐
ContentEN: But ever, always, willingly,

ContentCN: 直到生命盡頭﹐直到生命盡頭。
ContentEN: To serve Thee to the end, to serve Thee to the end.

ContentCN: 祢名香甜遠超眾名﹐怎能將祢唱透﹗
ContentEN: I cannot sing enough of Thee, the sweetest name on earth;

ContentCN: 我心充滿甜美感應﹐
ContentEN: A note so full of melody

ContentCN: 深願向祢不住頌稱﹗
ContentEN: Comes from my heart so joyously,

ContentCN: 喜樂湧自心頭﹐喜樂湧自心頭。
ContentEN: And fills my soul with mirth, and fills my soul with mirth.

ContentCN: 祢的自己可愛、無比﹐怎能將祢說透﹗
ContentEN: I cannot speak enough of Thee, I have so much to tell;

ContentCN: 祢心柔細﹐充滿同情﹐
ContentEN: Thy heart it beats so tenderly

ContentCN: 吸引我心向祢倚投﹐
ContentEN: As Thou dost draw me close to Thee,

ContentCN: 細語﹕"有祢足夠﹗"細語﹕"有祢足夠﹗"
ContentEN: And whisper, "All is well," and whisper, "All is well."

ContentCN: 祂生﹐為愛我﹗祂死﹐為救我﹗
ContentEN: Living, He loved me; dying, He saved me;

ContentEN: Buried, He carried my sins far away;

ContentEN: Rising, He justified freely forever;

ContentEN: One day He's coming — O glorious day!

ContentCN: 榮耀的救主﹐是萬王之王。
ContentEN: Glorious Saviour, this Jesus is mine!

ContentCN: 在隱密處與神同關鎖﹕
ContentEN: Shut in with God in the secret place:

ContentCN: 沐於祂同在﹐瞻仰祂榮臉﹐
ContentEN: Here in His presence beholding His face,

ContentCN: 從祂得能力一路奔向前﹔
ContentEN: Gaining the power to run in the race;

ContentCN: 我切願與神同關鎖。
ContentEN: I long to be shut in with God.

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐我羨慕活在祢面前﹐
ContentEN: Lord Jesus, I long in Thy presence to live,

ContentCN: 在早晨﹐在晚上﹐只有一世間﹔
ContentEN: From morning to ev'ning my one world Thou art;

ContentCN: 不讓我心快樂﹐若我在愛慕、
ContentEN: Oh let not my heart be contented or rest

ContentCN: 在感覺或思想無祢的事物。
ContentEN: When loving or seeking what with Thee doth part.

ContentCN: 每一刻﹐每一天﹐不論何痛苦﹐
ContentEN: Each moment, each day, throughout suff'ring and pain,

ContentCN: 當世上正沒有甚麼可鼓舞﹐
ContentEN: When nought in the world can give comfort or cheer,

ContentCN: 當歎息正不禁﹐眼淚流滴滴﹐
ContentEN: When sighing or weeping encompasses me,

ContentCN: 主﹐擦乾我眼淚﹐平靜我歎息。
ContentEN: Lord, still all my sighing, and wipe ev'ry tear.

ContentCN: 我每次如夢想人生的善美﹐
ContentEN: Each time when I dream of the goodness of life,

ContentCN: 親愛主﹐我求祢﹐必須也在內！
ContentEN: I pray Thee, dear Lord, that Thou in it may be;

ContentCN: 不讓我離開祢去尋求快樂﹐
ContentEN: Oh, do not allow me to choose by myself

ContentCN: 不讓我憑自己去單獨選擇！
ContentEN: Nor seek any pleasure that's other than Thee.

ContentCN: 當每夜萬籟靜﹐孤單自處時﹐
ContentEN: Each night when alone in the stillness I lie,

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐我求祢﹐仍與我同止﹔
ContentEN: I pray Thee, Lord Jesus, that Thou wilt be near;

ContentCN: 當每晨未破曉﹐我仍蒙昧中﹐
ContentEN: Each morning ere dawn comes, while still in my sleep,

ContentCN: 求祢來低聲喚﹐將我耳開通。
ContentEN: Come whispering call me and open my ear.

ContentCN: 當每次我虔讀祢聖潔話語﹐
ContentEN: Each time, Lord, when reading in Thy holy Word,

ContentCN: 求祢用祢榮耀照亮每一句﹔
ContentEN: I pray that Thy glory may shine on each line,

ContentCN: 讓我能明看見﹕這寶貴救主﹐
ContentEN: That clearly I'll see what a Saviour I have

ContentCN: 和祂的大救恩﹐無一不我屬。
ContentEN: And how great salvation that Thou hast made mine.

ContentCN: 當我正無倚靠﹐跪到祢座前﹐
ContentEN: When helpless I come, Lord, to kneel at Thy throne,

ContentCN: 求垂聽我禱告﹐賜夠用恩典﹔
ContentEN: I pray Thee to hear me and grant me Thy grace.

ContentCN: 有時候因有錯﹐禱告祢不聽﹐
ContentEN: If thro' my shortcomings Thou hear not my prayer,

ContentCN: 別收回祢同在﹐使我感不寧。
ContentEN: Withdraw not Thy presence, O hide not Thy face.

ContentCN: 當每次我想到屬天的福氣﹐
ContentEN: Each time when of heavenly blessings I think,

ContentCN: 讓我心切羨慕早日會見祢﹔
ContentEN: O let my heart long to be raptured to Thee;

ContentCN: 我在此所希望只有祢再來﹐
ContentEN: My only hope here is Thy coming again,

ContentCN: 我在彼所快樂只有祢同在。
ContentEN: My only joy there, Lord, Thy presence will be.

ContentCN: 主﹐求祢教訓我活在祢面前﹐
ContentEN: Lord, teach me each day in Thy presence to live,

ContentCN: 在早晨﹐在晚上﹐只有一世間﹔
ContentEN: From morning to ev'ning my one world Thou art;

ContentCN: 不讓我心快樂﹐若我在愛慕、
ContentEN: O let not my heart be contented or rest

ContentCN: 在感覺或思想無祢的事物。
ContentEN: When loving or seeking what with Thee doth part.

ContentCN: 親愛主﹗寶貝主﹗我輕視我事物﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 有誰像祢如此美麗﹐如此甘甜﹐如此柔細﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢是人中無比﹐誰能與祢相匹﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 親愛主﹗寶貝主﹗我聽見祢招呼﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢的聲音入我心內﹐我就脫離所有纏累﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 驕傲都歸虛無﹐追求都變庸俗。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 親愛主﹗寶貝主﹗我怎能再頑固﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我將剛硬投祢腳旁﹐領首詩歌回家去唱﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 歡喜作祢奴僕﹐歡喜向祢屈服。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 親愛主﹗寶貝主﹗我揀選祢道路﹕
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 一面順服﹐一面流淚﹐但我不肯改變地位﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我要討祢喜悅﹐羨慕愛的暴虐。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 親愛主﹗寶貝主﹗自從祢去天府﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我臉好像不能再笑﹐我天好像不能再曉﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我只想祢回來﹐我只想祢同在。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 親愛主﹗寶貝主﹗讓我來向祢訴﹕
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢是我所朝夕思慕﹐只有祢能使我滿足﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 得祢甚麼都有﹐祢外無所要求。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 親愛主﹗寶貝主﹗我奉獻我事物﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 有誰像祢如比美麗﹐如此甘甜﹐如此柔細﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祢是人中無比﹐誰能與祢相匹﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 釋放我的靈﹐使我能敬拜祢;
ContentEN: Set my spirit free, that I may worship Thee.

ContentCN: 釋放我的靈﹐使我能讚美祢。
ContentEN: Set my spirit free, that I may praise Thy name.

ContentCN: 脫離一切捆綁﹐使祢靈運行;
ContentEN: Let all bondage go, and let deliv'rance flow.

ContentCN: 釋放我的靈來敬拜祢。
ContentEN: Set my spirit free to worship Thee.

ContentCN: 與祢更親﹐我神﹐與祢更親﹔
ContentEN: Nearer, my God, to Thee, Nearer to Thee;

ContentCN: 雖然十架在身﹐不易前進﹔
ContentEN: E'en tho' it be a cross that raiseth me,

ContentCN: 我的歌唱聲音﹐仍是與祢更親﹐
ContentEN: Still all my song shall be nearer, my God, to Thee!

ContentCN: 仍是與祢更親﹐與祢更親。
ContentEN: Nearer, my God, to Thee! Nearer to Thee!

ContentCN: 雖在曠野飄泊﹐日已西墜﹐
ContentEN: Though like the wanderer, the sun gone down,

ContentCN: 黑暗四圍罩我﹐枕石而睡﹔
ContentEN: Darkness be over me, my rest a stone,

ContentCN: 夢中我仍追尋﹐望能與祢更親﹐
ContentEN: Yet in my dreams I'd be nearer, my God to Thee!

ContentCN: 望能與祢更親﹐與祢更親。
ContentEN: Nearer, my God, to Thee! Nearer to Thee!

ContentCN: 彷彿有路顯明﹐如梯通天﹐
ContentEN: There let the way appear steps unto heav'n;

ContentCN: 凡我所遇事情﹐出祢恩憐﹔
ContentEN: All that Thou sendest me in mercy giv'n;

ContentCN: 似有天使來引﹐招我與祢更親﹐
ContentEN: Angels to beckon me nearer, my God, to Thee!

ContentCN: 招我與祢更親﹐與祢更親。
ContentEN: Nearer, my God, to Thee! Nearer to Thee!

ContentCN: 醒來﹐心思滿是新鮮感激﹐
ContentEN: Then with my waking thought bright with Thy praise,

ContentCN: 從我憂苦之石﹐建伯特利﹔
ContentEN: Out of my stony griefs Bethel I'll raise;

ContentCN: 我的所有艱辛﹐使我與祢更親﹐
ContentEN: So by my woes to be nearer, my God, to Thee!

ContentCN: 使我與祢更親﹐與祢更親。
ContentEN: Nearer, my God, to Thee! Nearer to Thee!

ContentCN: 假若喜樂生翼﹐忽然騰空﹐
ContentEN: Or if on joyful wing cleaving the sky,

ContentCN: 日月星辰俱遺﹐仍然上沖﹔
ContentEN: Sun, moon, and stars forgot upward I fly,

ContentCN: 我的歌唱聲音﹐仍是與祢更親﹐
ContentEN: Still all my song shall be nearer, my God, to Thee!

ContentCN: 仍是與祢更親﹐與祢更親。
ContentEN: Nearer, my God, to Thee! Nearer to Thee!

ContentCN: 如果我的道路引我去受苦﹐
ContentEN: If the path I travel lead me to the cross,

ContentCN: 如果祢是命定要我歷艱辛﹐
ContentEN: If the way Thou choosest, lead me to pain and loss,

ContentCN: 就願祢我從茲﹐交通益親摯﹐
ContentEN: Let the compensation daily, hourly, be

ContentCN: 時也刻也無間﹐彌久彌香甜。
ContentEN: Shadowless communion, blessed Lord with Thee.

ContentCN: 如果地樂消減﹐求祢多給天﹐
ContentEN: If there's less of earth joy give, Lord, more of heav'n.

ContentCN: 雖然心可傷痛﹐願靈仍讚頌﹔
ContentEN: Let the spirit praise Thee, though the heart be riv'n;

ContentCN: 地的香甜聯結﹐若因祢分裂﹐
ContentEN: If sweet earthly ties, Lord, break at Thy decree,

ContentCN: 就願祢我之間﹐聯結更香甜。
ContentEN: Let the tie that binds us, closer, sweeter be.

ContentCN: 這路雖然孤單﹐求祢作我伴﹐
ContentEN: Lonely through the pathway, cheer it with Thy smile,

ContentCN: 用祢笑容鼓舞我來盡前途﹔
ContentEN: Be Thou my companion through earth's little while;

ContentCN: 主﹐我靠祢恩力﹐盼望能無己﹐
ContentEN: Selfless may I live, Lord, by Thy grace to be,

ContentCN: 作一潔淨器皿﹐流出祢生命。
ContentEN: Just a cleansed channel for Thy life through me.

ContentCN: 親近﹐更親近﹐近主心懷﹗
ContentEN: Nearer, still nearer, close to Thy heart,

ContentCN: 親愛之救主﹐引我近前來﹔
ContentEN: Draw me, my Savior, so precious Thou art;

ContentCN: 雙手護持我﹐靠祢胸前﹐
ContentEN: Fold me, oh, fold me close to Thy breast,

ContentCN: 如在穩靜港﹐掩蔽我平安﹐
ContentEN: Shelter me safe in that "Haven of Rest."

ContentCN: 如在穩靜港﹐掩蔽我平安。
ContentEN: Shelter me safe in that "Haven of Rest."

ContentCN: 親近﹐更親近﹐我有何能﹐
ContentEN: Nearer, still nearer, nothing I bring,

ContentCN: 有何堪奉獻﹐而承主恩情﹖
ContentEN: Naught as an off'ring to Jesus, my King,

ContentCN: 惟攜我憂傷痛悔心靈﹐
ContentEN: Only my sinful, now contrite heart,

ContentCN: 求主以寶血完全洗潔淨﹐
ContentEN: Grant me the cleansing Thy blood doth impart,

ContentCN: 求主以寶血完全洗潔淨。
ContentEN: Grant me the cleansing Thy blood doth impart.

ContentCN: 親近﹐更親近﹐我惟屬主﹐
ContentEN: Nearer, still nearer, Lord, to be Thine,

ContentCN: 罪惡與愚行甘心全脫除﹔
ContentEN: Sin, with its follies, I gladly resign,

ContentCN: 撇下罪中樂、驕傲、炫誇﹐
ContentEN: All of its pleasures, pomp and its pride,

ContentCN: 惟要得救主﹐誇主十字架﹐
ContentEN: Give me but Jesus, my Lord crucified,

ContentCN: 惟要得救主﹐誇主十字架。
ContentEN: Give me but Jesus, my Lord crucified.

ContentCN: 親近﹐更親近﹐終生親近﹐
ContentEN: Nearer, still nearer, while life shall last,

ContentCN: 直到榮耀裏﹐我錨已拋穩﹔
ContentEN: Till safe in glory my anchor is cast;

ContentCN: 親近﹐更親近﹐永遠親近﹐
ContentEN: Thro' endless ages, ever to be

ContentCN: 無論到何時﹐與主還相親﹐
ContentEN: Nearer, my Savior, still nearer to Thee,

ContentCN: 無論到何時﹐與主還相親。
ContentEN: Nearer, my Savior, still nearer to Thee.

ContentCN: 晨光掠天而過﹐我心醒來喊說﹕
ContentEN: When morning gilds the skies, my heart awaking cries:

ContentCN: 願頌讚歸耶穌﹗不論工作、禱告﹐
ContentEN: May Jesus Christ be praised! Alike at work or prayer,

ContentCN: 我要向主倚靠﹐"願頌讚歸耶穌﹗"
ContentEN: To Jesus I repair; may Jesus Christ be praised!

ContentCN: 黑夜要變白晝﹐當我衷心歌謳﹕
ContentEN: The night becomes as day when from the heart we say:

ContentCN: 願頌讚歸耶穌﹗黑暗權勢潰崩﹐
ContentEN: May Jesus Christ be praised! The pow'rs of darkness fear

ContentCN: 當它聽聞此聲﹕"願頌讚歸耶穌﹗"
ContentEN: When this sweet chant they hear: May Jesus Christ be praised!

ContentCN: 日、月、星辰歌唱﹐天使天軍頌揚﹕
ContentEN: Sing, suns and stars of space, sing, ye that see His face,

ContentCN: 願頌讚歸耶穌﹗全地同來響應﹐
ContentEN: Sing, Jesus Christ be praised! Let all the earth around

ContentCN: 齊發歡樂歌聲﹕"願頌讚歸耶穌﹗"
ContentEN: Ring joyous with the sound: May Jesus Christ be praised!

ContentCN: 當我尚存一息﹐我仍歌唱不已﹕
ContentEN: Be this while life is mine my canticle divine:

ContentCN: 願頌讚歸耶穌﹗唱此永遠歌頌﹐
ContentEN: May Jesus Christ be praised! be this th'eternal song,

ContentCN: 直至永世無窮﹐"願頌讚歸耶穌﹗"
ContentEN: Through all the ages long: May Jesus Christ be praised!

ContentCN: 每日早晨愛都新鮮﹐
ContentEN: New ev'ry morning is the love

ContentCN: 再顯在我重新回醒﹔
ContentEN: Our wak'ning and uprising prove;

ContentCN: 使我平安度過睡眠﹐
ContentEN: Thro' sleep and darkness safely brought,

ContentCN: 復有思想、能力、生命。
ContentEN: Restored to life, and pow'r, and thought.

ContentCN: 每個新日有新憐憫﹐
ContentEN: New mercies, each returning day,

ContentCN: 當我禱告都在四圍﹕
ContentEN: Hover around us while we pray;

ContentCN: 新的赦免﹐新的親近﹐
ContentEN: New perils past, new sins forgiv'n,

ContentCN: 對神新知﹐對天新窺。
ContentEN: New thoughts of God, new hopes of heav'n.

ContentCN: 如果我的每日道路﹐
ContentEN: If, on our daily course, our mind

ContentCN: 定規都要分別為聖﹔
ContentEN: Be set to hallow all we find,

ContentCN: 無價之寶﹐新的事物﹐
ContentEN: New treasures still of countless price

ContentCN: 神正豫備作我祭牲。
ContentEN: God will provide for sacrifice.

ContentCN: 舊人﹐舊地都更可愛﹐
ContentEN: Old friends, old scenes will lovelier be,

ContentCN: 如果彼此都更思家﹔
ContentEN: As more of heav'n in each we see;

ContentCN: 今日求賜軟化忍耐﹐
ContentEN: Some soft'ning gleam of love and prayer

ContentCN: 顯在每一個十字架。
ContentEN: Shall dawn on every cross and care.

ContentCN: 簡單工作﹐平常人地﹐
ContentEN: The trivial round, the common task,

ContentCN: 都會成為禱告張本﹔
ContentEN: Will furnish all we ought to ask;

ContentCN: 都是機會可以捨己﹐
ContentEN: Room to deny ourselves; a road

ContentCN: 使我每日更親我神。
ContentEN: To bring us daily nearer God.

ContentCN: 但主﹐求祢因祢的愛﹐
ContentEN: Only, O Lord, in Thy dear love

ContentCN: 準備我心為著來朝﹔
ContentEN: Fit us for perfect rest above,

ContentCN: 叫我今天﹐每天﹐都該
ContentEN: And help us, this and every day,

ContentCN: 生活更像我的禱告。
ContentEN: To live more nearly as we pray.

ContentCN: 醒來﹐我魂﹐當隨朝陽﹐
ContentEN: Awake, my soul, and with the sun

ContentCN: 開始一天當盡本分﹔
ContentEN: Thy daily stage of duty run;

ContentCN: 放棄怠惰﹐早起剛強﹐
ContentEN: Shake off dull sloth and joyful rise

ContentCN: 歡然獻祭在此清晨。
ContentEN: To pay thy morning sacrifice.

ContentCN: 醒來﹐我心﹐舉起自己﹐
ContentEN: Wake and lift up thyself, my heart,

ContentCN: 效法天使盡你職守﹔
ContentEN: And with the angels bear thy part,

ContentCN: 他們一夜未曾歇息﹐
ContentEN: Who all night long unwearied sing

ContentCN: 不斷向神讚美、歌謳。
ContentEN: High praise to the eternal King.

ContentCN: 感謝我主將我保護﹐
ContentEN: All praise to Thee, Who safe hast kept

ContentCN: 安度睡眠﹐恢復新鮮﹔
ContentEN: And hast refreshed me while I slept:

ContentCN: 有日當我從死復甦﹐
ContentEN: Grant, Lord, when I from death shall wake

ContentCN: 容我得進光明高天。
ContentEN: I may of endless light partake.

ContentCN: 主﹐我向你重申誓願﹐
ContentEN: Lord, I my vows to Thee renew;

ContentCN: 驅盡我罪﹐如露消散﹔
ContentEN: Disperse my sins as morning dew;

ContentCN: 保守我心初萌意念﹐
ContentEN: Guard my first springs of thought and will,

ContentCN: 以祢自己將我充滿。
ContentEN: And with Thyself my spirit fill.

ContentCN: 求主提議、引導、管理
ContentEN: Direct, control, suggest, this day,

ContentCN: 一切所思、所言、所習﹔
ContentEN: All I design, or do, or say,

ContentCN: 願我所有才幹、能力﹐
ContentEN: That all my pow'rs, with all their might,

ContentCN: 能以集合歸榮與祢。
ContentEN: In Thy sole glory may unite.

ContentCN: 讚美真神萬福源頭﹐
ContentEN: Praise God, from whom all blessings flow;

ContentCN: 天下萬有讚祂不休﹔
ContentEN: Praise Him, all creatures here below;

ContentCN: 天上眾軍和聲響應﹕
ContentEN: Praise Him above, ye heav'nly host;

ContentCN: 讚美聖父、聖子、聖靈。
ContentEN: Praise Father, Son, and Holy Ghost.

ContentCN: 哦﹐滿了傷痕的頭﹐滿了痛苦誶詬﹐
ContentEN: O Head once full of bruises, so full of pain and scorn,

ContentCN: 近乎﹐近乎﹐近乎﹐可近之主﹗
ContentEN: Holy, holy, holy, Lord God of Hosts.

ContentCN: 我心所羨靈所慕﹐
ContentEN: Heav'n and earth are full of Thee!

ContentCN: 是祢可愛的面目﹐可親之主﹗
ContentEN: Heav'n and earth are praising Thee, O Lord most high!

ContentCN: 夕陽西沉大地靜﹐蝟務完畢我心定﹔
ContentEN: Day is dying in the west, heav'n is touching earth with rest;

ContentCN: 晚星高照暗中明﹐幽夜近主靈裏清﹐
ContentEN: Wait and worship while the night sets her ev'ning lamps alight

ContentCN: 靜候俯伏。
ContentEN: Thro' all the sky.

ContentCN: 近乎﹐近乎﹐近乎﹐可近之主﹗
ContentEN: Holy, holy, holy, Lord God of Hosts.

ContentCN: 我心所羨靈所慕﹐
ContentEN: Heav'n and earth are full of Thee!

ContentCN: 是祢可愛的面目﹐可親之主﹗
ContentEN: Heav'n and earth are praising Thee, O Lord most high!

ContentCN: 在這宇宙廣廈中﹐我心尋求祢面容﹔
ContentEN: Lord of life, beneath the dome of the universe, Thy home,

ContentCN: 深願能在我四圍﹐所見全是祢光輝﹐
ContentEN: Gather us, who seek Thy face, to the fold of Thy embrace,

ContentCN: 使我滿足。
ContentEN: For Thou art nigh.

ContentCN: 近乎﹐近乎﹐近乎﹐可近之主﹗
ContentEN: Holy, holy, holy, Lord God of Hosts.

ContentCN: 我心所羨靈所慕﹐
ContentEN: Heav'n and earth are full of Thee!

ContentCN: 是祢可愛的面目﹐可親之主﹗
ContentEN: Heav'n and earth are praising Thee, O Lord most high!

ContentCN: 當這夜影愈幽深﹐我心羨慕愈殷勤﹔
ContentEN: While the deep'ning shadows fall, heart of Love, enfolding all,

ContentCN: 願能衝過眾星辰﹐得見祢面﹐近祢身﹐
ContentEN: Through the glory and the grace of the stars that veil Thy face,

ContentCN: 永不孤苦。
ContentEN: Our hearts ascend.

ContentCN: 近乎﹐近乎﹐近乎﹐可近之主﹗
ContentEN: Holy, holy, holy, Lord God of Hosts.

ContentCN: 我心所羨靈所慕﹐
ContentEN: Heav'n and earth are full of Thee!

ContentCN: 是祢可愛的面目﹐可親之主﹗
ContentEN: Heav'n and earth are praising Thee, O Lord most high!

ContentCN: 有日太空的繁星﹐在我眼前全不明﹔
ContentEN: When forever form our sight pass the stars, the day, the night,

ContentCN: 願那永遠的早晨﹐在我眼前顯光明﹐
ContentEN: Lord of angels, on our eyes let eternal morning rise,

ContentCN: 夜影俱無。
ContentEN: And shadows end.

ContentCN: 救主耶穌﹐我的太陽﹐
ContentEN: Sun of my soul, Thou Saviour dear,

ContentCN: 有祢同在﹐夜也明亮﹔
ContentEN: It is not night if Thou be near;

ContentCN: 勿讓人世有雲遮掩
ContentEN: Oh, may no earthborn cloud arise,

ContentCN: 僕人心眼﹐不見慈顏。
ContentEN: To hide Thee from Thy servant's eyes.

ContentCN: 倦眼欲合﹐頻頻催眠﹐
ContentEN: When the soft dews of kindly sleep

ContentCN: 睡如甘露﹐潤我夕薦﹔
ContentEN: My wearied eyelids gently steep,

ContentCN: 深願今晚最後思念﹐
ContentEN: Be my last thought how sweet to rest

ContentCN: 乃是永世息祢胸前。
ContentEN: Forever on my Savior's breast.

ContentCN: 與我同在自晨至夕﹐
ContentEN: Abide with me from morn till eve,

ContentCN: 離祢﹐我覺生無意義﹔
ContentEN: For without Thee I cannot live;

ContentCN: 無祢﹐我懼死蔭臨到﹐
ContentEN: Abide with me when night is nigh,

ContentCN: 求祢相偕自晚至朝。
ContentEN: For without Thee I dare not die.

ContentCN: 設有遊子背父流浪﹐
ContentEN: If some poor wandering child of Thine

ContentCN: 縱聞父聲依然心剛﹔
ContentEN: Has spurned today the voice divine,

ContentCN: 深願此刻祢親工作﹐
ContentEN: Now Lord, the gracious work begin;

ContentCN: 勿使仍在罪中墮落。
ContentEN: Let him no more lie down in sin.

ContentCN: 病弱兒女﹐求主看護﹐
ContentEN: Watch by the sick; enrich the poor

ContentCN: 缺乏信徒﹐求主眷顧﹐
ContentEN: With blessings from Thy boundless store;

ContentCN: 愁苦弟兄﹐求主賜憐﹐
ContentEN: Be every mourner's sleep tonight,

ContentCN: 能如嬰孩母懷安眠。
ContentEN: Life infant's slumbers, pure and light.

ContentCN: 當我睡醒﹐求主賜福﹐
ContentEN: Come near, and bless us when we wake,

ContentCN: 扶我行走人生路途﹔
ContentEN: Ere through the world our way we take;

ContentCN: 直至那日被提祢旁﹐
ContentEN: Till in the ocean of Thy love

ContentCN: 溶化在祢愛的海洋。
ContentEN: We lose ourselves in Thee above.

ContentCN: 一點星星之火﹐可燃起營火興旺﹔
ContentEN: It only takes a spark to get a fire going,

ContentCN: 不久四圍群眾﹐都得享溫暖、亮光。
ContentEN: And soon all those around can warm up to its glowing.

ContentCN: 神愛也正是這樣﹐當你經歷祂救恩,
ContentEN: That's how it is with God's love once you've experienced it;

ContentCN: 你要將祂大愛傳開﹐你要去傳給人。
ContentEN: You spread His love to ev'ry one; you want to pass it on.

ContentCN: 春光明媚奇妙﹐嫩芽從樹上伸張﹔
ContentEN: What a wondrous time is spring when all the trees are budding,

ContentCN: 小鳥開聲歌唱﹐百花都爭先開放。
ContentEN: The birds begin to sing, the flowers start their blooming,

ContentCN: 神愛也正是這樣﹐當你經歷祂救恩﹐
ContentEN: That's how it is with God's love once you've experienced it;

ContentCN: 你要歌唱﹐如春新樣﹐你要去傳給人。
ContentEN: You want to sing, it's fresh like spring, you want to pass it on.

ContentCN: 朋友們﹐我切望你來得我這喜樂﹔
ContentEN: I wish for you, my friend, this happiness that I've found,

ContentCN: 你可向神投靠﹐不論你光景如何。
ContentEN: You can depend on Him, it matters not where you're bound.

ContentCN: 我要在山頂喊叫﹐要向全世界宣稱﹕
ContentEN: I'll shout it from the mountain top, I want my world to know,

ContentCN: 恩愛的主已拯救我﹐我要去傳給人。
ContentEN: The Lord of love has come to me, I want to pass it on.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐傳講老舊的福音﹐
ContentEN: I love to tell the story, 'twill be my theme in glory,

ContentCN: 傳講耶穌愛罪人﹐傳講耶穌救恩。
ContentEN: To tell the old, old story of Jesus and His love.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐傳講天上妙事﹐
ContentEN: I love to tell the story of unseen things above;

ContentCN: 傳講耶穌愛罪人﹐傳講祂為人死﹔
ContentEN: Of Jesus and His glory, of Jesus and His love.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐福音是神大能﹐
ContentEN: I love to tell the story because I know 'tis true;

ContentCN: 能救罪人免沉淪﹐能叫死人得生。
ContentEN: It satisfies my longings as nothing else can do.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐傳講老舊的福音﹐
ContentEN: I love to tell the story, 'twill be my theme in glory,

ContentCN: 傳講耶穌愛罪人﹐傳講耶穌救恩。
ContentEN: To tell the old, old story of Jesus and His love.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐福音美妙稱心﹔
ContentEN: I love to tell the story, more wonderful it seems

ContentCN: 勝過奪人的奇珍﹐勝過所夢黃金。
ContentEN: Than all the golden fancies of all our golden dreams.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐福音益我何多﹔
ContentEN: I love to tell the story, it did so much for me;

ContentCN: 使我得到一新心﹐使我得進神國。
ContentEN: And that is just the reason I tell it now to thee.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐傳講老舊的福音﹐
ContentEN: I love to tell the story, 'twill be my theme in glory,

ContentCN: 傳講耶穌愛罪人﹐傳講耶穌救恩。
ContentEN: To tell the old, old story of Jesus and His love.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐因人多未聽見﹐
ContentEN: I love to tell the story, 'tis pleasant to repeat

ContentCN: 神是如何的慈仁﹐如何充滿愛憐﹔
ContentEN: What seems, each time I tell it, more wonderfully sweet.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐因那常聽之人﹐
ContentEN: I love to tell the story, for some have never heard

ContentCN: 仍是饑渴要聽聞﹐像那未聽之人。
ContentEN: The message of salvation from God's own Holy Word.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐傳講老舊的福音﹐
ContentEN: I love to tell the story, 'twill be my theme in glory,

ContentCN: 傳講耶穌愛罪人﹐傳講耶穌救恩。
ContentEN: To tell the old, old story of Jesus and His love.

ContentCN: 我愛傳講主福音﹐越傳越覺甘甜﹔
ContentEN: I love to tell the story, for those who know it best

ContentCN: 每逢對人來講論﹐愈講愈覺新鮮。
ContentEN: Seemed hungering and thirsting to hear it like the rest.

ContentCN: 等我進到榮耀境﹐所唱之歌必新﹔
ContentEN: And when, in scenes of glory, I sing the new, new song,

ContentCN: 雖新﹐仍是這一生所愛老舊福音。
ContentEN: 'Twill be the old, old story that I have loved so long.

ContentCN: 因黑夜必要轉為晨光﹐
ContentEN: For the darkness shall turn to dawning,

ContentCN: 到正午更顯得輝煌﹐
ContentEN: And the dawning to noonday bright,

ContentCN: 基督國度就降臨地上﹐
ContentEN: And Christ's great kingdom shall come to earth,

ContentCN: 全地充滿愛與光。
ContentEN: The kingdom of love and light.

ContentCN: 我們有一故事傳給萬邦﹐
ContentEN: We've a story to tell to the nations

ContentCN: 能使人心回轉歸正﹔
ContentEN: That shall turn their hearts to the right,

ContentCN: 這故事真實又美妙﹐
ContentEN: A story of truth and mercy,

ContentCN: 滿有平安與光明﹐滿有平安與光明。
ContentEN: A story of peace and light, a story of peace and light.

ContentCN: 因黑夜必要轉為晨光﹐
ContentEN: For the darkness shall turn to dawning,

ContentCN: 到正午更顯得輝煌﹐
ContentEN: And the dawning to noonday bright,

ContentCN: 基督國度就降臨地上﹐
ContentEN: And Christ's great kingdom shall come to earth,

ContentCN: 全地充滿愛與光。
ContentEN: The kingdom of love and light.

ContentCN: 我們有一詩歌唱給萬邦﹐
ContentEN: We've a song to be sung to the nations

ContentCN: 能使人心向主歸降﹔
ContentEN: That shall lift their hearts to the Lord,

ContentCN: 這詩歌能勝過罪惡﹐
ContentEN: A song that shall conquer evil

ContentCN: 能粉碎利劍、矛槍﹐能粉碎利劍、矛槍。
ContentEN: And shatter the spear and sword, and shatter the spear and sword.

ContentCN: 因黑夜必要轉為晨光﹐
ContentEN: For the darkness shall turn to dawning,

ContentCN: 到正午更顯得輝煌﹐

ContentCN: 為你﹐我今祈求﹗為你﹐我今祈求﹗

ContentCN: 但願我救主也把你來拯救﹗
ContentEN: For you I am praying, I'm praying for you.

ContentCN: 我有一救主﹐在天為我祈求﹐

ContentCN: 哦﹐願我救主也成為你救主﹗
ContentEN: But O, that my Savior were your Savior too!

ContentCN: 為你﹐我今祈求﹗為你﹐我今祈求﹗
ContentEN: For you I am praying, for you I am praying,

ContentEN: But O, that He'd let me bring you with me too!

ContentEN: For you I am praying, for you I am praying,

ContentCN: 哦﹐願我救主也賜你這喜樂﹗

ContentCN: 為你﹐我今祈求﹗為你﹐我今祈求﹗
ContentEN: For you I am praying, for you I am praying,

ContentCN: 到遠方﹐到萬國﹐我必去﹐我必去﹔
ContentEN: To the regions beyond, I must go, I must go,

ContentCN: 向全地廣傳播主救恩﹐大應許。
ContentEN: Till the world, all the world, His salvation shall know.

ContentCN: 到遠方﹐到萬國﹐我必去﹐我必去﹐
ContentEN: To the regions beyond, I must go, I must go,

ContentCN: 到福音從未傳達之地﹔
ContentEN: Where the story has never been told;

ContentCN: 千萬人從未聞主大愛與憐惜﹐
ContentEN: To the millions that never have heard of His love,

ContentCN: 我必去報佳音不遲疑。
ContentEN: I must tell the sweet story of old.

ContentCN: 到遠方﹐到萬國﹐我必去﹐我必去﹔
ContentEN: To the regions beyond, I must go, I must go,

ContentCN: 向全地廣傳播主救恩﹐大應許。
ContentEN: Till the world, all the world, His salvation shall know.

ContentCN: 主呼召我前去—最艱苦的地區﹐
ContentEN: To the hardest of places He calls me to go,

ContentCN: 莫貪戀這俗世的安逸﹔
ContentEN: No thinking of comfort or ease;

ContentCN: 縱世人譏誚我空作夢、常癡愚﹐
ContentEN: The world may pronounce me a dreamer, a fool,

ContentCN: 我只要討我主的歡喜。
ContentEN: Enough if the Master I please.

ContentCN: 到遠方﹐到萬國﹐我必去﹐我必去﹔
ContentEN: To the regions beyond, I must go, I must go,

ContentCN: 向全地廣傳播主救恩﹐大應許。
ContentEN: Till the world, all the world, His salvation shall know.

ContentCN: 切不要再耗費你精力與生命﹐
ContentEN: Oh, ye that are spending your leisure and pow’rs

ContentCN: 空追求己快樂與興趣﹔
ContentEN: In pleasures so foolish and fond;

ContentCN: 速速從你自私愚妄中得覺醒﹐
ContentEN: Awake from your selfishness, folly and sin,

ContentCN: 遵主命速前往遠方去。
ContentEN: And go to the regions beyond,

ContentCN: 到遠方﹐到萬國﹐我必去﹐我必去﹔
ContentEN: To the regions beyond, I must go, I must go,

ContentCN: 向全地廣傳播主救恩﹐大應許。
ContentEN: Till the world, all the world, His salvation shall know.

ContentCN: 我救主心所掛還有其他迷羊﹐
ContentEN: There are other “lost sheep” that the Master must bring,

ContentCN: 他們亦需聽到主福音﹔
ContentEN: And they must the message be told;

ContentCN: 主差遣我前往﹐將迷羊從各方
ContentEN: He sends me to gather them out to all lands,

ContentCN: 領回圈與救主同歡欣。
ContentEN: And welcome them back to His fold.

ContentCN: 我豈可以空手見主﹖豈可雙手空空去﹖
ContentEN: Must I go and empty-handed? Must I meet my Savior so?

ContentCN: 未領一人來歸基督﹗豈可雙手空空去﹖
ContentEN: Not one soul with which to greet Him: must I empty-handed go?

ContentCN: 我豈可去﹐雙手空空﹖豈可如此見主面﹖
ContentEN: Must I go and empty-handed? Thus my dear Redeemer meet?

ContentCN: 從無一日為主作工﹐未有擄物獻主前。
ContentEN: Not one day of service give Him. Lay no trophy at His feet?

ContentCN: 我豈可以空手見主﹖豈可雙手空空去﹖
ContentEN: Must I go and empty-handed? Must I meet my Savior so?

ContentCN: 未領一人來歸基督﹗豈可雙手空空去﹖
ContentEN: Not one soul with which to greet Him: must I empty-handed go?

ContentCN: 今日去世復有何恐﹖因為恩主已救我﹔
ContentEN: Not at death I shrink nor falter, for my Savior saves me now;

ContentCN: 但一思念雙手虛空﹐愁容滿面真難過﹗
ContentEN: But to meet Him empty-handed, thought of that now clouds my brow.

ContentCN: 我豈可以空手見主﹖豈可雙手空空去﹖
ContentEN: Must I go and empty-handed? Must I meet my Savior so?

ContentCN: 未領一人來歸基督﹗豈可雙手空空去﹖
ContentEN: Not one soul with which to greet Him: must I empty-handed go?

ContentCN: 從前犯罪所廢歲月﹐假若現在能贖回﹐
ContentEN: O the years in sinning wasted; could I but recall them now,

ContentCN: 我必完全奉獻無缺﹐樂行主旨不再違。
ContentEN: I would give them to my Savior, to His will I'd gladly bow.

ContentCN: 我豈可以空手見主﹖豈可雙手空空去﹖
ContentEN: Must I go and empty-handed? Must I meet my Savior so?

ContentCN: 未領一人來歸基督﹗豈可雙手空空去﹖
ContentEN: Not one soul with which to greet Him: must I empty-handed go?

ContentCN: 哦﹐願我們努力發奮﹐殷勤作工趁白日﹔
ContentEN: O ye saints, arouse, be earnest, up and work while yet 'tis day;

ContentCN: 死辰尚未臨到你身﹐熱心救人不停止。
ContentEN: Ere the night of death o'ertake thee, strive for souls while still you may.

ContentCN: 貧窮、軟弱、悲傷、憂愁﹐親愛罪人﹐請你來﹗
ContentEN: Come, ye sinners, poor and wretched, weak and wounded, sick and sore;

ContentCN: 耶穌等著要施拯救﹐滿了能力和憐愛﹔
ContentEN: Jesus ready waits to save you, full of pity, love and pow'r:

ContentCN: 祂能救你﹗祂能救你﹗祂肯救你莫疑猜。
ContentEN: He is able, He is able, He is willing, doubt no more.

ContentCN: 祂要歡迎﹐來罷﹐放心﹐祂不棄絕任何人﹔
ContentEN: Come, ye needy, come and welcome; God's free bounty glorify;

ContentCN: 實在懊悔﹐實在相信﹐你就必定能蒙恩﹔
ContentEN: True belief and true repentance, every grace that brings us nigh,

ContentCN: 不用代價﹐不用代價﹐就可進入得救門。
ContentEN: Without money, without money, come to Jesus Christ and buy.

ContentCN: 莫讓良心使你徘徊﹐或想怎樣纔配來﹔
ContentEN: Let not conscience make you linger, nor of fitness fondly dream;

ContentCN: 你已"配來﹐"若你理會﹐你是需要祂的愛﹔
ContentEN: All the fitness He requireth is to feel your need of Him:

ContentCN: 無別條件﹐無別條件﹐恩門是為罪人開。
ContentEN: This He gives you, this He gives you, 'tis the Spirit's rising beam.

ContentCN: 你心煩悶﹐你心悒怏﹐疲倦痛苦常失敗﹔
ContentEN: Come, ye weary, heavy laden, lost and ruined by the fall;

ContentCN: 如果你要等到改良﹐你就永遠不會來﹔
ContentEN: If you tarry till you're better, you will never come at all:

ContentCN: 耶穌釘死﹐耶穌釘死﹐是為罪人贖罪債。
ContentEN: Not the righteous, not the righteous, sinners Jesus came to call.

ContentCN: 請你想起客西馬尼﹐救主如何流血汗﹔
ContentEN: Agonizing in the garden, your Redeemer prostrate lies;

ContentCN: 請你聽祂在髑髏地﹐如何臨死大聲喊﹕
ContentEN: On the bloody tree behold Him! Hear Him cry, before He dies,

ContentCN: 已經成了﹗"已經成了﹗罪人你今能無感﹖
ContentEN: It is finished! "It is finished! " Sinner, will not this suffice?

ContentCN: 祂的流血﹐已經滿足你神公義的要求﹐
ContentEN: Lo! th' incarnate God, ascended, pleads the merit of His blood;

ContentCN: 應當信服﹐完全信服﹐罪過就都得免宥﹔
ContentEN: Venture on Him, venture wholly; let no other trust intrude:

ContentCN: 惟有耶穌﹐惟有耶穌﹐能作罪人的朋友。
ContentEN: None but Jesus, none but Jesus, can do helpless sinners good.

ContentCN: 我願你認識耶穌﹐像我一樣愛祂﹔
ContentEN: I wish you knew my Jesus, and loved Him as I do,

ContentCN: 若你認識我耶穌﹐你也必然愛祂。
ContentEN: For if you knew my Jesus, then you would love Him too.

ContentCN: 祂捨命在各各他﹐為你付上贖價﹔
ContentEN: He gave His life at Calv’ry, the sacrifice for you:

ContentCN: 若你接受我耶穌﹐你也必然愛祂。
ContentEN: If you’ll receive my Jesus, then you will love Him too.

ContentCN: 你的罪雖像硃紅﹐主必使它白如雪﹔
ContentEN: Tho' your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow;

ContentCN: 你的罪雖像硃紅﹐主必使它白如雪。
ContentEN: Tho' your sins be as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow;

ContentCN: 你罪雖紅如丹顏﹐必白如羊毛。
ContentEN: Tho' they be red like crimson, they shall be as wool!

ContentCN: 你的罪雖像硃紅﹐你的罪雖像硃紅﹐
ContentEN: Tho' your sins be as scarlet, tho' your sins be as scarlet,

ContentCN: 主必使它白如雪﹐主必使它白如雪。
ContentEN: They shall be as white as snow, they shall be as white as snow.

ContentCN: 請聽主慈愛呼聲﹕"快回轉歸向真神﹗"
ContentEN: Hear the voice that entreats you, O return ye unto God!

ContentCN: 請聽主慈愛呼聲﹕"快回轉歸向真神﹗"
ContentEN: Hear the voice that entreats you, O return ye unto God!

ContentCN: 主的大愛何奇妙﹐憐憫何廣大。
ContentEN: He is of great compassion, and of wondrous love;

ContentCN: 請聽主慈愛呼聲﹐請聽主慈愛呼聲﹕
ContentEN: Hear the voice that entreats you, hear the voice that entreats you,

ContentCN: 快回轉歸向真神﹗"快回轉歸向真神﹗
ContentEN: O return ye unto God! O return ye unto God!

ContentCN: 你的罪﹐主必赦免﹐從今後不再記念﹐
ContentEN: He'll forgive your transgressions, and remember them no more;

ContentCN: 你的罪﹐主必赦免﹐從今後不再記念﹔
ContentEN: He'll forgive your transgressions, and remember them no more;

ContentCN: 主你神正在呼召﹕"來向我仰望。"
ContentEN: Look unto Me, ye people. Saith the Lord your God!

ContentCN: 你的罪﹐主必赦免﹐你的罪﹐主必赦免﹔
ContentEN: He'll forgive your transgressions, He'll forgive your transgressions,

ContentCN: 從今後不再記念﹐從今後不再記念。
ContentEN: And remember them no more, and remember them no more.

ContentCN: 救主為你捨命心破碎﹐救主捨命心破碎﹔
ContentEN: He died of a broken heart for you, He died of a broken heart,

ContentCN: 為你、為我﹐身懸十架﹐救主捨命心破碎。
ContentEN: Upon a tree, for you, for me, He died of a broken heart.

ContentCN: 你曾否念過十架故事﹐耶穌在上捨命﹐
ContentEN: Have you read the story of the Cross, where Jesus bled and died,

ContentCN: 主寶血從祂肋旁流下﹐罪債為你還清﹖
ContentEN: Where your debt was paid by His precious blood that flowed from His wounded side?

ContentCN: 救主為你捨命心破碎﹐救主捨命心破碎﹔
ContentEN: He died of a broken heart for you, He died of a broken heart,

ContentCN: 為你、為我﹐身懸十架﹐救主捨命心破碎。
ContentEN: Upon a tree, for you, for me, He died of a broken heart.

ContentCN: 你曾否念過救主為你戴上荊棘冠冕﹐
ContentEN: Have you read how they placed the crown of thorns upon His brow for you,

ContentCN: 主禱告﹕"他們所作無知﹐父阿﹐求祢赦免﹖"
ContentEN: When He prayed, "Forgive them, oh, forgive, they know not what they do?"

ContentCN: 救主為你捨命心破碎﹐救主捨命心破碎﹔
ContentEN: He died of a broken heart for you, He died of a broken heart,

ContentCN: 為你、為我﹐身懸十架﹐救主捨命心破碎。
ContentEN: Upon a tree, for you, for me, He died of a broken heart.

ContentCN: 你曾否念過主仰望天說﹕"成了﹗"是為你﹖
ContentEN: Have you read that He looked to heaven and said, "'Tis finished?" 'Twas for thee.

ContentCN: 你曾否對主說﹕"感謝主﹐因祢為我捨己﹖"
ContentEN: Have you ever said, "I thank Thee, Lord, for giving Thy life for me?"

ContentCN: 因為神愛世人﹐捨了獨生愛子﹔
ContentEN: For God so loved the world, He gave His only Son

ContentCN: 釘死在十架上﹐使我脫離罪勢。
ContentEN: To die on Calv'ry's tree from sin to set me free;

ContentCN: 有日﹐祂要再來﹐何等尊貴榮耀﹗
ContentEN: Some day He's coming back - what glory that will be!

ContentCN: 主的大愛真奇妙﹗
ContentEN: Wonderful His love to me!

ContentCN: 愛就是神成人樣式﹐
ContentEN: Love was when God became a man

ContentCN: 尊榮皆捨棄﹐受時空限制﹔
ContentEN: Locked in time and space without rank or place;

ContentCN: 愛就是神降生猶大﹐
ContentEN: Love was God born of Jewish kin,

ContentCN: 與漁人為友﹐生活木匠家。
ContentEN: Just a carpenter with some fishermen.

ContentCN: 愛就是耶穌行走於歷史﹐
ContentEN: Love was when Jesus walked in history -

ContentCN: 祂帶來新生﹐祂日日恩賜﹔
ContentEN: Lovingly He brought a new life that's free;

ContentCN: 愛就是主流血捨身﹐
ContentEN: Love was God nailed to bleed and die

ContentCN: 為拯救並愛如我罪人。
ContentEN: To reach and love one such as I.

ContentCN: 愛就是神降卑為人﹐
ContentEN: Love was when God became a man

ContentCN: 好使我得見祂愛我何深﹔
ContentEN: Down where I could see love that reached to me;

ContentCN: 愛就是主為我受死﹐
ContentEN: Love was God dying for my sin

ContentCN: 當我被罪捆﹐欲脫無望時﹔
ContentEN: And so trapped was I my whole world caved in.

ContentCN: 愛就是復活主與我同行﹐
ContentEN: Love was when Jesus rose to walk with me –

ContentCN: 祂日日賜我自由新生命﹔
ContentEN: Lovingly He brought a new life that's free;

ContentCN: 愛就是惟有神竟肯
ContentEN: Love was God – only He would try

ContentCN: 來拯救並愛如我罪人。
ContentEN: To reach and love one such as I.

ContentCN: 仰望真神羔羊﹗
ContentEN: Look to the Lamb of God,

ContentCN: 仰望真神羔羊﹗
ContentEN: Look to the Lamb of God,

ContentCN: 除耶穌以外﹐無別法拯救﹐
ContentEN: For He alone is able to save you,

ContentCN: 仰望真神羔羊﹗
ContentEN: Look to the Lamb of God.

ContentCN: 至佳音﹐天使在唱﹔至尊名﹐人間無雙﹔
ContentEN: Sweetest note in seraph song, sweetest name on mortal tongue,

ContentCN: 至美歌﹐天地頌揚﹔耶穌﹐可愛耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Sweetest carol ever sung, Jesus, blessed Jesus.

ContentCN: 至大醫生現今可近﹐滿有同情的耶穌﹔
ContentEN: The great Physician now is near, the sympathizing Jesus,

ContentCN: 祂發恩言愈人憂心﹐請你即來聽耶穌﹗
ContentEN: He speaks the drooping heart to cheer, oh, hear the voice of Jesus.

ContentCN: 至佳音﹐天使在唱﹔至尊名﹐人間無雙﹔
ContentEN: Sweetest note in seraph song, sweetest name on mortal tongue,

ContentCN: 至美歌﹐天地頌揚﹔耶穌﹐可愛耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Sweetest carol ever sung, Jesus, blessed Jesus.

ContentCN: 你罪縱多﹐祂盡寬恕﹐請你來聽這耶穌﹔
ContentEN: Your many sins are all forgiv'n. Oh, hear the voice of Jesus;

ContentCN: 一生行走通天的路﹐終戴華冠如耶穌。
ContentEN: Go on your way in peace to heav'n, and wear a crown with Jesus.

ContentCN: 至佳音﹐天使在唱﹔至尊名﹐人間無雙﹔
ContentEN: Sweetest note in seraph song, sweetest name on mortal tongue,

ContentCN: 至美歌﹐天地頌揚﹔耶穌﹐可愛耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Sweetest carol ever sung, Jesus, blessed Jesus.

ContentCN: 榮耀全歸復活羔羊﹐我今誠心信耶穌﹔
ContentEN: All glory to the dying Lamb, I now believe in Jesus;

ContentCN: 祂的大名何其芬芳﹐我愛可愛的耶穌。
ContentEN: I love the blessed Savior's name, I love the name of Jesus.

ContentCN: 至佳音﹐天使在唱﹔至尊名﹐人間無雙﹔
ContentEN: Sweetest note in seraph song, sweetest name on mortal tongue,

ContentCN: 至美歌﹐天地頌揚﹔耶穌﹐可愛耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Sweetest carol ever sung, Jesus, blessed Jesus.

ContentCN: 赦我愆尤﹐驅我憂懼﹐別無他名惟耶穌﹔
ContentEN: His name dispels my guilt and fear, no other name but Jesus;

ContentCN: 我心充滿何等欣愉﹐我聽有名叫耶穌。
ContentEN: Oh! How my soul delights to hear the precious name of Jesus!

ContentCN: 至佳音﹐天使在唱﹔至尊名﹐人間無雙﹔
ContentEN: Sweetest note in seraph song, sweetest name on mortal tongue,

ContentCN: 至美歌﹐天地頌揚﹔耶穌﹐可愛耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Sweetest carol ever sung, Jesus, blessed Jesus.

ContentCN: 不久我們升到天上﹐就要看見這耶穌﹔
ContentEN: And when to that bright world above we rise to be with Jesus,

ContentCN: 環繞寶座敬拜歌唱至高聖名主耶穌。
ContentEN: We'll sing around the throne of love His name, the name of Jesus.

ContentEN: Eternity! Eternity! How will you spend Eternity?

ContentCN: 當先解決這個問題﹐免得將來痛悔無及﹗
ContentEN: This question comes to you and me! How will you spend Eternity?

ContentCN: 得救沉淪都是永遠﹐你要如何過此永遠﹖
ContentEN: Tell me, what shall your answer be how will you spend Eternity?

ContentCN: 永遠永遠﹐永永遠遠﹗你要如何過此永遠﹖
ContentEN: Eternity! Eternity! How will you spend Eternity?

ContentCN: 多人現在揀選耶穌﹐離開他們一切罪途﹐
ContentEN: Many are choosing Christ today, turning from all their sins away;

ContentCN: 相信救主﹐接受救恩﹐得了重生﹐親近父神。
ContentEN: Christ shall their blessed portion be: how will you spend Eternity?

ContentCN: 永遠永遠﹐永永遠遠﹗你要如何過此永遠﹖
ContentEN: Eternity! Eternity! How will you spend Eternity?

ContentCN: 你若不入得救恩門﹐滅亡道上仍然馳奔﹐
ContentEN: Leaving the strait and narrow way, going the downward road today,

ContentCN: 現在請你仔細思量﹐至終結局將要怎樣﹖
ContentEN: What shall the final ending behow will you spend Eternity?

ContentCN: 永遠永遠﹐永永遠遠﹗你要如何過此永遠﹖
ContentEN: Eternity! Eternity! How will you spend Eternity?

ContentCN: 回頭信主趁此時辰﹐不被定罪﹐出死入生﹐
ContentEN: Turn, and believe this very hour, trust in the Savior's grace and power:

ContentCN: 你就可以歡然應說﹕我要永遠住在神國。
ContentEN: Then shall your joyous answer be, saved through a long Eternity!

ContentCN: 有佳客在你門外﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: There's a Stranger at the door, let Him in;

ContentCN: 祂忍耐等你門開﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: He has been there oft before, let Him in;

ContentCN: 讓祂進﹐切莫遲誤﹗
ContentEN: Let Him in, ere He is gone,

ContentCN: 祂乃是慈愛救主﹐
ContentEN: Let Him in, the Holy One,

ContentCN: 神兒子耶穌基督﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: Jesus Christ, the Father's Son, let Him in.

ContentCN: 速向祂敞開心懷﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: Open now to Him your heart, let Him in,

ContentCN: 恐怕祂就要離開﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: If you wait He will depart, let Him in;

ContentCN: 讓祂進﹐祂是你友﹐
ContentEN: Let Him in, He is your Friend,

ContentCN: 必將你靈魂拯救﹐
ContentEN: He your soul will sure defend,

ContentCN: 並將你永遠保守﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: He will keep you to the end, let Him in.

ContentCN: 趁今天聽祂慈聲﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: Hear you now His loving voice? Let Him in;

ContentCN: 趁現在將祂選定﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: Now, oh, now make Him your choice, let Him in;

ContentCN: 祂仍在門外站等﹐
ContentEN: He is standing at your door,

ContentCN: 要賜你永遠生命﹐
ContentEN: Joy to you He will restore,

ContentCN: 並使你喜樂歡騰﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: And His name you will adore, let Him in.

ContentCN: 就接祂進你心間﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: Now admit the heav'nly guest, let Him in,

ContentCN: 必與祂同赴恩筵﹐讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: He will make for you a feast, let Him in;

ContentCN: 祂必說"你罪赦免﹐
ContentEN: He will speak your sins forgiv'n.

ContentCN: 我賜你永遠平安﹐
ContentEN: And when earth ties all are riv'n,

ContentCN: 並使你永脫重擔。"讓祂進﹗
ContentEN: Comfort, rest, you will be giv'n, let Him in.

ContentCN: 要及時！要及時！
ContentEN: Be in time, be in time!

ContentCN: 當今耶穌在召喚﹕要及時！
ContentEN: While the voice of Jesus calls you, be in time!

ContentCN: 若在罪中仍流連﹐只怕恩門向你關﹐
ContentEN: If in sin you longer wait, you may find no open gate,

ContentCN: 那時呼救已太晚﹐要及時！
ContentEN: And your cry be just too late, be in time!

ContentCN: 飄渺人生何短暫﹐好似浮雲現即散﹐
ContentEN: Life at best is very brief like the falling of a leaf,

ContentCN: 又似幻夢醒就完﹐要及時！
ContentEN: Like the binding of a sheaf, be in time!

ContentCN: 時日飛逝在宣言﹕
ContentEN: Fleeting days are telling fast

ContentCN: 轉瞬就到死亡線﹐
ContentEN: That the die will soon be cast

ContentCN: 再遲必在地獄間﹐要及時！
ContentEN: And the fatal line be passed, be in time!

ContentCN: 要及時！要及時！
ContentEN: Be in time, be in time!

ContentCN: 當今耶穌在召喚﹕要及時！
ContentEN: While the voice of Jesus calls you, be in time!

ContentCN: 若在罪中仍流連﹐只怕恩門向你關﹐
ContentEN: If in sin you longer wait, you may find no open gate,

ContentCN: 那時呼救已太晚﹐要及時！
ContentEN: And your cry be just too late, be in time!

ContentCN: 誰是智者﹐該想看﹕鮮花朝豔暮凋殘﹐
ContentEN: Fairest flowers soon decay, youth and beauty pass away;

ContentCN: 英年要去何能挽﹖要及時！
ContentEN: Oh, you have not long to stay — be in time!

ContentCN: 哦﹐我求你早打算﹐
ContentEN: O I pray you count the cost!

ContentCN: 免得過了死亡線﹐
ContentEN: Ere the fatal line be cross'd,

ContentCN: 靈魂喪在地獄間﹐要及時！
ContentEN: And your soul in hell be lost — be in time!

ContentCN: 要及時！要及時！
ContentEN: Be in time, be in time!

ContentCN: 當今耶穌在召喚﹕要及時！
ContentEN: While the voice of Jesus calls you, be in time!

ContentCN: 若在罪中仍流連﹐只怕恩門向你關﹐
ContentEN: If in sin you longer wait, you may find no open gate,

ContentCN: 那時呼救已太晚﹐要及時！
ContentEN: And your cry be just too late, be in time!

ContentCN: 聖靈仍在把你感﹐時常與你來爭戰﹐
ContentEN: Time is gliding swiftly by, death and judgment draweth nigh,

ContentCN: 何不降服得平安﹖要及時！
ContentEN: To the arms of Jesus fly, Be in time!

ContentCN: 救主等候賜恩典﹐
ContentEN: While God's Spirit bids you come,

ContentCN: 願意救你免悲慘﹐
ContentEN: Sinner, do not longer roam

ContentCN: 你若躊躇何愚頑！要及時！
ContentEN: Lest you seal your hopeless doom, be in time!

ContentCN: 要及時！要及時！
ContentEN: Be in time, be in time!

ContentCN: 當今耶穌在召喚﹕要及時！
ContentEN: While the voice of Jesus calls you, be in time!

ContentCN: 若在罪中仍流連﹐只怕恩門向你關﹐
ContentEN: If in sin you longer wait, you may find no open gate,

ContentCN: 那時呼救已太晚﹐要及時！
ContentEN: And your cry be just too late, be in time!

ContentCN: 罪人﹐請聽我忠言﹐莫把救恩視等閒﹐
ContentEN: Sinner, heed the warning voice, make the Lord your final choice,

ContentCN: 速把救主來揀選﹐要及時！
ContentEN: Then all heaven will rejoice, be in time!

ContentCN: 來投耶穌懷裏面﹐
ContentEN: Come from darkness into light;

ContentCN: 來接基督進心間﹐
ContentEN: Come, let Jesus make you right;

ContentCN: 來就救主趁今天﹐要及時！
ContentEN: Come, receive His life tonight, be in time!

ContentEN: Just now your doubtings give o'er;

ContentCN: 現在﹐將救主投倚﹔

ContentEN: Almost persuaded Christ to receive;

ContentCN: 幾乎要聽勸﹐切勿離開﹗

ContentCN: 親友代你祈禱﹐天使望你趁早﹐
ContentEN: Jesus invites you here, Angels are ling'ring near,

ContentCN: 耶穌等你求告﹐迷人來吧﹗
ContentEN: Prayers rise from hearts so dear, O wand'rer, come.

ContentCN: 幾乎要聽勸﹐還誤機會﹗

ContentCN: 幾乎要聽勸﹐難免定罪﹗
ContentEN: Almost persuaded, doom comes at last!

ContentCN: 幾乎甚為不妥﹐"幾乎"鑄成大錯﹐
ContentEN: Almost cannot avail; "Almost" is but to fail!

ContentCN: 幾乎終於相左﹐"幾乎"…猶亡﹗
ContentEN: Sad, sad, that bitter wail, "Almost" - but lost.

ContentCN: 歸家﹗歸家﹗疲乏困倦者﹐歸家﹗
ContentEN: Come home, come home, ye who are weary come home;

ContentCN: 何等懇切慈愛﹐耶穌在呼召﹐
ContentEN: Earnestly, tenderly, Jesus is calling,

ContentCN: 呼召﹐哦﹐罪人﹐歸家﹗
ContentEN: Calling, O, sinner, come home!

ContentCN: 何等柔細慈愛﹐耶穌在呼召﹐
ContentEN: Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling,

ContentCN: 呼召你﹐也呼召我﹗
ContentEN: Calling for you and for me;

ContentCN: 祂在天上等待﹐也來地尋找﹐
ContentEN: See, on the portals He's waiting and watching,

ContentCN: 尋找你﹐也尋找我﹗
ContentEN: Watching for you and for me.

ContentCN: 歸家﹗歸家﹗疲乏困倦者﹐歸家﹗
ContentEN: Come home, come home, ye who are weary come home;

ContentCN: 何等懇切慈愛﹐耶穌在呼召﹐
ContentEN: Earnestly, tenderly, Jesus is calling,

ContentCN: 呼召﹐哦﹐罪人﹐歸家﹗
ContentEN: Calling, O, sinner, come home!

ContentCN: 為何糊塗遲延﹐不聽祂懇勸﹐
ContentEN: Why should we tarry when Jesus is pleading

ContentCN: 懇勸你﹐也懇勸我﹖
ContentEN: Pleading for you and for me?

ContentCN: 為何躊躇留戀﹐不理祂恩眷﹐
ContentEN: Why should we linger and heed not His mercies

ContentCN: 恩眷你﹐也恩眷我﹖
ContentEN: Mercies for you and for me?

ContentCN: 歸家﹗歸家﹗疲乏困倦者﹐歸家﹗
ContentEN: Come home, come home, ye who are weary come home;

ContentCN: 何等懇切慈愛﹐耶穌在呼召﹐
ContentEN: Earnestly, tenderly, Jesus is calling,

ContentCN: 呼召﹐哦﹐罪人﹐歸家﹗
ContentEN: Calling, O, sinner, come home!

ContentCN: 時間急急在逝﹐機會要越過﹐
ContentEN: Time is now fleeting, the moments are passing

ContentCN: 越過你﹐也越過我﹔
ContentEN: Passing from you and from me;

ContentCN: 陰影漸漸在集﹐死亡要來捉﹐
ContentEN: Shadows are gathering, death-beds are coming

ContentCN: 來捉你﹐也來捉我。
ContentEN: Coming for you and for me!

ContentCN: 歸家﹗歸家﹗疲乏困倦者﹐歸家﹗
ContentEN: Come home, come home, ye who are weary come home;

ContentCN: 何等懇切慈愛﹐耶穌在呼召﹐
ContentEN: Earnestly, tenderly, Jesus is calling,

ContentCN: 呼召﹐哦﹐罪人﹐歸家﹗
ContentEN: Calling, O, sinner, come home!

ContentCN: 哦那奇妙之愛﹐祂已經應許﹐
ContentEN: Oh, for the wonderful love He has promised

ContentCN: 應許你﹐也應許我﹔
ContentEN: Promised for you and for me!

ContentCN: 雖然污穢敗壞﹐祂仍必憐恤﹐
ContentEN: Though we have sinned, He has mercy and pardon

ContentCN: 憐恤你﹐也憐恤我。
ContentEN: Pardon for you and for me!

ContentCN: 今日召你﹗今日召你﹗
ContentEN: Calling today, calling today,

ContentCN: 耶穌今日召你﹐今日發慈聲呼召你﹗
ContentEN: Jesus is calling, is tenderly calling today.

ContentCN: 耶穌發慈聲要召你回來﹐
ContentEN: Jesus is tenderly calling you home,

ContentCN: 今日召你﹗今日召你﹗
ContentEN: Calling today, calling today,

ContentCN: 為何仍迷蒙﹐遠離主慈懷﹐
ContentEN: Why from the sunshine of love will you roam

ContentCN: 終日流蕩在苦地﹖
ContentEN: Farther and farther away?

ContentCN: 今日召你﹗今日召你﹗
ContentEN: Calling today, calling today,

ContentCN: 耶穌今日召你﹐今日發慈聲呼召你﹗
ContentEN: Jesus is calling, is tenderly calling today.

ContentCN: 耶穌在呼召勞者來得息﹐
ContentEN: Jesus is calling the weary to rest,

ContentCN: 今日召你﹐今日召你﹗
ContentEN: Calling today, calling today!

ContentCN: 重擔卸給祂﹐無倚成有倚﹐
ContentEN: Bring Him thy burden and thou shalt be blest:

ContentCN: 祂要歡迎不絕棄
ContentEN: He will not turn thee away.

ContentCN: 今日召你﹗今日召你﹗
ContentEN: Calling today, calling today,

ContentCN: 耶穌今日召你﹐今日發慈聲呼召你﹗
ContentEN: Jesus is calling, is tenderly calling today.

ContentCN: 耶穌在等待你來得赦免﹐
ContentEN: Jesus is waiting, O come to Him now!

ContentCN: 今日等你﹐今日等你﹗
ContentEN: Waiting today, waiting today!

ContentCN: 可帶你罪來﹐俯伏主腳前﹔
ContentEN: Come with thy sins, at His feet lowly bow;

ContentCN: 現在就來莫遲疑﹗
ContentEN: Come, and no longer delay.

ContentCN: 今日召你﹗今日召你﹗
ContentEN: Calling today, calling today,

ContentCN: 耶穌今日召你﹐今日發慈聲呼召你﹗
ContentEN: Jesus is calling, is tenderly calling today.

ContentCN: 耶穌仍呼召﹐何不就聽從﹖
ContentEN: Jesus is pleading, O list to His voice!

ContentCN: 今日聽祂﹗今日聽祂﹗
ContentEN: Hear Him today, hear Him today!

ContentCN: 來求告祂名﹐蒙恩必無窮﹔
ContentEN: They who believe on His name shall rejoice:

ContentCN: 他要賜福無復加
ContentEN: Quickly arise, come away!

ContentCN: 歡迎你來﹐無論甚麼人﹐
ContentEN: Come, and welcome, whosoever will,

ContentCN: 這是救主的呼召﹔祂能、祂肯、祂等﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis the Savior's gracious call; He is able, willing,

ContentCN: 等著施救恩﹐不過只要你信靠。
ContentEN: Waiting now to save, simply trust Him, that is all.

ContentCN: 耶穌今留步﹐要等候你來﹐
ContentEN: Jesus lingers still: 'tis for you He waits,

ContentCN: 祂已等候好久長﹔
ContentEN: And He's waiting for you long;

ContentCN: 祂這樣等候﹐是望你悔改﹐
ContentEN: He waits that heaven, with its fadeless joys,

ContentCN: 得享永生免滅亡。
ContentEN: May yet to you belong.

ContentCN: 歡迎你來﹐無論甚麼人﹐
ContentEN: Come, and welcome, whosoever will,

ContentCN: 這是救主的呼召﹔祂能、祂肯、祂等﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis the Savior's gracious call; He is able, willing,

ContentCN: 等著施救恩﹐不過只要你信靠。
ContentEN: Waiting now to save, simply trust Him, that is all.

ContentCN: 你雖然不羈﹐流蕩已經遠﹐
ContentEN: Though your wayward feet may have wandered far,

ContentCN: 沉溺罪中已經深﹔
ContentEN: And you're deeply sunk in sin;

ContentCN: 祂仍然等候﹐忍耐著申勸﹐
ContentEN: Yet the Savior waits, with His patient grace

ContentCN: 要得你這疲倦人。
ContentEN: Your stony heart to win.

ContentCN: 歡迎你來﹐無論甚麼人﹐
ContentEN: Come, and welcome, whosoever will,

ContentCN: 這是救主的呼召﹔祂能、祂肯、祂等﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis the Savior's gracious call; He is able, willing,

ContentCN: 等著施救恩﹐不過只要你信靠。
ContentEN: Waiting now to save, simply trust Him, that is all.

ContentCN: 你雖已多次拒祂的恩召﹐
ContentEN: Though His gracious call you have oft refused

ContentCN: 多次使祂空眷顧﹐
ContentEN: And He's sought your trust in vain;

ContentCN: 祂的愛不因你冷落生惱﹐
ContentEN: Yet, with love unchanged by your cold neglect

ContentCN: 今又向你來催促。
ContentEN: He is seeking you again.

ContentCN: 歡迎你來﹐無論甚麼人﹐
ContentEN: Come, and welcome, whosoever will,

ContentCN: 這是救主的呼召﹔祂能、祂肯、祂等﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis the Savior's gracious call; He is able, willing,

ContentCN: 等著施救恩﹐不過只要你信靠。
ContentEN: Waiting now to save, simply trust Him, that is all.

ContentCN: 你應當服降﹐服降這個愛﹐
ContentEN: Oh, surrender now! Yield to love divine;

ContentCN: 耶穌現在等候你﹔
ContentEN: Jesus lingers for you still:

ContentCN: 祂既仍召呼﹕"請你就我來﹗"
ContentEN: While in grace He says, "Oh, come to Me,"

ContentCN: 你當回應﹕"我願意。"
ContentEN: Let your answer be, "I will."

ContentCN: 只要信祂﹗只要信祂﹗現在要信祂﹗
ContentEN: Only trust Him, only trust Him, only trust Him now;

ContentCN: 祂要救你﹗祂要救你﹗現在要救你﹗
ContentEN: He will save you, He will save you, He will save you now.

ContentCN: 被罪壓害﹐人人請來﹐救主充滿愛憐﹔
ContentEN: Come, ev'ry soul by sin oppressed, there's mercy with the Lord,

ContentCN: 祂要救你﹐安你心懷﹐只要信祂恩言。
ContentEN: And He will surely give you rest by trusting in His word.

ContentCN: 只要信祂﹗只要信祂﹗現在要信祂﹗
ContentEN: Only trust Him, only trust Him, only trust Him now;

ContentCN: 祂要救你﹗祂要救你﹗現在要救你﹗
ContentEN: He will save you, He will save you, He will save you now.

ContentCN: 耶穌為賜豐富恩典﹐已經流出寶血﹔
ContentEN: For Jesus shed His precious blood rich blessings to bestow;

ContentCN: 你若投此硃紅泉源﹐必得潔白如雪。
ContentEN: Plunge now into the crimson flood that washeth white as snow.

ContentCN: 只要信祂﹗只要信祂﹗現在要信祂﹗
ContentEN: Only trust Him, only trust Him, only trust Him now;

ContentCN: 祂要救你﹗祂要救你﹗現在要救你﹗
ContentEN: He will save you, He will save you, He will save you now.

ContentCN: 是的﹐主是道路、真理﹐引人進入安息﹔
ContentEN: Yes, Jesus is the Truth, the Way, that leads you into rest;

ContentCN: 立即相信﹐勿再遲疑﹐必得永生福氣。
ContentEN: Believe in Him without delay, and you are fully blest.

ContentCN: 只要信祂﹗只要信祂﹗現在要信祂﹗
ContentEN: Only trust Him, only trust Him, only trust Him now;

ContentCN: 祂要救你﹗祂要救你﹗現在要救你﹗
ContentEN: He will save you, He will save you, He will save you now.

ContentCN: 來阿﹗加入這個聖隊﹐同向榮耀直往﹔
ContentEN: Come then, and join this holy band, and on to glory go;

ContentCN: 美麗天城無憂無淚﹐不息之樂永享。
ContentEN: To dwell in that celestial land where joys immortal flow.

ContentCN: 照我本相﹐無善足稱﹐
ContentEN: Just as I am, without one plea,

ContentCN: 惟祢流血﹐替我受懲﹐
ContentEN: But that Thy blood was shed for me,

ContentCN: 並且召我就祢得生﹐
ContentEN: And that Thou bid'st me come to Thee,

ContentCN: 救主耶穌﹐我來﹗我來﹗
ContentEN: O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

ContentCN: 照我本相﹐不必等到
ContentEN: Just as I am, and waiting not

ContentCN: 自己改變比前更好﹔
ContentEN: To rid my soul of one dark blot;

ContentCN: 因祢寶血除罪可靠﹐
ContentEN: To Thee whose blood can cleanse each spot,

ContentCN: 救主耶穌﹐我來﹗我來﹗
ContentEN: O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

ContentCN: 照我本相﹐反覆不定﹐
ContentEN: Just as I am, though tossed about

ContentCN: 疑信參半﹐如浪不平﹔
ContentEN: With many a conflict, many a doubt;

ContentCN: 內有掛慮﹐外有惡行
ContentEN: Fightings within, and fears without,

ContentCN: 救主耶穌﹐我來﹗我來﹗
ContentEN: O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

ContentCN: 照我本相﹐貧、瞎、可憐﹐
ContentEN: Just as I am, poor, wretched, blind;

ContentCN: 我真需要祢的恩典﹐
ContentEN: Sight, riches, healing of the mind;

ContentCN: 感我惡心﹐開我盲眼﹔
ContentEN: Yes, all I need, in Thee to find,

ContentCN: 救主耶穌﹐我來﹗我來﹗
ContentEN: O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

ContentCN: 照我本相﹐祢肯收留﹐
ContentEN: Just as I am, Thou wilt receive,

ContentCN: 賜我生命﹐赦我愆尤﹔
ContentEN: Wilt welcome, pardon, cleanse, relieve;

ContentCN: 祢既應許﹐必定成就﹐
ContentEN: Because Thy promise I believe,

ContentCN: 救主耶穌﹐我來﹗我來﹗
ContentEN: O Lamb of God, I come! I come!

ContentCN: 主﹐我來就祢﹗我今來就祢﹗
ContentEN: I am coming, Lord! Coming now to Thee!

ContentCN: 求主用血將我洗﹔使我乾淨無比。
ContentEN: Wash me, cleanse me, in the blood that flowed on Calvary.

ContentCN: 祢的歡迎聲音﹐召我前來相信﹔
ContentEN: I hear Thy welcome voice, that calls me, Lord, to Thee,

ContentCN: 因祢為我已流寶血﹐特要洗我良心。
ContentEN: For cleansing in Thy precious blood that flowed on Calvary.

ContentCN: 主﹐我來就祢﹗我今來就祢﹗
ContentEN: I am coming, Lord! Coming now to Thee!

ContentCN: 求主用血將我洗﹔使我乾淨無比。
ContentEN: Wash me, cleanse me, in the blood that flowed on Calvary.

ContentCN: 我真污穢可鄙﹐行善一無能力﹔
ContentEN: Though coming weak and vile, Thou dost my strength assure;

ContentCN: 但祢歡喜賜恩幫助﹐並除一切惡跡。
ContentEN: Thou dost my vileness fully cleanse, till spotless all and pure.

ContentCN: 主﹐我來就祢﹗我今來就祢﹗
ContentEN: I am coming, Lord! Coming now to Thee!

ContentCN: 求主用血將我洗﹔使我乾淨無比。
ContentEN: Wash me, cleanse me, in the blood that flowed on Calvary.

ContentCN: 祢今鄭重吩咐﹐要我遠離罪途﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis Jesus who confirms the blessed work within,

ContentCN: 虛心悔改﹐實心相信﹐豫備奔跑天路。
ContentEN: By adding grace to welcome grace, where reigned the power of sin.

ContentCN: 主﹐我來就祢﹗我今來就祢﹗
ContentEN: I am coming, Lord! Coming now to Thee!

ContentCN: 求主用血將我洗﹔使我乾淨無比。
ContentEN: Wash me, cleanse me, in the blood that flowed on Calvary.

ContentCN: 神用恩言呼召﹐又用聖靈光照﹐
ContentEN: 'Tis Jesus calls me on to perfect faith and love,

ContentCN: 使我知道自己不堪﹐知道救主可靠。
ContentEN: To perfect hope, and peace and trust, for earth and heav'n above.

ContentCN: 主﹐我來就祢﹗我今來就祢﹗
ContentEN: I am coming, Lord! Coming now to Thee!

ContentCN: 求主用血將我洗﹔使我乾淨無比。
ContentEN: Wash me, cleanse me, in the blood that flowed on Calvary.

ContentCN: 聖靈今在我靈﹐證明我有生命﹔
ContentEN: And He the witness gives to loyal hearts and free,

ContentCN: 神的應許已經應驗﹐因我已信祂名。
ContentEN: That every promise is fulfilled if faith but brings the plea.

ContentCN: 主﹐我來就祢﹗我今來就祢﹗
ContentEN: I am coming, Lord! Coming now to Thee!

ContentCN: 求主用血將我洗﹔使我乾淨無比。
ContentEN: Wash me, cleanse me, in the blood that flowed on Calvary.

ContentCN: 奇哉﹗神愛罪人﹗妙哉﹗神有救恩﹗
ContentEN: All hail, atoning blood! All hail, redeeming grace!

ContentCN: 美哉﹗耶穌流血贖罪﹗我願獻上全身﹗
ContentEN: All hail, the gift of Christ our Lord our strength and righteousness.
