ContentCN: 回家罷﹗回家罷﹗不要再流蕩﹗
ContentEN: Coming home, coming home, never more to roam;

ContentCN: 慈愛膀臂向我伸張﹐主﹐我要回家。
ContentEN: Open wide Thine arms of love; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 我正流蕩遠離天父﹐現在要回家﹔
ContentEN: I've wandered far away from God, now I'm coming home;

ContentCN: 走過好長罪惡道路﹐主﹐我要回家。
ContentEN: The paths of sin too long I've trod; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 回家罷﹗回家罷﹗不要再流蕩﹗
ContentEN: Coming home, coming home, never more to roam;

ContentCN: 慈愛膀臂向我伸張﹐主﹐我要回家。
ContentEN: Open wide Thine arms of love; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 多年浪費寶貴歲月﹐現在要回家﹔
ContentEN: I've wasted many precious years, now I'm coming home;

ContentCN: 今天懊悔流淚悲切﹐主﹐我要回家。
ContentEN: I now repent with bitter tears; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 回家罷﹗回家罷﹗不要再流蕩﹗
ContentEN: Coming home, coming home, never more to roam;

ContentCN: 慈愛膀臂向我伸張﹐主﹐我要回家。
ContentEN: Open wide Thine arms of love; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 流蕩犯罪我已疲乏﹐現在要回家﹔
ContentEN: I'm tired of sin and straying, Lord, now I'm coming home;

ContentCN: 投靠祢愛﹐相信祢話﹐主﹐我要回家。
ContentEN: I'll trust Thy love, believe Thy word; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 回家罷﹗回家罷﹗不要再流蕩﹗
ContentEN: Coming home, coming home, never more to roam;

ContentCN: 慈愛膀臂向我伸張﹐主﹐我要回家。
ContentEN: Open wide Thine arms of love; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 我魂衰殘﹐我心悲傷﹐現在要回家﹔
ContentEN: My soul is sick, my heart is sore, now I'm coming home;

ContentCN: 加我力量﹐復我盼望﹐主﹐我要回家。
ContentEN: My strength renew, my hope restore; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 回家罷﹗回家罷﹗不要再流蕩﹗
ContentEN: Coming home, coming home, never more to roam;

ContentCN: 慈愛膀臂向我伸張﹐主﹐我要回家。
ContentEN: Open wide Thine arms of love; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 惟祢是我所求所望﹐現在要回家﹔
ContentEN: My only hope, my only plea, now I'm coming home;

ContentCN: 因祢替我血流命喪﹐我今要回家。
ContentEN: That Jesus died, and died for me; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 回家罷﹗回家罷﹗不要再流蕩﹗
ContentEN: Coming home, coming home, never more to roam;

ContentCN: 慈愛膀臂向我伸張﹐主﹐我要回家。
ContentEN: Open wide Thine arms of love; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 我心切需洗罪寶血﹐現在要回家﹔
ContentEN: I need His cleansing blood, I know, now I'm coming home;

ContentCN: 洗我罪污潔白如雪﹐我今要回家。
ContentEN: Oh wash me whiter than the snow; Lord, I'm coming home.

ContentCN: 救主耶穌﹐聽我呼求﹕惟祢是我盼望、拯救﹔
ContentEN: O Jesus, Saviour, hear my call, while at Thy feet I humbly fall:

ContentCN: 今在祢前謙卑伏拜﹐救主耶穌﹐我來﹗
ContentEN: To Thee my Hope, my Life, my all, O Blessed Lord, I come!

ContentCN: 我來就祢﹐無他倚賴﹐祢已為我捨命還債﹔
ContentEN: I come and this my only plea, that Thou didst give Thyself for me;

ContentCN: 今帶罪擔投靠祢愛﹐救主耶穌﹐我來﹗
ContentEN: And casting all my care on Thee, O blessed Lord, I come!

ContentCN: 進入我心﹗進入我心﹗來進入我心﹐主耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Into my heart, into my heart, come into my heart, Lord Jesus;

ContentCN: 求祢現今進來施恩﹐來進入我心﹐主耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Come in today, come in to stay, come into my heart, Lord Jesus.

ContentCN: 來進入我心﹐親愛耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Come into my heart, O Lord Jesus,

ContentCN: 進入我心﹐是我懇求﹔
ContentEN: Come into my heart, I pray;

ContentCN: 我心靈重擔極其沉重﹐今即求進入我心。
ContentEN: My soul is so troubled and weary, come into my heart today.

ContentCN: 進入我心﹗進入我心﹗來進入我心﹐主耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Into my heart, into my heart, come into my heart, Lord Jesus;

ContentCN: 求祢現今進來施恩﹐來進入我心﹐主耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Come in today, come in to stay, come into my heart, Lord Jesus.

ContentCN: 來進入我心﹐親愛耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Come into my heart, O Lord Jesus,

ContentCN: 疲倦人生祢是我需﹔
ContentEN: I need Thee through life's dreary way;

ContentCN: 我罪惡重擔何等沉重﹐今即求居住我心。
ContentEN: The burden of sin is so heavy, come into my heart to stay.

ContentCN: 進入我心﹗進入我心﹗來進入我心﹐主耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Into my heart, into my heart, come into my heart, Lord Jesus;

ContentCN: 求祢現今進來施恩﹐來進入我心﹐主耶穌﹗
ContentEN: Come in today, come in to stay, come into my heart, Lord Jesus.

ContentCN: 來進入我心﹐親愛耶穌﹐
ContentEN: Come into my heart, O Lord Jesus,

ContentCN: 願祢榮光照耀我魂﹔
ContentEN: Now cleanse and illumine my soul;

ContentCN: 奇妙聖靈今充滿我靈﹐今即求掌管我心。
ContentEN: Fill me with Thy wonderful Spirit, come in and take full control.

ContentCN: 救主﹐救主﹐請聽我禱告﹔
ContentEN: Savior, Savior, hear my humble cry;

ContentCN: 當祢正向別人召呼﹐莫把我漏掉。
ContentEN: While on others Thou art calling, do not pass me by.

ContentCN: 別忘記我﹐慈愛救主﹐請聽我禱告﹔
ContentEN: Pass me not, O gentle Savior; hear my humble cry;

ContentCN: 當祢正向別人召呼﹐莫把我漏掉。
ContentEN: While on others Thou art calling, do not pass me by.

ContentCN: 救主﹐救主﹐請聽我禱告﹔
ContentEN: Savior, Savior, hear my humble cry;

ContentCN: 當祢正向別人召呼﹐莫把我漏掉。
ContentEN: While on others Thou art calling, do not pass me by.

ContentCN: 讓我在祢施恩座前﹐從祢得救恩﹔
ContentEN: Let me at Thy throne of mercy find a sweet relief;

ContentCN: 俯伏痛悔﹐承認罪愆﹐求祢助我信。
ContentEN: Kneeling there in deep contrition, help my unbelief.

ContentCN: 救主﹐救主﹐請聽我禱告﹔
ContentEN: Savior, Savior, hear my humble cry;

ContentCN: 當祢正向別人召呼﹐莫把我漏掉。
ContentEN: While on others Thou art calling, do not pass me by.

ContentCN: 單單靠賴十架功能﹐我尋求祢面﹔
ContentEN: Trusting only in Thy merit, would I seek Thy face;

ContentCN: 醫我傷痛、破碎心靈﹐救我用恩典。
ContentEN: Heal my wounded, broken spirit, save me by Thy grace.

ContentCN: 救主﹐救主﹐請聽我禱告﹔
ContentEN: Savior, Savior, hear my humble cry;

ContentCN: 當祢正向別人召呼﹐莫把我漏掉。
ContentEN: While on others Thou art calling, do not pass me by.

ContentCN: 祢是我的安慰源頭﹐於我比命貴﹔
ContentEN: Thou the spring of all my comfort, more than life to me;

ContentCN: 除祢之外﹐在地何投﹖在天何所歸﹖
ContentEN: Whom have I on earth beside Thee? Whom in heaven but Thee?

ContentCN: 使我成祝福﹐使我成祝福﹐
ContentEN: Make me a blessing, make me a blessing,

ContentCN: 願主榮光從我四射﹔
ContentEN: Out of my life may Jesus shine;

ContentCN: 使我成祝福﹐這是我禱告﹐
ContentEN: Make me a blessing, O Savior, I pray,

ContentCN: 願有人今日從我得祝福。
ContentEN: Make me a blessing to someone today.

ContentCN: 在人生紛歧曲折途徑中﹐
ContentEN: Out in the highways and byways of life,

ContentCN: 多人正疲倦困頓﹔
ContentEN: Many are weary and sad;

ContentCN: 黑暗籠罩﹐快將真光照明﹐
ContentEN: Carry the sunshine where darkness is rife,

ContentCN: 使憂傷者得歡欣。
ContentEN: Making the sorrowing glad.

ContentCN: 使我成祝福﹐使我成祝福﹐
ContentEN: Make me a blessing, make me a blessing,

ContentCN: 願主榮光從我四射﹔
ContentEN: Out of my life may Jesus shine;

ContentCN: 使我成祝福﹐這是我禱告﹐
ContentEN: Make me a blessing, O Savior, I pray,

ContentCN: 願有人今日從我得祝福。
ContentEN: Make me a blessing to someone today.

ContentCN: 將主赦罪大能並祂大愛﹐
ContentEN: Tell the sweet story of Christ and His love,

ContentCN: 儘速向人廣傳揚﹔
ContentEN: Tell of His pow'r to forgive;

ContentCN: 這些在你身若時刻真實﹐
ContentEN: Others will trust Him if only you prove

ContentCN: 別人即將歸救主。
ContentEN: True, every moment you live.

ContentCN: 使我成祝福﹐使我成祝福﹐
ContentEN: Make me a blessing, make me a blessing,

ContentCN: 願主榮光從我四射﹔
ContentEN: Out of my life may Jesus shine;

ContentCN: 使我成祝福﹐這是我禱告﹐
ContentEN: Make me a blessing, O Savior, I pray,

ContentCN: 願有人今日從我得祝福。
ContentEN: Make me a blessing to someone today.

ContentCN: 我給﹐因主曾白白賜給我﹐
ContentEN: Give as 'twas given to you in your need,

ContentCN: 我愛﹐因主曾愛我﹔
ContentEN: Love as the Master loved you;

ContentCN: 願我真成為無助者之助﹐
ContentEN: Be to the helpless a helper indeed,

ContentCN: 使我完成祂託付。
ContentEN: Unto your mission be true.

ContentCN: 愛主﹐要我何去﹐我就去﹐無論平地或山河﹔
ContentEN: I'll go where you want me to go, dear Lord, o'er mountain or plain or sea;

ContentCN: 要我去說何語﹐我就說何語﹐要我如何就如何。
ContentEN: I'll say what you want me to say, dear Lord, I'll be what you want me to be.

ContentCN: 主要我事奉祂的所在﹐未必是遠隔重洋﹐
ContentEN: It may not be on the mountain's height, or over the stormy sea,

ContentCN: 未必是在高山的巉崖﹐或在危險的異鄉﹔
ContentEN: It may not be at the battle's front my Lord will have need of me;

ContentCN: 但是祂若微聲召我去-我不知道的地區﹐
ContentEN: But if by a still, small voice He calls to paths I do not know,

ContentCN: 愛主﹐我必欣然答應不猶豫﹕
ContentEN: I'll answer, dear Lord, with my hand in Thine,

ContentCN: 要我何去﹐我就去。
ContentEN: I'll go where You want me to go.

ContentCN: 愛主﹐要我何去﹐我就去﹐無論平地或山河﹔
ContentEN: I'll go where you want me to go, dear Lord, o'er mountain or plain or sea;

ContentCN: 要我去說何語﹐我就說何語﹐要我如何就如何。
ContentEN: I'll say what you want me to say, dear Lord, I'll be what you want me to be.

ContentCN: 也許今天就有神恩言﹐是主要我去呼喊﹐
ContentEN: Perhaps today there are loving words which Jesus would have me speak,

ContentCN: 也許現在罪惡途徑間﹐有人要我去追還﹔
ContentEN: There may be now in the paths of sin some wand'rer whom I should seek;

ContentCN: 救主﹐祢若親自來帶領﹐道路雖然暗無光﹐
ContentEN: O Saviour, if Thou wilt be my guide, tho' dark and rugged the way,

ContentCN: 我的聲音要響應祢的佳音﹐
ContentEN: My voice shall echo the message sweet,

ContentCN: 要我怎講﹐我就講。
ContentEN: I'll say that You want me to say.

ContentCN: 愛主﹐要我何去﹐我就去﹐無論平地或山河﹔
ContentEN: I'll go where you want me to go, dear Lord, o'er mountain or plain or sea;

ContentCN: 要我去說何語﹐我就說何語﹐要我如何就如何。
ContentEN: I'll say what you want me to say, dear Lord, I'll be what you want me to be.

ContentCN: 在這世界廣大禾田間﹐總有我的一寸土﹐
ContentEN: There's surely somewhere a lowly place in earth's harvest fields so wide,

ContentCN: 我能夠花費此生餘年﹐為著我的受死主﹔
ContentEN: Where I may labor thro' life's short day for Jesus, the Crucified;

ContentCN: 我將自己交託祢手裏﹐知道你愛我深刻﹐
ContentEN: So trusting my all unto Thy care I know Thou lovest me!

ContentCN: 我要從我心裏順服祢旨意﹐
ContentEN: I'll do Thy will with a heart sincere.

ContentCN: 要我如何﹐就如何。
ContentEN: I'll be what You want me to be.

ContentCN: 要忠心！忠心！讓此聲四面回響﹔
ContentEN: Be true! Be true! Let the holy watchword ring;

ContentCN: 忠心！要忠心！忠於你的榮耀王。
ContentEN: Be true to your trust, be true to your glorious King;

ContentCN: 要忠心！忠心！縱然伴侶都失敗﹔
ContentEN: Be true! Be true! Whether friends be false or few;

ContentCN: 無論何境況﹐必站主一邊﹐讓主常見你忠心。
ContentEN: Whatsoe'er betide, ever at His side, let Him always find you true.

ContentCN: 從基督學校我們今要出發﹐
ContentEN: We are going forth from the school of Jesus,

ContentCN: 回想曾坐在主腳前﹔
ContentEN: We have sat at His blessed feet.

ContentCN: 我們暢飲於神聖真理活泉﹐
ContentEN: We have drunk from truth's celestial fountain,

ContentCN: 嘗其味有如蜜甘甜。
ContentEN: We have tasted its honey sweet.

ContentCN: 如今要見證我們親愛救主﹐
ContentEN: We are witnesses for our blessed Master

ContentCN: 在這陌生的世界﹔
ContentEN: In a world where friends are few;

ContentCN: 祂差遣我們﹐用此神聖指引﹐
ContentEN: And He sends us forth with the watchword holy,

ContentCN: 無論何代價要忠心。
ContentEN: Whatsoe'er it costs, "Be true."

ContentCN: 要忠心！忠心！讓此聲四面回響﹔
ContentEN: Be true! Be true! Let the holy watchword ring;

ContentCN: 忠心！要忠心！忠於你的榮耀王。
ContentEN: Be true to your trust, be true to your glorious King;

ContentCN: 要忠心！忠心！縱然伴侶都失敗﹔
ContentEN: Be true! Be true! Whether friends be false or few;

ContentCN: 無論何境況﹐必站主一邊﹐讓主常見你忠心。
ContentEN: Whatsoe'er betide, ever at His side, let Him always find you true.

ContentCN: 從禱告小樓我們今正出發﹐
ContentEN: We are going forth from the upper chamber,

ContentCN: 五旬能力如火焚燒﹔
ContentEN: From the days of our Pentecost,

ContentCN: 我們獻自己向主完全降服﹐
ContentEN: We have giv'n ourselves in a full surrender,

ContentCN: 並且被聖靈來充滿。
ContentEN: And been filled with the Holy Ghost.

ContentCN: 我們今往前正如主的活信﹐
ContentEN: We are going forth as epistles holy,

ContentCN: 要傳播基督馨香﹔
ContentEN: And to live as Christ would do;

ContentCN: 一舉一動要將我主來流露﹐
ContentEN: Let us always represent our Master,

ContentCN: 一生一世都要忠心。
ContentEN: Let our life be always true.

ContentCN: 要忠心！忠心！讓此聲四面回響﹔
ContentEN: Be true! Be true! Let the holy watchword ring;

ContentCN: 忠心！要忠心！忠於你的榮耀王。
ContentEN: Be true to your trust, be true to your glorious King;

ContentCN: 要忠心！忠心！縱然伴侶都失敗﹔
ContentEN: Be true! Be true! Whether friends be false or few;

ContentCN: 無論何境況﹐必站主一邊﹐讓主常見你忠心。
ContentEN: Whatsoe'er betide, ever at His side, let Him always find you true.

ContentCN: 從榮耀使命我們今正出發﹐
ContentEN: We are going forth with a glorious mission,

ContentCN: 有如天國所遣使者﹔
ContentEN: As ambassadors for God,

ContentCN: 我們奉差遣傳揚救主慈祥﹐
ContentEN: We are sent with heaven's last word of mercy,

ContentCN: 在全世界每一角落。
ContentEN: Over all the world abroad.

ContentCN: 奉派去拯救黑暗憂傷靈魂﹐
ContentEN: We are sent to save from the blight of sorrow,

ContentCN: 消除罪惡與咒詛﹔
ContentEN: And the curse of sin undo;

ContentCN: 哦﹐這是如此神聖嚴肅託付﹐
ContentEN: With a work so grand and a trust so holy,

ContentCN: 怎能不為主盡忠心！
ContentEN: Oh, what heart would not be true?

ContentCN: 主﹐我不過是祢運河﹐祢要流出祢生命﹔
ContentEN: Channels only, blessed Master, but with all Thy wondrous pow'r

ContentCN: 求祢用我﹐解人乾渴﹐無有時間無止境。
ContentEN: Flowing through us, Thou canst use us ev'ry day and ev'ry hour.

ContentCN: 我已得蒙寶血洗淨﹐嘗過天上的喜樂﹔
ContentEN: How I praise Thee, precious Saviour, that Thy love laid hold of me;

ContentCN: 得著生命﹐充滿聖靈﹐好使我成祢運河。
ContentEN: Thou hast saved and cleansed and filled me, that I might Thy channel be.

ContentCN: 主﹐我不過是祢運河﹐祢要流出祢生命﹔
ContentEN: Channels only, blessed Master, but with all Thy wondrous pow'r

ContentCN: 求祢用我﹐解人乾渴﹐無有時間無止境。
ContentEN: Flowing through us, Thou canst use us ev'ry day and ev'ry hour.

ContentCN: 不過作一祝福運河﹐運給四圍的渴人﹔
ContentEN: Just a channel, full of blessing, to the thirsty hearts around;

ContentCN: 運給他們救恩快樂﹐並賜滿足的父神。
ContentEN: To tell out Thy full salvation, all Thy loving message sound.

ContentCN: 主﹐我不過是祢運河﹐祢要流出祢生命﹔
ContentEN: Channels only, blessed Master, but with all Thy wondrous pow'r

ContentCN: 求祢用我﹐解人乾渴﹐無有時間無止境。
ContentEN: Flowing through us, Thou canst use us ev'ry day and ev'ry hour.

ContentCN: 倒空﹐好讓祢來充滿﹐潔淨﹐好讓祢使令﹔
ContentEN: Emptied that Thou shouldest fill me a clean vessel in Thine hand;

ContentCN: 無力﹐只有祢的能幹﹐隨祢命令來供應。
ContentEN: With no pow'r but as Thou givest, graciously with each command.

ContentCN: 主﹐我不過是祢運河﹐祢要流出祢生命﹔
ContentEN: Channels only, blessed Master, but with all Thy wondrous pow'r

ContentCN: 求祢用我﹐解人乾渴﹐無有時間無止境。
ContentEN: Flowing through us, Thou canst use us ev'ry day and ev'ry hour.

ContentCN: 救主﹐求將聖靈充滿這個已經奉獻身﹔
ContentEN: Jesus, fill now with Thy Spirit, hearts that full surrender know;

ContentCN: 好讓活水如河一般﹐從我裏面直流奔。
ContentEN: That the streams of living water from our inner man may flow.

ContentCN: 再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹔
ContentEN: Toiling on, toiling on, toiling on, toiling on;

ContentCN: 常盼望﹐常儆醒﹐再殷勤直等主降臨。
ContentEN: Let us hope, let us watch, and labor till the Master comes.

ContentCN: 去作工﹐去作工﹐神僕人當盡忠﹔
ContentEN: To the work! to the work! We are servants of God,

ContentCN: 主腳蹤﹐何佳美﹐我們要緊跟從。
ContentEN: Let us follow the path that our Master has trod;

ContentCN: 主必要賜膏油﹐使力量得更新﹔
ContentEN: With the balm of His counsel our strength to renew,

ContentCN: 去作工﹐手不歇﹐盡全力﹐盡全心。
ContentEN: Let us do with our might what our hands find to do.

ContentCN: 再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹔
ContentEN: Toiling on, toiling on, toiling on, toiling on;

ContentCN: 常盼望﹐常儆醒﹐再殷勤直等主降臨。
ContentEN: Let us hope, let us watch, and labor till the Master comes.

ContentCN: 去作工﹐去作工﹐叫饑者得飽足﹐
ContentEN: To the work! to the work! let the hungry be fed;

ContentCN: 引倦者近活泉﹐得活力和安舒﹔
ContentEN: To the fountain of life let the weary be led;

ContentCN: 十架是我旌旗﹐我榮耀﹐我奇珍﹐
ContentEN: In the cross and its banner our glory shall be,

ContentCN: 向萬人去傳揚﹕主白白救贖恩。
ContentEN: While we herald the tidings, "Salvation is free!"

ContentCN: 再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹔
ContentEN: Toiling on, toiling on, toiling on, toiling on;

ContentCN: 常盼望﹐常儆醒﹐再殷勤直等主降臨。
ContentEN: Let us hope, let us watch, and labor till the Master comes.

ContentCN: 去作工﹐去作工﹐每一人有一分﹔
ContentEN: To the work! to the work! there is labor for all;

ContentCN: 黑暗國﹐錯謬理﹐必失敗﹐必消沉。
ContentEN: For the kingdom of darkness and error shall fall;

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐寶貝名﹐必高舉成至尊﹔
ContentEN: And the name of Jehovah exalted shall be,

ContentCN: 讓我們高聲唱﹕主白白救贖恩。
ContentEN: In the loud swelling chorus, "Salvation is free!"

ContentCN: 再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹐再殷勤﹔
ContentEN: Toiling on, toiling on, toiling on, toiling on;

ContentCN: 常盼望﹐常儆醒﹐再殷勤直等主降臨。
ContentEN: Let us hope, let us watch, and labor till the Master comes.

ContentCN: 去作工﹐去作工﹐靠主恩得力量﹔
ContentEN: To the work! to the work! in the strength of the Lord,

ContentCN: 細麻衣﹐金冠冕﹐那日是我獎賞。
ContentEN: And a robe and a crown shall our labor reward,

ContentCN: 當我們抵天家﹐要領悟主深恩﹔
ContentEN: When the home of the faithful our dwelling shall be,

ContentCN: 與贖民同頌揚﹕主白白救贖恩。
ContentEN: And we shout with the ransomed, "Salvation is free!"

ContentCN: 快樂﹐快樂﹐事奉主真快樂﹐
ContentEN: There is joy, joy, joy in serving Jesus,

ContentCN: 不斷在我心湧溢﹐當我支取祂能力﹐
ContentEN: Joy that throbs within my heart; every moment, every hour,

ContentCN: 時刻遵行祂旨意﹐真有快樂﹐快樂永遠不稍離。
ContentEN: As I draw upon His pow'r, there is joy, joy, joy that never shall depart.

ContentCN: 事奉耶穌真有快樂﹐當我旅程中往前﹔
ContentEN: There is joy in serving Jesus, as I journey on my way,

ContentCN: 使我心中每時每刻湧出讚美向祂獻。
ContentEN: Joy that fills the heart with praises, every hour and every day.

ContentCN: 快樂﹐快樂﹐事奉主真快樂﹐
ContentEN: There is joy, joy, joy in serving Jesus,

ContentCN: 不斷在我心湧溢﹐當我支取祂能力﹐
ContentEN: Joy that throbs within my heart; every moment, every hour,

ContentCN: 時刻遵行祂旨意﹐真有快樂﹐快樂永遠不稍離。
ContentEN: As I draw upon His pow'r, there is joy, joy, joy that never shall depart.

ContentCN: 事奉耶穌真有快樂﹐能勝一切的苦痛﹔
ContentEN: There is joy in serving Jesus, joy that triumphs over pain;

ContentCN: 我魂充滿天上樂歌﹐我口應和同歌頌。
ContentEN: Fills my soul with heaven's music, till I join the glad refrain.

ContentCN: 快樂﹐快樂﹐事奉主真快樂﹐
ContentEN: There is joy, joy, joy in serving Jesus,

ContentCN: 不斷在我心湧溢﹐當我支取祂能力﹐
ContentEN: Joy that throbs within my heart; every moment, every hour,

ContentCN: 時刻遵行祂旨意﹐真有快樂﹐快樂永遠不稍離。
ContentEN: As I draw upon His pow'r, there is joy, joy, joy that never shall depart.

ContentCN: 事奉耶穌真有快樂﹐雖然只有主同行﹔
ContentEN: There is joy in serving Jesus, as I walk alone with God;

ContentCN: 因祂為我受苦負軛﹐使我今高歌歡吟。
ContentEN: 'Tis the joy of Christ, my Savior, who the path of suff'ring trod.

ContentCN: 快樂﹐快樂﹐事奉主真快樂﹐
ContentEN: There is joy, joy, joy in serving Jesus,

ContentCN: 不斷在我心湧溢﹐當我支取祂能力﹐
ContentEN: Joy that throbs within my heart; every moment, every hour,

ContentCN: 時刻遵行祂旨意﹐真有快樂﹐快樂永遠不稍離。
ContentEN: As I draw upon His pow'r, there is joy, joy, joy that never shall depart.

ContentCN: 事奉耶穌真有快樂﹐雖四圍黑暗重重﹔
ContentEN: There is joy in serving Jesus, joy amid the darkest night,

ContentCN: 奇妙祕訣我已獲得﹐我今行走光明中。
ContentEN: For I've learned the wondrous secret, and I'm walking in the light.

ContentCN: 慘哉﹐加略﹗痛哉﹐加略﹗在彼耶穌為我流血﹔
ContentEN: O Calvary! Dark Calvary! Where Jesus shed His blood for me;

ContentEN: O Calvary! Dark Calvary! Where Jesus shed His blood for me;

ContentEN: O Calvary! Dark Calvary! Where Jesus shed His blood for me;

ContentCN: 慘哉﹐加略﹗痛哉﹐加略﹗在彼耶穌為我流血﹔
ContentEN: O Calvary! Dark Calvary! Where Jesus shed His blood for me;

ContentCN: 大哉﹐加略﹗福哉﹐加略﹗在彼救主為我命絕。
ContentEN: O Calvary! Blest Calvary! 'Twas there my Savior died for me.

ContentEN: O Calvary! Blest Calvary! 'Twas there my Savior died for me.

ContentEN: O Calvary! Blest Calvary! 'Twas there my Savior died for me.

ContentEN: O Calvary! Blest Calvary! 'Twas there my Savior died for me.

ContentEN: O Calvary! Blest Calvary! 'Twas there my Savior died for me.

ContentEN: O Calvary! Dark Calvary! Where Jesus shed His blood for me;

ContentEN: To bear the cross and agony in that dread hour on Calvary!

ContentCN: 向我說話﹐使所傳講
ContentEN: Lord, speak to me, that I may speak

ContentCN: 是祢聲音活潑回響﹔
ContentEN: In living echoes of Thy tone;

ContentCN: 像祢那樣﹐讓我找尋
ContentEN: As Thou hast sought so let me seek

ContentCN: 祢那犯錯失迷子民。
ContentEN: Thy erring children, lost and lone.

ContentCN: 引我﹐導我﹐使能引導
ContentEN: Oh, lead me, Lord, that I may lead

ContentCN: 流蕩腳步堅穩不搖﹔
ContentEN: The wand'ring and the wav'ring feet,

ContentCN: 餵我﹐養我﹐使能餵養
ContentEN: Oh, feed me, Lord, that I may feed

ContentCN: 祢的饑民飽享天糧。
ContentEN: Thy hung'ring ones with manna sweet.

ContentCN: 教我﹐導我﹐使能教導
ContentEN: Oh, teach me, Lord, that I may teach

ContentCN: 祢所開啟奧祕珍寶﹔
ContentEN: The precious things Thou dost impart;

ContentCN: 靈翼駕我言辭﹐飛入
ContentEN: And wing my words that they may reach

ContentCN: 許多心靈隱密之處。
ContentEN: The hidden depths of many a heart.

ContentCN: 賞我﹐賜我甜美安息﹐
ContentEN: Oh, give Thine won sweet rest to me,

ContentCN: 我話纔有安撫能力﹔
ContentEN: That I may speak with soothing pow'r

ContentCN: 從祢而來及時恩語﹐
ContentEN: A word in season, as from Thee,

ContentCN: 時刻甦醒疲倦客旅。
ContentEN: To weary ones in needful hour.

ContentCN: 滿我﹐溢我﹐以祢美麗﹐
ContentEN: Oh, fill me with Thy fullness, Lord,

ContentCN: 直到我心充滿流溢
ContentEN: Until my very heart o'erflow

ContentCN: 火熱思想﹐發亮言語﹐
ContentEN: In kindling thought and glowing word,

ContentCN: 述說祢愛廣溥豐裕。
ContentEN: Thy love to tell, Thy praise to show.

ContentCN: 使我﹐用我任何時地﹐
ContentEN: Oh, use me, Lord, use even me,

ContentCN: 使我﹐用我惟憑祢意﹔
ContentEN: Just as Thou wilt, and when, and where

ContentCN: 直到見祢可頌面容﹐
ContentEN: Until Thy blessed face I see,

ContentCN: 分享祢樂﹐祢憩﹐祢榮。
ContentEN: Thy rest, Thy joy, Thy glory share.

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐我曾應許﹐永遠事奉我主﹔
ContentEN: O Jesus, I have promised, to serve Thee to the end;

ContentCN: 我主﹐我親愛朋友﹐懇求與我同住—
ContentEN: Be Thou forever near me, my Master and my Friend;

ContentCN: 若主時常在我旁﹐我必不怕戰場﹐
ContentEN: I shall not fear the battle, if Thou art by my side,

ContentCN: 若主時常引我路﹐我必不致迷茫。
ContentEN: Nor wander from the pathway, if Thou wilt be my Guide.

ContentCN: 世界四面包圍我﹐求主與我相近﹔
ContentEN: O let me feel Thee near me, the world is ever near;

ContentCN: 我見蓬亂的景物﹐聽見誘惑聲音﹔
ContentEN: I see the sights that dazzle, the tempting sounds I hear;

ContentCN: 在我身外或心內﹐常有仇敵相侵﹔
ContentEN: My foes are ever near me, around me and within;

ContentCN: 懇求耶穌來親近﹐保守我的心靈。
ContentEN: But Jesus, draw Thou nearer, and shield my soul from sin.

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐祢曾應許﹐凡跟隨祢的人﹐
ContentEN: O Jesus, Thou hast promised to all who follow Thee;

ContentCN: 在祢榮耀的居所﹐主僕亦必有份﹔
ContentEN: That where Thou art in glory there shall Thy servant be;

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐我曾應許﹐永永遠遠事奉﹐
ContentEN: And, Jesus, I have promised to serve Thee to the end;

ContentCN: 求主﹐我親愛朋友﹐施恩使我跟從。
ContentEN: O give me grace to follow, my Master and my Friend.

ContentCN: 讓我得見祢腳跡﹐將我安置其中﹔
ContentEN: Oh, let me see Thy footmarks and in them plant mine own;

ContentCN: 我惟依賴祢大力﹐才能步步相從。
ContentEN: My hope to follow duly is in Thy strength alone,

ContentCN: 一路呼喚、牽引我﹐扶持、照應到底﹔
ContentEN: Oh, guide me, call me, draw me, uphold me to the end;

ContentCN: 救主﹐我友﹐接納我﹐那日享祢安息。
ContentEN: And then to rest receive me, my Savior and my Friend.

ContentCN: 不是我們隨意走﹐乃是隨主的引領﹔
ContentEN: Not where we elect to go, but where Jesus leads the way,

ContentCN: 那裏活水方湧流﹐那裏心中方光明。
ContentEN: There the living waters flow, there our darkness turns to day.

ContentCN: 不是自擇的工作﹐就能博得他嘉許﹔
ContentEN: Not our self-appointed task will the Lord's approval win,

ContentCN: 乃是完成祂委托﹐纔可領受祂稱譽。
ContentEN: But the work we did not ask, finished humbly, just for Him.

ContentCN: 不是我們隨自己﹐就能座前獻禱告﹔
ContentEN: Not the prayer we long to plead, when we bend before the Throne,

ContentCN: 乃是聖靈的歎息﹐摸著更深的需要。
ContentEN: But the touching deeper need of the Spirit's wordless groan.

ContentCN: 如果我們答應"不﹐"當他輕說"我需要﹔"
ContentEN: Not the gift we proudly lay on His altar will He heed,

ContentCN: 就是壇上有禮物﹐也不能使他稱好。
ContentEN: If our hearts have said Him, "Nay," when He whispered, "I have need."

ContentCN: 我們如此向己死﹐與祂一同活天上﹔
ContentEN: Thus we die, and dying live in the heav'nlies with the Lord;

ContentCN: 如此奉獻而服事﹐祂將自己作恩賞。
ContentEN: Thus we serve, and pray, and give, Christ Himself, our great Reward.

ContentCN: 神聖呼召﹐榮耀顯現﹐辭別親人與愛友﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 從前無知﹐現今蒙恩﹐歡然前去報救贖﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 是神差遣！是神差遣！他們不過聽吩咐。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 正當他們到了異鄉﹐要用眼淚去撒種﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 野地危險﹐途中困苦﹐求使他們不放鬆﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 願主祝福！願主祝福！直至收成的歡動。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 有時缺少果實鼓勵﹐好像勞苦都落空﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 求向他們顯祢親密﹐扶持激勵慰苦衷﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 求與同在！求與同在！試煉之中常歌頌。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 有時遭遇仇敵反對﹐求使溫柔並甜美﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 若遇成功﹐有人蒙恩﹐求使他們能謙卑﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 能力充盈！能力充盈！他們纔能常得勝。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 今用眼淚澆灌栽培親手所撒的善種﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 舉目觀看金色遍野﹐我心不禁受感動﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 時日何短﹐大日臨近﹐主召歸家樂無窮！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 趕緊工作﹐夜快臨﹐工作在於清晨﹔
ContentEN: Work, for the night is coming, work thru the morning hours;

ContentCN: 工作﹐正當朝色新﹐工作﹐花正芬﹔
ContentEN: Work while the dew is sparkling, work 'mid springing flow'rs.

ContentCN: 工作﹐當日光無蔭﹐工作在於驕陽﹐
ContentEN: Work when the day grows brighter, work in the glowing sun;

ContentCN: 趕緊工作﹐夜快臨﹐必須離工場。
ContentEN: Work, for the night is coming, when man's work is done.

ContentCN: 趕緊工作﹐夜快臨﹐工作在於正午﹔
ContentEN: Work, for the night is coming, work thru the sunny noon;

ContentCN: 最亮時辰宜辛勤﹐不久﹐不辛苦。
ContentEN: Fill brightest hours with labor rest comes sure and soon.

ContentCN: 每一飛逝的光陰﹐都當裝滿成績﹔
ContentEN: Give ev'ry flying minute something to keep in store;

ContentCN: 趕緊工作﹐夜快臨﹐那時人安息。
ContentEN: Work, for the night is coming, when man works no more.

ContentCN: 趕緊工作﹐夜快臨﹐趁此加深暮景﹔
ContentEN: Work, for the night is coming, under the sunset skies:

ContentCN: 夕陽西移彩霞新﹐再過成灰影﹔
ContentEN: While their bright tints are glowing, work, for daylight flies.

ContentCN: 最後一線的光陰﹐不久就要沒落﹔
ContentEN: Work till the last beam fadeth, fadeth to shine no more;

ContentCN: 趕緊工作﹐夜正臨﹐轉瞬工作過。
ContentEN: Work, while the night is dark'ning, when man's work is o'er.

ContentCN: 凡事為主而作﹐必蒙賞﹐
ContentEN: Ev'ry work for Jesus will be blest,

ContentCN: 主所要求﹐是"最好獻上﹐"
ContentEN: But He asks from ev'ry one his best.

ContentCN: 我的才力雖小﹐微不足道﹐
ContentEN: Our talents may be few, these may be small,

ContentCN: 惟願獻上我的一切最好。
ContentEN: But unto Him is due Our best, our all.

ContentCN: 要將最好獻上！聽主呼聲﹔
ContentEN: Hear ye the Master's call, "Give Me thy best!"

ContentCN: 每件大小事上﹐主要驗明。
ContentEN: For, be it great or small, that is His test.

ContentCN: 不求任何獎賞﹐盡力作工﹔
ContentEN: Do then the best you can, not for reward,

ContentCN: 不求人的稱揚﹐只為主用。
ContentEN: Not for the praise of man, but for the Lord.

ContentCN: 凡事為主而作﹐必蒙賞﹐
ContentEN: Ev'ry work for Jesus will be blest,

ContentCN: 主所要求﹐是"最好獻上﹐"
ContentEN: But He asks from ev'ry one his best.

ContentCN: 我的才力雖小﹐微不足道﹐
ContentEN: Our talents may be few, these may be small,

ContentCN: 惟願獻上我的一切最好。
ContentEN: But unto Him is due Our best, our all.

ContentCN: 不理會人稱讚﹐或是輕視﹔
ContentEN: Wait not for men to laud, heed not their slight;

ContentCN: 只求主的笑臉﹐作我賞賜。
ContentEN: Winning the smile of God brings its delight!

ContentCN: 為人真實、善良﹐走蒙福路﹔
ContentEN: Aiding the good and true ne'er goes unblest,

ContentCN: 無論工作、思想﹐盡力以赴。
ContentEN: All that we think or do, be it the best.

ContentCN: 凡事為主而作﹐必蒙賞﹐
ContentEN: Ev'ry work for Jesus will be blest,

ContentCN: 主所要求﹐是"最好獻上﹐"
ContentEN: But He asks from ev'ry one his best.

ContentCN: 我的才力雖小﹐微不足道﹐
ContentEN: Our talents may be few, these may be small,

ContentCN: 惟願獻上我的一切最好。
ContentEN: But unto Him is due Our best, our all.

ContentCN: 黎明微光來迎﹐黑夜將殘﹔
ContentEN: Night soon comes on apace, day hastens by;

ContentCN: 今日所作之工﹐那日考驗。
ContentEN: Workman and work must face testing on high.

ContentCN: 但願那日安息﹐甜美安息﹔
ContentEN: Oh, may we in that day find rest, sweet rest,

ContentCN: 因主應許、獎勵忠心僕役。
ContentEN: Which God has promised those who do their best.

ContentCN: 悄然過！悄然過！悄然過！悄然過！
ContentEN: Going by! Going by! Going by! Going by!

ContentCN: 願我常挑別人擔﹐正當時日悄然過！
ContentEN: Oh, the good we all my do, while the days are going by!

ContentCN: 正當時日悄然而過﹐就有孤寂待撫慰﹔
ContentEN: There are lonely hearts to cherish while the days are going by;

ContentCN: 正當時日悄然而過﹐就有疲憊告急危。
ContentEN: There are weary souls who perish while the days are going by;

ContentCN: 願我地上的一段﹐常能助人歡顏展﹔
ContentEN: If a smile we can renew, as our journey we pursue,

ContentCN: 願我常挑別人擔﹐正當時日悄然過！
ContentEN: Oh, the good we all may do, while the days are going by!

ContentCN: 悄然過！悄然過！悄然過！悄然過！
ContentEN: Going by! Going by! Going by! Going by!

ContentCN: 願我常挑別人擔﹐正當時日悄然過！
ContentEN: Oh, the good we all my do, while the days are going by!

ContentCN: 那有餘閒怨天尤人﹐正當時日悄然過﹔
ContentEN: There's no time for idle scorning, while the days are going by;

ContentCN: 常保臉面鮮如早晨﹐正當時日悄然過。
ContentEN: Let your face be like the morning, while the days are going by;

ContentCN: 不免有人在歎息﹐不免有人心憂悒﹔
ContentEN: Oh, the world is full of sighs, full of sad and weeping eyes;

ContentCN: 我當用力來扶起﹐正當時日悄然過！
ContentEN: Help your fallen brother rise, while the days are going by!

ContentCN: 悄然過！悄然過！悄然過！悄然過！
ContentEN: Going by! Going by! Going by! Going by!

ContentCN: 願我常挑別人擔﹐正當時日悄然過！
ContentEN: Oh, the good we all my do, while the days are going by!

ContentCN: 愛的連索時可中斷﹐正當時日悄然過﹔
ContentEN: All the loving links that bind us, while the days are going by;

ContentCN: 忠心的人逐漸失傳﹐正當時日悄然過。
ContentEN: One by one, we leave behind us, while the days are going by;

ContentCN: 但我所撒的善種﹐日長夜增漸繁榮﹔
ContentEN: But the seeds of good we sow, both in shade and shine will grow,

ContentCN: 不覺我心受感動﹐正當時日悄然過！
ContentEN: And will keep our hearts aglow, while the days are going by!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗我們現今等候﹗
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! While here to Thee we bow!

ContentCN: 但願正當我們俯伏﹐祢就顯現能手﹗
ContentEN: Descend, O gracious Lord, descend! Oh come, and bless us now!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗向祢聖徒顯現﹗
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! Now to Thy saints appear!

ContentCN: 求祢用權發出聖言﹐讓祢兒女檢點﹗
ContentEN: Oh, speak with pow'r to ev'ry soul, and let Thy people hear!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗我們現今等候﹗
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! While here to Thee we bow!

ContentCN: 但願正當我們俯伏﹐祢就顯現能手﹗
ContentEN: Descend, O gracious Lord, descend! Oh come, and bless us now!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗求祢感動教會﹔
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! And every soul inspire;

ContentCN: 為著罪惡﹐憂傷痛悔﹐好讓祢顯作為﹗
ContentEN: Oh kindle in each heart, we pray, the Pentecostal fire!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗我們現今等候﹗
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! While here to Thee we bow!

ContentCN: 但願正當我們俯伏﹐祢就顯現能手﹗
ContentEN: Descend, O gracious Lord, descend! Oh come, and bless us now!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗啟示祢的寶貴﹔
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! Exalt Thy precious name!

ContentCN: 但願祢愛在人心內﹐好像復燃死灰﹗
ContentEN: And may Thy love in every heart be kindled to a flame!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗我們現今等候﹗
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! While here to Thee we bow!

ContentCN: 但願正當我們俯伏﹐祢就顯現能手﹗
ContentEN: Descend, O gracious Lord, descend! Oh come, and bless us now!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗祝福祢的話語﹔
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! And bless to all Thy word!

ContentCN: 但願祢道所有真理﹐到處被人高舉﹗
ContentEN: And may its pure and sacred truth in living faith be heard!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗我們現今等候﹗
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! While here to Thee we bow!

ContentCN: 但願正當我們俯伏﹐祢就顯現能手﹗
ContentEN: Descend, O gracious Lord, descend! Oh come, and bless us now!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗證明祢的得勝﹔
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! And make Thy servants bold;

ContentCN: 但願祢民起來戰爭﹐好使撒但潰崩﹗
ContentEN: Convict of sin and work once more as in the days of old.

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗我們現今等候﹗
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! While here to Thee we bow!

ContentCN: 但願正當我們俯伏﹐祢就顯現能手﹗
ContentEN: Descend, O gracious Lord, descend! Oh come, and bless us now!

ContentCN: 復興祢工作﹐主﹗賜下當初權能﹔
ContentEN: Revive Thy work, O Lord! Give Pentecostal showers!

ContentCN: 但願榮耀全歸祢名﹐祝福則歸我們﹗
ContentEN: Be Thine the glory, Thine alone! The blessing, Lord, be ours!

ContentCN: 恩雨﹐降恩雨！願主聖靈充滿我！
ContentEN: Showers of blessing, showers of blessing we need;

ContentCN: 雖已蒙恩略為滋潤﹐還渴望大賜恩雨。
ContentEN: Mercy drops round us are falling, but for the showers we plead.

ContentCN: 必賜靈恩有如大雨﹐至大慈愛已應許﹔
ContentEN: There shall be showers of blessing: This is the promise of love;

ContentCN: 救主恩雨從上沛淋﹐我們必得大復興。
ContentEN: There shall be seasons refreshing, sent from the Saviour above.

ContentCN: 恩雨﹐降恩雨！願主聖靈充滿我！
ContentEN: Showers of blessing, showers of blessing we need;

ContentCN: 雖已蒙恩略為滋潤﹐還渴望大賜恩雨。
ContentEN: Mercy drops round us are falling, but for the showers we plead.

ContentCN: 必賜靈恩有如大雨﹐至貴復興已再臨﹔
ContentEN: There shall be showers of blessing precious reviving again;

ContentCN: 高山低谷活水充溢﹐盈耳都是透雨聲。
ContentEN: Over the hills and the valleys, sound of abundance of rain.

ContentCN: 恩雨﹐降恩雨！願主聖靈充滿我！
ContentEN: Showers of blessing, showers of blessing we need;

ContentCN: 雖已蒙恩略為滋潤﹐還渴望大賜恩雨。
ContentEN: Mercy drops round us are falling, but for the showers we plead.

ContentCN: 必賜靈恩有如大雨﹐聖靈已經大降臨﹔
ContentEN: There shall be showers of blessing: Send them upon us, O Lord;

ContentCN: 現今求來成就祢命﹐使我身心都更新。
ContentEN: Grant to us now a refreshing, come, and now honor Thy Word.

ContentCN: 恩雨﹐降恩雨！願主聖靈充滿我！
ContentEN: Showers of blessing, showers of blessing we need;

ContentCN: 雖已蒙恩略為滋潤﹐還渴望大賜恩雨。
ContentEN: Mercy drops round us are falling, but for the showers we plead.

ContentCN: 必賜靈恩有如大雨﹐此乃天父所應許﹔
ContentEN: There shall be showers of blessing: Oh, that today they might fall,

ContentCN: 速來求告耶穌尊名﹐速向父神來求懇。
ContentEN: Now as to God we're confessing, now as on Jesus we call!

ContentCN: 基督祢是潔淨火焰﹐降聖火﹐降聖火﹐降聖火！
ContentEN: Thou Christ of burning, cleansing fire, send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

ContentCN: 血下恩賜滿我心殿﹐降聖火﹐降聖火﹐降聖火！
ContentEN: Thy blood brought gift today we claim, send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

ContentCN: 求祢垂顧等候會眾﹐賜給我們應許聖靈﹐
ContentEN: Look down, and see this waiting host, give us the promised Holy Ghost,

ContentCN: 我們切慕五旬重臨﹐降聖火﹐降聖火﹐降聖火！
ContentEN: We want another Pentecost, send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

ContentCN: 以利亞神﹐聽我呼求﹕"降聖火﹐降聖火﹐降聖火！"
ContentEN: God of Elijah, hear our cry, send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

ContentCN: 或生或死全操祢手﹐降聖火﹐降聖火﹐降聖火！
ContentEN: He'll make us fit to live or die, send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

ContentCN: 燒去罪惡每一痕跡﹐帶進亮光﹐榮耀、安息﹐
ContentEN: To burn up ev'ry trace of sin, to bring the light and glory in,

ContentCN: 這是何等神聖興替﹐降聖火﹐降聖火﹐降聖火！
ContentEN: The revolution now begin, send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

ContentCN: 這是我們急需禱告﹕"降聖火﹐降聖火﹐降聖火！"
ContentEN: 'Tis fire we want, for fire we plead, send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

ContentCN: 祂能滿足每一需要﹐降聖火﹐降聖火﹐降聖火！
ContentEN: The fire will meet our ev'ry need, send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

ContentCN: 使我爭戰得勝有力﹐逐日剛強行主旨意﹐
ContentEN: For strength to ever do the right, for grace to conquer in the fight,

ContentCN: 行過今世蒙祂稱義﹐降聖火﹐降聖火﹐降聖火！
ContentEN: For pow'r to walk the world in white, send the fire, send the fire, send the fire!

ContentEN: Lord, send the old time power, the Pentecostal power!

ContentCN: 懇求主開天窗傾福並加光照﹔
ContentEN: Thy floodgates of blessing on us throw open wide!

ContentCN: 求賜下當初權能﹐賜下五旬大權能﹐
ContentEN: Lord, send the old time power, the Pentecostal power,

ContentCN: 使罪人扎心悔改﹐祢名大得榮耀。
ContentEN: That sinners be converted and Thy Name glorified!

ContentCN: 有如當初在五旬節﹐偉大權能顯揭﹔
ContentEN: Lord, as of old at Pentecost Thou didst Thy pow'r display.

ContentCN: 求降聖火使我得潔﹐將我全然聖別。
ContentEN: With cleansing, purifying flame descend on us today.

ContentEN: Each waiting heart to work for Thee; O Lord, our faith renew!

ContentCN: 俯祢座前﹐信祢應許﹐哦﹐主﹐求祢發聲﹔
ContentEN: Speak, Lord! Before Thy throne we wait, Thy promise we believe,

ContentCN: 直到祝福從天賜予﹐我將不住求等。
ContentEN: And will not let Thee go until the blessing we receive.

ContentEN: Send a great revival in my soul,

ContentEN: Send a great revival in my soul;

ContentCN: 求在我靈裏賜下大復興。

ContentCN: 惟獨信靠祢所許恩言﹔
ContentEN: Trusting only in Thy precious word,

ContentCN: 願我卑微禱告蒙垂憐﹐
ContentEN: Let my humble prayer to Thee be heard,

ContentCN: 求在我靈裏賜下大復興。
ContentEN: And send a great revival in my soul.

ContentCN: 燒去一切渣滓與罪跡﹔

ContentCN: 願祢大能作為今興起﹐

ContentCN: 求在我靈裏賜下大復興。
ContentEN: Oh, send a great revival in my soul.

ContentEN: Send a great revival, Lord, in me,

ContentCN: 使我靠主喜樂不稍停﹔
ContentEN: Help me that I may rejoice in Thee;

ContentCN: 我願靠主大能常得勝﹐
ContentEN: Give me strength to win the victory,

ContentCN: 求在我靈裏賜下大復興。
ContentEN: And send a great revival in my soul.

ContentCN: 求在我靈裏賜下大復興。

ContentCN: 主阿﹐求助我為祢外出﹐
ContentEN: Help me go for Thee, dear Lord, today,

ContentCN: 尋找流離迷羊如善牧﹔
ContentEN: To some lonely soul that's gone astray;

ContentCN: 領他們走上歸家路途﹐
ContentEN: Help me lead them in the homeward way,

ContentCN: 求在我靈裏賜下大復興。
ContentEN: Oh, send a great revival in my soul.

ContentCN: 懇求我主﹐鑒察我的心思﹐
ContentEN: Search me, O God, and know my heart today;

ContentCN: 求主試驗我﹐知道我心事﹔
ContentEN: Try me, O Savior, know my thoughts, I pray.

ContentCN: 看我裏面﹐有何惡行沒有﹐
ContentEN: See if there be some wicked way in me;

ContentCN: 洗去每一罪孽﹐使我自由。
ContentEN: Cleanse me from every sin and set me free.

ContentCN: 讚美我主﹐祢已潔淨我罪﹐
ContentEN: I praise Thee, Lord, for cleansing me from sin;

ContentCN: 實現祢應許﹐純淨我心內﹔
ContentEN: Fulfill Thy Word and make me pure within.

ContentCN: 求以靈火﹐潔淨以往羞情﹐
ContentEN: Fill me with fire where once I burned with shame;

ContentCN: 我只渴慕能榮顯祢聖名。
ContentEN: Grant my desire to magnify Thy name.

ContentCN: 主﹐佔有我﹐使我完全歸祢﹐
ContentEN: Lord, take my life and make it wholly Thine;

ContentCN: 以祢大愛﹐充滿貧窮心裏﹔
ContentEN: Fill my poor heart with Thy great love divine.

ContentCN: 奪我深處驕傲、情慾、意志﹐
ContentEN: Take all my will, my passion, self and pride;

ContentCN: 我今降服﹐求主與我同止。
ContentEN: I now surrender, Lord - in me abide.

ContentCN: 懇求聖靈﹐賜下復興之火﹐
ContentEN: O Holy Ghost, revival comes from Thee;

ContentCN: 求使復興先在我心點活﹔
ContentEN: Send a revival - start the work in me.

ContentCN: 祢既宣告供給復興需要﹐
ContentEN: Thy Word declares Thou wilt supply our need;

ContentCN: 為這祝福﹐我今迫切禱告。
ContentEN: For blessings now, O Lord, I humbly plead.

ContentCN: 枯乾的骸骨阿﹐要聽主的話﹕
ContentEN: O ye dry bones, hear the words of the Lord:

ContentCN: 我必使氣息進入你們裏面﹐
ContentEN: Be hold, I will cause breath to enter into you,

ContentCN: 你們就要活了﹐就要活了。
ContentEN: And ye shall live, and ye shall live.

ContentCN: 我神乃是大能堡壘﹐永不失敗永堅固﹔
ContentEN: A mighty Fortress is our God, a Bulwark never failing;

ContentCN: 致命危難密佈四圍﹐祂是我們的幫助。
ContentEN: Our Helper He, amid the flood, of mortal ills prevailing;

ContentCN: 我們素來仇敵﹐仍然害我不息﹐
ContentEN: For still our ancient foe, doth seek to work us woe;

ContentCN: 詭計能力都大﹐又配狠心毒辣﹐
ContentEN: His craft and pow'r are great, and armed with cruel hate,

ContentCN: 世界無人可對手。
ContentEN: On earth is not his equal.

ContentCN: 我們若信自己力量﹐我們鬥爭必失敗﹔
ContentEN: Did we in our own strength confide, our striving would be losing;

ContentCN: 我們這邊有一適當合神心意的人在。
ContentEN: Were not the right Man on our side, the Man of God's own choosing;

ContentCN: 如問此人名字﹐基督耶穌就是﹐
ContentEN: Dost ask who that may be? Christ Jesus, it is He;

ContentCN: 就是萬軍之王﹐萬世萬代一樣﹐
ContentEN: Lord Sabaoth His Name, from age to age the same,

ContentCN: 只有祂能得全勝。
ContentEN: And He must win the battle.

ContentCN: 世界雖然充滿鬼魅﹐想以驚嚇來敗壞﹔
ContentEN: And though this world with devils filled; should threaten to undo us;

ContentCN: 我也不怕﹐因神定規真理藉我來奏凱。
ContentEN: We will not fear, for God hath willed His truth to triumph through us;

ContentCN: 黑暗君王猙獰﹐我們並不戰兢﹐
ContentEN: The Prince of Darkness grim, we tremble not for him;

ContentCN: 我忍受牠怒氣﹐因牠結局已急﹐
ContentEN: His rage we can endure, for lo! His doom is sure,

ContentCN: 一言就使牠傾倒。
ContentEN: One little word shall fell him.

ContentCN: 主言超越世界全權﹐神旨成功不延遲﹔
ContentEN: That word above all earthly powers, no thanks to them abideth;

ContentCN: 藉主與我同在一邊﹐我有聖靈和恩賜。
ContentEN: The Spirit and the gifts are ours through Him who with us sideth;

ContentCN: 財物以及親友﹐任其損失無有﹐
ContentEN: Let goods and kindred go, this mortal life also;

ContentCN: 就是殺害身體﹐真理仍然屹立﹐
ContentEN: The body they may kill; God's truth abideth still,

ContentCN: 神的國度永遠存。
ContentEN: His Kingdom is forever.

ContentCN: 古聖信仰﹗神聖信仰﹗忠心不二﹐至死堅剛。
ContentEN: Faith of our fathers! Holy faith! We will be true to thee till death!

ContentCN: 古聖信仰﹐仍然活著﹐不顧冤獄、烈火、利劍﹔
ContentEN: Faith of our fathers, living still in spite of dungeon, fire and sword,

ContentCN: 我們的心充滿喜樂﹐每逢聽見如此榮言。
ContentEN: O how our hearts beat high with joy, whene'er we hear that glorious word!

ContentCN: 古聖信仰﹗神聖信仰﹗忠心不二﹐至死堅剛。
ContentEN: Faith of our fathers! Holy faith! We will be true to thee till death!

ContentCN: 古聖為此被鎖苦監﹐心仍自由無虧無驚﹔
ContentEN: Our fathers, chained in prisons dark, were still in heart and conscience free;

ContentCN: 今日眾聖前途甘甜﹐若像他們為此捨命。
ContentEN: And blest would be their children's fate, if they, like them should die for thee.

ContentCN: 古聖信仰﹗神聖信仰﹗忠心不二﹐至死堅剛。
ContentEN: Faith of our fathers! Holy faith! We will be true to thee till death!

ContentCN: 古聖信仰﹐神的大力不久要得萬人依投﹔
ContentEN: Faith of our fathers, we will strive to win all nations unto thee;

ContentCN: 藉著從神而來真理﹐萬人就要真正自由。
ContentEN: And through the truth that comes from God mankind shall then indeed be free.

ContentCN: 古聖信仰﹗神聖信仰﹗忠心不二﹐至死堅剛。
ContentEN: Faith of our fathers! Holy faith! We will be true to thee till death!

ContentCN: 古聖信仰﹐雖然鬥爭﹐仍當兼愛仇敵友人﹔
ContentEN: Faith of our fathers, we will love both friend and foe in all our strife,

ContentCN: 傳此信仰﹐以愛以誠﹐言語慈仁﹐行為光明。
ContentEN: And preach thee, too, as love knows how by kindly words and virtuous life.

ContentEN: NULL

ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 今日戰爭兇猛﹐仇敵聲勢更強﹔
ContentEN: Conflict today is fierce, the strength of Satan more;

ContentCN: 戰場呼喊﹐殺伐之聲﹐比前更為響亮。
ContentEN: The cry of battle calling now is louder than before.

ContentCN: 陰府反抗之聲﹐遠比以往厲害﹔
ContentEN: The rebel voice of hell e'en stronger now becomes;

ContentCN: 聽哪﹐卻有夜半呼聲﹕"看哪﹐我必快來。"
ContentEN: But list, the midnight cry resounds, behold, I quickly come!

ContentCN: 今日試煉更苦﹐敵我交戰益烈﹐
ContentEN: Trials more bitter grow, the fighting doth enlarge;

ContentCN: 陰府權勢一齊鼓舞﹐集隊洶洶來劫。
ContentEN: Hell's forces rally all their pow'rs and gather for the charge.

ContentCN: 我在此處守等﹐更覺難以得勝﹔
ContentEN: Yet while we wait and watch and feel the war severe,

ContentCN: 卻聽傳來喜樂之聲﹕"耶穌我主已近﹗"
ContentEN: We hear the joyful song ring out, Jesus, the Lord, is near!

ContentCN: 更難證實主話﹐在此末後之世﹔
ContentEN: 'Tis harder at the end the word to testify,

ContentCN: 因為撒但傾力攻打﹐竭盡一切權勢。
ContentEN: For Satan fights with all his pow'r our witness to defy.

ContentCN: 我需更大靈力﹐纔能擊敗仇敵﹔
ContentEN: Much greater strength we need the foe to overcome;

ContentCN: 當主再來不再歎息﹐那時何等樂呢﹗
ContentEN: How happy when the Lord we see and all our sighing's done!

ContentCN: 誰願一直前進﹐藉著主的大能﹖
ContentEN: Who then will forward go strong in His mighty pow'r?

ContentCN: 誰要堅定一直相信直到戰爭全贏﹖
ContentEN: Who then will firmly trust the Lord until the vict'ry hour;

ContentCN: 誰要靠主壯心﹐直到得勝奏凱﹖
ContentEN: Till with the conqu'rors blest, the triumph song's begun?

ContentCN: 他要聽主歡樂之聲﹕"看哪﹐我必快來。"
ContentEN: That man will then rejoice to hear, behold, I quickly come!

ContentCN: 誰選神的最好﹐踏上十架窄路﹐
ContentEN: Who then will choose God's best, and take the narrow track,

ContentCN: 歷盡百般憂患苦惱﹐絲毫也不回顧﹖
ContentEN: Though passing thru the wildest storms, yet never turning back?

ContentCN: 誰敢奮勇直前﹐忍受痛苦懼驚﹖
ContentEN: Who now will dare press on, enduring pain and fear?

ContentCN: 因在此時﹐歡樂可見﹕"耶穌我主已近﹗"
ContentEN: All such will then rejoice to see Jesus, the Lord, is near!

ContentCN: 現今黑暗深厚﹐我們仍當向前﹔
ContentEN: Though deep the darkness be we still would onward go,

ContentCN: 直到我們被提時候﹐榮耀正在顯現﹗
ContentEN: Till we the day of rapture greet and glory 'round shall glow.

ContentCN: 在彼我們見主﹐仇敵已經失敗﹔
ContentEN: 'Tis there we'll see the Lord, and Satan overcome;

ContentCN: 那時得勝者同歡呼﹕"耶穌我主已來﹗"
ContentEN: The overcomers will rejoice, Jesus, the Lord, has come!

ContentCN: 起來﹐起來為耶穌﹐你們十架軍兵﹔
ContentEN: Stand up, stand up for Jesus, ye soldiers of the cross!

ContentCN: 當將主大旗高豎﹐不可讓它不定。
ContentEN: Lift high His royal banner, it must not suffer loss;

ContentCN: 主必率領祂大軍﹐得勝而又得勝﹐
ContentEN: From vict'ry unto vict'ry His army shall He lead,

ContentCN: 直到撒但全潰崩﹐人尊基督為聖。
ContentEN: Till ev'ry foe is vanquished, and Christ is Lord indeed.

ContentCN: 起來﹐起來為耶穌﹐主召你聽命令﹔
ContentEN: Stand up, stand up for Jesus, the trumpet call obey;

ContentCN: 奮勇爭先全力赴這個偉大戰爭。
ContentEN: Forth to the mighty conflict, in this His glorious day;

ContentCN: 蒙贖的人當事奉﹐面對無數仇敵﹔
ContentEN: Ye that are men now serve Him against unnumbered foes;

ContentCN: 膽量應隨危險增﹐交鋒以力對力。
ContentEN: Let courage rise with danger, and strength to strength oppose.

ContentCN: 起來﹐起來為耶穌﹐忠心靠主大力﹔
ContentEN: Stand up, stand up for Jesus, stand in His strength alone;

ContentCN: 莫靠自己而貽誤﹐莫用血氣兵器。
ContentEN: The arm of flesh will fail you, ye dare not trust your own;

ContentCN: 福音軍裝穿齊備﹐禱告隨時多方﹔
ContentEN: Put on the gospel armour, and watching unto prayer,

ContentCN: 無論責任多艱危﹐都能隨靈前往。
ContentEN: Where duty calls, or danger, be never wanting there.

ContentCN: 起來﹐起來為耶穌﹐戰爭必不會長﹔
ContentEN: Stand up, stand up for Jesus! The strife will not be long;

ContentCN: 今日殺聲雖高呼﹐明日凱歌響亮。
ContentEN: This day the noise of battle, the next the victor's song;

ContentCN: 凡是靠主得勝者﹐必得生命冠冕﹐
ContentEN: To him that overcometh, a crown of life shall be;

ContentCN: 必與基督同快樂﹐同王直到永遠。
ContentEN: He with the King of glory, shall reign eternally.

ContentCN: 神的兒子出戰前方﹐去得冠冕為王﹔
ContentEN: The Son of God goes forth to war, a kingly crown to gain;

ContentCN: 血染大旗遠遠飄揚﹐誰配加祂陣行﹖
ContentEN: His blood-red banner streams afar, who follows in His train?

ContentCN: 誰將苦杯飲之如飴﹐不顧痛苦創傷﹐
ContentEN: Who best can drink His cup of woe, triumphant over pain,

ContentCN: 甘負十架忍耐到底﹐纔配加祂陣行﹗
ContentEN: Who patient bears His cross below, He follows in His train.

ContentCN: 歷代殉聖眼光銳利﹐看透墳墓對方﹐
ContentEN: The martyr first, whose eagle eye could pierce beyond the grave,

ContentCN: 看出主的復活能力﹐仰望祂的扶幫﹔
ContentEN: Who saw his Master in the sky and called on Him to save.

ContentCN: 效祂發出赦免之求﹐在受致死之傷﹐
ContentEN: Like Him, with pardon on his tongue in midst of mortal pain,

ContentCN: 也求饒恕害己之友﹐誰配加其陣行﹖
ContentEN: He prayed for them that did the wrong: who follows in his train?

ContentCN: 蒙主選召英勇聖徒﹐滿得聖靈力量﹐
ContentEN: A glorious band, the chosen few on whom the Spirit came,

ContentCN: 充滿盼望﹐輕看羞辱﹐匯成榮耀陣行﹔
ContentEN: Twelve valiant saints, their hope they knew and mocked the cross and flame:

ContentCN: 十架、烈火﹐欣然接受﹐刀劍、猛獸﹐不懼﹐
ContentEN: They met the tyrant's brandished steel, the lion's gory mane;

ContentCN: 死亡伏頸﹐想都不屑﹐誰配加其陣行﹖
ContentEN: They bowed their necks the death to feel; who follows in their train?

ContentCN: 復有軍兵、壯丁、孩童﹐賢婦、淑女繼起﹐
ContentEN: A noble army, men and boys, the matron and the maid,

ContentCN: 今繞寶座歡樂無窮﹐身服光明白衣﹔
ContentEN: Around the Savior's throne rejoice, in robes of light arrayed.

ContentCN: 他們登天歷盡災禍﹐勞碌加上創傷﹐
ContentEN: They climbed the steep ascent of heav'n through peril, toil, and pain;

ContentCN: 懇求我神賜恩給我﹐配加他們陣行﹗
ContentEN: O God, to us may grace be giv'n to follow in their train!

ContentCN: 主﹐當我們漂流曠野﹐祢愛前來尋我們﹔
ContentEN: Lord, Thy love has sought and found us wand'ring in this desert wide,

ContentEN: Thou hast thrown Thine arms around us, for us suffered, bled, and died,

ContentEN: Sing, my soul! He loved thee; Jesus gave Himself for me.

ContentCN: 聽哪﹐這是誰的哭聲﹐來自溪邊的荒園﹖
ContentEN: Hark! What sounds of bitter weeping from yon lonesome garden sweep;

ContentCN: 得勝﹐得勝者﹐都因著髑髏地。
ContentEN: A victor, a victor! Because of Calvary.

ContentCN: 使我作個得勝者﹐因著祢﹐因著祢能得勝。
ContentEN: Make me an overcomer, a conqu'ror, a conqu'ror, Lord, in Thee.

ContentCN: 我不敢稍微失敗﹐因有加略在望﹔
ContentEN: I dare not be defeated, with Calvary in view,

ContentCN: 耶穌在彼曾奏凱﹐勝過黑暗君王。
ContentEN: Where Jesus conquered Satan, where all His foes He slew.

ContentCN: 求主賜給我異象﹐我纔臨陣奮興﹔
ContentEN: Come, Lord, and give the vision to nerve me for the fight,

ContentCN: 使我作個得勝者﹐靠著祢的大名。
ContentEN: Make me an overcomer clothed with Thy Spirit's might.

ContentCN: 得勝﹐得勝者﹐都因著髑髏地。
ContentEN: A victor, a victor! Because of Calvary.

ContentCN: 使我作個得勝者﹐因著祢﹐因著祢能得勝。
ContentEN: Make me an overcomer, a conqu'ror, a conqu'ror, Lord, in Thee.

ContentCN: 我不敢稍微失敗﹐因為基督我主
ContentEN: I dare not be defeated since Christ, my conquering King

ContentCN: 召我進到前線來﹐與祂一同追逐。
ContentEN: Has called me to the battle which He did surely win.

ContentCN: 求主賜給我膽量﹐使我剛強有力﹔
ContentEN: Come, Lord, and give me courage, Thy conqu'ring Spirit give,

ContentCN: 使我作個得勝者﹐裏面充滿了祢。
ContentEN: Make me an overcomer, in pow'r within me live.

ContentCN: 得勝﹐得勝者﹐都因著髑髏地。
ContentEN: A victor, a victor! Because of Calvary.

ContentCN: 使我作個得勝者﹐因著祢﹐因著祢能得勝。
ContentEN: Make me an overcomer, a conqu'ror, a conqu'ror, Lord, in Thee.

ContentCN: 我不敢稍微失敗﹐因為耶穌領我
ContentEN: I dare not be defeated, when Jesus leads me on

ContentCN: 來衝陰府的境界﹐與祂同登寶座。
ContentEN: To press through hellish regions to share with Him His Throne;

ContentCN: 求主賜給你戰士有力能以揮劍﹔
ContentEN: Come, Lord, and give Thy soldier the pow'r to wield the sword,

ContentCN: 使我作個得勝者﹐藉著祢的聖言。
ContentEN: Make me an overcomer through Thine inerrant Word.

ContentCN: 得勝﹐得勝者﹐都因著髑髏地。
ContentEN: A victor, a victor! Because of Calvary.

ContentCN: 使我作個得勝者﹐因著祢﹐因著祢能得勝。
ContentEN: Make me an overcomer, a conqu'ror, a conqu'ror, Lord, in Thee.

ContentCN: 我不敢稍微失敗﹐當此日西時辰﹔
ContentEN: I dare not be defeated, just at the set of sun,

ContentCN: 因為我主正等待﹐要說﹕"好﹗我僕人。"
ContentEN: When Jesus waits to whisper, "Well done, beloved, well done!"

ContentCN: 求主今日從天上重新賜我能力﹐
ContentEN: Come, Lord, bend from the Glory, on me Thy Spirit cast,

ContentCN: 使我作個得勝者﹐得勝一直到底。
ContentEN: Make me an overcomer, a victor to the last.

ContentCN: 靠主耶穌必得勝﹐祂永是我救主﹔
ContentEN: O victory in Jesus, My Savior, forever,

ContentCN: 祂尋我﹐祂買我﹐祂血使我得贖。
ContentEN: He sought me and bo't me with His redeeming blood;

ContentCN: 雖我無知﹐祂愛我﹐今我的愛全歸祂﹔
ContentEN: He loved me ere I knew Him and all my love is due Him,

ContentCN: 祂領我常常誇勝﹐在祂寶血泉下。
ContentEN: He plunged me to victory, beneath the cleansing flood.

ContentCN: 為主站住﹗剛強站住﹗如同海邊磯磐穩固﹗
ContentEN: Stand up for Jesus, nobly stand! Firm as a rock on ocean's strand!

ContentCN: 站住﹐維持主的見證﹗站住﹐榮耀主的聖名。
ContentEN: Stand up, His righteous cause defend; stand up for Jesus, your best Friend.

ContentCN: 站住﹐你當為主站住如同海邊磯磐穩固﹗
ContentEN: Stand up for Jesus, Christian, stand! Firm as a rock on ocean's strand!

ContentCN: 衝擊你的罪孽狂浪﹐應當靠主大能抵擋﹗

ContentCN: 將祂真道四方廣佈﹐直到全地認祂為主。
ContentEN: Spread ye His glorious Word abroad, till all the world shall own Him Lord!

ContentCN: 為主站住﹗剛強站住﹗如同海邊磯磐穩固﹗

ContentCN: 直到萬邦人人眼開﹐看見祂的榮耀恩愛。
ContentEN: Till heathen lands, with wond'ring eye, its rising glory shall descry.

ContentCN: 為主站住﹗剛強站住﹗如同海邊磯磐穩固﹗
ContentEN: Stand up for Jesus, nobly stand! Firm as a rock on ocean's strand!

ContentCN: 站住﹐你當為主站住﹗不久就要盡此世途﹔
ContentEN: Stand up for Jesus, Christian, stand! Soon with the blest, immortal band

ContentCN: 必同千萬蒙愛聖徒﹐永遠住在光明國度。
ContentEN: We'll dwell for age, life's journey o'er, in realms of light on heavn's bright shore.

ContentCN: 藉著祢的救贖﹐並藉祢恩典﹐
ContentEN: By Thy grand redemption, by Thy grace divine,

ContentCN: 可愛、榮耀救主﹐我在祢這邊。
ContentEN: We are on the Lord's side; Savior, we are Thine.

ContentCN: 誰是在主這邊﹖誰要跟隨主﹖
ContentEN: Who is on the Lord's side? Who will serve the King?

ContentCN: 誰要為主活著﹐走祂的道路﹖
ContentEN: Who will be His helpers, other lives to bring?

ContentCN: 誰要撇開世界﹐去為主爭戰﹖
ContentEN: Who will leave the world's side? Who will face the foe?

ContentCN: 誰是在主這邊﹐跟隨主向前﹖
ContentEN: Who is on the Lord's side? Who for Him will go?

ContentCN: 藉著祢的救贖﹐並藉祢恩典﹐
ContentEN: By Thy grand redemption, by Thy grace divine,

ContentCN: 可愛、榮耀救主﹐我在祢這邊。
ContentEN: We are on the Lord's side; Savior, we are Thine.

ContentCN: 參加主的軍隊﹐歡樂去爭戰﹐
ContentEN: Not for weight of glory, not for crown and palm,

ContentCN: 不是為著榮耀﹐不是為冠冕﹔
ContentEN: Enter we the army, raise the warrior psalm;

ContentCN: 乃是因著主愛激勵我向前﹐
ContentEN: But for love that claimeth lives for whom He died:

ContentCN: 我既蒙祂恩待﹐該在祂這邊。
ContentEN: He whom Jesus nameth must be on His side.

ContentCN: 藉著祢的救贖﹐並藉祢恩典﹐
ContentEN: By Thy grand redemption, by Thy grace divine,

ContentCN: 可愛、榮耀救主﹐我在祢這邊。
ContentEN: We are on the Lord's side; Savior, we are Thine.

ContentCN: 祢已將我救贖﹐作祢的子民﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, Thou hast bought us, not with gold or gem,

ContentCN: 乃是用祢寶血﹐不是用金銀﹔
ContentEN: But with Thine own life-blood, for Thy diadem;

ContentCN: 凡來跟從祢者﹐得福都無限﹐
ContentEN: With Thy blessing filling each who comes to Thee,

ContentCN: 祢使我們甘願且自由向前。
ContentEN: Thou hast made us willing, thou hast made us free.

ContentCN: 藉著祢的救贖﹐並藉祢恩典﹐
ContentEN: By Thy grand redemption, by Thy grace divine,

ContentCN: 可愛、榮耀救主﹐我在祢這邊。
ContentEN: We are on the Lord's side; Savior, we are Thine.

ContentCN: 戰爭雖會兇猛﹐仇敵也強悍﹐
ContentEN: Fierce may be the conflict, strong may be the foe,

ContentCN: 但是主的軍隊﹐無人能擊散﹔
ContentEN: But the King's own army none can overthrow.

ContentCN: 在祂大纛之下﹐必定能得勝﹐
ContentEN: Round His standard ranging, vict'ry is secure,

ContentCN: 因祂真實、不變﹐奏凱已確定。
ContentEN: For His truth unchanging makes the triumph sure.

ContentCN: 藉著祢的救贖﹐並藉祢恩典﹐
ContentEN: By Thy grand redemption, by Thy grace divine,

ContentCN: 可愛、榮耀救主﹐我在祢這邊。
ContentEN: We are on the Lord's side; Savior, we are Thine.

ContentCN: 蒙主選為兵丁﹐在今世爭戰﹐
ContentEN: Chosen to be soldiers in an alien land;

ContentCN: 我當完全忠心﹐隨元帥向前﹔
ContentEN: Chosen, called, and faithful for our Captain's band;

ContentCN: 如此服事我王﹐切勿變冷淡﹐
ContentEN: In the service royal let us not grow cold;

ContentCN: 守住高貴身位﹐忠貞又勇敢。
ContentEN: Let us be right loyal, noble, true, and bold.

ContentCN: 親愛基督精兵﹐戰場在衝鋒﹐
ContentEN: Soldier, soldier, fighting in the world's great strife,

ContentCN: 前曾倚賴自己﹐爭戰難得勝﹔
ContentEN: On thyself relying, battling for thy life;

ContentCN: 勿再倚靠自己﹐單靠基督大力﹐
ContentEN: Trust thyself no longer, trust to Christ He's stronger;

ContentCN: 在加力量者裏面﹐凡事我都能作。
ContentEN: I can all things, all things do Thro' Christ, which strenght'neth me.

ContentCN: 在你日常分內﹐站住為公義﹐
ContentEN: In your daily duty, standing up for right,

ContentCN: 是否有時厭倦﹐感到不容易﹖
ContentEN: Are you sometimes weary - heart not always light.

ContentCN: 務要投靠救主﹐你擔﹐祂肯背負﹐
ContentEN: Doubt your Savior never, this your motto ever:

ContentCN: 在加力量者裏面﹐凡事我都能作。
ContentEN: I can all things, all things do through Christ, which strength'neth me.

ContentCN: 路中若感疲乏﹐祂必願扶助﹐
ContentEN: If your way be weary He will help you through -

ContentCN: 無論你是喜樂﹐或者是痛苦﹔
ContentEN: Help you in your troubles and your pleasures too;

ContentCN: 雖經水深火熱﹐也必安然度過﹐
ContentEN: Say, when Satan's by you: say, when all things try you:

ContentCN: 在加力量者裏面﹐凡事我都能作。
ContentEN: I can all things, all things do through Christ, which strength'neth me.

ContentCN: 在這邪惡世界﹐試探實頻繁﹐
ContentEN: In a world of trouble, tempted oft to stray,

ContentCN: 但你不需跌倒﹐撒但必逃竄﹔
ContentEN: You need never stumble, Satan cannot stay,

ContentCN: 牠必全然徒勞﹐只要你肯宣告﹕
ContentEN: Will but tempt you vainly, if you tell him plainly,

ContentCN: 在加力量者裏面﹐凡事我都能作。
ContentEN: I can all things, all things do through Christ, which strenght'neth me.

ContentCN: 耶穌無限能力﹐磅礡如海洋﹐
ContentEN: Jesus' pow'r is boundless, boundless as the sea;

ContentCN: 在祂永遠是"能"﹐足能扶持我﹔
ContentEN: He is always able, able to keep me,

ContentCN: 軟弱裏得能力﹐低微中顯榮耀﹐
ContentEN: Pow'r bring from my weakness, glory from my meekness.

ContentCN: 在加力量者裏面﹐凡事我都能作。
ContentEN: I can all things, all things do through Christ, which strenght'neth me.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹐榮耀的消息﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! Tell where'er you go

ContentCN: 耶穌得勝﹐仍舊得勝﹐勝過眾仇敵﹗
ContentEN: That the Lord is still the conqu'ror over every foe.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹐大聲唱凱歌﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! Tell with every breath

ContentCN: 耶穌得勝﹐仍舊得勝﹐勝過罪、死、魔﹗
ContentEN: That the Saviour still is conqu'ror over sin and death.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹐榮耀的消息﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! Tell where'er you go

ContentCN: 耶穌得勝﹐仍舊得勝﹐勝過眾仇敵﹗
ContentEN: That the Lord is still the conqu'ror over every foe.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹗寶血有能力﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor, power in His blood!

ContentCN: 仗祂十架﹐時時誇勝﹐魔鬼就逃匿。
ContentEN: In His cross we ever triumph; Satan's bound to flee.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹐榮耀的消息﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! Tell where'er you go

ContentCN: 耶穌得勝﹐仍舊得勝﹐勝過眾仇敵﹗
ContentEN: That the Lord is still the conqu'ror over every foe.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹗疾病也消殺﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! Pain and sickness flee

ContentCN: 因藉耶穌﹐完全得勝﹐成於各各他。
ContentEN: When we plead the mighty vict'ry won on Calvary.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹐榮耀的消息﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! Tell where'er you go

ContentCN: 耶穌得勝﹐仍舊得勝﹐勝過眾仇敵﹗
ContentEN: That the Lord is still the conqu'ror over every foe.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹗故剛強有為﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! Therefore do and dare

ContentCN: 無論何處﹐祂有遣徵﹐當應命勿畏。
ContentEN: Go wherever Jesus sends you in prevailing prayer.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹐榮耀的消息﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! Tell where'er you go

ContentCN: 耶穌得勝﹐仍舊得勝﹐勝過眾仇敵﹗
ContentEN: That the Lord is still the conqu'ror over every foe.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹗勿懼﹐勿讓步﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! No defeat nor fear

ContentCN: 前途縱有黑暗權能﹐耶穌必開路。
ContentEN: Evermore must dim thy vision — Christ the way will clear.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹐榮耀的消息﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! Tell where'er you go

ContentCN: 耶穌得勝﹐仍舊得勝﹐勝過眾仇敵﹗
ContentEN: That the Lord is still the conqu'ror over every foe.

ContentCN: 哈利路亞﹗耶穌得勝﹐耶穌快再臨﹗
ContentEN: Hallelujah, Christ is Victor! Soon His voice shall ring,

ContentCN: 所有同祂得勝的人﹐前來同歡欣﹗
ContentEN: Come, ye conqu'rors, come up hither, join thy conqu'ring King.

ContentCN: 爭戰原來不是你的﹐所以何必奮鬥﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 真實信心常是安息﹐沒有掙扎、憂愁。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 仇敵原來乃是神的﹐祂必看顧自己﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 只要我們藉祂能力﹐與祂一同站立。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我們所遇一切爭戰﹐已在加略得勝﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 只要我們堅守地位﹐運用基督權能。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 祂死﹐使我罪得饒恕﹔祂死﹐使我得潔﹔

ContentCN: 使我至終得進天府﹐靠著祂的寶血。
ContentEN: That we might go at last to heav'n, saved by His precious blood.

ContentCN: 惟祂能開天門的鎖﹐並且引我進內。
ContentEN: He only could unlock the gate of heav'n and let us in.

ContentCN: 靠主耶穌聖名﹐靠主耶穌聖名﹐我們必能得勝﹔
ContentEN: In the name of Jesus, in the name of Jesus, we have the victory.

ContentCN: 靠主耶穌聖名﹐靠主耶穌聖名﹐撒但必要逃遁。
ContentEN: In the name of Jesus, in the name of Jesus, Satan will have to flee.

ContentCN: 神的作為難盡說﹐神的大愛難測度﹔
ContentEN: Who can tell what God can do? Who can tell His love for you?

ContentCN: 靠主耶穌全能聖名﹐我們必能得勝。
ContentEN: In the name of Jesus, Jesus, we have the victory.

ContentCN: 全能名！全能名！我奉此名就得勝！
ContentEN: Mighty name! Mighty name! In that Name alone we win.

ContentCN: 全能名！全能名！撒但、罪、死﹐都無能。
ContentEN: Mighty name! Mighty name! Conqu'ring Satan, death, and sin.

ContentCN: 我奉耶穌全能的名﹐跪在施恩寶座前﹐
ContentEN: In the mighty name of Jesus, when we bow before the throne,

ContentCN: 打敗許多黑暗軍兵﹐滅熄許多的火箭。
ContentEN: Many deadly foes are vanquished, many victories are won.

ContentCN: 全能名！全能名！我奉此名就得勝！
ContentEN: Mighty name! Mighty name! In that Name alone we win.

ContentCN: 全能名！全能名！撒但、罪、死﹐都無能。
ContentEN: Mighty name! Mighty name! Conqu'ring Satan, death, and sin.

ContentCN: 當我求告全能耶穌﹐撒但全軍都敗陣﹔
ContentEN: When we plead the name of Jesus, Satan and his hosts must flee.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐耶穌﹐全能耶穌！祢的大名是得勝！
ContentEN: Jesus, Jesus, precious Jesus, in Thy name is victory.

ContentCN: 全能名！全能名！我奉此名就得勝！
ContentEN: Mighty name! Mighty name! In that Name alone we win.

ContentCN: 全能名！全能名！撒但、罪、死﹐都無能。
ContentEN: Mighty name! Mighty name! Conqu'ring Satan, death, and sin.

ContentCN: 不久主頒有福命令﹐召我進入祂天國﹔
ContentEN: Soon shall come the blessed moment when the battle shall be won,

ContentCN: 那時全能耶穌的名﹐使我得登祂寶座！
ContentEN: When the mighty name of Jesus shall exalt us to the throne.

ContentCN: 傳揚主口令！永不使靜默！
ContentEN: Peal out the watchword! silence it never!

ContentCN: 我靈發歌聲﹐釋放且歡騰﹔
ContentEN: Song of our spirits, rejoicing and free;

ContentCN: 傳揚主口令﹐忠心到永久﹐
ContentEN: Peal out the watchword! Loyal forever,

ContentCN: 惟靠祢恩典﹐生命的君王。
ContentEN: King of our lives, by Thy grace we will be.

ContentCN: 要全心﹐要真心﹐信實且忠誠﹐
ContentEN: True-hearted, whole-hearted, faithful and loyal,

ContentCN: 惟靠祢恩典﹐生命的君王﹔
ContentEN: King of our lives by Thy grace we will be;

ContentCN: 因著祢能力﹐在輝煌旌旗下﹐
ContentEN: Under the standard exalted and royal,

ContentCN: 奮發且剛強﹐全力赴戰場。
ContentEN: Strong in Thy strength we will battle for Thee.

ContentCN: 傳揚主口令！永不使靜默！
ContentEN: Peal out the watchword! silence it never!

ContentCN: 我靈發歌聲﹐釋放且歡騰﹔
ContentEN: Song of our spirits, rejoicing and free;

ContentCN: 傳揚主口令﹐忠心到永久﹐
ContentEN: Peal out the watchword! Loyal forever,

ContentCN: 惟靠祢恩典﹐生命的君王。
ContentEN: King of our lives, by Thy grace we will be.

ContentCN: 要全心﹐要真心﹐完全的順命﹐
ContentEN: True-hearted, whole-hearted, fullest allegiance

ContentCN: 從今全屬祢﹐榮耀的君王﹔
ContentEN: Yielding henceforth to our glorious King;

ContentCN: 勇敢竭盡全力﹐因愛而服從﹐
ContentEN: Valiant endeavor and loving obedience,

ContentCN: 甘願而喜樂﹐我們今獻身。
ContentEN: Freely and joyously now would we bring.

ContentCN: 傳揚主口令！永不使靜默！
ContentEN: Peal out the watchword! silence it never!

ContentCN: 我靈發歌聲﹐釋放且歡騰﹔
ContentEN: Song of our spirits, rejoicing and free;

ContentCN: 傳揚主口令﹐忠心到永久﹐
ContentEN: Peal out the watchword! Loyal forever,

ContentCN: 惟靠祢恩典﹐生命的君王。
ContentEN: King of our lives, by Thy grace we will be.

ContentCN: 要全心﹐要真心﹐榮耀的救主﹐
ContentEN: True-hearted, whole-hearted, Savior all-glorious!

ContentCN: 讓祢大能單獨掌管我心﹔
ContentEN: Take Thy great power and reign there alone,

ContentCN: 勝過我一切﹐意志、思想、感情﹐
ContentEN: Over our wills and affections victorious,

ContentCN: 甘願來投順﹐完全歸主名。
ContentEN: Freely surrendered and wholly Thine own.

ContentCN: 衝過！戰士哪﹐衝過！前線正在開火﹔
ContentEN: Charge, soldiers, charge in battle! The conflict has begun;

ContentCN: 但各各他已得勝﹐請你常唱此歌。
ContentEN: Thy battle song triumphant "The victory is won!"

ContentCN: 黑暗權勢應當退！撒但陰府已危！
ContentEN: Hell's power must be vanquished and Satan's forces strewn:

ContentCN: 萬軍之主的元帥﹐快要奏凱歸回。
ContentEN: The Captain of the Army will come and triumph soon.

ContentCN: 衝過！戰士哪﹐衝過！仰起你頭看我﹔
ContentEN: Charge, soldiers, charge in battle! And gaze upon thy Lord;

ContentCN: 你若為我打勝仗﹐必得登我寶座。
ContentEN: If thou wilt fight His battle, the throne is thy reward.

ContentCN: 這是屬靈的交戰﹐不在屬世地場﹔
ContentEN: This war is of the spirit, not fought on earthly ground;

ContentCN: 主已知道仇敵迫﹐前後四圍佈滿！
ContentEN: The Lord well knows the foe is near, encircling us around.

ContentCN: 衝過！戰士哪﹐衝過！你要登我寶座﹔
ContentEN: Charge, soldiers, charge in battle! Christ's throne awaiteth thee;

ContentCN: 使我復活的能力﹐會使你靈超脫。
ContentEN: His resurrection power will lift thy spirit free.

ContentCN: 藉我﹐你要得權能﹐藉我﹐你要得勝﹔
ContentEN: Through Him thou wilt have power, the foe to battle down;

ContentCN: 藉我﹐你要唱凱歌﹐藉我﹐你要高升。
ContentEN: Through Him thou wilt the triumph sing and wear the victor's crown.

ContentCN: 衝過！戰士哪﹐衝過！你要登我寶座﹔
ContentEN: Charge, soldiers, charge in battle! Thou shalt ascend the throne;

ContentCN: 我已為你留一席﹐你要歡喜快樂。
ContentEN: A feast He is preparing, how happy thou to own.

ContentCN: 我們與祂同復活﹐與祂天上同坐﹔
ContentEN: With Him we're resurrected above the battle din;

ContentCN: 遠離戰場的喊聲﹐遠離綁人罪惡。
ContentEN: Transcending all that binds us, we're far above in Him.

ContentCN: 衝過！戰士哪﹐衝過！你要登主寶座﹔
ContentEN: Charge, soldiers, charge in battle! Thou art the royal heir;

ContentCN: 主從灰塵揀選你﹐要你同祂得國。
ContentEN: The Lord from dust did choose thee, that thou His kingdom share.

ContentCN: 你的將來乃光明﹐不是黑暗灰心﹐
ContentEN: Thou hast no part in darkness, Thy future, O how bright;

ContentCN: 永與耶穌在一起﹐永得祂的愛情。
ContentEN: With Christ to dwell forever and in His love delight.

ContentCN: 衝過！歡呼著衝過！前面就是寶座﹔
ContentEN: With joyful shouts charge forward! The kingdom is before;

ContentCN: 你從郇山的高峰﹐可唱得勝新歌。
ContentEN: Upon the peak of Zion we'll sing, the battle o'er.

ContentCN: 被殺羔羊已得勝﹐登基羔羊已勝﹔
ContentEN: The Lamb has won the victory! The Lamb is on the throne!

ContentCN: 我們歡呼讚美祂﹐因祂必定得勝。
ContentEN: With shouts of joy we praise Him, for He must overcome.

ContentCN: 當奉耶穌這名站住﹐信祂得勝站住﹔
ContentEN: The name of Jesus is our stand, it is our victory;

ContentCN: 不靠自己力量站住﹐不靠才能站住。
ContentEN: Not on ourselves do we rely, but mighty Lord on Thee.

ContentCN: 不要使用血氣兵器﹐只用聖靈寶劍﹔
ContentEN: Our weapons are not arms of flesh, but ours the Spirit's sword,

ContentCN: 穿上神的軍裝服役﹐滅盡仇敵火箭。
ContentEN: And God's whole armor putting on, we battle in the Lord.

ContentCN: 看哪﹐邪靈正在聚集﹐故當守你地場﹔
ContentEN: Behold, the foe doth meet and plot, stand firm in one accord!

ContentCN: 四面黑暗﹐爭戰緊急﹐故當靠主抵擋。
ContentEN: Tho' war be fierce and darkness thick, resist him in the Lord!

ContentCN: 你若退後﹐怕仇敵兇﹐一人牽動全軍﹔
ContentEN: If one thro' fear should backward turn, He undermines the rest.

ContentCN: 請你不要使你弟兄因你緣故受窘。
ContentEN: Oh, do not let your brothers down, nor by you be distressed.

ContentCN: 撒但已知其時不久﹐所以其氣忿忿﹔
ContentEN: The devil knows his time is short, He is the more enraged,

ContentCN: 要在爭戰尚未起首﹐就使你靈鬱悶。
ContentEN: And by his wiles would weaken us before the battle's waged.

ContentCN: 誘惑、試探比前更多﹐苦難比前更大﹔
ContentEN: The trials now more numerous are, the suff'ring e'en more sore,

ContentCN: 陰府權勢攻逼你我﹐比前更為可怕。
ContentEN: The force of hell opposing us more dreadful than before.

ContentCN: 對此情形﹐我們當有何種態度纔可﹖
ContentEN: What should our posture be today in such a desp'rate hour?

ContentCN: 我們可否因貪優游﹐便讓仇敵宰割﹖
ContentEN: Should we our ease and pleasure seek and let the foe devour?

ContentCN: 或者因著苦難加倍﹐更加忍耐奮勇﹖
ContentEN: Or with increasing conflict strong, courageous to endure?

ContentCN: 生死關頭﹐在此定規誰要得主稱榮﹖
ContentEN: 'Tis here that life or death is won! Who will God's praise secure?

ContentCN: 因此﹐你當為主站住﹐耶穌是得勝者﹔
ContentEN: For Christ the Lord we then would stand, He is the Conqueror!

ContentCN: 你當忍受一切痛苦﹐直到那日方捨。
ContentEN: For Him we would endure the pain until the fight is o'er.

ContentCN: 耶穌不久快要再臨﹐戰事不久要停﹔
ContentEN: The hour of triumph soon we’ll see - the Lord will come again!

ContentCN: 你今為主受難受驚﹐那日必得權柄。
ContentEN: If now we suffer for His sake, then we with Him shall reign.

ContentCN: 神的子民被寇﹐神豈不為復仇﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主口親說﹐祂必定"要"﹔我何必怕彼獠﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 晝夜呼籲聲音﹐神豈不予垂聽﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我對你說﹐祂必趕"快"將敵從天下摔！
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 撒但如此壓迫﹐神豈不申斥責﹖
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我對你說﹐祂必定要立刻加以釘鐐。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 敵既這樣兇劇﹐主既這樣應許
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 我們就當繼續呼籲﹐使敵早日結局。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 因此﹐我們應當比前更加堅剛﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 無晝無夜向神控告﹐把敵權勢盡掃。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 這是榮耀教會﹐聖潔無瑕疵﹐已在寶血中洗淨。
ContentEN: 'Tis a glorious church, without spot or wrinkle, washed in the blood of Lamb;

ContentCN: 這是榮耀教會﹐聖潔無瑕疵﹐已在寶血中洗淨。
ContentEN: 'Tis a glorious church, without spot or wrinkle, washed in the blood of Lamb.

ContentCN: 你可聽見他們步聲﹐亮光中間浩蕩來﹔
ContentEN: Do you hear them coming, brother - thronging up the steeps of light,

ContentCN: 形容榮耀﹐充滿見證﹐血洗衣裳甚潔白﹖
ContentEN: Clad in glorious, shining garments - blood-washed garments, pure and white?

ContentCN: 這是榮耀教會﹐聖潔無瑕疵﹐已在寶血中洗淨。
ContentEN: 'Tis a glorious church, without spot or wrinkle, washed in the blood of Lamb;

ContentCN: 這是榮耀教會﹐聖潔無瑕疵﹐已在寶血中洗淨。
ContentEN: 'Tis a glorious church, without spot or wrinkle, washed in the blood of Lamb.

ContentCN: 高唱凱歌群眾是誰﹖動人歌聲漫天地﹔
ContentEN: Do you hear the stirring anthems filling all the earth and sky?

ContentCN: 這是偉大得勝軍隊﹐高高舉起主旌旗。
ContentEN: 'Tis a grand, victorious army, lift its banner up on light!

ContentCN: 這是榮耀教會﹐聖潔無瑕疵﹐已在寶血中洗淨。
ContentEN: 'Tis a glorious church, without spot or wrinkle, washed in the blood of Lamb;

ContentCN: 這是榮耀教會﹐聖潔無瑕疵﹐已在寶血中洗淨。
ContentEN: 'Tis a glorious church, without spot or wrinkle, washed in the blood of Lamb.

ContentCN: 不必懼怕憂愁得勝﹐不必懼怕罪和死﹔
ContentEN: Never fear the clouds of sorrow, never fear the storms of sin,

ContentCN: 明日我們就要得勝﹐今日喜樂已開始。
ContentEN: We shall triumph on the morrow, even now our joys begin.

ContentCN: 這是榮耀教會﹐聖潔無瑕疵﹐已在寶血中洗淨。
ContentEN: 'Tis a glorious church, without spot or wrinkle, washed in the blood of Lamb;

ContentCN: 這是榮耀教會﹐聖潔無瑕疵﹐已在寶血中洗淨。
ContentEN: 'Tis a glorious church, without spot or wrinkle, washed in the blood of Lamb.

ContentCN: 我們應當讚美高唱﹐豐富榮耀已在望！
ContentEN: Wave the banner, shout His praises, for our victory is nigh!

ContentCN: 不久將與我主同王﹐救主、教會同獎賞。
ContentEN: We shall join our conqu'ring Savir, we shall reign with Him on high!

ContentCN: 美麗錫安﹐我神聖城﹐萬般榮耀難盡述﹐
ContentEN: Glorious things of thee are spoken, Zion, city of our God;

ContentCN: 有許必應﹐有言必踐﹐選妳作為祂居所﹔
ContentEN: He whose word cannot be broken, formed thee for His own abode;

ContentCN: 萬古磐石是妳根基﹐誰能搖動妳安息﹖
ContentEN: On the Rock of Ages founded, what can shake thy sure repose?

ContentCN: 救恩牆垣四圍環繞﹐儘可嗤笑眾仇敵。
ContentEN: With salvation's walls surrounded, thou mayst smile at all thy foes.

ContentCN: 請看永遠活水滔滔﹐湧流來自永遠愛﹐
ContentEN: See the streams of living waters, springing from eternal love,

ContentCN: 無窮活泉供祢兒女﹐永無缺乏的恐懼﹔
ContentEN: Well supply thy sons and daughters and all fear of want remove.

ContentCN: 誰能覺得困倦乾渴﹐當此活水長湧流﹐
ContentEN: Who can faint while such a river ever flows their thirst t'assuage?

ContentCN: 恩典堅如賜恩的主﹐歷盡年代仍屹立！
ContentEN: Grace which, like the Lord, the Giver, never fails from age to age!

ContentCN: 請看雲火又正顯現﹐籠罩錫安千萬民﹐
ContentEN: Round each habitation hov'ring, see the cloud and fire appear

ContentCN: 如此榮光﹐如此遮蓋﹐顯示主正何等近﹔
ContentEN: For a glory and a cov'ring, showing that the Lord is near.

ContentCN: 美麗錫安﹐我神聖城﹐萬般榮耀難盡述﹐
ContentEN: Glorious things of thee are spoken, Zion, city of our God;

ContentCN: 有許必應﹐有言必踐﹐永選妳作祂居所。
ContentEN: He whose word cannot be broken formed thee for His own abode.

ContentCN: 主﹐我愛祢國度﹐
ContentEN: I love Thy Kingdom, Lord,

ContentCN: 就是祢的居所﹔
ContentEN: The house of Thine abode,

ContentCN: 就是教會-祢所救贖﹐
ContentEN: The church our blest Redeemer saved

ContentCN: 就是祢的傑作。
ContentEN: With His own precious blood.

ContentCN: 神﹐我愛祢教會﹐
ContentEN: I love Thy church, O God!

ContentCN: 她是祢心奇珍﹔
ContentEN: Her walls before Thee stand,

ContentCN: 祢對待她愛護入微﹐
ContentEN: Dear as the apple of Thine eye

ContentCN: 猶如眼中瞳仁。
ContentEN: And graven on Thy hand.

ContentCN: 為她我常求呼﹐
ContentEN: For her my tears shall fall,

ContentCN: 為她我常哀哭﹐
ContentEN: For her my prayers ascend;

ContentCN: 為她我常操心勞碌﹐
ContentEN: To her my cares and toils be given

ContentCN: 直到日子滿足。
ContentEN: Till toils and cares shall end.

ContentCN: 我寶貴她特點﹐
ContentEN: Beyond my highest joy

ContentCN: -遠超最高喜樂-
ContentEN: I prize her heav'nly ways,

ContentCN: 甘甜交通﹐真誠奉獻﹐
ContentEN: Her sweet communion, solemn vows,

ContentCN: 愛和讚美之歌。
ContentEN: Her hymns of love and praise.

ContentCN: 耶穌﹐神聖朋友﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, Thou Friend divine,

ContentCN: 我的救主、君王﹔
ContentEN: Our Savior and our King,

ContentCN: 大能的手施行拯救﹐
ContentEN: Thy hand from every snare and foe

ContentCN: 脫離仇敵、羅網。
ContentEN: Shall great deliv'rance bring.

ContentCN: 正如真理永存﹐
ContentEN: Sure as Thy truth shall last,

ContentCN: 錫安必蒙賜福﹔
ContentEN: To Zion shall be giv'n

ContentCN: 地上最大榮耀無盡﹐
ContentEN: The brightest glories earth can yield

ContentCN: 天上更大豐富。
ContentEN: And brighter bliss of heav'n.

ContentCN: 求主住在教會中﹐顯出愛心的交通﹐
ContentEN: Jesus, with Thy Church abide, be her Savior, Lord and Guide,

ContentCN: 求祢引導並感動﹐求聽我們禱告！
ContentEN: While on earth her faith is tried; we beseech Thee, hear us.

ContentCN: 賜她純正的話語﹐賜她屬靈的興趣﹐
ContentEN: Keep her life and doctrine pure, help her, patient to endure,

ContentCN: 使她信靠祢應許﹐求聽我們禱告！
ContentEN: Trusting in Thy promise sure: we beseech Thee, hear us.

ContentCN: 釋放她所有羈絆﹐停止她無益自滿﹐
ContentEN: All her fettered pow'rs release, bid our strife and envy cease,

ContentCN: 賜給她屬天平安﹐求聽我們禱告！
ContentEN: Grant the heav'nly gift of peace: we beseech Thee, hear us.

ContentCN: 願她真道能合一﹐愛心﹐工作能聯繫﹐
ContentEN: May she one in doctrine be, one in truth and charity,

ContentCN: 同心引領人歸祢﹐求聽我們禱告！
ContentEN: Winning all to faith in Thee: we beseech Thee, hear us.

ContentCN: 願她四散的兒女﹐掙脫惡者的禁拘﹐
ContentEN: May her scattered children be from reproach of evil free,

ContentCN: 作祢愛心的證據﹐求聽我們禱告！
ContentEN: Blameless witnesses for Thee: we beseech Thee, hear us.

ContentCN: 願她燈臺常發光﹐射出真理照四方﹐
ContentEN: May her lamp of truth be bright, bid her bear aloft its light

ContentCN: 除去諸罪和死亡﹐求聽我們禱告！
ContentEN: Through the realms of heathen night: we beseech Thee, hear us.

ContentCN: 願她滿足祢意旨﹐榮耀﹐聖潔﹐無瑕疵﹐
ContentEN: May she soon all glorious be, spotless and from wrinkle free,

ContentCN: 光明純潔﹐祢重視﹐求聽我們禱告！
ContentEN: Pure, and bright, and worthy Thee: we beseech Thee, hear us.

ContentEN: O teach me what it meaneth: that Cross uplifted high,

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐我們聚集在祢墓的四圍﹐
ContentEN: Around Thy grave, Lord Jesus, in spirit here we stand,

ContentCN: 口中歌唱心歡喜﹐見證祢的作為﹔
ContentEN: With hearts all full of praises to keep Thy blest command;

ContentCN: 我們用信來跟隨﹐追蹤祢的道路﹐
ContentEN: Our souls by faith rejoicing, to trace Thy path of love,

ContentCN: 藉這莊嚴奧妙水﹐進入祢的工夫。
ContentEN: Down through death's angry billows, up to the throne above.

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐我們記念祢魂中的苦難﹐
ContentEN: Lord Jesus! we remember the travail of Thy soul,

ContentCN: 祢因向我施恩典﹐曾被波浪沖漫﹔
ContentEN: When through Thy love's deep pity, the waves did o'er Thee roll;

ContentCN: 為我﹐祢浸死水中﹐為我﹐祢曾流血﹐
ContentEN: Baptized in death's dark waters, for us thy blood was shed;

ContentCN: 為我﹐祢曾離天庭﹐為我﹐祢曾命絕。
ContentEN: For us Thou, Lord of Glory, wast numbered with the dead.

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐祢今已復活﹐黑暗已成往事﹐
ContentEN: O Lord! Thou now art risen, Thy travail all is o'er;

ContentCN: 現今祢已登寶座﹐活著﹐永不再死﹔
ContentEN: For sin Thou once hast suffered, thou liv'st to die no more;

ContentCN: 罪、死、陰府祢毀盡﹐我也同祢得勝﹐
ContentEN: Sin, death and hell are vanquished by Thee, the Church's Head;

ContentCN: 因祢是我的生命﹐我是坐享其成。
ContentEN: And lo! We share Thy triumphs, thou first-born from the dead.

ContentCN: 我今受浸歸祢死！承認與祢同釘﹐
ContentEN: Unto Thy death baptized, we own with Thee we died;

ContentCN: 我也與祢同復活﹐與祢榮耀有分﹔
ContentEN: With Thee, our Life, we're risen, and shall be glorified.

ContentCN: 撒但、世界和罪惡﹐今都不能摸我﹐
ContentEN: From sin, the world, and Satan, we're ransomed by Thy blood,

ContentCN: 我今同祢作旅客﹐同祢為神生活。
ContentEN: And here would walk as strangers, alive with Thee to go.

ContentCN: 與主同葬﹐也一同復活﹐
ContentEN: Buried with Christ, and raised with Him too;

ContentCN: 還有甚麼留給我去作﹖
ContentEN: What is then left for me to do?

ContentCN: 只要我不再奮鬥擊空﹐
ContentEN: Simply to cease from struggling and strife;

ContentCN: 只要我照新生而舉動。
ContentEN: Simply to walk in newness of life.

ContentCN: 榮耀歸於神！
ContentEN: Glory be to God.

ContentCN: 一同復活與我的元首﹐
ContentEN: Risen with Christ, my glorious Head,

ContentCN: 我今在聖潔路上行走﹔
ContentEN: Holiness now, the pathway I tread,

ContentCN: 當我向前時﹐我就想到﹕
ContentEN: Beautiful thought, while walking therein;

ContentCN: 死的人脫罪是何其好！
ContentEN: He that is dead is freed from sin.

ContentCN: 榮耀歸於神！
ContentEN: Glory be to God.

ContentCN: 與主同活﹐祂永不再死﹐
ContentEN: Living with Christ, who dieth no more,

ContentCN: 與主同行﹐祂永不會遲﹔
ContentEN: Following Christ, who goeth before,

ContentCN: 我天天算自己已經死﹐
ContentEN: I am from bondage utterly freed,

ContentCN: 所以我就從捆綁得釋。
ContentEN: Reckoning self as dead indeed.

ContentCN: 榮耀歸於神！
ContentEN: Glory be to God.

ContentCN: 為主活著﹐我獻上肢體﹐
ContentEN: Living for Christ, my members I yield,

ContentCN: 永遠歸神﹐作祂的奴隸﹔
ContentEN: Servants to God, for evermore sealed,

ContentCN: 我今在恩下﹐不在法下﹐
ContentEN: Not under law, I'm now under grace,

ContentCN: 罪已失勢﹐主代興管轄。
ContentEN: Sin is dethroned, and Christ takes its place.

ContentCN: 榮耀歸於神！
ContentEN: Glory be to God.

ContentCN: 靠主長大﹐我今真慚愧
ContentEN: Growing in Christ, no more shall be named

ContentCN: 再題到我的已往寶貴﹔
ContentEN: Things of which now I'm truly ashamed,

ContentCN: 我願意結出成聖果子﹐
ContentEN: Fruit unto holiness will I bear,

ContentCN: 滿足神心意﹐遵行神旨。
ContentEN: Life evermore, the end I shall share.

ContentCN: 榮耀歸於神！
ContentEN: Glory be to God.

ContentEN: For the pledge that seals Him mine,

ContentEN: For the words of love divine,
