ContentEN: We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

ContentCN: 依然是酒﹐依然餅﹐
ContentEN: Only bread and only wine,

ContentCN: 藉此信心卻看明﹕
ContentEN: Yet to faith, the solemn sign

ContentCN: 愛心神聖的小影。
ContentEN: Of the heav'nly and divine!

ContentCN: 主﹐我們感謝祢。
ContentEN: We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

ContentCN: 為著祢曾召我們﹐
ContentEN: For the words that turn our eye

ContentCN: 舉目仰望祢救恩﹐
ContentEN: To the cross of Calvary,

ContentCN: 藉著信心近祢身﹐
ContentEN: Bidding us in faith draw nigh,

ContentCN: 主﹐我們感謝祢。
ContentEN: We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

ContentCN: 為著祢曾發命令﹐
ContentEN: For the words that fragrance breathe

ContentCN: 要我記念祢行徑—
ContentEN: These plain symbols underneath,

ContentCN: 何等溫柔、何等貧！
ContentEN: Words that His own peace bequeath,

ContentCN: 主﹐我們感謝祢。
ContentEN: We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

ContentCN: 為著祢曾用慈愛﹐
ContentEN: For Thy words in Spirit shown,

ContentCN: 引我想家在天外—
ContentEN: For Thy will to us made known,

ContentCN: 行此﹐直等到我來。
ContentEN: Do ye this until I come,

ContentCN: 主﹐我們感謝祢。
ContentEN: We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

ContentCN: 直到祂來﹐我擘餅﹐
ContentEN: Till He come we take the bread,

ContentCN: 表明祂作我生命﹐
ContentEN: Type of Him on whom we feed,

ContentCN: 為我睡了﹐為我醒﹐
ContentEN: Him who liveth and was dead!

ContentCN: 主﹐我們感謝祢。
ContentEN: We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

ContentCN: 直到祂來﹐我飲杯﹐
ContentEN: Till He come we take the cup;

ContentCN: 表明祂賜福全備﹐
ContentEN: As we at His table sup,

ContentCN: 使我站在新地位﹐
ContentEN: Eye and heart are lifted up!

ContentCN: 主﹐我們感謝祢。
ContentEN: We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

ContentCN: 為著再來的囑咐﹐
ContentEN: For that coming, here foreshown,

ContentCN: 為著那日的緊速﹐
ContentEN: For that day to man unknown,

ContentCN: 為著榮耀和國度﹐
ContentEN: For the glory and the throne,

ContentCN: 主﹐我們感謝祢。
ContentEN: We give Thee thanks, O Lord.

ContentCN: 主舉愛旗遮蓋我們﹐同來享受祂愛筵﹔
ContentEN: Jesus spreads His banner o'er us, cheers our famished souls with food;

ContentCN: 我們感激救贖大恩﹐全心虔誠來記念。
ContentEN: He the banquet spreads before us, of His mystic flesh and blood.

ContentCN: 桌上陳設這餅和杯﹐都是表明祢的愛﹔
ContentEN: Precious banquet, bread of heaven, wine of gladness, flowing free;

ContentCN: 我們一同領祢恩惠﹐我們一同來敬拜。
ContentEN: May we taste it, kindly given, in remembrance Lord, of Thee.

ContentCN: 我們記念祢曾臨世﹐成了奴僕歷艱苦﹔
ContentEN: In Thy holy incarnation, when the angels sang Thy birth;

ContentCN: 祢受試探﹐祢常禁食﹐勞碌並無枕首處。
ContentEN: In Thy fasting and temptation, in Thy labors on the earth,

ContentCN: 我們記念祢尋罪人﹐常受頂撞和饑渴﹔
ContentEN: In Thy trial and rejection, in Thy suff'rings on the tree,

ContentCN: 如有一人悔改歸神﹐祢認流血也值得。
ContentEN: In Thy glorious resurrection, may we, Lord, remember Thee.

ContentCN: 我們記念祢釘十架﹐被人定罪﹐被神棄﹔
ContentEN: In Thy holy incarnation, when the angels sang Thy birth;

ContentCN: 獨自支付我們贖價﹐祢顯祢愛的無極。
ContentEN: In Thy fasting and temptation, in Thy labors on the earth,

ContentCN: 我們記念祢今在天﹐在神右邊常代求﹔
ContentEN: In Thy trial and rejection, in Thy suff'rings on the tree,

ContentCN: 祢曾應許還要顯現﹐主阿﹐求祢快成就。
ContentEN: In Thy glorious resurrection, may we, Lord, remember Thee.

ContentCN: 主﹐在此﹐我要與祢面對面﹐
ContentEN: Here, O my Lord, I see Thee face to face;

ContentCN: 在此﹐我要用信把握不見﹔
ContentEN: Here faith can touch and handle things unseen.

ContentCN: 在此﹐我要更深認識恩典﹐
ContentEN: Here would I grasp with firmer hand Thy grace,

ContentCN: 將我疲勞都息在主腳前。
ContentEN: And all my weariness upon Thee lean.

ContentCN: 在此﹐我要喫主所賜美物﹐
ContentEN: Here would I feed upon the bread of God;

ContentCN: 在此﹐我要飲主所遞福杯﹔
ContentEN: Here drink with Thee the royal wine of heav'n;

ContentCN: 在此﹐我要忘記一切難處﹐
ContentEN: Here would I lay aside each earthly load;

ContentCN: 再嘗一次赦罪平安滋味。
ContentEN: Here taste afresh the calm of sin forgiv'n.

ContentCN: 我雖有罪﹐但祢卻有公義﹐
ContentEN: Mine is the sin, but Thine the righteousness,

ContentCN: 我雖污穢﹐但祢卻有寶血﹔
ContentEN: Mine is the guilt, but Thine the cleansing Blood;

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐祢的寶血﹐將我清洗﹐
ContentEN: Here is my robe, my refuge, and my peace:

ContentCN: 祢的公義﹐對付我的罪孽。
ContentEN: Thy blood, Thy righteousness, O Lord my God!

ContentCN: 除祢之外﹐我無別的幫助﹐
ContentEN: I have no help but Thine; nor do I need

ContentCN: 有祢賜恩﹐我就不求人惠﹔
ContentEN: Another arm save Thine to lean upon;

ContentCN: 有祢的愛﹐我已心滿意足﹐
ContentEN: It is enough, my Lord, enough indeed;

ContentCN: 靠祢能力﹐我要站住地位。
ContentEN: My strength is in Thy might, Thy might alone.

ContentCN: 席撤何速﹐表記的物已盡﹐
ContentEN: Too soon we rise; the symbols disappear;

ContentCN: 酒餅雖無﹐拯救的愛未亡﹔
ContentEN: The feast, though not the love, is past and gone;

ContentCN: 宴筵已過﹐祢仍在此親近﹐
ContentEN: The bread and wine remove, but Thou art here,

ContentCN: 親近有加﹐作我萬有君王。
ContentEN: Nearer than ever still our Shield and Sun.

ContentCN: 上席﹐罷席﹐次次我們聚散﹐
ContentEN: Feast after feast thus comes and passes by,

ContentCN: 如此聚散﹐遙指天上佳筵﹔
ContentEN: Yet passing, points to the glad feast above;

ContentCN: 時雖未至﹐我們卻已豫嘗
ContentEN: Giving sweet foretastes of the festal joy,

ContentCN: 他日天上羔羊婚娶喜宴。
ContentEN: The Lamb's great bridal-feast of bliss and love.

ContentCN: 看哪﹐雲柱今又離地上升﹐
ContentEN: Behold! The cloud is taken up again,

ContentCN: 在這野地又要乘夜前征﹔
ContentEN: Onward will march the faithful pilgrim band;

ContentCN: 祢正召呼﹐我們緊緊隨行﹐
ContentEN: As Thou art calling, we will follow on,

ContentCN: 不久我們就到光明天城。
ContentEN: Soon we will reach the city bright and grand.

ContentCN: 主耶穌﹐當那晚間﹐人們在祢旁邊﹐
ContentEN: On that same night, Lord Jesus, when all around Thee joined

ContentCN: 用盡黑暗和欺騙叫祢聖心受煎﹔
ContentEN: To cast its darkest shadow across Thy holy mind,

ContentCN: 祢在席間頻告語﹐要我行此相記﹐
ContentEN: We hear Thy voice, blest Savior, "this do, remember me,"

ContentCN: 我們聽話今會聚﹐為的來記念祢。
ContentEN: With grateful hearts responding, we do remember Thee.

ContentCN: 怒氣的杯何等苦！但祢為我們喝﹐
ContentEN: The depth of all Thy suff'ring no heart could e'er conceive,

ContentCN: 死亡的浸何難渡！但祢為我們涉﹔
ContentEN: The cup of wrath o'erflowing for us Thou didst receive;

ContentCN: 可憐祢在骷髏地﹐竟被父神離棄﹐
ContentEN: And, oh, of God forsaken on the accursed tree;

ContentCN: 主﹐我們滿心感激﹐不能不記念祢。
ContentEN: With grateful hearts, Lord Jesus, we now remember Thee.

ContentCN: 我想當日的幽冥﹐怎樣攻逼祢靈﹐
ContentEN: We think of all the darkness which round Thy spirit pressed,

ContentCN: 又想洪濤和波瀾﹐怎樣漫過祢身﹔
ContentEN: Of all those waves and billows, which rolled across Thy breast

ContentCN: 但在那裡我見祢﹐流露恩愛無比﹐
ContentEN: Oh, there Thy grace unbounded and perfect love we see;

ContentCN: 主﹐我們憂喜交集﹐現在來記念祢。
ContentEN: With joy and sorrow mingling, we would remember Thee.

ContentCN: 我們知祢已復活﹐吞滅死權死鉤﹐
ContentEN: We know Thee now as risen, the Firstborn from the dead;

ContentCN: 我們見祢坐寶座﹐作教會榮耀頭﹔
ContentEN: We see Thee now ascended, the Church's glorious Head.

ContentCN: 我們因祢蒙悅納﹐身心因祢得醫﹐
ContentEN: In Thee by grace accepted, the heart and mind set free

ContentCN: 祢的恩典何浩大﹐怎能不記念祢？
ContentEN: To think of all Thy sorrow, and thus remember Thee.

ContentCN: 祢若尚未得榮來﹐接我免去大災﹐
ContentEN: Till thou shalt come in glory, and call us hence away,

ContentCN: 叫我與祢永同在﹐安息直到萬代﹔
ContentEN: To rest in all the brightness of that unclouded day,

ContentCN: 我們還要效法死﹐還要表明身體﹐
ContentEN: We show Thy death, Lord Jesus, and here would seek to be

ContentCN: 還要想慕祢不止﹐還要來記念祢。
ContentEN: More to Thy death conformed, while we remember Thee.

ContentCN: 我們照祢恩惠話語﹐
ContentEN: According to Thy gracious word,

ContentCN: 帶著謙卑心意﹐
ContentEN: In meek humility,

ContentCN: 受死的主﹐我們會聚﹐
ContentEN: This will I do, my dying Lord,

ContentCN: 現今來記念祢。
ContentEN: I will remember Thee.

ContentCN: 祢的身體為我裂開﹐
ContentEN: Thy body, broken for my sake,

ContentCN: 要成我的供給﹔
ContentEN: My bread from heav'n shall be;

ContentCN: 我今舉起立約杯來﹐
ContentEN: Thy testamental cup I take,

ContentCN: 為的是記念祢。
ContentEN: And thus remember Thee.

ContentCN: 能否我忘客西馬尼﹐
ContentEN: Gethsemane can I forget?

ContentCN: 或看祢的孤寂﹐
ContentEN: Or there Thy conflict see,

ContentCN: 祢的血汗和祢哭泣﹐
ContentEN: Thine agony and bloody sweat,

ContentCN: 而不來記念祢。
ContentEN: And not remember Thee?

ContentCN: 當我轉眼看十字架﹐
ContentEN: When to the cross I turn mine eyes

ContentCN: 看祢在髑髏地﹐
ContentEN: And rest on Calvary,

ContentCN: 神的羔羊﹐我的救法﹐
ContentEN: O Lamb of God, my sacrifice,

ContentCN: 我必須記念祢。
ContentEN: I must remember Thee.

ContentCN: 記念祢和祢的苦痛﹐
ContentEN: Remember Thee and all Thy pains

ContentCN: 和祢對我愛意﹔
ContentEN: And all Thy love to me;

ContentCN: 一息尚存﹐一脈尚動﹐
ContentEN: Yea, while a breath, a pulse remains,

ContentCN: 我必定記念祢。
ContentEN: I will remember Thee.

ContentCN: 當我漸衰﹐嘴唇無音﹐
ContentEN: And when these failing lips grow dumb

ContentCN: 思想記憶軟弱﹐
ContentEN: And mind and memory flee,

ContentCN: 當祢在祢國度降臨﹐
ContentEN: When thou shalt in Thy kingdom come,

ContentCN: 主﹐求祢記念我。
ContentEN: Jesus, remember me.

ContentCN: 願主為我擘開生命的餅﹐
ContentEN: Break Thou the bread of life, dear Lord, to me

ContentCN: 就像當日傍海對眾所行﹔
ContentEN: As Thou didst break the loaves beside the sea.

ContentCN: 靠這聖書引導﹐我尋求祢﹐
ContentEN: Beyond the sacred page I seek Thee, Lord;

ContentCN: 我主﹐神的活道﹐我渴慕祢﹗
ContentEN: My spirit pants for Thee, O living Word.

ContentCN: 願主為我擘開生命的餅﹐
ContentEN: Thou art the bread of life, O Lord, to me,

ContentCN: 使我充滿主愛﹐記念主名﹗
ContentEN: Thy holy word, the truth that saveth me.

ContentCN: 釋放我的思想脫離自己﹐
ContentEN: Give me to eat and live with Thee above;

ContentCN: 好叫我的傾向都在乎祢。
ContentEN: Teach me to love Thy truth, for Thou art love.

ContentCN: 惟主解開真理﹐我纔明白
ContentEN: Oh, send Thy Spirit, Lord, now unto me,

ContentCN: 祢的一切信息如何警策﹔
ContentEN: That He may touch my eyes and make me see,

ContentCN: 使我與祢同情﹐與祢同行﹐
ContentEN: Show me the truth concealed within Thy word,

ContentCN: 使祢榮耀容形滿我眼睛。
ContentEN: And in Thy book revealed, I see Thee, Lord.

ContentCN: 愛主﹐求祢祝福祢的真理﹐
ContentEN: Bless Thou the truth, dear Lord, to me, to me,

ContentCN: 像祢為餅祝福在加利利﹔
ContentEN: As Thou didst bless the loaves by Galilee;

ContentCN: 好叫捆綁都脫﹐鎖鍊都落﹐
ContentEN: Then shall all bondage cease, all fetters fall,

ContentCN: 自由為祢生活﹐為祢工作。
ContentEN: And I shall find my peace, my all in all.

ContentCN: 我主﹐請說﹐僕人敬聽﹐我今等候祢恩言﹔
ContentEN: Master, speak! Thy servant heareth, waiting for Thy gracious word,

ContentCN: 我心渴望聞祢慈聲﹐但願今就得聽見。
ContentEN: Longing for Thy voice cheereth, Master let it now be heard.

ContentCN: 哦﹐主﹐我今正傾聽﹐是否就向我發聲﹖
ContentEN: I am list'ning, Lord, for Thee; what hast Thou to say to me?

ContentEN: When I survey the wondrous cross

ContentEN: When I survey the wondrous cross

ContentEN: On which the Prince of glory died,

ContentEN: My richest gain I count but loss,

ContentEN: My richest gain I count but loss,

ContentEN: And pour contempt on all my pride.

ContentEN: And pour contempt on all my pride.

ContentEN: Forbid it, Lord, that I should boast,

ContentEN: Save in the cross of Christ my God;

ContentCN: 主﹐祢有否一句為我﹖
ContentEN: Lord, hast Thou not one word for me?

ContentCN: 使我更能向祢信託﹐
ContentEN: To bind my soul more close to Thee,

ContentCN: 使我更能離開己意﹔
ContentEN: That ev'ry evil I may flee;

ContentCN: 一句﹐我主﹐求賜一句。
ContentEN: One word, O Lord! one word from Thee.

ContentCN: 一句﹐來顯我的軟弱﹐
ContentEN: One word, to show how weak am I

ContentCN: 當我欣賞自己工作﹐
ContentEN: When in my strength alone I try,

ContentCN: 我空勞碌﹐我空歎息﹔
ContentEN: In vain I toil, in vain I sigh;

ContentCN: 一句﹐我主﹐求賜一句﹗
ContentEN: One word, O Lord! one word from Thee.

ContentCN: 一句﹐來示祢的相親﹐
ContentEN: One word, to show how near Thou art,

ContentCN: 因祢乃是住在我心﹐
ContentEN: For thou dost dwell within my heart;

ContentCN: 祢的生命我也同領﹔
ContentEN: And of Thy life I share a part;

ContentCN: 一句﹐我主﹐求賜一句﹗
ContentEN: One word, O Lord! one word from Thee.

ContentCN: 一句﹐求將有力應許﹐
ContentEN: One word of pow'r, oh, let me hear,

ContentCN: 顯在許多畏懼掛慮﹐
ContentEN: Above the heart's most anxious fear,

ContentCN: 祢的微聲﹐祢的話語﹔
ContentEN: Thy still small voice, yet deep and clear;

ContentCN: 一句﹐我主﹐求賜一句﹗
ContentEN: One word, O Lord! one word from Thee.

ContentCN: 一句﹐最終得勝呼喊﹐
ContentEN: One word of final triumph, Lord;

ContentCN: 得祢應許甘甜充滿﹐
ContentEN: Sweet hope Thy promises afford,

ContentCN: 與祢永遠快樂同居﹔
ContentEN: To dwell with Thee in sweet accord;

ContentCN: 一句﹐我主﹐求賜一句﹗
ContentEN: One word, O Lord! one word from Thee.

ContentCN: 主阿﹐我們聚集祢前﹐要來傳說完全救法﹐
ContentEN: Lord, in Thy presence we are met, a full salvation to proclaim,

ContentCN: 使我見證所得恩典﹐並因祢名﹐望人接納﹔
ContentEN: To testify of grace received, or offered now in Jesus' name;

ContentCN: 恩主﹐我靈向祢祈求﹐願祢將我羨慕成就。
ContentEN: Dear Lord, to Thee our spirits cry, our ev'ry longing satisfy.

ContentCN: 饑餓的心﹐從祢接受赦免、能力或是清潔﹐
ContentEN: We ask Thee, Lord, for Thou art here, make this a Pentecostal hour,

ContentCN: 我求祢﹐主﹐使這時候成為又一的五旬節﹔
ContentEN: When hung'ring souls from Thee receive pardon, or purity, or pow'r;

ContentCN: 開通耳聾﹐開明目盲﹐帶領靈魂得祢釋放。
ContentEN: Unstop deaf ears, let blind eyes see, bring souls into Thy liberty.

ContentCN: 在此有人對罪厭煩﹐厭煩﹐因為裏面墮落﹐
ContentEN: Thou knowest sin-sick souls are here, sick with depravity within,

ContentCN: 現今失望、疲倦、不安﹐而祢在此要除罪惡﹔
ContentEN: Restless, discouraged, weary ones, and Thou art here to cleanse from sin;

ContentCN: 求祢說﹕"我肯﹐祢潔淨﹐"拯救、聖別每個生命。
ContentEN: Oh, speak the word "I will, be whole," and save and sanctify each soul.

ContentCN: 賜祢僕人今有膽量﹐他們纔能忠心傳話﹔
ContentEN: Grant to Thy servants boldness now, that faithfully they speak Thy Word,

ContentCN: 求祢伸手醫治病恙﹐神蹟奇事從祢出發﹔
ContentEN: By stretching forth Thy hand to heal, let signs and wonders from the Lord

ContentCN: 命其成在我們中間﹐求父將子如此榮顯。
ContentEN: Here in our midst to-day be done. So, Father, glorify Thy Son.

ContentCN: 主﹐我等候祢的聖言﹐成功在祢僕人身上﹔
ContentEN: We wait according to Thy Word, Lord, let it to Thy servants be;

ContentCN: 不讓自己驕傲、成見﹐或是不信把祢阻擋﹔
ContentEN: May nothing, self, pride, prejudice or unbelief, still hinder Thee;

ContentCN: 願祢聖靈自由開墾柔軟的心、降服的人。
ContentEN: Bless'd Spirit, have unhindered way in yielded hearts and lives today.

ContentCN: 救主﹐我們因祢話﹐現在聚集要來靜聽﹔
ContentEN: Blessed Jesus, at Thy word we are gathered all to hear Thee;

ContentCN: 但願心都受溶化﹐要來敬畏並受引領﹔
ContentEN: Let our heart and soul be stirred now to seek and love and fear Thee;

ContentCN: 因祢教訓聖潔無此﹐吸引我們完全愛祢。
ContentEN: By Thy teaching sweet and holy, drawn from earth to love Thee solely.

ContentCN: 我們知識和感覺﹐難免黑暗深重遮蔽﹔
ContentEN: All our knowledge, sense, and sight lie in deepest darkness shrouded,

ContentCN: 除非聖靈的光教﹐藉著真理深入啟迪﹔
ContentEN: Till Thy Spirit breaks our night with the beams of truth unclouded.

ContentCN: 只有祢能帶我歸神﹐祢須作工在於我身。
ContentEN: Thou alone to God canst win us; thou must work all good within us.

ContentCN: 我主﹐求祢賜自己﹐從神出來光中之光﹔
ContentEN: Glorious Lord, Thyself impart! Light of light, from God proceeding.

ContentCN: 開通我耳並我意﹐以祢聖靈助我盼望﹔
ContentEN: Open Thou our ears and heart. Help us by Thy Spirit's pleading,

ContentCN: 請聽祢的子民呼求﹐請聽﹐並請祝福不休。
ContentEN: Hear the cry Thy people raises. Hear, and bless our pray'rs and praises.

ContentCN: 我們呼吸天上空氣﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 香味從天而來﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 但願每魂脫離肉體﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 每靈都充滿愛。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 主﹐使我們心心相聯﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 滿有聖潔情意﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 不至有日彼此改變﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 不愛祢或祢的。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 只受祢的十架指引﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 服祢所有旨意﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 能以彼此更為親近﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 能以更親近祢。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 福哉﹐愛的捆綁﹐
ContentEN: Blest be the tie that binds

ContentCN: 捆綁我們相契﹔
ContentEN: Our hearts in Christian love;

ContentCN: 同一的心彼此交往﹐
ContentEN: The fellowship of kindred minds

ContentCN: 就與天人無異。
ContentEN: Is like to that above.

ContentCN: 在父寶座之前﹐
ContentEN: Before our Father's throne

ContentCN: 我們熱心祈求﹔
ContentEN: We pour our ardent prayers;

ContentCN: 有苦同咽﹐有望同勉﹐
ContentEN: Our fears, our hopes, our aims are one,

ContentCN: 同心﹐同樂﹐同憂。
ContentEN: Our comfort and our cares.

ContentCN: 軟弱彼此體諒﹐
ContentEN: We share our mutual woes,

ContentCN: 重擔互相擔當﹔
ContentEN: Our mutual burdens bear,

ContentCN: 一人心傷﹐眾人淚淌﹐
ContentEN: And often for each other flows

ContentCN: 只有一個心腸。
ContentEN: The sympathizing tear.

ContentCN: 每逢彼此分離﹐
ContentEN: When we asunder part,

ContentCN: 寸衷悵惘難言﹔
ContentEN: It gives us inward pain;

ContentCN: 但身雖離﹐心仍合一﹐
ContentEN: But we shall still be joined in heart,

ContentCN: 希望再會眼前。
ContentEN: And hope to meet again.

ContentCN: 盼望那日快顯﹐
ContentEN: From sorrow, toil and pain,

ContentCN: 再無別離心酸﹔
ContentEN: And sin we shall be free;

ContentCN: 相愛更親﹐相交更甜﹐
ContentEN: And perfect love and friendship reign

ContentCN: 同樂直到永遠。
ContentEN: Through all eternity.

ContentCN: 弟兄和睦同居﹐何等美善﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 像油從亞倫頭﹐流到衣衫﹐
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 又像露從黑門﹐降在錫安﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 在此有生命福﹐直到永遠。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 心存歡喜誠實﹐來赴愛筵﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 藉此飽嘗主恩﹐滿心感讚﹗
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 弟兄彼此交通﹐何等甘甜﹔
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 盼望那日快到﹐不再離散。
ContentEN: NULL

ContentCN: 聖徒眾心﹐愛裡相繫﹐同在主裏享安息﹔
ContentEN: Christian hearts in love united, seek alone in Jesus rest.

ContentCN: 救主大愛激發愛心﹐如此相愛永相親。
ContentEN: Has He not your love excited? Then let love inspire each breast.

ContentCN: 同作肢體﹐倚靠元首﹐眾光反映主日頭﹔
ContentEN: Members on our Head depending, lights reflecting Him, our Sun,

ContentCN: 同為兄弟﹐行主旨意﹐主裏相繫原為一。
ContentEN: Brethren His commands attending, we in Him, our Lord, are one.

ContentCN: 主的群羊﹐同來祂前﹐更新誓約與奉獻﹔
ContentEN: Come then, come, O flock of Jesus, covenant with Him anew;

ContentCN: 忠心服事﹐全心愛戴﹐因祢君王已奏凱。
ContentEN: Unto Him who conquered for us, pledge we love and service true;

ContentCN: 倘若有日彼此聯結不再堅韌變鬆懈﹔
ContentEN: And should our love's union holy firmly linked no more remain,

ContentCN: 同心謙卑伏祂腳前﹐求祂施恩重相聯。
ContentEN: Wait ye at His footstool lowly till He draw it close again.

ContentCN: 求助我們"彼此相愛"﹐遵此命令不稍怠﹔
ContentEN: Grant, Lord, that with Thy direction, "Love each other," we comply,

ContentCN: 惟願彰顯主愛浩大﹐主裏相愛無虛假。
ContentEN: Aiming with unfeigned affection Thy love to exemplify;

ContentCN: 今讓這愛照耀無間﹐好讓世人得明見﹕
ContentEN: Let our mutual love be glowing: thus will all men plainly see

ContentCN: 我們相愛﹐主裏合一﹐好比根同枝雖異。
ContentEN: That we, as on one stem growing, living branches are in Thee.

ContentCN: 但願我們完全合一﹐如祢與父原為一﹔
ContentEN: Oh, that such may be our union as Thine with the Father is,

ContentCN: 但願我們愛裏相交﹐永不離棄這福道。
ContentEN: And not one of our communion e'er forsake the path of bliss;

ContentCN: 但願我們光照明耀﹐使主榮光得反照﹔
ContentEN: May our light 'fore men with brightness from Thy light reflected shine;

ContentCN: 但願世人確知無疑﹕我們乃真屬於祢。
ContentEN: Thus the world will bear us witness that we, Lord, are truly Thine.

ContentCN: 哦﹐完全的愛﹐遠超人心所想！
ContentEN: O perfect Love, all human thought transcending,

ContentCN: 在祢寶座前﹐我們同禱祈﹕
ContentEN: Lowly we kneel in prayer before Thy throne,

ContentCN: 願他們相愛﹐到永遠無限量﹐
ContentEN: That theirs may be the love which knows no ending,

ContentCN: 在主裏合而為一永相繫。
ContentEN: Whom Thou forevermore dost join in one.

ContentCN: 哦﹐完全生命﹐願成他們確據﹕
ContentEN: O perfect Life, be Thou their full assurance

ContentCN: 得著祢柔愛﹐不移的信心﹐
ContentEN: Of tender charity and steadfast faith,

ContentCN: 單純的依靠如孩童無所懼﹐
ContentEN: Of patient hope, and quiet, brave endurance,

ContentCN: 不息的盼望﹐無聲的堅忍。
ContentEN: With childlike trust that fears nor pain nor death.

ContentCN: 求賜祢喜樂﹐消除一切憂、怯﹐
ContentEN: Grant them the joy which brightens earthly sorrow,

ContentCN: 並賜祢平安﹐撫平諸爭競﹔
ContentEN: Grant them the peace which calms all earthly strife,

ContentCN: 願他們共度一生未知歲月﹐
ContentEN: And to life's day the glorious, unknown morrow

ContentCN: 聯於這永遠的愛與生命。
ContentEN: That dawns upon eternal love and life.

ContentCN: 愛的神阿﹐在祢座前﹐
ContentEN: O God of love to Thee we bow,

ContentCN: 我們今為新人禱祈﹔
ContentEN: And pray for these before Thee now.

ContentCN: 求使他們緊緊相聯﹐
ContentEN: That, closely knit in holy vow,

ContentCN: 祢裏合而為一。
ContentEN: They may in Thee be one.

ContentCN: 有時道路平順無險﹐
ContentEN: When days are filled with pure delight,

ContentCN: 天色明麗﹐充滿歡喜﹔
ContentEN: When paths are plain and skies are bright,

ContentCN: 憑信前進不憑眼見﹐
ContentEN: Walking by faith and not by sight,

ContentCN: 因在祢裏合一。
ContentEN: May they in Thee be one.

ContentCN: 有時遭遇狂風暴雨﹐
ContentEN: When stormy winds fulfill Thy will,

ContentCN: 一切福樂變為憂慼﹔
ContentEN: And all their good seems turned to ill,

ContentCN: 全心靠主﹐一無畏懼﹐
ContentEN: Then, trusting Thee completely, still

ContentCN: 仍在祢裏合一。
ContentEN: May they in Thee be one.

ContentCN: 共度此生﹐不問禍福﹐
ContentEN: Whate'er in life shall be their share

ContentCN: 同證主恩﹐不論憂喜﹔
ContentEN: Of quick'ning joy or burd'ning care,

ContentCN: 從主得力﹐堅忍相助﹐
ContentEN: In pow'r to do and grace to bear,

ContentCN: 永在祢裏合一。
ContentEN: May they in Thee be one.

ContentCN: 永遠的愛﹐時刻同在﹐
ContentEN: Eternal Love, with them abide;

ContentCN: 主裏躲藏﹐何等安息﹔
ContentEN: In Thee forever may they hide,

ContentCN: 即使死亡﹐不能分開﹐
ContentEN: For even death cannot divide

ContentCN: 主所結合為一。
ContentEN: Those whom Thou makest one.

ContentCN: 我們愛﹐我們愛﹐因為神先愛我們﹕
ContentEN: We love, we love because God first loved us.

ContentCN: 祂賜給﹐祂賜給﹐將愛子賜給我們。
ContentEN: He gave, He gave His only Son for us.

ContentCN: 主捨命﹐主捨命﹐從罪中救贖我們﹐
ContentEN: He died, He died from sin to ransom us.

ContentCN: 願相愛﹐願相愛﹐像祂這樣愛我們。
ContentEN: We long, we long to love as He loved us.

ContentCN: 主大愛﹐主大愛﹐將我們捆綁激勵﹕
ContentEN: His love, His love constrains our hearts to stay

ContentCN: 在愛中﹐在愛中﹐活祂愛中不稍離。
ContentEN: In love, in love with Jesus all the day.

ContentCN: 我們愛﹐我們愛﹐遵守祂所留命令﹕
ContentEN: We love, we love His command to obey

ContentCN: 讓我們﹐讓我們﹐彼此相愛不稍停。
ContentEN: To love, to love each other all the way.

ContentCN: 主妙愛﹐主妙愛﹐使我們深受激勵﹕
ContentEN: Such love, such love constrains our hearts today

ContentCN: 捨自己﹐捨自己﹐因愛甘心捨自己。
ContentEN: To give, to give ourselves in every way

ContentCN: 懇求主﹐懇求主﹐常以祢大愛充溢﹐
ContentEN: Fill us, fill us e'er with Thy love, we pray

ContentCN: 使我們﹐使我們﹐能切實相愛不已。
ContentEN: So we may love each other all the way.

ContentCN: 你要痊愈麼﹖你要痊愈麼﹖
ContentEN: Wilt thou be made whole? Wilt thou be made whole?

ContentCN: 來吧﹗被罪苦害者﹐多年軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Oh, come, weary suff'rer, Oh, come, sin-sick soul;

ContentCN: 看哪﹗生命泉已開﹐醫治活水湧流﹐
ContentEN: See the life-stream is flowing, See the cleansing waves roll;

ContentCN: 快投身此泉﹐就必痊愈無憂。
ContentEN: Step into the current and thou shalt be whole.

ContentCN: 請聽﹗耶穌腳步聲﹐祂正從此經過﹐
ContentEN: Hear the footsteps of Jesus - He is now passing by,

ContentCN: 為傷者祂帶膏油﹐醫治所有軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Bearing balm for the wounded, healing all who apply;

ContentCN: 正如祂曾見病者﹐在池邊躺臥﹐
ContentEN: As He spake to the suff'rer who lay at the pool,

ContentCN: 此刻祂正柔聲問﹕"你要痊愈麼﹖"
ContentEN: He is saying this moment, "Wilt thou be made whole?"

ContentCN: 你要痊愈麼﹖你要痊愈麼﹖
ContentEN: Wilt thou be made whole? Wilt thou be made whole?

ContentCN: 來吧﹗被罪苦害者﹐多年軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Oh, come, weary suff'rer, Oh, come, sin-sick soul;

ContentCN: 看哪﹗生命泉已開﹐醫治活水湧流﹐
ContentEN: See the life-stream is flowing, See the cleansing waves roll;

ContentCN: 快投身此泉﹐就必痊愈無憂。
ContentEN: Step into the current and thou shalt be whole.

ContentCN: 這是救主慈愛聲﹐滿帶憐憫呼召﹗
ContentEN: 'Tis the voice of that Saviour, whose merciful call

ContentCN: 祂要賜白白救恩﹐只要你肯求告﹔
ContentEN: Freely offers salvation to one and to all;

ContentCN: 祂正召呼眾罪人﹐就祂脫罪鎖﹐
ContentEN: He is now beck'ning to Him each sin-tainted soul

ContentCN: 此刻祂正慈聲問﹕"你要痊愈麼﹖"
ContentEN: And lovingly asking, "Wilt thou be made whole?"

ContentCN: 你要痊愈麼﹖你要痊愈麼﹖
ContentEN: Wilt thou be made whole? Wilt thou be made whole?

ContentCN: 來吧﹗被罪苦害者﹐多年軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Oh, come, weary suff'rer, Oh, come, sin-sick soul;

ContentCN: 看哪﹗生命泉已開﹐醫治活水湧流﹐
ContentEN: See the life-stream is flowing, See the cleansing waves roll;

ContentCN: 快投身此泉﹐就必痊愈無憂。
ContentEN: Step into the current and thou shalt be whole.

ContentCN: 是否在猶豫、掙扎﹐被罪欺壓痛苦﹖
ContentEN: Are you halting and struggling, overpow'red by your sin,

ContentCN: 正當池中水動時﹐是否無法投入﹖
ContentEN: While the waters are troubled, can you not enter in?

ContentCN: 看哪﹗救主在等待救你脫軟弱﹐
ContentEN: Lo, the Saviour stands waiting to strengthen your soul;

ContentCN: 此刻祂正迫切問﹕"你要痊愈麼﹖"
ContentEN: He is earnestly pleading, "Wilt thou be made whole?"

ContentCN: 你要痊愈麼﹖你要痊愈麼﹖
ContentEN: Wilt thou be made whole? Wilt thou be made whole?

ContentCN: 來吧﹗被罪苦害者﹐多年軟弱﹔
ContentEN: Oh, come, weary suff'rer, Oh, come, sin-sick soul;

ContentCN: 看哪﹗生命泉已開﹐醫治活水湧流﹐
ContentEN: See the life-stream is flowing, See the cleansing waves roll;

ContentCN: 快投身此泉﹐就必痊愈無憂。
ContentEN: Step into the current and thou shalt be whole.

ContentCN: 可頌救主﹐求助我﹐在祢話裏安息﹗
ContentEN: Blessed Saviour, assist us to rest on Thy Word;

ContentCN: 好讓祢能在我身傾倒醫治能力﹔
ContentEN: Let the soul-healing power on us now be outpoured;

ContentCN: 願祢掌管我全人﹐罪污求洗去﹐
ContentEN: Wash away every sin spot, take perfect control,

ContentCN: 並對我說﹕"你信心已叫你痊愈﹗"
ContentEN: Say to each trusting spirit, "Thy faith makes thee whole."

ContentCN: 只一摸﹐就必得痊愈﹗
ContentEN: Just one touch as He passes by,

ContentCN: 主仍在此﹐尚未離去﹔
ContentEN: He will list to the faintest cry.

ContentCN: 前來摸祂﹐不必再疑慮﹐
ContentEN: Come and be cured while the Lord is nigh,

ContentCN: 一摸就必得痊愈。
ContentEN: Christ is the Healer divine.

ContentCN: 只一摸﹐當主正經過﹐
ContentEN: Just one touch as He moves along,

ContentCN: 眾人擁塞將祂擠著﹔
ContentEN: Push'd and press'd by the jostling throng,

ContentCN: 她從背後將主一摸﹐
ContentEN: Just one touch and the weak was strong,

ContentCN: 立刻得著了痊愈。
ContentEN: Cured by the Healer divine.

ContentCN: 只一摸﹐就必得痊愈﹗
ContentEN: Just one touch as He passes by,

ContentCN: 主仍在此﹐尚未離去﹔
ContentEN: He will list to the faintest cry.

ContentEN: Come and be cured while the Lord is nigh,

ContentCN: 一摸就必得痊愈。
ContentEN: Christ is the Healer divine.

ContentCN: 只一摸﹐就必得痊愈﹐
ContentEN: Just one touch! and He makes me whole,

ContentCN: 祂使我心平安無懼﹔
ContentEN: Speaks sweet peace to my sin-sick soul,

ContentCN: 在祂腳前﹐重擔全去﹐
ContentEN: At His feet all my burdens roll,

ContentCN: 我已得著了痊愈。
ContentEN: Cured by the Healer divine.

ContentCN: 只一摸﹐就必得痊愈﹗
ContentEN: Just one touch as He passes by,

ContentCN: 主仍在此﹐尚未離去﹔
ContentEN: He will list to the faintest cry.

ContentCN: 前來摸祂﹐不必再疑慮﹐
ContentEN: Come and be cured while the Lord is nigh,

ContentCN: 一摸就必得痊愈。
ContentEN: Christ is the Healer divine.

ContentCN: 只一摸﹐一切卻完成﹐
ContentEN: Just one touch! and the work is done,

ContentCN: 我得脫去所有疾病﹔
ContentEN: I am cured by the blessed Son,

ContentCN: 直到永遠﹐我要頌稱﹐
ContentEN: I will sing while the ages run,

ContentCN: 因我得著了痊愈。
ContentEN: Cured by the Healer divine.

ContentCN: 只一摸﹐就必得痊愈﹗
ContentEN: Just one touch as He passes by,

ContentCN: 主仍在此﹐尚未離去﹔
ContentEN: He will list to the faintest cry.

ContentCN: 前來摸祂﹐不必再疑慮﹐
ContentEN: Come and be cured while the Lord is nigh,

ContentCN: 一摸就必得痊愈。
ContentEN: Christ is the Healer divine.

ContentCN: 只一摸﹐主就轉過來﹐
ContentEN: Just one touch! and He turns to me,

ContentCN: 哦﹐祂眼中希奇之愛﹔
ContentEN: O the love in His eyes I see!

ContentCN: 撫慰我心﹐使我感戴﹐
ContentEN: I am His for He hears my plea,

ContentCN: 我已得著了痊愈。
ContentEN: Cured by the Healer divine.

ContentCN: 只一摸﹐就必得痊愈﹗
ContentEN: Just one touch as He passes by,

ContentCN: 主仍在此﹐尚未離去﹔
ContentEN: He will list to the faintest cry.

ContentCN: 前來摸祂﹐不必再疑慮﹐
ContentEN: Come and be cured while the Lord is nigh,

ContentCN: 一摸就必得痊愈。
ContentEN: Christ is the Healer divine.

ContentCN: 只一摸﹐就必得醫治﹐
ContentEN: Just one touch! by His mighty power

ContentCN: 祂能醫你﹐就在此時﹔
ContentEN: He can heal thee this very hour,

ContentCN: 只要一摸﹐不管病勢﹐
ContentEN: Thou canst hear tho' the tempests low'r

ContentCN: 就必得著了痊愈。
ContentEN: Cured by the Healer divine.

ContentCN: 讚美救主完全救贖﹐來救痛苦的人世﹔
ContentEN: Blessed be the great atonement, to a suff'ring world revealed;

ContentCN: 讚美救主作我大夫﹐祂受鞭傷我得治。
ContentEN: Blessed be the great Physician, for by His stripes we are healed.

ContentCN: 神的福音﹐何等有福﹗來救痛苦的人世﹔
ContentEN: Blessed be the glorious tidings to a suff'ring world revealed;

ContentCN: 耶穌已為疾病救贖﹐祂的鞭傷有醫治。
ContentEN: Jesus has atoned for sickness, and by His stripes we are healed.

ContentCN: 讚美救主完全救贖﹐來救痛苦的人世﹔
ContentEN: Blessed be the great atonement, to a suff'ring world revealed;

ContentCN: 讚美救主作我大夫﹐祂受鞭傷我得治。
ContentEN: Blessed be the great Physician, for by His stripes we are healed.

ContentCN: 無論是誰求祂設法﹐祂都歡迎不推辭﹔
ContentEN: Jesus ever welcomed suff'rers to His mercy who appealed;

ContentCN: 祂叫我帶疾病尋祂﹐因祂鞭傷能醫治。
ContentEN: He bids us bring Him our sickness, for by His stripes we are healed.

ContentCN: 讚美救主完全救贖﹐來救痛苦的人世﹔
ContentEN: Blessed be the great atonement, to a suff'ring world revealed;

ContentCN: 讚美救主作我大夫﹐祂受鞭傷我得治。
ContentEN: Blessed be the great Physician, for by His stripes we are healed.

ContentCN: 讚美祂的神聖膏油﹐藉著聖靈來恩賜﹔
ContentEN: Blessed be the sacred 'nointing, by the Holy Spirit sealed;

ContentCN: 求祢來為我們按手﹐因祢鞭傷能醫治。
ContentEN: Jesus lay Thy hand upon us, for by Thy stripes we are healed.

ContentCN: 讚美救主完全救贖﹐來救痛苦的人世﹔
ContentEN: Blessed be the great atonement, to a suff'ring world revealed;

ContentCN: 讚美救主作我大夫﹐祂受鞭傷我得治。
ContentEN: Blessed be the great Physician, for by His stripes we are healed.

ContentCN: 當那撒但火箭環攻﹐求作盾牌來抵制﹔
ContentEN: Saviour, 'mid the darts of Satan, be our refuge and our shield;

ContentCN: 我們必定安全到終﹐因祢鞭傷有醫治。
ContentEN: Safely shall we walk through danger, for by Thy stripes we are healed.

ContentCN: 讚美救主完全救贖﹐來救痛苦的人世﹔
ContentEN: Blessed be the great atonement, to a suff'ring world revealed;

ContentCN: 讚美救主作我大夫﹐祂受鞭傷我得治。
ContentEN: Blessed be the great Physician, for by His stripes we are healed.

ContentCN: 主﹐我奉獻所有肢體﹐我要榮耀祢不止﹔
ContentEN: Jesus to Thy glory ever, all our members we would yield;

ContentCN: 使我不至有日忘記祢的鞭傷有醫治。
ContentEN: Ne'er let us cease to remember, that by Thy stripes we are healed.

ContentCN: 每天從主吸取生命﹐相信應許遵祂命令﹔
ContentEN: Take life from Jesus everyday, trust in His promise and obey;

ContentCN: 日過一日﹐從祂得力﹐完我旅程﹐讚美不已。
ContentEN: Receive His strength from day to day, praise Him thro'out our pilgrim way.

ContentCN: 身體得生命﹐藉寶血﹐我靈﹐與魂﹐與體得贖﹔
ContentEN: Life for the body thro' His blood, saved in our spirit, body, soul;

ContentCN: 基督不止只救一節﹐祂是來救我的全部。
ContentEN: Christ did not die to save a part, but has redeemed and claims the whole.

ContentCN: 每天從主吸取生命﹐相信應許遵祂命令﹔
ContentEN: Take life from Jesus everyday, trust in His promise and obey;

ContentCN: 日過一日﹐從祂得力﹐完我旅程﹐讚美不已。
ContentEN: Receive His strength from day to day, praise Him thro'out our pilgrim way.

ContentCN: 身體得生命﹐藉話語﹐它是充滿神聖能力﹔
ContentEN: Life for the body thro' His word, that word which speaks in living pow'r;

ContentCN: 它曾創造許多世宇﹐每刻都能生命供給。
ContentEN: That word which form'd the worlds of space, can give to us new life each hour.

ContentCN: 每天從主吸取生命﹐相信應許遵祂命令﹔
ContentEN: Take life from Jesus everyday, trust in His promise and obey;

ContentCN: 日過一日﹐從祂得力﹐完我旅程﹐讚美不已。
ContentEN: Receive His strength from day to day, praise Him thro'out our pilgrim way.

ContentCN: 身體得生命﹐藉聖靈﹐是祂每時向我吹氣﹔
ContentEN: Life for the body from above, life thro' the Spirit's quick'ning breath;

ContentCN: 是祂來作復活生命﹐是祂使主從死復起。
ContentEN: Healed by the resurrection life that raised our blessed Lord from death.

ContentCN: 祂醫治我﹐祂醫治我﹐祂有權柄來醫治我﹔
ContentEN: He healeth me, He healeth me, by pow'r divine He healeth me;

ContentCN: 祂在加利利已救活許多的人﹐今醫治我。
ContentEN: He healed the sick in Galilee, and now by faith He healeth me.

ContentCN: 祂醫治我﹐讚美祂名﹗我要歌頌祂的救贖﹔
ContentEN: He healeth me, O bless His name! I want to spread abroad His fame;

ContentCN: 祂釋放我脫離疾病﹐大能的主是我大夫。
ContentEN: From dread disease He sets me free, the Lord my healer, strong is He.

ContentCN: 祂醫治我﹐祂醫治我﹐祂有權柄來醫治我﹔
ContentEN: He healeth me, He healeth me, by pow'r divine He healeth me;

ContentCN: 祂在加利利已救活許多的人﹐今醫治我。
ContentEN: He healed the sick in Galilee, and now by faith He healeth me.

ContentCN: 祂醫治我﹐信心簡單﹐滿心相信祂說的話﹔
ContentEN: He healeth me, my simple faith believes the word that Jesus saith.

ContentCN: 滿懷希望﹐滿載平安﹐我信祂必使我離榻。
ContentEN: And takes the place of ardent hope, believes the Lord will raise me up.

ContentCN: 祂醫治我﹐祂醫治我﹐祂有權柄來醫治我﹔
ContentEN: He healeth me, He healeth me, by pow'r divine He healeth me;

ContentCN: 祂在加利利已救活許多的人﹐今醫治我。
ContentEN: He healed the sick in Galilee, and now by faith He healeth me.

ContentCN: 祂醫治我﹐我求醫治﹐來摸祂的衣裳襚子﹔
ContentEN: He healeth me, I touch for cure the border of His garment pure,

ContentCN: 能力流通全身不止﹐自然沉坷受了禁制。
ContentEN: And virtue through my being flows, a healing balm for nature's woes.

ContentCN: 祂醫治我﹐祂醫治我﹐祂有權柄來醫治我﹔
ContentEN: He healeth me, He healeth me, by pow'r divine He healeth me;

ContentCN: 祂在加利利已救活許多的人﹐今醫治我。
ContentEN: He healed the sick in Galilee, and now by faith He healeth me.

ContentCN: 祂醫治我﹐有如當日﹐祂來擔當疾病罪過﹔
ContentEN: He healeth me, as when of yore, their sins and sicknesses He bore,

ContentCN: 祂並不失祂的本事﹐我的救主仍然活著。
ContentEN: Nor has He lost His pow'r and skill, our blessed Christ is living still.

ContentCN: 祂醫治我﹐祂醫治我﹐祂有權柄來醫治我﹔
ContentEN: He healeth me, He healeth me, by pow'r divine He healeth me;

ContentCN: 祂在加利利已救活許多的人﹐今醫治我。
ContentEN: He healed the sick in Galilee, and now by faith He healeth me.

ContentCN: 祂醫治我﹐我已求尋許多次數﹐但不得著﹔
ContentEN: He healeth me, O oft I sought this healing pow'r but found it not,

ContentCN: 但今我是全心相信﹐因信﹐祂今使我再活。
ContentEN: But now I trust with all my soul, and now thro' faith He makes me whole.

ContentCN: 主裏安睡﹐何等有福﹗
ContentEN: Asleep in Jesus! Blessed sleep!

ContentCN: 此睡﹐無人醒來哭泣﹔
ContentEN: From which none ever wakes to weep.

ContentCN: 脫離紛擾﹐進入安舒﹐
ContentEN: A calm and undisturbed repose,

ContentCN: 仇敵權勢無法攻擊。
ContentEN: Unbroken by the last of foes.

ContentCN: 主裏安睡﹐何等甘甜﹗
ContentEN: Asleep in Jesus! O how sweet

ContentCN: 此睡﹐無人仍帶苦憂﹔
ContentEN: To be for such a slumber meet;

ContentCN: 信心堅定﹐唱出美言﹕
ContentEN: With holy confidence to sing

ContentCN: 死亡已失它的毒鉤。
ContentEN: That death hath lost its painful sting!

ContentCN: 主裏安睡﹐何等安息﹗
ContentEN: Asleep in Jesus! Peaceful rest!

ContentCN: 醒來﹐就是福氣無極﹔
ContentEN: Whose waking is supremely blest;

ContentCN: 無懼、無苦再能掩蔽
ContentEN: No fear, no woe shall dim that hour

ContentCN: 救主所要彰顯能力。
ContentEN: That manifests the Saviour's pow'r.

ContentCN: 主裏安睡﹐何等安穩﹗
ContentEN: Asleep in Jesus! O for me

ContentCN: 此避難所安全可靠﹔
ContentEN: May such a blissful refuge be!

ContentCN: 我的塵土安靜在等
ContentEN: Securely shall my ashes lie,

ContentCN: 主自高天向我呼召。
ContentEN: Waiting the summons from on high.

ContentCN: 主裏安睡﹐暫時別離﹐
ContentEN: Asleep in Jesus! Far from thee

ContentCN: 醒後相聚﹐倍加欣喜﹔
ContentEN: Thy kindred and their graves may be;

ContentCN: 主裏安睡﹐福樂無比﹗
ContentEN: But there is still a blessed sleep,

ContentCN: 此睡﹐無人醒來哭泣。
ContentEN: From which none ever wakes to weep.

ContentCN: 今將此身安葬入墓﹐
ContentEN: This body in the grave we lay

ContentCN: 安息等候大日臨到﹔
ContentEN: There to await that solemn day

ContentCN: 神必親自叫它復甦﹐
ContentEN: When God Himself shall bid it rise

ContentCN: 凱旋上升喜樂歡跳。
ContentEN: To mount triumphant to the sky.

ContentCN: 一切煩惱、試煉皆過﹐
ContentEN: All trials and all griefs are past,

ContentCN: 盡已終結葬此土下﹔
ContentEN: A blessed end has come at last.

ContentCN: 凡曾在世甘負主軛﹐
ContentEN: Christ's yoke was borne with ready will;

ContentCN: 雖死猶生﹐仍舊說話。
ContentEN: Who dieth thus is living still.

ContentCN: 我們不用傷心流淚﹐
ContentEN: We have no cause to mourn or weep;

ContentCN: 如此安眠﹐何等有福﹗
ContentEN: Securely shall this body sleep

ContentCN: 等主再臨﹐死亡摧毀﹐
ContentEN: Till Christ Himself shall death destroy

ContentCN: 必再醒來﹐喜樂歡呼﹗
ContentEN: And raise the blessed dead to joy.

ContentCN: 在世與主同受苦難﹐
ContentEN: For they who with Him suffered here

ContentCN: 在天必要同享榮耀﹔
ContentEN: Shall there be healed from woe and fear;

ContentCN: 在那永遠福樂彼岸﹐
ContentEN: And when eternal bliss is won,

ContentCN: 光明如日榮耀四照。
ContentEN: They'll shine in glory like the sun.

ContentCN: 今讓我們就此告別﹐
ContentEN: Then let us leave this place of rest

ContentCN: 勇奔前程﹐豫備不懈﹔
ContentEN: And homeward turn, for they are blest

ContentCN: 因信迎接死亡無怯﹐
ContentEN: Who heed God's warning and prepare

ContentCN: 待繞主前歡聚永偕。
ContentEN: Lest death should find them unaware.

ContentCN: 又是一年正起首﹐主﹐這是我意念﹕
ContentEN: Another year is dawning! Dear Father, let it be,

ContentCN: 無論工作或等候﹐是和祢的一年。
ContentEN: In working or in waiting, another year with Thee.

ContentCN: 又是一年的依傍﹐在祢慈愛胸臆﹔
ContentEN: Another year of progress, another year of praise,

ContentCN: 又是一年的信望﹐充滿喜樂安息。
ContentEN: Another year of proving Thy presence all the days.

ContentCN: 又是一年蒙憐憫﹐可靠﹐信實恩典﹔
ContentEN: Another year of mercies, of faithfulness and grace;

ContentCN: 又是一年的歡欣﹐在祢發光面前。
ContentEN: Another year of gladness in the shining of Thy face;

ContentCN: 又是一年來依憑﹐又是一年讚美﹔
ContentEN: Another year of progress, another year of praise;

ContentCN: 又是一年要證明祢同在的寶貴。
ContentEN: Another year of proving Thy presence all the days.

ContentCN: 又是一年的訓練﹐為著祢的工作﹔
ContentEN: Another year of service, of witness for Thy love;

ContentCN: 又是一年的實驗﹐為著親近寶座。
ContentEN: Another year of training for holier work above.

ContentCN: 又是一年正開啟﹐主﹐這是我意念﹔
ContentEN: Another year is dawning! Dear Father, let it be

ContentCN: 無論在天或在地﹐又是為祢一年。
ContentEN: On earth, or else in heaven, another year for Thee.

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐賜我救贖主﹐感謝神﹐凡事擔當﹔
ContentEN: Thanks to God for my Redeemer, thanks for all Thou dost provide!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐以往的同住﹐感謝神﹐主在我旁。
ContentEN: Thanks for times now but a mem'ry, thanks for Jesus by my side!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐賜和煦春天﹐感謝神﹐蕭瑟秋景﹔
ContentEN: Thanks for pleasant, balmy springtime, thanks for dark and dreary fall!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐收去我眼淚﹐感謝神﹐裏頭安寧。
ContentEN: Thanks for tears by now forgotten, thanks for peace within my soul!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐應允我禱告﹐感謝神﹐或未垂聽﹔
ContentEN: Thanks for prayers that Thou hast answered, thanks for what Thou dost deny!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐雖經過風暴﹐感謝神﹐祂是供應。
ContentEN: Thanks for storms that I have weathered, thanks for all Thou dost supply!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐賜苦也賜樂﹐感謝神﹐絕望得慰﹔
ContentEN: Thanks for pain and thanks for pleasure, thanks for comfort in despair!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐無比施愛者﹐感謝神﹐無限恩惠。
ContentEN: Thanks for grace that none can measure, thanks for love beyond compare!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐賜路旁玫瑰﹐感謝神﹐雖它有刺﹔
ContentEN: Thanks for roses by the wayside, thanks for thorns their stems contain!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐全家火爐圍﹐感謝神﹐天涯分馳。
ContentEN: Thanks for homes and thanks for fireside, thanks for hope, that sweet refrain!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐奔波或惆悵﹐感謝神﹐屬天平安﹔
ContentEN: Thanks for joy and thanks for sorrow, thanks for heav'nly peace with Thee!

ContentCN: 感謝神﹐賜明日盼望﹐感謝神﹐直到永遠。
ContentEN: Thanks for hope in the tomorrow, thanks thro' all eternity!

ContentCN: 讓我們重起首﹐奔前路﹐齊趕快﹐
ContentEN: Come, let us anew our journey pursue,

ContentCN: 與年歲同更始﹐
ContentEN: Roll round with the year,

ContentCN: 常努力不停頓﹐直等到主回來﹔
ContentEN: And never stand still till the Master appear.

ContentCN: 心專一樂遵從祂旨意、祂領率,
ContentEN: His adorable will let us gladly fulfill,

ContentCN: 千而萬進不止﹐
ContentEN: And our talents improve,

ContentCN: 藉愛心的工作和盼望的忍耐﹐
ContentEN: By the patience of hope and the labor of love,

ContentCN: 藉愛心的工作和盼望的忍耐。
ContentEN: By the patience of hope and the labor of love.

ContentCN: 時間如影難捉﹐生命如水急流﹐
ContentEN: Our life is a dream, our time as a stream

ContentCN: 轉眼就成已過﹔
ContentEN: Glides swiftly away,

ContentCN: 光陰飛﹐縱即逝﹐不為我稍等候﹐
ContentEN: And the fugitive moment refuses to stay,

ContentCN: 箭脫弦﹐不可追﹐年日去﹐不可留﹐
ContentEN: The arrow is flown, the moment is gone;

ContentCN: 千禧年神的國﹐
ContentEN: The millennial year

ContentCN: 快趕到我面前﹐那永世就起首﹐
ContentEN: Rushes on to our view and eternity's here,

ContentCN: 快趕到我面前﹐那永世就起首。
ContentEN: Rushes on to our view and eternity's here,

ContentCN: 願人人都能在主來時﹐向祂說﹕
ContentEN: O that each in the day of His coming might say,

ContentCN: 當跑路已跑盡﹐
ContentEN:
I have fought my way thro',	2	3	Verse
H714	所信道已守住﹐美好仗已打過！	I have finished the work Thou didst give me to do!

ContentCN: 願人人都能從主那裏﹐聽見說﹕
ContentEN: O that each from his Lord may receive the glad word,

ContentCN: 又良善﹐又忠心﹐
ContentEN:
Well and faithfully done,	5	3	Verse
H714	可進入我喜樂﹐可同登我寶座﹐	Enter into My joy and sit down on My throne!	6	3	Verse
H714	可進入我喜樂﹐可同登我寶座。	Enter into My joy and sit down on My throne!

ContentCN: 流血免我災禍﹗
ContentEN: He died to set me free.

ContentCN: 流血免我災禍﹗
ContentEN: He died to set me free.

ContentCN: 主祢是我最知心的朋友，
ContentEN: Lord, You are always my best Friend,

ContentCN: 主祢是我最親愛的伴侶，
ContentEN: Lord You are my dear Companion,

ContentCN: 我的心在天天追想著祢，
ContentEN: So much my heart seeks You ev’ry day,

ContentCN: 渴望見到祢的面。
ContentEN: Long to see Your face.

ContentCN: 在我人生的每一個台階，
ContentEN: You are with me on life’s stairways.

ContentCN: 在我人生的每一個小站，
ContentEN: You are with me on my life’s stages.

ContentCN: 祢的手總是在攙拉著我，
ContentEN: You lead me ever in Your loving hand,

ContentCN: 把我帶在祢身邊。
ContentEN: Just to keep me on Your side.

ContentCN: 告訴我當走的路，
ContentEN: You show me the righteous way,

ContentCN: 沒有滑向死亡線，
ContentEN: Deliver me from destruction.

ContentCN: 祢愛何等的長闊深高，
ContentEN: Your love is so long, wide, deep and high,

ContentCN: 我心發出驚嘆。
ContentEN: My heart expresses awe!

ContentCN: 有了主還要什麼！
ContentEN: With the Lord I have no want,

ContentCN: 我心與主心相連，
ContentEN: My heart is one with the Lord,

ContentCN: 我已起誓要跟隨主，
ContentEN: I have promise to follow the Lord

ContentCN: 永不改變。
ContentEN: Never turning back.

ContentCN: 雖不見祢，觸不到祢，
ContentEN: Though I can’t see You, or touch You,

ContentCN: 但是我知，祢正在對我低語，
ContentEN: Yet I know You have been whispering to me.

ContentCN: 喔！主耶穌，喔！主耶穌，
ContentEN: Oh, Lord Jesus, Oh, Lord Jesus,

ContentCN: 我深知道祢一直就在這裏。
ContentEN: I truly know that You are always right here.

ContentCN: 是祢的手，釘痕的手，
ContentEN: It is Your hands, Your nail scare hands

ContentCN: 重新撫慰，我那破碎的心田，
ContentEN: That once more comfort my very broken heart.

ContentCN: 是祢聲音，溫柔話語，
ContentEN: It is Your voice, the gentle words,

ContentCN: 再度填滿我心靈中的飢渴。
ContentEN: That once again fill my heart and empty soul.

ContentCN: 主是為我釘十字架﹐
ContentEN: For me the Lord was crucified;

ContentCN: 主是為我釘十字架﹐
ContentEN: For me the Lord was crucified;

ContentCN: 為我受苦流血捨命﹔
ContentEN: In agony and blood He died.

ContentCN: 為我受苦流血捨命﹔
ContentEN: In agony and blood He died.

ContentCN: 主代替我在十字架﹐
ContentEN: On Calvary His body torn:

ContentCN: 主代替我在十字架﹐
ContentEN: On Calvary His body torn:

ContentCN: 擔當一切罪惡疾病。
ContentEN: The ransom paid for sins of mine.

ContentEN: The ransom paid for sins of mine.

ContentEN: Beneath the cross of Jesus, I fain would take my stand,

ContentCN: 耶穌乃是罪人之友﹐祂今尋找你﹔
ContentEN: He who was the friend of sinners, seeks thee, lost one, now;

ContentEN: Sinner, come, and at His footstool penitently bow.

ContentCN: 深過波濤滾滾大海洋﹔
ContentEN: Deeper than the mighty rolling sea;

ContentCN: 深過波濤滾滾大海洋﹔
ContentEN: Deeper than the mighty rolling sea;

ContentCN: 高過最高山嶺﹐美過最美泉源﹐
ContentEN: Higher than the mountain, sparkling like a fountain,

ContentCN: 高過最高山嶺﹐美過最美泉源﹐
ContentEN: Higher than the mountain, sparkling like a fountain,

ContentCN: 奇妙救恩足夠我需用﹔
ContentEN: All sufficient grace for even me,

ContentCN: 奇妙救恩足夠我需用﹔
ContentEN: All sufficient grace for even me,

ContentCN: 闊過我一生所行的過犯﹐
ContentEN: Broader than the scope of my transgressions,

ContentCN: 闊過我一生所行的過犯﹐
ContentEN: Broader than the scope of my transgressions,

ContentCN: 大過我一切罪污邪情﹐
ContentEN: Greater far than all my sin and shame.

ContentCN: 大過我一切罪污邪情﹐
ContentEN: Greater far than all my sin and shame.

ContentCN: 我要稱揚主聖名﹐我要讚美主聖名﹗
ContentEN: O magnify the precious name of Jesus, Praise His name!

ContentCN: 我要稱揚主聖名﹐我要讚美主聖名﹗
ContentEN: O magnify the precious name of Jesus, Praise His name!

ContentCN: 耶穌奇妙的救恩﹐臨到失喪之人﹔
ContentEN: Wonderful grace of Jesus, reaching to all the lost,

ContentCN: 耶穌奇妙的救恩﹐臨到失喪之人﹔
ContentEN: Wonderful grace of Jesus, reaching to all the lost,

ContentCN: 藉救恩我罪得赦﹐並拯救我靈魂。
ContentEN: By it I have been pardoned, saved to the uttermost,

ContentCN: 藉救恩我罪得赦﹐並拯救我靈魂。
ContentEN: By it I have been pardoned, saved to the uttermost,

ContentCN: 主為我解脫捆綁﹐使我得著釋放﹔
ContentEN: Chains have been torn asunder, giving me liberty;

ContentCN: 主為我解脫捆綁﹐使我得著釋放﹔
ContentEN: Chains have been torn asunder, giving me liberty;

ContentCN: 耶穌奇妙的救恩使我得拯救。
ContentEN: For the wonderful grace of Jesus reaches me.

ContentCN: 耶穌奇妙的救恩使我得拯救。
ContentEN: For the wonderful grace of Jesus reaches me.
